40001001	Jesus Kristus wõ yen, anĩ nẽ ibor gĩ isin, Ĩ Dawid tubu, Abraham nẽ ibor.
40001002	Isak, ne tama Abraham, Jakop, ne tama Isak, Juda, ne tura tar geid, idi temeid Jakop,
40001003	Feres Sera ado, nedi temeid Juda, nedi sineid Tamar, Hesron, ne tama Feres, Ram, ne tama Hesron,
40001004	Aminadab, ne tama Ram, Nason, ne tama Aminadab, Salmon, ne tama Nason,
40001005	Boas, ĩ yogon tama Salmon, Boas sina Rahab, ĩ haiden kayau, Israel kayau sã, Obed, ĩ yogon tama Boas, yogon sina Rut, ĩ haiden kayau, Israel kayau sã, Jesi, ne tama Obed,
40001006	King Dawid, ne tama Jesi. Solomon, ne tama Dawid, Solomon ne sina ĩ, kulu kusĩ mudur Uria nẽ kayaun,
40001007	Rehoboam, ne tama Solomon, Abiya, ne tama Rehoboam, Asa, ne tama Abiya,
40001008	Jehosafat, ne tama Asa, Jehoram, ne tama Jehosafat, Usia, ne tama Jehoram,
40001009	Jotam, ne tama Usia, Ahas, ne tama Jotam, Hesekia, ne tama Ahas,
40001010	Manase, ne tama Hesekia, Amon, ne tama Manase, Josia ne tama, Amon,
40001011	Jekonia in tura tar geid, nedi temeid Josia, sain anĩ bun, Babilonem Israel tamo kayau guri difeid dirou, Babilon kalabus bun dilen.
40001012	Babilon kalabus bun dilen sain anĩ bunem, Sieltiel, ne tama Jekonia, Serubabel, ne tama Sieltiel,
40001013	Abiud, ne tama Serubabel, Eliakim, ne tama Abiud, Asor, ne tama Eliakim,
40001014	Sadok, ne tama Asor, Akim, ne tama Sadok, Eliud, ne tama Akim,
40001015	Eleasar, ne tama Eliud, Matan, ne tama Eleasar, Jakop, ne tama Matan,
40001016	Josef ĩ, ne tama Jakop, Josef ĩ Maria aiwa, Maria ĩ Jesus gõ fen, Jesus ĩ anĩ Kristus dedig.
40001017	Anĩ nigin, ibor Abraham bun tamal ile Dawid, are ibor 14, Dawid bun tamal ile Babilon kalabus dilen, are ibor 14, kalabus bun tamal ile Kristus wõ yen, are ibor 14.
40001018	Jesus wõ yen anĩ eig fiya: In sina Maria Josefem yalouf nigin digirkenen, anĩ ere, idi uruwom fau mois diyo ken, Awa Uur Fateul bunem Maria bou adon anĩ dilen.
40001019	Josef, Maria ne aiwa, ĩ nun karĩya tamo, anĩ ĩ Maria atun meleid bun yana sane ifenẽya itor ken, yaor to wogõ yen, ĩ namen kayau anĩ itornẽf nigin kisi fen.
40001020	Agef kisif mog, Negur nẽ engel, imĩya bun ĩ wagen wõ ye fen, iron, “Josef, Dawid naal, Maria wale fõ bun on kayau ibodõf nigin to kumĩ wo, ere nigin, Maria namen kare fef are, Awa Uur Fateul bunem.
40001021	Kayau anĩ kesu monog gõ fouf, õ yana ũ Jesus wouf, ere nigin, yogon tamo kayau mosor bun temeleid kel gei fouf.”
40001022	Negur nẽ od, profet sigor bun eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin, enĩ ganan wõ yen:
40001023	“Kayau taulei kesu adouf, kesu monog gõ fouf, idi yana dũ Imanuel douf,” anĩ nẽ gariya, “Negur ĩ ada ado.”
40001024	Sain Josef irik yen, Negur nẽ engel wogõ fiyen kilei agef fen, Maria yale fõ bun irou ile, in kayau ibodon.
40001025	Anĩ ere, ĩ kayau ado bouweid bagu fiya san, ile kesu monog matu gõ fen, anĩ Josef kesu yana yũ Jesus yen.
40002001	King Herod nẽ sain bun, Jesus Betlehem fonõ Judia distrik bun wõ yen, anĩ bure fele di, keleĩ tamo gaa iseyan temeleid Jerusalem disin,
40002002	idi to difen, “Kesu momou Juda neid king wõ youf den anĩ, nain wõ yen? Amã in barisa gaa iseyan melem mailen, ĩ yana malesauf nigin masin.”
40002003	King Herod od anĩ karĩ yen, ĩ wau morõ fen, idi Jerusalem dibodon anĩ ganan geid waud morõ fedin.
40002004	Agef fen, tamo kayau neid pris odudug ganan ado, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo ganan iweigneĩd, guru dife di, ĩ to fedin, “Kristus nain bagai wõ youf?”
40002005	Idi aiten dalen, “Oun Betlehem fonõ Judia distrik an, age fouf nigin kulu profet eig ye itoton:
40002006	“‘Õ Betlehem, Juda teneub bun, õ Juda neid uyu irouya atun naal bagai sã, fau õ bunem tamo yana odug ado wõ youf, ĩ anim neu tamo kayau Israel marau ibodõf.’ ”
40002007	Age de di, Herod gaa iseyan keleĩ tamo iminẽyan iweigneĩd fen, ere sain bagai barisa anĩ wõ yen anĩ kelein.
40002008	Ĩ idi Betlehem sur feid fen, iron, “Ulagauf, kesu anĩ foinenem ed ge umirẽgouf. Kesu anĩ fata gouf, kaisã bagai aya urokanag, ago ge di, ayag ele fen, yana alesauf.”
40002009	King nẽ od karĩ del fen, idi naab dale dilen, age de mog, barisa oun gaa iseyan idi dilen anĩ, ĩ ket uyu ile, kesu yenen nẽ modoũ an bagai dẽ yel ifaren.
40002010	Barisa anĩ dẽ yele di, dile fen, idi waud kulĩya odug bagai adon.
40002011	Fõ namen disorũ dilen, kesu sina Maria ado diledin, idi bobou dife fen, in yana dalesen, age de fen, nedi faa diwareĩd fen, safina ege luwa eneidi difenen, are gol, aa gaula sumeĩ nigin tõ fiyadig, moul aa bun tamal sumeĩ biya biya ado anĩ.
40002012	Herod wagenem to ke de dilauf nigin, imĩya bunem wedereid iroun, anĩ nigin, idi neid teneub bun ke douf nigin naab taka dalen.
40002013	Idi dilel mog, Odug nẽ engel, imĩya bun Josef wagen wõ yen, ĩ iron, “Fã wo, kesu sina ado gei wo, uyag Isip uleg, an ubodõg uleg mog, aya fau arokonõf, gama bagai Herod kesu imirek yukesiyouf nigin age fef.”
40002014	Anĩ nigin, Josef fã yen, kesu sina ado gei feid, bõ turan Isip diya dilen.
40002015	Josef fau an ibod mog, Herod laa fen. Anĩ bun, Odug nẽ od, profet sigor bun eig ye wogõ yen anĩ, wõ ye kisi felen, “Isip bun tamal aya neu kesu aweignen.”
40002016	Herod mogo kisi yalen, “Gaa iseyan keleĩ tamo aya didegnan,” ye fen, ĩ mogo fatuk bagai seye yen, keleĩ tamo naa nigin solo de dirokenen anĩ bun kisi es fe fen, Betlehem fonõ kalilĩ fiya anĩ kesu monog yar uru, yar tekelei anĩ ganan didenkesiyouf nigin bagai ari fedi di, didenkesin.
40002017	Anĩ bun, Negur, profet Jeremaia bunem eig ye wogõ yen anĩ, agef kisi felen:
40002018	“Rama fonõ ait taka, inã wau gudũ fiya odug karĩ den, Rahel inã odug gere tar nigin yalen, ĩ taka nem bobo fiyẽf anĩ itoron, ere nigin, yogon kesu taka to mata ibodon.”
40002019	Herod laa fe di, Odug nẽ engel, Josef Isip ibod mog, imĩya bun ĩ wagen wõ ye fen,
40002020	iron, “Fã wo, kesu sina ado gei wo, Israel teneub bun ule, ere nigin, idi kesu yukesiya nigin age difen are mogo gare den.”
40002021	Age fe di, Josef fã yen, kesu sina ado gei feid, Israel teneub bun diyok dilen.
40002022	Anĩ ere, ĩ, Akelaus ĩ mogo tama Herod fotokar Judia teneub lo fef ya anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ an ileya nigin kumĩ yen. Imĩya bun weder iroun nigin, ĩ tokõ fel, Galili distrik ilen.
40002023	Josef ilen, taun taka Nasaret dedig an ibodon. Anĩ bun, profet od eig de wogõ den anĩ kisi felen, “Ĩ Nasaret tamo douf.”
40003001	Sain anĩ bun, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo isin, gerere tuan Judia teneub bun biya od wogõ ye fen,
40003002	iweig iron, “Wauĩ falei gei, ere nigin, saa tano mogo melsak.”
40003003	Tamo enĩ nigin profet Asaia eig ye wogõ yen, “Ait taka gerere tuan iweig iron, ‘Odug nẽ naab dodok gei, in naab madur gei.’”
40003004	Jon ne gabar are kamel siwi, ĩ gaar gabar nem lũ diwan anim luwa gu fedig. Yogon saaf totobi nin te ado.
40003005	Tamo kayau Jon wagen guru difen, idi Jerusalem, Judia teneub ganan, Jordan naan kalilĩ fiya anĩ adok bun temeleid.
40003006	Idi neid mosor yaor difele di, Jon Jordan naan igunẽdin.
40003007	Anĩ ere, ĩ naan iguneĩd mog, Farisia tamo, Sadusia tamo geid musei disi di, ileid fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Ã, gogour sane gere tar! Didi isiyouf anĩ wal ge fen, uyagauf nigin aim irokenein?
40003008	Wauĩ falei gef are, age fiya gen faat biya ũ gouf.
40003009	Ã aug nigin kisi to eig ye irõf, ‘Abraham nemã tamamã.’ Aya arokeneik, meein eneidi bun Negur sã irõ di, Abraham gere tar wowã douf.
40003010	Safor aayũ gariyan mogo ibodok, aayũ ganan faat biya to yuk, are itu ira ken, yã malan irãf.
40003011	“Wauĩ falei gef nigin, aya naan nem naan aguneik, anĩ ere, taka ĩ aya dumeun isiyouf, ĩ megeir barikã aya wal fiya, ayam yogon ye su inukeis kenẽya kisi feleya sã. Ĩ Awa Uur Fateul yã ado nem naan iguneĩf.
40003012	Ĩ susu fiya nẽ fok iman ado, ĩ yogon susu fiya nẽ mayã waĩ fouf, yogon wit biya are wit fõ bun kuruf fen, wit ido yã mala faimud bun an irãf.”
40003013	Anĩ bure fele di, Jesus Jonem naan igunẽf nigin Galili tamal Jordan naanũ isin.
40003014	Anĩ ere, Jon Jesus gudũ fiye ken, iron, “Onom aya naan igunaya, ere nigin aya garan usif?”
40003015	Jesus aiten yalen, “Arokonok nem ago. Negur nẽ madur bagai anĩ ganan kisi falauf nigin ada age tafouf, are biya.” Age ye di, Jon dõf age fen.
40003016	Jesus naan yale bure fel fen, kaisã bagai ĩ naanũ tamal fã yen. Agef mog bagai, saa ilun bobog kã fele di, ĩ lof mog, Negur nẽ Awa Uur, ninã kuburir gen Jesus muduren isi, lalan ifenen.
40003017	Ait taka saa ilun iweig iron, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig.”
40004001	Anĩ bure fele di, Awa Uur Jesus itonẽ di, gerere tuan ile, Satanem kisi fiyen.
40004002	Ĩ kuri ibodon, naa foti bõ foti bure fele di, ĩ naũ fen.
40004003	Kisi fiyẽya tamo Satan, ĩ bun wõ ye fen, irokenen, “Õ Negur Naal ouf are, meein enidi urõ di, bret falei fediyouf.”
40004004	Jesus Satan aiten yalen, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, ‘Tamo bretem dogol to mata ifenẽf, sã, od ganan Negur sigor bun isif anim mata ifenẽf.’ ”
40004005	Age fe di, Satan Jesus yale irou, fateul taun Jerusalem irou iselen, an tempel fõ soko ilun bagai inenẽ ifaren.
40004006	Satan iron, “Õ Negur Naal ouf are, ogo ufũ urã. Ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, “‘Negur õ nigin yogon engel ari fedi di, idi õ imedim ololon daleyõf, age dife di, õ yẽ meein takam to itutu ouf.’ ”
40004007	Jesus Satan aiten yale iron, “Negur nẽ Itotoya taka buneg eig ye irok, ‘Odug ogon Negur kisi fiya bun to unenẽf.’ ”
40004008	Baban, Satan Jesus yale irou, arei odug ilun biya isel fen, teneub enei nẽ tano ganan, nedi biya fiya adok ifelnen.
40004009	Satan iron, “Enidi ganan aya afonõf, õ wageun bobou wo, selu wabiyouf are.”
40004010	Jesus Satan irokenen, “Satan, utorna ule! Ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, ‘Odug ogon Negur seli wabi fen, ĩ dogol aruna walouf.’ ”
40004011	Age ye di, Satan Jesus itornẽ ile di, engel disi Jesus aruna dalen.
40004012	Jesus mogo, Jon kalabus ibodon anĩ karĩ ye fen, kel Galili distrik ilen.
40004013	Jesus Nasaret taun itor ile, Kapenaum taun ibodon, Kapenaum are Galili daliyou sirin, Sebulun Naptali ado idi neid teneub akor bun ibodon.
40004014	Od profet Asaia eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin, agef wõ yen,
40004015	“Sebulun nẽ teneub, Naptali nẽ teneub, are naab maaĩwõ ileyan, Jordan naan sitakã, Galili distrik haiden Israel sã anidi dibodok nẽ,
40004016	tamo kayau gugum bun difaren, idi lalan odug dilen, tamo kayau laa teneub ado laa nẽ buri bun dibodon idi bun lalan iran.”
40004017	Sain anĩ bunem ilen anĩ, Jesus biya od wogõya gariya inon, “Wauĩ falei gei, ere nigin, saa tano mogo melsak.”
40004018	Jesus Galili daliyou yeri iyok isil fen, mala iran uru tura ado iledin, Simon yana taka Pita, yogon tura Endru ado. Idi maaĩ daliyoun kakãg diran, ere nigin, idi gau yaleya tamo.
40004019	Jesus iron, “Usig, aya dõ wiyag len, aya ã tamo gei fiya tamo aneneĩf.”
40004020	Kaisã bagai, idi neid kakãg folõ difel fen, Jesus dõ difen.
40004021	Anenem iyok ile fen, Jesus baban mala iran uru tura ado iledin, Jems Sebedi ne naal, yogon tura Jon ado. Idi waag bun nedi temeid Sebedi geid kakãg madur difedif dibodon. Jesus disiyouf nigin iweignẽdin.
40004022	Kaisã bagai, temeid waag ado ditor ken, Jesus dõ difen.
40004023	Jesus Galili distrik akor anĩ adok iyo ken, Juda neid uub fõ bun od ifelneĩd, saa tano ne biya od anĩ wogõ fedin, agef fen, tamo kayau atun dagi fire fire ado ilõyabidiya adok el fedin.
40004024	Ĩ nigin od anĩ, Siria teneub ganan bun iyokelen, age fe di, tamo kayau idi, dagi taka taka adodo anidi ganan Jesus wagen guri difeid, disin, idi darau odug biya adodo, idi kaa sesen adodo, idi mir adodo, idi bouweid ilolaisidiya anĩ, Jesus el fedin.
40004025	Guru fiya odug, Galili temeleid, Dekapolis temeleid, Jerusalem temeleid, Judia teneub ado Jordan naan sitakã teneub akor anĩ ganan tamo kayau Jesus dõ difen.
40005001	Gama tamo kayau musei guru dife di, Jesus ileid fen, arei wala bun isel ibodon. Yogon dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disin.
40005002	Jesus gariya ino ifelneĩd fen, iron,
40005003	“Aib idi uur nigin maleg dibodok, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, saa tano are idi neid.
40005004	Aib idi waud gudũ fedif, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi waud yo fediyouf.
40005005	Aib idi molol dibodok, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi teneub akor adouf.
40005006	Aib idi Negur nẽ madur bagai nigin naũ fedif, naan ail fedif, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi weit fediyouf.
40005007	Aib idi waud ifenẽdif, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi wau ifenẽya dalouf.
40005008	Aib idi waud bun karẽtut, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi Negur dilouf.
40005009	Aib idi maur gudũ difedig, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, idi Negur gere tar difediyouf.
40005010	Aib idi Negur nẽ madur bagai nigin darau dalef, gama idi el fedif, ere nigin, saa tano are idi neid.
40005011	“Aib ã aya nigin tamo kayau idi kono diyeik, darau difeneik, idegẽya bun od sane ganan ã bun dirarak, gama ã nigin el yeik.
40005012	Wauĩ kulĩg fen, sereg, ere nigin, ãgenei mala solo saa tano bun odug, profet idi ket dibodoneg kulu darau age fiya bagai dalen.
40005013	“Ã teneub enĩ nẽ sol, anĩ ere, sol in kai sa kalauf are, ere naig fe di, baban kai adouf? Ĩ baban ereb kabĩ taka ifenẽya kisi feleya sã, diraile di, tamo anĩ teten dilef, disi difouf dogol.
40005014	“Ã teneub enĩ nẽ lalan. Taun taka uya bun ibodok anĩ inokeleya kisi feleya sã.
40005015	Age fiya gen, tamo kayau lam tõ de fen, beĩ kur to dinouf. Age fiya ban, idi yoki bun diseginnẽ di, anĩ lalan tamo ganan fõ anĩ bun ifenẽdif.
40005016	Age fiya bagai, ãgenei fula fiya tamo kayau lalan ifenẽdiyouf, ago ge di, tamo kayau idi ãgenei tobonuneĩ biya anĩ dile fen, ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok anĩ seli dabiyouf.
40005017	“Aya asin anĩ, Moses nẽ Lo, profet neid od ado alelauf nigin asin to gouf, aya anĩ yaleleya nigin to asin, anĩ kisi afalauf nigin asin.
40005018	Aya momoi bagai arokeneik, sain saa teneub ado iminkeleya sã mog, sifa naal bagai, pen togo fiya anĩ Lo bun taka to fitol yale iminkalauf, idi anĩ ganan dibod mog, ereb ereb ganan kisi falauf.
40005019	Aibem taka, ĩtãfiya enĩ nẽ tekelei naal bagai anĩ to dõf fen, tamo tunĩ ĩ dõ difiyẽ age difouf nigin ifelnẽdiyouf are, ĩ saa tanon yana naal bagai youf, anĩ ere, aib taka ĩtãfiya eneidi dõf agef kisi fel ifelnẽdiyouf, saa tanon yana odug yalouf.
40005020	Anĩ aya arokeneik, ãgenei madur bagai anim, Farisia tamo ado lo ifelnẽdiya tamo neid madur bagai to wal gouf are, ã saa tanon ileya nigin kisi feleya sã bagai.
40005021	“Tamo ĩtãfiya kulu eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Õ tamo to ukeis, taka ne tã yukesif are, es fiya bun ifarauf.’
40005022	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, aibem taka tura seye ifenek are, ĩ es fiya bun ifarauf. Baban, aib taka tura irokenek, ‘Daku,’ ĩ kot bun ifarauf. Takag, aibem irok, ‘Õ neneya!’ age youf, hel nẽ yã uruwa dõya kelẽ fiyek.
40005023	“Anĩ nigin, õ Negur bun sesewi wou fenẽ kisi wale, alta garan safina urou ule fen, õ turã õ bun nauseir ado anĩ õ weder fokõ fouf are,
40005024	safina an alta garan utor yen, kel ule turã ado komo weleg fen, gama usi, Negur safina wenẽ, sesewi wouf.
40005025	“Aib õ kot bun irouleyõya nigin, ã uruwom naab luwe uleg fen, on kiwai tamo ado kaisã komo gouf. Sãf, ĩ õ es fiya tamo bun inenõf. Age fe di, es fiya tamo õ irouyõ polis imeid bun ino di, idim õ kalabus bun dirãyõf.
40005026	Aya momoi arokonok, õ kalabus bun kutũ yesiya sã mog, wareg ganan unolauf.
40005027	“Tamo ĩtãfiya eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Õ seseirã to uno.’
40005028	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, taka ĩ malam kayau lof fen, mala yũ yalef, ĩ mogo wau bun kayau anĩ bun seseirã inol.
40005029	Õ malã biyalem mosor bun inenõf are, ubodol uraile. Õ boũ adok hel bun irãya anĩ fotokar, õ boũ tunĩ taka iminkalauf, are deuf.
40005030	Õ imã biyalem mosor bun inenõf are, gudũ uraile. Õ boũ adok hel bun irãya anĩ fotokar, õ boũ tunĩ taka iminkalauf, are deuf.
40005031	“Ĩtãfiya eig fe yenen, ‘Aibem taka yogon aiwa iruwau fenẽ, kayau ado bagu fiya anĩ fara fiya nẽ pepa ifen ken, bagu fiya fara fouf.’
40005032	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, aibem taka, yogon kayau ĩ tamo taka ado to seseirã dino mog, iruf are, ĩ kayau anĩ seseirã naab bun inenek. Anĩ aibem taka kayau anĩ yalef, tamo anĩ mogo seseirã inof.
40005033	“Takag, tamo ĩtãfiya kulu eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Ã wau kuturoleya od anĩ to waleleg. Ã wau kuturoleya od, Odug mala bun unogen anĩ kulatun gouf.’
40005034	Anĩ ere, aya arokeneik, od megeir ifenẽya bun, saa mala bun to bagai wouf, ere nigin, saa are Negur nẽ ibodõya modoũ.
40005035	Oo teneub mala buneg to wouf, ere nigin, teneub are Negur ye inoya nẽ sawa. Oo Jerusalemeg mala bun to wouf, ere nigin, are King Odug in taun yana.
40005036	Õ muduremeg anĩ nigin megeir to unouf, ere nigin, õ ogon fatiya age fe di, lalau be karos be taka wõya kisi feleya sã.
40005037	Ã nigin yo yeya are yo gouf, sã de sã gouf dogol, od enĩ wal fe fen, tobol fiya are Satan bunem isif.
40005038	“Tamo ĩtãfiya eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Mala fagã difouf, mala solo abag mala fagã wo. Waila are waila tura.’
40005039	Anĩ ere, aya arokeneik, tamo sane mala solo to wenẽ. Tamo taka ogon walã biyalẽ fakã fouf are, falei wel len, walã sitakãg fakã fouf.
40005040	Tamo taka ogon kolos yalouf nigin kot yõ fenẽ, malakaĩ ogon saket anĩg utorken.
40005041	Tamo taka mail tekelei ileya nigin nugo yõf, malakaĩ uruwom mail uru ulagauf.
40005042	Aibem ereb taka nigin to yok, are wenẽf. Aibem ereb taka wareg õ bun yalou fenẽf, õ to dudum wiyẽ.
40005043	“Tamo ĩtãfiya eig den anĩ karĩ gen, ‘Õ nẽ tã nigin waũ laaf fen, on kiwai anĩ kiwai wenẽ.’
40005044	Anĩ ere, aya arokeneik, ãgenei kiwai nigin wauĩ laaf fen, tunĩ darau difeneik idi nigineg kosẽ gouf.
40005045	Ago gouf are, ã Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok gere tar wowã gouf. Ĩ yogon gaa sur fef, tamo sane, tamo biya adok daledig, taka uyẽg sur fef, tamo madur, tamo madur sã adok ifenẽdidig.
40005046	Idi ã nigin orodidig anidi nigin dogol wauĩ laa fouf are, ere mala solo anĩ ã walogouf? Are takis yaleya tamog to age difedig de?
40005047	Ã tureĩ tar dogol aan wiyẽdigouf are, ere anĩ tunĩ wal fediya ago gef? Haiden are idig, anĩ to age difedig de?
40005048	Anĩ nigin, Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok ĩ madur bagai gen, ãg de madur bagai agog.
40006001	“Ã lo welegei, ãgenei tobonuneĩ madur anĩ seluma kulõ difouf ge mã, anĩ tamo kayau meleid bun yaau to du wog. Ã ago gouf, Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok mala solo to ifeneĩf.
40006002	“Sain õ maleg tamo usennẽdiyou fenẽ, õ anĩ taur to fũ fen, ait bagauf, mala yaleya tamo Juda neid uub fõ bun ado naabur, tamo idi seluma kulõ difouf de fen, age difedig gen. Aya momoi arokeneik, idi anĩ nẽ mala solo adok mogo dalen.
40006003	Anĩ õ maleg tamo usennẽdif, on imã kilẽ to keleĩ mog, imã biya melẽ age fouf,
40006004	anĩ õ iminẽyan dor walef. Ago di, on Tamã, õ iminẽyan agol, ile fen, mala solo ifonõf.
40006005	“Sain ã kosẽ gouf bun, ã mala yaleya tamo age difedig gen to agog. Idi tamo dilemãf de fen, Juda neid uub fõ namen ado naab kaleyan difar fen, kosẽya orodidig. Aya momoi arokeneik, idi anĩ nẽ mala solo adok mogo dalen.
40006006	Sain õ kosẽ wou fenẽ, õ ogon aabẽ ule, sukar unol fen, Tamã Negur, ĩ iminẽyan ibodok, kosẽ wiyẽ. Anĩ on Tamã õ iminẽyan agol, ile fen, mala solo ifonõf.
40006007	Sain ã kosẽ gouf, haiden age difedig gen, od musei to dĩg, ere nigin, idi neid kisi, nemã od musei nigin karĩ famãf de fen, idi od musei biya wogõ dedig.
40006008	Ã, idi age difedig gen, to agog, Negur ãgenei Temeĩ ĩ ereb ã lau gef anĩ mogo keleĩ mog, dum ĩ to wiyẽgedig.
40006009	“Kosẽ gou fenẽ, ã eig wog urõgouf: “‘Õ nemã Dei õ saa ilun ubodok, õ yanã fateul ibodõf,
40006010	ogon tano isiyouf, ogon oroyok saa ilun age fef gen, tenebur eineg age fouf.
40006011	Saaf naa enĩ nẽ wanamãf.
40006012	Õ amã nemã mosor nigin wederẽ tu kalauf, are idi amã bun mosor dinof, amãg idi neid mosor nigin wederamã tu kelef gen.
40006013	Kisi famãya bun to uroulemãf, sesen anĩ bun tamal amã walelnamãf.’
40006014	Tamo idi ã bun mosor dinoyeĩf, ã idi neid mosor nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf are, ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok, ĩg ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.
40006015	Anĩ ere, ã tamo idi neid mosor nigin wedereĩ to tu kalauf are, ãgenei Temeĩ, ĩg ãgenei mosor nigin weder to tu kalauf.
40006016	“Sain ã kuri gouf, mala yaleya tamo sẽya nẽ neweid age difedig gen to ago gei, ago gouf, tamo anĩ dile fen kuri def douf. Aya momoi arokeneik, anĩ nẽ mala solo adok mogo dalen.
40006017	Anĩ ere, sain õ kuri wouf, fatiyã moul u ken, nawã usurũf.
40006018	Anĩ bunem, õ kuri bek oo sã be, tamo idi õ nigin to keleĩ youf. Ogon Tamã, Negur iminẽyan ibodok, ĩ yogo dogol keleĩ youf, anĩ ogon Tamã õ iminẽyan ereb ago wouf ile fen, mala solo ifonõf.
40006019	“Aug nigin safina biya biya tenebur ein to kuru wog. An dedek yãf, maat te yũf, bẽ tamog narĩ de, bẽ dalouf.
40006020	Ã aug nigin safina biya biya saa ilun kuru wog. An dedek to yãf, maat te to yũf, bẽ tamog to narĩ de, bẽ dalouf.
40006021	Ogon safina biya biya ibodok nẽ an, ogon waũg an yenẽf.
40006022	“Mala are bouwa nẽ yal. Õ malã biyauf are, ogon bouwã ganan lalan lauf.
40006023	Anĩ ere, õ malã sane lauf are, ogon bouwã ganan gugum kalauf. Lalan õ ado anĩ gugum kalauf, gugum are odug bagai!
40006024	“Aib taka ĩ yogon marau uru bun kabĩ to yalouf. Anĩ taka kiwai ifen ken, taka anĩ nigin wau laa fouf. Ĩ taka anĩ dõf fen, taka anĩ mala irim fouf. Anĩ nigin, ã uru to aruneid walogouf, Negur ado moni.
40006025	“Age fiya nigin, aya ã arokeneik, ã ãgenei bouweĩ mata ibodõf nigin to osig fen, ere saaf tãf, ere naan tãf gouf. Ã ãgenei bouweĩ nigin to osig fen, ere gabar tafilaĩf gouf. Mata anĩ saaf wal fiya, bouwa anĩ gabar wal fiya sã de?
40006026	Saa ilun ã ninã uledigouf, idi saaf to ditenẽdig, idi saaf u de fen, kin to dinodig, anĩ ere, ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun yogo ifoutnẽdidig. Ã idi anĩ wal fediya sã de?
40006027	Ã takam yogon mata nigin osi ye fen, aua tekelei tobol fiya kisi feleya de?
40006028	“Ere nigin ã gabar nigin osi gef? Dubur aa munĩ, naig fe odugedig anĩ ulogouf. Idi kabĩ to daledig, to diwadig.
40006029	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, kulu King Solomoneg, yogon saki gegẽ biya biya ifonun anim, aa munĩ eig fediya taka to wal fen.
40006030	Anĩ ere, Negur, dubur aa munĩ gama dogol ifarauf, nile di, yã irãf anĩ, agef naki fediyouf are, ã bun idi wal fediya bagai Negur ifounneĩf, age fiya sã de, ã momoiya naal bagai ado?
40006031	Anĩ nigin, to osi wog urõgouf, ‘Ere saaf ada tãf?’ oo ‘Ere naan ada tãf?’ oo ‘Ere gabar ada tafilaĩf?’
40006032	Haiden idi enĩ ganan nigin meleid dimirẽdig. Ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun lau gef anĩ ganan keleĩ.
40006033	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ tano ado yogon madur bagai ketem umirẽg, ago ge di, safina eneidig ganan ifeneĩf.
40006034	Age fiya nigin, naa nil nẽ anĩ nigin to osi wog, nil nẽ are yogo nigin osi youf. Naa mugu mugu nẽ morõ are idi dogo dalouf.
40007001	“Taka to es wiyẽg, ago gouf, ãg es yeĩf.
40007002	Anĩ nigin, tunĩ es wedigef gen, ãg agef es yeĩf. Ãgenei es fiya nẽ naab de tekelei bun ãg agef es yeĩf.
40007003	“Õ ere nigin turã mala teteur lo fen, õ ogon aa masak malã bun ibodok anĩ to ulef?
40007004	Aa masak ogon malã bun ibod mog, naig fe di, turã nigin dogol urokenek, ‘Utor len, aya ogon malã teteur alelkonõf’?
40007005	Õ mala yaleya tamo, õ ogon malã bun ketem aa masak walel kelẽ wol fen, dum turã bun mala teteur walelauf.
40007006	“Ereb fateul anĩ gaũ to urakenẽdig. Ãgenei maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel anĩ bor to urakenẽdig. Ã ago gouf, yedim lalai difouf. Age de fen, falei del, ã serek de fisik diyeĩf.
40007007	“To gouf, agef ã ifeneĩf; umirẽgouf, ã gurug gouf; godugodu gouf, ã sukar kã feneĩf.
40007008	Aibem taka to fef, yalouf; aibem taka imirek, gurug fouf; aibem taka godugodu fef, sukar kã fel kenẽf.
40007009	“Ã anĩ takam, ĩ naal bret nigin to fef, ĩ meein ifenẽf de?
40007010	Takag, ĩ gau nigin to fef, ĩ gogour ifenẽf de?
40007011	Seseneĩ bagai ã, ãgenei kesu safina biya biya anĩ ifenẽdiya ã keleĩ bagai, age fiyauf are, Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok, safina biya biya aib idi to difiyek, ãgenei wenẽdigedig anĩ wal fiya, idi ifenẽdiyouf!
40007012	Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb ganan bun, ereb taka idim age diyeĩf anĩ oroyeik anĩ, ãg idi nigin ago gouf. Od enĩ Lo od ado Profet od neid kaũ.
40007013	“Bobog kidõ bun usorug ulagauf. Ere nigin, daũ fiya bun ileya nigin bobog bilalã fiya, naab odug. Tamo kayau musei naab odug anĩ diledig.
40007014	Anĩ ere, mata tano bun ileya nigin bobog kidõ, naab naal. Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau teke tekeleim dogol, anĩ fata difedig.
40007015	“Idegẽya profet anidi lo weledigei. Idi ege sipsip siwi difoun ken, ã garan disif, anĩ ere, idi namedin gaũ kuĩ sane ado.
40007016	Idi neid faat yũf bun, ã idi dogo anibo be biya be ulogouf. Tamo kayau idi wei biya barik bun, gira udum bun daledig de?
40007017	Age fiya gen, aayũ biya are faat biya yũdig, aayũ anibo are faat anibo yũdig.
40007018	Aayũ biya ĩ, faat sane yũya kisi feleya sã, aayũ anibo are faat biya imaya kisi feleya sã.
40007019	Aayũ ganan faat biya to imaf are, ditu dale yã malan dirãf.
40007020	Age fiya nigin, idi neid faat yũdig bunem, ã idi nigin yaor keleĩ youf.
40007021	“Idi aya ‘Odug, Odug’ de fen dirokanadig, idi ganan saa tanon to dilauf. Aibem ĩ, neu Dei saa ilun ibodok in oroya dõf age fef anim dogol ilauf.
40007022	Naa anĩ bun, musei aya dirokanauf, ‘Odug, Odug, amã õ yanã nem profet od wogõ maun, amã õ yanã nem kaa sesen maruid fen, õ yanã nem memelik musei manodin!’
40007023	Age de di, aya yaor arokenẽdiyouf, ‘Aya ã keleĩ sã. Ã sane gide gedig, uyaleleg!’
40007024	“Age fiya nigin, taka ĩ neu od eneidi karĩ ye fen, dõf age fef, ĩ keleĩ tamo yogon fõ meein teten inon gen.
40007025	Sain uyẽ burabura isin, kuwei odug ile, solalã fel fen, yau odug fã ye fen, fõ yoũ fe di, to kubũ yen, ere nigin, tor gariya meein teten inon.
40007026	Anĩ ere, aib taka ĩ neu od eneidi karĩ ye fen, to dõf age fef, ĩ neneya tamo yogon fõ subusir teten inon gen.
40007027	Sain uyẽ burabura isin, kuwei odug ile, solalã fel fen, yau odug fã ye fen, fõ yoũ fe di, kubũ ye narĩf irailen.”
40007028	Od ganan Jesus wogõ ye idikele di, tamo kayau in od ifelnẽdin anĩ nigin terẽ den,
40007029	ere nigin, Jesus ifelnẽdin are, taka ĩ yana adom gen age fiya od wogõ fedin, idi neid lo ifelnẽdiya tamo age difedig gen sã.
40008001	Jesus arein tamal kutũ yesi di, tamo kayau musei dõ difiyen.
40008002	Tamo lepra dagi ado isi, Jesus wagen ibor bobou fe fen, irokenen, “Odug, õ waũ irom are, aya el fiyaya nigin kisi feleyam.”
40008003	Jesus ima iran, tamo anĩ kobũf fen, iron, “Aya wau irok, bouwã biyaf.” Age ye di, kaisã bagai yogon lepra dagi sa kelen.
40008004	Jesus irokenen, “Õ aib taka to urokenẽf. Õ ogo pris wagen ule, bouwã ufelne ken, Moses nẽ od dõ fen, safina sesewi wo, anĩ bunem õ biya lel anĩ, tamo kayau dilouf.”
40008005	Jesus Kapenaum taun wõ ye di, Rom kusĩ tamo neid orowa Jesus wagen isi fen, isennẽf nigin to fiyen.
40008006	Ĩ iron, “Odug, neu kabĩ tamo fõ bun darau odug ado ilolaisin yenek.”
40008007	Jesus irokenen, “Aya ele, el afiyẽf.”
40008008	Age ye di, kusĩ orowa aiten yale iron, “Odug, aya to biya nigin aya kisi afef, õ neu fõ bun to usiyouf. Malakaĩ, õ od dogol urõ di, anĩ neu kabĩ tamo dagi sa kalauf.
40008009	Aya yug nigin age fiya, ayag neu odug anĩ farumen abodok, kusĩ tamo idig aya farumeun dibodok. Aya taka enĩ arokenek, ‘Ule’ afiyek, ĩ ilauf. Aya taka arokenek, ‘Õ usi’ au di, ĩ isidig. Neu kabĩ tamo enĩ ago afiyek, ĩ agef age fedig.”
40008010	Od anĩ kusĩ orowa age irõ di, Jesus od anĩ karĩ ye, terẽ ye fen, tamo kayau dõ difiyen anidi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aya Israel bun ãgenei momoiya odug eig fiya taka to ailen.
40008011	Aya arokeneik, musei fau gaa iseyan gaa ileyan temeledim disiyouf, idim modoũ dalel fen, saa tano nẽ tar odug bun, Abraham, Isak, Jakop geid saa tanon dibodõf.
40008012	Anĩ ere, Israel tamo kayau musei Negurem idi nigin saa tano dodok fe kenẽdin anidi, fau dumeitur gugum bẽ mayarẽ irarãf, an inã odug ado firi de fen, goboreid kikokõ youf.”
40008013	Jesus age wogõ yel fen, kusĩ orowa irokenen, “Kel ule! Õ ogon momoiya kilei bagai, õ nigin dõf agef ifonõf.” Sain anĩ wogõ ye mog bagai, yogon kabĩ tamo dagi sa kelen.
40008014	Jesus Pita nẽ fõ bun ilen, Pita nẽ mam bouwa uruwa odug ado fatarẽ yen mog, ilen.
40008015	Jesus kayau ima anĩ kobũ fe di, bouwa uruwa fara fiye kele di, kaisã bagai kayau fã yale, Jesus aruna yalen.
40008016	Gugum mog, tamo kayau kaa sesen adodo musei guri difeid, Jesus wagen disin. Age dife di, Jesus od nem kaa sesen iruid fen, dagi adodo ganan el fedin.
40008017	Jesus enĩ ganan age fen, are Negur ĩ, profet Asaia bunem od eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin: “Ĩ yogo neda ilõyabiya yales, neda dagi faali fen.”
40008018	Sain anĩ Jesus mala iran, tamo kayau musei kalilĩ difiyẽ di, daliyou sitakã dibal dilauf nigin in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin.
40008019	Age fiyeĩd mog, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo taka wagen isi fen, irokenen, “Tise, õ narib ulauf are, aya õ dõ ayõf.”
40008020	Jesus aiten yale iron, “Gaũ kuĩ idi yenẽya nẽ modoũ ku ado, ninã lalo bun diyok idi uru ado, anĩ ere, Tamo Naal ĩ mudur inoya nẽ modoũ sã.”
40008021	In dõ fiya taka irokenen, “Odug, fau de, folõ wiya len, aya ele fen, neu dei mũ afel fen.”
40008022	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Õ aya dõ wiya, laa tamo idi, laa tutur abob mumã difouf.”
40008023	Jesus waag owor isile di, in dõ fiya tar ĩ geid dilen.
40008024	Idi keleĩ sã mog, maaĩ daliyoun yau totol fã yen. Agef mog, maaĩ odug fã ye, waag yũ di, waag anĩ naanũ imutkesilau fenẽ age fen. Anĩ ere, Jesus mulã yenen.
40008025	In dõ fiya tar dilen, turĩ difiyẽ, diron, “Odug, usennamã! Amã mogo naanũ mamutatã gare mausiyou fenẽ!”
40008026	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Ãgenei momoiya naal bagai, ere nigin ã fatuk kumĩ gef?” Age ye fen, ĩ fã ye, maaĩ yau ado ou fiyẽdi di, oditekei kee delen.
40008027	Tamo idi terẽ de fen, to difen, “Tamo eĩ naig fiya bagai? Maaĩ yau ado karĩ difiye ken, dõ difef!”
40008028	Jesus Gadara neid teneub bun daliyou sitakã ilen, kaa sesen adodo tamo uru matmat bunem dile fen, Jesus tarabã difen. Tamo uru kuĩ bagai diledin nigin, tamo ganan naab anĩ to diyõdig.
40008029	Anĩ idi diweig fen, diron, “Negur Naal, õ amã nigin ere naig wamãf? Õ naa wenen anĩ fau mog, gama bagai daig wamã fenẽ ein usif de?”
40008030	Idi difaren sitakã gerõ nuwa an, bor musei saaf doko diyon.
40008031	Kaa sesen idi Jesus digonen, “Õ tamo eneidi bun tamal urumã fenẽf are, amã bor musei namedin sur wamãf.”
40008032	Jesus kaa sesen irokenẽdin, “Uleleg!” Idi ulolõ deis fen, diselen bor namedin dilelen. Bor ganan gududu de bebeigir disil, daliyoun naanũ gare desin.
40008033	Bor lo fiya tamo diya, taun disil fen, Jesus kaa sesen irudi di, bor gare den anĩ ganan wogõ den. Age de fen, idi ereb tamo uru kaa sesen adodo bun wõ yen anĩ nigineg wogõ den.
40008034	Age de di, tamo kayau taun temeleid adok, Jesus ileya nigin dilen. Idi Jesus dile fen, idi neid fonõ anĩ itor ilauf nigin digonen.
40009001	Jesus waag taka sõ ye, daliyou ibal fen, yogon taun ilen.
40009002	Tamo tunĩ tamo bouwa ilolaisin gabgab bun yen mog, Jesus wagen diroulen. Idi neid momoiya Jesus ile fen, Jesus tamo bouwa ilolaisin irokenen, “Kesu, waũ unois, ogon mosor alelkonok.”
40009003	Anĩ karĩ de fen, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ, idi neid kisi bun diron, “Tamo eĩ Negur kono fiyek!”
40009004	Idi neid kisi kelei ken, Jesus iron, “Ã ere nigin wauĩ bun kisi sane agef wõ yef?
40009005	Nanĩ anĩ irõya nigin karika: ‘Ogon mosor alelkonok,’ de? Oo ‘Fã, ufar uyok ule’?
40009006	Anĩ ere, Tamo Naal ĩ tenebur ein mosor yaleleya nigin yana ado anĩ ã keleĩ youf nigin…” Age ye fen, tamo bouwa ilolaisin irokenen, “Fã ufar, ogon gabgab wale urou, fonõ ule.”
40009007	Age ye di, tamo fã yale, fonõ ilen.
40009008	Tamo kayau guru difen ganan anĩ meledim dile fen, terẽ de kumĩ den. Negur yogo tamo yana enĩ ifenẽdin anĩ nigin, idi Negur yana dalesen.
40009009	Jesus an tamal iyok ile fen, mala irakelen, tamo yana Matyu takis yaleya fõ bun ibod mog, ilen. Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya.” Age ye di, Matyu fã yale, Jesus dõ fen.
40009010	Jesus Matyu nẽ fõ bun bõ saaf yõ mog, takis yaleya tamo, mosor ado tamo kayau musei disi fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid weim saaf don.
40009011	Farisia tamo idi anĩ dile fen, idi Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar to difedin, “Ere nigin ãgenei tise, takis yaleya tamo, mosor ado tamo kayau geid saaf doko?”
40009012	Od anĩ Jesus karĩ ye fen, iron, “Idi bouweid biya bagai, dokta gein ileya nigin to waud yenẽdig, tamo dagi ado idim dogol, dokta gein ileya nigin waud yenẽdig.
40009013	Uleg fen, od enĩ dir ge fen, kaũ ere yeĩf anĩ keleĩ youf, ‘Aya wau ifenẽya anĩ orouf, sesewi fiya sã.’ Anĩ nigin, aya tamo madur anidi iweignẽdiya nigin to asin, aya mosor adodo anidi iweignẽdiya nigin asin.”
40009014	Age ye mog, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo nẽ dõ fiya tar disin, Jesus to difiyen, “Naig fe di, amã Farisia tamo geid kuri mau di, ogon dõ fiya tar idi kuriya sak?”
40009015	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Tamo, kayau yalou fenẽ tar bun, ne tã tar disennek idi fau weim dibod ken, naig ĩ nigin waud gudũ fouf? Dum sain wõ ye di, an ne tã tar bun tamal yalelnẽf bun anĩ, idi gama kuri douf.
40009016	“Tamo taka, gabar masak mata, gabar tubu ado baguf fen, to iwauf. Anĩ age fouf, gabar masak matam gabar tubu dĩ fe di, tubu kudef, awa kanouf.
40009017	Takag, tamo idi wain mata anĩ meme gabar tubu anĩ bun to ditinẽf. Age difouf, meme gabar kude fele di, wain oho yalauf. Meme gabar sane lauf. Age fiya sã, idi wain mata are meme gabar mata bun ditinẽf. Age fe di, uru idi kabĩ ifenẽdiya nigin biya difarauf.”
40009018	Od enĩ Jesus fau wogõ ye mog, Juda neid uub fõ nẽ uyu irouya taka isin, Jesus wagen ibor bobou fe fen, iron, “Gama bagai neu barai laa fel. Õ uma fen, imã teten uno di, kayau naal baban kel mata ibodõf.”
40009019	Jesus fã yale, uruwom dile di, yogon dõ fiya tar idig dilen.
40009020	Dile mog, kayau taka ogõ dagi faimud ado yar tuwelf iyon anĩ, Jesus dume dume isi fen, Jesus nẽ kolos iri kobũ fen.
40009021	Kayau anĩ yogon kisi iron, “Aya de yogon kolos dogol kobũ afouf, anĩ aya neu dagi sa kalauf.”
40009022	Jesus falei yelen, kayau anĩ ile fen, iron, “Nau barai, waũ unois, ogon momoiya anim dagi sa kel konok.” Age ye mog bagai, kayau in dagi sa kelen.
40009023	Jesus uyu irouya nẽ fõ bun isour ilen, mala iran, tamo kayau musei kokũ de, i de mog, iledin.
40009024	Jesus iron, “Uyaleleg, kayau naal enĩ laa fiya sã, mulã yenek.” Age ye di, idi kasã difiyen.
40009025	Tamo kayau mayarẽ irud laisi fen, Jesus aab namen ilen, kayau naal ima yale iroun. Age fe di, kayau naal fã yen.
40009026	Nenerĩ anĩ wogõ de di, teneub anĩ ganan bun iyokelen.
40009027	Jesus modoũ anĩ itor ken, iyok ile mog, tamo uru meleid ifofakeleya Jesus dõ difiyen, diweig diron, “Dawid Naal, amã nigin waũ inõ!”
40009028	Jesus fõ aaben ile di, tamo uru meleid ifofakeleya wagen dilen, Jesus idi to fedin, “Ã momoi gef, aya ã meleĩ el afe di, lo gouf nigin kisi feleya?” Idi aiten dalen, “Ao, Odug.”
40009029	Age de di, Jesus imam meleid kobũ feid fen, iron, “Momoi gef kilei, ã nigin age feneĩf.”
40009030	Idi neid meleid gama kelẽ delen. Jesus totol bagai katũ feid fen, iron, “Enĩ nigin taka to urokenẽgouf.”
40009031	Anĩ ere, idi kututũ deis dile fen, Jesus age fen anĩ, teneub anĩ nẽ akor ganan bun od dinof diyon.
40009032	Idi Jesus ditornẽ dile mog, tamo taka kaa sanem ait ifokelen anĩ Jesus wagen dirousin.
40009033	Kaa sane iru di, iyan, tamo ait ifokeleya wogõ yen. Tamo kayau guru difen ganan terẽ de fen, diron, “Kulu nem isi gama, Israel bun eig fiya taka to tailen.”
40009034	Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idi diron, “Are kaa sane neid mudur yana bunem, ĩ kaa sesen irudif.”
40009035	Jesus taun ganan fonõ fonõ ganan bun iyo ken, nedi uub fõ bun ifelneĩd, saa tano nẽ biya od wogõ feid fen, dagi gariya fire fire ganan el fedin.
40009036	Sain Jesus mala iran, tamo kayau musei guru difen anĩ ileid fen, idi nigin wau yun, ere nigin, idi morõ adodo isennẽdiya sã, idi sipsip marau sã age fiya gen.
40009037	Anĩ yogon dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Kabier saaf musei biya ima bure felen, anĩ ere, kabĩ tamo musei sã.
40009038	Age fiya nigin, kusu fiya marau, Odug to wiyẽg, kabĩ tamo susur fedi di, yogon kabier kususu fiya nigin dilauf.”
40010001	Jesus in dõ fiya tar tuwelf iweignẽdi di, wagen guru difen, kaa sesen irudiya, dagi gariya fire fire ganan el difediyouf nigin megeir ifenẽdin.
40010002	Eĩ aposel tuwelf yeneid, Simon (in yana Pita dedig), yogon tura Endru, Jems Sebedi naal, ne tura Jon,
40010003	Filip, Batolomyu, Tomas, taka Matyu takis yaleya tamo, Jems Alfeus naal, taka Tadeus,
40010004	Simon Selot, taka Judas Iskariot, ĩ anĩ Jesus kiwai ifenen.
40010005	Idi tuwelf enidi, Jesus fadim enĩ ado dõ difouf nigin sur fedin: “Idi ibor fire Juda ibor sã wagedin to ulagauf, Samaria neid taun taka taka buneg to uleg.
40010006	Israel atun idi sipsip fõ delen anidi bun dogol ulagauf.
40010007	Sain ã ulagauf, od enĩ anĩ wogõ gef uyõg, ‘Saa tano mogo melsak.’
40010008	Dagi el wedig, gare den turĩ wedig, lepra dagi ado el wedig, kaa sesen urudig. Megeir anĩ ã na yaleya sã ege walegen, anĩ nigin, ege luwa wenẽdigouf.
40010009	Ã gol moni, silwa moni, kapa moni be, ãgenei kodolẽ taka to bagai ufeg.
40010010	Delẽ uyõgou fenẽ, delẽ iyõya nẽ faa sã, gabar uru, sendel uru, manig uru agog to guri gouf, tamo kabĩ dalef, idi de mala ereb lau difef anĩ difenẽdiyadidig.
40010011	“Narib gouf, taun be, fonõ taka be bun ulegef, ã meleĩ unog, tamo ã nigin sere yeĩf, yogon fõ bun ubodõg, dum utorõg uleg.
40010012	Ã fõ anĩ bun ulegef, ãgenei wau inosiya nẽ aanya wenẽdigouf.
40010013	Fõ anĩ bun tamo kayau biya diyeik, ãgenei wau inosiya nẽ aanya an urofosig, idi age fiya sãf, ãgenei wau inosiya nẽ aanya anĩ baban keg waleg.
40010014	Aib taka ĩ ã nigin to sere yeĩf, ãgenei od to karĩ youf, ãgenei yeĩ aasu tu weleg fen, fõ be taun anĩ utorõg ulagauf.
40010015	Aya momoi arokeneik, Sodom Gomora ado darau dalen anĩ wal fiya, es fouf naa anĩ bun, taun anĩ in darau odug bagai yalouf.
40010016	“Aya ã sur ayeik are, sipsip gaũ kuĩ atun sur fiya gen. Anĩ nigin, ã gogour age fedig gen, kisi ed ge waleg fen, ago gouf, ninã kuburir gen, imatkesiya ubodõgouf.
40010017	Ã tamo nigin lo walagauf, idi fau kaunsel imeid bun dineneĩ di, idi Juda neid uub fõ bun wagagã diyeĩf.
40010018	Idi aya nigin de fen, ã guri diyeĩ diroule, gawaman mudur, king ado wagedin difarnei ken, ã idi geid fen, haiden Israel sã anidi meleid bun, aya nigin wogõ gouf.
40010019	Anĩ ere, idi ã kot bun ifareya nigin gei diyeĩf, ã wauĩ to morõ ken, ere od tarõf, naig ta tarõf anĩ nigin to kisi fatuk walogouf. Sain anĩ bun, ã ereb od urõgouf nigin fau ifeneĩf.
40010020	Are ãgem to urõgouf, ãgenei Temeĩ nẽ Awa Uur ĩ yogo ã bunem wogõ youf.
40010021	“Tura fã youf, tura nigin kiwai fen, idegẽ di, laa bun inenẽf, tamag naal ado age difouf, kesu fã douf, idi neid sina tama nigin kiwai dino fen, idi dogo laa bun dinenẽdiyouf.
40010022	Tamo ganan idi, aya nigin fau kiwai difeneĩf, anĩ ere, aib taka megeir ino ifar ile idikeleya bun ouf, Negur isennẽf.
40010023	Teneub taka bun, ã darau odug difeneĩf are, uyu takã uyag uleg. Aya momoi arokeneik, ã fau Israel neid taun ganan bun to uyõg udikeleg mog, Tamo Naal kel isiyouf.
40010024	“Skul kesu ĩ yogon tise to wal fouf, age fiya gen, ferfer ĩ yogon marau to wal fouf.
40010025	Skul kesu ĩ yogon tise genẽf, are de. Takag, kabĩ tamo ĩ yogon orowa genẽf, are de. Fõ anĩ tama yana dun Belsebub, anĩ nigin, fõ anĩ tamo ganĩ be dibodok idi yeneid sane bagai dalef!
40010026	“Age fiya nigin, ã idi to kumĩ wedig. Gama ereb ein dede fiya yenek, are fau lelek falauf, gama ereb iminẽyan yenek, are dum fau keleĩ youf.
40010027	Gama ereb aya gugum bun wogõ ayeik, are fau gaa lalan bun wogõ gouf bagai; gama ereb kosesẽyam karĩ gef, dum fau fõ agaran ufareg fen, uweigig urõgouf bagai.
40010028	Idi bouwa dukesif, anĩ ere, malakanon yukesiya kisin sã anĩ to kumĩg. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ malakanon bouwa ado yũ orok fe, hel bun irãya kisi feleya anĩ dogol kumĩ gouf.
40010029	Fisisir uru ten toea nem na nigin sur gedig. Anĩ ere, ãgenei Temeĩ yogon wau to irõ mog, taka tenebur to kubũ youf.
40010030	Ãgenei mudureĩ bun fatiyeĩg ganan iwes yalen.
40010031	Age fiya nigin, to kumĩg, ã Negur mala bun safina odug bagai, fisisir musei wal fediya.
40010032	“Aibem taka aya nigin tamo meleid bun kurõ falaisiyouf, ayag ĩ nigin neu Dei saa ilun ibodok wagen kurõ afalaisiyouf.
40010033	Anĩ ere, aibem taka aya nigin tamo meleid bun wa fouf, ayag ĩ nigin neu Dei saa ilun ibodok wagen wa afouf.
40010034	“Ã to kisi eig wog, aya tenebur ein wau inosiya irou isiya nigin asin gouf. Aya wau inosiya irou isiya nigin to asin, anĩ ere, aya soworu irou isiya nigin asin.
40010035	Anĩ nigin, aya tubi kobõ fiya nigin asin, “‘Tamo ĩ tama nigin kiwai inouf, ne barai yogon sina nigin kiwai inouf, yanawau ĩ sina yana nigin kiwai inouf.
40010036	Tamo nẽ kiwai are, de tamo anĩ nẽ ibor bun tamalem fã de fen, kiwai difenẽf.’
40010037	“Aibem taka ĩ, yogon tama sina nigin wau fatuk ifen ken, aya nigin to age fef, ĩ aya dõ fiya nigin to kisi falauf. Aibem taka ĩ, yogon naal be, ne barai be wau fatuk ifen ken, aya nigin to age fef, ĩ aya dõ fiya nigin to kisi falauf.
40010038	Aibem taka ĩ, yogon aa tetek orowa to sef fen, aya dõ fiyaf, areg aya dõ fiya nigin to kisi falauf.
40010039	Aib taka tenebur ein nẽ mata alouf ye fen imirek, yogon mata fõ yalauf. Aib taka yogon mata aya nigin irailef, yogon mata kel yalouf.
40010040	“Tamo aibem ã yaleyeik, are aya yaleyaf, tamo aibem aya yaleyaf, are aib ĩ aya sur fiyan ĩ yalef.
40010041	Aibem taka ĩ, ĩ profet nigin ye fen, profet taka yalef, ĩ profet mala yalouf, aibem taka ĩ, ĩ madur tamo nigin ye fen, madur tamo taka yalef, ĩ madur tamo nẽ mala yalouf.
40010042	Aibem taka, naan medir kap tekelei, tamo yeneid sã anĩ taka ifen yãf, ere nigin, ĩ neu dõ fiya tamo, aya ã momoi arokeneik, ĩ yogon mala solo to bagai wal fiyẽf.”
40011001	Jesus yogon dõ fiya tamo tuwelf tai feid bure fel fen, anenem tokõ fel, Galili taun taka taka bun ifelneĩd fen, biya od wogõ fediyouf nigin ilen.
40011002	Age fe di, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo kalabus bun ibod ken, Kristus kabĩ agef yalef de di, od anĩ karĩ yen, Jon yogon dõ fiya tar Jesus to difiyẽf nigin
40011003	sur fedi di, dilen, to difiyen, “Tamo isiyouf den, õ ogo yeir de? Oo amã fau taka nigin tari mafouf?”
40011004	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Kekug uleg fen, ã wedereim karĩ gel, meleim ulegel anĩ Jon wogõ wiyẽg,
40011005	meleid ifofakelen kelẽ def, to diyon mogo diyok, lepra dagi adon mogo el fedin, wedereid daabun od karĩ def, gare den turĩ fedif, maleg bun biya od wogõ fedif.
40011006	Tamo aya nigin wau to firagagaũ fef, Negur ĩ el fiyek.”
40011007	Jon nẽ dõ fiya tamo ditornẽ dilele di, Jesus, tamo kayau guru difen anidi, Jon nigin irokenẽdiya anĩ gariya inon, “Ã ere bagai anĩ ulogouf nigin, gerere tuan ulegen? Ã unin yaum walala fe di, ulogouf nigin ulegen de?
40011008	Anĩ sãf are, ere bagai ã ulogou fenẽ, ulegen? Tamo taka kolos biya bagai ifonun de? Sã, idi kolos biya bagai difonuk age fiya are, king nẽ fõ bun dibodok.
40011009	Ba, ere bagai anĩ ã ulogou fenẽ, ulegen? Profet taka de? Are de yeir, aya ã arokeneik, ĩ profet wal fediya.
40011010	Tamo anĩ, ĩ nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye itoton: “‘Aya neu arũ tamo sur afe di, ĩ ket uyu ilauf, im uyulil ogon naab dodok fouf.’
40011011	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, kayau onoudi kesu dalen idi atun an, taka nem Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo to wal difiyen, anĩ ere, aib taka saa tanon yana naal bagai ado ĩ Jon wal fiya.
40011012	Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo in sain bunem isi gama, saa tano, megeir ado bilalaũ fedig, megeir ado tamom saa tano anĩ irou irouledig.
40011013	Profet ganan Moses nẽ Lo ado, saa tano nigin profet od wogõ def disin, isi Jon bun daun.
40011014	Ã walogou fenẽ wauĩ oroĩf are, ĩ Eliya, ĩ fau isif ya anĩ.
40011015	Aib ĩ weder adouf, karĩ youf.
40011016	“Tamo kayau sain enei bun, idi nigin ere bunem aya kisi afouf? Idi simom maket modoũ bun dibod ken, abob diweignẽdidig gen:
40011017	“‘Amã ã nigin kelel maun, anĩ ere, ã to kui gen; amã kanon seg malen, anĩ ere, ã to wauĩ gudũ fen.’
40011018	Anĩ Jon isin, saaf to yon, wain to yon, idi dirõdig, ‘Ĩ kaa sane ado.’
40011019	Tamo Naal isin, saaf yon, wain yon, idi dirõdig, ‘Eĩ saaf wan, wainei yedig, dobu irãya tamal, ĩ, takis yaleya tamo, mosor tamo ado geid nigal difedig.’ Anĩ ere, kisi biya ĩ in tobonunã anĩ bunem, biya yaoref.”
40011020	Jesus ĩ, taun tunĩ bun memelik musei inodin, anĩ ere, idi waud to falei den, anĩ nigin, Jesus ou fiyẽdin.
40011021	“Korasin taun, õ malalon ado! Betsaida, õ malalon ado! Ã bun memelik musei anodin, age fiya gen anĩ Taia taun Saidon taun ado bun wõ yem are, mogo kulu waud falei de fen, wau gudũ fiya nẽ gabar difoun ken, aasur dibodom.
40011022	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, es fiya sain bun, morõ Taia taun Saidon taun ado dalouf anĩ wal fiya, ã walogouf.
40011023	Õ Kapenaum, õ yanã anĩ saa ilun iselauf de? Sã bagai, õ laa neid modoũ bun usilauf. Memelik õ bun wõ yen anĩ age fiya, Sodom taun an wõ yem are, ĩ gamag eig fe di, ibodom.
40011024	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, es fiya sain bun, morõ Sodom yalouf anĩ wal fiya, õ walouf.”
40011025	Sain anĩ bun, Jesus iron, “Dei, saa ado teneub nẽ Odug, aya õ yanã alesef, ere nigin, safina eneidi, kisi biya ado keleĩ adodo to dilouf nigin õ unokon, ago fen, simõ dibodon anidi bun yaor won.
40011026	Ariya, Dei, enĩ are ogon waũ filolõ fiya biya bunem agon.
40011027	“Ereb ereb ganan, neu Dei ĩ aya bun inon. Taka nem Naal keleĩ sã, Dei yogo dogol. Taka nem Dei keleĩ sã, Naal yogo, tunĩ idi Naalum Dei ifelnẽdiyouf nigin igirnẽdif anidim dogol keleĩ.
40011028	“Ã ganan morõ yei ken, sii yeik, wageun usig, ago ge di, aya wau inosiya afeneĩf.
40011029	Neu sũ waleg, oroweĩ seg fen, aya bun keleĩ walogouf, ere nigin, aya molol fen, aya imatkesiya. Ago gouf, meleĩkanon siwo inoya gurug fouf.
40011030	Ere nigin, neu sũ karika fen, neu morõ yal bagai.”
40012001	Sain anĩ Juda neid Sabat naa bun, Jesus wit kabĩ atu atu iyok ilen. Jesus in dõ fiya tar naũ feid fen, wit tunĩ gei fiya gariya dino fen, don.
40012002	Farisia tamo idi anĩ dileid fen, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Ulef! On dõ fiya tamo tar idi, ĩtãfiya difodul ken, Sabat naa bun oug difef.”
40012003	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Dawid in kusĩ tamo anidi geid naũ fedi di, Dawid age fen anĩ, ã Negur nẽ Itotoya bun to uwesegen de?
40012004	Ĩ Negur nẽ fõ namen ilen, agef fen, ĩ in kusĩ tamo anidi geid, bret fateul anĩ don, anĩ idi age fiya kisi feleya sã, anĩ idi ĩtãfiya difodul ken, age difen anĩ, prisem sã age difoũ nẽ anĩ.
40012005	Oo ã Lo od anĩ to be uwesegen de? Are Sabat naa bun, pris tempel namen kabĩ dalef bunem naa anĩ didodok, anĩ ere, anĩ mosor sã.
40012006	Aya ã arokeneik, tekelei ĩ tempel wal fiya anĩ, are yeir.
40012007	Ã od enĩ, ‘Aya wau ifenẽya anĩ orouf, sesewi fiya sã,’ anĩ nẽ gariya keleim are, ã tamo morõ sã ege mosor ado to wiyẽdigem.
40012008	Ere nigin, Tamo Naal yogo dogol Sabat naa nẽ Odug.”
40012009	Jesus modoũ anĩ itor ken, iyok ile, Juda neid uub fõ namen ilen,
40012010	tamo taka ima sitakã gege fefu fen, ĩ an ibodon. Idi Jesus bouwa bun od dinou fenẽ nigin naab dimir ken, abugã to difiyen, “Sabat naa bun tamo madur fiya anĩ idodõya sã de?”
40012011	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã anĩ taka, ã atun ĩ sipsip taka ado anĩ Sabat naa bun mekur isilauf, ã to uleg waleseg unenẽgouf de?
40012012	Tamo ĩ sipsip wal fiya bagai! Anĩ nigin, biya anĩ Sabat naa bun age tafef, are idodõya sã.”
40012013	Age ye fen, ĩ tamo anĩ irokenen, “Imã fara wol.” Age ye di, ĩ ima fara fele di, oditekei ima madur len, age fe di, ima sitakã gen wõ yen.
40012014	Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idi dilelel fen, Jesus yukesiya nigin katõ difen.
40012015	Idi neid kisi kelei ken, Jesus modoũ anĩ itoron. Tamo kayau musei ĩ dõ difiyẽ di, ĩ idi neid dagi ganan el fedin,
40012016	tamo kayau ganan wedereid iroun, ĩ aib yeya anĩ to yaor difouf nigin.
40012017	Enĩ Negur, profet Asaia bunem eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin, agef wõ yen:
40012018	“Eĩ neu kabĩ tamo ayam agirnen, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig; aya neu Awa Uur ĩ bun anouf, ĩ anĩ teneub ganan haiden bun Negur nẽ madur bagai anĩ kurõ fesiyouf.
40012019	Ĩ to seye ye fen, ait bagam to iweig irõf; takam in ait naabur to karĩ youf.
40012020	Werĩ felu reya ĩ to were fouf, takag, lalan komomor fe mog, ĩ to gare falauf, agef mog, Negur nẽ madur bagai anim ganan wal fouf.
40012021	In yana bun, teneub ganan haiden, idi neid waud an yenẽf.”
40012022	Tamo taka kaa sanem irou di, mala sigor ado ifofakelen, idi anĩ dirousi di, Jesus ĩ el fiyen. Age fe di, ĩ mala kelẽ ye fen, od wogõ yen.
40012023	Tamo kayau adok waud bun terẽ de fen, diron. “Enĩ anĩ Dawid Naal de?”
40012024	Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idi karĩ de fen, diron, “Are kaa sane neid mudur Belsebub yana bunem dogol, tamo enĩ kaa sesen irudif.”
40012025	Jesus idi neid kisi kelei ken, idi irokenẽdin, “Tano ganan yogo kiwai ifen ken, fara fouf, are sane lauf, taun ganan bun be, fõ ganan bun be, idi dogo fara difouf, idi to difarauf.
40012026	Satan ĩ yogo Satan iruf, ĩ yogo nigin faraf, yogo kiwai ifenek, naig fe fen, anĩ yogon tano ifarauf?
40012027	Are aya Belsebub yana bunem kaa sesen arudif, ere bunem ãgenei tamo kayau kaa sesen dirudidig? Anĩ nigin, idim ã es diyeĩf.
40012028	Anĩ ere, aya Negur nẽ Awa Uur bunem kaa sesen arudif are, Negur nẽ tano mogo ã bun isil.
40012029	“Takag, taka megeir ado nẽ fõ bun ile, in safina bẽ yalou fenẽ, are ĩ tamo megeir ado anĩ ket ifokel fen, gama ĩ in safina fõ bun bẽ yalouf.
40012030	“Taka ĩ aya to fedẽ fiyaf, ĩ neu kiwai, takag, taka ĩ aya ado to guru mafef are, ĩ firagagaũ fef.
40012031	Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, mosor kono fiya ado ganan tamo bun wõ yef, are yalelauf, anĩ ere, Awa Uur kono fiyek, are mosor to yalelauf.
40012032	Taka ĩ Tamo Naal nigin kiwai ifen ken, kobu yef are, in mosor yalelauf. Ani ere, taka ĩ Awa Uur Fateul nigin kiwai ifen ken, kobu yef are, in mosor to yalelauf, gama sain enĩ bun ado dumen isiyouf buneg to yalelauf.
40012033	“Aa biya are faat biya yũdig, aa sane are faat sane yũdig, anĩ nigin, aa ganan faat bunem keleĩyadig.
40012034	Ã, gogour sane gere tar, naig fe di, ã sane anim ã biya nigin wogõ gouf? Ereb ã namein isokosef, are sigoreim kaaresi gef.
40012035	Tamo biya, safina biya ĩ bun kuru fef anĩ irou isidig, age fe di, tamo sane, safina sane ĩ bun kuru fef anĩ irou isidig.
40012036	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, tamo idi od kisi sã wogõ den anĩ ganan, fau es fiya sain bun, idi fau dogo Negur mala bun, mugu mugu kurõ difesiyouf.
40012037	Anĩ nigin, ogon od bunem õ mosor sã yõf, ogon od bunem õ mosor ado yõf.”
40012038	Age fe di, Farisia tamo tunĩ, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ geid, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Tise, amã õ bun memelik nẽ uris taka mailau fenẽ.”
40012039	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Sane seseirã ibor, sain enei nẽ tamo kayau anĩ, memelik nigin to difef! Anĩ ere, taka to ifelneĩf, de profet Jona nẽ uris anim dogol ifelneĩf.
40012040	Ere nigin, Jona naa towo bõ towo, gau odug namen ibodon, age fiya gen, Tamo Naal naa towo bõ towo, teneub akor ilon yenẽf.
40012041	Niniwe tamo kayau fã de fen, es fiya naa bun, ibor enĩ, sain enei nẽ tamo kayau sane difiyẽdiyouf, ere nigin, idi mogo Jona wogõ ye di, waud falei den, gama taka Jona wal fiya are yeir.
40012042	Kuin Saut tamal fã ye fen, es fiya naa bun, ibor enĩ, sain enei nẽ tamo kayau sane fiyẽdiyouf, ere nigin, kayau anĩ, King Solomon nẽ keleĩ biya karĩ youf nigin teneub idiyan tamal isin, gama taka King Solomon wal fiya are yeir.
40012043	“Sain kaa sane tamo bun tamal ulõ yeis fen, gerere tuan ile, si inoya modoũ imirek ile to fotou fef.
40012044	Agef fen, ĩ irok, ‘Aya fõ atoron anĩ bun baban kelauf.’ Sain ĩ kel isif, fõ ani daku, waĩ difel fen, madur difen anĩ ilef.
40012045	Anĩ nigin, ĩ ile fen, baban kaa sesen ĩ wal fiya sewen anĩ geif irou isif, age de fen, idi namen dile, an difaref. Age dife di, tamo anĩ gai sane bagai lef, uruwa bun ne tobonunã anĩ wal fiya. Age fiya bagai, sain enei nẽ tamo kayau, ibor sane enĩ gama difaref, idi tobonunã anĩ adouf.”
40012046	Sain Jesus tamo kayau wogõ feid mog, in sina tura tar geid serẽ difar fen, ĩ geid od wogõ douf nigin orodin.
40012047	Takam ĩ irokenen, “Ogon sinã turã tar geid serẽ difaref, idi õ geid od wogõ dou fenẽ orodif.”
40012048	Jesus aiten yalen, “Ai anĩ neu naai, ai anĩ neu turau tar?”
40012049	In dõ fiya tar bun imam ifelneĩd fen, ĩ iron, “Enidi anĩ neu naai, neu turau tar.
40012050	Taka ĩ, neu Dei saa ilun ibodok anĩ nẽ oroya dõf age fef anĩ ĩ, neu turau, neu mainou, neu naai.”
40013001	Naa de anĩ bun, Jesus aaben tamal kutũ yeis ile, daliyou sirin ibodon.
40013002	Guru fiya odug kalilĩ difiyẽ di, tamo kayau adok ubun difar mog, ĩ waag namen isil ibodon.
40013003	Agef fen, ereb ereb musei yaab od nem irokeneĩd fen, iron, “Kabĩ marau taka, faat irarãf nigin ilen.
40013004	Sain ĩ irarak ile mog, tunĩ naab luwen kuku ren, are ninã disi dakasin.
40013005	Tunĩ meein tuar kuku ren, an teneub badagar. Are kaisã bagai fokũ den, ere nigin, teneub are badagar bagai.
40013006	Anĩ ere, sain gaa ise di, bali are ilala di, laasi yedin, ere nigin, idi warumutei sã.
40013007	Faat tunĩ malũ duri atun kuku ren, are malũ duri anĩ fã ye fen, bali sile feledin.
40013008	Faat tunĩ teneub biya bun kuku ren, are idi biya imadin, taka biya handred, taka biya siksti, taka biya teti age fef ilauf.
40013009	Aib ĩ weder adouf, karĩ youf.”
40013010	In dõ fiya tar ĩ wagen disi to difiyen, “Ere nigin õ yaab od nem tamo kayau urokenẽdif?”
40013011	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Saa tano nẽ waa keleĩ youf nigin are mogo ã ifenein, anĩ ere, tamo kayau to ifenẽdin.
40013012	Ereb taka aib ĩ ado are, anĩ wal fiya ifenẽf, anĩ ĩ musei adouf. Ereb taka aib ĩ sã, ereb ereb ĩ ado areg ĩ bun yalelauf.
40013013	Anĩ nigin, aya yaab od nem arokenẽdif, ere nigin, “Idi meledim diledig, anĩ ere, idi meleid fokõya sã, idi wederedim karĩ dedig, anĩ ere, idi wedereid fokõya sã, to keleik.
40013014	Idi bun, Asaia nẽ profet od kisi felef: “‘Ã wedereim karĩ gouf, anĩ ere, wedereĩ to fokõ youf, ã meleim ulogouf, anĩ ere, meleĩ to fokõ youf.
40013015	Ere nigin, tamo kayau enei, idi waud katĩ felen, idi wederedim karĩya malai bagai, age de fen, idi meleid difofakelen, age fiya sam are, idi meledim dilem, wederedim karĩ dem ado, idi waud fokõ ye fen, falei de di, aya idi el afedim.’
40013016	Anĩ ere, ãgenei meleĩ nigin el fedif, ere nigin, ã ulegef, ãgenei wedereĩ nigin el fedif, ere nigin, ã karĩ gef.
40013017	Anĩ aya ã momoi arokeneik, profet musei, madur tamo geid, ã ulegef anĩ dilou fenẽ nigin waud yenen, anĩ ere, idi meledim to dilen, takag, karĩya ã karĩ gef anĩ karĩ dou fenẽ nigin waud yenen, anĩ ere, idi wederedim to karĩ den.
40013018	“Yaab od bun, faat irarãya tamo nẽ gariya anĩ karĩg:
40013019	Taka ĩ, saa tanon nẽ od karĩ ye fen, ĩ weder to fokõ yef, sane taka isi, faat yogon wau bun iraran anĩ son fiyek. Are faat naab luwen iraran anĩ age fiya.
40013020	Takag, faat meein tuar kubũ yen are, tamo ĩ od karĩ ye fen, kaisã bagai ĩ od anĩ yale fen, wau bun kulĩ yef.
40013021	Anĩ ere, ĩ warumutei sã, anĩ nigin, ĩ sain meluk to ibodõf. Sain, biya od nigin morõ be, kafĩ fiya be isif, ĩ kaisã bagai irofosif.
40013022	Takag, faat taka malũ duri atun kubũ yen are, tamo ĩ od karĩ yef, anĩ ere, tenebur mata ibodõya nẽ sii fiya, safina ado ibodõya nẽ kisi fiya anidim, biya od sile fe di, anim biya to yũf.
40013023	Takag, faat teneub biya bun kubũ yen are, tamo ĩ od karĩ ye fen, fokõ yef, are ĩ biya yũf, taka biya handred, taka biya siksti, taka biya teti agef imauf.”
40013024	Jesus yaab od taka irokenẽdin, “Saa tano ĩ, tamo taka yogon kabĩ bun, wit faat biya iraran gen.
40013025	Anĩ ere, tamo adok mulaĩ den mog, yogon kiwai isin, lili wit kabier irara ken, agef yen ilen.
40013026	Sain wit bali fokũ ye fen, biya olili den, agef mog, lilig wowã den.
40013027	“Marau nẽ kabĩ tamo, ĩ wagen disin diron, ‘Tamo biya, õ faat biya on kabier to uraran de? Lili anĩ nainenem disin?’
40013028	“Ĩ aitedin yalen, ‘Kiwai takam age fen.’ “Ne kabĩ tamom to difiyen, ‘Amã mele anĩ kususu mafelauf anĩ õ oroyok de?’
40013029	“Ĩ aitedin yalen, ‘Sã, ere nigin, lili kususu ge mã, ã wit ado kususu gouf.
40013030	Malakaĩ, weim difar mog, fau kusu fiya sain bun. Sain anĩ bun, aya kususu fiya tamo arokenẽdiyouf: Lili ketem kurug fen, ufafãg, dum yakur feid isaikalauf nigin; agog fen, wit kurug, neu kin gurig uleg.’”
40013031	Jesus yaab od taka irokenẽdin: “Saa tano ĩ, masted faat tamo takam yale fen, yogon kabier itenen gen.
40013032	Anĩ ĩ faat ganan nigin naal bagai, anĩ ere, ĩ odugouf, ĩ kabier saaf ganan wal fediya aa wõ youf. Age fe di, ninã ilun temeleid disi, were bun dibodõf.”
40013033	Jesus baban yaab od taka irokenẽdin: “Saa tano ĩ, yis kayau takam yale fen, flawa odug ado falei fe di, ganan gẽ yedig gen.”
40013034	Jesus od enĩ ganan, yaab od nem tamo kayau wogõ fiyẽdin. Ĩ od ganan to kurõ falaisi irokenẽdin, yaab od nem dogol.
40013035	Anĩ bunem, Negur profet bunem eig ye wogõ yen anĩ, agef kisi felen: “Aya yaab od bunem sigoroum kurõ afesiyouf, gariya bun teneub ino fen, ereb ereb inokakan anĩ aya yaor afouf.”
40013036	Jesus tamo kayau itorneĩd fen, fõ namen ilen. In dõ fiya tar ĩ wagen disi fen, diron, “Kabier lili nẽ yaab od anĩ, amã faded wamã.”
40013037	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Tamo tekelei faat biya iraran, are Tamo Naal.
40013038	Kabĩ are tenebur tamo kayau, faat biya anĩ, are Negur nẽ tano nẽ gere tar, lili are Satan nẽ gere tar,
40013039	kiwaim lili iraran, are Satan. Kusu fiya are saa teneub ado idiyẽf bun, kususu fiya tamo are idi engel.
40013040	“Anĩ nigin, lili kususu feid, yã yakur feid isaikalauf, age fiya gen, saa teneub ado idiyẽf bun, age fouf.
40013041	Tamo Naal ĩ, yogon engel sur fediyouf, idi yogon tano bun ereb ereb ganan mosor dinodig ado, tamo kayau ganan sane age difedig gei difeid fen, dalelnẽdiyouf.
40013042	Idi yã mala bobo rouf bun dirarãf, an inã odug ado firi de fen, goboreid kikokõ youf.
40013043	Age fe di, madur tamo idi, gaa gen nedi Temeid nẽ tanon fula difouf. Aib ĩ weder adouf, karĩ youf.
40013044	“Saa tano ĩ, safina biya bagai kabier inokon gen. Tamo taka fotou fe fen, baban kabier inokon. Agef fen, wau al fef ile, safina adok ĩ ado anĩ, na nigin sur fe fen, akor anĩ na yalen.
40013045	“Takag, saa tano ĩ, na yaleya tamo, maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel biya, na nigin imirek gen.
40013046	Ĩ meein medeĩya taka moni odug nẽ anĩ fotou fe fen, ile, safina adok ĩ ado anĩ na nigin sur fe fen, meein medeĩya anĩ na yalen.
40013047	“Takag, saa tano ĩ, kakãg daliyou bun gau bou fire fire gei fiya nigin dirãdig gen.
40013048	Sain kakãg isokose di, gau yaleya tamo dĩ dife, ubun ise di, anĩ idi dibod ken, gau biya gei de, karam namen difeid fen, sesen anĩ are dirarailen.
40013049	Age fiya bagai, saa teneub ado idikalauf bun eig fouf. Engel idi disi fen, idi madur tamo atun sesen anidi gei de dale,
40013050	yã mala bobo ref bun dirarãf, an inã odug ado firi de fen, goboreid kikokõ youf.”
40013051	Jesus to fedin, “Ã od enĩ ganan wedereĩ fokõ yef de?” Idi diron, “Yo, amã karĩ mauf.”
40013052	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Anĩ nigin, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo ganan saa tano nigin ifelnẽdin are, idi fõ tama gen, ĩ safina biya nẽ aaben tamal safina mata tubu ado irou isidig.”
40013053	Jesus yaab od eneidi bure fel fen, anenem iyok ilen.
40013054	In fõ gariyan isi fen, ĩ an tamo kayau dogo neid uub fõ bun ifelnẽdin, age fe di, idi terẽ den. Idi to difen, “Tamo eĩ, kisi biya ado memelik nẽ totol enei, nain yalen?
40013055	Ĩ kapenta naal sã de? In sina Maria sã de? In tura tar Jems, Josef, Simon, Judas ado sã de?
40013056	In main tar ganan, ada weim to tabodok de? Tamo enĩ enei ganan nain yalen?”
40013057	Age de fen, idi ĩ kiwai difenen. Anĩ ere, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Profet taka ĩ, in fõ gariyan ado in fõ bun dogol, ĩ yana sã.”
40013058	Ĩ an memelik musei to inon, ere nigin, idi to momoi den.
40014001	Sain anĩ bun, Galili nẽ uyu irouya Herod Jesus nigin od karĩ ye fen,
40014002	in kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, “Enĩ Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo, ĩ laa fen anĩ kel fã yen! Anĩ nigin, memelik nẽ totol ĩ bun kabĩ yalef.”
40014003	Kulu Herod, in tura Filip nẽ aiwa, Herodias nigin, Jon yale ifõ, kalabus bun inenen.
40014004	Ere nigin, Jon ĩ irokenẽdig, “Õ ĩtãfiya ufodul ken, turã nẽ kayau walen.”
40014005	Herod Jon yukesiya nigin wau yenen, anĩ ere, tamo kayau kumĩ fedin, ere nigin, idi ĩ profet taka dedig.
40014006	Herod sina gõ fen anĩ nẽ naa bun, Herodias nẽ barai seg kui ye fen, dole kenẽdi di, Herod wau al bagai fen.
40014007	Age fe di, ĩ wau adok kuturol fen, ne barai ereb taka nigin to fouf, de anĩ bagai ifenẽf yen.
40014008	In sinam weder te yabi di, ĩ iron, “Beĩ taka bun Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo mudur uno fen, ein wanauf.”
40014009	King ĩ wau togun, anĩ ere, wau kuturol fen, tamo kayau meleid bun kurõ fesin anĩ nigin, in oroya dõf anĩ bagai ifenẽf nigin wogõ ye fen, tamo sur fe di,
40014010	Jon kalabus bun ula gudũ fen.
40014011	In mudur beĩ bun dino diroule, ne barai difenẽ di, ĩ sina gein irou ilen.
40014012	Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar disi, in bouwa buru dale mũ difen. Age de fen, idi dilen, Jesus dirokenen.
40014013	Jesus, Herod Jon ula gudũ fen anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ mugu bagai waag bun moilin ilen. Tamo kayau idi anĩ karĩ de fen, taun temeleid yedim dõ difen.
40014014	Sain Jesus kutũ yeis fen, mala iran, tamo kayau musei iledin, ĩ idi nigin wau yu ken, idi neid dagi el fiyẽdin.
40014015	Mogo bok isi di, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disi diron, “Eĩ gerere tuan, sain mogo sa kelef. Tamo kayau susur wo di, dilalauf, ago di, idi fonõ fonõ dile fen, dogo neid saaf na dalouf.”
40014016	Jesus irokenẽdin, “Idi ileya nigin kisi to yenẽf. Saaf yõya nigin ãgem wenẽdigouf.”
40014017	Idi dirokenen, “Amã ein bret faif, gau uru ado dogol.”
40014018	Ĩ iron, “Wageun gurig urousig.”
40014019	Tamo kayau fisir bun dibodadãf nigin Jesus irokenẽdin. Bret faif gau uru ado, imam yale, saa ilun itad fen, ĩ Negur de fiye ken, bret mumã fen. Agef fen, in dõ fiya tar ifenẽdi di, idim tamo kayau difenẽdin.
40014020	Idi ganan don anĩ kisi felen. Age fe di, in dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau bret dokon, tunĩ ditoraran anĩ fito difen, karam tuwelf eweid gere fen.
40014021	Tamo bret don anĩ, idi faif tausen age fiya, kayau kesu geid iwesediya sã.
40014022	Kaisã bagai, Jesus, in dõ fiya tar waag bun idi ketem sitakã dilauf nigin sur fedin. Age de mog, ĩ tamo kayau irudin.
40014023	Jesus idi irud le fen, ĩ yogo arein kosẽ youf nigin iselen. Ĩ an mugu ibod mog, bõ irou isin.
40014024	Anĩ ere, waag mogo teneub itoron gerõ ifaren, yau odug fã ye di, moloun wĩ ye fen, waag yũ di, ilef isif fen.
40014025	Wef mog, Jesus daliyou teteatu idi gedin iyok ilen.
40014026	Sain in dõ fiya tar meleid diran, daliyou teteatu iyõ mog, dile fen, idi tererẽ den. Idi diron, “Eĩ baraũ,” kumĩ de fen, ui guru den.
40014027	Anĩ ere, kaisã bagai Jesus irokenẽdin, “Totol ufareg! Are ayam. To kumĩ wog.”
40014028	Pita solof iron, “Odug, onom ouf are, urokana len, naan teteatu õ garan asiyouf.”
40014029	Jesus iron, “Usi.” Age fiyẽ di, Pita waag bun kutũ yeis, naan teteatu Jesus wagen iyok ilen.
40014030	Anĩ ere, ĩ yau ile fen, kumĩ ye di, gamai imutuk isil fen, iweig iron, “Odug, usenna!”
40014031	Kaisã bagai, Jesus ima iran, yalesne ken, irokenen, “Õ momoiya naal, ere nigin õ waũ uru ado?”
40014032	Age ye fen, idi uru waag namen sosõ de di, yau kee relen.
40014033	Anĩ dile fen, idi waag namen difaren, Jesus nigin seli dabi diron, “Momoi bagai, õ anĩ Negur Naal.”
40014034	Sain idi daliyou sitakã dibal dilen, Genesaret teneub bun wõ den.
40014035	Tamo kayau fonõ anĩ bun temeleid, Jesus kelei ken, idi fonõ anĩ kalilĩ fiya fõ fõ ganan od dinon. Fonõ fonõ idi neid dagi tamo guri difeid, Jesus wagen disi fen,
40014036	idi dagi tamo yogon gabar irig kobũ difouf nigin, Jesus digonen. Ganan idi ĩ kobũ difen, dagi fara feledin.
40015001	Sain anĩ bun, Farisia tamo tunĩ, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ geid, Jesus garan Jerusalem temeleid disi to difiyen,
40015002	“Ere nigin on dõ fiya tar, mudur ado neid tobonunã wal difedig? Idi neid imeid kulo fiya sã, saaf dõdig!”
40015003	Jesus solof irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin ã ãgenei tobonuneĩ dõg fen, Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya wal gedig?
40015004	Ere nigin, Negur iron, ‘Õ sinã tamã yeneid wales,’ ‘Aibem taka sina be tama be gelu fiyẽf, ĩ laa bun dinenẽf bagai.’
40015005	Anĩ ere, ã urõgedig, ‘Tamo taka, sina be, tama be idi bun irõf, “Ereb taka õ isennõya nigin ayam ifonõya anĩ, ayam Negur afenem,”
40015006	ĩ age fef anĩ bunem in tama yana seli kulõ fiya nigin to age fouf,’ gedig. Ãgenei tobonunã age fiya bunem Negur nẽ od to dõ gedig.
40015007	Ã mala yaleya tamo! Asaia ĩ, ã nigin profet od eig ye wogõ yen in od tutuk:
40015008	“‘Tamo kayau enidi, nedi sigoredim aya selu kulõ difedig, anĩ ere, idi neid waud aya nigin gerõ ifaref.
40015009	Idi aya yanau dalesedig, are ege. Idi neid ifelnẽdiya are tamo nẽ keleĩ dogol dõ difedig.’ ”
40015010	Jesus tamo kayau iweig laisi, irokeneĩd fen, iron, “Karĩg fen, wedereĩ fokõf.
40015011	Ereb taka mayarem tamo awa kurẽ isilef anim, ĩ amuyẽ to ifenẽdig, anĩ ere, ereb taka namenem awa kurem ulõ yesif anim, ĩ amuyẽ ifenẽdig.”
40015012	Age ye di, in dõ fiya tar ĩ garan disi to difiyen, “Farisia tamo idi od enĩ karĩ de fen, waud õ nigin to biyaf anĩ, õ karĩ wof de?”
40015013	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Aayũ ganan, neu Dei saa ilun tamal im to itenanan, are warumutei ado kususu fouf.
40015014	Utornẽdig; idi uyu irouya nigin meleid ifofakelen. Mala ifofakeleya tamo taka, mala ifofakeleya taka gim fiyẽf are, idi uruwom mekur kuku douf.”
40015015	Pita iron, “Yaab od enĩ nẽ gariya faded wo urokanamã.”
40015016	Jesus to fedin, “Ã fau nene gef de?
40015017	Ã to ulegedig de? Ereb taka awa gerinem te namen isilef are te ado iledig.
40015018	Anĩ ere, ereb taka awa bun wõ yef are wauda bunem isedig anim, tamo amuyẽ ifenẽdig.
40015019	Ere nigin, wauda bun tamal wõ yef, are kisi sesen, tamo yukesiya, seseirã inoya, noli tobonunã, bẽ, kot bun idegẽya od bou bun yũya, dumen od wogõya.
40015020	Enĩ ganan anĩ tamo amuyẽ ifenẽdig, anĩ ere, ima kulo fiya sã saaf doko anim, tamo amuyẽ to ifenẽdig.”
40015021	Jesus modoũ anĩ itor ken, Taia Saidon ado neid teneub akoron ilen.
40015022	Haiden kayau Kanan tamal taka, melsã an tamal Jesus wagen isin iweig iron, “Odug, Dawid Naal, aya nigin malalon yõ! Neu barai kaa sanem irou di, to biya bagai yenek.”
40015023	Anĩ ere, Jesus od taka to solo fenen. Anĩ nigin, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disi, totol bagai dirokenen, “Kayau sur wo di, ile, ere nigin, ĩ iweig fen, iweig fen, dõ fadaf.”
40015024	Jesus kayau aiten yalen, “Negur aya sur fiyan are, sipsip Israel atun fõ delen anidi bun dogol.”
40015025	Kayau anĩ isin, wagen ibor bobou fe fen, ĩ iron, “Odug, aya usenna!”
40015026	Jesus aiten yalen, “Kesu nanaal neid saaf yale fen, gaũ irarak kenẽdiya are to biya.”
40015027	Kayau anĩ iron, “Odug, are momoi, anĩ ere, gaũ idig moroid tar tebol bun saaf dõ di, momout kuku re di, dõdig.”
40015028	Age ye di, Jesus aiten yalen, “Kayau, õ momoiya odug ado! Ogon waũ irok agef ifonok.” Sain anĩ bun bagai, ĩ ne barai el felen.
40015029	Jesus an itor ken, Galili maaĩ yeri dõ fen. Agef fen, ĩ arein isel ibodon.
40015030	Tamo kayau musei wagen disin, yeid kirorõya, meleid ifofakelen, iborodim gogo dedig, aiteid ifofakelen, dagi fire fire museig, Jesus ye gariyan guri dife dirou disi di, ĩ el fedin.
40015031	Aiteid ifofakelen od wogõ den, iborodim gogo dedig madur feid difaren, yeid kirorõya diyon, meleid ifofakelen lo difen, anĩ ganan tamo kayau dile fen, terẽ den. Age fe di, idi Israel nẽ Negur yana dalesen.
40015032	Jesus, in dõ fiya tar iweignẽdi di, wagen disi di, irokenẽdin, “Aya tamo kayau enidi nigin waud inaf, idi mogo aya geid naa towo dibodon, anĩ ere, gama ereb taka yõya sã. Aya, idi naũ susur afedi di, dilauf anĩ to orouf, age afouf are, idi luwen kuku douf.”
40015033	In dõ fiya tar dirokenen, “Amã gerere tuan ein bret kisi feleya nain male fen, musei enĩ weit mafediyouf?”
40015034	Jesus to fedin, “Bret ganĩ ã ado?” Idi diron, “Bret sewen, gau nanaal teke tekelei ado.”
40015035	Jesus tamo kayau tenebur dibodadãf nigin irokenẽdin.
40015036	Agef fen, Jesus, bret sewen gau ado, imam yale iroun, ĩ Negur de fiye ken, bret anĩ mumã feid fen, in dõ fiya tar ifenẽdi di, idi bagam tamo kayau difenẽdin.
40015037	Idi ganan don anĩ kisi felen. Dumen in dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau bret dokon, tunĩ ditoraran anĩ fito difen, karam sewen eweid gere fen.
40015038	Tamo bret don anĩ idi fo tausen, kayau kesu geid iwesediya sã.
40015039	Jesus tamo kayau susur feid, dilele di, ĩ waag bun sõ ye, Magadan akoron ilen.
40016001	Farisia tamo Sadusia tamo geid, Jesus wagen disi, kisi difiye ken, saa ilun nẽ memelik taka meledin inouf nigin to difiyen.
40016002	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Sain aragau isi di, ã urõgedig, ‘Sain biyau fenẽ, ere nigin, saa giri yef,’
40016003	bonimei di, ã urõgedig, ‘Gama uyẽ yau ado fouf, ere nigin, saa giri ye fen, budũ iyokelef.’ Ã saa bun es fiya nigin keleĩ bagai, anĩ ere, ã ereb sain nẽ uris es fiya nigin kisi feleya sã.
40016004	Sain enei nẽ tamo kayau, ibor sane seseirã inoya nẽ anĩ, memelik nẽ uris dimirẽdig, anĩ ere, taka to ifenẽdiyouf, de Jona nẽ uris dogol ifenẽdiyouf.” Age ye fen, Jesus idi itorneĩd ilen.
40016005	Sain idi daliyou sitakã dibal dilen, in dõ fiya tar bret yaleya nigin wedereid tu kelen.
40016006	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Lo welegei! Farisia tamo ado Sadusia tamo neid yis nigin, ã lo welegei.”
40016007	In dõ fiya tar idi dogo dogol katõ de fen, diron, “Ĩ agef irok, ere nigin, ada bret to tarousil nigin.”
40016008	Idi neid wogõya Jesus kelei ken, to fedin, “Ã momoiya naal bagai, ere nigin ã bret sã ge fen, aug tutur wogõ gef?
40016009	Ã wedereĩ fau to fokõ yef de? Ã to karĩ welegef, bret faif anĩ faif tausen don, age fe di, karam ganĩ ã kuru ge di, eweid gere fen?
40016010	Takag, bret sewen anĩ fo tausenem don, age fe di, karam ganĩ ã kuru ge di, eweid gere fen?
40016011	Ã naig fe di, wedereĩ to fokõ yef, aya bret nigin ã to arokeneim de? Anĩ ere, ã lo welegei, Farisia tamo ado Sadusia tamo neid yis nigin.”
40016012	Age ye di, idi mogo wedereid fokõ yen, ĩ yis bret bun dinodig anĩ nigin to wogõ fedin, ĩ Farisia tamo ado Sadusia tamo neid ifelnẽdiya anĩ nigin wogõ fedin.
40016013	Sain Jesus Sisaria Filipai nediwon isi fen, in dõ fiya tar to fiyẽdin, “Tamo kayau Tamo Naal nigin ai dedig?”
40016014	Idi dirokenen, “Tunĩ dirok, õ Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo, tunĩ dirok, õ Eliya, tunĩ dirok, õ Jeremaia oo profet taka be.”
40016015	Jesus to fedin, “Ba ã uleg? Aya nigin ã ai gef?”
40016016	Simon Pita aiten yalen, “Õ anĩ Kristus, Õ mata ibodõya Negur Naal.”
40016017	Jesus solof iron, “El fiya õ ado, Simon Jona nẽ naal, ere nigin, on keleĩ are tamo nẽ keleĩ bunem sã, are neu Dei saa ilun tamal in keleĩ bunem.
40016018	Anĩ nigin, aya õ arokonok, õ Pita, meein enĩ teten neu sios anouf, laa nẽ megeir anim sios to wal fiyẽf.
40016019	Aya saa tano nẽ ki õ afonõf, ereb õ tenebur ein ufok, are saa ilun ouneg ifõf, ereb õ tenebur ein biru wof, are saa ilun ouneg biru fouf.”
40016020	Age ye fen, Jesus ĩ Kristus yeya anĩ, aib taka to dirokenẽf nigin, in dõ fiya tar wedereid iroun.
40016021	Sain anĩ bunem ilauf bun, Jesus yogo nigin in dõ fiya tar yaor fe irokenẽdin, ĩ Jerusalem ilauf bagai, an darau musei, mudur adodo, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo imeid bun yalouf, an ĩ dukesiyouf, naa towo bure fele di, mata kel fã youf.
40016022	Pita Jesus yale, yerin irou ile ou fiyen, ĩ iron, “Odug, sã bagai! Enĩ ganan õ nigin to bagai wõ youf!”
40016023	Jesus falei yel, Pita irokenen, “Satan, dumeun ule! Õ aya naaburau gudũ wof; on kisi are Negur nẽ sã, on kisi tamo nẽ dogol.”
40016024	Age ye fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Aib taka aya dõ fiyau fenẽ, ĩ yogon oroya lai fesil fen, ĩ yogon aa tetek faali fe fen, anĩ aya dõ fiyauf.
40016025	Ere nigin, aib taka yogon mata isennẽf nigin oro fef are, fõ yalauf, aib taka yogon mata, aya nigin irailauf are, mata anĩ gurug fouf.
40016026	Tamo taka ĩ, teneub enĩ ganan kakarai fe fen, akorou yef, anĩ are, ĩ yogon malakanon irailauf, ere biya ĩ yalouf? Takag, tamo taka yogon malakanon nigin ere mala solof fen, ĩ kel yalouf?
40016027	Tamo Naal, in Tama nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ado in engel geid disiyouf, agef fen, tamo mugu mugu ereb age fef anĩ kilei, ĩ mala solo age fiya bagai ifenẽdiyouf.
40016028	Aya momoi arokeneik, tunĩ ein difaref fau to gare de mog, idi Tamo Naal in tano bun isi di, dilouf.”
40017001	Naa sigis bure fele di, Jesus, Pita, Jems, taka Jon Jems nẽ tura geif fen, idi mugu arei odug ilun diselen.
40017002	An Jesus idi meleid bun bouwa falei felen. In nawa gaa gen fula felen, in kolos lalau fen, yal gen lalanen.
40017003	Agef mog, an idi meleid bun Moses, Eliya ado wõ de fen, Jesus weim wogõ den.
40017004	Pita Jesus irokenen, “Odug, ada ein ibodõya nigin biya bagai. Õ oroyõf are, aya salafat towo anouf, taka ogon, taka Moses nẽ, taka Eliya nẽ.”
40017005	Pita fau wogõ ye mog, lalo lalau bagai idi kerub fedin, ait taka lalo namen iron, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig. Ĩ karĩ wiyẽg!”
40017006	Anĩ in dõ fiya tar karĩ den, idi neweid kususur de fen, tenebur gurorõ de tererẽ den.
40017007	Anĩ ere, Jesus isin, kobũ feid fen, ĩ iron, “Fafãg, to kumĩg.”
40017008	Idi ditadsen, taka to dilen, Jesus dogol.
40017009	Idi arei bun diyok disi fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã ereb ulegel enĩ, aib taka to urokenẽg, fau Tamo Naal laa bun tamal kel fã ye di.”
40017010	In dõ fiya tar Jesus to difiyen, “Ere nigin lo ifelnẽdiya tamo dirõdig, ‘Eliya ĩ ketem isiyouf bagai’ dedig?”
40017011	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Momoi bagai, Eliya isi fen, ereb ereb ganan madur fediyouf.
40017012	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, Eliya mogo isi bure felen, idi anĩ ĩ nigin to kelei ken, ereb ereb ganan idi waud iron kilei, ĩ nigin mogo age difen. Age fiya gen, Tamo Naal idi imeid bun darau yalouf.”
40017013	Jesus age wogõ ye di, in dõ fiya tar idi wedereid fokõ yen, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo nigin irok den.
40017014	Sain idi tamo kayau gedin disin, tamo taka Jesus wagen isi fen, ibor bobou fen.
40017015	Ĩ iron, “Odug, neu kesu nigin malalon yõ. Ĩ mir yuk sain, sane bagai firi ye fen, sain musei yãg iledig, naanũg iledig.
40017016	Aya, ĩ, on dõ fiya tar wagedin arou elen, anĩ ere, idi el fiyẽya kisi feleya sã.”
40017017	Jesus solof iron, “Sain enei nẽ tamo kayau, ibor enĩ, sane, momoiya sã, sain ganĩ aya ã geid tabodõf? Sain ganĩ aya ã nigin wau aukesilauf? Kesu wageun ein urousig.”
40017018	Jesus kaa sane ou fiyẽ di, kesu bun tamal ulõ yeis ile mog, kesu ĩ bou karika len.
40017019	Age fe di, in dõ fiya tar mugun Jesus wagen disi to difiyen. “Ere nigin amã kaa sane iruya kisi feleya san?”
40017020	Jesus irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin, ãgenei momoiya naal bagai nigin. Aya momoi arokeneik, ã momoiya naal masted faat age fiya adouf are, ã arei enĩ urokenẽgouf, ‘Ein tamal godo urou ule, oun ufar,’ ago ge di, ĩ dõf age fouf. Ereb ereb ganan ã age fiya kisi feleya.”
40017022	Sain idi disi, Galili guru difen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo Naal ĩ fau tamo imeid bun dinouf.
40017023	Idi fau ĩ dukesiyouf, anĩ ere, naa towo bure fele di, ĩ fau baban mata kel fã youf.” Age ye di, in dõ fiya tar waud morõ gudũ fesin.
40017024	Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, Kapenaum taun disi di, tempel takis yaleya tamo, Pita wagen disi to difiyen, “Ãgenei tise tempel nẽ takis to inodig de?”
40017025	Pita iron, “Ariya, ĩ takis inodig.” Sain Pita fõ namen isi di, Jesus ket wogõ yen, “Simon, õ ere kisi wof? Ai bunem tenebur nẽ king anidi takis daledig, idi neid kesu bunem de, oo tamo tunĩ bunem?”
40017026	Pita solof iron, “Tamo tunĩ bunem.” Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Anĩ nigin, kesu idi bunem sã.
40017027	Anĩ ere, adam idi waud saneya to tafenẽdiyouf nigin, õ daliyoun ule, on mũ urãf. Gau uruwa walouf anĩ awa gede fen, an silwa koin moni ulouf, wale fen, takis ogon ado neu nigin wenẽdiyouf.”
40018001	Sain anĩ bun, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disi, to difiyen, “Aim saa tanon odug bagai ibodok?”
40018002	Ĩ kesu naal taka iweignẽ isi di, idi atun ifarnen.
40018003	Agef fen, ĩ iron, “Aya momoi arokeneik, ã kesu nanaal gen falei gouf anĩ dogol, age fiya sãf are, ã saa tanon to bagai ulagauf.
40018004	Anĩ nigin, aib taka yogo nigin kuru kel fen, kesu enĩ genẽf are, ĩ saa tanon odug bagai ibodok.
40018005	“Takag, aib taka kesu naal eig fiya, aya yanau nem yalef are, ĩ aya yaleyaf.
40018006	Anĩ ere, aibem taka age fe di, kesu aya nigin momoi def enidi taka, mosor bun kubũ youf are, tamo anĩ meein odug guyutu bun ifo ken, maaĩwõ irãya nigin biya.
40018007	“Teneubur tamo kayau idi meleidlon ado, ere nigin, ereb to biya anĩ age fe di, tamo mosor bun dilalauf. Tobonunã age fiya bagai wõ youf, anĩ ere, tamo nanĩ be bunem isif, ĩ malalon ado!
40018008	Ogon imam be, yem be mosor bun ineyõf are, gudũ fen uraile. Õ imã tobega be, yẽ tobega ado mata bun ileya nigin biya bagai, ere nigin, imã totoũ be, yẽ totoũ adouf are, yã faimud ibodkeleya anĩ bun an dirãyõf.
40018009	Age fiya bagai, ogon malam mosor bun ineyõf are, ubodol uraile. Õ malã tekelei ado mata bun ileya nigin biya bagai, ere nigin, malã totoũ adouf are, hel nẽ yã mala bun dirãyõf.
40018010	“Ã lo welegei, kesu nanaal enidi taka to meleĩ irim gouf. Ere nigin, aya ã arokeneik, idi neid engel saa ilun dibodok, sain ganan neu Dei saa ilun ibodok no diledig.
40018012	“Ã ere kisi ado? Tamo taka ĩ wan handred sipsip ado, tekelei idi atun fõ yalauf are, marau ĩ nainti-nain sipsip uya bun itorneĩd fen, ile, tekelei fõ yelen anĩ to imirẽf de?
40018013	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ĩ fata fouf are, ĩ sipsip tekelei anĩ nigin wau kulĩya odug, sipsip nainti-nain to fõ delen nigin anĩ nẽ kulĩya wal fiya.
40018014	Age fiya bagai, ãgenei Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok, kesu nanaal enidi taka fõ yeleya nigin to orodig.
40018015	“Ogon turã taka mosor inoyõf, ule ã uruwom atun dogol in kũ fenẽya ufelnẽf. Ĩ õ karĩ yõf, õ ogon turã mogo kel walel.
40018016	Anĩ ere, ĩ to karĩ yõf, baban tekelei be uru age fiya õ geid fen, ulagauf, ago di, ‘od ganan isennẽya uruwom be, towom sigoredim kurõ difesiyouf anĩ megeir gouf.’
40018017	Ĩ idi karĩ fediya nigin itorõf, sios urokenẽf. Ĩ sioseg karĩ fiyẽya nigin itorõf are, ĩ haiden be takis yaleya tamo sane gen unenẽf.
40018018	“Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ereb taka ã tenebur ein ufokalagauf, are saa iluneg ifokalauf, ereb taka ã tenebur ein biru walagauf, are saa iluneg biru falauf.
40018019	“Baban, aya ã arokeneik, tenebur ein ã uruwom ereb taka nigin wauĩ tekelei fen, to gouf, neu Dei saa ilun ibodok, ĩ dõf ã nigin age fouf.
40018020	Ere nigin, uruwom be, towom be, aya yanau nem guru difef, aya an idi geid mabodok.”
40018021	Age ye di, Pita Jesus wagen isi, to fen, “Odug, neu turau aya nigin mosor inouf, sain ganĩ neu turau nẽ mosor nigin wederou tu kalauf? Wederou tu kelef ile, sewen daũ de?”
40018022	Jesus aiten yalen, “Aya õ arokonok, õ sewen dogol to agouf, sewenti anĩ are sewenem tobol wouf.
40018023	“Anĩ nigin, saa tano ĩ, king taka, ne ferfer geid in wareg madur fiya nigin oron gen.
40018024	King ĩ wareg madur fiya nigin gariya inon, tamo taka ĩ bun ten milion kina yalen anĩ, ĩ wagen dirou disin.
40018025	Ĩ wareg anĩ yukesiya kisi feleya sã nigin marau iron, ĩ yogo ado in aiwa, in gere tar ado in safina ganan na nigin sur fedi di, in wareg anĩ yukesiya kisi falauf yen.
40018026	“Kabĩ tamo, marau wagen ibor bobou fe fen, igonen, ‘Õ aya nigin waũ unois fen, sain wana len, aya wareg anĩ ganan kisi afelkonõf.’
40018027	Kabĩ tamo anĩ nẽ marau, ĩ nigin wau yu ken, wareg anĩ ganan lai fesil fen, itornẽ di, ilen.
40018028	“Anĩ ere, kabĩ tamo anĩ oreis ile fen, ĩ yogon kabĩ tura taka fotou fen, ĩ bun wareg wan handred kina ado. Ĩ ka fe, ula irou fen, iron, ‘Õ aya bun wareg walen anĩ kel wana!’
40018029	“In kabĩ tura kubũ ye, ibor bobou fe fen, igonen, ‘Õ aya nigin waũ unois fen, sain wana len, aya wareg anĩ mala kela afonõf.’
40018030	“Anĩ ere, ĩ to karĩ fiyen. Ĩ tamo yale irou, kalabus bun iran, are de wareg inouf anĩ dogol.
40018031	Anĩ kabĩ tura tar tunĩ, ĩ age fen anĩ dile fen, idi waud odug sanen, anĩ nigin, dile, idi neid marau ereb age fen anĩ ganan wogõ difiyen.
40018032	“Age de di, marau tamo, kabĩ tamo anĩ iweignẽ isi di, ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ kabĩ tamo sane. Aya ogon wareg ganan lai afonon, ere nigin, õ aya ugonan.
40018033	Aya õ nigin wau inan gen, õ ogon kabĩ tura nigin waũ inõya san de?’
40018034	In marau tamo name ise fen, darau ifenẽya nigin kalabus lo fiya tamo imeid bun inenen, are de wareg ganan inouf anĩ dogol.
40018035	“Age fiya bagai, neu Dei saa ilun ibodok, ã atun tureĩ tar neid mosor nigin wauĩ bun wedereĩ to tu kalauf are, ãg age yeĩf.”
40019001	Jesus od enidi wogõ ye bure fel fen, Galili distrik itor ken, Judia distrik ilen, Jordan naan sitakã.
40019002	Tamo kayau musei dõ difiyẽ di, ĩ an idi dagi el fedin.
40019003	Farisia tamo tunĩ ĩ wagen disi, kisi difiye ken, idi to difiyen, “Tamo taka, yogon kayau gariya fire fire bun iruf anĩ, lo dõ fiya de?”
