40019004	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Ã Negur nẽ Itotoya to uweseg ulegen de? Gariya bun, Negur ereb ereb kare fedin ĩ, ‘tamo ino kayau ino fen,’
40019005	Negur iron, ‘Anĩ nigin, tamo ĩ in sina tama itorneĩd fen, in kayau ado bagu difouf, idi uruwom bouweid tekelei.’
40019006	Age difef, idi uru sã, idi tekelei. Anĩ nigin, Negur tamo kayau ado bagu fedin anĩ, tamom to fara fouf.”
40019007	Idi to difiyen, “Age fiyauf are, ere nigin Moses iron, tamo taka in kayau fara fiya nẽ pepa ifen ken, iru di, ilauf yen?”
40019008	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Moses ĩ ãgenei wauĩ totol anĩ ile fen, ãgenei kayau iruya nigin to katũ yein. Anĩ ere, gariya bun age fiya sã.
40019009	Aya ã arokeneik, aib taka in kayau seseirã inoya sã mog, kayau iru fen, kayau taka yalef are, ĩ seseirã inof.”
40019010	In dõ fiya tar Jesus dirokenen, “Tamo kayau atun morõ agef yenek nigin, ĩ kayau to yalouf are biya bagai.”
40019011	Jesus irokenẽdin, “Tamo ganan od enĩ dõ fiya kisi feleya sã, teke tekeleim Negurem age fedif anidi dogol.
40019012	Tunĩ idi, sineid namenem, bouweid kesu irouya nigin tutuk sã gõ fedidig, tunĩ are tamom korõ difedidig, tunĩ saa tano nigin kisi de fen, kayau to daledig. Tamo taka kisi enĩ dõ fiya nigin kisi falauf, dõf age fouf.”
40019013	Jesus ima tetedin ino fen, kosẽ fiyẽdiyouf nigin, kesu nanaal ĩ wagen guri de dirousin. Anĩ ere, in dõ fiya tar, idi guri de dirousin anidi ou difiyẽdin.
40019014	Jesus iron, “Utornẽdig len, kesu nanaal aya wageun disiyouf, idi to katũ wedig, ere nigin, saa tano are eig fediya neid.”
40019015	Age ye fen, ĩ ima tetedin inol fen, an tamal tokõ fel ilen.
40019016	Tamo taka Jesus wagen isi to fiyen, “Tise, ere biya anĩ aya age afe fen, mata ibodkeleya alouf?”
40019017	Jesus aiten yalen, “Õ ere nigin ereb biya nigin aya to wiyaf? Tekelei ĩ dogol biya. Mata ibodkeleya bun ulau fenẽ, õ ĩtãfiya dõ woid.”
40019018	Tamo Jesus irokenen, “Ĩtãfiya nanĩ bagai?” Jesus iron, “‘Õ tamo taka to ukesiyouf, seseirã to unouf, to bẽ walouf, õ taka nigin idegẽya od to urõf,
40019019	ogon sinã tamã yeneid walesauf, õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago.’ ”
40019020	Tamo gaũ iron, “Anĩ ganan aya dõ afen, ere taka anĩ aya fau dõ fiya sã?”
40019021	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Õ madur bagai you fenẽf, ule, ogon safina ganan na nigin sur wo fen, maleg tamo wenẽdiyouf, agouf, õ saa ilun safina biya adouf. Agol fen, usi, aya dõ wiya.”
40019022	Od enĩ tamo gaũ karĩ ye fen, ĩ wau morõ fe di, itor ilen, ere nigin, ĩ safina musei ado.
40019023	Age fe di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, safina musei ado tamo, saa tanon ileya nigin malai bagai.
40019024	Baban aya ã arokeneik, kamel ĩ gabar iwaya nẽ nil ku bun ileya nigin karika bagai, safina musei ado tamo, Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin malai bagai.”
40019025	Od enĩ in dõ fiya tar karĩ den, idi fatuk terẽ de fen, to difen, “Age fiyauf are, aim anĩ mata ibodkeleya yaleya kisi feleya?”
40019026	Jesus idi lo feid fen, iron, “Tamo yogo bun age fiya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, Negur yogo bun ereb ereb ganan age fiya kisi feleya.”
40019027	Pita Jesus aiten yalen, “Amã ereb ereb ganan mator ken, õ dõ mayok! Ere anĩ amã nemã mala solo malouf?”
40019028	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ereb ereb ganan mata falei fouf sain anĩ bun, Tamo Naal ĩ yogon king nẽ sia bun fula fiya medeĩya ado ibodõf, ã aya dõ wiyagef, ãg king nẽ sia tuwelf bun ubodõg fen, Israel ibor tuwelf es wedigouf.
40019029	Taka fõ be, tura tar be, main tar be, tama, sina, gere tar, kabĩ, aya yanau nigin itoron, idi ganan mala solo wan handred wal fiya dalouf, mata faimud ibodkeleya anĩ dalouf.
40019030	Anĩ ere, musei malabag dibodok, idi dumen dibodõf, musei dumen dibodok, idi malabag dibodõf.
40020001	“Saa tano nẽ tobonunã are, teneub marau taka ĩ, bonimei bagai ile fen, yogon wain kabier kabĩ dalouf nigin tamo oroi yaledin age fiya gen.
40020002	Kabĩ marau naa tekelei nigin ten kina afeneĩf ye di, idi ganan anĩ yo de di, in wain kabier sur fedin.
40020003	“Nain kilok bonimei age fiya, ĩ ilen, tamo tunĩ maket modoũ bun ege difar mog, iledin.
40020004	Ĩ idi irokenẽdin, ‘Ãg uleg, neu wain kabier kabĩ waleg, ago gouf, mala de afeneĩf.’
40020005	Age ye di, idi dilen. “Ĩ baban gaa atun ado aragau tri kilok age fiya ile feneg, de age fen.
40020006	Aragau faif kilok age fiya, ĩ ilen, tunĩg fau difar mog, iledin. Ĩ idi to fiyẽdin, ‘Ere nigin ã ege bagai gaa ganan ein ufaregel?’
40020007	“Idi aiten dalen, ‘Ere nigin, taka nem amã to oroi yalemam.’ “Ĩ idi irokenẽdin, ‘Ãg uleg, neu wain kabier kabĩ waleg.’
40020008	“Sain aragau di, wain kabĩ marau in kabĩ tamo neid orowa irokenen, ‘Kabĩ tamo uweigneĩd fen, dogo neid mala wenẽdiyouf, dumen disil idi bun gariya uno fen, ule, uyu disil bun ouf.’
40020009	“Kabĩ tamo aragau faif kilok age fiya kabĩ dalen disi fen, mugu mugu ten kina dalen.
40020010	Sain idi bonimei nem ket iweignẽdin anidi disin, idi kisi difen, amã idi wal fiya malouf den, anĩ ere, idig mugu mugu ten kina dalen.
40020011	Sain idi moni dalel fen, idi teneub marau nigin nauseir den.
40020012	Idi diron, ‘Tamo enidi dum bagai uweignẽdi di, aua tekelei dogol kabĩ dalel, anĩ ere, amã, naa enĩ ganan bonimei nem isi, gama yeiref, kabĩ totol malel, gaa uruwa dõ famam, anĩ ere, õ amã idi geid ten kina dede wanamam.’
40020013	“Anĩ ere, kabĩ marau ĩ, idi neid taka solof irokenen, ‘Mou, aya õ sane to ayok. Õ ten kina nigin ada uruwom sigoroda to tekeleil de?
40020014	Ogon kabĩ mala wale fen, ule. Aya õ afonom age fiya, tamo dum bagai oroi aleyen anĩ, de age fiya afenẽf nigin wau irok.
40020015	Aya neu safina ereb taka age fiya nigin wau irok anĩ, aya to age afouf de? Aya neu biya age afef nigin, õ aya kiyeĩ wanaf de?’
40020016	“Anĩ nigin, idi dumen dibodok anidi malabag dibodõf, idi malabag dibodok anidi dumen dibodõf.”
40020017	Jesus Jerusalem iselau fenẽ, ĩ in dõ fiya tar tuwelf mugu bagai gei feid fen, irokenẽdin,
40020018	“Ada Jerusalem teselef, an Tamo Naal ĩ pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo imeid bun dinenẽf. Idi ĩ laa fouf nigin bou bun od dũf.
40020019	Age de fen, idi ĩ haiden Juda sã anidi imeid bun dino di, kono difiyẽ, wagĩ difiye ken, aa tetek bun dukesiyouf. Naa towo bun, ĩ mata kel fã youf!”
40020020	Age fe di, Sebedi nẽ kesu uru, sineid geid Jesus wagen disin. Idi neid sineid ibor bobou fe fen, wau irok anĩ Jesus to fiyen.
40020021	Jesus to fiyen, “Ere anĩ õ orok?” Kayau iron, “Õ urõf, neu kesu uru enĩ, ogon tano bun taka ima biyalẽ ibodõf, taka ima kilẽ ibodõf.”
40020022	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã ereb to gef anĩ nẽ gariya, ã keleĩ sã, naan aya ãf anĩ ã yõya kisi feleya de?” Idi aiten dalen, “Amã kisi feleya.”
40020023	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã momoi neu kap bun naan are wãgauf, anĩ ere, imau biyalẽ ibodõya be, kilẽ ibodõya are, ayam ifenẽya kisi feleya sã. Modoũ anidi are, neu Dei idi nigin dodok fen anidi neid.”
40020024	In dõ fiya tar ten, od anĩ karĩ de fen, uru tura ado nigin seye den.
40020025	Jesus idi iweig laisi fen, iron, “Ã keleĩ, haiden idi dogo neid uyu irouya, tamo kayau lo fiya nigin totol dinodig, idi dogo neid odudug, tamo kayau nigin megeir yaor difedig.
40020026	Anĩ ere, ã bun kisi to agef yenẽf, ã atun aib taka odug ibodõf nigin orof, ĩ ãgenei kabĩ tamo ibodõf.
40020027	Ã atun aib taka uyun ibodõf nigin orof, ĩ ãgenei ferfer ibodõf.
40020028	Age fiya gen, Tamo Naal ĩ disennẽf nigin to isin, anĩ ere, ĩ tamo kayau isenneĩd fen, tamo kayau musei idi neid mosor anĩ fotokar yogon mata ifenẽdiyouf nigin isin.”
40020029	Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid Jeriko ditor dile mog, tamo kayau musei dõ difiyen.
40020030	Tamo uru meleid ifofakelen naab yerin dibodon. Sain idi Jesus isi ilef yeya karĩ de fen, diweig diron, “Odug, Dawid Naal, amã nigin malalon yõ!”
40020031	Tamo kayau idi ou difiyeĩd fen, foro dalauf nigin dirokenẽdin, anĩ ere, idi wade bagai diweig diron, “Odug, Dawid Naal, amã nigin malalon yõ!”
40020032	Jesus dẽ yel fen, idi iweigneĩd fen, ĩ to fedin, “Ere naig ayẽif nigin ã oroyeik?”
40020033	Idi aiten dalen, “Odug, amã malamã fara wol kanamãf nigin oromak.”
40020034	Jesus idi nigin meleidlon fe fen, idi meleid kobũ fedin. Kaisã bagai, idi meleid fara fele di, sã lo dife fen, idi Jesus dõ difen.
40021001	Idi Jerusalem kelẽ difiye ken, Moul Arei bun Betfage fonõ wõ den, Jesus in dõ fiya tar uru sur feid fen,
40021002	ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Fonõ wagein ifaref tokõ weleg, ulõ wesig fen, kaisã bagai donki ifõya naal ado uledigouf. Idi biru weledig fen, wageun gurig usig.
40021003	Taka nem ã ereb yeĩf, ĩ urokenẽgouf, Odug ĩ kabĩ ifenẽdiyou fenẽ orof, ago ge di, kaisã bagai sur fediyouf.”
40021004	Profet eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin agef wõ yen:
40021005	“Saion nẽ tamo kayau urokenẽgouf, ‘Ulef, ogon king õ garan isif, imatkeis fen, donki bun ibodok, donki naal teten.’”
40021006	In dõ fiya tar dilen, Jesus iron kilei age difen.
40021007	Idi donki naal ado dirousi di, tetedin idi neid gabar du difedi di, Jesus anĩ tetedin ibodon.
40021008	Tamo kayau musei, idi neid gabar naabur du difedin, tunĩ idi aa were kokour dife, naabur du difedin.
40021009	Tamo kayau uyu dilen ado, dume dõ difen diweig diron, “Hosiana, Dawid Naal bun!” “Odug yana bunem isif, ĩ el fiya ado!” “Hosiana, saa ilun bagai!”
40021010	Sain Jesus Jerusalem ulõ yesi di, taun anĩ bun tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, toti difen, “Tamo eĩ aim?”
40021011	Tamo kayau diron, “Eĩ Jesus, profet Nasaret taun Galili teneub bun tamal.”
40021012	Jesus tempel modoũ bun ile, wõ ye fen, na dale dile disi dife mog, an tamo kayau adok irudidin. Ĩ moni solo fediya neid tebol ado kuburir na sur fediya neid fatar eleg feledin.
40021013	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur nẽ Itotoya irok, ‘Neu fõ ĩ kosẽ nẽ fõ douf,’ anĩ ere, ã ‘bẽ tamo neid iminẽya fõ’ unogen.”
40021014	Meleid ifofakeleya, yeid kirorõya, Jesus wagen tempel bun disi di, ĩ el fedin.
40021015	Anĩ ere, Jesus ereb biya bagai age fe di, kesu nanaal tempel modoũ bun diweig diron, “Hosiana, Dawid Naal bun,” age de di, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, idi anĩ dileid fen, seye den.
40021016	Idi Jesus to difiyen, “Kesu nanaal enidi ereb def, õ karĩ wof de?” Jesus aitedin yalen, “Ariya, ã Negur nẽ Itotoya to uwesegen de? “‘Kesu momou kesu nanaal geid sigoreid bun selu kulõ fiya nigin Negur idi mogo saika fedin.’ ”
40021017	Agef fen, Jesus an tamal idi itorneĩd, taun anĩ itor ken, Betani fonõ ilen, an bõ tekelei ibodon.
40021018	Bonimei bagai, Jesus Jerusalem kel ile fen, naab luwen naũ fen.
40021019	Mala irakelen, aa fig naab yerin ilen, Jesus iyok iselen fele fen, aa fig biya sã ege aarau dogol. Jesus aa fig irokenen, “Õ baban to bagai umauf!” Kaisã bagai, aa fig gariri kelen.
40021020	In dõ fiya tar anĩ dile mã, idi terẽ de kulõ de fen, diron, “Naig fe di, aa fig kaisã bagai gariri kelen?”
40021021	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã wauĩ momoi ge mã, wauĩ to ilef isi fouf, ã aa fig enĩ bun age afel dogol to ago gouf, sã arei enĩg urokenẽgouf, ‘Kusu fen, maaĩwõ irãyõf,’ are ĩ dõf age fouf.
40021022	Ã momoi gouf are, ereb taka nigin tog fen, kosẽ gouf, ã walogouf.”
40021023	Jesus tempel modoũ namen ulõ yeis fen, an tamo kayau od ifelneĩd mog, pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo, ĩ wagen disi to difen, “Ere igirĩya bunem õ ereb ereb enĩ ago wof? Aim õ igirĩya enĩ ifonon?”
40021024	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ayag to fiya tekelei afeneĩf. Ã solog urokanagauf are, ereb igirĩya bunem ereb ereb enĩ age afef, aya ã arokeneĩf.
40021025	Jon nẽ naan igunẽdin, are nainenem isin? Are saa ilun tamal de, tamo bunem?” Idi dogo dogol katõ de fen, diron, “Ada ‘Ĩ saa ilun tamal,’ tauf, ĩ irõf, ‘Ba anĩ, ere nigin ã ĩ nigin to momoi wiyẽgen?’
40021026	Anĩ ere, ada ‘Tamo bunem’ tauf, ada tamo kayau nigin kumĩ tafedif, ere nigin, tamo kayau idi ganan Jon nigin profet taka dedig.”
40021027	Anĩ nigin, idi Jesus ait solo de diron, “Amã keleĩ sã.” Age de di, Jesus iron, “Ago gouf are, ayag, ere igirĩya bunem ereb ereb enĩ age afef anĩ to arokeneĩf.
40021028	“Ã ere kisi gef? Tamo taka ĩ naal uru adon. Tama ĩ kesu matu garan ile iron, ‘Neu kesu, gama wain kabier ule, kabĩ walouf.’
40021029	“Ĩ aiten yalen, ‘Aya tuwauf,’ dum ĩ in kisi falei ye fen, ilen.
40021030	“Agef fen, tama kesu taka garan ile, od tekelei anĩ irokenen. Kesu aiten yalen, ‘Dei, aya age afouf,’ anĩ ere, ĩ ileya sã.
40021031	“Idi uru atun, aim anĩ tama oron anĩ age fen?” Idi aiten dalen, “Matum.” Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, takis yaleya tamo, kayau bouweid na nẽ sur difedig geid, ã atun, idi ketem Negur nẽ tano bun uyu dilauf.
40021032	Ere nigin, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo ĩ, madur ibodõya nẽ naab ifelneĩf nigin ã garan isin, ã ĩ nigin to momoi gen, anĩ ere, takis yaleya tamo, kayau bouweid na nẽ sur difedig geid, idi momoi den. Ã ĩ ulegeneg, ã wauĩ to falei ge fen, ĩ to momoi wiyẽgen.
40021033	“Yaab od taka nigin wedereĩ unog. Teneub marau taka ĩ yogon kabier aa wain itenen, ĩ kau ifõ kalĩ felen, wain sumin asi fiya nigin ku yalen, kabĩ lo fiya nẽ fõ inon. Agef fen, ĩ mala solo yalouf nigin wain kabĩ, kabĩ lo difedig tamo tunĩ imeid bun ino fen, uyu takã ilen.
40021034	Sain biya bure fele di, teneub marau wain biya fito fiya nigin in ferfer susur fe di, kabĩ lo difedig tamo garan dilen.
40021035	“Kabĩ lo difedig tamo, teneub marau nẽ ferfer dirouneĩd fen, taka dun, taka dukesin, taka meein tulu difen.
40021036	Age dife di, teneub marau ferfer tunĩ sur fedin, are idi musei uyulil sur fedin wal fiya. Age fe di, kabĩ lo difedig tamo uruwa age difen gen, baban yogon ferfer bun age difedin.
40021037	Dum bagai, teneub marau yogon naal idi garan sur fiyen. Ĩ iron, ‘Idi neu kesu nigin fau karĩ difiyẽf.’
40021038	“Anĩ ere, kabĩ lo difedig tamo, naal anĩ dile fen, idi abob dirokenen, ‘Eĩ inim wain kabĩ akorouf. Usig, ada ĩ taukeis fen, yogon akor talouf.’
40021039	Age de fen, idi ĩ dale, wain kabĩ mayarẽ dira ken, dukesin.
40021040	“Age fiya nigin, sain wain kabĩ nẽ marau isiyouf, ĩ kabĩ lo difedig tamo ere naig fediyouf?”
40021041	Idi Jesus aiten dalen, “Teneub marau, idi sane bagai sane ye fen, idenkesiyouf, ĩ wain kabĩ anĩ, kabĩ lo difedig tamo tunĩ imeid bun ino fen, na yaledi di, idi wain mayof sain bun fito de fen, yogon biya difenẽf.”
40021042	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã od Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ to uwesegen de? “‘Meein are fõ inoya tamom sane de fen, ditoron anĩ, gama monog tor wõ yen, anĩ Odug yogo age fe di, malamã yun.’
40021043	“Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, Negur nẽ tano ã bun tamal son yeĩ yale, tamo kayau idi aayũ faat biya yũf anidi ifenẽdiyouf.
40021044	Aib taka meein anĩ teten kubũ youf, mered fe fisik fouf, takag, aib taka meein anĩ ĩ teten kubũ youf, ĩ danĩf aas lauf.”
40021045	Sain pris odudug, Farisia tamo geid, Jesus nẽ yaab od karĩ den, idi kelein, Jesus idi nigin wogõ yen.
40021046	Idi Jesus irounẽya nigin naab dimiren, anĩ ere, idi tamo kayau nigin kumĩ den, ere nigin, tamo kayau idi Jesus nigin profet taka dedig.
40022001	Jesus yaab od nem baban irokeneĩd fen, iron:
40022002	“Saa tano ĩ, king taka, ĩ naal kayau yalouf nigin tar dodok fen age fiya gen.
40022003	Ĩ yogon ferfer sur fedi di, tamo iweignẽdin yogon tar bun disiyouf nigin dirokenẽdin, anĩ ere, idi isiya ditoron.
40022004	“Ĩ baban ferfer tunĩ sur feid fen, iron, ‘Idi aya aweignẽdin anĩ urokenẽdig: Aya tar mogo saika afel. Aya bulmakau yaro biya biya ado adenen, ereb ereb ganan mogo dodok afelel. Bagu fiya tar bun usig.’
40022005	“Anĩ ere, idi to karĩ difiyẽdin, idi diyalelen, taka yogon kabier ilen, taka ĩ yogon bisnis kabĩ yalen.
40022006	Tunĩ idi ferfer dirouneĩd fen, tadũ difiyeĩd didenkesin.
40022007	Anĩ nigin, king name odug sane fen, yogon kusĩ tamo sur fedi di, dilen, ferfer didenen anidi didenkeis fen, nedi taun yã dinon.
40022008	“Agef fen, king, ne ferfer irokenẽdin, ‘Bagu fiya nẽ tar mogo dodok afelel, aya tamo aweigneĩd fen, naa afenẽdin anidi, dogo sane age difen nigin, isiya kisi feleya sã.
40022009	Anĩ nigin, ã ulagauf, naab kaleyan aib aib uledigouf are, urokenẽdig len, idi tar bun disiyouf.’
40022010	Age ye di, ferfer dilelen, naab naab diyo ken, tamo kayau dileid fen, biya ado sane ganan gou difedin, age dife di, tamo kayau ado bagu difedidig nẽ guru fiya modoũ bun tamo kayau isokosen.
40022011	“Age dife di, king namen isin, tamo kayau fele fedin, an ĩ tamo taka kolos biya ifonũya sã fotou fen.
40022012	King ĩ to fiyen, ‘Mou, naig fe di, õ bagu fiya nẽ naki sã anĩ guru fiya enĩ namen usil?’ Tamo ĩ od sã ibodon.
40022013	“Age fe di, king yogon kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, ‘Ima ye ado ufõg, mayarẽ gugum bun urãg, an are wifirig ye fen, gobora kikokõ yediyouf.’
40022014	“Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau musei iweignẽdif, anĩ ere, teke tekelei igirnẽdif.”
40022015	Age fe di, Farisia tamo dilen, Jesus in od bun naig fe mog, talouf de fen, od katõ difen.
40022016	Age de fen, Farisia tamo, idi neid dõ fiya tar, Herod nẽ tamo tar geid, Jesus wagen sur difedi di, dilen, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Tise, amã keleĩ, õ momoi wogõya nẽ tamo, anĩ õ Negur nẽ naab momoi bagai ufelnẽdidig, õ tamom to wewu diyõdig, ere nigin, õ idi yana ado be sã anĩ to es wedig.
40022017	Anĩ amã urokanamã, ogon kisi ere wof? Sisa takis ifenẽya nigin biya de, sã?”
40022018	Anĩ ere, Jesus idi neid namedin kisi sane kelei ken, iron, “Ã meleid yaleya tamo, ere nigin ã aya kisi wiyagef?
40022019	Takis ifenẽya nigin koin moni ufelnag.” Idi koin moni taka wagen diroule di,
40022020	Jesus idi to fedin, “Eĩ ai nawa nẽ malakanon? Eĩ ai yana nẽ itotoya?”
40022021	Idi aiten dalen, “Sisa nẽ.” Age de di, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Ereb Sisa nẽ are Sisa wenẽg, ereb Negur nẽ are Negur wenẽg.”
40022022	Od enĩ idi karĩ de fen, terẽ den. Age de fen, idi Jesus ditornẽ diya dilelen.
40022023	Naa de tekelei anĩ bun, Sadusia tamo idi dirõdig anĩ, laa bun tamal to ke de fã dedig, dedig anidim, Jesus wagen disi to difiyen.
40022024	Idi diron, “Tise, Moses iron, tamo taka kesu sã mog laa fef, in tura waab yale fen, tura fotokar kesu iroukenẽf.
40022025	Amã atun, tura tura sewen dibodon. Matu ĩ kayau yalen laa fen, ĩ kesu sã, anĩ nigin, ĩ, in kayau, ne tura itorkenen.
40022026	Age fiya bagai, tura dõ fiya ĩg age fen, anĩ dõ fiya tri ĩg agef ile sewen adoken.
40022027	Idikeleya bun, kayau ĩg laa fen.
40022028	Anĩ nigin, kel fãya bun, idi sewen anĩ atun, ĩ ai nẽ kayau bagai ibodõf? Ere nigin, idi ganan kayau anĩ dalen.”
40022029	Jesus aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Ã od kũ wenẽgef, ere nigin, ã Negur nẽ Itotoya ado Negur nẽ megeir keleĩ sã.
40022030	Laa bun tamal kel fãya bun, an tamo kayau ado abob yalef ya sã, idi engel saa ilun difaref gen dibodõf.
40022031	Anĩ ere, laa bun tamal kel fãya nigin, Negur ã irokenein anĩ, ã to uwesegen de?
40022032	Negur iron, ‘Aya Abraham nẽ Negur, Isak nẽ Negur, Jakop nẽ Negur.’ Ĩ laa neid Negur sã, ĩ mata ibodõya neid Negur.”
40022033	Anĩ tamo kayau od enĩ karĩ de fen, ĩ agef ifelnẽdin anĩ nigin terẽ den.
40022034	Jesus ĩ Sadusia tamo od bun sigoreid ifokelen anĩ karĩ de fen, Farisia tamo idi guru difen.
40022035	Idi atun, lo keleĩ tamo takam Jesus kisi fiye ken, eig fiyẽ to fiyen,
40022036	“Tise, ĩtãfiya nanĩ anĩ, ganan wal fiya odug bagai Lo bun irok?”
40022037	Jesus irokenen, “‘Õ, Odug ogon Negur waũ adok, malãkanon adok, kisi adok bunem, ĩ nigin waũ laaf.’
40022038	Ĩtãfiya enĩ ĩ matu, Lo bun ganan wal fiya odug bagai irok.
40022039	Anĩ dõ fiya are eig fiya, ‘Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago waũ laaf.’
40022040	Lo ado Profet neid od ganan, ĩtãfiya uru enĩ teten difaref.”
40022041	Sain Farisia tamo idi guru difesi di, Jesus idi to fedin,
40022042	“Kristus nigin ã kisi ai gef? Ai nẽ naal anĩ Kristus?” Idi aiten dalen, “Dawid naal.”
40022043	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Dawid naig fe di, anĩ Awa Uurem irokenen, ĩ nigin ‘Odug’ yen?” Ĩ nigin Dawid iron,
40022044	“‘Negur neu Odug irokenen: “Imau biya melem ubod mog, ogon kiwai tar on yẽ farume gõ afalauf.” ’
40022045	Dawid ĩ nigin ‘Odug’ yen ouf are, naig fe di, Kristus ĩ Dawid naal ouf?”
40022046	Taka nem, ĩ aiten yale solof irõya kisi feleya san, naa anĩ bunem ilen ganan, takam baban ĩ to fiyẽya nigin kumĩ den.
40023001	Dum Jesus, tamo kayau in dõ fiya tar geid irokenẽdin,
40023002	“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, Moses nẽ sia bun dibodõdig.
40023003	Anĩ nigin, ã idi karĩ wiyẽdig fen, ereb idi ã ago gei de di, ã ago gouf. Anĩ ere, ereb idi age difef anĩ, ã to agog, ere nigin, idi dirõdig anĩ to dõ de age difedig.
40023004	Idi morõ odudug difofa ken, tamo kayau oroweid se difedig, anĩ ere, idi dogo bagai, morõ enei dalesauf nigin imeid gege tekelei bagai gebeya nigin to orodidig.
40023005	“Idi ereb ereb ganan age difedig, are ege tamo meleid yaleya: Age de fen, idi tamo meleid yaleya nigin, lo ĩtãfiya bokis naal odudug nuwa bun difeid fen, demeid bun ado imeid dã bun difofãdig, idi neid kolos nẽ malũ meluluk adodo dinodidig.
40023006	Idi, saaf odudug bun ado Juda neid uub fõ bun, modoũ malabag ibodõya anĩ orodidig.
40023007	Idi maket modoũ bun, tamo kayau idim sere difiyeĩd fen, ‘O tise’ difediyouf anĩ orodidig.
40023008	“Anĩ ere, ã tise to diyeĩf, ere nigin, ã Tise tekelei dogol ado, ã adok tura tura.
40023009	Ã tenebur ein aib taka to dei gouf, ere nigin, ã Temeĩ tekelei dogol ado, ĩ saa ilun ibodok.
40023010	Ã mudur ado to diyeĩf, ere nigin, ã Mudur Ado tekelei dogol, are Kristus.
40023011	Ã atun, aib taka ganan wal fiya wõ you fenẽ, ĩ ãgenei kabĩ tamo ibodõf.
40023012	Ere nigin, aib taka ĩ yogo yana yalesef, ĩ lai fesilauf, aib taka ĩ yogo nigin lai fesilauf, ĩ yana adouf.
40023013	“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã tamo kayau meleid bun saa tano nigin sukar unogedig. Ã aug namen to ulegedig, idi dilau fenẽ age difef, ã katĩ welegedig.
40023015	“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã, tamo tekelei waleg fen, ĩ ãgenei dõ fiya unenẽgouf nigin, teneub bun uyokeleg fen, maaĩ naab bun uyõgefeg ago gedig, agog fen, tamo ĩ anĩ ufelnẽge di, ĩ ãgenei dõ fiya wõ yef are, ĩ ã hel nẽ gere tar ubodõgef wal yeĩya sane bagai wõ yef.
40023016	“Mala ifofakeleya uyu irouya, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã urõgedig, ‘Aib taka tempel yana bunem in od isen ken, totol od irok, are ege, anĩ ere, aib taka tempel nẽ gol bunem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ dõf age fouf.’
40023017	Ã neneya, meleĩ ifofakeleya! Ere anĩ odug, gol de, oo tempel gol fateul ifenẽdig anĩ?
40023018	Takag ã urõgedig, ‘Aib taka alta yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, are ege, anĩ ere, aib taka sesewi fiya nẽ safina alta bun ifaref anĩ yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ dõf age fouf.’
40023019	Ã, mala ifofakeleya tamo! Ere anĩ odug, safina de, oo alta sesewi fiya fateul ifenẽdig anĩ?
40023020	Anĩ nigin, aib taka alta yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ alta ado safina ganan alta teten ifaref anim in od isen ken, totol od irok.
40023021	Taka ĩ tempel yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ tempel ado, Negur tempel namen ibodok anim in od isen ken, totol od irok.
40023022	Taka ĩ saa yana nem in od isen ken, totol od irok, ĩ Negur nẽ king sia ado, Negur ĩ an ibodok anim in od isen ken, totol od irok.
40023023	“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã kabier tamal sako nanaaleg farag fen, ten tekelei unogedig, anĩ ere, ã, lo nẽ odug, are safina wal fiya anidi nigin to kisi gedig, are lo nẽ madur fiya, wau ifenẽya, wau momoiya. Ã anĩ adok to tai gedig. Ã teten nẽ anĩ dõg fen, dum nẽ anĩg tai gem, are dem.
40023024	Ã, mala ifofakeleya uyu irouya! Ã soloulã tar bun ibodok anĩ ulul nem yaleleya nigin kous gedig, anĩ ere, ã kamel tar bun ibodok anĩ utobogedig.
40023025	“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã kap beĩ ado agara anĩ kulo gedig, anĩ ere, name bun amuyẽ isokos fen, taka nẽ safina yaleya nigin imeĩ su lai ge fen fe tetenem yaleya ado, akorou yeya aug naumeĩ nigin dogol yenek.
40023026	Farisia tamo, mala ifofakeleya! Kap beĩ ado name ket kulo wedig, ago ge di, teteneg fili youf.
40023027	“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã aau lalau nem matmat sigor naki fiya gen, teten lo fiya nigin biya bagai, namen anĩ are tamo gare den tuweid ado ereb ereb ganan amuyẽ isokosen.
40023028	Age fiya bagai, ãg teten tamo kayau meleid bun madur tamo gen ubodõgedig, anĩ ere, nameneĩ mala yaleya ado sane bagai isokosen.
40023029	“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo geid, ã meleid yaleya tamo, ã nigin meleĩlon ado! Ã profet neid matmat unog fen, madur tamo neid matmat garab wiyẽgedig.
40023030	Ã urõgedig, ‘Ada tubuda tar dibodon sain bun, ada tabodom are, ada idi geid to bagu tafem, profet naudeid to filu fadam.’
40023031	Anĩ nigin, ã aug nigin yaor gef, ere nigin, ã idi profet didenkesin anidi neid ibor tar.
40023032	Ãgenei tubuĩ tar neid mosor tobol ge di, isokosef!
40023033	“Ã gogour bagai! Ã gogour sane gere tar! Ã naig ge fen, hel nẽ es fiyauf bun tamal uyagauf?
40023034	Age fiya nigin, aya, profet, keleĩ biya tamo, tise ado ã bun sur afediyouf. Idi tunĩ udenkesigouf, tunĩ aa tetek bun udenẽdigouf, tunĩ ãgenei uub fõ bun wagagã gouf, fonõ fonõ idi darau wenẽdig fen, urudigouf.
40023035	Anĩ nigin, madur tamo Abel nẽ naud bun ile, Sekaraia Berekia naal, ĩ tempel alta ado atun ã ukesigen, in naud bun, madur tamo neid naudeid ganan teneub enĩ iroun nigin, anĩ nẽ mala solo sane ã bun isiyouf.
40023036	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, mala solo kafĩ fiya enĩ ganan, tamo kayau sain enei bun dibodok anidi bun isiyouf.
40023037	“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, õ profet udenkeis fen, õ bun sur fedig anidi meein meein wedidig, sain musei aya õ wau afon ken, ogon gerẽ tar kuru afedig, tataro sina momou waye farumen kuru fedig gen, anĩ ere, ã utorõgedig.
40023038	Ulogouf, ãgenei fõ fonou lef.
40023039	Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, ã aya baban to uleyagauf ile, ã fau urõgouf, ‘Odug yana bunem isif, ĩ el fiya ado,’ sain anĩ bun, ã aya uleyagauf.”
40024001	Jesus tempel bun tamal kutũ yeis, iyok ile mog, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disin, tempel fõ tunĩ anĩ difelnen.
40024002	Jesus to fedin, “Ã enĩ ganan ulegef de? Aya ã momoi arokeneik, meein enĩ taka, meein tura teten to yenẽf, anĩ adok fau isog irailauf.”
40024003	Jesus Moul Arein ibod mog, in dõ fiya tar mugun wagen disin dirokenen, “Urokanamã, ere sain enĩ wõ youf? Ere uris bagai anĩ, on isiya nẽ ado idikeleya nẽ?”
40024004	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Takam to idegneĩf nigin lo weleg.
40024005	Ere nigin, musei aya yanau nem disi dirõf, ‘Aya Kristus,’ age de fen, idi tamo kayau musei didegnẽdiyouf.
40024006	Ã kusĩ wõya karĩg fen, tamo sigoredim kusĩ nigin wogõ douf anĩ karĩ gouf, ã anĩ nigin to terẽ gei. Ereb ereb anĩ agef wõ youf, anĩ ere, idikeleya sain fau dum isiyouf.
40024007	Teneub taka fã ye fen, ĩ teneub taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf, tano taka ĩ tano taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf. Naũ odug mimĩ ado, uyu taka taka bun wõ youf.
40024008	Enei ganan, kayau kesu ibodõf nigin darau gariya inof gen.
40024009	“Sain age fouf bun, ã idi imeid bun ulagauf, darau odug laa bun dineneĩf, teneub ganan bun tamo kayau ã nigin to orodiyouf, ere nigin, aya yanau ã ado nigin.
40024010	Sain anĩ bun, musei momoiya dudum difouf, idi dogo tutur abob kiwai difenẽf, idi abob to orodiyouf.
40024011	Agef mog, idegẽya profet musei wowã douf, idi tamo kayau musei didegnẽdiyouf.
40024012	Tobonunã sane anĩ fou yalauf nigin, tamo kayau musei wau laa fiya nigin folo rouf.
40024013	Anĩ ere, aib taka ĩ megeir ifar ile, idikeleya bun, Negur ĩ isennẽf.
40024014	Saa tano nẽ biya od enĩ wogõ difediyouf anim, teneub ganan bun tamo kayau wedereid irou fen, uris gen ifenẽdiyouf, anĩ gama idikeleya isiyouf.
40024015	“Sain ã log mog, ninir fonou inenẽf, are profet Daniel sigor bun wogõ yen anĩ, Jerusalem fateul modoũ bun ifarauf are (ani uweseg keleĩ youf),
40024016	idi Judia teneub bun dibodok, arein diya diselauf.
40024017	Taka ĩ yogon fõ sokor ibodok, ĩ to kel isil, aaben ereb ereb gei fouf.
40024018	Taka ĩ kabier ibodok, yogon gabar yalouf nigin to kel ilauf.
40024019	Naa anĩ bun, kayau bouweid ado, kayau kesu su ifenek ado, idi meleidlon adouf.
40024020	Feluk sain Sabat naa bun ado, ã to uyagauf nigin Negur kosẽ gouf.
40024021	Sain anĩ bun, morõ odug biya isiyouf, morõ age fiya gariya bun teneub inon isi gama, taka to wõ yen, dum buneg taka to wõ youf.
40024022	Negurem naa anĩ to godo falaisim are, taka to mata ibodom, tamo kayau igirnẽdin idi nigin ye fen, naa anĩ godo falaisiyouf.
40024023	Sain anĩ bun, taka ã irokeneĩf, ‘Ulegef, Kristus yeir!’ oo ‘Ĩ your!’ ã anĩ to momoi ge.
40024024	Fau idegẽya Kristus, idegẽya profet ado wõ de fen, idi kisi falauf are, Negur igirnẽdin anidig didegnẽdiyouf nigin uris odug memelik ado difelnẽdiyouf.
40024025	Karĩg, aya tetunem ã arokenein.
40024026	“Anĩ nigin, takam ã irokeneĩf, ‘Kristus ĩ your, gerere tuan,’ ã to ulagauf, ‘Kristus ĩ yeir, aab namen,’ ã anĩ to momoi ge.
40024027	Gaa iseyanem kolimei fili ye di, ile, gaa ileyaneg iledig, age fiya bagai, Tamo Naal in isiyouf bun age fouf.
40024028	Nain be ereb bouwa buru waaif nẽ an, tum guru difouf.
40024029	“Morõ sain anĩ bure fele di, kaisã bagai “‘gaa gugum kalauf, ogõ to lalan youf, saa ilun tamal barisa kuku rediyouf, saa nẽ megeir guyoyõ douf.’
40024030	“Sain anĩ bun, Tamo Naal nẽ uris saa bun wõ youf, teneub ganan bun tamo kayau waud gudũ fouf. Idi Tamo Naal saa lalo bun, yogon fula fiya medeĩya barikã megeir ado isi mog, dilouf.
40024031	Agef fen, ĩ yogon engel, taur ait odug ado susur fedi di, idi, yogon tamo kayau igirnẽdin anidi, teneub akor ganan bun, saa akor ganan bun ado kuru difediyouf.
40024032	“Gama ã, aa fig bun keleĩ walogouf: Susu bonuf fen, aarau inodif, ã keleĩ, saneya melsak.
40024033	Age fiya nigin, ã anĩ ganan ulogouf are, ã keleĩ, in isiya mogo melsã, bobogẽ bagai ifaref.
40024034	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo kayau sain enei nẽ idi to sa kel mog, enĩ ganan wowã youf.
40024035	Saa teneub ado sa kalauf, anĩ ere, neu od to bagai sa kalauf.
40024036	“Taka nem, anĩ nẽ naa sain ado to keleĩ, saa ilun engel idig sã, Naal ĩg sã, Dei yogo dogol keleĩ.
40024037	Noa nẽ sain bun age fen age fiya bagai, Tamo Naal isiyouf bun age fouf.
40024038	Kuwei odug nẽ naa fau mog, tamo kayau saafei de fen, naanuei den, tamo kayau yalef, kayau tamo difenek difen, age de dile mog, Noa waag namen ilen.
40024039	Idi ereb wõ youf anĩ to keleĩ mog, kuwei isi, adok kuweir dilelen. Age fiya bagai, Tamo Naal ĩ isiyouf bun age fouf.
40024040	Tamo uru idi kabier kabĩ dalef difarauf, tekelei yalouf, taka itornẽf.
40024041	Kayau uru idi falawa falei dife mog, tekelei yalouf, taka itornẽf.
40024042	“Age fiya nigin, meleĩ unog fen, log, ere nigin, ã keleĩ sã, naa nanĩ be bun ãgenei Odug isiyouf.
40024043	Ã keleĩ youf: Fõ marau, bõ ereb sain, bẽ tamo isiyouf keleĩ youf are, ĩ mata ibod ken, bẽ tamo in fõ to narĩ fouf nigin ololo fouf.
40024044	Age fiya nigin, ãg saika gouf, ere nigin, Tamo Naal ĩ fau sain to isiyouf gouf bun isiyouf.
40024045	“Ferfer taka aim anĩ dõ fiya kisi biya ado de? Ĩ yogon odugem, ĩ yogon odug nẽ fõ bun anidi neid saaf, dogo neid sain kilei dõf ifenẽdiyouf nigin ima bun inon anĩ.
40024046	Sain tamo odug kelouf bun, ferfer biya bagai age fe di, ilouf, tamo odug ĩ nigin biya fiyẽf.
40024047	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo odug ĩ, yogon safina ganan ferfer anĩ ima bun inouf.
40024048	Anĩ ere, ferfer taka sane ĩ wau bun irõf, ‘Neu tamo odug ilen, sain meluk biya gerõ ibodok, ĩ kukula to isiyouf.’
40024049	Age ye fen, ĩ, in kabĩ tura tar idenẽdiya gariya ino fen, gama ĩ yogo, saaf biya naan biya, aai sẽ fiya tamo geid dõdig.
40024050	Ferfer anĩ nẽ tamo odug, in isiya nẽ naa, ferfer to isiyouf ye fen, kisif mog, in isiya sain, ĩ keleĩ sã mog, isiyouf.
40024051	Tamo odug, ferfer anĩ gudũf fisik fe fen, mala yaleya tamo geid nedi modoũ bun inenẽf, an are wifirig ye fen, gobora kikokõ yediyouf.”
40025001	Jesus tobol fe iron, “Sain anĩ bun, saa tano ĩ, kayau taulei ten, idi neid lam gei de diyok dilen, tamo mois tarabã difiyẽf age fiya gen.
40025002	Faif idi kisi neneya ado di, faif idi kisi biya ado.
40025003	Kisi neneya ado, idi neid lam gei difen, anĩ ere, keresin to dalen.
40025004	Anĩ ere, kisi biya ado, keresin kulumã ado lam dalen.
40025005	Tamo mois kaisã to isin, idi adok mulã fedi di, denenan.
40025006	“Bõ atun ait taka iweig iron, ‘Ulegef, tamo mois mogo yeir, ulolõ wesig fen, fotou wiyẽg!’
40025007	“Kayau taulei ganan fafã de fen, lam wik koriri difeselen.
40025008	Kisi neneyam, kisi biya ado dirokenẽdin, ‘Ãgenei keresin tunĩ wanamãg, amã nemã lam gare felediyou fenẽ.’
40025009	“Kisi biya adodom, kisi neneya dirokenẽdin, ‘Eo, keresin eĩ, ã ado amã ado to kisi falauf. Amam ifeneĩya ban, uleg, oun keresin na nẽ dinodig bun, aug nigin na waleg.’
40025010	“Kisi neneya idi, keresin na nigin dile mog, tamo mois mogo isin. Kayau taulei idi ololo difiyen, weim bagu fiya nẽ tar bun, aaben dilelen. Age dife di, sukar kotũ felen.
40025011	“Dum, kisi neneya idig disin, idi diron, ‘Tamo odug, tamo odug, amã nigin sukar kã wo!’
40025012	“Anĩ ere, tamo mois aitedin yalen, ‘Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aya ã keleĩ sã.’
40025013	“Age fiya nigin, ã lo weleg, ere nigin, naa kilok ado ã keleĩ sã.
40025014	“Takag, saa tano ĩ, tamo taka ĩ, uyu takã gerõ naab ilau fenẽ nigin, ĩ yogon ferfer iweigneĩd fen, yogon safina kulatun de kenẽf nigin, imeid bun inon age fiya gen.
40025015	Taka ĩ faif tausen kina ifenen, taka tu tausen kina ifenen, taka wan tausen kina ifenen, idi dogo mugu mugu neid safina kulatun fiya nẽ keleĩ kilei kilei ifeneĩd fen, ĩ uyu takã gerõ naab ilen.
40025016	Tamo faif tausen kina yalen, kaisã bagai ilen, moni kabĩ bun ino fen, baban faif tausen kina yalen.
40025017	Tamo tu tausen kina yalen, ĩg agef fen, baban tu tausen kina yalen.
40025018	Tamo wan tausen kina yalen, anĩ ere, ĩ ile, meku yale fen, tamo odug nẽ moni teneub kur inokelen.
40025019	“Sain meluk bure fele di, ferfer neid odug kel isi fen, moni ferfer mugu mugu ifenẽdin anĩ, idi naig dife kabĩ difenen anĩ, faded de dirokenẽf nigin ferfer ganan iweig laisin.
40025020	Tamo faif tausen kina yalen, ĩ baban faif tausen kina taka ado irou isi fen, ĩ iron, ‘Tamo odug, õ aya faif tausen kina wanan, ulef, aya baban faif tausen kina taka ado.’
40025021	“In tamo odug ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ de agon, õ ferfer biya dõ fiya biya bagai! Õ safina naal bun kulatun biya ubodon nigin, aya õ imã bun safina musei anouf. Usi fen, ogon tamo odug nẽ kulĩya namen ubod!’
40025022	“Tamo tu tausen kina yalen, ĩg isi fen, ĩ iron, ‘Tamo odug, õ aya tu tausen kina wanan, ulef, aya baban tu tausen kina taka ado.’
40025023	“In tamo odug ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ de agon, õ ferfer biya dõ fiya biya bagai! Õ safina naal bun kulatun biya ubodon nigin, aya õ imã bun safina musei anouf. Usi fen, ogon tamo odug nẽ kulĩya namen ubod!’
40025024	“Age fe di, tamo wan tausen kina yalen, ĩ isi fen, iron, ‘Tamo odug, aya kelein, õ tamo totol ado, onom to utenen anĩ kusu wodig, onom faat to uraran anĩ fito wodig.
40025025	Anĩ nigin, aya õ nigin kumĩ au fen, ele, ogon moni teneub kur anokelen. Ulef, ogon safina yeir.’
40025026	“In tamo odug ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ, ferfer sane fõ tamal! Õ kelein, ayam to atenen anĩ kusu afedig, ayam faat to araran anĩ fito afedig de?
40025027	Õ kisi agom, neu moni benk bun uno di, benk im kabĩ yalekanam, ago wom, sain aya kelauf bun, moni kabĩ yalen anĩ nẽ mala ado, moni õ benk wenen anĩ bagu fiya kel isin ado alem. Anĩ õ to agon.’
40025028	“Age ye fen, ĩ ari fedin, ‘Wan tausen kina ĩ bun son ge fen, tamo ten tausen kina ado anĩ wenẽg.
40025029	Taka ĩ ereb ado, aya toru afouf, age fe di, ĩ musei adouf. Taka ĩ sã bagai, ereb taka ĩ adog, ĩ bun tamal son fouf.
40025030	Ferfer sane anĩ mayarẽ gugum namen urãg, an are wifirig ye fen, gobora kikokõ yediyouf.’
40025031	“Sain Tamo Naal, yogon fula fiya medeĩya ado engel ganan geid disiyouf, ĩ in ibodõya modoũ fula fiya medeĩya bun ibodõf.
40025032	Teneub ganan bun, tamo kayau ĩ wagen kuru difediyouf, age dife di, ĩ tamo kayau foi fediyouf, sipsip lo fiya tamo, sipsip meme ado foi fedig gen age fouf.
40025033	Ĩ sipsip ima biyalẽ inoid fen, meme ima kilẽ inodiyouf.
40025034	“Agef fen, King ĩ, idi ima biyalẽ anidi irokenẽdiyouf, ‘Neu Deim el yeik ã, usig, ãgenei akoreĩ waleg, gariya bun teneub inon bunem isi gama, tano ãgenei nigin saika fen anĩ.
40025035	Ere nigin, aya naũ fiya mog, ã yõya nẽ safina wanagen, aya naan ail fiya mog, ã naan yõya nigin wanagen, aya yaũ tamo abod mog, ã aabẽ urou uleyagen.
40025036	Aya gemũ abod mog, ã gabar ufilaĩnagen, aya dagi abod mog, ã kulatun wiyagen, aya kalabus bun abod mog, ã usig ki wiyagen.’
40025037	“Age ye di, madur tamo kayau aiten dalen, ‘Odug, ere sain õ naũ ubod mog, amã saaf mafonon, õ naan ail yõ mog, naan mafonon?
40025038	Ere sain õ yaũ tamo mailiyo ken, amã nemã fõ bun maleyon, õ gemũ ubod mog, gabar mafilaĩnon?
40025039	Ere sain õ dagi ubod mog, amã õ mailiyon, õ kalabus bun ubod mog, amã ki mayon?’
40025040	“King aitedin yale irõf, ‘Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã neu turau tar yeneid sã enidi taka el wiyẽgen, are aya el wiyagen.’
40025041	“Age ye fen, ĩ ima kilẽ anidig irokenẽdiyouf, ‘Gelu yein ã, wageun uyag uleg, yã mala fitotoleya faimud, Satan in engel geid idi nigin dodok fen anĩ, an uleg.
40025042	Ere nigin, aya naũ abod mog, ã ereb taka to wanagen, aya naan ail fiya mog, ã naan to wanagen.
40025043	Aya yaũ tamo abod mog, ã aabẽ to urou uleyagen, aya gemũ abod mog, ã gabar to ufilaĩnagen, aya dagi abodon, kalabus bun abod mog, ã to kulatun wiyagen.’
40025044	“Idig aiten dale dirõf, ‘Odug, ere sain õ naũ ubodon, naan sã ubodon, yaũ tamo ubodon, gabar sã ubodon, dagi ubodon, kalabus bun ubodon, amã õ to masennon?’
40025045	“King aitedin yale irõf, ‘Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã neu idi yeneid sã enidi taka to el wiyẽgen, are aya to el wiyagen.’
40025046	“Age ye di, idi darau faimud ibodkeleya nẽ bun dilauf, madur tamo kayau idi mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ bun dilauf.”
40026001	Jesus od enĩ ganan wogõ ye bure fel fen, ĩ in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin,
40026002	“Ã keleĩ, naa uru bure fele di, Pasa naa isiyouf, age fe di, Tamo Naal idi imeid bun dino di, aa tetek bun dukesiyouf.”
40026003	Dum pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo, pris mudur ado in yana Kaiafas in fõ bun guru difen.
40026004	An idi Jesus idegẽya naab bun dale fen, dukesiyouf nigin katõ difen.
40026005	Idi diron, “Sifa inoya bun to age tafouf, age tafouf, tamo kayau idi seye de fen, kusĩ dalesauf.”
40026006	Jesus, Betani fonõ an, Simon lepra dagi kulu adon in fõ bun ibod mog,
40026007	kayau taka, Jesus wagen moul sumeĩ biya bagai moni odug nem anĩ, moul ifeya nẽ gulub ado irou isin anĩ, Jesus tebol bun saaf yoko ibod mog, ĩ mudur bun moul fi felen.
40026008	Anĩ in dõ fiya tar dile mã, idi nameid sane fen, diron, “Ere nigin enĩ sekil fef?
40026009	Moul enei na odug nem sur fiyam are, moni anĩ yale maleg tamo ifenẽdiyam.”
40026010	Anĩ Jesus kelei ken, idi irokenẽdin, “Ã, ere nigin kayau enĩ wau morõ wenẽgef? Kayau enĩ aya bun biya bagai age fel.
40026011	Maleg idi ã geid faimud ubodõgouf, anĩ ere, aya ã geid faimud to tabodõf.
40026012	Sain kayau moul enĩ, neu bouwau bun fi felel are, mekur ainẽf nigin dodok fiyal.
40026013	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tenebur ein nain be biya od enĩ wogõ douf, ereb kayau anĩ age fen anĩg wogõ douf. Age dife di, idi ĩ nigin dum dum wogõ de fen, karĩ dalauf.”
40026014	Agef fen, dõ fiya tar tuwelf idi atun taka, yana Judas Iskariot tamal, pris odudug wagedin ile fen,
40026015	to fedin, “Sain aya ĩ imeĩ bun ano di, ere anĩ ã aya wanagauf nigin kisi gef?” Age ye di, idi teti silwa koin moni anĩ diweskene ken, difenen.
40026016	De anenem, Judas ĩ Jesus kiwai tamo imeid bun inoya nigin naab imirek ilen.
40026017	Bret yis sã sifa inoya naa matu anĩ bun, in dõ fiya tar Jesus wagen disi to difiyen, “Õ amã nain anĩ Pasa saaf wãf nigin, amã dodok mafe konõf anĩ oroyok?”
40026018	Jesus iron, “Taun uleg, tamo taka wagen wõg fen, urokenẽg, ‘Tise irok: Aya neu naa mogo melsã. Aya, neu dõ fiya tar geid, ogon fõ bun Pasa saaf male fen, sigigi mafouf.’”
40026019	Anĩ nigin, in dõ fiya tar, Jesus iron anĩ dõ de fen, Pasa saaf nigin dodok difen.
40026020	Aragau di, Jesus, in tuwelf geid, tebol bun saaf doko dibodon.
40026021	Idi saaf dokon, Jesus iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã atun takam, aya kiwai tamo imeid bun ineyauf.”
40026022	Idi waud gudũf fen, mugu mugu wogõ fiyẽya nigin gariya dinon, “Odug, momoi bagai, aya sã?”
40026023	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Taka ĩ, amã uruwom imamã takai beĩ bun nu mafesil, im aya kiwai tamo imeid bun ineyauf.
40026024	Tamo Naal, ĩ nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya irok kilei, agef bagai ilauf. Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ Tamo Naal kiwai tamo imeid bun inof, ĩ malalon ado! Ĩ sina to gõ fem, are dem.”
40026025	Age ye di, Judas, tamo ĩ Jesus kiwai tamo imeid bun inouf, iron, “Momoi bagai, aya sã, Rabi?” Jesus aiten yale iron, “Are õ ogo urok.”
40026026	Idi saaf dokon, Jesus bret yale, Negur de fiye ken, bret anĩ mumãf, in dõ fiya tar ifeneĩd fen, iron, “Bret enei waleg fen, wõg, eĩ neu bouwau.”
40026027	Agef fen, ĩ kap yale, Negur de fiye ken, kap anĩ ifeneĩd fen, iron, “Ã ganan, enĩ bun wõg.
40026028	Eĩ neu naudou bar itenẽya nigin, are tamo kayau musei mosor yalel kenẽdiyouf nigin fi felef.
40026029	Aya ã arokeneik, aya baban wain enĩ to ãf, gaman ile, aya ã geid, neu Dei nẽ tano bun, wain mata tãf anĩ bun.”
40026030	Anĩ bure fele di, idi seg taka dalel fen, idi Moul Arei bun diselen.
40026031	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Bõ enĩ bun, ã ganan aya utornagauf, ere nigin, are Negur nẽ Itotoya irok kilei: “‘Aya sipsip marau aukesi di, sipsip ganan firagagaũ difouf.’
40026032	Anĩ ere, aya, laa bun tamal kel fã au fen, aya ket Galili uyu alauf.”
40026033	Pita, Jesus aiten yale iron, “Idi ganan õ ditornõfeg, aya are to bagai atornõf.”
40026034	Jesus Pita irokenen, “Aya õ momoi arokonok, bõ enĩ bun tataro kokorok yeya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa towo wouf.”
40026035	Anĩ ere, Pita Jesus irokenen, “Momoi ada uruwom gare tau mogoufeg, aya õ nigin to bagai wa afouf.” Age ye di, dõ fiya tar ganan, od tekelei anĩ diron.
40026036	Age de fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, modoũ taka yana Getsemane dilen. An, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Aya oun ele, kosẽ au mog, ein ubodõgouf.”
40026037	Jesus, Pita Sebedi gere tar uru gei feid fen, dile mã, ĩ wau gudũf fen, moro kalaisin.
40026038	Age fe di, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Neu malaukanon tobega le fen, wau morõ gudũ falaisi, laa nẽ daũ bun ifaref. Ein ufareg fen, ã aya geid lo tafalauf.”
40026039	Naal godof iroule fen, kubũ ye, nawa tenebur kumokur fe fen, kosẽ yen, “Neu Dei, kisi falauf are, darau nẽ kap enĩ walel kanauf. Anĩ ere, neu oroya to dõ wouf, on oroya anĩ dogol dõ wo.”
40026040	Age fel fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar gedin kel isin, mulã den mog, iledin, ĩ Pita to fiyen, “Tamo ã, aya geid aua tekelei lo fiya nigin to kisi feleya de?
40026041	Ã, lo weleg fen, kosẽ gouf, are ã kisi yeĩya bun to kubũ gouf nigin. Uur are orof, anĩ ere, bouwa anĩ malegef.”
40026042	Ĩ, anĩ dõ fiya, baban kel ile, kosẽ yen, “Neu Dei, kap enĩ bun aya to ãf are, õ kap enĩ yaleleya nigin kisi feleya sã, age fouf, õ ogon oroya dõ wouf.”
40026043	Ĩ kel isin, baban denena mog iledin, ere nigin, idi meleid morõ gudũ fesin.
40026044	Agef fen, ĩ idi itorneĩd fen, baban kel ilen, kosẽ yen anim towo, od tekelei iron anĩ baban kosẽ yen.
40026045	Agef fen, ĩ in dõ fiya tar gedin kel ile, idi irokenẽdin, “Ã fau si unog fen, yenẽyai gef? Ulegef, sain mogo melsã, Tamo Naal mogo mosor tamo imeid bun ilef.
40026046	Fafãg fen, teleg! Kiwai imeid bun inoya tamo yeir isif!”
40026047	Jesus fau wogõ ye mog, in dõ fiya tar tuwelf idi anĩ atun taka, Judas isin. Tamo musei dimig adodo seburer adodo ĩ geid disin. Pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo idim sur difedi di, disin.
40026048	Gama Judas, Jesus kiwai tamon inoya tamo ĩ, Jesus yaor fiyẽf nigin idi uris ifenẽdin: “Tamo aya umã fiya bunem aan afiyẽf anĩ, ĩ waleg.”
40026049	Judas, kaisã bagai, Jesus wagen ile iron, “O Rabi, fel!” Age ye fen, ĩ umã fiyen.
40026050	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Mou, ereb wofon usif, are ago.” Age ye mog, tamo Jesus wagen dile dirounen.
40026051	Age dife di, tamo Jesus weim difaren anidi takam, ima iran, dimig ul feis yalen, pris mudur ado nẽ ferfer weder salõf iran.
40026052	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ogon dimig in modoũ bun uno, ere nigin, idi ganan dimig ul difeis dalef, dimig bun gare douf.
40026053	Ã kisi gef are, aya, neu Dei isennauf nigin aweignẽ di, ĩ kaisã bagai, engel musei biya, sewenti-tu tausen wal fiya imau bun inoya kisi feleya sã de?
40026054	Age afouf are, Negur nẽ Itotoya anĩ nigin iron enĩ ganan, naig fe kisi fel, agef wõ youf?”
40026055	Sain anĩ bun, Jesus tamo musei irokenẽdin, “Ã bẽ tamo walegedig gen, aya ã dimig adodo seburer adodo waleyagau fenẽ usigef de? Naa ganan, aya tempel fofomala bun abod ken, od afelnẽdidig, anĩ ere, ã aya to urouyagen.
40026056	Anĩ ere, profet neid itotoya kisi falauf nigin, enĩ ganan wõ yen.” Age ye di, in dõ fiya tar ganan ditornẽ diyalelen.
40026057	Idi Jesus dalen, pris mudur ado Kaiafas garan dirou dilen, an lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid guru difen.
40026058	Anĩ ere, Pita, Jesus dume naal soso fiye ken, dõf tokõ fel ile, pris mudur ado nẽ fofomalan wõ yen. Ĩ namen ile fen, kabĩ tamo geid dibod ken, naig be difiyẽf nigin lo fen.
40026059	Pris odudug, Juda neid kaunsel ganan geid, Jesus laa bun dinenẽf nigin, bou bun idegẽya od dinou fenẽ dimiren.
40026060	Musei wagen disi fen, disenneĩd fen, idegẽya od diraran, anĩ ere, Jesus laa bun dinenẽf nigin od gariya taka to dilen. Dum tamo uru wõ den,
40026061	anidim diron, “Tamo enim iron, ‘Aya Negur nẽ tempel narĩ afel fen, naa towo bun baban anouf, are kisi feleya.’”
40026062	Age de di, pris mudur ado fã ye, ifar fen, Jesus irokenen, “Õ to solo urõf de? Eĩ ere od anĩ, tamo enidi õ nigin dirousif?”
40026063	Anĩ ere, Jesus mutũ ifaren. Pris mudur ado Jesus irokenen, “Õ mata ibodõya Negur mala bun urõf nigin, od arokonok. Õ momoi Kristus, Negur Naal be anĩ, amã urokanamãf.”
40026064	Jesus aiten yalen, “Ao, õ ogo yer urok. Anĩ ere, aya ã ganan arokeneik: Dum bun, Tamo Naal Negur megeir ado ima biyalem ibod ken, saa lalo bun isi mog, ã ulogouf.”
40026065	Jesus age ye di, pris mudur ado karĩ ye fen, in kolos serek fe fen, iron, “Ĩ Negur kono fel! Ere nigin ada od megeir fiya nigin tamo baban tamirẽf? Ulegef, ã gama Negur kono fel anĩ karĩ gel.
40026066	Anĩ ã ere kisi gef?” Idi aiten dalen, “Ĩ laa bun ilauf.”
40026067	Age de fen, idi, Jesus nawa bun disisne ken, imedim dun. Tunim wala fã de fen,
40026068	diron, “Kristus, kurõ weis urokanamã, aim õ inok?”
40026069	Pita, pris mudur ado nẽ fõ fofomalan ibod mog, kabĩ kayau momoul taka wagen isi iron, “Õg Jesus Galili tamal weim uyõgen.”
40026070	Anĩ ere, ganan meleid bun ĩ waf fen, iron, “Õ od urok enĩ, aya keleĩ sã.”
40026071	Age ye fen, ĩ iyok ilen, bobog bun, an kayau momoul takam ile fen, tamo kayau an difaren idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo enĩ, Jesus Nasaret tamal ĩ geiden.”
40026072	Ĩ baban waf fen, totol od iron, “Tamo are aya keleĩ sã!”
40026073	Sain naal ile di, idi an difaren Pita garan dile fen, diron, “Momoi bagai, õ idi neid taka, on od wogõya bun ogo yaor yok.”
40026074	Age de di, ĩ mogo yogo bouwa geluf fen, totol od irokenẽdin, “Tamo are aya keleĩ sã!” Age ye mog, kaisã bagai tataro kokorok yen.
40026075	Age fe di, Pita Jesus wogõ yen anĩ nigin weder fokõ yen, “Sain tataro kokorok yeya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa wo towo wouf.” Anĩ nigin, ĩ weder fokõ ye di, ĩ mayarẽ ile fen, inã odug yalen.
40027001	Bonimei bagai, pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid, Jesus yukesiya nigin od difon.
40027002	Idi ĩ difõ dale diroule, gawaman nẽ mudur Pailat ima bun dinon.
40027003	Anĩ Judas, Jesus kiwai ifenen, ĩ lof mog, Jesus dukesiyouf nigin ĩ bou bun od dun anĩ ile fen, ĩ kisif wau yu ken, teti silwa koin moni kel iroule, pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid ifenẽdin.
40027004	Judas iron, “Aya mosor anon, ere nigin, ĩ mosor sã mog, ayam kiwai anon.” Age ye di, idi aiten dalen, “Amã ere mayõf? Are ogon sakir.”
40027005	Judas moni irou ile, tempel namen irara ken, ilen. Anĩ ĩ iya ile, yogo kosim bun ula iseginen.
40027006	Pris odudug moni gei de fen, diron, “Lo to wal tafouf nigin, moni enĩ tempel nẽ kolekta bokis bun to ufeg, ere nigin, moni enĩ naud mala.”
40027007	Katõ fiya bure difel fen, moni anim, mis inoya tamo nẽ teneub anĩ na dale fen, yaũ tamo mumã difediyouf nigin, idi kisi difon.
40027008	Anĩ bunem, gamag teneub anĩ yana, Naud nẽ Mayã dedig.
40027009	Are profet Jeremaia nẽ od, eig ye wogõ yen anĩ kisi felen: “Idi teti silwa koin moni dalen, moni anĩ Israel tamo kayau ĩ nigin digiren.
40027010	Idi moni anim, mis inoya tamo nẽ teneub na dalen, Odug aya agef irokanan kilei.”
40027011	Jesus, Rom gawaman nẽ mudur Pailat, mala bun ifare di, gawaman nẽ mudur Pailat ĩ to fiyen, “Õ Juda neid king de?” Jesus iron, “Are de yer, õ urok anĩ.”
40027012	Sain pris odudug, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid, Jesus bou bun od dun, ĩ aitedin to yalen.
40027013	Pailat Jesus to fiyen, “Õ boũ bun od dirarak to karĩ wof de?”
40027014	Anĩ ere, Jesus aiten to yalen, ĩ bou yũya od tekelei bagai nigin taka to solof iron. Age fe di, gawaman nẽ mudur, odug biya terẽ yen.
40027015	Gama gawaman mudur nẽ tobonunã, Pasa sifa naa bun, tamo kayau, tamo taka kalabus bun digirĩ di, yalisnẽdig.
40027016	Sain anĩ bun, idi kalabus tamo taka, yana sane bagai adon, ĩ yana Barabas.
40027017	Bonimei, tamo kayau, Pailat nẽ fõ bun guru difesi di, Pailat to fedin, “Nanĩ ã aliskeneĩf anĩ oroyeik, Barabas de oo Jesus ĩ Kristus dedig anĩ?”
40027018	Ere nigin, ĩ yogo kelein, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo idi, kiyeĩ bunem, Jesus ĩ ima bun dinon.
40027019	Pailat od es fiya modoũ bun ibod mog, in aiwa od sur fen, “Tamo anĩ ĩ mosor sã, ĩ nigin ereb taka to ago wouf, ere nigin, aya, nor bõ, ĩ nigin ami ken, morõ odug ĩ nigin ailel.”
40027020	Anĩ ere, pris odudug, mudur adodo geid, tamo kayau od irõya nigin wedereid diroun, are idi Barabas yalisnẽya nigin ado, Jesus dukesiyouf nigin nonĩ douf nigin age difen.
40027021	Gawaman nẽ mudurem to fedin, “Aya ã aliskeneĩf nigin, uru enidi ã nanĩ oroyeik?” Idi aiten dalen, “Barabas anĩ.”
40027022	Pailat to fedin, “Age fiyauf are, aya, Jesus, Kristus dedig nigin, ere naig afouf?” Idi ganan diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf!”
40027023	Pailat to fedin, “Ere nigin? Ere mosor ĩ age fen?” Anĩ ere, idi totol bagai diweig diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf!”
40027024	Pailat ĩ anĩ ile fen, ĩ od irõya nigin naab taka sã, anĩ tamo kayau idi totol bagai dino fen, kusĩ dou fenẽ age dife di, ĩ naan yale fen, tamo kayau meleid bun ima kulof fen, ĩ iron, “Tamo enĩ naud aya bun sã, are ãgenei sakir!”
40027025	Tamo kayau ganan aiten dale diron, “Yogon naud utor len, amã bun ado nemã kesu tar bun yenẽf!”
40027026	Age de di, ĩ Barabas yalis ifenẽdin. Agef fen, ĩ irõ di, Jesus wagĩ de fen, ĩ aa tetek bun dũf nigin, kusĩ tamo imeid bun inon.
40027027	Gawaman mudur nẽ kusĩ tamo, Jesus dale gawaman mudur nẽ fõ namen dile fen, an mayã taka, kusĩ tamo ganan gou difalaisi salili difiyen.
40027028	Idi Jesus nẽ kolos dinukeis fen, kolos meluk giriya anĩ difounnen.
40027029	Age dife fen, idi malũ duri ado dale, teter tanak kori de fen, ĩ mudur bun kurũ difen. Idi werĩ tibog dale, ima biyalẽ dino fen, wagen bobou de fen, diselinen. Idi diron, “O Juda neid king gai gai ibodõf!”
40027030	Idi ĩ disisne ken, idi baban werĩ tibog ima bun tamal dale, mudur bun baba baban dun.
40027031	Idi diseline kel fen, kolos meluk giriya anĩ dinukeis, yogon kolos bagai anĩ baban difounnen. Age de fen, kusĩ tamom idi, ĩ aa tetek bun dũf nigin dirou diselen.
40027032	Sain idi mayã anĩ ditor diyok dile fen, idi Sairini tamal tamo taka fotou difen, yana Simon. Idi ĩ, Jesus nẽ aa tetek faali fouf nigin nugo difiyen.
40027033	Idi disel, modoũ yana Golgota (anĩ nẽ gariya, Mudur Tuwa nẽ Modoũ) wõ den.
40027034	Kusĩ tamo idi, an wain makik ado falei difen anĩ, Jesus yãf nigin difenen. Anĩ ere, ĩ yõ ile fen, yõya nigin itoron.
40027035	Sain idi ĩ aa tetek bun du kel fen, idi aisaĩ dira kodẽ de fen, yogon kolos morou morou gadõ difen.
40027036	Age de fen, idi an dibod ken, lo difiye kelen.
40027037	Ĩ bou bun od dinon anĩ, idi yogon mudur ilun ditoton: EĨ JESUS, JUDA NEID KING.
40027038	Age de fen, kusĩ tamo idi, bẽ tamo urug, ĩ geid aa tetek bun didenen, taka yogon ima biyalẽ, taka yogon ima kilẽ.
40027039	Tamo kayau dile disi dife, Jesus kono difiye ken, kasã difiyẽ, mudureid dira ken,
40027040	idi diron, “Õ onom tempel narĩ wol fen, baban naa towo bun anouf won, õ ogo nigin usennẽf! Õ Negur Naal wouf are, aa tetek bun tamal kutũ weis!”
40027041	Age difiyen gen, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo, idi Jesus diselinen.
40027042	Idi diron, “Tunĩ anĩ isennẽdin, anĩ ere, ĩ yogo nigin isennẽya kisi feleya sã! Ĩ Israel nẽ king! Utornẽg len, gama aa tetek bun tamal kutũ yesiyouf. Age fe di, ada ĩ nigin momoi tauf.
40027043	Ĩ Negur nigin momoi yedig. Ĩ irõdig, ‘Aya Negur Naal,’ anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ nigin orouf are, utornẽg len, gama Negurem ĩ isennẽf.”
40027044	Age difiyen gen, bẽ tamo Jesus geid, aa tetek bun didenen idig, ĩ nigin kono fiya od in bou bun diran.
40027045	Tuwelf kilok gaa ado nẽ ile, tri kilok aragaun, gugum isin, teneub ganan kerub fen.
40027046	Tri kilok age fiya mog, Jesus wade bagai iweig iron, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” –anĩ nẽ gariya, “Neu Negur, neu Negur, ere nigin õ aya utornal?”
40027047	Tunĩ an difaren, anĩ karĩ de fen, diron, “Ĩ Eliya iweignek.”
40027048	Kaisã bagai, idi atun takam gudu re ile, spons yalen, wain kai ado bun nu feis fen, tibog bun ino fen, Jesus yãf nigin ifenen.
40027049	Tunĩ ganan diron, “Gama utornẽg, Eliya isi isennẽ mog, tailauf.”
40027050	Jesus baban ait odug nem iweig di, in uur ul fe yale di, laa fen.
40027051	Sain anĩ bun, gabar meluk odug tempel namen modoũ fateul bun ibodon anĩ, serek fe uru fen, ilunenem irousil teneburen. Teneub yoũf fen, meein fara fedin.
40027052	Matmat bobog kã fedi di, tamo kayau fateul musei gare den idi, baban mata fafã den.
40027053	Idi matmat bunem fafã den anidi, Jesus kel fã ye di, Jerusalem fateul taun dile fen, tamo kayau musei meleid bun wowã den.
40027054	Kusĩ tamo tunĩ, idi neid orowa geid, Jesus tari difiyen, teneub yoũ fe di, ereb ereb ganan wowã ye di, dile fen, fatuk bagai terẽ de fen, diron, “Momoi bagai, ĩ Negur Naal!”
40027055	Kayau musei an difaren, idi so del fen, lo difen. Idi Galili anenem Jesus aruna yaleya nigin dõ difen anidi.
40027056	Idi atun Maria Magdala tamal, Maria Jems Joses ado neid sineid, taka Sebedi gere tar neid sineid.
40027057	Aragau mog, safina ado tamo, Arimatea tamal, yana Josef isin, ĩ Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar anĩ nẽ taka.
40027058	Ĩ Pailat wagen ile, Jesus nẽ bouwa buru nigin to fiyẽ di, Pailat yo ye fen, Jesus nẽ bouwa buru ĩ ifenẽya nigin, kusĩ tamo irokenẽdin.
40027059	Josef bouwa buru yale gabar lalau amuyẽ sã anim sile fen.
40027060	Agef fen, ĩ yogon matmat mata sa bun ku yalen ani bun, Jesus nẽ bouwa buru inenen. Ĩ meein odug wele fe di, isi, matmat awa ku katĩ fel fen, ilen.
40027061	Maria Magdala tamal, Maria taka ado, matmat wagen dibodon.
40027062	Naa taka, Sabat naa nẽ dodok fiya naa anĩ bure fele di, pris odudug, Farisia tamo geid, Pailat wagen dilen.
40027063	Idi diron, “Tamo Odug, amã karĩ maulef, idegẽya tamo ĩ matan iyo ken, iron, ‘Naa towo bure fele di, aya laa bun tamal, baban mata kel fã auf.’
40027064	Age fiya nigin, õ urõ len, naa towo bun matmat totol bagai tari difouf. Age fiya sãf, in dõ fiya tar disi, bouwa buru bẽ dale mã, tamo kayau didegneĩd fen, ĩ laa bun tamal kel fã yel douf. Idegẽya dum isiyouf anĩ gai sane bagai, uruwa nẽ wal fiyauf.”
40027065	Pailat iron, “Lo fiya tamo tekelei waleg. Uleg fen, ã, taka nem matmat bun ileya nigin, totol bagai katĩ feleya nigin, ã keleĩ anĩ kilei bagai, matmat agog totol bagai lo gouf.”
40027066	Anĩ nigin, idi dile, matmat bun meein teten wõ dũ dino fen, lo fiya tamo anĩ dinenen.
40028001	Sabat naa bure fele di, uub nẽ naa matu bun bonimei mumurei ado, Maria Magdala tamal, Maria taka ado matmat dilou fenẽ dilen.
40028002	Sain anĩ bun kaisã bagai, mimĩ totol ado wõ yen, ere nigin, Odug nẽ engel saa ilun tamal isin, matmat bun ilen, meein welef yerin ile di, teten ibodon.
40028003	Agef fen, in lo fiya kolimei filiya gen, in kolos lalau medeĩya saa lalo lalau gen.
40028004	Matmat lo difen tamo, idi ĩ nigin kumĩ de, tererẽ de fen, laa tamo gen denenan.
40028005	Engel kayau irokenẽdin, “To kumĩ wog, ere nigin, aya keleĩ, ã Jesus aa tetek bun dun anĩ umirnẽgef.
40028006	Ĩ ein sã, ĩ iron kilei, mogo laa bun tamal mata kel fã yel. Usig fen, ĩ yenen modoũ uleg.
40028007	Agog fen, kaisã bagai uleg, in dõ fiya tar urokenẽdig: ‘Ĩ laa bun tamal kel fã ye fen, ĩ ketem Galili ilef. An ã ĩ ulogouf.’ Aya mogo ã arokeneim.”
40028008	Age ye di, kayau idi, kaisã bagai matmat ditor dilen, kumĩ den, anĩ ere, waud kulĩya ado, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar dirokenẽdiyou fenẽ nigin gududu den.
40028009	Age de mog, Jesus tarabã feid fen, iron, “Fel.” Idi ĩ wagen disin, in ye dirou fen, seli dabin.
40028010	Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã, to kumĩ wog, uleg fen, neu turau tar idi, Galili dilauf nigin urokenẽdig; idi an aya dileyauf.”
40028011	Kayau naab luwe dile mog, matmat lo difen tamo tunĩ, taun namen dile, pris odudug bun, ereb ereb ganan wõ yen anĩ nigin od dinon.
40028012	Pris odudug, mudur adodo geid, guru de, kisi katõ de fen, idi kusĩ tamo moni odug difenẽdin.
40028013	Idi, matmat lo difen tamo dirokenẽdin, “Ã urõgouf, ‘Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar bõ disi fen, mainana kel mog, in bouwa buru bẽ dalen’ gouf.
40028014	Od enĩ gawaman nẽ mudur bun ilauf are, amã faded mafiyẽ di, ã morõ to walogouf.”
40028015	Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo moni dalen, idi diron kilei age difen. Od enĩ, Juda tamo kayau bun iyokelen, gamag agef yenek.
40028016	Age fe di, in dõ fiya tar ilewen Galili dilen, arei Jesus irokenẽdin nẽ an dilen.
40028017	Sain idi Jesus dilen, idi seli dabinen, anĩ ere, tunĩ waud urun.
40028018	Age dife di, Jesus wagedin isin irokenẽdin, “Megeir adok, saa ilun nẽ ado tenebur nẽ anĩ ganan, Negurem aya ifanan.
40028019	Anĩ nigin, ã, teneub ganan bun, tamo kayau ganan bun uleg fen, neu dõ fiya tar unenãdigouf, Dei yana nem, Naal yana bunem, Awa Uur Fateul yana bunem, idi naan ugunẽdigouf.
40028020	Agog fen, od aya ã arokenein anĩ ganan dõ difouf nigin ufelnẽdigouf. Momoi bagai, aya ã geid sain faimud tabodok, ile, sain idikalauf bun.”
41001001	Jesus Kristus, Negur Naal nigin, biya od gariya inoya.
41001002	Profet Asaia nẽ itotoya bun ibodok: “Aya neu arũ tamo ĩ ket sur afe di, ĩ uyu ilauf, ogon naab dodok fouf.”
41001003	“Ait taka gerere tuan iweig irok, ‘Odug nẽ naab dodok ge fen, madur wenẽg.’”
41001004	Age fiya nigin, Jon isin, tamo kayau gerere tuan od irokenẽdi di, waud falei del, nedi mosor yaleleya nigin naan igunẽdin.
41001005	Judia kalilĩ fiya, Jerusalem tamo kayau ganan, ĩ garan dilen. Idi neid mosor kurõ difesi di, idi im Jordan naanũ naan igunẽdin.
41001006	Jon kamel siwi nem gabar diwan anĩ ifonũdig. Agef fen, gaar gabar nem lũ diwan anim luwa gu fedig. Ĩ totobi nin te ado yõdig.
41001007	Eĩ enĩ yogon od iron, “Taka ĩ aya dumeun dõ fiyauf, anĩ ere, in megeir neu wal fiya. Aya to biya nigin, iborou bobou fe fen, in ye su nẽ malũ biru fiya kisi feleya sã.
41001008	Aya naan nem aguneik, anĩ ere, ĩ Awa Uur Fateulem iguneĩf.”
41001009	Sain anĩ bun, Jesus Nasaret taun oun Galili nediwom isi, Jonem Jordan naan igunen.
41001010	Jesus naanum fã yale fen, ĩ lof mog, saa tano kãf fen, Awa Uur kuburir gen, ĩ bun isi mog, ilen.
41001011	Age fe di, ait taka saa ilunem isin, “Õ neu Kesu, õ nigin aya wau laa fedig, õ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig.”
41001012	Kaisã bagai, Awa Uurem sur fiyẽ di, gerere tuan ilen.
41001013	Ĩ gerere tuan an, naa foti ibod mog, Satanem kisi fiyen. Ĩ gaar kuĩ geid difar mog, engel idim anĩ ĩ disennen.
41001014	Jon kalabus bun dinenen ibod mog, Jesus Galili ile, Negur nẽ biya od anĩ kurõ feis iron.
41001015	Ĩ iron, “Sain mogo isil. Negur nẽ tano mogo melsak. Wauĩ falei wog fen, biya od enĩ nigin wauĩ momoi gei!”
41001016	Jesus Galili maaĩ yeri iyo ken, ĩ Simon, ne tura Endru ado, daliyou bun kakãg dirã mog, iledin, ere nigin, idi gau yaleya tamo.
41001017	Jesus iron, “Usig, dõ wiyag, aya ã tamo gei fiya nigin aneyeĩf.”
41001018	Sain anĩ bun bai, nedi kakãg ditor ken, ĩ dõ difiyen.
41001019	Sain ĩ naal iyok ile fen, ĩ Sebedi naal Jems, tura Jon ado, waag namen, idi neid kakãg dodok dife mog, iledin.
41001020	Kaisã bagai, ĩ iweignẽdin. Age fe di, idi temeid Sebedi, in kabĩ tamo oroi yaledin anidi geid waag bun ditorneĩd fen, Jesus dõ difiyen.
41001021	Idi Kapenaum taun dilen. Sain Juda neid uub naa Sabat wõ ye di, Jesus Juda neid uub fõ namen ile fen, od ifelnẽdiya gariya inon.
41001022	Tamo kayau in od nigin terẽ den, ere nigin, ĩ tamo yana adom gen ifelnẽdin, ĩ lo ifelnẽdiya tamo gen sã.
41001023	Agef mog bai, tamo taka kaa sanem irounen anĩ, nedi uub fõ namen an kaĩ ye iron,
41001024	“Õ amã ere naig wamã fenẽ, Jesus Nasaret tamal? Õ amã daig wamã fenẽ nigin usil de? Aya õ nigin keleĩ, Negur nẽ Fateul bagai!”
41001025	Jesus totol ado iron, “Foro wol! Ĩ namen tamal ulõ weis!”
41001026	Kaa sane, tamo anĩ totol bagai yokũ fiyẽ, sur fiyẽ, ira ken, kaĩ ye, ulõ yesin.
41001027	Tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, abob toti difen, “Eĩ ere? Keleĩ mata, agef fen, totol ado! Ĩ irõ di, kaa seseneg dõ difedig.”
41001028	Ĩ age fen anĩ nẽ od kaisã bagai, Galili kalilĩ fiya fonõ anĩ adok iyokelen.
41001029	Sain Juda neid uub fõ ditor ken, kututũ desin, idi Jems Jon ado weim, Simon Endru ado neid fõ bun dilen.
41001030	Simon nẽ mam, ĩ bouwa uruwa odug ado nigin fatarẽ yenen, anĩ idi ĩ nigin Jesus dirokenen.
41001031	Anĩ nigin, Jesus kayau wagen ile, kayau ima yales irou isennẽ di, fã yen. Age fe di, bouwa uruwa anĩ kayau folo fiye kele di, kayau ĩ aruneid yalen.
41001032	Aragau anĩ bun gaa kuru kel mog, tamo kayau dagi adodo, kaa sesen adodo ganan, Jesus wagen guri difeid, disin.
41001033	Taun anĩ nẽ tamo kayau ganan, fofomala anĩ bun guru difen.
41001034	Anĩ bun, Jesus, tamo kayau dagi fire fire adodo musei el fiyẽdin, kaa sesen musei irudi di, diyawon. Anĩ ere, kaa sesen idi ĩ nigin kelein. Anĩ nigin, idi to wogõ douf nigin sigoreid ifofan.
41001035	Bonimei bagai mumurei ado, Jesus fã yale, fõ itor, moilin ile, an Negur kosẽ fiyen.
41001036	Simon ĩ, ne tã tar geid dimirne ken, dilen.
41001037	An fotou difiye ken, idi dirokenen, “Tamo kayau ganan õ dimirnok!”
41001038	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ada uyu takã talauf, fonõ melsã anĩ bun. Aya aneg od arõf, anĩ nigin aya asin.”
41001039	Age ye fen, Jesus Galili kalilĩ fiya ganan bun iyo ken, nedi uub fõ fõ bun od iro ken, kaa sesen irudi di, diyawon.
41001040	Tamo taka lepra dagi ado, ĩ wagen isi, ibor bobou fe fen, igon, “Õ oroyõf are, el wiyauf.”
41001041	Jesus wau gudũf fen, ima irã, kobũ fiye ken, ĩ iron, “Aya wau irok, õ bouwã biyaf!”
41001042	Age ye di, kaisã bagai lepra guruma ĩ itornẽ di, bouwa biya len.
41001043	Jesus kaisã bagai totol bagai weder irou fen, sur fiyẽ di, ilen:
41001044	“Karĩ welei, enĩ aib taka to urokenẽf, anĩ ere, õ pris wagen ule, õ bouwã ufelnẽf, õ bouwã biyal anĩ nigin Moses nẽ od irok anĩ dõ fen, sesewi fiya wenẽf, anĩ bunem yaore di, tamo kayau dilouf.”
41001045	Anĩ ere, ĩ iyok ile fen, kurõ feis irõ di, od anĩ iyokelen. Anĩ nigin, Jesus mal atun taun taka bun to iledig, ĩ moilin ibodon. Anĩ ere, tamo kayau firen firen temeleid fau fau ĩ wagen disidig.
41002001	Naa tunĩ bure fele di, Jesus baban Kapenaum taun ile di, tamo kayau idi, ĩ fõ taka bun ibodok yeya anĩ karĩ den.
41002002	Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau musei guru difen, fõ aaben ado fofomala dino dale di, modoũ san. Age dife di, Jesus od irokenẽdin.
41002003	Jesus od irokeneĩd mog, tamo tunĩ tamo ilolaisin anĩ tamo aiwa ifenẽyam faali de, dirou disin.
41002004	Idi ĩ Jesus garan irou ileya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, tamo kayau musei, anĩ nigin, idi Jesus ibodok nẽ fõ soko anĩ korõ difel fen, tamo gabgab bun yen mog, folo folõ dife di, isilen.
41002005	Jesus idi neid momoiya ile fen, ĩ tamo ilolaisin irokenen, “Kesu, ogon mosor alelkonok.”
41002006	Age fe di, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ an dibodon, idi dogo namedin kisi difen,
41002007	“Ere nigin ĩ age irok? Ĩ kono fef! Taka nem mosor yaleleya to yenek, Negur yogo dogol.”
41002008	Kaisã bagai, Jesus yogon kisi bun, idi waudim kisi difen anĩ kelein. Agef fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Ã ere nigin agog kisi gef?
41002009	Tamo ilolaisin anĩ irokenẽya nigin nanĩ anĩ karika, ‘Ogon mosor alelkonok’ de, ‘Fã wo, ogon gabgab wale fen, uyok ule’?
41002010	Anĩ ere, Tamo Naal ĩ tenebur ein mosor yaleleya nigin yana ado anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin…” Age ye fen, ĩ tamo ilolaisin anĩ irokenen,
41002011	“Aya õ arokonok, fã wo, ogon gabgab wale fen, fõ bun ule.”
41002012	Ĩ fã yale, ganan meleid bun in gabgab yale iyok ilen. Age fe di, tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, Negur yana dales diron, “Ada kulu ereb eig fiya taka to tailen!”
41002013	Jesus ĩ baban daliyou sirin ilen. Tamo kayau musei ĩ wagen disile di, ĩ od gariya ino ifelnẽdin.
41002014	Ĩ iyok ile, Lewi, Alfeus naal, takis yaleya fõ bun ibod mog, ile fen, irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya.” Age ye di, ĩ fã yale, dõ fiyen.
41002015	Jesus Lewi nẽ fõ bun saaf yõ mog, takis yaleya tamo musei, mosor adodo tamo kayau musei, ĩ, in dõ fiya tar geid, weim saaf don, ere nigin, idi musei Jesus dõ difiyen.
41002016	Sain lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Farisia tamo idi, Jesus ĩ takis yaleya tamo, mosor adodo tamo kayau geid, weim saaf doko dibod mog, dileid fen, idi in dõ fiya tar anĩ to difiyẽdin, “Ere nigin ĩ takis yaleya tamo, mosor adodo tamo kayau geid weim doko?”
41002017	Anĩ karĩ ye fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Dagi sã anidim dokta bun ileya nigin waud to yenek, dagi adodom dogol. Aya madur tamo anidi iweignẽdiya nigin to asin, mosor adodo tamo anidi iweignẽdiya nigin asin.”
41002018	Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar, Farisia tamo geid, idi kuri den. Tamo tunĩ disi, Jesus to difiyen, “Naig fe di, Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar, Farisia tamo nẽ dõ fiya tar geid, idi kuri dedig, anĩ ere, ogon idi sã?”
41002019	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Naig fe di, mois tamo ibod mog, in tamo tar idi kuri douf? Idi to age difouf, ere nigin, ĩ idi geid fau dibodok.
41002020	Anĩ ere, naa fau isi di, anĩ bun mois tamo idi bun tamal yalelnẽ di, naa anĩ bun gama idi kuri douf.
41002021	“Tamo taka, gabar tubu, gabar masak mata ado baguf fen, to iwauf. Taka ĩ age fouf are, masak mata anim tubu arirĩ fe di, tubu kudef irailauf.
41002022	Takag age fiya, taka nem wain mata meme gabar tubu bun to itinẽf. Ĩ age fouf are, wain anim age fe di, meme gabar gẽ ye fen, serek fouf. Age fe di, wain meme gabar ado sane lauf. Age fiya nigin, ĩ wain mata meme gabar mata bun itinẽf.”
41002023	Sabat naa taka bun, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, wit kabĩ atu diyok dile fen, idi wit biya tunĩ fito difen.
41002024	Age dife di, Farisia tamo idi Jesus dirokenen, “Ulef, ere nigin idi Sabat naa nẽ lo difodul ken, Sabat naa bun oug difef?”
41002025	Jesus irokenẽdin, “Sain Dawid, ne tã tar geid naũ fedi di, saaf lau de fen, Dawid age fen anĩ, ã to uwesegen de?
41002026	Abiata, pris mudur ado ibodon sain anĩ bun, Dawid ĩ Negur nẽ fõ namen ile fen, bret fateul prisem dogol dõdig an ibodon anĩ yokon, ĩ bret tunĩ, ne tã tareg ifenẽdin.”
41002027	Age ye fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo isennẽya nigin Sabat naa inon, tamom Sabat naa anĩ isennẽf nigin to inon.
41002028	Anĩ nigin, Tamo Naal ĩ Odug, Sabat nẽg ĩ Odug.”
41003001	Sain taka, Jesus baban Juda neid uub fõ bun ilen. Tamo taka ima sitakã gege fefu fen anĩ, an ibodon.
41003002	Tamo tunĩ an difaren idi, Jesus bouwa bun od dinouf nigin naab dimiren, anĩ nigin, idi ĩ Sabat naa bun tamo anĩ el fiyẽ mog, dilouf nigin ololo difen.
41003003	Jesus tamo ima fefu fiya anĩ irokenen, “Ganan meleid bun fã, ufar.”
41003004	Age ye fen, Jesus idi to fedin, “Nanĩ anĩ Sabat naa bun lo dõ fiya? Tobonunã biya age fiya anĩ de, tobonunã sane age fiya anĩ; isennẽ di, mata ibodõya anĩ de, yukesiya anĩ?” Anĩ ere, idi nin kẽ delen.
41003005	Jesus seye ye fen, idi fele fedin, idi waud togun nigin, ĩ wau odug gudũf fen, tamo anĩ irokenen, “Ogon imã yaĩ wo.” Ĩ yaĩ fe di, in ima oditekei biya len.
41003006	Age fe di, kaisã bagai Farisia tamo idi kututũ deis dile, Herod nẽ dõ fiya tar weim, idi Jesus naig de dukesiyouf nigin od katõ difen.
41003007	Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, daliyoun disile di, tamo kayau musei Galili temeleid dõ difen.
41003008	Jesus ĩ ereb ereb ganan age fen anĩ karĩ de fen, tamo kayau musei Judia distrik, Jerusalem taun, Idumea distrik, Jordan naan kalilĩ fiya, Taia Saidon ado kalilĩ fiya adok, ĩ wagen disin.
41003009	Tamo kayau museim Jesus to sile difiyẽf nigin, ĩ yogon waag naal taka dodok de yenẽf nigin, in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin.
41003010	Ere nigin, ĩ mogo musei el fedin. Anĩ nigin, idi dagi adodo Jesus kobũ fiya nigin abob susur difedin.
41003011	Kaa sesen Jesus dilef sain ganan, idi ĩ wagen kuku de, den ken, diweig dirõdig, “Õ Negur Naal.”
41003012	Anĩ ere, Jesus, ĩ aib anĩ, to wogõ douf nigin totol bagai katũ fedin.
41003013	Jesus arei wala bun isel ibod ken, idi ĩ aib aib oron anĩ iweignẽdin. Age fe di, idi ĩ wagen disin.
41003014	Jesus ĩ tuwelf gei fen, aposel wowã douf nigin igirnẽdin, are idi Jesus geid fen, dum biya od wogõ douf nigin fau sur fediyouf,
41003015	idi totol dale fen, kaa sesen dirudiyouf nigin age fen.
41003016	Jesus tuwelf igirnẽdin enidi, are Simon (Jesus ĩ yana yun Pita),
41003017	Jems Sebedi naal, tura Jon ado (Jesus idi yeneid yun Boaneges, anĩ nẽ gariya, Kolimei Gere Tar),
41003018	Endru, Filip, Batolomyu, Matyu, Tomas, Jems Alfeus naal, Tadeus, Simon Selot taka,
41003019	Judas Iskariot, ĩ dum Jesus kiwai imeid bun inenen.
41003020	Jesus ĩ, fõ taka bun ile di, tamo kayau musei baban guru difen. Anĩ nigin, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, saaf yõya kisi feleya san.
41003021	Jesus nẽ tura tar od anĩ karĩ de fen, idi ĩ dale diroulauf nigin dilen, ere nigin, idi diron, “Ĩ neneya kisi ado.”
41003022	Age dife di, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo Jerusalem temeleid disi diron, “Ĩ Belsebub ado, ĩ kaa sesen neid mudur yana bunem, kaa sesen irudidig.”
41003023	Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi iweigneĩd fen, yaab od nem irokenẽdin, “Satan ĩ naig Satan iruwauf?
41003024	Tano tekelei anĩ, yogo faraf, kiwai ifenẽf are, tano anĩ to ifarauf.
41003025	Fõ tekelei anĩ, yogo faraf, kiwai ifenẽf are, fõ anĩ to ifarauf.
41003026	Takag, Satan ĩ yogo faraf, kiwai ifenẽf are, ĩ to ifarauf, in sain mogo bure felef.
41003027	Anĩ ere, taka nem tamo totol ado nẽ fõ bun safina gei fou fenẽ, tamo totol ado ket ifokel fen, anĩ ĩ yogon fõ bun bẽ yalouf.
41003028	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo neid mosor ganan ado kono difef are, fau yalel kenẽdiyouf.
41003029	Ani ere, aibem taka Awa Uur Fateul kono fiyek, in mosor to yalelauf, in mosor anĩ faimud ibodkalauf.”
41003030	Jesus od enĩ iron, ere nigin, idi dirõdig, “Ĩ kaa sane ado.”
41003031	Age ye di, Jesus nẽ sina, tura tar geid disin. Mayarẽ difar mã, idi Jesus dirokenẽf nigin taka sur difen.
41003032	Tamo kayau musei ĩ salili difiyek dibodon, idi ĩ dirokenen, “Ogon sinã, turã tar geid, mayarẽ õ dimirnok.”
41003033	Jesus to fedin, “Ai anĩ neu naai, neu turau tar?”
41003034	Age ye fen, ĩ, salili difiyẽ dibodon idi lo feid fen, ĩ iron, “Enidi anĩ neu naai, neu turau tar!
41003035	Aib idi Negur nẽ oroya dõ difedig anidi anĩ, neu turau, neu mainou, neu naai.”
41004001	Jesus baban daliyou sirin, gariya ino, od ifelnẽdin. Tamo kayau guru de, salili difiyen anĩ gai musei biya, anĩ nigin, tamo kayau adok ubun difar mog, ĩ waag taka daliyoun ifaren anĩ namen isil ibodon.
41004002	Agef fen, ereb ereb musei yaab od nem ifelneĩd fen, iron,
41004003	“Karĩ gei! Kabĩ marau taka faat irarãf nigin ilen.
41004004	Sain ĩ irarak ile mog, tunĩ naab luwen kuku ren, are ninã disi dakasin.
41004005	Tunĩ meein tuar kuku ren, an teneub badagar. Are kaisã bagai fokũ den, ere nigin, teneub are badagar bagai.
41004006	Anĩ ere, sain gaa ise di, bali are ilalaid, laasi yedin, ere nigin, idi warumutei sã.
41004007	Faat tunĩ malũ duri atun kuku ren, are malũ duri anĩ fã ye fen, sile feledin, anĩ nigin, biya to yun.
41004008	Faat tunĩ teneub biya bun kuku ren, are idi fokũ yedin, oduduge di, biya imadin, taka biya teti, taka biya siksti, taka biya wan handred, age fef ilauf.”
41004009	Age ye fen, Jesus iron, “Taka ĩ karĩya nigin weder ado, ĩ karĩ youf.”
41004010	Sain Jesus ĩ yogo ibod mog, yogon dõ fiya tar tuwelf, tamo tunĩ salili difiyen anidi geid, yaab od nigin ĩ to difiyen.
41004011	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur tano nẽ waa are Negur mogo ifenein, anĩ ere, idi dumeitur onudi nigin, ereb ereb ganan yaab od bunem wogõ yef,
41004012	ere nigin, “‘idi meledim diledig, anĩ ere, idi meleid fokõya sã, idi wederedim karĩ dedig, anĩ ere, idi gariya keleĩ sã. Age fiya sãf are, idi waud falei de di, mosor yalel kenẽdiyouf.’ ”
41004013	Age ye fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã yaab od enĩ wauĩ to fokõ youf? Age fiyauf are, naig fe di, ã yaab od tunĩ nigin wauĩ fokõ youf?
41004014	Faat irarãya tamo, biya od irarak.
41004015	Tamo tunĩ idi faat naab luwen kuku ren gen, an biya od iraran. Idi karĩ de mog, kaisã bagai Satan isi, biya od idi namedin iraran anĩ yaleledig.
41004016	Tunĩ idi faat meein tuar iraran gen, idi od anĩ karĩ de fen, kaisã bagai dale fen, waud bun kulĩ dedig.
41004017	Anĩ ere, idi warumutei sã, anĩ nigin, idi sain meluk to dibodõf. Sain, biya od nigin, morõ be kafĩ fiya be isif, idi kaisã bagai dirofosif.
41004018	Tunĩg faat malũ duri atun iraran gen, idi biya od karĩ den.
41004019	Anĩ ere, tenebur mata ibodõya nẽ sii fiya, safina ado ibodõya nẽ kisi fiya, oroya fire fire isif anidim, biya od sile fe di, anim biya to yũf.
41004020	Tunĩ faat teneub biya bun iraran gen, idi biya od karĩ den, dale di, anĩ biya yũf, taka biya teti, taka biya siksti, taka biya wan handred, age fef ilauf.”
41004021	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã lam urou usig, beĩ kuren be fatar farumen unogouf de? Age fiya ban, ã lam yogon yoki bun to useginnẽgouf de?
41004022	Ereb ereb ganan iminẽyan yenek anĩ ganan yaor fouf, ereb ereb ganan nar fen yenek anĩ ganan irou isi, biru fel fen, yaau du fouf.
41004023	Taka ĩ karĩya nigin weder ado, ĩ karĩ youf.”
41004024	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã od karĩ gef anĩ, ed ge kisi gouf, ã idi nigin kisi gef gen, ã nigineg age de kisi difouf, anĩ tobol feneĩf.
41004025	Aib taka ĩ ado, wal fiya ifenẽf, aib taka ĩ sã, ereb ereb ĩ ado anĩg ĩ bun yalelauf.”
41004026	Takag Jesus iron, “Negur nẽ tano are eig fiya gen, tamo taka teneub bun faat irarak.
41004027	Bõ ado gaa ado, tamo ĩ mulaĩ yenek, fã ye iyok, faat fokũ ye fen, odugef, anĩ ere, ĩ naig be fe odugef, ĩ keleĩ sã.
41004028	Teneub yogo dogol biya inodig, uyulil bali, age fe di, turu, anĩ turu bun biya inodig.
41004029	Biya bure fele di, kaisã bagai ĩ dimig gunõ waila ado inodig, ere nigin, biya yaleya sain isif.”
41004030	Baban Jesus iron, “Negur nẽ tano, ere taka age fiya tauf? Ere bunem yaab tafouf?
41004031	Ĩ masted faat age fiya. Ĩ faat memereis bagai ã teneub bun utenẽgedig.
41004032	Anĩ ere, ĩ utenẽge di, ĩ odugouf, ĩ kabier saaf ganan wal fediyouf, in beneir odudug irara ken, buri ino di, ninã ilun temeleid disi dibodõf.”
41004033	Jesus yaab od age fediya musei bunem, tamo kayau idi keleĩ youf kisin, od wogõ fiyẽdin.
41004034	Ĩ tamo kayau ereb od irokenẽdiyou fenẽ, yaab od bunem dogol. Anĩ ere, ĩ mugu yogon dõ fiya tar geidef are, ereb ereb ganan faded fedidig.
41004035	Naa anĩ bun aragau di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Ada daliyou sitakã talauf.”
41004036	Idi tamo kayau ditorneĩd fen, Jesus waag bun ibod mog, idi ĩ dale dirou dilen. Waag tunĩg weim dilen.
41004037	Yau odug fã ye di, maaĩ fã ye, waag yu ken, maaĩ ifilege di, waag namen isokosen.
41004038	Jesus ĩ, waag ibun edẽ bun mulaĩ yen mog, idi ĩ turĩ difiyẽ dirokenen, “Tise, ada naanũ talalau fenẽ, õ to kisi walef de?”
41004039	Ĩ fã yen, yau sakã fiye ken, maaĩ irokenen, “Kee resig fen, dẽ weleg!” Age ye di, yau dẽ yele di, maaĩg oditekei dẽ yelen.
41004040	Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin ã kumĩ wogef? Ã fau momoiya sã de?”
41004041	Idi fatuk bagai kumĩ tererẽ de fen, abob toti difen, “Eĩ aim bagai? Ĩ irõ di, yau maaĩ adog ait dõ difef!”
41005001	Idi naan daliyou dibal dile, Gerasa teneub bun wõ den.
41005002	Jesus waag bun tamal kutũ yesi di, tamo taka kaa sane ado, matmat bunem ĩ fotou fiyẽ fenẽ isin.
41005003	Tamo matmat bun ibodon anĩ, taka nem ĩ ifõya nigin kisi feleya sã, sen nemeg ifõya kisi feleya sã.
41005004	Ĩ sain musei sen nem, ye ima ado difofãdig, anĩ ere, ĩ sen kokour fel, yem ain weweur fedig. Taka nem totol ino fen, ĩ ifõ di, dẽ yeleya kisi feleya sã.
41005005	Sain ganan bõ ado gaa ado, ĩ matmat atun ado areineg iweig kaĩ ye fen, meeinem yogo bouwa kokour fedig.
41005006	Ĩ mala irakelen, Jesus gerom ile fen, gudu ref ile, Jesus wagen kubũ ye, ibor bobou fen.
41005007	Ĩ ait odug nem iweig iron, “Õ aya ere naig wiyau fenẽ, Jesus, Negur Ilun Bagai nẽ Naal? Negur yana nem aya õ agonok, õ aya to daig wiyauf!”
41005008	Ere nigin, ĩ mogo kaa sane irokenen, “Õ tamo enĩ bun tamal ulõ weis!”
41005009	Age ye fen, Jesus ĩ to fiyen, “Õ yanã ai?” Ĩ iron, “Aya yanau Ami, ere nigin, amã musei biya.”
41005010	Jesus idi akor anĩ bun tamal to irudiyouf nigin, ĩ baba baban Jesus igonen.
41005011	Melsã arei wala sirin, bor musei biya saaf doko difaren.
41005012	Kaa sesen Jesus digonen, “Amã bor atun susur wamãf, yo wamã di, idi namedin malalauf.”
41005013	Jesus idi yo fedi di, kaa sesen ulolõ deis disel, bor namedin dilelen. Bor, tu tausen age fiya, gududu de, bebeig sane baurin daliyoun disil, naanũ gare desin.
41005014	Bor lo fiya tamo diya dile, od anĩ taun ado fonõ fonõ wogõ den. Age dife di, tamo kayau ereb wõ yen anĩ dilou fenẽ dilen.
41005015	Sain idi Jesus garan wõ den, idi meleid dirã, tamo kaa sesen museim dirounen anĩ, an garab yel, kisi biya ado ibod mog, dilen. Anĩ nigin, idi kumĩ den.
41005016	Tamo idi meledim dilen anidim, kaa sesenem tamo diroun anĩ ado bor age difen anĩ nigin, tamo kayau wogõ difiyẽdin.
41005017	Age dife di, tamo kayau, Jesus ĩ idi neid teneub anĩ itor ilauf nigin digonen.
41005018	Age de di, Jesus ĩ waag bun sõ ye mog, tamo kaa sesenem dalen anĩ, Jesus ado dilauf nigin nonĩ fiyen.
41005019	Jesus ĩ to awa yokon irokenen, “Õ fonõ ogon ibor tar gedin ulauf, Odug õ nigin age fen anĩ ado, ĩ naig fe fen, õ nigin wau yun anĩ, idi urokenẽdiyouf.”
41005020	Age ye di, tamo anĩ itor ilen, Jesus ĩ nigin age fen anĩ, Dekapolis teneub bun tamo kayau wogõ fiyẽdi di, idi ganan terẽ den.
41005021	Jesus baban waag bun ibal, naan daliyou sitakã ilen, ĩ daliyou yerin ibod mog, tamo kayau musei disi salili difiyen.
41005022	Age de mog, Juda neid uub fõ lo fiya nẽ mudur taka, yana Jairus an isin. Ĩ Jesus ile fen, ĩ ye gariyan kubũ yen.
41005023	Ĩ igone ken, irokenen, “Nau barai naal oboim fef. Uma fen, imã teten uno di, ĩ biyal, matauf.”
41005024	Anĩ nigin, Jesus ĩ uruwom dilen. Tamo kayau musei dõ difiyẽ, kitikiti de, susir difiyek dilen.
41005025	Kayau taka idi atun an ifaren, ogõ dagi faimud ado yar tuwelf iyon.
41005026	Kayau anĩ dokta musei bun ilen, anĩ ere, bouwa bun morõ odug idi bun yalen. Agef fen, yogon safina ganan irailen. Anĩ ere, kayau ĩ bouwa biya leya ban sane len.
41005027	Sain kayau ĩ Jesus nigin karĩ yen, ĩ Jesus dume dõf, tamo kayau atu ile, in kolos kobũ fen,
41005028	ere nigin, kayau ĩ kisi fen, “Aya in gabar dogol kobũ afouf, are deuf, aya fau biyauf.”
41005029	Kaisã bagai, kayau naud segẽ yelen. Age fe di, kayau ĩ yogo bouwa bun karĩ yen, are karika len.
41005030	Kaisã bagai, Jesus in totol ĩ bun tamal ul fe yale mog, karĩ yen. Ĩ tamo kayau atun falei yel, to fedin, “Aim neu kolos kobũ fel?”
41005031	In dõ fiya tar Jesus dirokenen, “Tamo kayau musei õ kiti diyok, ule fen anĩ, õ ‘Aim aya kobũ fiyal?’ wof.”
41005032	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ aibem age fen anĩ ilouf nigin, fau fau fai yen.
41005033	Age fe di, kayau ĩ yogo ereb age fen kelei ken, Jesus wagen isi, ye gariyan kubũ yen. Ĩ kumĩ tererẽ ye fen, momoi od ganan Jesus irokenen.
41005034	Jesus kayau irokenen, “Nau barai, ogon momoiya anim el yom. Waũ unois ule, dagi anim to ifõyõf.”
41005035	Jesus fau od wogõ ye mog, tamo tunĩ, Juda neid uub fõ lo fiya mudur Jairus nẽ fõ bunem disin. Idi diron, “Nẽ barai mogo laa fel. Ere nigin õ tise fau morõ wenek?”
41005036	Jesus od idi diron anĩ idod ken, Juda neid uub fõ lo fiya mudur anĩ irokenen, “To kumĩ wo, momoi dogol wo.”
41005037	Jesus ĩ takam dõ fediya nigin katũ fedin, Pita, Jems, ne tura Jon idim dogol.
41005038	Idi Juda neid uub fõ lo fiya mudur nẽ fõ bun ulõ deis fen, Jesus mala iran, tamo kayau waud gudũf fen, inã legur mog, iledin.
41005039	Jesus aaben ile fen, idi irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin ã fatuk bagai inaĩ gef? Kayau naal ĩ laa fiya sã, ĩ mulã yenek.”
41005040	Anĩ ere, idi Jesus kasã difiyen. Age dife di, Jesus idi irud le fen, ĩ kesu nẽ sina tama ado, in dõ fiya tar geid, kesu yenen nẽ namen dilen.
