41005041	Jesus ĩ imalẽ yalesne ken, irokenen, “Talita kum!” (anĩ nẽ gariya, “Kayau naal, aya õ arokonok, fã wo!”).
41005042	Kaisã bagai, kayau naal fã yale iyon (ĩ yar tuwelf ado). Anĩ nigin, idi oditekei terẽ den.
41005043	Anĩ ere, taka to diro ken, karĩ youf nigin, Jesus totol bagai katũ fedin. Agef fen, ĩ kayau naal saaf difenẽ di, yãf nigin irokenẽdin.
41006001	Jesus an itor ken, in dõ fiya tar geid yogon fõ gariyan dilen.
41006002	Sabat naa wõ ye di, Jesus Juda neid uub fõ bun ifelnẽdiya gariya inon. Age fe di, musei ĩ karĩ difiye ken, terẽ de diron, “Tamo enĩ ereb ereb enei nain gei fen? Eĩ ere keleĩ anĩ ĩ ifenen? Anĩ bunem ĩ memelikeg inodig.
41006003	Ĩ to kapenta de? Ĩ to Maria naal fen, Jems, Josef, Judas, Simon ado tureid de? In main tar ada to ein weim de?” Age de fen, idi ĩ kiwai difenen.
41006004	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Profet taka ĩ, in fõ gariyan, in sirag atun ado, in fõ bun dogol, ĩ yana sã.”
41006005	Ĩ an memelik taka inoya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, ĩ dagi tamo teke tekelei dogol ima tetedin ino fen, el fedin.
41006006	Jesus idi neid momoiya to ile fen, terẽ yen. Agef fen, Jesus fonõ fonõ iyo ken, od ifelnẽdin.
41006007	Jesus tuwelf iweignẽdi di, idi ĩ wagen disin. Ĩ uru uru, sur feid fen, kaa sesen dirudiyouf nigin, idi megeir ifenẽdin.
41006008	Ĩ fadim yu ken, iron, “Delẽ uyõgouf nigin ereb taka to walogouf, bret sã, kodol sã, moni sã, manig dogol.
41006009	Sendel ufonũg fen, gabar ufilaĩgef dogol, taka to walogouf.
41006010	Ereb sain ã fõ bun ulagauf, an ubodõgef uleg, taun anĩ utorõgouf.
41006011	Fonõ taka bun ã to daleyei ken, ã to karĩ diyeĩf, sain ã fonõ anĩ utorõg fen, yeĩ aas tu welege di, idi ã kiwai difenein anĩ keleĩf.”
41006012	Tamo kayau waud falei youf nigin, idi dile, od wogõ den.
41006013	Idi kaa sesen musei diruid fen, tamo kayau dagi ado musei moul diguneĩd, el difedin.
41006014	King Herod Jesus nigin od karĩ yen, ere nigin, Jesus nẽ yana fõ fõ ganan karĩ den. Tunĩ diron, “Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo, ĩ laa bun tamal kel fã yen, anĩ nigin, memelik nẽ totol ĩ bun kabĩ yalef.”
41006015	Tunĩ diron, “Ĩ Eliya.” Tunĩ diron, “Ĩ profet taka, profet kulu temeleid taka gen.”
41006016	Anĩ ere, sain Herod od enĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ iron, “Jon, tamo anĩ ayam ula gudũ afen, ĩ laa fen anĩ kel fã yen!”
41006017	Ere nigin, kulu Herod ĩ irõ di, Jon dale difo ken, kalabus bun dinenen. Are Herod yogo tura Filip nẽ kayau Herodias yalen nigin,
41006018	Jon Herod irokenẽdig, “Õ turã nẽ kayau son won, are lo ufodulen.”
41006019	Herodias Jon nigin name sane fen, ĩ dukesiyouf nigin wau iron. Anĩ ere, ĩ kisi feleya sã,
41006020	ere nigin, Herod Jon kumĩ fiye ken, ĩ, Jon anĩ madur fateul tamo ye fen, kulatun fedig. Sain Herod ĩ Jon nẽ od karĩ yedig, ĩ wau togudig, anĩ ere, ĩ in od karĩya nigin orodig.
41006021	Dum sain biya wõ yen, Herod ĩ sina gõ fen anĩ nẽ naa bun, in kabĩ tamo odudug, in kusĩ mudur adodo, Galili teneub bun uyu irouya tamo anidi nigin tar inon.
41006022	Sain anĩ bun, Herodias nẽ barai isi, seg kui ye fen, dole di, Herod in tamo tar geid waud al fen. Anĩ nigin, king kayau momoul irokenen, “Ereb taka nigin waũ iro ken, to wiyauf, are õ afonõf.”
41006023	Age ye fen, ĩ wau adok kuturol fen, kayau momoul irokenen, “Ereb taka nigin õ to wiyauf, aya neu tano anĩ fara af, uru afe fen, sitakã ifonõya kisin anĩ afonõf.”
41006024	Kayau momoul ile, sina irokenen, “Ere bagai nigin aya to afiyẽf?” Sina iron, “Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo nẽ mudur nigin.”
41006025	Ĩ kaisã bagai ile, king irokenen, “Aya gama bagai Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo nẽ mudur, beĩ bun uno wanauf anĩ orouf.”
41006026	King ĩ wau togun bagai, anĩ ere, in wau kuturol fen, tamo kayau meleid bun mogo iron nigin, ĩ kayau nẽ od yaleleya itoron.
41006027	Anĩ nigin, king kaisã bagai ula gudũ fedig kabĩ tamo, Jon nẽ mudur yale irou isiyouf nigin sur fiyen. Age fe di, ĩ ilen, kalabus bun Jon ula gudũf fen,
41006028	mudur anĩ beĩ bun ino irou isin, kayau momoul ifenẽ di, ĩ bam yale, sina ifenen.
41006029	Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar anĩ karĩ de fen, disin, in bouwa dale, matmat bun mũ difen.
41006030	Aposel idi Jesus wagen guru de fen, idi ereb age difen ado difelnẽdin anĩ adok, wogõ difiyen.
41006031	Age de mog, tamo kayau musei dilef disif difen, anĩ bunem, idi saaf yõya kisin san. Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã aug dogol usig, aya geid talauf, modoũ taka motikeleyan an si tanouf.”
41006032	Anĩ nigin, idi dogo dogol waag dale diya, moilin dilen.
41006033	Anĩ ere, tamo kayau musei lo difeid mog, dilen nigin, idi nigin kelei ken, taun ganan bun temeleid idi yedim gududu de dile, idi ket an wowã den.
41006034	Sain Jesus wõ ye fen, mala iran, tamo kayau musei iledin, ĩ idi nigin wau yun, ere nigin, idi sipsip marau sã gen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ ereb ereb musei idi ifelnẽdin.
41006035	Sain anĩ bun, gaa mogo kuru kelen, anĩ nigin, in dõ fiya tar ĩ garan disi diron, “Eĩ gerere tuan, sain mogo sa kelel.
41006036	Tamo kayau susur wodi di, dilauf, ago di, idi fonõ kalilĩ fiya fonõ fonõ dile fen, dogo yõya nigin saaf na gei difouf.”
41006037	Anĩ ere, ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Idi dãf nigin ereb ãgem wenẽdigouf.” Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Tamo kayau musei nigin, saaf na yaleya moni odug biya. Ada tele, bret bun moni odug age fiya tara ken, tafenẽdi di, dãf de?”
41006038	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Bret ganĩ ã ado? Uleg ulogouf.” Idi kelei ken, Jesus dirokenen, “Bret faif, gau uru ado.”
41006039	Age de di, Jesus, tamo kayau ganan, mala fire fire, fisir biya bun dibodadãf nigin, in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin.
41006040	Anĩ nigin, idi mala bun dibodadan, tunĩ wan handred, wan handred, tunĩ fifti, fifti.
41006041	Jesus bret faif gau uru ado yale, saa ilun itad fen, ĩ Negur de fiye ken, bret mumã fen. Agef fen, ĩ in dõ fiya tar ifenẽdin, tamo kayau wagedin dinodiyouf nigin. Ĩ gau urug agef tamo kayau atun foif ifenẽdin.
41006042	Idi ganan don kisi felen.
41006043	In dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau bret gau ado dokon, tunĩ ditoraran anĩ fito difen, karam tuwelf isokosen.
41006044	Faif tausen tamo anidim bret don.
41006045	Kaisã bagai, Jesus, in dõ fiya tar waag bun, idi ketem Betsaida dilauf nigin, sur fedin. Agef fen, ĩ tamo kayaug irudin.
41006046	Jesus idi itorneĩd fen, Negur kosẽ fiyẽf nigin arein iselen.
41006047	Aragau mog, waag daliyou atun ifaren, anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ yogo mugu teneub bun.
41006048	Jesus in dõ fiya tar totol bagai ful dife mog, iledin, ere nigin, yau odug biya wewu fedin. Maur oboi wele ye mog, Jesus daliyou teteatu idi gedin iyok ilen. Ĩ wal fediyou fenẽ age fen.
41006049	Anĩ ere, sain in dõ fiya tar meleid diran, Jesus daliyou teteatu iyõ mog, dile mã, idi kisi baraũ de fen, idi ui guri den,
41006050	ere nigin, idi ganan ĩ dile fen, kumĩ tererẽ den. Kaisã bagai, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Totol unog! Are ayam. To kumĩ wog.”
41006051	Age ye fen, ĩ idi gediyouf nigin waag bun sõ ye di, yau kee relen. Idi oditekei terẽ den,
41006052	ere nigin, idi bret bun waud to fokõ yen, idi neid waud katĩ felen.
41006053	Idi sitakã dibabal dale, Genesaret teneub bun wõ de fen, an waag difokel difaren.
41006054	Idi waag bunem kututũ deis mog, tamo kayau enei Jesus yeya idi kelein.
41006055	Idi Jesus an ibodok yeya karĩ def are, idi fonõ anĩ kalilĩ fiya adok gududu de fen, dagi tamo gabgab ado guri difedi di, disin.
41006056	Sain ganan, modoũ fire fire bun, Jesus ilen, fonõ fonõ, taun tunĩ, taun dumeitur, tamo kayau idi maket modoũ bun dagi tamo dinenẽdin. Idi yogon gabar iri kobũ difouf nigin Jesus nonĩ difiyen. Ganan idi ĩ kobũ difen, dagi fara feledin.
41007001	Farisia tamo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ geid, Jerusalem temeleid disi guru de fen, Jesus salili difiyen.
41007002	Idi lo difeid mog, in dõ fiya tar tunĩ amuyẽ ado imeid kulo fiya sã saaf don.
41007003	(Farisia tamo ado Juda tamo kayau ganan, saaf kaisã to dõdig. Idi imeid ket kulo difel fen, saaf dãf, ere nigin, idi mudur adodo biyeid neid tobonunã dõ difedig.
41007004	Idi maket bun tamal ke douf, idi saaf kaisã to dãf, idi imeid kulo de fen bagai. Idi tobonunã musei tunĩg dõ difedig, kap, darum, ketel kulo fiya age fiya.)
41007005	Anĩ nigin, Farisia tamo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, Jesus to difiyen, “Ere nigin on dõ fiya tar, mudur adodo biyeid neid tobonunã to dõ de fen, amuyẽ ado imeid kulo fiya sã saaf dõdig?”
41007006	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Asaia ĩ, ã mala yaleya tamo nigin wogõ yen, in od tutuk, are eig ye itoton: “‘Tamo kayau enidi neid sigoredim aya selu kulõ difedig, anĩ ere, idi waud aya nigin gerõ ifaref.
41007007	Idi aya yanau dalesedig, are ege. Idi tamo nẽ lo dogol anĩ difelnẽdidig.’ ”
41007008	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya utorõg fen, tamo nẽ tobonunã anĩ urougef.”
41007009	Age ye fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Ã augeneĩ tobonunã dõ fiya nigin ge fen, ã Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya anĩ weleĩ sirin inoya keleĩ bagai!
41007010	Ere nigin, Moses iron, ‘Õ sinã tamã yeneid wales,’ ‘Aibem taka sina tama ado yeneid sane inouf, ĩ laa bun dineyẽf.’
41007011	Anĩ ere, ã urõgedig, tamo taka sina tama ado nigin irõf, ‘Ereb taka ã isenneĩya nigin ayam ifeneĩya, anĩ Koban’ (anĩ nẽ gariya, ‘ayam Negur afenem’),
41007012	anĩ bunem, ã ĩ sina tama baban isennẽdiya nigin katũ wiyẽgedig.
41007013	Anĩ nigin, tubuĩ tar neid tobonunã anĩ waleg uroug fen, Negur nẽ od tadũ gedig. Agog fen, ã tobonunã fire fire musei ago gedig.”
41007014	Jesus baban tamo kayau iweignẽdi di, wagen disi di, iron, “Ã adok aya karĩ wiyag, enei keleĩ youf.
41007015	Safina serẽ tamal tamo namen isilef anim, tamo amuyẽ to ifenẽdig, anĩ ere, ereb taka tamo namenem wõ yef anim, ĩ amuyẽ ifenẽdig.”
41007017	Jesus tamo kayau itorneĩd fen, fõ bun ile di, in dõ fiya tar, yaab od enĩ nigin ĩ to difiyen.
41007018	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ãg fatuk nene gef de? Ereb taka serẽ tamal tamo namen isiledig anim, amuyẽ to ifenẽdig anĩ, ã to ulegedig de?
41007019	Ere nigin, safina are tamo wau bun to iledig, anĩ ere, te namen isiledig, anenem bou dõf isil, ulõ yesidig.” (Age ye iron anĩ bunem, Jesus kurõ feis, saaf ganan amuyẽ sã yen.)
41007020	Ĩ od tobol fe fen, iron, “Ereb tamo namenem ulõ yesef anim, ĩ amuyẽ ifenẽdig.
41007021	Ere nigin, tamo waud bunem kisi sesen wõ yef, noli tobonunã, bẽ, tamo yukesiya, seseirã inoya,
41007022	neu mugu yeya, tobonunã sesen, idegẽya, noli kisi, kiyeĩ, ne tã bou yũya, aya aya yeya, neneya tobonunã.
41007023	Tobonunã sesen enei ganan, tamo namen tamal ulõ yesef anim, tamo amuyẽ ifenẽdig.”
41007024	Jesus fonõ anĩ itor ken, Taia teneub bun ilen. Ĩ fõ taka aaben ile fen, taka nem ĩ an ibodok yeya to keleĩ youf nigin wau iron. Anĩ ere, ĩ iminkel ibodõya nigin kisi feleya sã.
41007025	Agef mog, kayau taka Jesus nigin od karĩ yen, ĩ, ne barai kaa sanem irounen anĩ isi fen, Jesus ye gariyan kubũ yen.
41007026	Kayau anĩ ĩ Grik kayau, ĩ Siria nediwon Fonisia an sina gõ fen. Ĩ, kaa sane, ne barai bun tamal iruwauf nigin Jesus nonĩ fiyen.
41007027	Jesus kayau irokenen, “Kesu nanaal idi ereb orodif anĩ, idi ket dãf, ere nigin, kesu nanaal neid bret yale, gaũ irarakenẽdiya, are to biya.”
41007028	Kayau anĩ solof iron, “Odug, are momoi, anĩ ere, gaũ idig, tebol farumen kesu nanaal neid saaf momout kuku re di, dõdig.”
41007029	Age ye di, Jesus kayau irokenen, “Ago solo urok nigin, õ ule, kaa sane, nẽ barai mogo itornem.”
41007030	Age ye di, kayau fõ bun ilen, kaa sane, ne barai itornen anĩ, fatarẽ yen mog, ilen.
41007031	Jesus Taia teneub itor ken, Saidon teneub atu ilen, Dekapolis teneub bun wõ ye fen, Galili maaĩwõ isilen.
41007032	An tamo kayau, tamo taka weder daabu leya tutuk wogõya kisi feleya sã anĩ, Jesus wagen dirou disin. Idi tamo anĩ bun, ima teten inouf nigin Jesus nonĩ difiyen.
41007033	Jesus, ĩ tamo kayau atun yale, firen irou ile fen, in ima gege, tamo anĩ nẽ weder kur inodin. Agef fen, Jesus salina ira ken, tamo anĩ nẽ bale kobũ fen.
41007034	Jesus saa ilun itad fen, si odug yale fen, ĩ irokenen, “Efata!” (anĩ nẽ gariya, “Fokõ weid!”).
41007035	Kaisã bagai, tamo nẽ weder fokõ yedin, in bale karika le di, ĩ od atata fel wogõ yen.
41007036	Jesus, taka irokenẽya nigin idi katũ fiyẽdin. Ĩ baba baban irokenẽdin, anĩ ere, musei wogõ def dilen.
41007037	Tamo kayau idi odug biya terẽ de fen, idi diron, “Ĩ ereb ereb ganan biya dogol age fen. Ĩ age fe di, weder daabuya karĩ yef, sigor ifokeleya wogõ yef.”
41008001	Sain anĩ bun, baban tamo kayau musei guru difen. Idi ereb taka yõya nigin san, anĩ nigin, Jesus in dõ fiya tar ĩ garan iweig laisi fen, irokenẽdin,
41008002	“Aya tamo kayau enidi waud inaf, idi mogo aya geid, naa towo ereb taka yõya sã.
41008003	Aya idi naũ ado fonõ susur afouf are, idi luwen kuku douf, ere nigin, idi tunĩ egerõ temeleid disin.”
41008004	In dõ fiya tar aiten dale, Jesus dirokenen, “Gerere tuan eig fiya, taka nem bret kisi feleya nain yale fen, idi ifenẽdiyouf?”
41008005	Jesus to fedin, “Bret ganĩ ã ado?” Idi diron, “Sewen dogol.”
41008006	Jesus tamo kayau tenebur dibodadãf nigin irokenẽdin. Agef fen, Jesus bret sewen geif iroun, ĩ Negur de fiye ken, bret anĩ mumã feid fen, tamo kayau wagedin dinouf nigin, in dõ fiya tar ifenẽdi di, idi age difen.
41008007	Idi gau nanaaleg teke tekelei adon. Ĩ gau anidi nigineg Negur de fiye ken, idi gadõ difediyouf nigin in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin.
41008008	Tamo kayau don kisi felen. Dum in dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau bret dokon, tunĩ ditoraran anĩ fito difen, karam sewen isokosen.
41008009	Tamo fo tausen age fiya an difaren. Anĩ Jesus idi, nedi fonõ fonõ sur fedi di, ke de dilen.
41008010	Agef fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, waag bun sosõ de fen, Dalmanuta distrik dilen.
41008011	Farisia tamo disi, Jesus kisi difiye ken, saa ilun nẽ uris dilouf nigin to difiyen.
41008012	Ĩ si odug yale fen, iron, “Ere nigin tamo kayau sain enĩ bun difaref eneidi, uris nigin aya to difiyaf? Aya ã momoi arokeneik, uris taka idi to dalouf.”
41008013	Age ye fen, ĩ idi itorneĩd, waag bun kel sõ ye, maaĩ sitakã ibal ilen.
41008014	In dõ fiya tar bret taka to dalen, wedereid tu kelen. Bret tekelei dogol waag bun idi adon.
41008015	Jesus idi wedereid iroun, “Ã, Farisia tamo geid Herod geneid yis nigin lo welegei.”
41008016	In dõ fiya tar idi dogo dogol katõ de fen, diron, “Ada bret sã nigin age yel.”
41008017	Idi neid wogõya Jesus kelei ken, idi to fedin, “Ere nigin ã bret to urougel nigin wogõ gef? Ã fau ileya sã, wedereĩ fokõya sã de? Ãgenei wauĩ totol bagai lef de?
41008018	Ã meleĩ ado, anĩ ere, ã to ulegedig de? Ã wedereĩ ado, anĩ ere, ã to karĩ gedig de? Ã to karĩ welegef de?
41008019	Sain aya bret faif, faif tausen tamo nigin mumã afen, ã karam ganĩ bun, bret tunĩ kuru ge di, isokosen?” Idi aiten dalen, “Karam tuwelf.”
41008020	“Sain aya bret sewen, fo tausen tamo nigin mumã afen, ã karam ganĩ bun, bret tunĩ kuru ge di, isokosen?” Idi aiten dalen, “Karam sewen.”
41008021	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã fau to kisi fokõ yef de?”
41008022	Idi Betsaida disin. An tamo kayau tunĩ, tamo taka mala ifofakeleya diroule fen, Jesus imam kobũ fiyẽf nigin nonĩ difiyen.
41008023	Jesus, tamo mala ifofakeleya ima yale, sibof, fonõ dumeitur dilen. Agef fen, ĩ tamo mala bun salina ira ken, ima tamo mala bun ino fen, to fiyen, “Ere tau ulef?”
41008024	Ĩ mala fara fel fen, iron, “Aya tamo kayau ailedif, idi aa gegen diyokesif.”
41008025	Jesus baban in ima, tamo mala bun inon. Age fe di, tamo mala fara fele di, tutuk kelẽ yelen. Ereb ereb ganan ĩ yaor iledin.
41008026	Jesus tamo anĩ in fõ bun sur fiye ken, irokenen, “Fonõ atu to ulauf.”
41008027	Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, Sisaria Filipai nediwon fonõ fonõ diyok dilen. Naabur ĩ to fedin, “Tamo kayau idi, aya nigin ai dedig?”
41008028	Idi diron, “Tunĩ dirok, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo; tunĩ dirok, Eliya; tunĩ dirok, profet anidi taka.”
41008029	Jesus to fedin, “Ba ã uleg? Aya nigin ã ai gef?” Pita aiten yale iron, “Õ anĩ Kristus.”
41008030	Age ye di, Jesus ĩ nigin taka to dirokenẽf nigin, idi wedereid iroun.
41008031	Age ye fen, Jesus gariya ino, idi ifelneĩd fen, irokenẽdin, Tamo Naal ĩ, darau musei yale fen, mudur adodo, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo idim dudum difiyẽf. Age de fen, ĩ dukesi di, naa towo bure fele di, kel fã youf.
41008032	Jesus od anĩ kurõ fesi di, Pita Jesus yale, yerin irou ile, ou fiyen.
41008033	Age fe di, Jesus falei yel, in dõ fiya tar lo feid fen, ĩ Pita ou fiyen. Ĩ iron, “Satan! Dumeun ule. On kisi are Negur nẽ sã, on kisi tamo nẽ dogol.”
41008034	Age ye fen, Jesus, tamo kayau in dõ fiya tar geid iweigneĩd fen, irokenẽdin, “Aib taka aya dõ fiyau fenẽ, ĩ yogon oroya lai fesil fen, yogon aa tetek faali fe, aya dõ fiyauf.
41008035	Ere nigin, aib taka yogon bouwa buru mata ibodõf nigin oro fef, are fõ yalauf, anĩ ere, aib taka yogon mata bouwa buru, aya nigin ado biya od nigin ye fen, irailauf, are kel yalouf.
41008036	Tamo taka ĩ, teneub enĩ ganan kakarai fe, akorou ye fen, in malakanon irailauf, ere biya ĩ yalouf?
41008037	Takag, tamo taka, yogon malakanon nigin ere mala solof fen, ĩ kel yalouf?
41008038	Aib taka, seseirã inoya, mosor inoya nẽ tamo kayau eneidi bun, aya nigin ado neu od nigin mama fouf are, sain Tamo Naal in engel fateul geid, Tama nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ado disiyouf bun, ĩg ĩ nigin mama fouf.”
41009001	Age ye fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tunĩ ein difaref, fau to gare de mog, idi Negur nẽ tano megeir ado isi mog, dilouf.”
41009002	Naa sigis bure fele di, Jesus, Pita, Jems, Jon anidi geif fen, idi mugu arei odug ilun diselen. An Jesus idi meleid bun bouwa falei felen.
41009003	In kolos lalau medeĩya bagai, lalau anĩ tenebur ein taka nem kulo fe di, agef filiya kisi feleya sã.
41009004	Agef mog, an idi meleid bun, Moses Eliya ado wowã de fen, Jesus weim wogõ den.
41009005	Pita Jesus irokenen, “Rabi, ada ein ibodõya nigin biya bagai. Ada salafat towo tanouf, taka ogon, taka Moses nẽ, taka Eliya nẽ.”
41009006	(Ĩ wogõya tata fen, ere nigin, idi fatuk bagai kumĩ den.)
41009007	Agef mog, lalo isi, idi kerub feid fen, ait taka lalo bunem wõ yen, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig. Ĩ karĩ wiyẽg!”
41009008	Kaisã bagai, idi fai den, aib taka to weim difar mog, dilen, Jesus dogol.
41009009	Idi arei nem diyok disi fen, Jesus ereb idi dilen anĩ, Tamo Naal laa bun tamal fau fãya sã mog, taka to dirokenẽf nigin, idi katũ fedin.
41009010	Idi od anĩ dogo bun dogol ibod ken, ‘laa bun tamal kel fãya’ anĩ nẽ gariya nigin katõ difen.
41009011	Age de fen, idi Jesus to difiyen, “Ere nigin lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, ‘Eliya ĩ ket uyu isi di, Mesia isiyouf,’ dedig?”
41009012	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Momoi bagai, Eliya ket uyu isi fen, ereb ereb ganan madur fedif. Anĩ ere, ere nigin Tamo Naal ĩ darau musei yale fen, dudum difiyẽf anĩ, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok?
41009013	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, Eliya mogo isin, ĩ nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek gen, ereb ereb ganan idi waud iron, ĩ nigin mogo age difen.”
41009014	Sain idi, in dõ fiya tar tunĩ ganan geredin disi fen, tamo kayau musei, idi salili difiyeĩd fen, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, od nem abob fe fe de mog, diledin.
41009015	Kaisã bagai, tamo kayau ganan Jesus isi mog, dile fen, idi fatuk bagai terẽ den, aan difiyẽf nigin gududu de dilen.
41009016	Jesus idi to fiyẽdin, “Ã ere nigin idi geid, od nem abob fe fe gef?”
41009017	Guru fiya atun, tamo takam aiten yale iron, “Tise, aya neu kesu, õ gein arou asil, ĩ kaa sanem irou di, ait ifokelen.
41009018	Sain ganan kaa sanem irouf, ĩ yũ irã di, tenebur kubũ ye, sali mokuf, gobora kikokõ ye fen, bouwa teregein yedig. Aya on dõ fiya tar kaa sane diruwauf nigin to afedin, anĩ ere, idi kisi feleya sã.”
41009019	Jesus solof iron, “Tamo kayau eneidi momoiya sã, sain ganĩ aya ã geid tabodõf? Sain ganĩ aya ã nigin wau aukesilauf? Kesu wageun urousig.”
41009020	Age ye di, idi kesu anĩ, ĩ garan dirou disi di, kaa sane Jesus ile fen, kaisã bagai kesu yũ iran. Kesu ĩ tenebur kubũ ye, wele yef, yen ken, awa bun sali moku fen.
41009021	Jesus kesu nẽ tama to fiyen, “Sain ganĩ ĩ eig fiya ibodon?” Ĩ aiten yale iron, “Ĩ kesu naalun gariya inon.
41009022	Sain musei, ĩ yukesiyou fenẽ nigin yã bun ado naanũ irãdig. Anĩ ere, õ ereb taka age fiya nigin kisi feleyauf are, amã nigin waũ ino ken, usennamã.”
41009023	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “‘Õ kisi feleyauf,’ wof de? Taka ĩ momoi youf, ereb ereb ganan age fiya nigin kisi feleya.”
41009024	Kaisã bagai, kesu nẽ tama iweig iron, “Aya momoi auf, neu momoiya naal nigin usenna!”
41009025	Age ye di, tamo kayau gududu de disi mog, anĩ Jesus ileid fen, ĩ kaa sane ou fiyen. Ĩ iron, “Õ daabuya ait ifokeleya kaa, aya õ arokonok, ĩ bun tamal ulõ weis fen, baban ĩ namen to kel ulauf.”
41009026	Kaa anĩ ui ye fen, kesu yũ irã di, fatuk bagai tererẽ ye mog, ulõ yeis ilen. Lo difen, kesu laa gen yenẽ di, musei diron, “Ĩ laa fel.”
41009027	Anĩ ere, Jesus kesu anĩ ima irou fen, yalesnẽ di, ĩ ifaren.
41009028	Jesus ĩ aaben ile ibod mog, in dõ fiya tar mugun ĩ to difiyen, “Ere nigin amã kaa sane iruya nigin kisi feleya san?”
41009029	Age de di, ĩ irokenẽdin, “Eig fiya are, Negur kosẽ fiyẽya bunem dogol iyawauf.”
41009030	Idi modoũ anĩ ditor ken, Galili distrik atu diyok dilen. Taka nem idi an yeya karĩya nigin, Jesus to oron,
41009031	ere nigin, ĩ in dõ fiya tar ifelnẽdin. Ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo Naal ĩ, fau kiwai tamo imeid bun dinouf. Idi fau ĩ dukesiyouf, naa towo bure fele di, ĩ fau kel fã youf.”
41009032	Anĩ ere, idi od enĩ nẽ gariya nene de fen, ĩ to fiya nigin kumĩ den.
41009033	Idi Kapenaum taun disin. Jesus fõ bun ibod ken, ĩ idi to fedin, “Ã naabur ere luwa urougel?”
41009034	Anĩ ere, idi foro firi delen, ere nigin, naab luwen, aim anĩ idi atun odug bagai ibodok nigin luwa diroun.
41009035	Jesus ibod ken, in dõ fiya tar tuwelf iweig laisi fen, iron, “Taka ĩ uyu ifarau fenẽf, ĩ gai dumen bagai youf. Agef fen, ĩ ganan neid kabĩ tamouf.”
41009036	Ĩ kesu naal taka yale iroule, idi atun ifarnen. Ĩ imam yale koboi fiye ken, ĩ idi irokenẽdin,
41009037	“Aib taka aya yanau bunem, kesu naal eig fiya taka yalef are, ĩ aya yaleyaf. Aib taka ĩ aya yaleyaf are, ĩ aya dogol to yaleyaf, ĩ aya sur fiyan anĩg yalef.”
41009038	Jon iron, “Tise, tamo taka, õ yanã nem kaa sesen iruid mog, amã mailen. Anĩ nigin, amã ĩ katũ mafiyen, ere nigin, ĩ neda takam sã.”
41009039	Anĩ ere, Jesus iron, “To katũ wiyẽg, taka ĩ neu yanau nem memelik inof are, ĩ kaisã bagai aya nigin sane irõya kisi feleya sã,
41009040	ere nigin, taka ĩ ada nigin kiwai to inof, are neda.
41009041	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, taka ĩ, aya yanau nem, ã Kristus nẽ nigin ye fen, kap naan ado ifeneĩf are, ĩ in mala solo momoi bagai yalouf.
41009042	“Aibem taka age fe di, kesu aya nigin momoi def enidi taka, mosor bun ineyẽf are, tamo anĩ meein odug guyutu bun ifo ken, maaĩwõ irãyam, are dem.
41009043	Ogon imam mosor bun ineyõf, gudũ wol. Õ imã tobega ado, mata bun ileya nigin biya bagai, ere nigin, ima totoũ adouf are, hel bun an yã faimud ibodkeleyan uleya nigin.
41009045	Age fiya gen, ogon yẽ anim, mosor bun ineyõf, gudũ wol. Õ yẽ tobega ado mata bun ileya nigin biya bagai, ere nigin, yẽ totoũ adouf are, hel bun dirãyõf.
41009047	Takag, ogon malã anim, mosor bun ineyõf, ubodol uraile. Õ malã tekelei ado Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin biya bagai, ere nigin, malã totoũ adouf are, hel bun dirãyõf,
41009048	an “‘idi neid mamat to gare dedig, yãg to gare feledig.’
41009049	Tamo ganan, yã tetedin sol gen tu difouf.
41009050	“Sol ĩ biya, anĩ ere, in kai sa kalauf, naig wo di, baban kai youf? Ã aug bun sol adouf, agog fen, abob nigin wau inosiya bun ubodõgouf.”
41010001	Jesus modoũ anĩ itor ken, Judia distrik nẽ akor anĩ atu ile, Jordan naan sitakã ilen. Baban tamo kayau mala odug ĩ wagen disi di, ĩ gai age fedig gen, od ifelnẽdin.
41010002	Farisia tamo tunĩ disi, kisi difiye ken, to difiyen, “Tamo taka yogon kayau iruf anĩ, are lo dõ fiya de?”
41010003	Ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Moses, anĩ nigin ere od wogõ yein?”
41010004	Idi diron, “Moses yo yen, are tamo bagu fiya anĩ fara fiya pepa itot fen, kayau od sã iru di, ilauf, yen.”
41010005	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Moses lo anĩ itotkenein, ere nigin, ãgenei wauĩ totol bagai agef yeneĩd.
41010006	Anĩ ere, gariya bun Negur ereb ereb ino fen, ‘tamo ino, kayau ino fen.’
41010007	‘Age fiya nigin, tamo ĩ in sina tama itorneĩd fen, in kayau ado bagu difouf,
41010008	age fe di, idi uruwom bouweid tekelei youf.’ Age dife di, idi uru sã, idi tekelei.
41010009	Anĩ nigin, ereb Negur bagu fedin anĩ, tamom to fara fouf.”
41010010	Sain idi baban fõ bun dibod ken, in dõ fiya tar od enĩ nigin Jesus to difiyen.
41010011	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aib taka in kayau iru fen, kayau taka yalouf, ĩ kayau tubu morõ ifen ken, seseirã inouf.
41010012	Age fiya bagai, kayau taka in aiwa itorne ken, tamo taka yalouf are, ĩ seseirã inouf.”
41010013	Tamo kayau, kesu nanaal Jesus wagen kobũ fediyouf nigin guri difeid disin, anĩ ere, in dõ fiya tar, idi ou difiyẽdin.
41010014	Jesus anĩ ile fen, wau sanen. Ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Utornẽdig len, kesu nanaal aya wageun disiyouf, idi to katũ wedig, ere nigin, Negur nẽ tano are eig fediya neid.
41010015	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aib taka ĩ, Negur nẽ tano kesu naal age fiya gen to yalouf are, ĩ namen to bagai ilauf.”
41010016	Age ye fen, ĩ kesu nanaal koboi feid fen, in ima tetedin ino fen, el fiya ifenẽdin.
41010017	Jesus mogo naab iyok ile mog, tamo taka ĩ garan gudu ref isel, wagen kubũ ye, ibor bobou fe fen, ĩ to fiyen, “Tise biya, aya ere naig afouf anĩ, mata faimud ibodkeleya alouf?”
41010018	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ere nigin õ aya anĩ biya wiyaf? Aibem taka biya sã, Negur yogo dogol.
41010019	Õ ĩtãfiya keleĩ: ‘Õ tamo taka to ukesiyouf, õ to seseirã unouf, õ to bẽ walouf, õ taka nigin idegẽya od to urõf, õ idegẽya bunem safina to walouf, sinã tamã sigoreid dõ wouf.’ ”
41010020	Ĩ Jesus irokenen, “Tise, enei ganan, aya kesu naalun dõ afef asin.”
41010021	Jesus ĩ lof ile, ĩ nigin wau laaf fen, iron, “Tekelei anĩ õ inĩ sã. Ule, ogon safina ganan na nigin sur wo fen, maleg tamo weneĩd, agouf anĩ, õ saa ilun safina biya adouf. Ago wol fen, usi, aya dõ wiya.”
41010022	Od anĩ bunem, nawa kuru kele fen. Ĩ wau morõ ado ilen, ere nigin, ĩ safina musei ado.
41010023	Jesus falei yel fen, in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Safina musei ado tamo, Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin gai malai bagai!”
41010024	In dõ fiya tar, in od anĩ nigin terẽ den. Anĩ ere, Jesus baban iron, “Nau kesu tar, Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin gai malai bagai!
41010025	Kamel ĩ gabar iwaya nil ku bun ileya nigin karika bagai, safina musei ado tamo Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin malai bagai.”
41010026	Od anĩ bun, in dõ fiya tar fatuk bagai terẽ de fen, abob toti difen, “Age fiyauf are, aim anĩ mata ibodkeleya yaleya kisi feleya?”
41010027	Jesus idi lo feid fen, iron, “Tamo bun are kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, Negur bun kisi feleya. Ereb ereb ganan Negur bun kisi feleya.”
41010028	Pita Jesus irokenen, “Amã ereb ereb ganan mator ken, õ dõ mayok!”
41010029	Jesus solof iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aib taka fõ, tura tar, main tar, sina, tama, gere tar be, kabĩ, aya nigin ado biya od nigin itoron,
41010030	ĩ mala solo wan handred wal fiya, sain enĩ bun, (fõ, tura tar, main tar, sina tar, gere tar, kabĩ anidi ado morõg) yalouf, ĩ dumen isiyouf buneg mata faimud ibodkeleya yalouf.
41010031	Anĩ ere, musei malabag dibodok, idi dumen dibodõf; musei dumen dibodok, idi malabag dibodõf.”
41010032	Jesus uyu irou fen, idi Jerusalem naab diselen. Age fe di, in dõ fiya tar idi terẽ de mog, idi dõ difedin anĩ kumĩ den. Baban Jesus in dõ fiya tar tuwelf firen gou feid fen, ĩ fau bouwa bun ere wõ youf anĩ irokenẽdin.
41010033	Jesus iron, “Ada Jerusalem teselef, an Tamo Naal ĩ pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo imeid bun dinenẽf. Idi ĩ laa fouf nigin bouwa bun od dũf. Age de fen, idi ĩ haiden Juda sã anidi imeid bun dino di,
41010034	idi ketẽ difiyẽf, disisnẽf, wagĩ difiye ken, dukesiyouf. Naa towo bure fele di, ĩ kel fã youf.”
41010035	Sebedi gere tar, Jems Jon ado, Jesus wagen disin. Idi diron, “Tise, amã ereb taka nigin to mafe di, õ agouf anĩ oromak.”
41010036	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã ere anĩ, aya age afeneĩf nigin oroyeik?”
41010037	Idi aiten dale diron, “Ogon fula fiya medeĩya bun, amã taka ogon ima biyalẽ ibodõ di, taka ogon ima kilẽ ibodõf anĩ oromak.”
41010038	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã ereb to gef anĩ nẽ gariya ã keleĩ sã, aya naan ãf anĩ, ã yõya kisi feleya de? Agef mã, naan aya agũf anĩ, ã igũya kisi feleya de?”
41010039	Idi aiten dale diron, “Amã kisi feleya.” Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Naan aya ãf are, ã wãgauf, naan aya agũf are, ã ugũgouf,
41010040	anĩ ere, imau biyalẽ ibodõya, kilẽ ibodõya are, ayam ifenẽya kisi feleya sã. Modoũ anidi are, idi nigin saika fen anidi neid.”
41010041	In dõ fiya tar ten od anĩ karĩ de fen, Jems Jon ado nigin seye den.
41010042	Jesus idi iweig laisi fen, iron, “Ã keleĩ, haiden neid uyu irouya def anĩ, tamo kayau lo fiya nigin totol dinodig, idi dogo neid odudug, idi aruneid dalouf nigin megeir dinodig.
41010043	Ã bun kisi to agef yenẽf, ã atun, aib taka odug ibodõf nigin orof, ĩ ãgenei kabĩ tamo ibodõf.
41010044	Aib taka uyun ibodõf nigin orof, ĩ ganan neid ferfer ouf.
41010045	Ere nigin, Tamo Naal ĩg disennẽf nigin to isin, anĩ ere, ĩ tamo kayau isenneĩd fen, tamo kayau musei idi neid mosor anĩ fotokar, yogon mata ifenẽdiyouf nigin isin.”
41010046	Age de fen, idi Jeriko disin. Jesus, in dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau mala odug geid, taun anĩ ditor dile mã, tamo taka mala ifofakeleya, Bartimeus (Timeus naal), ĩ naab yerin nonĩ yef ibodon.
41010047	Sain ĩ Jesus Nasaret tamal yeya anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ iweig iron, “Jesus, Dawid Naal, aya nigin malalon yõ!”
41010048	Age ye di, tamo musei sakã difiye ken, foro yalauf nigin dirokenen, anĩ ere, ĩ wade bagai iweig iron, “Dawid Naal, aya nigin malalon yõ!”
41010049	Jesus dẽ yel fen, iron, “Uweignẽg.” Age ye di, idi tamo mala ifofakeleya diweignen, “Waũ el fe fen, fã wale! Ĩ õ iweignok.”
41010050	Age de di, ĩ yogon gabar sirilẽ iraile fen, fã yale, Jesus wagen isin.
41010051	Jesus ĩ to fiyen, “Aya õ ere age afonõf ani, õ oroyok?” Tamo mala ifofakeleya iron, “Rabi, aya kelẽ au fenẽ.”
41010052	Jesus iron, “Ule, ogon momoiya anim el yom.” Kaisã bagai, ĩ kelẽ yel fen, Jesus dõf, naab dilen.
41011001	Idi Jerusalem kelẽ difiye ken, Moul Arei bun Betfage Betani ado wõ den, Jesus in dõ fiya tar uru sur feid fen,
41011002	ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Fonõ wageik anĩ bun uleg, an wõg fen, donki naal difon anĩ ulogouf, are aibem taka anĩ bun to iyon. Anĩ biru weleg fen, ein urou usig.
41011003	Taka nem to yeĩf, ‘Ere nigin ã enĩ ago gef?’ youf are, urokenẽgouf, ‘Odug orof nigin, fau mogo kaisã ein kel sur fouf.’”
41011004	Idi dile, donki naal naabur bobog ileyan difokelen ifar mog, fotou difen. Idi biru de mog,
41011005	tamo tunĩ an difaren anidim to difedin, “Ã ere naig gouf nigin, donki naal anĩ biru gef?”
41011006	Idi Jesus irokenẽdin kilei, solo de dirokenẽdin. Age de di, tamo ditornẽdi di, dilen.
41011007	Idi donki naal anĩ Jesus wagen dirousi fen, idi neid gabar teten dirarã di, ĩ anĩ teten ibodon.
41011008	Tamo kayau musei, idi neid gabar naabur du difedin, age de mog, tunĩ idi kabier aa were aarau ado kokour difedin anĩ du difedin.
41011009	Tamo kayau uyu dilen ado dume dõ difen, kakaĩ de diron, “Hosiana!” “Odug yana bunem isif, are ĩ el fiyek!”
41011010	“Neda tamada Dawid nẽ tano isif, are el fiyek!” “Hosiana, ilun bagai!”
41011011	Jesus Jerusalem wõ ye fen, tempel ilen. Ĩ ereb ereb ganan kii fedin, anĩ ere, sain bure felen nigin, ĩ in dõ fiya tar tuwelf geid Betani dilen.
41011012	We fele di, idi Betani ditor dile fen, Jesus naũ fen.
41011013	Ĩ mala ira kel, aa fig aarau ile fen, ĩ faat ado be ye mã, ilouf nigin ilen. Ĩ non ilen, faat taka to ilen, aarau dogol, ere nigin, imaya sain sã.
41011014	Age fiya ile fen, ĩ aa irokenen, “Taka nem õ bun faat baban to yãf.” Agef irõ mog, in dõ fiya tar karĩ den.
41011015	Jerusalem wõ de fen, Jesus tempel modoũ namen ile, na dale dile disi dife mog, an irudidin. Ĩ moni solo fediya neid tebol ado, kuburir na nigin sur fediya neid bens eleg feledin.
41011016	Tamo ganan, tempel modoũ bun safina na nẽ iroulediya nigin katũ fiyẽdin.
41011017	Agef fen, Jesus ifelneĩd iron, “‘Neu fõ, teneub ganan nẽ kosẽya fõ douf,’ are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun to yenek de? Anĩ ere, ã ‘bẽ tamo neid iminẽya fõ’ unogen.”
41011018	Age ye di, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, od enĩ karĩ de fen, Jesus dukesiyouf nigin naab dimiren. Idi Jesus kumĩ difiyen, ere nigin, tamo kayau ganan in ifelnẽdin anĩ nigin terẽ den.
41011019	Aragau di, idi taun anĩ ditor dilen.
41011020	Bonimei idi naab diyok dile fen, idi aa fig warei bunem gariri kelen anĩ dilen.
41011021	Pita weder fokõ yel fen, Jesus irokenen, “Rabi, ulef! Õ aa fig usisin, are gariri kelen!”
41011022	Age ye di, Jesus solof irokenẽdin, “Negur bun momoi wogei.
41011023	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aibem taka arei enĩ irokenẽf, ‘Õ kusu urã, maaĩwõ usil,’ age ye fen, ĩ wau to uru fen, momoi aya orok anĩ agef wõ youf, youf are, agef dõ fenẽf.
41011024	Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, ereb taka nigin ã kosẽ bun tog fen, mogo malel ge, momoi gouf, are ãgenei youf.
41011025	Sain ã ufareg kosẽg fen, ã takan nẽ sane nigin wauĩ bun yenẽf are, wedereĩ tu kalauf. Ago ge di, ãgenei Temeĩ saa tanon ibodok, ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.”
41011027	Idi baban Jerusalem wõ den, Jesus tempel fofomalan iyok ile mog, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, mudur adodo geid, ĩ wagen disin.
41011028	Idi Jesus to difiyen, “Ere igirĩya bunem, õ ereb ereb enĩ ago wof? Aim õ enĩ agouf nigin igirnon?”
41011029	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya to fiya tekelei afeneĩf. Solog urokanage di, ereb igirĩya bunem ereb ereb enĩ age afef anĩ, aya ã arokeneĩf.
41011030	Jon naan igunẽdin, are saa ilun tamal de, tamo bunem? Urokanag!”
41011031	Idi dogo dogol katõ de fen, diron, “Ada, ‘Saa ilun tamal,’ tauf, ĩ to fouf, ‘Age fe di, ere nigin, ã ĩ nigin to momoi gen?’
41011032	Anĩ ere, ada, ‘Tamo bunem,’ tauf…” (Idi tamo kayau kumĩ difedin, ere nigin, tamo ganan, Jon ĩ momoi bagai profet den.)
41011033	Anĩ nigin, idi Jesus ait solo de diron, “Amã keleĩ sã.” Age de di, Jesus iron, “Ayag ã to arokeneĩf, ereb igirĩya bunem aya ereb ereb enĩ age afedif.”
41012001	Age ye fen, Jesus yaab od nem idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo taka wain kabĩ yalen. Ĩ kau ifõ kalĩ felen, wain sumin asi fiya nigin ku yalen, kabĩ lo fiya tamo neid fõ inon. Agef fen, ĩ mala solo yalouf nigin wain kabĩ, kabĩ tamo tunĩ imeid bun ino fen, uyu takã ilen.
41012002	Fito fiya sain, ĩ, kabĩ tamo taka, wain kabĩ lo fiya tamo gedin, wain biya tunĩ, idi bun gei fouf nigin sur fen.
41012003	Anĩ ere, idi ĩ dale, du ken, sur difiyẽ di, ima sãsã ilen.
41012004	Age dife di, ĩ kabĩ tamo taka idi gedin sur fen. Idi tamo anĩ mudur bun du ken, mama difenẽ di, ilen.
41012005	Ĩ baban takag sur fen, areg idi dukesin. Ĩ musei tunĩg sur fedin, age fe di, tunĩ diden ken, tunĩ didenkesin.
41012006	“Ĩ gama tekelei dogol sur fiya nigin ibodon, are yogo naal, ĩ yogon oboi bagai. Ĩ anĩ dumen bagai sur fiye ken, iron, ‘Idi neu kesu anĩ karĩ difiyẽf.’
41012007	“Anĩ ere, kabĩ lo fiya tamo, idi abob dirokenen, ‘Eĩ ĩ akorouf. Usig, ada ĩ tau keis fen, akor eĩ nedauf.’
41012008	Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ dale, dukeis fen, wain kabĩ dumeitur diran.
41012009	“Age dife di, wain kabĩ marau naig fouf? Ĩ isi, kabĩ lo fiya tamo idenkeis fen, wain kabĩ anĩ tamo tunĩ ifenẽdiyouf.
41012010	Ã Negur nẽ Itotoya enĩ to uwesegen de? “‘Meein are fõ inoya tamom sane de fen, ditoron, meein anĩ gama monog tor wõ yen,
41012011	anĩ Odug yogo age fe di, malamã yũ yalen.’ ”
41012012	Age ye di, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, mudur adodo geid, Jesus irounẽya nigin naab dimiren, ere nigin, idi kelein, ĩ idi nigin yaab od wogõ yen. Anĩ ere, idi tamo kayau nigin kumĩ de fen, idi ĩ ditornẽ dilen.
41012013	Dum idi, Farisia tamo tunĩ, Herod nẽ tamo tunĩ geid, Jesus garan in od bun kũ fenẽ di, dirounẽf nigin sur difedin.
41012014	Idi ĩ garan disi fen, diron, “Tise, amã keleĩ, õ momoi wogõya nẽ tamo. Õ tamom to wewu diyõdig, ere nigin, õ idi yeneid ado be, sã anĩ to es wedidig. Ago fen, õ momoi bagai Negur nẽ naab ufelnamãdig. Sisa takis ifenẽya nigin biya de, sã?
41012015	Amã mafenẽf de, sã?” Anĩ ere, Jesus idi neid namedin kisi sane kelei ken, iron, “Ere nigin ã aya nigin kor unogef? Koin moni taka urousig len, aya ailau fenẽ.”
41012016	Idi koin moni taka dirousi di, ĩ idi to fedin, “Eĩ ai nẽ malakanon? Eĩ ai yana nẽ itotoya?” Idi aiten dale diron, “Sisa nẽ.”
41012017	Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Sisa nẽ are Sisa wenẽg, Negur nẽ are Negur wenẽg.” Age ye di, idi ĩ nigin terẽ den.
41012018	Sadusia tamo idi dirõdig, laa bun tamal to ke de fã dedig anĩ, Jesus wagen disi to difiyen.
41012019	Idi diron, “Tise, Moses itotkanaman, are tamo taka laaf fen, aiwa itornen, anĩ ere, kesu sã, tamo ĩ waab anĩ yale fen, tura nẽ kesu diroukenẽf.
41012020	Gama tura tura sewen dibodon. Matu ketem kayau yalen, anĩ ere, kesu yaleya sã mog, laa fen.
41012021	Matu dõ fiya bagam waab anĩ yalen, anĩ ere, ĩg kesu sã mog, laa fen. Idi dõ fediyag de age fen.
41012022	Tura tura sewen anidi adok, kesu taka to dalen. Dum kayau areg laa fen.
41012023	Dum laa bun tamal kel fãya sain bun, ĩ ai nẽ kayau ibodõf, ere nigin, tura tura sewen anidi adok, ĩ dale dogolen?”
41012024	Jesus aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Ã od kũ wenẽgef, ere nigin, ã Negur nẽ Itotoya ado Negur nẽ megeir keleĩ sã.
41012025	Sain laa bun tamal kel fãya bun, an tamo kayau ado abob yalef ya sãf, idi engel saa ilun dibodok gen dibodõf.
41012026	Gama, laa bun tamal fãya nigin, Moses nẽ od Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, are arein aa mata bun fotou fiyen Negur ĩ naig fe irokenen, ‘Aya Abraham nẽ Negur, Isak nẽ Negur, Jakop nẽ Negur’ anĩ to be uwesegen de?
41012027	Ĩ laa neid Negur sã, anĩ ere, ĩ mata ibodõya neid. Ã fatuk bagai kũ wenẽgef!”
41012028	Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo taka isi, idi od nem kusĩ de mog, karĩ fiyẽdin. Jesus ĩ aiten, od biya irokeneĩd mog, karĩ ye fen, ĩ Jesus to fiyen, “Ĩtãfiya ganan bun, ĩtãfiya nanĩ anĩ ganan wal fiya?”
41012029	Jesus iron, “Ĩtãfiya ganan wal fiya are enĩ, ‘O Israel, karĩ wog, Odug neda Negur, Odug ĩ yogo tekelei.
41012030	Õ, Odug ogon Negur ĩ nigin waũ adok, malãkanon adok, kisi adok, megeir adok bunem, ĩ nigin waũ laaf.’
41012031	Anĩ dõ fiya are eig fiya, ‘Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago waũ laaf.’ Ĩtãfiya uru enim, ganan wal fiya.”
41012032	Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo anĩ Jesus irokenen, “Tise, õ de urok. Negur ĩ tekelei, taka to ibodok, Negur yogo dogol wof, anĩ bun momoi urok.
41012033	Õ Negur nigin waũ adok, kisi adok, megeir adok bunem waũ laaf fen, õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago waũ laafei yeya anim, yã bun sesewi fiya ado sesewi fiya fire fire ganan wal fiya.”
41012034	Jesus tamo anĩ keleĩ ado aiten yale di, ile fen, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Õ Negur nẽ tano nigin egerõ sã.” Sain anĩ bunem ilen, taka nem baban to fiyẽya nigin kumĩ den.
41012035	Jesus tempel modoũ bun ifelneĩd fen, ĩ to fedin, “Naig fe di, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Kristus ĩ Dawid nẽ naal dedig?
41012036	Dawid ĩ yogo Awa Uur Fateul bunem wogõ ye fen, kurõ falaisin: “‘Negur, neu Odug irokenen, “Imau biya melem ubod mog, ogon kiwai tar on yẽ farumẽ gõ afalauf.” ’
41012037	Dawid yogo, ĩ nigin ‘Odug’ yef, naig fe di, ĩ Dawid naal ouf?” Tamo kayau musei waud el fiya ado karĩ difiyen.
41012038	Jesus ifelneĩd fen, iron, “Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo nigin lo welegei. Idi gabar meluluk difonunakel diyo ken, maket modoũ bun aan difiyẽdiyouf anĩ orodidig.
41012039	Age de fen, idi Juda neid uub fõ bun, sia biyai biyai bun dibod ken, tar inoya bun modoũ malabag bun dibodõdig.
41012040	Idi, kayau waab idegnẽdiya bunem nedi fõ sosoin de fen, meleid yaleya nigin meluk bagai kosẽ dedig. Tamo age fediya, mala solo sane bagai dalouf.”
41012041	Jesus ofa moni bogis sitakã ibod ken, tamo kayau lo feid mog, idi moni tempel bogis bun dinon. Tamo kayau safineid adodo musei moni odudug diraran.
41012042	Anĩ ere, kayau waab maleg taka isi, kapa koin moni giriya nanaal bagai uru inon. Are tu toea dogol.
41012043	Jesus in dõ fiya tar iweig laisi fen, irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, kayau waab maleg enĩ ĩ, ganan wal fediya, odug bagai bogis bun inol.
41012044	Idi ganan dogo neid safineid bun tamal tunĩ dinon, anĩ ere, kayau maleg anĩ, ereb ereb adok ĩ isennẽf anĩ ganan inon.”
41013001	Jesus ĩ tempel bunem kutũ yeis mog, in dõ fiya tar taka ĩ irokenen, “Ule, Tise! Ere meein odudug oug fediya! Ere fõ meli meli oug fediya!”
41013002	Age ye di, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Fõ odudug enĩ ganan uledif de? Meein enĩ taka to abob teten yenẽf, anĩ adok fau isog irailauf.”
41013003	Jesus Moul Arein tempel sitakã ibod mog, Pita, Jems, Jon, Endru anidim mugun Jesus to difiyen,
41013004	“Ere sain enidi wõ youf? Ere uris bagai anĩ, enĩ ganan kisi falauf nigin wõ youf? Anĩ urokanamã.”
41013005	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Takam idegneĩya nigin lo weleg.
41013006	Musei aya yanau nem disi dirõf, ‘Aya Kristus,’ age de fen, musei didegnẽdiyouf.
41013007	Sain ã kusĩ nigin karĩg fen, tamo sigoredim kusĩ nigin wogõ douf anĩ karĩ gouf, ã to tererẽ gei. Ereb ereb anidi agef wõ youf, anĩ ere, idikeleya sain fau dum isiyouf.
41013008	Teneub taka fã ye fen, ĩ teneub taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf, tano taka ĩ, tano taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf. Uyu taka taka bun mimĩ wõ ye fen, naũ isiyouf. Age fouf anĩ, kayau kesu gõ fouf nigin darau gariya inodig age fiya.
41013009	“Ã aug nigin lo weleg. Ã fau kaunsel imeid bun dinenei ken, uub fõ bun wagagã diyeĩf. Aya yanau nigin, ã gawaman mudur, king geid meleid bun ufareg fen, idi kurõ walaisig urokenẽdigouf.
41013010	Biya od ketem teneub ganan bun iyokalauf.
41013011	Sain ã gei diyei ken, kot bun dirouleyeĩf, ere mauf wog fen, to kisi musei waleg. Sain anĩ bun, ereb ifeneik anĩ wogõ gouf, ere nigin, are ãgem to wogõ gouf, are Awa Uur Fateulem.
41013012	“Turam, tura kiwai imeid bun ino di, dukesiyouf, age fe di, tamam in kesu age fouf. Kesum sina tama kiwai difeneĩd fen, laa bun dinenẽdiyouf.
41013013	Tamo ganan aya nigin ã kiwai difeneĩf, anĩ ere, taka ĩ megeir ifaref ile ile idikeleyanouf, Negur ĩ yalouf.
41013014	“Sain ‘ninir anĩ fonou inouf nigin’ ĩ an to ifarau nẽ anĩ ulogouf (anĩ uweseg, keleĩ youf), idi Judia distrik bun dibodok, arein diya diselauf.
41013015	Taka ĩ yogon fõ agaran ibodok, ĩ kutũ yeis, aaben ile, ereb ereb to yalouf.
41013016	Taka ĩ kabier ibodok, yogon gabar yalouf nigin to kel ilauf.
41013017	Naa anĩ bun, kayau bouweid ado, kayau kesu su difenẽdif ado, idi meleidlon ado!
41013018	Feluk sain bun, anĩ to wõ youf nigin, ã Negur kosẽ wiyẽgouf,
41013019	ere nigin, naa anidi bun morõ odug biya adouf, morõ age fiya, gariya bun Negur teneub inon bunem isi gama, taka to wõ yen, dum buneg taka to wõ youf.
41013020	Odug morõ odug nẽ naa anĩ to guru falaisim, taka to ibodom. Anĩ ere, tamo kayau ĩ igirnẽdin nigin, ĩ naa anĩ guru falaisin.
41013021	Sain anĩ bun, taka ã irokeneĩf, ‘Ulegef, Kristus yeir!’ oo ‘Ĩ your!’ ã anĩ to momoi ge.
41013022	Fau idegẽya Kristus, idegẽya profet ado, wõ de fen, idi kisi falauf are, Negur igirnẽdin anidi didegnẽdiyouf nigin uris memelik ado dinodiyouf.
41013023	Anĩ nigin, lo welegei, sain anĩ fau mog, aya ã ereb ereb ganan arokenein.
41013024	“Anĩ ere, naa anidi bun, morõ anĩ dõ fiya, “‘gaa gugum kalauf, age fe di, ogõ lalan to ifenẽf,
41013025	saa ilun tamal barisa kuku rouf, saa nẽ megeir ganan guyoyõ douf.’
41013026	“Sain anĩ bun, tamo idi, Tamo Naal lalo bun yogon megeir odug fula fiya medeĩya ado isi mog, dilouf.
41013027	Agef fen, ĩ yogon engel susur fedi di, yogon tamo kayau igirnẽdin anidi, teneub akor ganan bun, gaa iseya nem ile gaa ileyan, gei de, kuru difediyouf.
41013028	“Gama ã, aa fig bun keleĩ walogouf. Susu bonuf fen, aarau inodif, ã keleĩ, saneya melsak.
41013029	Age fiya gen, ã ereb ereb anĩ wõ youf ulogouf, ã keleĩ, are mogo melsã bagai bobogẽ ifaref.
41013030	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo kayau sain enĩ bun dibodok eneidi to gare de mog, enĩ ganan wõ youf.
41013031	Saa teneub ado sa kalauf, anĩ ere, neu od to bagai sa kalauf.
41013032	“Taka nem naa sain ado to keleĩ youf, saa ilun engel idig sã, Naal ĩg sã, Dei yogo dogol.
41013033	Mata ubodõg fen, lo weleg! Ereb sain anĩ wõ youf, ã to keleĩ youf.
41013034	Are tamo fõ itor ileya gen. Ĩ yogon fõ itor ken, lo difouf nigin yogon ferfer imeid bun inon, idi mugu mugu kabĩ fire fire ifenẽdin. Agef fen, ĩ tamo bobog bun anĩ mala inof ibodõf nigin irokenen.
41013035	“Anĩ nigin, mata ubodõg fen, lo welegei, ere nigin, ã keleĩ sã, ereb sain fõ marau kel isiyouf, aragau be, bõ atun be, tataro yũ mog be, wef mog be.
41013036	Ĩ isi tarabã yeĩf, ã to wenẽg mog, ileyeĩf, are deuf.
41013037	Ereb aya ã arokeneik, aya adok ganan arokenẽdif, ‘Lo weleg!’”
41014001	Gama Pasa naa ado Bret Yis Sã Sifa naa, fau uru yen mog, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, Jesus idegẽya naab bun dale dirou fen, dukesiyouf nigin naab dimiren.
41014002	Idi diron, “Sifa sain bun to age tafouf, age tafouf are, tamo kayau seye de fen, kusĩ dalesauf.”
41014003	Jesus Betani an, Simon kulu lepra dagi adon tamo, in fõ bun saaf yoko ibod mog, kayau taka ĩ wagen moul sumeĩ biya bagai moni odug nem, nad nem dogol dinon anĩ, gulub ado irou isin. Agef fen, kayau gulub anĩ karãf fen, Jesus mudur bun moul fi felen.
41014004	Age fe di, tunĩ an difaren are waud sane fen, abob dirokenen, “Ere nigin moul enĩ sekil fef?
41014005	Moul enei yar tekelei nẽ dimig mala wal feseya nem sur fiyam, agef fen, moni anĩ yale, maleg tamo ifenẽdiyam, are dem.” Age de fen, idi ĩ totol bagai ou difiyen.
41014006	Jesus iron, “Utornẽg, ã ere nigin ĩ wau morõ wenẽgef? Kayau enĩ aya nigin biya bagai age fel.
41014007	Maleg idi faimud ã geid ubodõgouf, anĩ nigin, ã idi isennẽdiya oroyeĩf, are sain musei. Anĩ ere, aya faimud ã geid to tabodõgouf.
41014008	Ĩ ereb age fiya kisin anĩ age fel. Ĩ moul aya bouwau bun fi felel are, mekur ainẽf nigin anĩ ketem dodok fel.
41014009	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tenebur ein nain be, biya od enĩ wogõ douf, ereb kayau enĩ age fel anĩg wogõ douf. Age fe di, idi ĩ nigin kisi difouf.”
41014010	Age ye di, Judas Iskariot, tuwelf anidi atun taka, Jesus kiwai ifen ken, pris odudug imeid bun inouf nigin wagedin ilen.
41014011	Pris odudug idi od enĩ karĩ de, waud al fe fen, ĩ moni difenẽf nigin dirokenen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ Jesus idi imeid bun inouf nigin naab imirek ilen.
41014012	Bret Yis Sã Sifa inoya naa matu anĩ bun, sain anĩ are idi neid tobonunã, sipsip naal, Negur tubuid tar isennẽdin anĩ kisi de fen, sesewi difedig anĩ, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar Jesus to difiyen, “Õ amã nain anĩ Pasa naa nẽ saaf wãf nigin, amã dodok mafouf anĩ oroyok?”
41014013	Age de di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar uru sur feid fen, irokenẽdin, “Taun uleg fen, tamo taka darum naan ado isi fotou yeĩf, ĩ dõ gouf.
41014014	Ĩ fõ taka namen ile di, uleg fen, gama ã fõ marau eig wiyẽg urokenẽgouf, ‘Tise to fel: Aya neu dõ fiya tar geid, Pasa naa nẽ saaf mãf nigin aab nain ibodok?’
41014015	Ĩ aab odug ilun anĩ ifelneĩf, an ereb ereb dodok de bure difelen. An neda nigin dodok gouf.”
41014016	In dõ fiya tar taun dile fen, Jesus iron kilei, ereb ereb age fiya dilen. Anĩ nigin, idi Pasa naa nẽ saaf dodok difen.
41014017	Aragau di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar tuwelf geid, an wõ den.
41014018	Idi tebol bun si dino, saaf dokon, Jesus iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, ã atun takam aya kiwai imeid bun inoyauf, taka aya uruwom moko anim.”
41014019	Idi waud gudũf fen, mugu mugu dirokenen, “Momoi bagai, ayam sã de?”
41014020	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ã tuwelf atun takam, taka ĩ, imamã uruwom beĩ bun nu mafef anim.
41014021	Tamo Naal ĩ nigin ditoton agef bai ilauf. Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ Tamo Naal kiwai tamo imeid bun inof, ĩ malalon ado! Ĩ sina to gõ fem, are dem.”
41014022	Idi saaf dokon, Jesus bret yale, Negur de fiye ken, bret anĩ mumã fen. Agef fen, in dõ fiya tar ifeneĩd fen, iron, “Waleg, eĩ neu bouwau.”
41014023	Agef fen, ĩ kap yale, Negur de fiye ken, kap anĩ ifenẽdin, age fe di, idi adok anĩ bun don.
41014024	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Eĩ neu naudou, ã Negur geid bar itenẽya nigin, are tamo kayau musei nigin fi felef,
41014025	aya ã momoi arokeneik, aya baban wain enĩ to ãf, gaman ile, aya Negur nẽ tano bun wain mata ãf bun.”
41014026	Idi seg taka dalel fen, idi Moul Arei bun diselen.
41014027	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã fau adok uyalalagauf, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok: “‘Aya sipsip marau aũ di, sipsip ganan firagagaũ difouf.’
41014028	Anĩ ere, aya kel fã auf bun, aya ket Galili uyu alauf.”
41014029	Pita Jesus irokenen, “Ganan diyalalaufeg, aya sãf.”
41014030	Jesus Pita irokenen, “Aya õ momoi arokonok, gama bõ enĩ bun, tataro kokorok ye uru fiya sã mog, õ ogo aya nigin wa wo, towo wouf.”
41014031	Anĩ ere, Pita totol bagai iron, “Momoi aya õ uruwom gare tauf nigin oufeg, aya õ nigin to bagai wa afouf.” Age ye di, idig ganan od de tekelei anĩ diron.
41014032	Idi modoũ yana Getsemane dedig, an dilen. Age de fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Ein ubodõg mog, aya kosẽ auf.”
41014033	Ĩ, Pita, Jems, Jon anidi dogol geif fen, ĩ geid dilen. Agef fen, ĩ wau gũf fen, morõ odug gudũ fen.
41014034	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Neu malaukanon tobega le fen, wau morõ gudũ feis, laa nẽ daũ bun ifaref. Ein ufareg fen, lo weleg.”
41014035	Naal godof iroule fen, kisi falauf are, sain anĩ Jesus wal fiyẽf nigin, ĩ tenebur kubũ ye fen, kosẽ yen.
41014036	Jesus iron, “Aba, Dei, ereb ereb ganan, õ age fiya kisi feleya. Kap enĩ walelkana. Anĩ ere, neu oroya anĩ to dõ wo, on oroya dõ wo.”
41014037	Age fel fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar gedin kel isin, mulã den mog, iledin. Jesus Pita irokenen, “Simon, õ wenek de? Õ aua tekelei to mata ubodõf de?
41014038	Ã, kisi yeĩya bun to kubũ gouf nigin lo weleg fen, kosẽ gouf. Uur are orof, anĩ ere, bouwa anĩ malegef.”
41014039	Ĩ baban kel ile, uruwa kosẽ yen gen, dõf age fen.
41014040	Ĩ kel isin, baban denena mog, iledin, ere nigin, idi meleid morõ gudũ fesin. Idi ĩ ereb fiyẽya nigin taka to kisi difen.
41014041	Jesus kel towo fe fen, in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Ã fau si unog fen, yenẽyai gef? Bure! Sain mogo isil. Ulegef, Tamo Naal mogo mosor tamo imeid bun ilef.
41014042	Fafãg fen, teleg! Kiwai imeid bun inoya tamo yeir isif!”
41014043	Jesus fau wogõ ye mog, tuwelf anidi atun taka, Judas wõ yen. Tamo musei dimig adodo, seburer adodo, ĩ geid disin. Pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, mudur adodo idim sur difedi di, disin.
41014044	Gama Judas ĩ Jesus yaor fiyẽya nẽ uris nigin, idi faded fiyẽdin: “Tamo aya umã afouf anĩ, ĩ waleg fen, uroug uleg.”
41014045	Judas kaisã bagai Jesus wagen ile iron, “Rabi!” Agef fen, umã fiyen.
41014046	Tamo idi Jesus ka dife dirounen.
41014047	Age dife di, tamo melsã difaren anĩ takam dimig ul feis yale, pris mudur ado nẽ kabĩ tamo weder salõf iran.
41014048	Jesus iron, “Aya bẽ tamo gen, ã dimig adodo, seburer adodo, waleyagau fenẽ usigef de?
41014049	Naa ganan, aya ã geid tabod ken, tempel fofomala bun afelnein, anĩ ã aya to urouyagen. Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok anĩ kisi falauf nigin.”
41014050	Age ye di, ganan ditornẽ diyalelen.
41014051	Tamo gaũ taka, gabar lalau dogol ifonun ĩ, Jesus dõ fen. Sain idi Jesus ka dife di,
41014052	ĩ gabar inũ iraile, gemũ iyawon.
41014053	Idi Jesus dale, pris mudur ado wagen diroulen. Age dife di, pris odudug, mudur adodo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, ganan disi guru difen.
41014054	Pita Jesus dume dõf, tokõ fel ile, pris mudur ado nẽ fõ fofomalan wõ yen. An ĩ kabĩ tamo geid dibod ken, yã imidirek ibodon.
41014055	Pris odudug, kaunsel ganan geid, Jesus laa bun dinenẽf nigin bouwa bun od dimiren. Anĩ ere, taka to dilen.
41014056	Musei Jesus bouwa bun idegẽya od diraran, anĩ ere, idi neid od tekelei sã.
41014057	Age de fen, tamo tunĩ fafã de fen, Jesus bouwa bun idegẽya od enĩ diran,
41014058	“Amã karĩ mafiyẽ mog, iron, ‘Aya tempel tamom dinon anĩ narĩ afel fen, naa towo bun, taka, are tamom to inouf anĩ anouf.’”
41014059	Anĩ ere, idi neid od anĩg tekelei sã.
41014060	Age de di, pris mudur ado wagedin fã ye ifar fen, Jesus to fiyen, “Õ to solo urõf de? Eĩ ere od anĩ tamo enidi dirousi, õ boũ bun duk?”
41014061	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ mutũ ifar fen, to solof iron. Baban pris mudur adom, ĩ to fiyen, “Õ Kristus, Negur Naal de?”
41014062	Jesus iron, “Aya im, ã Tamo Naal Negur megeir ado ima biyalem ibod ken, saa lalo bun isi mog, ulogouf.”
41014063	Age ye di, pris mudur ado in kolos serek fe fen, to fen, “Ere nigin ada od megeir fiya nigin tamo baban tamirẽf?
41014064	Ã kono fiya od mogo karĩ gel. Ã ere kisi gef?” Idi ganan ĩ laa fouf nigin diron.
41014065	Age de fen, tunĩ Jesus disisnẽ, mala difofakel fen, imedim dun. Age de fen, idi diron, “Aim inok kurõ weis urõ!” Age dife di, kusĩ tamo Jesus dale fen, dun.
41014066	Pita fõ fofomalan tenebur ibod mog, pris mudur ado nẽ kabĩ kayau taka isin.
41014067	Ĩ, Pita yã imidir mog, lo fel fen, iron, “Õg Jesus Nasaret tamal geiden.”
41014068	Anĩ ere, ĩ waf fen, iron, “Õ od urok enĩ, aya keleĩ sã.” Age ye fen, ĩ bobogẽ iyok ilen.
41014069	Kabĩ kayau anĩ Pita an ile fen, ĩ baban an difaren anĩ irokenẽdin, “Tamo enĩ are idi neid taka.”
41014070	Ĩ baban wa fen. Sain naal ilele di, idi melsã difaren anidim Pita dirokenen, “Momoi bagai, õ idi neid taka, ere nigin, õ Galili tamal.”
41014071	Ĩ mogo yogo bouwa geluf fen, totol od irokenẽdin, “Tamo ã urõgef anĩ, aya keleĩ sã.”
41014072	Age ye mog, kaisã bagai, tataro baban kokorok yen. Age fe di, Pita Jesus od irokenen anĩ weder fokõ felen: “Tataro fau kokorok ye uru fiya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa wo, towo wouf.” Anĩ bunem, ĩ kusureis fen, inã yalen.
41015001	Bonimei bagai, pris odudug, mudur adodo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, Juda neid kaunsel ganan geid, od difon. Idi Jesus difõ dale dirou, Pailat ima bun dinon.
41015002	Pailat Jesus to fiyen, “Õ Juda neid king de?” Jesus solof iron, “Are de yer, õ urok anĩ.”
41015003	Pris odudug ĩ bouwa bun od musei dun.
41015004	Anĩ nigin, Pailat baban Jesus to fiyen, “Õ to solo wo urõf de? Ereb ereb musei nigin bouwã bun od dinof anĩ ulef.”
41015005	Anĩ ere, Jesus fau od taka to solo fen. Age fe di, Pailat terẽ ye fen, kisi musei yalen.
41015006	Gawaman nẽ tobonunã are, Pasa Sifa inoya bun tamo kayau dirõ di, kalabus bun tamo taka dalisnẽdig.
41015007	Tamo taka yana Barabas ĩ, tamo kusĩ dales fen, tamo didenkesin, kalabus bun dinenan anidi neid taka.
41015008	Tamo kayau mala odug dise, Pailat gai age fedig anĩ, age fenẽdiyouf nigin to difiyen.
41015009	Pailat to fedin, “Ã aya Juda neid king anĩ aliskeneĩf de?”
41015010	Pailat keleĩ, pris odudug idi kiyeĩ dino fen, Jesus ĩ ima bun dinon.
41015011	Anĩ ere, pris odudug tamo kayau waud dale fen, dirokenẽdi di, idi Jesus ban Barabas anĩ Pailatem yaliskenẽdiyouf nigin diron.
41015012	Pailat idi to fiyẽdin, “Juda neid king gedig anĩ, aya ĩ nigin naig afiyẽf?”
41015013	Idi diweig diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf!”
41015014	Pailat idi to fiyẽdin, “Ere nigin? Ere mosor ĩ age fen?” Anĩ ere, idi totol bagai diweig diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf!”
41015015	Tamo kayau waud el fouf nigin, Pailat Barabas yaliskenẽdin. Pailat irõ di, Jesus wagĩ difiye ken, aa tetek bun dũf nigin, kusĩ tamo imeid bun inon.
41015016	Kusĩ tamo idi, Jesus dale dirou gawaman mudur nẽ fõ aaben dile fen, kusĩ tamo ganan diweignẽdi di, guru difen.
41015017	Idi gabar kadaũ difounkenen, age de fen, idi malũ duri ado dale, teter tanak kori de fen, ĩ mudur bun kurũ difen.
41015018	Age de fen, idi ĩ diweig dirokenen, “O, Juda neid king gai gai ibodõf!”
41015019	Baba baban idi werĩ tibog nem mudur bun du ken, disisnen. Idi iboreid bobou de, kususu de fen, ketẽ difiyen.
41015020	Idi ketẽ difiye kel fen, gabar kadaũ dinukeis, yogon gabar bagai anĩ difounkenen. Age de fen, idi ĩ aa tetek bun dũf nigin dirou diselen.
41015021	Tamo taka Sairini tamal, yana Simon, Aleksanda Rufus ado neid temeid, ĩ yogon fonom isi, luwen wal fediyoũ mog, idi Jesus nẽ aa tetek faali fouf nigin nugo difiyen.
41015022	Idi Jesus modoũ yana Golgota (anĩ nẽ gariya, Mudur Tuwa nẽ Modoũ) an dirou diselen.
41015023	Age de fen, idi Jesus darau naal to karĩ youf nigin wain marasin taka ado falei de difenen, anĩ ere, ĩ to yon.
41015024	Idi ĩ aa tetek bun du ken, in gabar foi de fen, aibem ereb anĩ yalouf nigin aisaĩ kodẽ den.
41015025	Bonimei nain kilok bun, idi ĩ aa tetek bun dun.
41015026	Jesus bouwa yũya od eig de ditoton: JUDA NEID KING.
41015027	Idi bẽ tamo urug, ĩ geid aa tetek bun didenen, taka Jesus ima biyalẽ, taka ima kilẽ.
41015029	Tamo kayau dile disi dife, kono difiye ken, kasã difiyẽ, mudureid dira ken, diron, “Õ, tempel narĩ afel fen, baban naa towo bun anouf, won,
41015030	õ ogo nigin usenne ken, aa tetek bun tamal kutũ weis!”
41015031	Age difiyen gen, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, idi dogo dogol wogõ de fen, ĩ ketẽ difiyen. Idi diron, “Ĩ tunĩ isennẽdidig, anĩ ere, ĩ yogo isennẽya kisi feleya sã!
41015032	Kristus enĩ, Israel neid King, utornẽg len, gama aa tetek bun tamal kutũ yeis len, tail fen, momoi tauf.” Idi ĩ geid aa tetek bun didenẽdineg, ĩ kono difiyen.
41015033	Gaa atun tuwelf kilok bun, gugum isi, teneub ganan kerũ fel ile, tri kilok aragaun.
41015034	Aragau tri kilok bun, Jesus wade bagai iweig iron, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” –ani nẽ gariya, “Neu Negur, neu Negur, ere nigin õ aya utornal?”
41015035	Tunĩ melsã difaren, anĩ karĩ de fen, idi diron, “Karĩg, ĩ Eliya iweignek.”
41015036	Tamo taka gudu re ile, spons yalen, wain makik ado bun nu feis fen, tibog bun ino fen, Jesus yãf nigin ifenen. Agef fen, ĩ iron, “Gama utornẽg. Eliya isi yaleisnẽ mog, tailauf.”
41015037	Jesus ait odug nem iweig fen, laa fen.
41015038	Tempel nẽ gabar faraf uru fen, ilunenem irousil teneburen.
41015039	Kusĩ tamo neid orowa, Jesus wagen an ifaren anĩ, in kaĩya anĩ karĩ ye, in laa anĩ ile fen, iron, “Momoi bagai, tamo enĩ Negur Naal!”
41015040	Kayau tunĩ so del difar fen, lo difen. Idi atun, Maria Magdala, taka Maria, Jems naal bagai Joses ado neid sineid, taka Salome.
41015041	Galili an kayau enidi Jesus dõ difiye ken, aruna dalen. Kayau musei, Jesus geid Jerusalem diselen anidig an difaren.
41015042	Naa are dodok fiya nẽ naa (naa anĩ bure fele di, Sabat naa wõ youf). Aragau mog,
41015043	Josef, Arimatea tamal, ĩ kaunsel neid odug taka, ĩ yogo anĩ Negur nẽ tano tari fen, ĩ kumĩ sã Pailat garan ile, Jesus bouwa buru yalouf nigin to fiyen.
41015044	Pailat Jesus mogo laa fel ya anĩ karĩ ye fen, terẽ yen. Ĩ kusĩ tamo neid orowa iweigne ken, Jesus mogo be laa fel anĩ, ĩ to fiyen.
41015045	Sain ĩ kusĩ tamo neid orowa bun laa fel ya karĩ ye fen, ĩ Jesus bouwa buru yaleya nigin Josef yo fiyen.
41015046	Age fe di, Josef gabar lalau na yale fen, bouwa buru yaleis, gabar lalau anim sile fen. Agef fen, ĩ matmat sa bun ku dalen anĩ kur inenen. Gama ĩ meein wele fe di, matmat bobog katĩ felen.
41015047	Maria Magdala, Maria Joses nẽ sina ado, ĩ dinenen modoũ anĩ dilen.
41016001	Sabat naa bure fele di, Maria Magdala, Maria Jems sina, Salome anidim dile, Jesus bouwa bun wã difouf nigin, moul sumeĩ biya na gei difen.
41016002	Uub nẽ naa matu bun bonimei bagai, we kurã fel mog, idi matmat bun naab diyok dile fen,
41016003	idi abob to difen, “Aim matmat bobog bun meein wele fel kanadauf?”
41016004	Age de fen, meleid diran, idi meein odug biya anĩ wele feleya dilen.
41016005	Idi meku namen dilen, tamo gaũ taka gabar lalau ifounkel, ima biya melem ibod mog, dile fen, terẽ den.
41016006	Ĩ iron, “To terẽ wog, ã Jesus Nasaret tamal aa tetek bun dun anĩ umirnẽgef. Ĩ mogo fã yel! Ĩ ein sã. Idi ĩ dinenẽ yenen modoũ anĩ uleg.
41016007	Anĩ ere, uleg, in dõ fiya tar Pita geid urokenẽdig, ‘Ĩ ketem Galili ilef. An ĩ ulogouf, ĩ irokenein kilei.’”
41016008	Idi terẽ de fen, waud firagagaũ felen, anĩ nigin, kayau idi ulolõ deis, meku ditor diyawon. Idi kumĩ den nigin, aib taka to dirokenen. [Itotoya tunĩ kulu bagai od gariya dino fen, ditoton anĩ bun, Mak 16:9-20 to ibodok.]
41016009	Jesus, uub nẽ naa matu bun bonimei bagai, fã ye fen, ĩ Maria Magdala bun ketem wõ yen, kulu Jesus kaa sesen sewen kayau anĩ bun irudin.
41016010	Ĩ ile, idi Jesus geid diyon anidi, waud gudũf fen, marudim difen anĩ irokenẽdin.
41016011	Idi, Jesus mata fã yel, kayau ĩ ilel ya anĩ karĩ de fen, waud to momoi den.
41016012	Dum in dõ fiya tar uru naab diyok dile mog, Jesus bouwa fire bunem, idi atun wõ yen.
41016013	Age fe di, idi keku de disi, an difaren anidi dirokenẽdin, anĩ ere, idi nigineg to momoi den.
41016014	Dum idi Ilewen, saaf doko dibod mog, Jesus idi bun wõ ye fen, ou fiyẽdin, ere nigin, idi Jesus fã yel mog, dilen anĩ to momoi de fen, waud katĩ difelen nigin.
41016015	Jesus irokenẽdin, “Ã teneub ganan bun uleg fen, biya od tamo kayau ganan urokenẽdig.
41016016	Taka ĩ momoi ye fen, naan yalef are, ĩ kel yalouf, taka ĩ to momoi yef are, es fiya bun inenẽf.
41016017	Momoi def idi, uris enidi idi bun wõ youf, idi aya yanau nem kaa sesen dirudiyouf, idi od mata mata wogõ douf.
41016018	Idi imedim gogour dale diroudiyouf, takag, laa nẽ mũ sane dãf, to mũ idenẽdiyouf, takag, idi dagi tamo bun imeid dino di, dagi sa kalauf.”
41016019	Odug Jesus irokeneĩd bure fele di, Negur Jesus yale, saa ilun irou isel, Negur ima biyalẽ ibodok.
41016020	Anĩ nigin, in dõ fiya tar dile, teneub ganan bun biya od wogõ den. Age dife di, Odug idi ado kabĩ yale di, uris bunem yogon od anĩ megeir fen.
42001001	Musei idi, amã atun ereb ereb wowã yen anĩ, ditotauf nigin age difen,
42001002	are biya od nẽ kabĩ tamo uyulil dibod ken, meledim dilen anidi bun tamal, anĩ wogõ difaman.
42001003	Age fiya nigin, aya yug bagai, gariya bunem ereb wowã yen anĩ ganan amir ailen, are aya kisi afen, tamo odug Teofilus õ bun el fe, itotoya nigin biya bagai aun,
42001004	anĩ bunem, õ ereb ereb difelnon are momoi yeya anĩ keleĩ youf.
42001005	Herod Judia nẽ king ibodon sain bun, pris taka ibodon, in yana Sekaraia, ĩ Abiya nẽ pris bun tamal taka, in aiwa Elisabet ĩg Aron nẽ ibor bun tamal.
42001006	Idi urom Negur mala bun madur dibodon, idi Odug nẽ ĩtãfiya ganan ado nun el de, tutuk dõ difedig.
42001007	Anĩ ere, idi urom kesu sã, ere nigin, Elisabet ĩ dali, kesu gõ fiya kisi feleya sã, agef fen, idi urom tubau bagai.
42001008	Sain taka bun, Sekaraia, ne kabĩ tura tar geid kabĩ dale mog, ĩ Negur nẽ pris kabĩ yale fen,
42001009	pris idi neid tobonunã bunem, Odug nẽ tempel namen ile fen, aa gaula sumeĩ biya tõ fiya nigin aisaĩ kodẽ bunem ĩ digirnen.
42001010	Aa gaula sumeĩ biya tõ fiya saine di, idi Odug yana dalesedig ganan mayarẽ kosẽ den.
42001011	Agef mog, Odug nẽ engel, ĩ bun wõ ye, alta aa gaula sumeĩ biya tõ fiyadig anĩ ima biyalẽ ifaren.
42001012	Age fe di, Sekaraia ĩ ile fen, ĩ terẽ ye mã, kumĩ ye fen, dẽ yelen.
42001013	Anĩ ere, engel ĩ irokenen, “Õ to kumĩ wo, Sekaraia, ogon kosẽya are Negur ĩ karĩ yen. Ogon aiwã Elisabet ĩ, ogon kesu monog gõ fouf, age fe di, in yana ũ, Jon wouf.
42001014	Ĩ bunem waũ kulĩya ado waũ al fiya õ bun ibodõf, age fe di, musei ĩ gõ fouf bun waud al fouf,
42001015	ere nigin, Odug mala bun ĩ yana odug adouf, ĩ wain be, aai naan totol falei difef anĩg to yãf, agef fen, ĩ sina namenem Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyẽf.
42001016	Israel tamo kayau musei fau inim, Odug, nedi Negur wagen kel gurif irou ilauf.
42001017	Agef fen, ĩ Eliya nẽ uur ado megeir bunem, Odug fau ileya sã mog, ĩ ket uyu irou ile fen, temeid tar, naaluid tar nigin waud yenẽf nigin ado, fe temeleid idi madur ibodõya nẽ kisi biya bun ileya nigin falei fe fen, tamo kayau Odug nẽ anidi saika fediyouf.”
42001018	Sekaraia engel to fiyen, “Naig afe fen, aya enei keleĩ youf? Aya neu kayau ado urom mabodok masi, tubau bagaif.”
42001019	Engel aiten yale iron, “Aya Gabriel. Aya Negur mala bun afaredig, anĩ nigin, aya õ wogõ yõya nigin ado, biya od enei irokonõya nigin sur fiyal.
42001020	Anĩ gama õ ait ufokol fen, od to wogõ wof ule, anĩ wõ youf naa bun, ere nigin, õ neu od to momoi wol, od enei are fau yogon sain bun bagai, kaũ wõ youf.”
42001021	Age fe di, tamo kayau Sekaraia tari de fen, idi ĩ sain meluk tempel namen ibodon nigin kisi musei dalen.
42001022	Ĩ ulõ yesin sain bun, ĩ wogõ fiyẽdiya kisi feleya san. Age fe di, idi kelein, ĩ tempel namen mala seleulã kurãf fen, ereb taka ilel, ere nigin, ĩ imam dogol ifelneĩd fen, ĩ wogõya sã ibodok ilen.
42001023	In kabĩ nẽ sain bure fele di, ĩ fõ bun kel ilen.
42001024	Anĩ bure fele di, in aiwa Elisabet bou adon, agef fen, ogõ faif ĩ iminkel ibodon.
42001025	Ĩ iron, “Odugem enei age fanan. Naa eneidi bun, ĩ yogon oroya ado wau ifenẽya ifelnan, agef fen, neu mama tamo kayau atun yalelkanan.”
42001026	Ogõ sigis bun, Negur, engel Gabriel Nasaret taun, oun Galili teneub, sur fiyẽ di, ile,
42001027	kayau taulei, tamo yana Josef, Dawid nẽ ibor bun tamalem yalouf nigin digirin gein ilen. Kayau taulei yana Maria.
42001028	Engel ĩ gein ile fen, iron, “Fel, õ nigin Negur fatuk el yok. Odug õ ado ibodok.”
42001029	Maria in od nigin wau fatuk togu fen, aanya enei naig fiya nigin ye fen, kisi musei yalen.
42001030	Anĩ ere, engel ĩ irokenen, “Maria, õ to kumĩ wo, õ Negur nẽ wau el fiya gurug wol.
42001031	Õ fau kesu ado fen, kesu monog gõ wouf, ago fen, yana ũ, Jesus wouf.
42001032	Ĩ fau odug wõ ye di, Negur Ilun Bagai Naal douf. Negur Odug yogo, king nẽ modoũ tama Dawid nẽ anĩ, ĩ ifenẽf.
42001033	Age fe di, ĩ Jakop nẽ ibor bun king gai ibodkalauf, in tano to sa kalauf.”
42001034	Maria engel to fiyen, “Aya fau mois, eĩ naig fe wõ youf?”
42001035	Engel ĩ aiten yale iron, “Awa Uur Fateul õ bun isiyouf, age fe di, Negur Ilun Bagai nẽ megeir kerub yõf. Anĩ bunem fateul bagai gõ wouf are, yana Negur Naal douf.
42001036	Ogon sirag Elisabeteg tubau mog, kesu yalouf, ĩ dali den, anĩ mogo ogõ sigis ĩ bou ado ibodok.
42001037	Ere nigin, ereb taka anĩ Negur bun malai sã.”
42001038	Maria ĩ aiten yale iron, “Aya Odug nẽ kabĩ kayau, aya bun od sã, õ urok kilei od sã agef wõ youf.” Age ye di, engel ĩ itornẽ ilen.
42001039	Sain anĩ bun, Maria dodok fel, kaisã bagai taun taka arei bun, Judia distrik nediwon ilen.
42001040	An ĩ Sekaraia nẽ fõ bun wõ ye fen, Elisabet fel fiyen.
42001041	Sain Elisabet Maria nẽ fel ya anĩ karĩ ye fen, kesu sina namen ibodon anĩ okĩ yen, age fe di, Elisabet Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyen.
42001042	Ĩ ait odugem iweig iron, “Kayau ganan atun, Negur õ el yok. Agef fen, kesu gõ wouf anĩg, Negur ĩ el fiyek!
42001043	Anĩ ere, aya naig fiya bagai nigin, neu Odug nẽ sina anĩ aya bun isif?
42001044	Ogon fel ya nẽ ait wederoun ile mog bagai, momou nameun al fe fen, okĩ yel.
42001045	Kayau taka, ĩ ereb Odug ĩ irokenek are agef kisi fel wõ youf, ye fen, momoi yef, are Negur ĩ el fiyek!”
42001046	Age fe di, Maria iron: “Neu malaukanon Odug yana yalesef,
42001047	agef fen, neu uur Negur Isennaya nigin kulĩ yef,
42001048	ere nigin, ĩ, aya yogon kabĩ kayau maleg nigin kisi fatuk yalen. Sain enei bunem ilauf ganan, ibor ganan Negur ĩ el fiyen douf,
42001049	ere nigin, Negur Megeir Barikã ĩ aya bun ereb odug age fel, ĩ yana fateul ibodok.
42001050	In wau yũya, ĩ nigin anini def bun tobol fouf, ibor gama ibodok enei ado, dumen isiyouf idi buneg gai gai ibodkalauf.
42001051	Ĩ yogo imam kabĩ totol odug biya age fedin, ĩ idi neid kisi bun yeneid dalesef anĩ irudi di, firagagaũ difen.
42001052	Ĩ yeneid adodo, nedi modoũ bun yalelneĩd fen, maleg anĩ yalesnẽdin.
42001053	Ĩ idi naũ fedif anĩ, ereb ereb biya ifeneĩd fen, idi safineid adodo daku irudin.
42001054	Ĩ amã tubumã tar irokenẽdin kilei, ĩ yogon kabĩ tamo Israel isennen,
42001055	agef fen, Abraham ado in ibor nẽ tubu tar bun faimud, wau yũya ifenẽdiya nigin karĩ yeledig.”
42001056	Maria, Elisabet ado ogõ towo age fiya dibod ken, fõ bun kel ilen.
42001057	Elisabet nẽ kesu gõ fiya sain wõ ye di, ĩ kesu monog gõ fen.
42001058	Ĩ ne tã tar, in sirag tar geid, Negur nẽ wau yũya odug ifelnen anĩ karĩ de fen, idi weim waud al fen.
42001059	Naa eit bun, idi mulũ nigin kesu bou gudũ fiya nigin disin, age de fen, ĩ yana dũ, tama nẽ dait Sekaraia douf nigin age difen.
42001060	Anĩ ere, ne sina aitedin yale iron, “Age fiya sã! Ĩ yana Jon ye yauf.”
42001061	Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Ogon sirag tar atun, yana age fiya taka sã.”
42001062	Age de fen, in tama bun kesu yana aib youf anĩ karĩ douf nigin, uris difenen.
42001063	Age dife di, ĩ itotoya nẽ safina nigin to fiyẽdin, agef fen, “Ĩ yana Jon,” ye itoto di, idi ganan terẽ den.
42001064	Sain anĩ bun bagai, ĩ awa kakã ye di, bale faraf yale ulõ yalaisi di, ĩ wogõ ye fen, Negur yana yalesen.
42001065	Ne tã tar terẽ de fen, anini den, age de fen, Judia neid arein, fonõ fonõ wogagã de fen, ereb wõ yen anĩ ganan wogõ den.
42001066	Adok anĩ karĩ de fen, kisi musei dale fen, to difen, “Kesu enei naig fiya wõ youf?” Ere nigin, Odug nẽ ima ĩ bun ibodon.
42001067	In tama Sekaraia Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyẽ di, ĩ profet od eig ye wogõ yen:
42001068	“Odug seli tabiyouf, Israel neid Negur, ere nigin, ĩ isi fen, in tamo kayau kafĩ fiya bun tamal kel gei fel.
42001069	Ĩ yogon kabĩ tamo Dawid nẽ fõ bun, isennadaya megeir ado yalesel ifaref,
42001070	(are ĩ yogon profet fateul kulu temeleid sigoreid bun wogõ den kilei).
42001071	Nemã kiwai tar ado, amã nigin to orodif anĩ imeid bun tamal, kel yalemãf.
42001072	Nemã tamamã tar nigin wau yũya anĩ ifelneĩd fen, ĩ yogon bar itenẽya fateul anĩ karĩ yelen.
42001073	Ĩ wau kuturol fen, nemã tamamã Abraham irokenen.
42001074	Nemã kiwai tar imeid bun tamal kel gei famãf, agef fen, amã kumĩ sã ĩ aruna yaleya kisi falauf nigin.
42001075	Amã nemã mabodok malauf bun, ĩ mala bun gai fateul bagai fen, madur bagai mabodõf nigin.
42001076	“Age fe di, õ neu kesu, Negur Ilun Bagai nẽ profet douf, ere nigin, õ uyu urou fen, Odug nẽ naab dodok wouf.
42001077	In tamo kayau neid mosor nigin wedereid tu kalauf bunem, kel yalediyouf nẽ keleĩ wenẽdiyouf.
42001078	Are nemã Negur molol nem wau yũya bunem, anĩ bun gaa kurã fiya, saa ilunem amã bun isiyouf.
42001079	Are idi gugum bun difaref ado, laa nẽ buri bun difaref anidi bun, fula fouf, age fe di, nemã yemã delẽ anidi bun madur marã di, wau inosiya bun malauf.”
42001080	Age fe di, kesu biya fen, uur orib yen, ĩ gerere tuan ibodok ile, dum ĩ Israel tamo kayau meleid bun wõ yen.
42002001	Sain anĩ bun, Sisa Ogastus, Rom teneub ganan bun, tamo kayau an temeleid anĩ yeneid yaleya nigin od inon.
42002002	(Eĩ urug bagai, sain Kwirinius ĩ Siria nẽ gawaman mudur ibod mog, tamo kayau yeneid dalen.)
42002003	Anĩ nigin, ganan dogo dogo neid taun bun yeneid inoya nigin dilen.
42002004	Anĩ nigin, Josef ĩg, oun Galili teneub Nasaret taun bun tamal Judia iselen, Betlehem Dawid nẽ taun bun iselen, ere nigin, ĩ Dawid nẽ fonõ ado in ibor bun tamal.
42002005	Ĩ Maria ado yeneid dinouf nigin diselen, ĩ Maria aiwauf nigin digirin, anĩ ĩ bou ado.
42002006	Idi an dibod mog, kesu gõ fiya sain wõ yen.
42002007	Age fe di, kesu monog matu gõ fen. Maria ĩ gabar nem silef fen, yaro neid beĩ bun inenen, ere nigin, tamo irouya fõ bun modoũ isokosen.
42002008	An gaar lo fediya tamo, melsã fonõ yerin dibod ken, bõ nedi gaar lo difedin.
42002009	Age de mog, Odug nẽ engel idi bun wõ yen, age fe di, Odug nẽ fula fiya medeĩya kerub fedi di, idi kumĩ tererẽ den.
42002010	Anĩ ere, engel idi irokenẽdin, “Ã to kumĩ wog, aya od biya, tamo kayau ganan waud al fouf nigin arou asif.
42002011	Ere nigin, gama Dawid nẽ taun bun, ãgenei isenneĩya wõ yel, ĩ anĩ Kristus Odug.
42002012	Enei ã bun uris. Ã momou taka gabar nem sile de fen, yaro neid beĩ bun dinenem yenek anĩ ulogouf.”
42002013	Kaisã bagai, engel musei saa ilun temeleid ulolõ deis, engel anĩ geid Negur yana dales diron,
42002014	“Negur ilun bagai bun fula fiya medeĩya, age fe di, tenebur ein tamo kayau ĩ el fedif bun, wau inosiya ibodõf.”
42002015	Sain engel idi ditorneĩd, saa ilun disele di, gaar lo fiya tamo abob dirokenen, “Odug ada irokanadal anĩ nigin, ada Betlehem teleg, ereb wõ yel anĩ taileg.”
42002016	Anĩ nigin, idi kaisã bagai dile, Maria, Josef ado diledin, momou yaro neid beĩ bun yen mog, dilen.
42002017	Idi ĩ dile fen, idi kesu anĩ nigin wogõ fiyẽdin anĩ od wogõ de diyon.
42002018	Age dife di, ganan karĩ den idi, gaar lo fiya tamo wogõ difiyẽdin anĩ nigin terẽ den.
42002019	Anĩ ere, Maria od anĩ ganan yale fen, waun ino fen, kisim dogol fen.
42002020	Gaar lo fiya tamo keku de fen, idi wogõ fiyẽdin kilei, ereb idi karĩ den ado dilen anĩ ganan nigin, Negur seli dabi fen, yana dalesen.
42002021	Naa eit bun, ĩ mulũ ileya saine di, ĩ yana dũ, Jesus den, yana are sina fau bou ado ya sã mog, engelem yun.
42002022	Idi neid nonorou lilik fiya naa, Moses nẽ Lo ifaref kilei anĩ bure fele di, Josef Maria ado, Jesus Jerusalem, Odug ifenẽya nigin dirou diselen,
42002023	(are Odug nẽ Lo itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Kesu matu monog wõ douf ganan, Odug wenẽdigouf”),
42002024	idi Negur sesewi fiya difenẽf nigin diselen, Odug nẽ Lo eig ye irok kilei, “kuburir uru be, kukutir balas uru be.”
42002025	Gama Jerusalem an tamo yana Simeon ibodon, ĩ madur bagai fen, Odug nigin karĩ yeledig. Ĩ Israel waud inosiya dalouf anĩ tari fedig, Awa Uur Fateul ĩ bun ibodon.
42002026	Awa Uur Fateulem, ĩ fau to laaf mog, Odug nẽ Kristus wõ ye di, ilouf nigin irokenen.
42002027	Awa Uurem toli fiyẽ di, ĩ tempel nẽ modoũ bun ilen. Sain tama sina ado, Lo irok kilei age difouf nigin, kesu Jesus dirou dile di,
42002028	Simeon imam ĩ yales fen, Negur yana yales iron:
42002029	“Odug, õ uron kilei, õ gama ogon ferfer wau inosiya ado sur wo di, ilauf.
42002030	Aya malaum bagai ogon isennẽya anĩ ailel.
42002031	Are ganan meleid bun saika won.
42002032	Are haiden Israel sã anidi bun, Negur nẽ oroya kurõ falaisiya nẽ lalan, ago di, are ogon tamo kayau Israel bun fula fiya medeĩya.”
42002033	Kesu tama sina ado, od anĩ karĩ de fen, kisi bun terefeit den.
42002034	Age dife di, Simeon el fiya ifeneĩd fen, sina Maria irokenen, “Kesu enĩ, Israel tamo kayau musei kuku douf, musei fafã douf nigin ado, ĩ daũ gen ifare di, ĩ dumen od sane dirõf nẽ uris wõ youf nigin igirnen.
42002035	Anĩ bunem, musei waud bun dinokok are yaorouf. Age fe di, ogon malãkanon anĩg dig otem borũ fouf.”
42002036	Profet kayau takag ibodon, Ana, Fanuel ne barai, Aser nẽ ibor bun tamal. Ĩ gai tubau bagai, ĩ tamo yale fen, aiwa ado yar sewen dibodon.
42002037	Agef fen, ĩ waab ibodok ile, in yar eiti-fo. Ĩ tempel to itoron, bõ ado gaa ado kuri ye fen, kosẽ ye, Negur yana yalesedig.
42002038	Sain anĩ bun bagai, ĩ idi gein isel, Negur de fiye ken, Jerusalem tamo kayau kafĩ fiya bun tamal kel yalediyouf nigin ganan tari de difaren anidi, kesu anĩ nigin wogõ fiyẽdin.
42002039	Josef, Maria ado, Odug nẽ Lo irok anĩ ganan dõ de kisi fele di, idi baban ke de, Galili teneub oun, nedi taun Nasaret dilen.
42002040	An, kesu ĩ biya fen, totol adon, ĩ kisi biya barikan, agef fen, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ĩ bun ibodon.
42002041	Yar ganan bun, in tama sina Pasa Sifa naa bun Jerusalem taun diledig.
42002042	Sain ĩ tuwelf yar mog, idi neid tobonunã dõ de fen, Sifa bun diselen.
42002043	Sifa bure fele di, in tama sina fonõ ke de dile mog, kesu Jesus ĩ fau Jerusalem ibodon, anĩ ere, idi to kelein.
42002044	Idi weim melef den, age de fen, naa tekelei diyon. Age dife fen, idi mogo nedi sirag tar bun ado, nedi tã tar atun dimirnen.
42002045	Idi ĩ to dile mã, idi ĩ dimirnẽ fenẽ nigin, Jerusalem taun baban ke de dilen.
42002046	Naa towo bure fele di, idi ĩ tempel modoũ bun ifelnẽdiya tamo atun ibod, karĩ fiyeĩd fen, to fiyeĩd mog, fotou difiyen.
42002047	Ganan ĩ karĩ difiyen are, in karĩya nigin ado aiteid solo fen anĩ nigin, terefeit den.
42002048	Tama sina ado ĩ dile fen, fatuk bagai terẽ den. Sina ĩ irokenen, “Neu kesu, ere nigin eig wamam? Aya tamã ado waumã morõ ken, mamirnom.”
42002049	Ĩ to fen, “Ere nigin ã aya umirnagel? Aya neu Dei nẽ fõ bun abodõf ya, ã keleĩ sã de?”
42002050	Anĩ ere, ĩ ereb irokenẽdin are, idi to kelein.
42002051	Age dife di, ĩ weim Nasaret disil fen, sigoreid dõf el fen. Anĩ ere, in sina anĩ ganan yale, waun inon.
42002052	Jesus kisi biya ado bouwa orib yen, Negur ado tamo nẽ lo fiya bun biya len.
42003001	Taiberius, Sisa mudur ibodon yar fiftin bun, Pontius Pailat ĩ Judia distrik nẽ gawaman mudur ibodon, Herod ĩ Galili distrik lo fen, ĩ tura Filip Ituria distrik ado Trakonitis distrik lo fen, age fe di, Lisanias ĩ Abilene distrik lo fen.
42003002	Anas Kaiafas ado pris mudur dibodon sain bun, Negur nẽ od gerere tuan oun Jon, Sekaraia naal bun isin.
42003003	Ĩ Jordan naan kalilĩ fiya ganan bun iyo ken, waud falei de fen, naan digũ di, mosor yalel kenẽdiyouf nigin biya od wogõ yen.
42003004	Are profet Asaia nẽ itotoya bun ibodok kilei: “Ait taka gerere tuan iweig irok, ‘Odug nẽ naab dodok ge fen, madur wenẽg.
42003005	Uus ganan bun kurokirĩya yoso fouf, arei ganan mudu ganan ado gudũ falaisi tenebur ouf. Naab goigul yedin, madur fouf, naab koũkĩ yediya yoso fediyouf.
42003006	Age fe di, tamo kayau ganan, Negur nẽ tamo kayau kel gei fiya anĩ dilouf.’”
42003007	Tamo kayau Jonem naan igunẽdiyouf nigin guru difen anidi Jon irokenẽdin, “Ã, gogour sane gere tar! Negur nẽ didi isiyouf anĩ wal ge fen, uyagauf nigin, aim irokenein?
42003008	Wauĩ falei gef are, faat biya ũ gouf. Ã aug nigin to eig ge urõg, ‘Abraham nemã tamamã.’ Aya arokeneik, meein enidi Negur sã irõ di, Abraham gere tar wowã douf.
42003009	Safor aayũ gariyan mogo ibodok, aayũ ganan faat biya to yuk, are itu ira ken, yã malan irãf.”
42003010	Tamo kayau guru difen anidim to difen, “Age fiyauf are, amã naig mafouf?”
42003011	Jon aitedin yale iron, “Tamo ĩ gabar uru adouf are, aib ĩ sã anĩ taka ifenẽf, takag, taka ĩ saaf adouf, areg de age fouf.”
42003012	Takis yaleya tamog, naan igũya nigin disin, idi to difen, “Tise, amã ere naig mafouf?”
42003013	Ĩ irokenẽdin, “Ã yaleya kilei anĩ to wal woseg waleg.”
42003014	Age fe di, kusĩ tamo tunĩ to difiyen, “Ba amã ere naig mafouf?” Age de di, ĩ iron, “Ã nedi moni nigin ge fen, to fefu wiyẽdig fen, idegẽya bunem tamo kayau bouweid bun od to ũg. Ãgenei kabĩ mala walegedig anĩ bun dogol al gouf.”
42003015	Tamo kayau Kristus nigin tari difen, anĩ nigin, idi ganan waud bun Jon anĩ Kristus be de fen, kisi musei dalen.
42003016	Jon idi ganan aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Aya naan nem naan aguneik. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ in megeir neu wal fiya fau isif, aya to biya nigin, ayam in su nẽ malũ biru felediya kisi feleya sã. Ĩ Awa Uur Fateul yã ado nem naan iguneĩf.
42003017	Ĩ es fiya nẽ fok iman ado, ĩ yogon mayã waĩ fouf, yogon wit biya are yogon ki bun kuruf fen, wit ido yã mala faimud bun an irãf.”
42003018	Agef fen, Jon od musei bunem, tamo kayau waud yale fen, biya od wogõ fiyẽdin.
42003019	Anĩ ere, Jonem, Herod tano anĩ nẽ mudur, tura nẽ aiwa Herodias nigin ado ereb ereb sane ganan age fen nigin ou fiyẽ di,
42003020	Herod mosor ganan mosor enei ado baguf fen, ĩ Jon kalabus bun inenen.
42003021	Sain Jonem tamo kayau ganan naan iguneĩd fen, Jesus ĩg naan igunen. Age fe di, Jesus kosẽ ye mog, saa kã fele di,
42003022	Awa Uur Fateul kuburir bouwa bun genem ĩ bun isin. Age fe di, ait taka saa ilunem isin, “Õ neu Kesu, õ nigin aya wau laa fedig, õ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig.”
42003023	Gama Jesus yogo ĩ yar teti age fiya bun kabĩ gariya inon. Tamo kayau kisi difen, ĩ Josef naal den, Heli naal,
42003024	Matat naal, Lewi naal, Melki naal, Janai naal, Josef naal,
42003025	Matatias naal, Amos naal, Nahum naal, Esli naal, Nagai naal,
42003026	Mat naal, Matatias naal, Semen naal, Josek naal, Joda naal,
42003027	Joanan naal, Resa naal, Serubabel naal, Sieltiel naal, Neri naal,
42003028	Melki naal, Adi naal, Kosam naal, Elmadam naal, Er naal,
42003029	Josua naal, Elieser naal, Jorim naal, Matat naal, Lewi naal,
42003030	Simeon naal, Juda naal, Josef naal, Jonam naal, Eliakim naal,
42003031	Melea naal, Mena naal, Matata naal, Natan naal, Dawid naal,
42003032	Jesi naal, Obed naal, Boas naal, Salmon naal, Nason naal,
42003033	Aminadab naal, Ram naal, Hesron naal, Peres naal, Juda naal,
42003034	Jakop naal, Isak naal, Abraham naal, Tera naal, Nahor naal,
42003035	Serug naal, Reu naal, Peleg naal, Eber naal, Sela naal,
42003036	Kainan naal, Arpaksad naal, Sem naal, Noa naal, Lamek naal,
42003037	Metusela naal, Enok naal, Jared naal, Mahalalel naal, Kenan naal,
42003038	Enos naal, Set naal, Adam naal, Negur naal.
42004001	Jesus Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyen, Jordan naanum kel fen, Awa Uurem itonẽ, gerere tuan irou ilen.
42004002	An ĩ naa foti ibod mog, Satanem kisi fiyen. Ĩ sain anĩ bun ereb taka to yon, naa foti bure fele di, ĩ naũ fen.
42004003	Agef mog, Satanem Jesus irokenen, “Õ Negur Naal ouf are, meein enei urokenẽ di, bret falei fouf.”
42004004	Jesus Satan aiten yale iron, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, ‘Tamo bretem dogol to mata ifenẽf.’”
42004005	Satan Jesus yale irou, modoũ ilun isel fen, kaisã bagai teneub enei nẽ tano ganan ifelnen.
42004006	Agef fen, Satan Jesus irokenen, “Aya õ teneub enei nẽ biya fiya megeir ado ganan afonõf, ere nigin, are aya ifanan, anĩ nigin, aya aib taka ifenẽya orouf are afenẽf.
42004007	Anĩ nigin, õ aya selu wabiyouf are, onou ganan are ogon ouf.”
42004008	Jesus Satan aiten yale iron, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, ‘Odug ogon Negur seli wabi fen, ĩ dogol aruna walouf.’
42004009	Satan Jesus yale irou, Jerusalem taun ilen, an tempel fõ soko ilun bagai inenẽ, ifaren. Satan iron, “Õ Negur Naal ouf are, ogo einenem ufũ urã.
