42004010	Ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok: “‘Negur õ nigin yogon engel ari fedi di, kulatun diyõf,
42004011	idi õ imedim ololon daleyõf, age dife di, õ yẽ meein takam to itutu ouf.’”
42004012	Jesus Satan aiten yale iron, “Eig ye irok, ‘Odug ogon Negur kisi fiya bun to unenẽ.’”
42004013	Satan kisi fiya enei ganan bure fel fen, ĩ Jesus itorne ken, ĩ fau sain taka anĩ tari fen.
42004014	Jesus Awa Uur nẽ megeir bunem Galili kel ilen, age fe di, ĩ nigin od Galili teneub fonõ fonõ ganan iyokelen.
42004015	Ĩ idi neid uub fõ fõ bun biya od ifelnẽdi di, ganan ĩ yana dalesen.
42004016	Ĩ Nasaret ilen, ĩ an biyan nẽ, agef fen, Sabat naa bun, idi neid uub fõ namen ilen, gai age fedig gen. Agef fen, ĩ iwesauf nigin fã ye ifaren.
42004017	Age fe di, profet Asaia nẽ itotoya buk kori fiya anĩ difenen, age dife di, ĩ fara fel fen, eig ye itoton anĩ imiren:
42004018	“Odug nẽ Awa Uur aya bun ibodok, ere nigin, ĩ aya maleg anidi biya od wogõ afediyouf nigin, igirna fen, mudurou bun moul fi felen. Ĩ, aya kalabus bun difaref anidi karika dalouf nigin ado, meleid ifofakeleya anidi meleid fara falauf nigin, kurõ afalaisiyouf nigin sur fiyan. Tamo kayau tunim kiwai difeneĩd fen, morõ difenẽdif anidi yalel kenẽdiya nigin sur fiyan.
42004019	Takag, Odug nẽ biya fiya nẽ yar anĩ kurõ afalaisiyouf nigin sur fiyan.”
42004020	Age yel fen, ĩ gaar gabar itotoya ado are korif fen, itotoya anĩ lo fedig tamo, kel ifen ken, ibodon. Juda neid uub fõ anĩ bun difaren ganan bagai, Jesus lo difelen.
42004021	Age dife di, ĩ gariya ino fen, irokenẽdin, “Gama naa enĩ bun, Negur nẽ Itotoya enei, ãgenei karĩya bun kisi felel.”
42004022	Ganan ĩ yana dales fen, ĩ sigoron, wau ifenẽya od wogõ yen anĩ nigin terẽ den. Age de fen, idi to difen, “Eĩ Josef naal anĩ sã de?”
42004023	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Momoi bagai, aya nigin od enei tamo kayau musei wogõ dedig wogõ gouf, ‘Dokta, õ ogo ogon dagi el wo! Ereb Kapenaum taun oun agon karĩ maun anĩ, ogon fõ gariyan ein ago wo.’”
42004024	Ĩ od tobol fe fen, iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, profet taka ĩ yogon fõ gariyan to karĩ difiyẽf.
42004025	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, Eliya nẽ sain bun, Israel oun kayau waab musei difar mog, yar towo ogõ sigis saa katĩ fele di, teneub ganan bun uyẽ sã naũ odug difaren.
42004026	Age de mog, Negur idi anidi taka bun Eliya to sur fen, anĩ ere, waab taka Sarefat oun Saidon teneub bun sur fen.
42004027	Takag, Israel oun profet Elisa nẽ sain bun, musei lepra dagi ado dibodon, anĩ ere, idi atun taka lepra dagi to loko felen, Naman, Siria tamalem dogol.”
42004028	Juda neid uub fõ bun, ganan anĩ karĩ de fen, waud sanen.
42004029	Age de fen, idi fafã de fen, ĩ taun anĩ itor ilauf nigin dirun. Nedi taun are, arei bun nigin, siya sane bun dirãf nigin dirou dilen.
42004030	Anĩ ere, ĩ tamo kayau atu iyok ile fen, yogon naab ilauf nẽ anĩ dõf ilen.
42004031	Agef fen, ĩ Kapenaum taun isilen, taun are Galili distrik bun ibodok, an Sabat naa bun, ĩ tamo kayau ifelnẽdiya gariya inon.
42004032	Idi ĩ ifelnẽdin anĩ nigin terẽ den, ere nigin, in od wogõya are megeir ado.
42004033	Juda neid uub fõ bun, tamo taka kaa sanem irounen anĩ an ibodon. Ĩ ait ilun feis iweig iron,
42004034	“O, Jesus Nasaret tamal, õ amã ere naig wamã fenẽ? Õ amã daũ wamã fenẽ nigin usil de? Aya õ nigin keleĩ, Negur nẽ Fateul anĩ!”
42004035	Jesus totol ado iron, “Foro wol! Ĩ namen tamal ulõ weis!” Age ye di, kaa sane anĩ, tamo kayau ganan atun, tamo anĩ tou fiyẽ ira ken, ulõ yeis ilen, tamo are bouwa to daũ fen.
42004036	Tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, abob dirokenen, “Eĩ ere keleĩ eig fiya? Ĩ yana megeir adom irõ di, kaa sesen ulõ deis dilef.”
42004037	Anĩ bunem, ĩ nigin od teneub anĩ kalilĩ fiya ganan bun iyokelen.
42004038	Jesus Juda neid uub fõ itor ken, Simon nẽ fõ bun ilen. Simon nẽ mam, ĩ bouwa uruwa odug ado nigin yenen anĩ, isennẽf nigin Jesus to difiyen.
42004039	Anĩ nigin, Jesus ĩ itirne ken, bouwa uruwa dagi ou fiyẽ di, itornen. Age fe di, kayau anĩ kaisã bagai fã yale, aruneid yalen.
42004040	Gaa kuru kel mog, tamo kayau, dagi tamo dagi gariya fire fire adodo ganan, Jesus wagen guri difeid disin, age dife di, idi mugu mugu bun ima tetedin ino fen, ĩ idi el fedin.
42004041	Kaa sesen, tamo kayau musei bun, ulolõ deis fen, diweig diron, “Õ anĩ Negur Naal!” Anĩ ere, ĩ sakã fiyeĩd fen, to wogõ douf nigin sigoreid ifofan, ere nigin, idi keleĩ, ĩ Kristus.
42004042	Bonimei gugum ado, Jesus moilin ilen. Tamo kayau ĩ dimirnek dile, ĩ ibodon nẽ disi fen, ĩ idi to itornẽdiyouf nigin katũ difiyen.
42004043	Anĩ ere, ĩ iron, “Aya Negur nẽ tano nigin biya od, taun taka takag wogõ auf, ere nigin, aya anĩ nigin sur fiyan.”
42004044	Age ye fen, ĩ Judia distrik oun Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun, biya od wogõ yef iyon.
42005001	Naa taka bun, Jesus Genesaret daliyou yerin ifaren. Agef mog, tamo kayau ĩ salili difiye ken, Negur nẽ od wogõ ye di, karĩ de difar mog anĩ,
42005002	ĩ mala ira kel, waag uru naan yerin difar mog, ilen, are gau yaleya tamom an ditor yen ken, nedi kakãg kulo difen.
42005003	Ĩ waag anidi taka bun sõ yen, are Simon nẽ waag, agef fen, waag naanũ naal godof irou ilauf nigin to fiyen. Agef fen, ĩ waag bun ibod ken, tamo kayau biya od ifelnẽdin.
42005004	Sain ĩ wogõya bure fel fen, ĩ Simon irokenen, “Waag naan mala bun urou ule fen, gau yaleya nigin kakãg urofosil.”
42005005	Simon aiten yale iron, “Odug, amã bõ odug kabĩ totol malel, anĩ ere, ereb taka to malel. Anĩ ere, õ urok nigin aya kakãg baban arofosilauf.”
42005006	Sain idi age difen, idi gau musei bagai gei difen, age dife di, nedi kakãg serek fou fenẽ melsan.
42005007	Anĩ nigin, idi, nedi tã tar waag taka bun temeleid disi disennẽdiyouf nigin, gale difiyẽdin, age dife di, disi, waag uru bun gau dife isokos fen, waag uru are dimutũ fenẽ melsan.
42005008	Sain Simon Pita enĩ ile fen, Jesus iboron bobou fe fen, iron, “Odug, aya utorna ule, aya mosor nẽ tamo!”
42005009	Ere nigin, ĩ ne tã tar geid gau gei difen anĩ nigin, terefeit den.
42005010	Sebedi gere tar Jems Jon ado, are Simon ne kabĩ tura tar idig age difen. Age dife di, Jesus Simon irokenen, “Õ to kumĩ wo, gama naa enĩ bunem ilauf ganan, õ tamo gei wouf.”
42005011	Age fe di, idi neid waag fiteiwõ didĩ dife di, isel fen, ereb ereb ganan ditorara ken, Jesus dõ difen.
42005012	Jesus taun taka bun ibod mog, tamo taka lepra guruma barikã anĩ isin. Sain ĩ Jesus ile fen, ĩ tenebur kubũ ye kumokur fe, Jesus igone ken, iron, “Odug, õ oroyõf are, el wiyauf.”
42005013	Jesus ima irã, tamo anĩ kobũ fiye ken, iron, “Aya wau irok, õ bouwã biyauf.” Age ye di, kaisã bagai, lepra dagi ĩ itornen.
42005014	Agef fen, Jesus tamo anĩ irokenen, “Õ aib taka to urokenẽf, anĩ ere, õ pris wagen ule, õ bouwã ufelnẽf, õ bouwã biyal anĩ nigin Moses nẽ od irok anĩ dõ fen, sesewi fiya wenẽf, anĩ bunem yaore di, tamo kayau dilouf.”
42005015	Anĩ ere, ĩ nigin od fau fau iyok ilen, anĩ nigin, tamo kayau musei ĩ karĩ difiye ken, idi neid dagi yalel kenẽdiyouf nigin disin.
42005016	Anĩ ere, Jesus sain taka taka moilin ile fen, kosẽ yedig.
42005017	Naa taka bun, ĩ biya od ifelneĩd mog, Farisia tamo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, Galili distrik fonõ ganan, Judia distrik ado Jerusalem temeleid idi an dibodon. Age de mog, dagi el fediyouf nigin Odug nẽ megeir, ĩ bun ibodon.
42005018	Tamo tunĩ, tamo ilolaisin anĩ, gabgab bun faali de dirou disi, Jesus wagen dinenẽf nigin fõ namen dirou dilau fenẽ age difen.
42005019	Idi anĩ age fiya nigin naab taka to dilen, ere nigin, tamo kayau ino yalen, idi fõ sokoron disel, soko korõ difel fen, ĩ gabgab ado folo folõ dife di, tamo kayau atun, Jesus wagen bagai isilen.
42005020	Jesus idi neid momoiya ile fen, ĩ iron, “Mou, ogon mosor alelkonok.”
42005021	Farisia tamo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, idi dogo namedin kisi difen, “Eĩ aim bagai, kono fiya od wogõ yef? Taka nem mosor yaleleya to yenek, Negur yogo dogol.”
42005022	Jesus idi kisi difen anĩ kelei ken, to fen, “Ã ere nigin nameĩ bun agog kisi gef?
42005023	Od nanĩ anĩ aya wogõya nigin karika, ‘Ogon mosor alelkonok’ de, ‘Fã wale fen, uyok ule’?
42005024	Anĩ ere, Tamo Naal ĩ tenebur ein mosor yaleleya nigin yana ado anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin…” Ĩ tamo ilolaisin anĩ irokenen, “Aya õ arokonok, fã wo, ogon gabgab wale fen, fonõ ule.”
42005025	Age ye mog bagai, ĩ fã ye, idi wagedin ifaren, yogon yenen gabgab yale, Negur yana yalesef, fonõ ilen.
42005026	Ganan terẽ de fen, Negur yana dalesen. Idi waud bun terefeit ye fen, diron, “Ada gama tobonunã fire bagai tailel.”
42005027	Enei bure fel fen, Jesus ile, takis yaleya tamo yana Lewi, an yogon takis yaleya fõ bun ibod mog, ilen. Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya.”
42005028	Age ye di, Lewi fã ye, ereb ereb adok itor yen, Jesus dõ fiyen.
42005029	Agef fen, Lewi yogon fõ bun, Jesus nẽ saaf odug yabi di, takis yaleya tamo musei, tunĩ geid weim saaf don.
42005030	Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo, idi neid lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar bun nauseir den, “Ã ere nigin takis yaleya tamo, mosor adodo geid, saaf ado naan wõgef?”
42005031	Jesus idi aitedin yale iron, “Dagi sã anidim dokta nigin waud to yenẽdig, dagi adodom dogol.
42005032	Aya madur tamo anidi iweignẽdiya nigin to asin, mosor adodo tamo anidi waud falei douf nigin asin.”
42005033	Farisia tamo idi ĩ dirokenen, “Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar, idi kuri de fen, kosẽ dedig, Farisia tamo neid dõ fiya tar idig age fiya, anĩ ere, ogon idi dobu dirak.”
42005034	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Mois ĩ fau ne tã tar weim dibod mog, ã ne tã tar idi kuriya nigin urokenẽdigouf anĩ kisi feleya de?
42005035	Anĩ ere, naa fau isi di, anĩ bun mois tamo idi bun tamal yalelnẽ di, naa anidi bun idi kuri douf.”
42005036	Jesus yaab od enei idi irokenẽdin, “Taka nem gabar masak mata serek fe fen, gabar tubu bun to iwadig. Ĩ age fouf are, ĩ gabar mata anĩ serek fouf, takag, gabar mata bun tamal masak are tubu anĩ ado to susu falauf.
42005037	Takag, taka nem wain mata meme gabar tubu bun to itinẽf. Ĩ age fouf are, wain mata anĩ, meme gabar gẽ ye fen, serek fouf. Age fe di, wain anĩ oho yeis fen, meme gabar sane lauf.
42005038	Age fiya sã, wain mata, meme gabar mata bun itinẽf.
42005039	Agef fen, taka nem wain tubu yakas fen, mata to orodig, ere nigin, ĩ irok, ‘Tubu are de biya.’”
42006001	Sabat naa taka bun, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, wit kabĩ atu diyok dile fen, in dõ fiya tar wit biya tunĩ fito difen, imeid bun orok de fen, nedi ilo don.
42006002	Farisia tamo tunim to difen, “Ã ere nigin Sabat naa bun ĩtãfiya ufoduleg fen, tobonunã enei ago gef?”
42006003	Jesus aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Sain Dawid, ne tã tar geid naũ fedi di, age fen anĩ, ã to uwesegen de?
42006004	Ĩ Negur nẽ fõ namen ile fen, bret fateul prisem dogol dõdig an ibodon anĩ yokon, ĩ bret tunĩ ne tã tareg ifenẽdin.”
42006005	Age ye fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo Naal ĩ Sabat naa nẽ Odug.”
42006006	Sabat naa taka bun, ĩ Juda neid uub fõ bun ile, biya od ifelnẽdin, sain anĩ bun, tamo taka ima biya melem gege fefu fiya anĩ an ibodon.
42006007	Farisia tamo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, idi Jesus bouwa bun od dinouf nigin naab dimiren, anĩ nigin, idi ĩ Sabat naa bun dagi el fe mog, mailauf de fen, ololo difen.
42006008	Anĩ ere, Jesus idi neid kisi kelei ken, tamo ima gege fefu fiya anĩ irokenen, “Fã wo fen, ganan meleid bun ufar.” Age ye di, ĩ fã yale, an ifaren.
42006009	Age fe di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã to ayeik, nanĩ anĩ Sabat naa bun lo dõ fiya? Biya age fiya anĩ de, sane age fiya anĩ, oo, isennẽ di, mata ibodõya anĩ de, daũ fiya anĩ?”
42006010	Jesus idi ganan fele feid le fen, tamo anĩ irokenen, “Imã yaĩ wo.” Ĩ yaĩ fe di, in ima oditekei biya len.
42006011	Anĩ ere, idi waud fatuk sane fen, mogo Jesus naig tafiyẽf de fen, dogo tutur katõ difen.
42006012	Anĩ sain bun naa taka, Jesus arein kosẽ youf nigin iselen, bõ anĩ bun Negur kosẽ fiyen.
42006013	We fele di, bonimei, Jesus in dõ fiya tar wagen iweig laisi fen, idi atun tuwelf geif fen, idi anidi aposel wowã douf nigin igirnẽdin.
42006014	Simon (Jesus ĩ yana yun Pita), in tura Endru, Jems, Jon, Filip, Batolomyu,
42006015	Matyu, Tomas, Jems Alfeus naal, Simon ĩ anĩ Selot taka,
42006016	Judas ĩ Jems naal, Judas Iskariot, inim dum Jesus kiwai imeid bun inenen.
42006017	Jesus idi geid weim disil, teneub uus bun difaren. In dõ fiya tar musei ado, tamo kayau musei biya, Judia distrik kalilĩ fiya ganan temeleid, Jerusalem temeleid, Taia Saidon taun ado neid ubun temeleid, an difaren,
42006018	tamo kayau anidi Jesus karĩ difiyẽ fenẽ nigin ado, idi neid dagi el fediyouf nigin, disin. Idi kaa sesenem morõ difenẽdin are el fedin.
42006019	Tamo kayau ganan ĩ kobũ difiyẽ fenẽ age difen, ere nigin, megeir ĩ bunem isi fen, idi ganan el fedin.
42006020	Jesus in dõ fiya tar lo fiyeĩd fen, iron: “Ã aib maleg are el yeik, ere nigin, Negur nẽ tano are ãgenei.
42006021	Ã gama naũ ufaregef are el yeik, ere nigin, ã nameĩ isokosauf. Ã gama maruĩ isif are el yeik, ere nigin, ã kasã gouf.
42006022	Tamo Naal nigin, tamo kayau sane diyeik, diruyei ken, kono diyeik, ã yeneĩ sane dile fen, to orodif are, Negur ã el yeik.
42006023	“Naa anĩ bun, wauĩ kulĩ ye fen, wauĩ al fouf, ere nigin, ãgenei mala solo odug oun saa ilun ibodok. Ere nigin, temeid tar profet nigin de age difedin.
42006024	“Anĩ ere, safineĩ ado ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ãgenei wauĩ isenneĩya mogo walegel.
42006025	Nameĩ gama isokosef ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ã naũ ulagauf. Gama kasã gef ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ã fau wauĩ gudũf fen, maruĩ isiyouf.
42006026	Ã nigin tamo ganan biya de fen, wogõ def ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, temeid tar idegẽya profet nigin de age difedin.
42006027	“Anĩ ere, ã aib aya karĩ wiyagef anĩ arokeneik: Ãgenei kiwai tar nigin wauĩ laa fouf, ã kiwai difeneik anidi nigin biya ago gouf.
42006028	Idi ã disisneik el fiya wenẽdig, idi ã to biya diyeik anidi nigin kosẽ gouf.
42006029	Tamo taka ogon walã sitakã fakã fouf, falei wel, walã sitakãg wenẽ. Tamo taka ogon saket yalouf are, ogon kolos yalouf nigineg to katũ wiyẽ.
42006030	Wenẽdiyouf nigin to diyok are, wenẽdiyouf, aib taka ogon safinã yalef are, anĩ baban kel yaleya nigin to urokenẽf.
42006031	Ereb taka idim age difekeneĩf anĩ oroyeik age fiya gen, ãg idi bun ago gouf.
42006032	“Idi ã nigin waud laa fef anidi nigin dogol wauĩ laa fef are, ã nigin ere mala ado? Mosor adodo idig, idi nigin waud laa fef anidi nigin, waud laa fedig.
42006033	Idi ã nigin biya diyeik anidi nigin biya ago gouf are, ã nigin ere mala ado? Mosor adodo idig age difedig.
42006034	Idi anidi bun moni kel walogouf nigin kisig fen, moni wenẽdigouf are, ã nigin ere mala ado? Mosor adodo idig, moni ganan kel yaleya nigin kisi de fen, mosor adodo tutur moni difenẽdidig.
42006035	Anĩ ere, ãgenei kiwai tar nigin wauĩ laa fouf, idi nigin biya ago wedigouf, ereb taka kel yaleya nigin to kisig fen, wenẽdigouf. Ago gouf are, ãgenei mala solo odug biyauf, agef fen, ã Negur Ilun Bagai nẽ gere tar wowã gouf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ idi to de difiyẽdig sesen anidi ado, biya fiyẽdidig.
42006036	Ãgenei Temeĩ wau yũdig gen, ãg idi nigin wauĩ ineĩf.
42006037	“Taka to es wiyẽg, to ago gouf are, ãg Negur to es yeĩf. Taka bouwa bun od to ũg, to ago gouf are, ãg Negur bouweĩ bun od to yũf. Mosor nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf, ago gouf are, Negur ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.
42006038	Wenẽdig, ago gouf are, Negur ifeneĩf. Ima su karikauf, lai fesil fen, baban teten ino isokose di, yokũ fe di, awa gere fasauf, ã nigin gogũ fouf. Tunĩ es wedigef gen, Negur ãg agef es yeĩf.”
42006039	Jesus yaab od eneig irokenẽdin, “Mala ifofakeleya tamo taka, mala ifofakeleya tura itonẽya kisi feleya de? Idi urom bebeigir to kuku douf de?
42006040	Skul kesu in tise to wal fef, anĩ ere, taka ĩ keleĩ ganan yalef, yogon tise gen wõ youf.
42006041	“Õ ere nigin turã mala teteur lo fen, õ ogon aa masak malã bun ibodok anĩ to ulef?
42006042	Õ ogo aa masak ogon malã bun to ule fen, naig fe di, turã nigin dogol urokenek, ‘Turau, utor len, aya ogon malã teteur alelkonõf’? Õ mala yaleya tamo, õ ogon malã bun ketem aa masak walel fen, anĩ malã kare kele di, turã bun mala teteur walelauf.
42006043	“Aa biya ĩ faat sane to imadig, aa sane are faat biya to imadig.
42006044	Aa mugu mugu yogon faat bun, tamo ĩ keleĩ youf. Tamo kayau idi, wei biya barik bun to daledig, gira udum bun to daledig.
42006045	Tamo biya ĩ, yogon wau bun ereb biya kuru fedig anĩ bunem, tobonunã biya yaor fedig, age fiya gen, tamo sane, yogon wau bun ereb sane kuru fedig anĩ bunem, tobonunã sane yaor fedig. Yogon wau bun isokosef, yogon sigor bun wogõ yedig.
42006046	“Ere nigin ã aya nigin ‘Odug, Odug,’ ge fen, aya orok anĩ to ago gedig?
42006047	Taka ĩ wageun isi, neu od karĩ ye fen, dõf age fef, ĩ naig fiya anĩ aya ã afelneĩf.
42006048	Ĩ fõ inoya tamo taka, ku fatuk yale fen, meein teten fõ gariya inon gen. Sain kuwei isin, wĩ ye fen, fõ yun, anĩ ere, fõ anĩ yokũ fiya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, fõ are totol ado inon.
42006049	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ neu od karĩ ye fen, to dõf age fef, ĩ tamo taka teneub bun fõ gariya sã inon gen. Sain kuwei wĩ ye fen, fõ yun, fõ anĩ kala fel, oditekei daũf irailen.”
42007001	Jesus tamo kayau karĩ douf nigin enei ganan wogõ bure fel fen, ĩ Kapenaum taun ilen.
42007002	An kusĩ tamo neid orowa nẽ ferfer taka, in odug ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ, dagi fen, laa fou fenẽ age fen.
42007003	Kusĩ orowa Jesus nigin karĩ ye fen, Juda neid mudur adodo Jesus garan susur fedi di, ĩ isi fen, yogon ferfer el fiyẽf nigin to difiyen.
42007004	Idi Jesus garan disi fen, totol bagai digonen, “Tamo enei, õ enĩ agouf nigin kisi feleya bagai,
42007005	ere nigin, ĩ nemã tamo kayau nigin wau laa fedig, nemã uub fõg inon.”
42007006	Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi geid dilen. Ĩ mogo fõ sirin mog, kusĩ orowa ne tã tar Jesus dirokenẽf nigin sur fedin, “Odug, õ kabĩ totol to walouf, ere nigin, aya to biya nigin aya kisi afef, õ neu fõ bun to usiyouf.
42007007	Aya to biya nigin, aya õ garan isiya nigineg to kisi afen. Anĩ ere, õ od urõ di, neu kabĩ tamo dagi fara falauf.
42007008	Ere nigin, aya yug nigin age fiya, ayag neu odug anĩ farumen abodok, kusĩ tamo idig aya farumeun dibodok. Aya taka enĩ arokenek, ‘Ule,’ afiyek, ĩ ilauf. Aya taka arokenek, ‘Õ usi,’ au di, ĩ isidig. Neu kabĩ tamo enĩ ago afiyek, ĩ anĩ age fedig.”
42007009	Kusĩ orowa od enĩ irõ di, Jesus karĩ ye fen, ĩ nigin terẽ yen, agef fen, tamo kayau dõ difiyen anidi bun falei yel iron, “Aya ã arokeneik, aya Israel bun, momoiya odug eig fiya taka to ailen.”
42007010	Age ye di, kusĩ tamo sur fedin anidi, fõ bun ke de dile fen, ferfer anĩ dagi sã ibod mog, fotou difen.
42007011	Anĩ dumen, Jesus taun taka Nain ilen, in dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau musei, ĩ geid weim dilen.
42007012	Ĩ mogo taun bobog kelẽ fiyẽ mog, laa tamo taka faali de disin, laa tamo anĩ kayau waab nẽ kesu tekelei bagai, tamo kayau musei taun temeleid kayau waab geid.
42007013	Sain Jesus kayau waab anĩ fele fiyen, in wau ĩ nigin gudũf fen, iron, “To inã wale.”
42007014	Age ye fen, ĩ isel, dege kobũ fe di, faali difen idi, dẽ delen. Ĩ iron, “Tamo gaũ, aya õ arokonok, fã wale!”
42007015	Laa tamo anĩ fã ye ibod ken, od yen, age fe di, Jesus tamo anĩ ĩ sina kel ifenen.
42007016	Age fe di, idi ganan kumĩ ado terefeit de fen, Negur yana dalesen. Idi diron, “Profet odug taka, ada atun wõ yel. Negur yogon tamo kayau isennẽdiyouf nigin isil.”
42007017	Jesus nigin, od enei Judia distrik kalilĩ fiya ganan iyokelen. Jesus,
42007018	Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar, enei ganan nigin Jon dirokenen. Jon idi uru iweigneĩd fen,
42007019	Odug eig de to difiyẽf nigin sur fedin, “Tamo isiyouf den, õ ogo yeir de, amã fau taka nigin malamã manouf?”
42007020	Tamo Jesus garan disi diron, “Jon Naan Igunẽdiya Tamo, õ to mayõf nigin amã sur famam, ‘Tamo isiyouf den, õ ogo yeir de, amã fau taka nigin malamã manouf?’”
42007021	Sain anĩ bun bagai, Jesus, tamo kayau musei dagi adodo, darau adodo, kaa sesenem dirounẽdin el feid fen, meleid ifofakeleya el fedi di, kelẽ den.
42007022	Jesus solof irokenẽdin, “Kekug uleg fen, ã wedereim karĩ gel, meleim ulegel anĩ Jon wogõ wiyẽg, meleid ifofakelen kelẽ def, to diyon mogo diyok, lepra dagi adon mogo el fedin, wedereid daabun od karĩ def, gare den turĩ fedif, maleg bun biya od wogõ fedif.
42007023	Tamo aya nigin wau to firagagaũ fef, Negur ĩ el fiyek.”
42007024	Jon nẽ arũ tamo ditornẽ dilele di, Jesus, tamo kayau guru difen anidi, Jon nigin irokenẽdin, “Ã ere bagai anĩ ulogouf nigin, gerere tuan ulegen? Ã unin yaum walala fe di, ulogouf nigin ulegen de?
42007025	Anĩ sãf are, ere bagai ã ulogou fenẽ, ulegen? Tamo taka kolos biya bagai ifonun de? Sã, idi kolos medeĩya biya difoun ken, safineid inid adodo are, king nẽ fõ bun dibodok.
42007026	Ere bagai anĩ ã ulogou fenẽ, ulegen? Profet taka de? Ariya, aya ã arokeneik, ĩ profet wal fediya.
42007027	Tamo anĩ, ĩ nigin eig ye itoton: “‘Aya neu arũ tamo sur afe di, ĩ uyu ilauf, im ket ogon naab dodok fouf.’
42007028	Aya ã arokeneik, kayau onudi kesu dalen idi atun, taka nem Jon to wal difiyen, anĩ ere, aib taka Negur nẽ tanon yana naal bagai ado, ĩ Jon wal fiya.”
42007029	(Tamo kayau ganan, takis yaleya tamog, sain idi Jesus nẽ od karĩ de fen, Negur nẽ naab anĩ biya den, ere nigin, idi Jonem naan igunẽdin.
42007030	Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo, lo keleĩ tamo geid, idi dogo nigin Negur nẽ oroya ditoron, ere nigin, idi Jonem naan to igunẽdin.)
42007031	“Tamo kayau sain enei bun, idi nigin ere bunem aya kisi afouf? Idi ere gen?
42007032	Idi simõ maket modoũ bun dibod ken, abob diweignẽdidig gen: “‘Amã ã nigin kelel maun, anĩ ere, ã to kui gen; amã kanon seg malen, anĩ ere, ã to inã walegen.’
42007033	Aya enei wogõ auf, ere nigin, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo isin, bret to yon, wain to yon, ã urõgef, ‘Ĩ kaa sane ado.’
42007034	Tamo Naal isin, saaf yon, naan yon, ã urõgef, ‘Eĩ dobu irãya tamal, ĩ, takis yaleya tamo, mosor tamo adodo geid, uyu kũ difedig.’
42007035	Anĩ ere, kisi biya ĩ, in dõ fiya ganan bunem, biya yaorouf.”
42007036	Farisia tamo takam, Jesus ĩ ado saaf dãf nigin iweignen, anĩ nigin, Jesus ĩ Farisia tamo anĩ nẽ fõ bun ile fen, tebol bun ibodon.
42007037	Taun anĩ bun, kayau taka mosor ado ibodõdig, Jesus Farisia tamo anĩ nẽ fõ bun, saaf yoko yeya karĩ ye fen, kayau, moul sumeĩ biya bagai anĩ gulub ado irou isin.
42007038	Kayau ĩ Jesus dumen ye garan ifar, maru isi fen, Jesus ye lũ fen. Agef fen, kayau yogon fatiyam Jesus ye waĩf, umã fe, moul sumeĩ biya bagai, ye bun fi felen.
42007039	Sain Farisia tamo Jesus iweignen anim, enei ile fen, ĩ yogo kisi bun iron, “Tamo enei profet takauf, ĩ aibem kobũ fiyek, ĩ ere kayau, ĩ mosor kayau taka anĩ, keleĩ youf.”
42007040	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Simon, aya ereb taka arokonõf.” Ĩ iron, “Tise, urokana.”
42007041	Jesus iron, “Tamo uru, moni tamo taka bun wareg dalen, taka faif tausen kina, taka faif handred kina.
42007042	Idi urom wareg ifenẽya moni sã, anĩ nigin, moni tamo dogo neid wareg gudũ felen. Gama nanim anĩ, moni tamo nigin wau fatuk laa fouf?”
42007043	Simon solof iron, “Aya kisi afef, taka ĩ wareg odug yalen anĩ gudũ fel kenen anim.” Jesus iron, “Õ tutuk es wol.”
42007044	Age ye fen, Jesus falei yel, kayau wage ifen ken, Simon irokenen, “Õ kayau enei ulef? Aya ogon fõ bun asil. Õ yeu kulo fiya nẽ naan taka to wanal, anĩ ere, kayau ĩ yogon marum yeu lũf fen, yogon fatiyam waĩ fel.
42007045	Õ to umã wiyal, anĩ ere, kayau enei, aya asour alel sain bun, ĩ yeu umã fel anĩ, fau fau umã fiyek.
42007046	Õ mudurou bun moul to unol, anĩ ere, kayau ĩ moul sumeĩ biya bagai, yeu bun fi felel.
42007047	Anĩ nigin, aya õ arokonok, kayau enĩ nẽ mosor musei yalelel, anĩ nigin, ĩ fatuk wau laa fen. Anĩ ere, aib taka mosor naal yalelen, ĩ wau laa fiya naal.”
42007048	Age ye fen, Jesus kayau irokenen, “Ogon mosor alelkonok.”
42007049	Tamo Jesus geid dibodon, tutur dogo dogol diron, “Eĩ aim, ĩ mosoreg yalelef?”
42007050	Jesus kayau anĩ irokenen, “Ogon momoiya anim isennom, waũ inosiya ado ule.”
42008001	Anĩ dumen, Jesus taun ado fonõ fonõ iyo ken, Negur nẽ tano nigin, biya od wogõ yen. In dõ fiya tar tuwelf weim,
42008002	kayau tunĩ idi kaa sesen iruid fen, dagi el fedin idig weim: Maria (Magdala tamal) ĩ bun kaa sesen sewen irudi di, diyan,
42008003	Joana Kusa nẽ kayau, Kusa ĩ Herod nẽ fõ lo fiya tamo, Susana, musei tunĩ geid. Kayau eneidi, idi neid safineid nem disennẽdin.
42008004	Tamo kayau taun ganan bun temeleid, Jesus garan disi, moku de mog, ĩ yaab od enei iron,
42008005	“Kabĩ marau taka, faat irarãf nigin ilen. Sain ĩ irarak ile mog, tunĩ naab luwen kuku ren, are teten diyon, ninã ilun temeledim dakasin.
42008006	Tunĩ meein tuar kuku ren, are bali fokũ yeid fen, laasi yedin, ere nigin, idi lumi sã.
42008007	Faat tunĩ malũ duri atun kuku ren, are malũ duri, faat anĩ ado, odudug fen, malũ durim sile feledin.
42008008	Faat tunĩ teneub biya bun kuku ren, are fokũ yedin, biya imadin, gariya tekelei yogon biya wan handred iman, biya anim gariya anĩ wal fiya.” Sain ĩ enĩ wogõ ye fen, ĩ iweig iron, “Taka ĩ karĩya nigin weder ado, ĩ karĩ youf.”
42008009	In dõ fiya tar, yaab od enĩ nẽ gariya nigin, ĩ to difiyen.
42008010	Jesus iron, “Negur tano nigin, iminẽya od nẽ keleĩ are, Negur ã mogo ifenein, anĩ ere, tunĩ bun aya yaab od nem wogõ auf, anĩ bunem, “‘idi meledim diledig, anĩ idi meleid fokõya sã, idi wederedim karĩ dedig, anĩ idi gariya keleĩ sã.’
42008011	“Yaab od anĩ nẽ gariya eig fiya. Faat are Negur nẽ od.
42008012	Faat tunĩ naab luwen kuku ren are, tamo idi od karĩ den, Satan isi, biya od idi namedin ibodok anĩ yaleledig, anĩ bunem, idi to momoi de di, to isennẽdiyouf.
42008013	Faat tunĩ meein tuar iraran are, tamo idi od karĩ de fen, waud bun kulĩya ado od daledig, anĩ ere, idi warumutei sã. Idi sain naal bagai momoi def, anĩ ere, kisi fiya isi di, fara furu de diyaleledig.
42008014	Faat malũ duri atun kubũ yen are, tamo idi od karĩ den, anĩ ere, idi diyok dile mog, tenebur mata ibodõya nẽ suwẽya, safina ado ibodõya nẽ kisi, bouwa nẽ oroya anidim idi sile fedi di, idi faat to yũf.
42008015	Anĩ ere, faat teneub biya bun kubũ yen are, tamo idi, kisi biya, karĩya biya ado, waud bun ibodok, od karĩ de fen, kafĩ difelef, anĩ totol difaref, faat biya yũf.
42008016	“Taka nem lam tõf fen, mis kur be, fatar farumen to inodig. Age fiya ban, ĩ yoki bun iseginẽ di, idi aaben disif, lalan dilouf.
42008017	Ereb ereb ganan iminẽya yenek anĩ ganan yaor fouf, ereb ereb ganan nar fen yenek anĩ ganan irou isi, biru fel fen, yaau du fe di, keleĩ youf.
42008018	Anĩ nigin, ã kisi el ge waleg fen, ã karĩ gouf. Aib taka ĩ ado, aya toru afouf, age fe di, ĩ musei adouf. Taka ĩ sã bagai, ereb taka ĩ ado nigin ĩ kisi fef areg, ĩ bun tamal son fouf.”
42008019	Jesus nẽ sina, tura tar geid, ĩ dilouf nigin disin. Anĩ ere, idi ĩ wagen ileya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, tamo kayau musei.
42008020	Takam Jesus irokenen, “Ogon sinã, turã tar geid, õ dileyõf nigin serẽ difaref.”
42008021	Jesus solof iron, “Neu naai ado turau tar, are idi Negur nẽ od karĩ de fen, dõ difef anidi.”
42008022	Naa taka bun, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Ada daliyou sitakã talauf.” Anĩ nigin, idi waag bun sõ de dilen.
42008023	Idi solĩ de mog, Jesus mulaĩ yenen. Yau odug daliyou bun isi di, maaĩ waag namen isokosen. Idi morõ odug fotou difen.
42008024	In dõ fiya tar dile, Jesus turĩ difiyẽ diron, “Odug, Odug, ada naanũ talalau fenẽ!” Ĩ fã yale, yau naan moloun wĩ yen ado, sakã fiyẽdi di, yau uyẽ ado irorou kel, ganan dẽ delen.
42008025	Jesus in dõ fiya tar to fiyẽdin, “Ãgenei momoiya nain?” Idi kumĩ terẽ de fen, abob toti difen, “Eĩ aim bagai? Ĩ yau ado naaneg irokenẽdi di, ĩ ait dõ difef.”
42008026	Idi Galili tamal daliyou dibal, Gerasa teneub bun dilen.
42008027	Sain Jesus ubun kutũ yesin, taun anĩ bun tamal, tamo taka kaa sesen ado ĩ tarabã fiyen. Sain meluk, tamo enei kolos sã, fõ buneg to ibodõdig, anĩ ere, ĩ matmat bun ibodõdig.
42008028	Ĩ Jesus ile fen, kaĩ ye, Jesus ye gariyan kubũ ye, ĩ ait odugem iweig iron, “Õ aya ere naig wiyau fenẽ, Jesus, Negur Ilun Biya nẽ Naal? Aya õ agonok, õ aya to daig wiyauf!”
42008029	Ere nigin, Jesus mogo kaa sane tamo anĩ bun tamal ulõ yesiyouf nigin irokenen. Sain musei kaa sanem irounẽ di, ye ima ado, sen nem difofãdig, age de fen, tari difiyẽdig, anĩ ere, ĩ sen kokour fele di, kaa sanem wala ino di, moilin iledig.
42008030	Age ye di, Jesus ĩ to fiyen, “Õ yana ai?” Ĩ solof iron, “Aya yanau Ami,” ere nigin, kaa museim ĩ namen disilen.
42008031	Idi ku isil idĩya sã modoũ bun to sur fediyouf nigin, baba baban Jesus digonen.
42008032	Arei wala sirin, bor musei biya an saaf doko difaren. Kaa sesen idi, bor namedin dilauf nigin, Jesus digonẽ di, Jesus idi yo fedin.
42008033	Kaa sesen, tamo anĩ bun tamal ulolõ deis fen, bor namedin dilelen. Age dife di, bor gududu de, bebeig sane baurin daliyoun disil, naanũ gare desin.
42008034	Bor lo fiya tamo, ereb ereb wõ yen anĩ dile fen, diya dile, od anĩ, taun ado fonõ fonõ wogõ den.
42008035	Age dife di, tamo kayau, ereb wõ yen anĩ dilou fenẽ dilen. Sain idi Jesus garan disin, kaa sesen tamo anĩ bun tamal diyalelen tamo anĩ, garab yel, kisi biya ado, Jesus ye gariyan ibod mog, dile fen, idi kumĩ den.
42008036	Tamo idi meledim dilen anidim, kaa sesenem tamo diroun anĩ, naig be el fiyen anĩ, tamo kayau wogõ difiyẽdin.
42008037	Age dife di, Gerasa teneub bun, tamo kayau ganan, Jesus itorneĩd ilauf nigin, ĩ dirokenen, ere nigin, idi kumim lai fedin. Anĩ nigin, Jesus waag bun sõ ye fen, itornẽdin.
42008038	Tamo ĩ bun tamal kaa sesen diyalelen anĩ, Jesus ado dilauf nigin igonen, anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ sur fiye ken, iron,
42008039	“Fonõ kel ule fen, Negur õ nigin age fen anĩ wogõ wouf.” Age ye di, tamo anĩ itor ilen, Jesus ĩ nigin age fen anĩ, taun ganan bun iyo ken, wogõ yen.
42008040	Sain Jesus kele di, tamo kayau musei, ĩ aan difiyen, ere nigin, idi ganan ĩ nigin ololo difen.
42008041	Age de mog, Juda neid uub fõ lo fiya nẽ mudur taka, yana Jairus isi, Jesus ye gariyan kubũ ye fen, yogon fõ bun ileya nigin igonen,
42008042	ere nigin, ĩ ne barai tekelei bagai, ĩ kayau naal tuwelf yar age fiya, mogo laa fou fenẽ. Jesus naab ile mog, tamo kayau musei kiti de fen, kafĩ difiyẽ genen.
42008043	Kayau taka an ifaren, ogõ dagi faimud ado, yar tuwelf iyon. Anĩ ere, taka nem ĩ to el fiyen.
42008044	Kayau ĩ Jesus dume ise, in kolos iri kobũ fen, age fe di, kaisã bagai, kayau nẽ naud segẽ yelen.
42008045	Jesus to fen, “Aim aya kobũ fiyal?” Idi ganan wa dife di, Pita iron, “Odug, tamo kayau musei kiti de fen, kobũ diyok
42008046	Anĩ ere, Jesus iron, “Aibem aya kobũ fiyal. Aya keleĩ, totol aya bun tamal ul fe yalel.”
42008047	Age ye di, kayau ĩ imin ken, ileya kisi feleya san, tererẽ ye fen, isi, Jesus ye gariyan kubũ yen. Tamo kayau ganan meleid bun, ĩ ereb nigin Jesus kobũ fiyem ado, naig be ĩ kaisã bagai biya lel anĩ, wogõ yen.
42008048	Age ye di, Jesus kayau irokenen, “Nau barai, ogon momoiya anim el yom. Waũ inosiya ado ule.”
42008049	Jesus fau od wogõ ye mog, tamo taka, Juda neid uub fõ lo fiya mudur Jairus nẽ fõ bunem isin. Ĩ iron, “Nẽ barai mogo laa fel. Baban õ tise morõ to wenẽf.”
42008050	Jesus od enei karĩ ye fen, Jairus irokenen, “To kumĩ wo, momoi dogol wo, ago di, kayau fau el fiyẽf.”
42008051	Jesus Jairus nẽ fõ bun wõ ye fen, takam ĩ geid, aaben ileya nigin katũ fedin, Pita, Jon, Jems ado, kesu nẽ tama sina dogol.
42008052	Tamo kayau ganan, ĩ nigin waud gudũf fen, inã legur mog, Jesus iron, “To inã waleg. Kayau naal ĩ laa fiya sã, ĩ mulã yenek.”
42008053	Idi Jesus kasã difiyen, idi keleĩ, kayau naal laa fel.
42008054	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ ima yales fen, iron, “Neu kesu, fã wo!”
42008055	Kayau nẽ uur kelen, age fe di, kaisã bagai, fã yale ifaren. Age fe di, Jesus, ĩ ereb taka ifen yõya nigin, idi irokenẽdin.
42008056	Kayau nẽ sina tama terefeit de di, ereb wõ yel anĩ, taka to dirokenẽf nigin, Jesus idi katũ fedin.
42009001	Jesus in dõ fiya tar tuwelf iweigneĩd fen, kuru fedin. Agef fen, ĩ, idi kaa sesen ganan dirudiyouf nigin ado, dagi el difediyouf nigin totol ifeneĩd fen, megeir fedin.
42009002	Ĩ, idi Negur nẽ tano nigin wogõ douf nigin ado, dagi adodo el difediyouf nigin sur fedin.
42009003	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Delẽ uyõgouf nigin ereb taka to walogouf, manig sã, faa sã, bret sã, moni sã, kolos uru to walogouf, tekelei dogol.
42009004	Fõ nanĩ be bun sõ gouf, an ubodõg ile, taun anĩ utorõgouf.
42009005	Tamo kayau ã to daleyei ken, ã to karĩ diyeĩf, sain ã nedi taun anĩ utorõg fen, yeĩ aas tu welege di, idi ã kiwai difenein anĩ keleĩf.”
42009006	Anĩ nigin, idi fafã de, fonõ fonõ diyo ken, modoũ ganan bun, biya od wogõ de fen, tamo kayau dagi el difedin.
42009007	Galili lo fiya nẽ mudur Herod, anĩ ganan wõ yef ilef anĩ, karĩ ye fen, wau togun, ere nigin, tunim dirok, Jon ĩ laa bun tamal mata kel fã yen,
42009008	tunim dirok, Eliya wõ yen, age fe di, tunĩg dirok, profet kulu temeleid anidi taka mata kel fã yen.
42009009	Anĩ ere, Herod iron, “Aya Jon ula gudũ afen. Enei aim, ĩ nigin karĩ auf?” Age ye fen, ĩ Jesus ileya nigin kisi fen.
42009010	Sain aposel idi keku den, idi age difen anĩ Jesus wogõ difiyen. Age de di, Jesus idi geif irou, idi mugu diya, taun taka Betsaida dilen.
42009011	Anĩ ere, tamo kayau musei anĩ kelei ken, Jesus dõ difen. Jesus idi aan fiyeĩd, Negur nẽ tano nigin wogõ fiyeĩd fen, idi dagi el fiya nẽ anidi el fedin.
42009012	Aragau di, in dõ fiya tar tuwelf, ĩ gein disi diron, “Tamo kayau susur wo di, idi fonõ kalilĩ fiya fonõ fonõ dile fen, saaf ado yenẽya modoũ dilouf, ere nigin, ada ein gerere tuan tabodok.”
42009013	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Idi dãf nigin ereb ãgem wenẽdigouf.” Idi solo de diron, “Ada bret faif, gau uru ado dogol. Ada tele, tamo kayau enei ganan nigin saaf to na talouf, are kisi feleya sã.”
42009014	(Faif tausen tamo age fiya an dibodon.) Anĩ ere, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Tamo kayau, mala fire fire fifti age fiya bun, ubodnẽdig.”
42009015	In dõ fiya tar age dife di, ganan dibodadan.
42009016	Jesus, bret faif gau uru ado yale, saa ilun itad fen, ĩ Negur de fiye ken, anĩ mumã fedin. Agef fen, ĩ in dõ fiya tar ifenẽdin, tamo kayau wagedin gõ difouf nigin.
42009017	Idi ganan don kisi felen. In dõ fiya tar, tamo kayau bret gau ado dokon, tunĩ ifaren anĩ fito difen, karam tuwelf isokosen.
42009018	Sain Jesus mugun kosẽ yen, in dõ fiya tar idi ĩ weim. Ĩ idi to fedin, “Tamo kayau idi, aya nigin ai dedig?”
42009019	Idi solo de diron, “Tunĩ dirok, Jon naan igunẽdiya tamo, tunĩ dirok, Eliya, are tunĩg dirok, profet kulu temeleid anidi taka mata kel fã yen.”
42009020	Jesus to fedin, “Ba ã uleg? Aya nigin ã ai gef?” Pita aiten yale iron, “Õ anĩ Negur nẽ Kristus.”
42009021	Age ye di, Jesus enei taka to dirokenẽf nigin, idi wedereid totol iroun.
42009022	Age ye fen, ĩ iron, “Tamo Naal ĩ darau musei yale fen, mudur adodo, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo idim dudum difiyẽf. Age de fen, ĩ dukesi di, naa towo bure fele di, mata kel fã youf.”
42009023	Age ye fen, Jesus idi ganan irokenẽdin, “Aib taka aya dõ fiyau fenẽ, ĩ yogon oroya dudum fe fen, yogon aa tetek, naa ganan faali fe, aya dõ fiyauf.
42009024	Aib taka, yogon bouwa buru, mata ibodõf nigin oro fef, are fõ yalauf, anĩ aib taka yogon mata bouwa buru, aya nigin ye fen, irailauf, are kel yalouf.
42009025	Tamo taka ĩ teneub enĩ ganan kakarai fe, akorou ye fen, ĩ yogo bou fõ yalauf be irailauf, ere biya ĩ yalouf?
42009026	Aib taka, aya nigin ado neu od nigin, mama fouf are, sain Tamo Naal, in fula fiya medeĩya, Tama nẽ ado, engel fateul neid fula fiya medeĩya ado disiyouf bun, ĩg ĩ nigin mama fouf.
42009027	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tunĩ ein difaref, fau to gare de mog, idi Negur nẽ tano dilouf.”
42009028	Jesus enei irokel fen, naa eit age fiya ilele di, ĩ, Pita, Jon, Jems yale, kosẽ youf nigin arei ilun diselen.
42009029	Ĩ kosẽ ye mog, yogon nawa falei felen, agef fen, yogon kolos, kolimei filiya nẽ lalan gen, wõ yen.
42009030	Tamo uru, Moses Eliya ado,
42009031	fula fiya medeĩya ado wowã de fen, Jesus geid wogõ den. Idi Jesus teneub itorõf anĩ nigin wogõ den, anĩ ĩ Jerusalem oun kisi falauf.
42009032	Pita ĩ, ne tã tar geid, mulã nigin meleid morõ kelen, anĩ ere, idi oditekei meleid bi fel fen, idi Jesus nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ado, tamo uru ĩ geid difaren anĩ dilen.
42009033	Tamo idi Jesus ditornẽ mog, Pita Jesus irokenen, “Odug, ada ein ibodõya nigin biya bagai. Ada salafat towo tanouf, taka ogon, taka Moses nẽ, taka Eliya nẽ.” (Ĩ wogõ yen anĩ, ĩ yogo keleĩ sã.)
42009034	Age ye mog, lalo isi, idi kerub fedi di, idi lalo bun dilel mog, kumĩ den.
42009035	Ait taka lalo bunem wõ ye fen, iron, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ayam ĩ agirnen. Ĩ karĩ wiyẽg.”
42009036	Ait anĩ wogõ yele di, idi Jesus mugu dilen. In dõ fiya tar anidi, enei dogo bun dogol ibodon, idi ereb dilen anĩ, sain anĩ bun, taka to dirokenen.
42009037	Naa taka bun, idi arein tamal disi mog, tamo kayau musei Jesus tarabã difiyen.
42009038	Guru fiya atun, tamo takam iweig iron, “Tise, aya õ agonok, õ neu kesu ulekanauf, ere nigin, ĩ neu kesu tekelei bagai.
42009039	Kaa sanem irounẽ di, ĩ terẽ adod ye, ui yedig. Kaa sanem kesu yũ irã di, tererẽ ye fen, awa bun sali moku fedig. Agef fen, kaisã to folõ fiye kele fen, ĩ bouwa daũ fedig.
42009040	Aya, on dõ fiya tar kaa sane diruwauf nigin agonẽdin, anĩ ere, idi kisi feleya sã.”
42009041	Jesus solof iron, “Sain enei bun, tamo kayau momoiya sã, sane bagai. Sain ganĩ aya ã geid tabod ken, ã nigin wau aukesilauf? Ogon kesu ein urousi.”
42009042	Kesu anĩ isi mog, kaa sanem kesu tenebur yũ irã di, tererẽ yen. Anĩ ere, Jesus kaa sane ou fiyen, agef fen, kesu anĩ el fiye ken, ĩ tama kel ifenen.
42009043	Age fe di, idi ganan, Negur nẽ megeir odug nigin terefeit den. Idi ganan, Jesus age fen anĩ ganan nigin, terẽ de mog, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin,
42009044	“Ereb aya arokeneĩf anĩ wedereĩ unog. Tamo Naal ĩ fau kiwai tamo imeid bun dinou fenẽ.”
42009045	Anĩ ere, idi od enĩ nẽ gariya nigin nene den. Idi nigin gariya anĩ inokon, anĩ nigin, idi od anĩ to kelei ken, ĩ to fiyẽya nigin kumĩ den.
42009046	Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar idi, aim anĩ idi atun odug ibodõf nigin, luwa diroun.
42009047	Jesus idi neid kisi kelei ken, kesu naal taka yale iroule, ĩ sirin ifarnen.
42009048	Agef fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Aib taka, aya yanau bunem, kesu naal eig fiya taka yalef are, ĩ aya yaleyaf. Aib taka ĩ aya yaleyaf are, ĩ aya sur fiyan anĩ yalef. Ã ganan atun, taka ĩ naal bagai are, ĩ anĩ odug bagai.”
42009049	Jon iron, “Odug, tamo taka, õ yanã nem kaa sesen iruid mog, amã mailen. Anĩ nigin, amã ĩ katũ mafiyẽf nigin age mafen, ere nigin, ĩ neda takam sã.”
42009050	Anĩ ere, Jesus iron, “To katũ wiyẽg, taka ĩ kiwai to ifeneik, are ãgenei.”
42009051	Jesus saa ilun yale irou iseleya nẽ naa dodole di, ĩ Jerusalem ileya nigin wau kuturolen.
42009052	Age fe di, ĩ arũ tamo uyu sur fedi di, idi Jesus nẽ ereb ereb dodok fiya nigin, Samaria fonõ dilen.
42009053	Anĩ ere, tamo kayau an to aan difiyen, ere nigin, ĩ Jerusalem ilauf nigin age fen.
42009054	Sain in dõ fiya tar Jems Jon ado, anĩ dile fen, idi to difen, “Odug, õ amã yã saa ilun tamal maweig di, isi, idi daũ fediyouf nigin oroyok de?”
42009055	Anĩ ere, Jesus falei yel, ou fiyẽdin,
42009056	age de fen, idi fonõ taka bun dilen.
42009057	Idi naab luwe dile fen, tamo taka Jesus irokenen, “Õ narib ulauf are, aya õ dõ ayõf.”
42009058	Jesus aiten yale iron, “Gaũ kuĩ idi, yenẽya nẽ modoũ ku ado, ninã lalo bun diyok idi, uru ado, anĩ ere, Tamo Naal ĩ mudur inoya nẽ modoũ sã.”
42009059	Jesus tamo takag irokenen, “Dõ wiya.” Anĩ ere, tamo iron, “Odug, fau de, folõ wiya len, aya ele, neu dei mũ afel fen.”
42009060	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Laa tamo idi, laa tutur abob mumã difouf. Anĩ ere, õ ule, Negur nẽ tano nigin wogõ wo.”
42009061	Baban takag iron, “Odug, aya õ dõ ayõf, anĩ ere, folõ wiya len, kelau ele, neu ibor tar dabuo afiyeĩd fen.”
42009062	Jesus solof iron, “Taka ĩ dur bun ima ino fen, koriri yedig anĩ, Negur nẽ tano nigin kabĩ yaleya to kisi falauf.”
42010001	Anĩ dumen, Odug sewenti-tu tamo igirneĩd fen, idi, ĩ taun ganan ado modoũ ilauf nẽ bun, uyulil uru uru susur fedin.
42010002	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Kabier saaf musei biya bure felen, anĩ ere, kabĩ tamo musei sã. Age fiya nigin, kabĩ marau, Odug to wiyẽg, kabĩ tamo sur fedi di, yogon kabier dilauf.
42010003	Uleg! Aya ã sipsip naal gen, gaũ kuĩ atun sur ayeik.
42010004	Ã moni nẽ kodol be, faa be, su be to walogouf, agog fen, naab luwen taka to aan wiyẽgouf.
42010005	“Fõ taka aaben ulagauf, uruwa urõgouf, ‘Fõ enei wau inosiya ado.’
42010006	Tamo taka wau inosiya nẽ anĩ an ibodõf are, ãgenei wauĩ inosiya ĩ bun ibodõf, sãf are, ã bun kel isiyouf.
42010007	Fõ anĩ bun ubodõgouf, saaf ado naan yõya nigin idi difeneĩf, are wãgauf, ere nigin, kabĩ tamo ĩ mala solo yaleya kisi feleya. Fõ fõ to walegef uyõg.
42010008	“Ã taun taka bun ulege di, idi ã aan diyeĩf, ã ereb wagein dinouf anĩ wãgauf.
42010009	Dagi adodo an difaref, el wiyẽdig fen, idi urokenẽdigouf, ‘Negur nẽ tano mogo ã nigin melsã.’
42010010	Anĩ ere, ã taun taka bun ulege di, idi ã to aan diyeĩf, naab toko tokõ ge fen, urõgouf,
42010011	‘Ãgenei taun nẽ aas yemã bun degẽ fen anĩg, amã kema ã bun tu mafef. Anĩ ere, ã enei keleĩ youf bagai, Negur nẽ tano mogo melsã.’
42010012	Aya ã arokeneik, es fiya naa anĩ bun, taun anĩ, in darau Sodom taun darau dalen anĩ wal fiya, yalouf.
42010013	“Korasin taun, õ malalon ado! Betsaida taun, õ malalon ado! Ã bun memelik musei anodin, age fiya gen anĩ, Taia ado Saidon taun bun wõ yem are, mogo kulu waud falei de fen, wau gudũ fiya nẽ gabar difoun ken, aasur dibodom.
42010014	Anĩ nigin, es fiya sain bun, ã, morõ Taia ado Saidon taun dalouf anĩ wal fiya, walogouf.
42010015	Õ Kapenaum taun, õ yanã anĩ saa ilun iselauf de? Sã bagai, õ laa neid modoũ bun usilauf.
42010016	“Taka ĩ karĩ yeik, aya karĩ fiyaf, taka ĩ ã iruyeik, are aya iruyaf, anĩ ere, taka ĩ aya iruyaf, are ĩ aya sur fiyan anĩ iruf.”
42010017	Sewenti-tu tamo idi, kulĩya ado keku de, disi diron, “Odug, õ yanã bunem kaa seseneg morõ di, dõ difen.”
42010018	Jesus solof iron, “Aya, Satan saa ilunem kolimei lalan gen kakur fen, kubũ ye mog, ailen.
42010019	Aya, ã, gogour, ambei lalai wedig fen, kiwai nẽ totol ganan wal gouf nigin, megeir afenein. Ereb takam to tadũ yeĩf.
42010020	Anĩ ere, kaa sigoramã dõ difel ge fen, to wauĩ kulĩ youf, anĩ ere, ãgenei yeneĩ saa ilun itoton nigin, wauĩ kulĩ youf.”
42010021	Sain anĩ bun, Jesus, Awa Uur Fateul bunem, kulĩya isokos fen, iron, “Dei, saa ado teneub nẽ Odug, aya õ yanã alesef, ere nigin, safina eneidi, kisi biya ado keleĩ adodo to dilouf nigin, õ unokon, ago fen, simõ gen dibodon anidi bun yaor won. Dei, enĩ are ogon waũ filolõ fiya biya bunem agon.
42010022	“Ereb ereb ganan, Dei ĩ aya bun inon. Taka nem Naal ĩ ai ya nigin keleĩ sã, Dei yogo dogol keleĩ. Taka nem Dei ĩ ai ya nigin keleĩ sã, Naal yogo dogol ado, tunĩ idi Naalum Dei ifelnẽdiyouf nigin igirnẽdif anidim dogol keleĩ.”
42010023	Age ye fen, Jesus falei yel, in dõ fiya tar lo feid fen, idi dogol irokenẽdin, “Meleim ã ulegedif anĩ dilef are el fedif.
42010024	Ere nigin, aya ã arokeneik, profet musei, king geid, ã ulegef anĩ dilou fenẽ nigin waud yenen, anĩ ere, idi meledim to dilen, idi ã karĩ gef anĩ karĩ dou fenẽ nigin waud yenen, anĩ ere, idi wederedim to karĩ den.”
42010025	Sain taka bun, lo keleĩ tamo taka fã ye fen, Jesus kisi fiyen. Ĩ Jesus to fiyen, “Tise, aya naig afe di, mata faimud ibodkeleya anĩ alouf?”
42010026	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun Lo ere yef? Õ uwesedig anĩ, ere yõdig?”
42010027	Lo keleĩ tamom Jesus solof irokenen, “‘Õ, Odug ogon Negur ĩ nigin waũ adok, malãkanon adok, ogon megeir adok, ogon kisi adok bunem, waũ laaf yenẽf.’ Takag, ‘Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago waũ laa fouf.’”
42010028	Jesus tamo anĩ irokenen, “Õ de tutuk solo wol. Enei ago di, õ mata ibodkeleya walouf.”
42010029	Anĩ ere, lo keleĩ tamo ĩ, Jesus ĩ nigin keleĩ biya sã fiyẽf anĩ itor ken, Jesus to fiyen, “Age fiyauf are, ai anĩ neu tã?”
42010030	Jesus solof iron, “Tamo taka Jerusalem taun tamal Jeriko taun isil mog, bẽ tamo imeid bun ilen. Idi yogon kolos dinukeis dũ di, laa gen yen mog, ditornẽ diyalelen.
42010031	Sain anĩ bun, pris taka naab tekelei anĩ dõf isilen, tamo are de ile fen, ĩ fasis fe tokõ felen.
42010032	Age fiya gen, Lewi tamo takag modoũ anĩ bun isi, tamo are de ile fen, ĩ fasis fe tokõ felen.
42010033	Anĩ ere, Samaria tamo taka iyok isin, tamo yenen nẽ isi, wõ ye, tamo anĩ ile fen, ĩ nigin wau yun.
42010034	Ĩ wagen ilen, moul wain ado gudũ fiya bun fi fel fen, ifokenen. Agef fen, tamo are yales, yogon donki teten ino irou ilen, tamo irouya fõ bun ino fen, kulatun fiyen.
42010035	Naa taka di, ĩ tu silwa koin moni yalis, tamo irouya fõ marau ifen ken, iron, ‘Kulatun wiyẽf, sain aya kelauf bun, õ baban mala teten be uran, are aya kela afonõf.’
42010036	“Õ kisi wof, towo eneidi atun, ai anĩ, bẽ tamo imeid bun ilen anĩ ĩ ne tã?”
42010037	Lo keleĩ tamo solof iron, “Tamo ĩ nigin wau yun anĩ.” Jesus ĩ irokeken, “Ule, ĩ age fen gen, ago.”
42010038	Jesus, in dõ fiya tar geid, naab luwe dile fen, Jesus fonõ taka bun wõ yen, an kayau yana Marta yogon fõ bun Jesus ilauf nigin, Jesus irokenen.
42010039	Ĩ tura yana Maria, ĩ anĩ, Odug ye gariyan ibod ken, ĩ wogõ yen anĩ karĩ yen.
42010040	Anĩ ere, Marta ereb ereb dodok fiya anĩ bun kisi yen ken, Jesus wagen isi to fiyen, “Odug, neu turau itorna di, aya mugu kabĩ alef anĩ nigin, õ to kisi wof de? Ĩ uroken, aya isenna!”
42010041	Age ye di, Odug aiten yalen, “Marta, Marta, õ ereb ereb musei nigin suwẽ wo fen, waũ morok,
42010042	anĩ ere, tekelei dogol õ nigin biya. Maria ĩ biya ani igirim, anĩ taka nem to yalelkenẽf.”
42011001	Naa taka bun, Jesus modoũ taka bun kosẽ yen. Sain ĩ bure fele di, yogon dõ fiya tamo takam Jesus irokenen, “Odug, amã kosẽya nigin ufelnamã, Jon, ne dõ fiya tar ifelnẽdin gen.”
42011002	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Sain ã kosẽ gouf, eig ge urõgouf: “‘Dei, õ yanã fateul ibodõf, ogon tano isiyouf.
42011003	Naa mugu mugu bun, naa anĩ nẽ saaf wanamãf.
42011004	Ganan amã bun mosor dinof, amã idi neid mosor nigin wederamã tu kelef, age fiya bagai, õg amã nemã mosor nigin wederẽ tu kel. Ago fen, kisi famãya bun to uroulemãf.’”
42011005	Age ye fen, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Ãgenei taka ĩ, ne mou ado, anĩ bõ atun ĩ gein ile fen, irokenẽf, ‘Mou, bret towo nem usenna,
42011006	ere nigin, aya neu tã taka, aya bun delẽ isil, anĩ ere, aya ĩ yõya nẽ ereb taka sã.’
42011007	“Age ye di, ĩ aaben tamal anim irõf, ‘Aya kabĩ totol to wana. Sukar mogo kotũ felel, aya neu kesu tar geid mogo fataren mainek. Aya fã au fen, ereb taka ifonõya kisi feleya sã.’
42011008	Aya ã arokeneik, ĩ, ne mou nigin to fã ye fen, bret ifenẽf, anĩ ere, tamo are kukĩya sã kinĩ yei fiyẽ di, fã ye fen, ereb ĩ orof anĩ kilei ifenẽf.
42011009	“Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, to gouf, agef ã ifeneĩf; umirẽgouf, ã gurug gouf; godu godu gouf, ã sukar kã feneĩf.
42011010	Aibem taka to fouf, yalouf; aibem taka imirek, gurug fouf; aibem taka godu godu fouf, sukar kã fel kenẽf.
42011011	“Ã tama tar, aim ãgenei kesu gau nigin to fef, anĩ ban gogour wenẽgouf de?
42011012	Takag, ĩ tataro faat nigin to fef, ĩ ambei wenẽgouf de?
42011013	Ã seseneĩ bagai, anĩ ere, ãgenei kesu safina biya biya anĩ ifenẽdiya, ã keleĩ bagai youf are, ãgenei anĩ wal fiya, Temeĩ saa ilun ibodok, Awa Uur Fateul aib idi to difiyek, idi ifenẽdiyouf bagai!”
42011014	Jesus ait ifokeleya nẽ kaa sane irun. Sain kaa sane iyawo di, tamo ait ifokelen od wogõ yen, age fe di, tamo kayau musei terẽ den.
42011015	Anĩ ere, tamo tunĩ diron, “Are kaa sane neid mudur Belsebub yana bunem, ĩ kaa sesen irudif.”
42011016	Tunĩ Jesus kisi difiye ken, saa ilun tamal uris nigin to difen.
42011017	Jesus idi neid kisi kelei ken, idi irokenẽdin, “Tano taka yogo kiwai ifen ken, fara fouf, are sane lauf, fõ taka yogo kiwai ifen ken, fara fouf, are kubũ youf.
42011018	Satan ĩ yogo kiwai ifen ken, fara fouf are, yogon tano naig fe ifarauf? Aya enĩ orok, ere nigin, ã urõgef, aya Belsebub yana bunem kaa sesen arudif.
42011019	Are aya Belsebub yana bunem kaa sesen arudif are, ere bunem ãgenei dõ fiya tar kaa sesen dirudidig? Anĩ nigin, idim ã es diyeĩf.
42011020	Anĩ ere, aya Negur nẽ ima gege bunem kaa sesen arudif are, Negur nẽ tano mogo ã bun isil.
42011021	“Tamo megeir ado taka, ĩ waila kisi feleya ado yogon fõ lo fef are, in safina are totoũ.
42011022	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ yogon megeir wal fiya anim irounẽ lai fiye ken, yogon waila ĩ anĩ bun totol yaledig anĩ son fe fen, in safina gadõ fouf.
42011023	“Taka ĩ aya to fedẽ fiyaf, ĩ neu kiwai, takag, ĩ aya ado to kuru mafef are, ĩ firagagaũ fef.
42011024	“Sain kaa sane tamo bun tamal ulõ yeis fen, gerere tuan ile, si inoya modoũ imirek ile to fotou fef. Agef fen, ĩ irok, ‘Aya fõ atoron anĩ bun baban kelauf.’
42011025	Sain ĩ kel isif, fõ ani waĩ difel fen, madur difen anĩ ilef.
42011026	Anĩ nigin, ĩ ile fen, baban kaa sesen ĩ wal fiya sewen anĩ geif irou isif, age de fen, idi namen dile difaref. Age dife di, tamo anĩ gai sane bagai lef, uruwa bun nẽ tobonunã anĩ wal fiya.”
42011027	Jesus eneidi nigin wogõ ye mog, tamo kayau atun kayau taka iweig iron, “Sinã õ gõ yo ken, su ifonon, are ĩ el fiyek.”
42011028	Ĩ solof iron, “Age fiya ban, Negur nẽ od karĩ de fen, dõ difef anidi, el fedif.”
42011029	Tamo kayau guru fiya mala oduge di, Jesus iron, “Tamo kayau, gama sain enei bun dibodok, are sane bagai. Idi memelik nigin to difef, anĩ ere, taka to afenẽdiyouf, de profet Jona nẽ uris anĩ dogol afenẽdiyouf.
42011030	Jona are Niniwe taun tamo kayau bun uris, age fiya bagai, Tamo Naal ĩg sain enei nẽ tamo kayau bun uris.
42011031	Es fiya sain bun, Kuin Saut tamal fã ye fen, tamo kayau sain enei bun geid, idi neid mosor nigin kurõ falaisiyouf, ere nigin, kayau anĩ Solomon nẽ keleĩ karĩ youf nigin, teneub idiyan tamal isin, gama taka Solomon wal fiya are yeir.
42011032	Es fiya sain bun, Niniwe tamo kayau fã de fen, tamo kayau sain enei bun geid, idi neid mosor nigin kurõ difalaisiyouf, ere nigin, idi mogo Jona wogõ ye di, waud falei den, gama taka Jona wal fiya are yeir.
42011033	“Taka nem lam tõf fen, to iminẽyan be, beĩ kur inodig, age fiya ban, in yoki bun iseginẽdig, age fe di, idi aabẽ disif anidi lalan dilouf.
42011034	Malã are bouwã nẽ lam. Õ malã biyauf are, ogon bouwã gananeg lalan barikãf. Anĩ ere, õ malã sesen lauf are, ogon bouwãg gugum kalauf.
42011035	Anĩ nigin, lalan õ ado anĩ gugum keleya nigin lo walauf.
42011036	Age fiya nigin, ogon boũ ganan lalan barikãf fen, siri sitakã to gugum ouf are, lam nẽ lalan õ bun so fe di, yaor ledig gen, bouwa ganan oditekei lalan ouf.”
42011037	Sain Jesus wogõ ye bure fele di, Farisia tamo takam ĩ, Jesus ado saaf dãf nigin iweignẽ di, aaben ile, tebol bun ibodon.
42011038	Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo ĩ, Jesus ima ketem kulo fiya sã, saaf nigin ibodon anĩ ile fen, terẽ yen.
42011039	Age fe di, Odug ĩ irokenen, “Farisia tamo ã, kap ado beĩ agara kulo gedig, anĩ ere, ã namein akorouya ado sanem barikã.
42011040	Ã neneya tamo! Negur agara inon anĩ, nameg to inon de?
42011041	Anĩ ere, ereb beĩ namen ibodok anĩ maleg wenẽdigouf, ago ge di, ereb ereb ganan ã bun filiya ibodõf.
42011042	“Farisia tamo ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ã ãgenei edẽ, bakso ado, kabier tamal ereb ereb ganan farag fen, ten tekelei Negur wenẽgedig, anĩ ere, ã lo es fiya ado Negur nigin wau laa fiya utorõgedig. Ã dum nẽ anĩ dõg fen, uruwa nẽ anĩg to utorõgem, are dem.
42011043	“Farisia tamo ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ã Juda neid uub fõ bun modoũ malabag ibodõya ado, maket modoũ bun tamo kayau idim sere diyeik anĩ oroyeik.
42011044	“Ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ã tamo mekura dede fiya gen, tamo idi keleĩ sa ken, teten diyõdig.”
42011045	Lo keleĩ tamo taka Jesus irokenen, “Tise, õ enei urõ di, õ amãg kono wamak.”
42011046	Jesus solof iron, “Lo keleĩ tamo, ãg meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ã tamo kayau, morõ idi faali fiya nigin malai bagai anĩ wenẽdigedig, anĩ ere, ã aug imeĩ gege tekelei idi isennẽdiya nigin to fitei yedig.
42011047	“Ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ã profet neid matmat unogedig, anĩ ere, ã tubuĩ tarem idi didenkesin.
42011048	Anĩ nigin, ãgenei tubuĩ tar profet age difedin anĩ, ã megeir ge fen, yaor gef, ere nigin, idi profet didenkesin, ã idi neid matmat unogedig.
42011049	Age fiya nigin, Negur yogon kisi biya bunem iron, ‘Aya fau idi bun profet, aposel ado sur afediyouf, age afe di, idi tunĩ didenkeis fen, tunĩ kafĩ fiya difenẽdiyouf.’
42011050	Anĩ nigin, teneub inon gariya bunem isif, profet ganan neid naudeid fi felen anĩ nẽ mala solo, tamo kayau gama sain enei bun idim dalouf,
42011051	Abel nẽ naud bunem ile, Sekaraia ĩ tempel alta ado atun dukesin in naud bun. Aya ã momoi arokeneik, naud enĩ ganan nẽ mala solo, tamo kayau gama sain enei bun idim dalouf.
42011052	“Lo keleĩ tamo, ã meleĩlon ado, ere nigin, ã keleĩ nẽ ki walelegen, ã aug namen ileya sa ken, ã idi namen dilef anidi neid sukar katĩ welegef.”
42011053	Sain Jesus modoũ anĩ itoron, Farisia tamo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, ĩ bun kiwai totol dino, to fiya fire fire musei to difiyen,
42011054	ereb od wogõ youf bun dirounẽf nigin tari difiyen.
42012001	Dirub kele di, tamo kayau tausen musei biya guru difen, anĩ bun idi abob tete tete lalai de difaren, age dife di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar ketem irokeneĩd fen, iron, “Ã, Farisia tamo neid yis nigin lo welegei, are mala yaleya tobonunã.
42012002	Gama ereb dede fiya yenek, are ganan fau lelek falauf, gama ereb iminẽyan yenek, are ganan fau yaorouf.
42012003	Ã gugum bun wogõ gen anĩ, fau gaa lalan bun karĩ douf, ã aaben wedereim kosesẽ gen anĩ, fau fõ sokoronem kurõ difesiyouf.
42012004	“Neu mou tar, aya ã arokeneik, idi bouwa dukeis fen, anĩ dumen ereb taka baban age fiya kisi feleya sã anidi to kumĩ wodig.
42012005	Anĩ ere, ã aib kumĩ wiyẽgouf anĩ afelneĩf: Ĩ bouwa yukeis fen, dumen ã hel bun irãyeĩf nigin megeir ado anĩ kumĩ wiyẽgouf. Ariya, aya ã arokeneik, ĩ kumĩ wiyẽg.
42012006	Fisisir faif, tuwenti toea nẽ nem na nigin to sur gedig de? Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ anidi taka nigin to weder tu keledig.
42012007	Momoi, Negur ãgenei mudureĩ bun fatiyeĩ ganan iwes yalen. To kumĩ wog, ã fisisir musei wal fediya.
42012008	“Aya ã arokeneik, aibem taka, aya nigin tamo meleid bun kurõ falaisiyouf, Tamo Naal ĩg, ĩ nigin Negur nẽ engel meleid bun kurõ falaisiyouf.
42012009	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ, aya nigin tamo meleid bun wa fouf, ayag ĩ nigin Negur nẽ engel meleid bun wa afouf.
42012010	Taka ĩ, Tamo Naal nigin kiwai ifen ken, kobu yef are, in mosor yalelauf. Ani are, taka ĩ, Awa Uur Fateul kiwai ifen ken, kono fiyek, in mosor to yalelauf.
42012011	“Sain ã Juda neid uub fõ bun guri diyeĩ diroule, mudur adodo yeneid adodo meleid bun difarneĩf, an wauĩ moro ken, aug isenneĩf nigin naig mafouf, ere mauf, wog fen, to sii yeĩf,
42012012	ere nigin, sain anĩ bun, Awa Uur Fateul ereb wogõ gouf nigin, ifelneĩf.”
42012013	Tamo kayau musei atun, tamo takam Jesus irokenen, “Tise, neu turau urokenẽ di, amã urom akor foi mafouf.”
42012014	Jesus solof iron, “Aim aya ã atun es fiya tamo be, foi fiya tamo igirnan?”
42012015	Age ye fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Lo welegei, ereb ereb ganan bun akorouya anĩ lo welegei, tamo nẽ mata in safina musei bun to ibodok.”
42012016	Age ye fen, ĩ yaab od enei idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo taka safina musei ado, ne teneub bun saaf musei yaledig.
42012017	Ĩ kisi yalen, ‘Aya naig afouf? Aya neu saaf inoya nẽ modoũ sã.’
42012018	“Agef fen, ĩ iron, ‘Aya eig afouf anĩ de. Neu ki narĩ afeleid fen, odug nuwa anodiyouf, an neu saaf ado ereb ereb ganan anouf.
42012019	Age afel fen, aya yug nigin orõf, “Õ ereb ereb biyai biyai musei biya, yar musei nẽ unof. Ibodõya karika, saaf, naan wokon, waũ el fouf.”’
42012020	“Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ irokenen, ‘Õ neneya! Bõ enei bun bagai, aya ogon mata alelkonõf. Age afe di, aim ogo nigin dodok won anĩ yalouf?’
42012021	“Taka ĩ yogo nigin, agef safina kuru fef, anĩ ere, Negur mala bun maleg ibodok, ĩ bun eig bagai fe, wõ youf.”
42012022	Age ye fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Age fiya nigin, aya ã arokeneik, ã ãgenei bouweĩ mata ibodõf nigin to osig fen, ere saaf tãf gouf, ã ãgenei bouweĩ nigin to osig fen, ere gabar tafilaĩf gouf.
42012023	Mata anĩ saaf wal fiya, bouwa anĩ gabar wal fiya.
42012024	Ã kalog uledigedig, idi saaf to ditenẽdig, idi saaf to u difedig, idi ki be, udũ inoya modoũ sã, anĩ ere, Negur ifoutnẽdidig. Ã ninã anidi wal fediya bagai!
42012025	Ã takam yogon mata nigin osi ye fen, aua tekelei tobol fiya kisi feleya de?
42012026	Ã naal bagai enei age fiya kisi feleya sã nigin, ere nigin anĩ ã ereb ereb tunĩ nigin osi gef?
42012027	“Aa munĩ naig fe odugedig anĩ ulegedig. Idi kabĩ to daledig, to diwadig. Anĩ ere, aya ã arokeneik, kulu King Solomon yogon fula fiya medeĩya bun naki gegẽ biya biya ifonun animeg, aa munĩ taka to wal fen.
42012028	Anĩ ere, Negur dubur aa munĩ gama dogol ifarauf, nile di, yã irãf anĩ, agef naki fediyouf are, ã idi wal fediya bagai, Negur naig fe ã ifounneĩf, ã momoiya naal bagai ado!
42012029	Anĩ nigin, ã wauĩ ere saaf wãgauf be, ere naan wãgauf anĩ bun to unog, anĩ bun to osig.
42012030	Are haiden idi enĩ ganan nigin meleid dimirẽdig. Ãgenei Temeĩ ã lau gef anĩ ganan keleĩ.
42012031	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ tano umirẽg, ago ge di, safina eneidig ifeneĩf.
42012032	“Musei sã ã, to kumĩ wog, ere nigin, ãgenei Temeĩ, tano anĩ ã ifeneĩya nigin wau al fen.
42012033	Ãgenei safineĩ na sur ge fen, maleg wenẽdigouf. Ã mugu mugu moni nẽ kodol to serek fouf anĩ uwagauf, agog fen, saa ilun nẽ safina biya biya to sa kalauf anĩ kuru gouf, an bẽ tamo non to isidig, tutũ to dãf.
42012034	Ãgenei safina biya biya ibodok nẽ an, wauĩg an yenẽf.
42012035	“Kabĩ nẽ naki ufonũg fen, ãgenei lam tõg saika wog,
42012036	tamo idi, nedi odug, tamo kayau ado bagu fiya nẽ tar bunem kelouf nigin tari difedig, anĩ bunem, sain ĩ isi, sukar godu godu fe di, idi sã kaisã bagai ĩ sukar kã difelkenẽf anidi gen ago gouf.
42012037	Ferfer anidi ololo dife mog, nedi odug isi ilediyouf anĩ, idi nigin deuf, aya ã momoi arokeneik, ĩ fau yogo kabĩ nẽ naki ifoun kel, ferfer tebol bun ibodneĩd fen, isi, aruneid yalouf.
42012038	Ferfer anidi saika difel mog, nedi odug, bõ atun be, we ado be isi ilediyouf anĩ, idi nigin deuf.
42012039	Anĩ ere, ã enei keleĩ youf: Fõ marau ĩ, sain nanĩ be bun, bẽ tamo isiyouf anĩ keleĩ youf are, ĩ yogon fõ lo fe di, to narĩ fouf.
42012040	Ãg saika gouf, ere nigin, Tamo Naal ĩ fau sain to isiyouf gouf bun isiyouf.”
42012041	Pita to fen, “Odug, õ yaab od enei amã nigin de, ganan nigin urok?”
42012042	Odug solof iron, “Ferfer taka aim anĩ, dõ fiya biya, kisi biya ado de? Ĩ, yogon odugem ĩ yogon odug nẽ fõ bun, anidi neid saaf dogo neid sain kilei, dõf ifenẽdiyouf nigin, ima bun inof.
42012043	Sain tamo odug kelouf bun, ferfer biya bagai age fe di, ilouf, tamo odug ĩ el fiyẽf.
42012044	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo odug ĩ, yogon safina ganan, ferfer anĩ ima bun inouf.
42012045	Anĩ ere, ferfer taka ĩ wau bun irõf, ‘Neu tamo odug isiya nigin sain meluk yalef,’ age ye fen, ĩ gariya ino, tamo ferfer ado kayau ferfer iden ken, ĩ yogo saaf biya naan biya yokon, aai sẽ fedig.
42012046	Ferfer anĩ nẽ tamo odug, in isiya nẽ naa ferfer to isiyouf ye fen, kisif mog, in isiya sain ĩ keleĩ sã mog, isiyouf. Tamo odug, ferfer anĩ gudũf fisik fe fen, momoiya sã geid, nedi modoũ bun inenẽf.
42012047	“Ferfer taka ĩ, yogon tamo odug nẽ oroya kelei ken, to dodok fef be, yogon odug orof anĩ to dõf age fef, ĩ fau wõf musei fouf.
42012048	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ to kelei ken, darau yaleya nẽ anĩ age fef, ĩ musei to wõ fouf. Aib taka ĩ musei ifenen, ĩ bun musei yaleya nigin irokenẽf, agef fen, taka ĩ lo fouf nigin musei biya ifenen, ĩ bun musei biya yalouf nigin to fiyẽf.
42012049	“Aya tenebur yã arou asiyouf nigin asin, yã mala kaur mogom are, aya orou bagai fiyam.
42012050	Anĩ ere, aya naan igũya taka fau alouf, anĩ nigin, aya wau fatuk morok ile, anĩ kisi falauf.
42012051	Ã kisi gef, aya tenebur ein maur gudũ fiya arou asiyouf nigin asin de? Sã bagai, aya ã arokeneik, isoreya nigin asin.
42012052	Gama ilauf bun, ibor tekelei bun, idi faif fara de fen, towom uru kiwai difenẽdi di, urum towo kiwai difenẽdiyouf.
42012053	Idi fara de fen, tamam kesu kiwai ifenẽ di, kesum tama kiwai ifenẽf, sina, ne barai kiwai ifenẽ di, ne barai sina kiwai ifenẽf, sina yanawau kiwai ifenẽ di, yanawau kayau sina kiwai ifenẽf.”
42012054	Jesus tamo kayau musei irokenẽdin, “Sain ã gaa ileyan budũ fã ye di, uleg fen, ã kaisã bagai urõgedig, ‘Uyẽ isiyouf,’ ago ge di, age fedig.
42012055	Takag, yau karag maaĩ ubunem fũ fef, ã urõgedig, ‘Uruwa dõ fadauf,’ are agef wõ yedig.
42012056	Ã mala yaleya tamo! Teneub saa ado suma dinof anĩ uleg fen, es gouf nigin ã keleĩ. Naig fe di, sain enei nẽ suma es fiya nigin ã to keleik de?
42012057	“Ere nigin ã aug ereb biya anĩg to es gedig?
42012058	Õ ogon kiwai ado medistret bun uleg fen, naab luwen ogon kiwai ado od madur wouf, to agouf are, ĩ õ yale, es fiya tamo bun inenõf, age fe di, es fiya tamo õ polis bun inenõ di, polis õ kalabus bun inenõf.
42012059	Aya õ arokonok, õ wareg ganan to unolauf are, õ kalabus bun to kutũ wesiyouf.”
42013001	Sain anĩ bun, tunĩ an difaren anidim, Pailat Galili temeleid tunĩ neid naudeid ado dogo neid sesewi fiya nẽ safina ekul fen anĩ, Jesus dirokenen.
42013002	Jesus solof iron, “Ã kisi gef, Galili temeleid eneidi age de darau dalen nigin, idi neid mosor Galili temeleid ganan neid mosor wal fiya de?
42013003	Aya ã arokeneik, sã bagai! Anĩ ere, ã wauĩ to falei gouf are, ãg ganan inanakalauf.
42013004	Takag, Siloam fõ meluk tamo kayau bun kubũ ye fen, idi eitin idenkesin. Ã kisi gef, idi neid mosor, tamo kayau ganan Jerusalem taun difaref neid mosor wal fiya de?
42013005	Aya ã arokeneik, sã bagai! Anĩ ere, ã wauĩ to falei youf are, ãg ganan inanakalauf.”
42013006	Age ye fen, Jesus yaab od enei iron, “Tamo taka, aa fig tekelei yogon wain kabier itenen, anĩ ĩ ile, faat nigin mala itoton, anĩ ere, taka to ilen.
42013007	Anĩ nigin, ĩ wain kabĩ lo fiya tamo irokenen, ‘Yar towo aya asi, aa fig enei bun faat nigin malau atoton, anĩ ere, taka to ailen. Utu urã! Ere nigin teneub gigiru yakasif?’
42013008	“Kabĩ lo fiya tamo solof iron, ‘Odug, baban yar tekelei utorkana len, aya gariyan ku kalĩ afel, yaro te anouf.
42013009	Yar taka bun biyauf, are deuf! Sãf are, utu urã.’”
42013010	Sabat naa taka bun, Jesus Juda neid uub fõ taka bun od ifelnẽdin.
42013011	Kayau taka, yar eitin kaa sanem irounen nigin dagi ado, an ibodon. Kayau ĩ bagiya fe fesen, agef fen, ĩ madur ifareya kisi feleya sã bagai.
42013012	Sain Jesus kayau anĩ lof fen, ĩ wagen iweigne ken, ĩ irokenen, “Kayau, õ ogon dagi bun tamal õ karika afonok.”
42013013	Age ye fen, Jesus ĩ bun ima ino di, kaisã bagai kayau ĩ madur le ifar fen, Negur yana yalesen.
42013014	Juda neid uub fõ nẽ mudur, Jesus Sabat naa bun dagi el fiyen nigin, name sane fen, tamo kayau irokenẽdin, “Kabĩ yaleya nigin naa sigis ado. Anĩ nigin, naa anidi bun usig el yeĩf, Sabat naa bun sã.”
42013015	Odug ĩ irokenen, “Ã, mala yaleya tamo! Ã mugu mugu Sabat naa bun, ãgenei bulmakau be, donki be difaredig modoũ bun tamal birug fen, naan ifenẽdiya nigin to gurig ulegedig de?
42013016	Kayau enei, ĩ Abraham nẽ barai, ĩ Satanem sain meluk yar eitin ifokelnen, ĩ ifõya anĩ bun tamal Sabat naa bun to karika afenẽf de?”
42013017	Jesus od enei wogõ ye di, yogon kiwai tar ganan mama fedin, anĩ ere, Jesus ereb ereb biya bagai age fen ganan nigin, tamo kayau musei ganan waud al fen.
42013018	Anĩ nigin, Jesus to fen, “Negur nẽ tano anĩ, ere taka gen? Ere bun aya kisi afe di, susu falauf?
42013019	Are masted faat gen, anĩ tamo takam yale fen, yogon kabier itenen. Anĩ odug fen, aa wõ ye di, ninã ilun temeleid disi, were bun dibodadan.”
42013020	Baban ĩ to fen, “Negur nẽ tano anĩ, ere taka bun aya kisi afe di, susu falauf?
42013021	Are yis gen, anĩ kayau takam yale fen, flawa odug ado falei fe di, ganan gẽ yen.”
42013022	Jesus Jerusalem taun ilauf nigin naab luwen iyok ile fen, taun ado fonõ fonõ ile, od ifelnẽdin.
42013023	Takam Jesus to fiyen, “Odug, are teke tekelei dogol kel yalediyouf de?” Jesus idi irokenẽdin,
42013024	“Bobog kidõ anĩ ileya nigin kabĩ totol walogouf, ere nigin, aya ã arokeneik, musei idi namen dilauf nigin age difouf, anĩ ere, to kisi falauf.
42013025	Sain fõ marau fã ye fen, sukar inolalauf, ã serẽ ufareg fen, godu godu ge ugonẽgouf, ‘Odug, sukar kã wanamãf.’ “Anĩ ere, ĩ solof irõf, ‘Aya ã keleĩ sã, ã nainenem usigen.’
42013026	“Age ye di, ã urõgouf, ‘Amã õ geid saaf naan ado ton, ago fen, õ nemã naab bun od ufelnamak uyon.’
42013027	“Anĩ ere, ĩ solof irõf, ‘Aya ã keleĩ sã, ã nainenem usigen. Ã sane ago gedig ganan, aya malau bun uyaleleg!’
42013028	“Sain Abraham, Isak, Jakop, profet ganan geid, Negur nẽ tano bun uledig fen, ã aug mayarẽ irarãyeĩf, an inã wifirig fen, goboreĩ kikokõ youf.
42013029	Tamo kayau gaa iseyan temeleid, gaa ileyan temeleid, yat temeleid, fa temeleid disi, Negur nẽ tanon tar bun idi neid modoũ dalouf.
42013030	Momoi, an idi dumen dibodok fau malabag dibodõf, idi malabag dibodok fau dumen dibodõf.”
42013031	Sain anĩ bun, Farisia tamo tunĩ Jesus garan disi dirokenen, “Modoũ enei utor ken, taka bun ule. King Herod ĩ õ inokesiyou fenẽ.”
42013032	Jesus solof iron, “Uleg, gaũ kuĩ anĩ urokenẽg, ‘Gama ado nil, aya kaa sesen aruid fen, tamo kayau el afediyouf, age afe fen, naa towo bun, aya neu kabĩ anĩ uyu katõ afalauf.’
42013033	Anĩ ere, aya gama, nil, arã toko tokõ afouf, momoi bagai profet taka Jerusalem taun to ito ken, firen laa fouf!
42013034	“O Jerusalem, Jerusalem, õ profet udenkeis fen, õ bun sur fedig anidi, meein meein wedidig, sain ganĩ aya õ wau afon ken, ogon gerẽ tar kuru afediyouf nigin age afedig, tataro sina momou waye farumen kuru fedig gen, anĩ ere, õ utorõdig!
42013035	Ulegouf, ãgenei fõ ã bun fonou lef. Aya ã arokeneik, ã aya baban to uleyagauf ile, ã fau urõgouf, ‘Odug yana bunem isif ĩ el fiya ado.’ Sain anĩ bun, ã aya uleyagauf.”
42014001	Sabat naa taka bun, Jesus, Farisia tamo uyu irouya taka nẽ fõ bun, saaf yõya nigin ilen, idi an Jesus ololo difen.
42014002	Jesus wagen an, tamo taka bou didĩya nigin darau yaledig anĩ ibodon.
42014003	Jesus, Farisia tamo, lo keleĩ tamo geid to fedin, “Sabat naa bun, dagi el fediya anĩ lo dõ fiya de, sã?”
42014004	Anĩ ere, idi mutũ difaren. Anĩ nigin, Jesus tamo anĩ yale, el fiye kel sur fiyẽ di, ilen.
42014005	Agef fen, ĩ idi to difen, “Ã taka, Sabat naa bun, kesu be, bulmakau be taka kuren isilauf, ã kaisã bagai to dĩ wasagauf de?”
42014006	Age ye di, idi od solof irõya kisi feleya sã.
42014007	Jesus, tamo tebol bun modoũ malabag anĩ gei dife di, ile fen, ĩ idi yaab od enei irokenẽdin,
42014008	“Tamo kayau ado bagu fiya nẽ tar bun, aib õ iweignõf are, modoũ malabag anĩ to walouf, ere nigin, tamo taka õ wal yõya iweignen be.
42014009	Age fouf are, ã uru iweigneim marau isi, õ irokonõf, ‘Ogon modoũ anĩ, tamo enei wenẽ.’ Age ye di, õ mama yo ken, modoũ dumen bagai anĩ walouf.
42014010	Anĩ ere, õ iweignõf are, modoũ dumen anĩ walouf, ago di, iweignom marau isiyouf, ĩ õ irokonõf, ‘Mou, modoũ biya bun godo urou usel.’ Age fe di, õ modoũ malabag anĩ wale di, ã iweigneim turã tar ganan meleid bun õ yanã odug adouf.
42014011	Ere nigin, aib taka yogo yana yalesef, fau lai fesilauf, aib taka ĩ yogo yana lai fesilef, Negur ĩ yana yalesauf.”
42014012	Age ye fen, Jesus fõ marau irokenen, “Sain õ gaa atun saaf be, bõ saaf wenẽdiyou fenẽ, ogon mou tar, naud turã tar, sirag tar be, nẽ tã tar safina inid adodo to uweignẽdiyouf, agouf, idi aba diweignõf, anĩ bun õ mala solo difonõf.
42014013	Anĩ ere, sain õ tar unouf, maleg, bouweid sesen, yeid kirorõya, meleid ifofakeleya anĩ uweignẽdiyouf,
42014014	agouf, Negur õ el yõf. Idi aba õ ke de difonõya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, madur tamo neid mata kel fãya bun, Negur õ mala solo ifonõf.”
42014015	Tamo tebol bun weim dibodon anidi takam, od enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ Jesus irokenen, “Negur nẽ tanon tar bun tamo saaf yãf anĩ, ĩ el fiya ado.”
42014016	Jesus solof iron, “Tamo taka tar odug dodok fe fen, musei iweignẽdin.
42014017	Tar sain bun, ĩ iweignẽdin anidi irokenẽdiyouf nigin yogon ferfer sur fen, ‘Usig, gama ereb ereb ganan dodok felel.’
42014018	“Anĩ ere, idi ganan de tekelei gen galã od dinon. Uyulil ĩ iron, ‘Aya gama bagai kabĩ na alen, anĩ nigin, aya anĩ ailau fenẽ alauf. O malalon ado, aya to asiyouf.’
42014019	“Taka iron, ‘Aya bulmakau ten na alen, anĩ idi naig fiya anĩ ailau fenẽ elef. O malalon ado, aya to asiyouf.’
42014020	“Takag iron, ‘Aya gama bagai kayau mata alen nigin, aya isiya kisi feleya sã.’
42014021	“Ferfer kel ile, ne odug od enei irokenen. Age fe di, fõ marau name sane fen, yogon ferfer irokenen, ‘Kaisã bagai ule, taun nẽ naab odug, naab nanaal ado dõ wo fen, maleg, bouweid sesen, meleid ifofakeleya, yeid kirorõya anidi guri urou usi.’
42014022	“Ferfer iron, ‘Odug, õ urom are mogo age afel, anĩ ere, modoũ fau lolokã.’
42014023	“Age ye di, odug yogon ferfer irokenen, ‘Naab uyok ule fen, fonõ fonõ naabur tamo kayau idi anĩ disiyouf nigin totol bagai urokenẽdi di, disi, neu fõ isokosauf.
42014024	Aya ã arokeneik, aya tamo idi aweignẽdin anidi taka, neu tar bun saaf bagai to kobũ de dilouf.’”
42014025	Tamo kayau musei, Jesus weim dile fen, ĩ falei yel, idi irokenẽdin,
42014026	“Taka ĩ aya gein isif, ne tama, sina, ne kayau, kesu tar, ne tura tar, main tar, yogon matag to itorõf are, ĩ neu dõ fiya tamo wõ youf nigin kisi feleya sã.
42014027	Takag, taka ĩ yogon aa tetek to faali fe fen, aya dõ fiyaf, ĩ neu dõ fiya tamo wõ youf nigin kisi feleya sã.
42014028	“Ã taka, fõ meluk taka inoya nigin orouf are, ĩ tetun ibod ken, fõ inolauf nigin moni kisi feleya ado be anĩ es fouf, age fiya sã de?
42014029	Ere nigin, ĩ fõ gariya ino mã, inoleya to kisi falauf are, tamo kayau ganan anĩ dile fen, kasã difiye ken,
42014030	dirõf, ‘Tamo enei fõ kare fen, anĩ ere, inoleya kisi feleya sã.’
42014031	“Takag, king taka, king taka ado kusĩ douf nigin, ĩ ten tausen kusĩ tamo adom, king taka tuwenti tausen kusĩ tamo ado kusĩ disif anĩ, kusĩ bun wal fiyẽya kisi feleya be sã be anĩ, tetun ibod ken, es fouf, age fiya sã de?
42014032	Ĩ to kisi falauf are, ĩ king taka fau gerõ ifar mog, wowor fiya tamo sur fedi di, idi komo fiya nigin to difiyẽf.
42014033	Age fiya gen bagai, ã taka ĩ, ereb ereb ganan ĩ ado anĩ to itorõf are, ĩ neu dõ fiya tamo wõ youf nigin kisi feleya sã.
42014034	“Anĩ nigin, sol ĩ biya, anĩ ere, in kai sa kalauf are, naig fe di, ĩ baban kai youf?
42014035	Sol age fiya are, teneub ado falei fiya nigin ado, gaar te ado falei fiya nigineg to biya, anĩ nigin dirailedig. “Aib ĩ karĩya nigin weder ado, utornẽ karĩ youf.”
42015001	Takis yaleya tamo, mosor adodo geid ganan, Jesus karĩ difiyẽf nigin ĩ non disin.
42015002	Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, nauseir de fen, diron, “Tamo enei, mosor adodo aan fiyeĩd fen, weim saaf doko.”
42015003	Age de di, Jesus yaab od enei irokenẽdin,
42015004	“Ã taka wan handred sipsip ado, anĩ tekelei iminkalauf are, ĩ nainti-nain sipsip yaorin itorneĩd fen, iminkelen anĩ imirek ile fotou fedig, age fiya sã de?
42015005	Sain ĩ fotou fouf, ĩ wau adod fen, yale, benerin orowa sef,
42015006	fõ bun ilauf. Agef fen, ĩ ne mou tar ado, ne tã tar gou feid irõf, ‘Ã aya geid kulĩ tauf. Aya neu sipsip fõ yelen anĩ fotou afel.’
42015007	Aya ã arokeneik, age fiya gen bagai, mosor ado tamo taka wau falei yef bun, saa ilun kulĩya odug adouf anim, nainti-nain madur tamo baban faleiya nẽ sã idi nigin kulĩya wal fiya.
42015008	“Takag, kayau taka silwa koin moni ten ado, anĩ tekelei iminkalauf are, ĩ lam tõf, fõ waĩf fen, el fe imirek ile fotou fouf, age fiya sã de?
42015009	Sain ĩ fotou fouf, ĩ ne mou tar ado, ne tã tar gou feid irõf, ‘Ã aya geid kulĩ tauf. Aya neu silwa koin moni iminkelen anĩ fotou afel.’
42015010	Age fiya gen bagai, aya ã arokeneik, mosor ado tamo taka wau falei yef ĩ nigin, Negur nẽ engel meleid bun kulĩya odug wõ yef.”
42015011	Jesus tobol fe iron, “Tamo taka kesu uru adon.
42015012	Ibuyem tama irokenen, ‘Dei, akor neu anĩ fara wana.’ Anĩ nigin, temeid yogon safina idi atun foi fen.
42015013	“Anĩ bure fel fen, sain meluk to ilele di, kesu ibuye, safina ĩ ado ganan kuruf yale irou, teneub taka bun gerõ biya ilen, an in safina tobonunã to biya bun daũ felen.
42015014	Ĩ ereb ereb ganan daũ fele di, teneub anĩ bun naũ odug wõ yen, age fe di, ĩ bun lau fiya wõ yen.
42015015	Anĩ nigin, ĩ ile, fõ morou taka bun kabĩ yalouf nigin to fiyẽ di, fõ moroum ĩ bor saaf ifenẽdiyouf nigin yogon kabier sur fen.
42015016	Ĩ naũ bagai nigin bor saaf dõ di, ĩg anĩ yõya nigin orodig, anĩ ere, takam ereb taka to ifenẽdig.
42015017	“Ĩ kisi kelen sain, ĩ iron, ‘Neu dei ĩ kabĩ tamo musei ado, idi saaf barikã. Aya ein naum laa fiyau fenẽ!
42015018	Aya fã au, neu dei garan kelau fen, ĩ arokenẽf: Dei, aya saa ilun ado õ bun mosor anon.
42015019	Aya to biya nigin, neu kesu to wouf, ogon kabĩ tamo oroi waledin taka gen waleyauf.’
42015020	Anĩ nigin, ĩ fã ye, tama gein ilen. “Anĩ ere, ĩ fau gerõ iyok isi mog, tama ĩ kesu ile fen, ĩ nigin wau fatuk yũ di, kesu gein gudu ref ile, kakarai fiye ken, umã fiyen.
42015021	“Kesum tama irokenen, ‘Dei, aya saa ilun ado õ bun mosor anon. Aya to biya nigin, neu kesu to wouf.’
42015022	“Anĩ ere, tama ĩ yogon ferfer irokenẽdin, ‘Gamanem kolos biya bagai waleg urousig, ĩ ufounnẽg, ima gege bun sai unog fen, ye bun su unokenẽg.
42015023	Bulmakau lubu bou dĩya waleg urousig ukesig. Ada tar tano tokon, sigigi tafouf.
42015024	Ere nigin, neu kesu enei laa fen anĩ baban matal, ĩ fõ yelen anĩ baban fotou tafiyem.’ Anĩ nigin, idi gariya dino sigigi difen.
42015025	“Sain anĩ bun, kesu matu ĩ kabier ibodon. Dum ĩ iyok isi, fõ kelẽ fiye ken, fõ non kui de gurũ de mog, karĩ yen.
42015026	Agef fen, ĩ kabĩ tamo taka iweigne ken, to fiyen, ‘Oun ere naig difef?’
42015027	Kabĩ tamo ĩ aiten yale iron, ‘Turã kel isil, anĩ tamã bulmakau lubu bou dĩya yum, ere nigin, tamam ĩ bouwa totoũ biya bagai ado kel yalel.’
42015028	“Age ye di, tura matu name sane fen, fõ bun ileya nigin itoron. Age fe di, tama mayarẽ ile wowor fiyen.
42015029	Anĩ ere, kesu ĩ tama solof irokenen, ‘Ulefe, yar enei ganan aya õ sigor taka to wal afe fen, arunã alef asin. Anĩ ere, õ aya meme lubu taka wana di, neu mou tar geid to sigigi mafen.
42015030	Anĩ ere, õ naal enei are, ogon safina, kayau bouweid na nẽ sur difedig anidi bun daũ fel fen, fonõ isi di, õ bulmakau lubu bou dĩya ukenem!’
42015031	“Tama iron, ‘Neu kesu, õ aya ado faimud tabodõdig. Safina ganan aya ado, are ogon.
42015032	Anĩ ere, ada sigigi tafe fen, wauda al fem bagai, ere nigin, turã enei laa fen anĩ baban matal, ĩ fõ yelen anĩ baban fotou tafiyem.’”
42016001	Takag, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Safina musei ado tamo taka, ĩ yogon kabĩ tamo neid orowam in safina daũ fef yeya karĩ yen.
42016002	Anĩ nigin, ĩ iweignẽ ile di, to fiyen, ‘Eĩ ere od anĩ õ nigin karĩ auf? Ogon kabĩ walen anĩ faded wo di, karĩ auf, ere nigin, õ baban kabĩ tamo neid orowa to ubodõf.’
42016003	“Kabĩ tamo neid orowa yogo nigin iron, ‘Gama aya naig afouf? Neu odug neu kabĩ yalelkanaf. Aya meku yaleya nigin totolou sã, agef mãg, aya nonĩya nigin mama ado.
42016004	Aya naig be afouf are aya keleĩ, anĩ bunem sain aya neu kabĩ ein atorõf are, tamo kayau neid fõ bun ileya nigin aan difiyauf.’
42016005	“Age ye fen, ĩ, yogon odug bun wareg dalen anidi mugu mugu iweignẽdi di, disin. Ĩ tamo uyulil anĩ to fiyen, ‘Õ neu odug bun wareg ganĩ walen?’
42016006	“Ĩ aiten yale iron, ‘Eit handred galen aa oliv moul alen.’” Kabĩ tamo neid orowa ĩ irokenen, ‘Ogon wareg ditoton wale, kaisã ubod ken, fo handred utot.’
42016007	“Age ye di, ĩ uyulil dõ fiyen anĩ to fiyen, ‘Ba õ wareg ganĩ walen?’ “Ĩ solof iron, ‘Wan handred wit bek alen.’ “Kabĩ tamo neid orowam ĩ irokenen, ‘Ogon wareg ditoton wale, eiti utot.’
42016008	“Yogon odug ĩ, kabĩ tamo neid orowa idegẽya tamal, ĩ kisi el fe yale fen, age fen nigin, yana yalesen. Ere nigin, tamo kayau teneub enei bun temeleid kisi el de dale fen, ereb dogo neid nigin tamo kayau lalan bun temeleid wal fediya age difedig.
42016009	Aya ã arokeneik, teneub enei nẽ safina bunem ã aug nigin neĩ mou tar waledigouf, anĩ bunem, sain safina sa kalauf, mata gai ibodkeleya bun aan diyeĩf.
42016010	“Taka ĩ ereb naal bagai el fe lo fef, odug buneg agef lo fouf, taka ĩ naal bagai bun idegek, odug buneg idegẽf.
42016011	Anĩ nigin, ã tenebur enei nẽ safina to el ge lo gen ouf are, aim ã momoi nẽ safina lo fiya nigin ineneĩf?
42016012	Ã takan nẽ safina to el ge kulatun gen ouf are, aim anĩ ã safineĩ ifeneĩf?
42016013	“Kabĩ tamo takam odug uru bun to kabĩ yalouf. Taka nigin to wau yen ken, taka nigin wau laa fouf be, taka anĩ aruna yale fen, taka anĩ to awa yãf. Ã Negur nigin ado moni nigin aruna yaleya kisi feleya sã.”
42016014	Farisia tamo moni nigin waud laa fedig anĩ, od enei ganan karĩ de fen, Jesus kasã difiyen.
42016015	Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã bagai anĩ, tamo meleid bun, ã aug nigin biya age mafef gedig, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ wauĩ keleĩ bagai. Tamo ereb nigin waud fatuk difenek, are Negur mala bun ninir bagai.”
42016016	“Lo nẽ od ado, profet neid od wogõ def disi, Jon bun daun. Sain anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ tano nigin biya od wogõ def disif, age fe di, ganan namen ileya nigin mugu mugu teĩbir def.
42016017	Saa teneub ado iminkeleya nigin are karika, anĩ ere, Lo bun itotoya togo fiya naal bagai taka to iminkalauf.
42016018	“Taka ĩ aiwa iru fen, kayau taka yalouf are, ĩ seseirã inof, taka ĩ kayau tamo takam irun anĩ yalouf are, ĩ seseirã inof.
42016019	“Safina musei ado tamo taka, naa ganan bun kolos naki biya, saaf biya, ibodõya biya ibodõdig.
42016020	Maleg taka yana Lasarus, gurumam barikã, safina musei ado tamo ne bobogẽ yenẽdig.
42016021	Agef fen, ĩ, safina musei ado tamo nẽ tebol bunem kuku ref anĩ yãf nigin orodig. Gaũg disi, guruma seum difedig.
42016022	“Dum maleg tamo laa fe di, engelem Abraham wagen dirou diselen. Safina musei ado tamog laa fe di, mũ difen.
42016023	Laa neid modoũ bun, safina musei ado tamo darau odug yale fen, ĩ gerõ mala irakel, Lasarus Abraham wagen ibod mog, ilen.
42016024	Agef fen, ĩ Abraham iweigne ken, iron, ‘Dei Abraham, aya nigin waũ ino ken, Lasarus sur wiyẽ di, ima gege uyum naan kobũf fen, irousi baleu felu kouf, ere nigin, aya yã enei bun darau odug alef.’
42016025	“Anĩ ere, Abraham aiten yale iron, ‘Kesu, õ mata ubodon sain, õ ereb ereb biya wale mog, Lasarus ĩ ereb ereb to biya yalen, anĩ karĩ wo, anĩ ere, gama ein ĩ wau wã fe di, õ darau odug bun ubodok.
42016026	Takag, enei ganan teten, amã ã geid atun meku odug inon, anĩ bunem, idi ein tamal ã gein isiya nigin kisi feleya sã, takam an tamal amã gein ibal isiya nigineg kisi feleya sã.’
42016027	“Ĩ aiten yale iron, ‘Age fiyauf are, Dei, aya õ agonok, neu dei nẽ fõ bun Lasarus sur wiyẽ di, isilauf,
42016028	ere nigin, aya turau tar faif dibodok. Utornẽ len, wedereid irouwauf, age fe di, idig darau odug nẽ modoũ enei bun to disiyouf.’
42016029	“Abraham solof iron, ‘Idi Moses nẽ itotoya ado profet neid itotoya ado, utorneĩd len, idi anidi bun wedereid dinouf.’
42016030	“Ĩ iron, ‘Age fiya sã, Dei Abraham, laa bun tamal takam idi bun isilauf are, idi waud falei youf.’
42016031	“Anĩ ere, Abraham tamo anĩ irokenen, ‘Idi Moses nẽ od ado profet neid od nigin to wedereid dinouf are, laa bun tamal takam fã ye fen, idi irokenẽdiyoufeg to karĩ douf.’”
42017001	Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Ereb ereb tamo mosor bun inenẽdiyouf anĩ isiyouf bagai, anĩ ere, tamo nanĩ be bunem isif, ĩ malalon ado.
42017002	Taka ĩ nanaal enidi taka mosor bun inenẽya ban, ĩ meein odug guyutu bun ifo ken, maaĩwõ irãya nigin biya bagai.
42017003	Anĩ nigin, ã lo welegei. “Õ turã mosor inouf, ou wiyẽf, anĩ ĩ falei youf are, õ in mosor nigin wederẽ tu kel.
42017004	Ĩ naa tekelei bun, õ bun mosor ino sewen fouf, ĩ õ gein isi, sewen fe irõf, ‘Aya awaul,’ õ in mosor nigin wederẽ tu kel.”
42017005	Aposel idi Odug dirokenen, “Nemã momoiya odug wouf!”
42017006	Jesus solof iron, “Ã momoiya naal, masted faat gen adouf are, aa enei urokenẽgouf, ‘Kusu wale, usil maaĩwõ ufarauf,’ ago ge di, ã sigoreĩ dõ fouf.
42017007	“Ã taka, yogon ferfer kabier teneub yũf be, sipsip lof fen, kabierem isi mog, ne maraum tau, ‘Kaisã bagai saaf yõya nigin usi ubod,’ fiyẽf de?
42017008	Age fiya ban, ĩ eig youf, ‘Neu saaf dodok wol fen, õ naki wol, arunau wale, akas bure afele di, gama õ saaf ado naan wãf.’
42017009	Ĩ irokenẽ di, dõf age fen nigin, maraum ferfer tau de wiyal fiyẽf de?
42017010	Anĩ nigin, ã ereb ereb irokeneik anĩ ganan dõg, ago weleg fen, ãg eig ge urõgouf, ‘Amã ferfer to biya, amã nemã kabĩ anĩ dogol malel.’”
42017011	Jesus Jerusalem ileya nigin, Samaria ado Galili distrik daũ atu iyok ilen.
42017012	Ĩ fonõ taka bun ile mog, tamo ten lepra dagi adodo, ĩ fotou difiyen. Idi gerom difar fen,
42017013	aiteid odug nem diweig diron, “Jesus, Odug, amã nigin malalon yõ!”
42017014	Sain ĩ idi ileid fen, iron, “Uleg, aug bouweĩ pris ufelnẽdigouf.” Age ye di, idi dile mog, bouweid biya len.
42017015	Idi neid taka bouwa biya len anĩ ile fen, kel isi, ait odugem Negur yana yalesen.
42017016	Jesus ye gariyan kubũ ye yen ken, de wiyal fiyen, ĩ Samaria tamal.
