42017017	Age fe di, Jesus to fen, “Ten ganan to biya ledin de? Tamo nain idi nain difaref?
42017018	Takam to kel isi, Negur yana yalesel, yaũ enei dogol de?”
42017019	Jesus age ye fen, ĩ irokenen, “Fã wale fen, ule, ogon momoiyam õ el yom.”
42017020	Sain taka, Farisia tamom, Negur nẽ tano ere sain isiyouf nigin Jesus to difiyẽ di, Jesus solof iron, “Negur nẽ tano, malam ileya kisi feleya sã bunem isidig,
42017021	tamo to ‘Eĩ yeir,’ be, ‘Your oun,’ be douf, ere nigin, Negur nẽ tano are ã atun ibodok.”
42017022	Age ye fen, Jesus yogon dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Sain isi di, Tamo Naal nẽ naa taka ileya nigin oroyeĩf, anĩ ere, ã anĩ to ulogouf.
42017023	Tamom dirokeneĩf, ‘Ĩ your!’ be, ‘Ĩ yeir!’ douf. Ã, to uleg, idi to dõ wedig.
42017024	Ere nigin, Tamo Naal, yogon naa bun, kolimei filiya lalan saa gariyanem irou, idikeleyan isiledig gen.
42017025	Anĩ ere, uruwa ĩ darau musei yale di, tamo kayau sain enei bun dibodok anidi ĩ dudum difiyẽf.
42017026	“Noa nẽ sain bun age fen gen, age fiya bagai Tamo Naal nẽ sain buneg age fouf.
42017027	Tamo kayau saafei de fen, naanuei den, tamo kayau yalef, kayau tamo difenek difen, age de dile mog, Noa waag namen ilen. Agef mog, kuwei isi fen, idi ganan daũ fedin.
42017028	“Lot nẽ sain buneg de age difen, tamo kayau saafem, naanem difen, na dalef, na sur difef, saaf diten, fõ dino mog, difen.
42017029	Anĩ ere, naa Lot Sodom taun itor ilen bun, yã ado meein salfa, saa bunem uyẽ gen kukur fen, idi ganan daũ fedin.
42017030	“Age fiya gen bagai, Tamo Naal yaorouf nẽ naa bun, agef wõ youf.
42017031	Naa anĩ bun, taka ĩ yogon fõ agaran ibod mog, in safina namen ibodok anĩ yalouf nigin to kel isilauf. Age fiya bagai, taka ĩ kabier ibodok, yogon safina yalouf nigin to kel ilauf.
42017032	Lot nẽ kayau bun kisi gouf!
42017033	Taka ĩ yogon mata yalouf nigin kisi fouf, ĩ mata anĩ fõ yalauf. Taka ĩ yogon mata anĩ itorõf are, ĩ yogon mata irou kafĩ falauf.
42017034	Aya ã arokeneik, bõ anĩ bun, tamo uru idi fatar tekelei bun denẽf, tekelei yalouf, taka itornẽf.
42017035	Kayau uru idi wit ditutu mog, tekelei yalouf, taka itornẽf.”
42017037	Idi to difen, “Odug, õ urok anĩ nain wõ youf?” Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Nain be laa yenek nẽ an, tum guru difouf.”
42018001	Age ye fen, Jesus, in dõ fiya tar idi faimud kosẽya nigin tuweid to yũf anĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin, yaab od taka irokenẽdin.
42018002	Ĩ iron, “Taun taka bun, es fiya tamo taka ibodon, ĩ Negur to kumĩ fiyẽdig, tamog to iwesnẽdig.
42018003	Taun anĩ bun an, kayau waab taka ibodon, ĩ es fiya tamo bun toku kel fen, yogon kiwai mala solo ifenẽf nigin irokenẽyai yedig.
42018004	“Es fiya tamo ĩ kaisã to karĩ fiyen, anĩ ere, dum ĩ yogo nigin iron, ‘Aya Negur to kumĩ afiyek, tamog to awesnẽdif,
42018005	anĩ ere, kayau waab enei toku morõ ifanaf nigin, in morõ anĩ ail fen, kayau ĩ irok anĩ age afouf, anĩ bunem ĩ to kel fen, morõ ifanauf!’”
42018006	Jesus age ye fen, iron, “Es fiya tamo sane, ereb ĩ iron anĩ karĩg.
42018007	Negur yogon igirnẽdin anidi, bõ ado gaa ado diweig dirokenẽdig nigin, ĩ lo nẽ madur fiya to ifenẽdiyouf de? Ĩ sain meluk to karĩ fiyẽdiyouf de?
42018008	Aya ã arokeneik, ĩ kaisã bagai lo nẽ madur fiya ifenẽdiyouf. Anĩ ere, Tamo Naal isiyouf sain bun, tenebur ein ĩ momoiya fotou fouf de?”
42018009	Tunĩ idi dogo nigin amã madur bagai de fen, tunĩ meleid irim lai difedidig anidi bun, Jesus yaab od eneig irokenẽdin,
42018010	“Tamo uru tempel bun kosẽ douf nigin diselen, taka Farisia tamo, taka takis yaleya tamo.
42018011	Farisia tamo ifar fen, yogo nigin kosẽ yen, ‘Negur õ de ayok, aya tamo tunĩ gen sã, bẽ diledig, sane age difedig, seseirã dinodig, takis yaleya tamo enei geneg sã.
42018012	Aya uub tekelei bun naa uru kuri au fen, ereb ereb ganan aya alef anĩ, ten teke tekelei õ afonõdig.’
42018013	“Anĩ ere, takis yaleya tamo ĩ so rel ifaren. Ĩ saa iluneg to itad fen, anĩ ere, ĩ akor yu ken, iron, ‘Negur, aya nigin waũ inõf, aya mosor temelou.’
42018014	“Aya ã arokeneik, Farisia tamo anĩ sã, takis yaleya tamo enei, Negur mala bun ĩ madur fen, fõ bun ilen. Ere nigin, taka ĩ yogo yana yalesef, Negur ĩ yana lai fouf, taka ĩ yogo yana lai fef, Negur ĩ yana yalesauf.”
42018015	Takag, tamo kayau, Jesus kesu momoug kobũ fediyouf nigin ĩ wagen guri difeid disin. Age dife di, in dõ fiya tar anĩ dile fen, idi ou difiyẽdin.
42018016	Anĩ ere, Jesus kesu ĩ wagen iweigneĩd fen, iron, “Utornẽdig len, kesu nanaal aya wageun disiyouf, idi to katũ wedig, ere nigin, Negur nẽ tano are eig fediya neid.
42018017	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aib taka ĩ, Negur nẽ tano, kesu naal age fiya gen to yalouf are, ĩ Negur nẽ tanon to bagai ilauf.”
42018018	Uyu irouya tamo taka Jesus to fiyen, “Tise biya, aya ere naig afe fen, mata faimud ibodkeleya alouf?”
42018019	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ere nigin õ aya anĩ biya wiyaf? Aibem taka biya sã, Negur yogo dogol.
42018020	Õ ĩtãfiya keleĩ: ‘Õ seseirã to unouf, õ tamo taka to ukesiyouf, õ to bẽ walouf, õ taka nigin idegẽya od to urõf, sinã tamã yeneid walesauf.’”
42018021	Age ye di, ĩ iron, “Enei ganan aya kesu naalun dõ afef asin.”
42018022	Jesus enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ irokenen, “Õ fau tekelei anĩ inĩ sã. Ogon safina ganan na nigin sur wo fen, maleg tamo weneĩd, agouf anĩ õ saa ilun safina biya adouf. Ago wol fen, usi, aya dõ wiya.”
42018023	Anĩ ere, ĩ od enei karĩ ye fen, wau fatuk gudũ fen, ere nigin, ĩ safina musei biya ado.
42018024	Jesus ĩ lege fiye ken, iron, “Safina musei adodo tamo, Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin, gai malai bagai!
42018025	Momoi, kamel ĩ, gabar iwaya nẽ nil ku bun ileya nigin, karika bagai, safina musei ado tamo, Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin, malai bagai.”
42018026	Idi od anĩ karĩ de fen, to difen, “Age fiyauf are, aim anĩ mata ibodkeleya anĩ yaleya nigin kisi feleya?”
42018027	Anĩ ere, Jesus solof iron, “Ereb tamom age fiya nigin kisi feleya sã anĩ, Negur age fiya nigin kisi feleya.”
42018028	Pita Jesus irokenen, “Ulef, amã õ dõ mayõf nigin, ereb ereb ganan amã ado anĩ matoron!”
42018029	Age ye di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aib taka fõ, kayau, tura tar, sina tama tar be, gere tar, Negur nẽ tano nigin itoron,
42018030	ĩ mala solo musei bagai sain enĩ bun yalouf, ĩ dumen isiyouf buneg mata faimud ibodkeleya yalouf.”
42018031	Age ye fen, Jesus, in dõ fiya tar tuwelf firen geif iroule irokenẽdin, “Ulegef, ada Jerusalem teselef, ereb ereb ganan Tamo Naal nigin profet ditoton anĩ, fau kisi falauf.
42018032	Ĩ fau haiden Israel sã anidi imeid bun ilauf. Idi ĩ fau diselinẽf, kono difiyẽf, disisnẽf, wagĩ difiye ken, dukesiyouf.
42018033	Naa towo bun, ĩ fau baban mata kel fã youf.”
42018034	Anĩ ere, dõ fiya tar, enei ganan taka to kelein. Od anĩ nẽ gariya idi bun iminen, agef fen, idi ĩ ereb nigin irok anĩ to kelein.
42018035	Sain Jesus Jeriko kelẽ fiyẽ mog, tamo taka mala ifofakeleya, naab yerin nonĩ yef ibodon.
42018036	Ĩ tamo kayau musei disi dilef ya karĩ ye fen, ereb wõ yef anĩ nigin to fedin.
42018037	Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Jesus Nasaret tamal isi ilef.”
42018038	Age de di, ĩ iweig iron, “Jesus, Dawid Naal, aya nigin malalon yõ!”
42018039	Tamo uyu dilen anidim sakã difiye ken, foro yalauf nigin dirokenen, anĩ ere, ĩ wade bagai iweig iron, “Dawid Naal, aya nigin malalon yõ!”
42018040	Jesus dẽ yel fen, tamo ĩ wagen dirou disiyouf nigin irokenẽdin. Ĩ isi melsã di, Jesus ĩ to fiyen,
42018041	“Aya õ ere age afonõf ani, õ oroyok?” Tamo anĩ solof iron, “Odug, aya malau kelẽ yalau fenẽ.”
42018042	Age ye di, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Malã fara wol, ogon momoiya anim el yom.”
42018043	Kaisã bagai, ĩ mala fara fel fen, Jesus dõf, Negur yana yalesen. Tamo kayau ganan anĩ dile fen, idig Negur yana dalesen.
42019001	Jesus Jeriko taun wõ ye fen, atu iyok ilen.
42019002	Tamo taka yana Sakeus an ibodon. Ĩ takis yaleya tamo neid mudur, safina musei ado.
42019003	Ĩ Jesus ĩ ai bagai anĩ ilouf nigin oron, anĩ ere, ĩ tobega tamo nigin ĩ kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, tamo kayau musei dinonolnen.
42019004	Anĩ nigin, ĩ ket gudu ref ile, Jesus ilouf nigin aa fig ilun sõ yen, ere nigin, Jesus naab anĩ dõf, are isi ilauf.
42019005	Sain Jesus modoũ anĩ bun ulõ yeis fen, mala ilun ira ken, ĩ irokenen, “Sakeus, kaisã bagai kutũ weis. Gama aya ogon fõ bun abodõf bagai.”
42019006	Age ye di, ĩ kaisã kutũ yeis fen, wau sere fiya ado Jesus aan fiyen.
42019007	Tamo kayau ganan enei dile fen, kosesẽ kurã den, “Ĩ mosor ado tamo nẽ fõ bun mogo ilef.”
42019008	Anĩ ere, Sakeus ifar fen, Jesus irokenen, “Odug, ulef! Gama yeir aya neu safina atun fara afe fen, sitakã maleg tamo afenẽdiyouf, aya idegẽya bunem tunĩ neid safina alen are, aya idi mugu mugu mala solo aiwa ifenẽya teten ano fen, afenẽdiyouf.”
42019009	Age ye di, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Gama kel yaleya anĩ fõ enei bun isil, ere nigin, tamo enĩ, ĩg Abraham naal taka.
42019010	Ere nigin, Tamo Naal fõ delen anidi imirneĩd fen, kel gei fouf nigin isin.”
42019011	Idi od enei karĩ de mog, Jesus tobol fe, yaab od taka irokenẽdin, ere nigin, ĩ mogo Jerusalem melsã ifaref, anĩ nigin, tamo kayau Negur nẽ tano kaisã bagai wõ youf de fen, kisi difen.
42019012	Anĩ nigin, ĩ iron, “Tamo taka yana odug ado, ĩ king dinenẽ di, kel isiyouf nigin fõ takã gerõ bagai ilen.
42019013	Anĩ nigin, ĩ yogon ferfer ten iweig laisi fen, moni wan tausen kina mugu mugu ifeneĩd fen, irokenẽdin, ‘Moni enei kabĩ wenẽg mog, aya kelauf.’
42019014	“Anĩ ere, yogon tamo tar kiwai difen ken, eig de dirõf nigin ĩ dumen arũ tamo sur difen, ‘Amã tamo enei nemã king wõ youf nigin to oromak.’
42019015	“Anĩ ere, ĩ king yana yale fen, fonõ kel isin. Agef fen, ĩ, ferfer moni ifenẽdin idi moni ado naig de kabĩ dalen anĩ ilouf nigin, iweignẽdi di, disin.
42019016	“Tamo uyu ĩ isi iron, ‘Odug, aya ogon wan tausen kina bun, ten tausen kina taka alen.’
42019017	“Age ye di, yogon odug solof irokenen, ‘Õ ferfer biya, õ de agon! Õ safina naal bagai bun kabĩ biya walen nigin, taun ten lo weid.’
42019018	“Ĩ dõ fiya taka isi iron, ‘Odug, aya ogon wan tausen kina bun, faif tausen kina taka alen.’
42019019	“Age ye di, yogon odug ĩg irokenen, ‘Õ taun faif lo weid.’
42019020	“Age fe di, ferfer taka isi iron, ‘Odug, ogon moni yeir. Aya moni anĩ gabar masak nem sile afe fen, anokon.
42019021	Aya õ nigin kumĩ aun, ere nigin, õ tamo totol ado. Õ ereb to unokon anĩ waledig, onom to utenen anĩ kusu wodig.’
42019022	“Yogon odug ĩ irokenen, ‘Aya ogon od bunem es ayõf, õ ferfer sane! Õ kelein, aya tamo totol ado, ayam to anokon anĩ aledig, ayam to atenen anĩ kusu afedig de?
42019023	Ere wo fen, neu moni benk bun to unon? Ago wom are, sain aya kelauf bun, moni kabĩ yalen anĩ nẽ mala ado, moni õ benk wenen anĩ bagu fiya kel isin ado alem.’
42019024	“Age ye fen, odug idi difaren anidi irokenẽdin, ‘Yogon moni son ge fen, tamo ten tausen kina ado anĩ wenẽg.’
42019025	“Age ye di, idi ĩ dirokenen, ‘Odug, ĩ mogo ten tausen kina ado!’
42019026	“Odug solof iron, ‘Aya ã arokeneik, taka ĩ ado, aya teten anouf, anĩ ere, taka ĩ sã bagai, ereb taka ĩ ado areg, ĩ bun tamal son fouf.
42019027	Anĩ ere, neu kiwai tar, aya nedi king ibodõya nigin to orodin anidi, ein wageun gurig urousig fen, malau bun udenkesig.’”
42019028	Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, Jerusalem iseleya nigin, ĩ ketem uyu iselen.
42019029	Jesus Moul Arei bun Betfage ado Betani fonõ kelẽ fiye ken, in dõ fiya tar uru sur feid irokenẽdin,
42019030	“Fonõ wageik anĩ bun uleg, an wõg fen, donki naal difon anĩ ulogouf, are aibem taka anĩ bun to iyon. Anĩ biru weleg fen, ein urou usig.
42019031	Taka nem to yeĩf, ‘Ere nigin ã anĩ biru gef?’ urokenẽgouf, ‘Odug anĩ kabĩ ifenẽf nigin.’”
42019032	Anĩ nigin, uyu sur fedin idi dile, Jesus irokenẽdin kilei bagai anĩ fotou difen.
42019033	Idi donki naal biru de mog, anĩ nẽ marau tamo idi to difiyẽdin, “Ã ere nigin donki naal anĩ biru gef?”
42019034	Idi ĩ solo de dirokenen, “Odug anĩ kabĩ ifenẽf nigin.”
42019035	Idi donki naal anĩ Jesus wagen dirousi fen, idi neid gabar teten dirara ken, ĩ anĩ teten dinenẽ ibodon.
42019036	Jesus iyok ile mog, tamo kayau idi neid gabar naabur du difedin.
42019037	Sain ĩ iyok isi, naab Moul Arei bunem isileya non, in dõ fiya tar ganan, memelik ganan inodin dilen nigin, waud al fiya ado aiteid odug nem Negur yana dalesen:
42019038	“King, Odug yana bunem isif, are ĩ el fiya ado!” Saa ilun wau inosiya ado, ilun bagai fula fiya medeĩya ado!”
42019039	Tamo kayau atun, Farisia tamo tunĩ Jesus dirokenen, “Tise, ogon dõ fiya tar sakã wiyeĩd!”
42019040	Anĩ ere, Jesus solof iron, “Aya ã arokeneik, idi foro dalauf are, meein eneidi diweig dirõf.”
42019041	Ĩ Jerusalem kelẽ fiye ken, taun anĩ ile, wau gudũ fe di, inã yale,
42019042	iron, “Õ Jerusalem naa enei bun, õ nigin erebem waũ inosiya irou isif anĩ õ keleim, are dem, anĩ ere, gama õ malã bun iminek.
42019043	Sain taka õ bun isiyouf, ogon kiwai tar, õ bun teneub mudu dino, salili diyokel, afi diyokalauf.
42019044	Idi õ tenebur dale dirãyõf, õ ado gerẽ tar ogon kau namen difaref geid. Idi meein taka taka teten ditorõ di, to ibodõf, ere nigin, Negur õ bun isin nẽ naa anĩ to ulegen nigin.”
42019045	Jesus tempel modoũ bun ile, idi ereb ereb na nigin sur de mog, an irudidin.
42019046	Agef fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, ‘Neu fõ are, kosẽya nẽ fõ ibodõf,’ anĩ ere, ãgem ‘bẽ tamo neid iminẽya fõ’ unogen.”
42019047	Naa ganan Jesus tempel bun ifelnẽdidin. Anĩ ere, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo geid, Jesus dukesiyouf nigin naab dimiren.
42019048	Anĩ ere, idi age difouf nigin naab taka to dilen, ere nigin, tamo kayau ganan in od anĩ diroun.
42020001	Naa taka bun, Jesus tempel bun tamo kayau ifelneĩd fen, biya od wogõ yen. Agef mog, pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, mudur adodo geid, ĩ gein disin.
42020002	Idi diron, “Aim õ igirnõ di, õ ereb ereb enĩ ago wof anĩ urokanamã. Aim õ igirnon?”
42020003	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ayag to fiya taka afeneĩf. Solog urokanag,
42020004	Jon naan igunẽdin are saa ilun tamal de, tamo bunem?”
42020005	Idi dogo dogol katõ de fen, diron, “Ada, ‘Saa ilun tamal,’ tauf are, ĩ to fouf, ‘Ere nigin ã ĩ nigin to momoi wiyẽgen?’
42020006	Anĩ ere, ada, ‘Tamo bunem,’ tauf are, tamo kayau ganan meeinem dinadauf, ere nigin, idi Jon ĩ profet den.”
42020007	Anĩ nigin, idi solo de diron, “Ĩ nain be tamal are amã keleĩ sã.”
42020008	Age de di, Jesus iron, “Ayag ã to arokeneĩf, aim aya igirna di, aya ereb ereb enĩ age afedif.”
42020009	Jesus tobol fe, yaab od enei tamo kayau irokenẽdin, “Tamo taka wain kabĩ yale, ĩ mala solo yalouf nigin wain kabĩ, kabĩ tamo tunĩ imeid bun ino fen, sain meluk uyu takã ilen.
42020010	Fito fiya sain, ĩ ferfer taka wain kabĩ lo fiya tamo gedin, wain biya tunĩ difenẽf nigin sur fen. Anĩ ere, idi ĩ du ken, sur difiyẽ di, ima sãsã ilen.
42020011	Ĩ ferfer taka sur fen, anĩ ere, idi tamo anĩg du ken, mama difenẽ di, ima sãsã ilen.
42020012	Ĩ baban takag sur fe di, idi ĩg darau difen ken, dumeitur diran.
42020013	“Age dife di, wain kabĩ marau iron, ‘Aya ere naig afouf? Aya neu kesu, oboiyou, sur afouf. Idi ĩ anĩ karĩ difiyẽf be.’
42020014	“Anĩ ere, kabĩ lo fiya tamo idi ĩ dile fen, abob dirokenen. Idi diron, ‘Eĩ ĩ akorouf. Ada ĩ taukeis fen, akor eĩ nedauf.’
42020015	Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ wain kabĩ dumeitur dira ken, dukesin.” Age dife di, wain kabĩ marau naig fediyouf?
42020016	Ĩ isi, kabĩ lo fiya tamo idenkeis fen, wain kabĩ anĩ tamo tunĩ ifenẽdiyouf.” Sain tamo kayau od enei karĩ de fen, idi diron, “Enei to bagai agef wõ youf!”
42020017	Anĩ ere, Jesus idi lo feid le fen, to fedin, “Age fiyauf are, ere gariya nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok: “‘Meein are fõ inoya tamom sane de fen, ditoron, meein anĩ gama monog tor wõ yen’?
42020018	Aib taka meein anĩ teten kubũ youf, mereb fe fisik fouf, takag, aib taka meein anĩ ĩ teten kubũ youf, ĩ danĩf aas lauf.”
42020019	Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, pris odudug geid, Jesus kaisã bagai irounẽya nigin naab dimiren, ere nigin, idi kelein, ĩ idi nigin yaab od enei wogõ yen. Anĩ ere, idi tamo kayau nigin kumĩ den.
42020020	Anĩ nigin, idi Jesus ololo difiye ken, kofo tamo sur difedin, kofo tamo idi idegẽya bun madur tamo gen dilen. Idi Jesus ereb od wogõya bun kũ fenẽ di, diroune ken, Rom gawaman mudur nẽ lo fiya ado megeir bun dinenẽf nigin kisi difen.
42020021	Anĩ nigin, kofo tamo Jesus to difiyen, “Tise, amã keleĩ, ogon wogõya ifelnẽya ado madur. Õ takam in oroya dõ wouf nigin wewu yõ di, in oroya dõ fen, taka wau morõ to wenẽdig, anĩ ere, õ momoi bun Negur nẽ naab ufelnamãdig.
42020022	Amã Sisa takis mafenẽf anĩ lo dõ fiya de, sã?”
42020023	Anĩ ere, Jesus idi namedin idegẽya anĩ ile fen, irokenẽdin,
42020024	“Koin moni taka ufelnag. Ai nẽ malakanon ado itotoya anĩ bun ibodok?”
42020025	Idi aiten dale diron, “Sisa nẽ.” Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Age fiyauf are, Sisa nẽ are Sisa wenẽg, Negur nẽ are Negur wenẽg.”
42020026	An Jesus mal atun wogõ yen bun, idi ĩ irounẽya kisi feleya sã. Idi ĩ solof iron anĩ bunem terefeit de fen, foro delen.
42020027	Sadusia tamo idi dirõdig, laa bun tamal mata to ke de fã dedig, dedig anĩ tunim, to fiya eig fiya ado Jesus wagen disin.
42020028	Idi diron, “Tise, Moses itotkanaman, are tamo taka, ne tura laaf fen, aiwa itornen, anĩ ere, kesu sãf are, tamo ĩ kayau waab anĩ yale fen, tura nẽ kesu diroukenẽf.
42020029	Gama tura tura sewen dibodon. Matu ketem kayau taka yalen, anĩ ere, kesu yaleya sã mog, tamo laa fen.
42020030	Matu dõ fiya bagam kayau anĩ yalen, ĩ laa fe di,
42020031	ĩ dõ fiya bagam kayau anĩ yalen, age de dile dile, tura tura sewen ganan kesu sã gare desin.
42020032	Dum kayau areg laa fen.
42020033	Anĩ nigin, dum laa bun tamal mata kel fãya sain bun, ĩ ai nẽ kayau ibodõf, ere nigin, tura tura sewen anidi adok ĩ dale dogolen?”
42020034	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Gama sain enei bun, tamo kayau yalef, kayau tamo yalef ya ibodok.
42020035	Anĩ ere, sain anĩ bun, idi laa bun tamal mata kel fãya sain bun dibodõf nigin kisi feleya anidi, an tamo kayau yalef, kayau tamo yalef ya sãf,
42020036	idi baban gare deyag kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, idi engel gen. Idi laa bun tamal mata ke de fã def nigin, idi Negur nẽ gere tar.
42020037	Anĩ ere, arein aa yã wõ yen nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya bun, Moseseg tamo gare den anĩ mata ke de fã douf nigin ifelnen, ere nigin, ĩ Odug nigin iron, ‘Abraham nẽ Negur, Isak nẽ Negur, Jakop nẽ Negur.’
42020038	Ĩ laa neid Negur sã, ĩ mata ibodõya neid Negur, ere nigin, ĩ bun ganan mata dibodok.”
42020039	Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ aiten dale diron, “Tise, õ de urok!”
42020040	Anĩ bunem idi kumĩ de fen, taka nem ereb taka nigin baban Jesus to, to fiyen.
42020041	Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Naig fe di, idi Kristus ĩ Dawid nẽ Naal dedig?
42020042	Dawid ĩ yogo Buk Sam bun kurõ falaisin: “‘Negur neu Odug irokenen, “Imau biya melem ubod mog,
42020043	ogon kiwai tar on yẽ inoya nẽ sawa anouf.”’
42020044	Dawid ĩ nigin ‘Odug’ yef, age fiyauf are, naig fe di, ĩ Dawid naaluouf?”
42020045	Tamo kayau ganan karĩ difiyẽ mog, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin,
42020046	“Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo nigin lo welegei. Idi gabar meluluk difonunakel diyo ken, maket modoũ bun aan difiyẽdiyouf anĩ orodidig. Age de fen, idi Juda neid uub fõ bun sia biyai biyai bun dibod ken, tar inoya bun modoũ malabag malabag bun dibodõdig.
42020047	Idi kayau waab idegnẽdiya bunem nedi fõ sosoin difeid fen, meleid yaleya nigin meluk bagai kosẽ dedig. Tamo age fediya, mala solo darau sane bagai dalouf.”
42021001	Jesus mala irã, tamo kayau safineid adodo, nedi kolekta moni tempel bogis bun dino mog, iledin.
42021002	Takag, ĩ lof mog, kayau waab maleg taka isi, peni giriya moni nanaal uru inon.
42021003	Agef fen, Jesus iron, “Aya ã momoi arokeneik, kayau waab maleg enĩ ĩ, ganan wal fediya, odug bagai bogis bun inol.
42021004	Tamo kayau enei ganan, dogo neid safineid bun tamal, nedi kolekta moni dinon, anĩ ere, kayau anĩ, maleg bun ĩ mata ibodõf nẽ anĩ ganan inon.”
42021005	In dõ fiya tar tunĩ, tempel meein biya biya nem ado, safineid biyai Negur difenen anim, tempel naki difiyen anĩ nigin wogõ den. Anĩ ere, Jesus iron,
42021006	“Ã ulegef enei nigin, sain fau isiyouf, meein enĩ taka to abob tete tete yenẽf, anĩ adok fau isog irailauf.”
42021007	Idi to difen, “Tise, ere sain eneidi wõ youf? Ere uris anĩ, eneidi kisi falauf nigin wõ youf?”
42021008	Age de di, Jesus iron, “Takam to idegneĩf nigin lo weleg. Ere nigin, musei aya yanau nem disi dirõf, ‘Aya Kristus,’ takag, ‘Sain mogo melsak.’ Age de di, to dõ wiyẽdig.
42021009	Ã kusĩ nigin ado, kantri bun kiwai fen, gawaman narĩ difef ya karĩ gouf, ã to tererẽ gei. Ereb ereb enidi ketem wõ youf bagai, anĩ ere, idikeleya anĩ, sain anĩ bun bagai to wõ youf.”
42021010	Age ye fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Teneub taka fã ye fen, ĩ teneub taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf, tano taka ĩ tano taka nigin kiwai ifenẽf.
42021011	Mimĩ odug wowã youf, naũ odug ado dagi totol, modoũ taka taka bun wowã youf, ereb ereb kumĩya nẽ ado uris odudug, saa bun wowã youf.
42021012	“Anĩ ere, eneidi ganan fau to wõ ye mog, idi kaka diyei ken, kafĩ fiya difeneĩf. Idi Juda neid uub fõ bun ado kalabus bun dineneĩf. Age de fen, ã king ado gawaman mudur adodo meleid bun dirouleyeĩf, anĩ ganan aya yanau nigin de fen, age diyeĩf.
42021013	Naab enei bunem, ã idi meleid bun, aya nigin kurõ wesigouf.
42021014	Anĩ ere, ã idi meleid bun aug isenneĩya nigin dodok ge fen, to wogõ gouf nigin ã kisi ketem ufokeleg.
42021015	Ere nigin, aya, od ado kisi biya, ãgenei kiwai tar takam solof irõya be, kiwai ifenẽya kisi feleya sã anĩ afeneĩf.
42021016	Anĩ ere, ã fau sineĩ temeĩ tarem, tureĩ tarem, sirag ado neĩ mou taremeg kiwai difenei ken, ã tunĩ laa bun dineneĩf.
42021017	Tamo ganan, aya yanau nigin de fen, ã kiwai difeneĩf.
42021018	Anĩ ere, mudureĩ bun, fatiyeĩ tekelei bagai to iminkalauf.
42021019	Megeir ifareya bunem, mata walogouf.
42021020	“Sain ã Jerusalem kusĩ tamom salili dife mog, ulogouf, ã keleĩ youf, Jerusalem fonou inenẽya anĩ melsak.
42021021	Age fiya ulogouf, idi Judia distrik bun dibodok, arein diya diselauf, idi taun anĩ bun dibodok, anenem diyalalauf, idi taun yerin difaref, namen to dilauf bagai.
42021022	Ere nigin, sain enei are, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok ganan kisi falauf nigin darau ifenẽya nẽ sain.
42021023	Naa anĩ bun, kayau bouweid ado, kayau kesu su difenek ado, idi meleidlon ado. Teneub anĩ bun, morõ odug wõ ye fen, Negur nẽ didi, tamo kayau enei bun isiyouf.
42021024	Idi dimig nem didenkeis, kalabus tamo gei difeid fen, teneub ganan bun diroulediyouf. Jerusalem fau haiden Israel sã anidim lalai difeid dile, haiden Israel sã anidi neid sain anĩ kisi falauf.
42021025	“Uris gaa bun, ogõ bun ado, barisa bun wõ youf. Tenebur ein, teneub ganan bun moloun fire bagai fã ye fen, maaĩ gugu re di, idi kisi gurũ ye fen, nene douf.
42021026	Tamo kayau, teneub bun ere wowã youf de fen, kumĩ de, meleid waĩ youf, ere nigin, saa nẽ megeir guyoyõ douf.
42021027	Sain anĩ bun, tamo idi, Tamo Naal lalo bun megeir ado fula fiya medeĩya barikã isi mog, dilouf.
42021028	Ereb ereb enei gariya ino, wõ ye di, ufareg fen, mudureĩ utadseg, ere nigin, kel yaleyeĩya are melsak.”
42021029	Age ye fen, Jesus yaab od enei irokenẽdin, “Ã aa fig ado aa ganan ulogouf.
42021030	Sain idi aarau ifiraũd mog, anĩ ã aug uleg fen, ã keleĩdig, saneya melsak.
42021031	Age fiya bagai, ereb ereb eneidi wõ ye mog, ulogouf are, ãg keleĩ youf, Negur nẽ tano are mogo melsak.
42021032	“Aya ã momoi arokeneik, tamo kayau sain enei bun dibodok anidi to gare de mog, ereb ereb eneidi ganan wõ youf.
42021033	Saa teneub ado sa kalauf, anĩ ere, neu od to bagai sa kalauf.
42021034	“Lo walagauf, sãf are, saafei ge, aai naanuei ge fen, tenebur mata ibodõya nigin sii fiya anim, ãgenei wauĩ bun kafĩ yeĩ di, ã keleĩ sã mog, Negur nẽ naa kor gen ã bun isiyouf.
42021035	Naa are, tenebur tamo kayau ganan bun wõ youf.
42021036	Eneidi ganan wowã you fenẽ anĩ wal fiya kisi falauf nigin ado, Tamo Naal mala bun ufaragauf nigin, ã faimud ololo wog fen, kosẽ gouf.”
42021037	Naa ganan, Jesus tempel bun ifelneĩd fen, aragau ganan, Moul Arein isel fen, bõ an ibodõdig.
42021038	Age fe di, tamo kayau ganan, tempel bun karĩ difiyẽf nigin, bonimei bagai disidig.
42022001	Gama Bret Yis Sã Sifa naa, Pasa naa dedig melsã di,
42022002	pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, Jesus yukesiya nigin naab dimiren, ere nigin, idi tamo kayau nigin kumĩ den.
42022003	Age fe di, Satan, Judas, Iskariot tamal dedig, tuwelf dõ fiya tar atun taka, ĩ namen ilen.
42022004	Age fe di, Judas ile, pris odudug ado tempel lo fiya tamo neid uyu irouya bun wõ ye fen, idi geid ĩ naig fe Jesus kiwai imeid bun inouf nigin katõ difen.
42022005	Idi od enĩ karĩ de, waud al fe fen, ĩ moni difenẽf nigin dirokenen.
42022006	Judas ĩ yo ye fen, tamo kayau to guru de mog, Jesus idi imeid bun inouf nigin naab imirek ilen.
42022007	Anĩ dumen, Bret Yis Sã anĩ nẽ naa wõ yen, anĩ bun idi Pasa naa nigin sipsip naal diden ken, sesewi difedig.
42022008	Jesus, Pita Jon ado sur feid fen, iron, “Uleg, ada Pasa naa nẽ saaf tãf nigin dodok wanadag.”
42022009	Idi Jesus to difiyen, “Õ, amã nain anĩ, Pasa naa nẽ saaf tãf nigin, dodok mafouf anĩ oroyok?”
42022010	Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Taun wõg fen, tamo taka darum naan ado isi fotou yeĩf, ĩ fõ bun ilauf anĩ dõg uleg.
42022011	Agog fen, ã fõ marau eig wiyẽg urokenẽgouf, ‘Tise õ irokonok: Aab nanĩ bun an, aya neu dõ fiya tar geid, Pasa naa nẽ saaf mãf?’
42022012	Ago ge di, ĩ aab odug ilun anĩ ifelneĩf, an ereb ereb dodok de bure difelen. An neda nigin dodok gouf.”
42022013	Age ye di, idi dile, Jesus irokenẽdin kilei ereb ereb age fiya dilen. Anĩ nigin, idi Pasa naa dodok difen.
42022014	Sain wõ ye di, Jesus in aposel geid tebol bun dibodon.
42022015	Age de fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya darau yaleya sã mog, ã geid Pasa naa nẽ saaf tãf anĩ orouf bagai.
42022016	Ere nigin, aya ã arokeneik, aya baban Pasa naa nẽ saaf to ãf ile, anĩ fau Negur nẽ tano bun kisi falauf.”
42022017	Age ye fen, ĩ kap yale, Negur de fiye ken, iron, “Enei waleg fen, ã atun foig.
42022018	Aya ã momoi arokeneik, aya baban wain to ãf ile, Negur nẽ tano isiyouf.”
42022019	Age ye fen, Jesus bret yale, Negur de fiye ken, mumã fen. Agef fen, ĩ in dõ fiya tar ifeneĩd fen, iron, “Eĩ neu bouwau, ã nigin afeneik. Enei agog fen, aya nigin kisi gouf.”
42022020	Age fiya bagai, saaf bure difel fen, Jesus kap yale, iron, “Kap enei, neu naudou bun, ã Negur geid bar itenẽya mata, naudou are ã nigin fi felef.
42022021	Anĩ ere, taka aya kiwai imeid bun inoyauf, are ein tebol bun urom imamã manof.
42022022	Momoi, Tamo Naal ĩ nigin iron kilei agef ilauf, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ kiwai ifenek, ĩ malalon ado.”
42022023	Age ye di, idi dogo dogol toti difen, idi atun aim bagai tobonunã enei age fouf.
42022024	Takag, idi atun aim anĩ odug bagai ibodõf nigin luwa diroun.
42022025	Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Haiden neid king, dogo neid tamo kayau lo difedig, idi dogo neid megeir tamo kayau bun yaor difedig, are ada biya difadauf dedig.
42022026	Anĩ ere, ã age fiya anĩ to ago gouf. Age fiya ban, ã atun odug ibodok are, kesu naal gen ibodõf, takag, uyu irouya tamo ĩ, aruna yaleya tamo gen ibodõf.
42022027	Ai anĩ odug, taka tebol bun ibodok anĩ de, taka ĩ aruna yalef anĩ? Taka ĩ tebol bun ibodok anĩ sã de? Anĩ ere, aya ã atun aruna yaleya tamo gen abodok.
42022028	Ã anĩ, neu kisi fiya isi di, aya bun toku ufaregen.
42022029	Neu Dei tano aya ifanan gen, ayag tano ã afeneik.
42022030	Age afe di, ã neu tanon, tebol bun saaf ado naan wãgauf, king nẽ sia bun ubodõg fen, Israel ibor tuwelf es gouf.
42022031	“Simon, Simon, tamo wit biya ado wit ido foi fiya nigin age fedig gen, Satan ĩ ãgenei momoiya kisi yeĩ fenẽ nigin to fen.
42022032	Anĩ ere, aya, Simon õ nigin ogon momoiya to urofosiyouf nigin kosẽ aun. Anĩ nigin, sain õ kelouf, turã tar megeir wediyouf.”
42022033	Anĩ ere, Pita aiten yale iron, “Odug, aya õ ado kalabus bun ado, laa bun ileya nigin dodok afel.”
42022034	Age ye di, Jesus iron, “Pita, aya õ arokonok, gama fau tataro kokorok yeya sã mog, õ wa fen, aya nigin keleĩ sã wo, towo wouf.”
42022035	Age ye fen, Jesus idi to fedin, “Sain aya ã moni nẽ kodol, faa be, su sã sur ayein, ã ere taka lau gen de?” Idi solo de diron, “Sã.”
42022036	Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Anĩ ere, gama taka ĩ moni nẽ kodol adouf, yalouf, faag age fiya, taka ĩ dimig sã, yogon gabar na nigin sur fe fen, taka na yalouf.
42022037	Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye ibodok, ‘Ĩ tamo sesen geid bagu difedin.’ Aya ã arokeneik, enei aya bun kisi fel, agef wõ youf. Ariya, aya nigin itoton are mogo kisi felef.”
42022038	In dõ fiya tar diron, “Ulef, Odug, dimig uru yeir.” Age de di, ĩ iron, “Are de.”
42022039	Agef fen, Jesus aabẽ tamal ulõ yeis fen, gai age fedig gen, Moul Arein iselen, age fe di, in dõ fiya tareg ĩ dõ difiyen.
42022040	Modoũ anĩ bun wõ de fen, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Kisi fiya bun to kubũ gouf nigin kosẽ wog.”
42022041	Jesus yogon dõ fiya tar itorneĩd, meein irã di, ile kubũ youn age fiyan ile, ibor bobou fe fen, kosẽ yen,
42022042	“Dei, õ oroyõf are, kap enĩ aya bun walelauf. Anĩ ere, neu oroya to dõ wouf, on oroya dõ wo.”
42022043	Engel taka saa ilun tamal, ĩ bun wõ ye fen, megeir ifenen.
42022044	Age fe di, Jesus wau morõ fatuk fe di, ĩ totol bagai kosẽ yen, age fe di, maab, naud isidig gen, tenebur kuku ren.
42022045	Ĩ kosẽ yel fen, fã ye, in dõ fiya tar gedin kel ile, waud gudũ falaisil, den mog, iledin.
42022046	Agef fen, Jesus idi to fedin, “Ere nigin mulaĩ wenẽgef? Ã kisi fiya bun to kuku gouf nigin fafãg fen, kosẽg.”
42022047	Jesus fau wogõ ye mog, tamo musei disin, tuwelf in dõ fiya tar idi anĩ atun taka, Judas dedig inim uyu iroukenẽdin. Ĩ Jesus umã fiyẽf nigin non ilen.
42022048	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ to fiyen, “Judas, õ umãya bunem Tamo Naal kiwai wenẽf de?”
42022049	Sain Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar, ereb wõ you fenẽ age fe di, dile fen, idi diron, “Odug, amã nemã dimig nem madenauf de?”
42022050	Age de fen, idi takam, pris mudur ado nẽ ferfer weder biyalẽ anĩ salõf iran.
42022051	Anĩ ere, Jesus iron, “Baban enei to ago gouf!” Age ye fen, ĩ tamo anĩ nẽ weder kobũf fen, el fiyen.
42022052	Agef fen, Jesus, pris odudug, tempel lo fiya tamo neid uyu irouya geid, mudur adodo, ĩ nigin disin anĩ irokenẽdin, “Ã bẽ tamo urounẽgouf gen, ã dimig adodo seburer adodo usigef de?
42022053	Naa ganan, aya ã geid tempel bun tabodon, anĩ ere, ã aya bun imeĩ taka to unogen. Anĩ ere, eĩ ãgenei sain, are gugum irouneik nigin.”
42022054	Idi Jesus dale, diroune ken, pris mudur ado nẽ fõ bun dirou dilen. Pita ĩ so rel fen, dumeid dõ fen.
42022055	Anĩ ere, sain idi fofomala atun yã kũ de dibodon, Pita ĩg an weim dibodon,
42022056	Kabĩ kayau momoul taka, Pita yã sirin ibod mog, ilen. Kayau momoul anĩ Pita lo fel fen, iron, “Tamo eneig ĩ geid.”
42022057	Anĩ ere, Pita waf fen, iron, “Kayau, aya ĩ keleĩ sã.”
42022058	Sain naal ile di, taka nem ĩ ile fen, iron, “Õg idi neid taka.” Anĩ ere, Pita iron, “Mou, aya sã!”
42022059	Aua tekelei age fiya ile di, taka bagam ĩ nigin totol iron, “Momoi bagai, tamo eneig ĩ geid diyon, ere nigin, ĩg Galili tamal.”
42022060	Anĩ ere, Pita aiten yale iron, “Tamo, õ urok anĩ aya keleĩ sã!” Ĩ irõ mog bagai, tataro kokorok yen.
42022061	Odug falei yel, Pita lo felen. Age fe di, Pita Jesus wogõ fiyen anĩ nigin weder fokõ yen, “Gama fau tataro kokorok yeya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa wo, towo wouf.”
42022062	Age fe di, ĩ mayarẽ ile fen, inã fatuk yalen.
42022063	Tamo Jesus dirounen idi, ĩ diseline ken, wagĩ difiyen.
42022064	Age dife fen, idi Jesus mala difofakel fen, to difiyen, “Kurõ weis urokanamã! Aim õ inok?”
42022065	Age de fen, idi kono fiya od musei dirokenen.
42022066	We fele di, tamo kayau neid mudur adodo neid kaunsel, are pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, weim guru de mog, Jesus idi gedin dirou dilen.
42022067	Idi diron, “Õ Kristus ouf are, amã urokanamã.” Anĩ ere, Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya ã arokeneĩf are, ã to momoi gouf,
42022068	agef fen, aya ã to ayeĩfeg, ã to solog urõgouf.
42022069	Anĩ ere, gama sain enei bunem ilauf ganan, Tamo Naal ĩ, Negur megeir ado ima biyalem ibodõf.”
42022070	Age ye di, idi ganan to difiyen, “Age fouf are, õ anĩ Negur Naal de?” Ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Ã de urõgef, aya anĩ.”
42022071	Age ye di, idi diron, “Ere nigin ada, ĩ nigin od megeir fiya nigin tamo baban tamirẽf? Ada ĩ sigoron bagai karĩ taul.”
42023001	Age de fen, guru fiya ganan fã de, Jesus Pailat bun dirou dilen.
42023002	Age de fen, idi mogo gariya dino, ĩ bouwa bun od du ken, diron, “Amã, tamo enei nemã tamo kayau ganan idegẽya bunem sanen guri feid irou ile mog, mailen. Ĩ Sisa takis ifenẽya nigin katũ fiyeĩd fen, ĩ yogo nigin aya Kristus, aya king yen.”
42023003	Anĩ nigin, Pailat Jesus to fiyen, “Õ Juda neid king de?” Jesus solof iron, “Are de yer, õ urok anĩ.”
42023004	Age ye di, Pailat ĩ, pris odudug, tamo kayau geid irokenẽdin, “Aya tamo enei bou bun mosor taka to ailel.”
42023005	Anĩ ere, idi totol dinon, “Ĩ Judia distrik ganan bun, in ifelnẽya bunem tamo kayau waud yalen. Ĩ Galili an gariya ino fen, tokõ fel eineg isin.”
42023006	Pailat anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ Galili tamal be anĩ to fen.
42023007	Pailat ĩ, Jesus Herod nẽ tano bun tamal yeya kelei ken, Herod gein sur fen, Herod ĩg sain anĩ bun Jerusalem ibodon.
42023008	Herod Jesus ile fen, wau fatuk kulĩ yen, ere nigin, sain meluk bagai ĩ ileya nigin oron. Ĩ nigin karĩ yen nigin, Herod ĩ Jesus bun memelik tunĩ ilouf nigin age fen.
42023009	Herod Jesus musei bagai to fiyen, anĩ ere, Jesus taka to solof iron.
42023010	Pris odudug, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid an difaren, ĩ bou bun od totol bagai dinon.
42023011	Age dife di, Herod yogon kusĩ tamo geid, Jesus kasã difiye ken, kono difiyen. Age dife fen, kolos biya difounne ken, Pailat wagen sur difiyẽ di, kel ilen.
42023012	Naa anĩ bun, Herod Pailat ado nigal dun, uruwa bun idi uruwom kiwain.
42023013	Pailat ĩ, pris odudug, mudur adodo, tamo kayau geid iweigneĩd fen,
42023014	irokenẽdin, “Ã tamo enei, tamo kayau waud yale fen, sane nigin weleid inon ge fen, waleg, urou usigel. Aya ã meleĩ bun to afiyem, anĩ ere, ã ĩ bou bun od unogen anĩ, tamo enei bun gariya taka to ailel.
42023015	Herod ĩg age fiya, anĩ nigin, ĩ kel sur fe di, ada gein isil. Anĩ ulogouf, ĩ yukesiya nigin ereb sane taka to age fen.
42023016	Anĩ nigin, aya darau dogol afen ken, atornẽf.”
42023018	Anĩ ere, idi sigoreid takai fen, diweig diron, “Tamo enei ukesiyouf! Barabas walis kanamã!”
42023019	(Barabas ĩ anĩ taun oun kusĩ yales fen, tamo yukesin nigin, kalabus bun dinenen.)
42023020	Pailat, Jesus yalisnẽya nigin baban totol bagai irokenẽdin.
42023021	Anĩ ere, idi baba baban diweig diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf! Aa tetek bun ũf!”
42023022	Age de di, Pailat ĩ irõ, towo fen sain bun anĩ irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin? Tamo enei, ere mosor inon? Aya ĩ yukesiya nẽ gariya anĩ, ĩ bun taka to ailel. Anĩ nigin, aya ĩ darau afen ken, atornẽf.”
42023023	Anĩ ere, idi aiteid odudug fen, ĩ aa tetek bun yũf nigin, baba baban dirokenen. Age dife di, dogo neid aitedim, Pailat nẽ od lai difiyen.
42023024	Anĩ nigin, Pailat, nedi oroya dõ fiya nigin kisi yale fen, irokenẽdin.
42023025	Pailat ĩ, tamo kusĩ yales fen, tamo yukesi di, kalabus bun dinenen ĩ nigin tamo kayau to difiyen anĩ, yalisne ken, dogo neid oroya dõ difouf nigin Jesus ifenẽdin.
42023026	Idi Jesus dirou dile fen, Simon Sairini tamal, ĩ yogon fonom isi mog, luwen ĩ dale, aa tetek orowa se dife di, faali fe, Jesus dõ fen.
42023027	Tamo kayau musei, kayau idi ĩ nigin waud gudũf fen, inã dalen geid, dõ difiyen.
42023028	Anĩ ere, Jesus idi bun falei yel, idi irokenẽdin, “Jerusalem nẽ barai tar, aya nigin inã to waleg, ã aug nigin ado gereĩ tar nigin inã waleg.
42023029	Ere nigin, sain fau isiyouf bun, idi dirõf, ‘Kayau dali, kayau fau kesu gõ fiya sã, kayau kesu su ifenẽya sã anidi el fedif!’
42023030	Age de fen, “‘idi arei dirokenẽdiyouf, “Teteman kukug!” arei mudu dirokenẽdiyouf, “Kerub wamãg!”’
42023031	Tamo, aa mata mog, enei age difedif are, meti youf sain bun, ere wõ youf?”
42023032	Lo wal fiya tamo uru idig, ĩ geid laa bun dinenẽdiyouf nigin dirou dilen.
42023033	Sain idi modoũ yana Mudur Tuwan dedig wõ de fen, an Jesus aa tetek bun dun, lo wal fiya tamo uru geid, taka biya melem, taka ki melem.
42023034	Age dife di, Jesus iron, “Dei, idi neid mosor nigin weder tu kel, ere nigin, idi keleĩ sa ken, enei age difef.” Age fe di, idi aisaĩ kodẽ de fen, yogon kolos idi atun foifu difen.
42023035	Tamo kayau difar fen, lo difeid mog, mudur adodomeg ĩ kasã difiyẽ diron, “Ĩ tunĩ isennẽdin, ĩ Kristus Negur igirnen ouf are, utornẽg len, yogo bouwa isennẽf.”
42023036	Kusĩ tamog dise fen, diselinen. Idi wain makik ado difen ken,
42023037	diron, “Õ Juda neid king ouf are, ogo boũ usennẽf.”
42023038	Ĩ muduren itotoya eig ya yenen: EĨ JUDA NEID KING.
42023039	Lo wal fiya tamo aa tetek bun difaren anĩ takam, Jesus kono fiyẽ iron, “Õ Kristus ouf are, õ ogo usenne ken, amã usennamãf!”
42023040	Anĩ ere, lo wal fiya tamo taka im, ne tã ou fiye ken, iron, “Õ kafĩ fiya tekelei walef, anĩ ere, õ Negur to kumĩ wiyek de?
42023041	Ada urom darau talef, are de, ere nigin, ada urom sane age tafen anĩ mala solo. Anĩ ere, tamo enei ereb sane to age fen.”
42023042	Age ye fen, ĩ Jesus irokenen, “Jesus, sain õ ogon tano bun usel fen, aya karĩ wiyalauf.”
42023043	Age ye di, Jesus tamo anĩ irokenen, “Aya õ momoi arokonok, gama õ aya ado paradis bun tabodõf.”
42023044	Gaa atun tuwelf kilok age fiya bun, teneub ganan bun gugum kelef ile, tri kilok aragaun,
42023045	ere nigin, gaa mala ifokelen. Age fe di, tempel nẽ gabar anĩ atusil serek fe, uru wõ yen.
42023046	Jesus ait odug nem iweig iron, “Dei, neu uur õ imã bun anof.” Agef iro ken, ĩ oboi irour yalen.
42023047	Kusĩ tamo neid orowa, Jesus age fiya ile fen, Negur yana yales iron, “Momoi, tamo eĩ madur tamo.”
42023048	Tamo kayau ganan idi lo fiya nigin guru difen, ereb anĩ wõ ye di, meledim dilen, are idi waud gudũf fen, akoreid du ken, firagagaũ difen.
42023049	Anĩ ere, idi Jesus keleĩ anidi ganan, idi atun kayau Galilim ĩ dõ de disin anidig, so del difar fen, eneidi wõ ye di, lo difen.
42023050	Tamo taka yana Josef, ĩ kaunsel taka, madur tamo biya bagai,
42023051	anĩ nigin, ĩ idi neid tobonuneid ado od difon anĩ nigin to yo yen. Ĩ Judia distrik bun Arimatea taun tamal, ĩ Negur nẽ tano isiyouf anĩ tari fen.
42023052	Josef ĩ, Pailat gein ile, Jesus bou buru yalouf nigin to fiyen.
42023053	Agef fen, ĩ Jesus bou buru yale, irou isil, gabar lalau nem silef fen, matmat sa bun ku dalen an inenen, ku anĩ bun an taka to dinenen.
42023054	Naa anĩ dodok fiya naa, Sabat naa mogo gariya inou fenẽ melsã.
42023055	Kayau Jesus geid Galilim disin, Josef dõ de, matmat ado, Jesus bouwa buru naig de dinof anĩ, lo difen.
42023056	Age difel fen, idi fonõ dile, bou wã fiya nẽ marasin ado moul sumeĩ biya bagai dodok difen. Anĩ ere, idi Sabat naa nigin ĩtãfiya dõ de fen, si dinon.
42024001	Uub nẽ naa matu bun bonimei bagai mumurei ado, kayau idi, bou wã fiya nẽ marasin dodok difen anĩ dale fen, matmat bun dilen.
42024002	Age dife fen, idi matmat bun meein wele feleya dilen.
42024003	Anĩ ere, sain idi meku namen dilen, idi Odug Jesus nẽ bouwa buru an to dilen.
42024004	Idi enei nigin kisi musei dale mog bagai, tamo uru kolos medeĩya barikã siridin difaren.
42024005	Age dife di, kayau kumĩ de fen, kususu de, teneub lo difen, anĩ ere, tamo idi kayau dirokenẽdin, “Ã ere nigin laa atun mata tamo umirnẽgef?
42024006	Ĩ ein sã, ĩ mogo fã yel! Ĩ Galili oun ã geid ubodõg fen, irokenein anĩ, wedereĩ fokõ youf,
42024007	ĩ iron, ‘Tamo Naal mosor adodo imeid bun dino di, ĩ aa tetek bun dukesiyouf, age dife di, naa towo bun, ĩ baban mata kel fã youf.’”
42024008	Age de di, kayau idi, in od anĩ wedereid fokõ yen.
42024009	Sain idi matmat bunem ke de, disi fen, aposel ilewen tunĩ ganan geid, enei ganan wogõ difiyẽdin.
42024010	Kayau idi are Maria Magdala tamal, Joana, Maria Jems nẽ sina. Kayau anidi, kayau tunĩg geid, enei aposel wogõ difiyẽdin.
42024011	Anĩ ere, idi kayau nigin to momoi den, ere nigin, kayau neid od, idi bun auya gen.
42024012	Anĩ ere, Pita fã yale, matmat bun gudu re ilen. Ĩ ku bun itin, gabar lalau dogol yen mog, ilen, agef fen, ereb anĩ wõ yen anĩ nigin, ĩ kisi musei yalef ile, yogon fõ bun ilen.
42024013	Naa de anĩ bun, idi neid tamo uru, fonõ taka yana Emaus dilen, Jerusalem anenem Emaus are ilewen kilomita age fiya.
42024014	Idi urom, ereb ereb ganan wõ yen anĩ abob dirokenek dilen.
42024015	Idi eneidi nigin diro ken, katõ de dile mog, Jesus yogo isi, weim diyok dilen.
42024016	Anĩ ere, idi Jesus keleĩya nigin meleid ifofakelen.
42024017	Age dife di, Jesus idi to fedin, “Ã ere nigin naab luwen katõ ge usigef?” Idi dẽ del fen, idi neweid wau gudũ fiya ado agogon delen.
42024018	Idi taka yana Kleopas Jesus solof irokenen, “Õ ege Jerusalem nẽ ki tamo nigin, naa eneidi bun an ereb ereb wõ yen anĩ, õ keleĩ sã de?”
42024019	Age ye di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ere bagai?” Idi Jesus dirokenen, “Jesus Nasaret tamal nigin. Ĩ profet taka, Negur ado tamo kayau ganan meleid bun, od ado tobonunã bun megeir barikã.
42024020	Pris odudug, neda mudur ado idim, ĩ laa bun dinenẽf nigin imeid bun dino di, aa tetek bun dukesin.
42024021	Anĩ ere, amã waumã iron, im anĩ Israel tamo kayau kel gei fouf maun. Anĩ dogol sã, enei ganan wõ yen are, gama naa eneim mogo naa towo ilef.
42024022	Takag, amã nemã kayau tunĩg, amã terẽ difamam. Gama bonimei bagai, idi matmat bun dilel,
42024023	anĩ ere, idi yogon bouwa buru to dilel. Idi dile, meleid seleulã kurãf fen, engel diledin, engel idi dirokenẽdil, Jesus ĩ mata ibodok, difiyẽdi di, disi, amã dirokanamam.
42024024	Age de di, amã tunĩ matmat bun dile, kayau wogõ del gen bagai dilel, anĩ ere, idi Jesus to dilel.”
42024025	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã neneya bagai, ã profet wogõ den anĩ ganan, wauĩ bun momoiya nigin folo reya bagai!
42024026	Kristus ĩ darau enei yale fen, yogon fula fiya medeĩya namen to ilauf de?”
42024027	Age ye fen, ĩ Moses ado profet ganan neid itotoya bunem gariya ino fen, yogo nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya ganan bun ibodok anĩ, idi faded fedin.
42024028	Idi fonõ dilef nẽ anĩ kelẽ difiye ken, Jesus tokõ feleya nigin suma ino genen.
42024029	Anĩ ere, idi totol bagai dirokenen, “Amã geid tabodõf, ere nigin, gaa mogo kuru kelef, gugum irousif.” Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi geid dibodõf nigin namen ilen.
42024030	Sain ĩ idi geid tebol bun dibod ken, ĩ bret yale, Negur de fiyẽ, mumãf fen, gariya ino ifenẽdin.
42024031	Age fe di, idi meleid fara fele di, idi Jesus nigin kelein. Age dife di, ĩ idi meleid bun iminkelen.
42024032	Idi abob dirokenen, “Sain ĩ naab luwen wogõ fada fen, Negur nẽ Itotoya faraf ifelnadal mog, ada namedan wauda to tõf yalel de?”
42024033	Age de fen, idi fã de dale, kaisã bagai Jerusalem keku de dilen, an idi aposel ilewen, tamo tunĩ idi geid, guru de difar mog, fotou difedi di,
42024034	diron, “Are momoi! Odug fã ye fen, Simon bun wõ yen.”
42024035	Age de di, tamo uru ereb naab luwen wõ yen ado, Jesus ĩ bret mumã fe di, idi Jesus nigin naig de kelein anĩ wogõ den.
42024036	Idi fau enei nigin wogõ de mog, Jesus yogo idi atun ifar fen, irokenẽdin, “Wau inosiya ã ado ibodõf.”
42024037	Idi baraũ mailef de fen, terẽ de fen, kumĩ den.
42024038	Age dife di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ere nigin ã wauĩ morõ fef, ere nigin ã wauĩ bun kisi uru wõ yef?
42024039	Aya imau yeu ado feleg. Eĩ aya yug bagai! Kobũ wiyag fen, uleg. Baraũ ĩ aya bouwau ado, tuwau ado uleyagef gen sã, ĩ bou sã, tuwa sã.”
42024040	Jesus enei iro ken, ĩ ima ye ado ifelnẽdin.
42024041	Age fe di, idi waud kulĩya ado terẽya bunem, fau waud to momoi de di, Jesus idi to fiyẽdin, “Ã ereb yõya nẽ taka ein tau ado?”
42024042	Idi gau yã tamal masak taka difenen,
42024043	age dife di, Jesus gau yale, meledin yon.
42024044	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Enei are, aya fau ã geid tabodon sain bun arokenein. Ereb ereb ganan, aya nigin Moses nẽ Lo bun, profet neid itotoya bun ado, Buk Sam bun ditoton anĩ ganan kisi falauf bagai.”
42024045	Agef fen, Jesus idi Negur nẽ Itotoya keleĩ youf nigin, waud kã fenẽdin. 4624
42024046	Ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok: Kristus ĩ fau darau yale fen, laa bun tamal naa towo bun mata kel fã youf,
42024047	age fe di, wau faleiya ado, mosor nigin weder tu keleya nẽ od anĩ, fau ĩ yana bunem teneub ganan bun, Jerusalem anenem gariya dino fen, wogõ de dilauf.
42024048	Ã enei ulegen nigin kurõ walaisi gouf.
42024049	Aya esel fen, neu Dei sur afouf yen anĩ, ã bun sur afouf, anĩ ere, taun anĩ bun ubodõgef uleg, ã megeir saa ilun tamal anim ifounneĩf.”
42024050	Sain Jesus idi gurif irou, Betani non dilen, an ĩ ima yales fen, el fiya ifenẽdin.
42024051	Ĩ idi el feid le fen, ĩ itornẽdi di, saa ilun irou iselen.
42024052	Age fe di, idi ĩ yana dales fen, waud kulĩya odug ado, Jerusalem ke de dilen.
42024053	Age de fen, idi tempel bun toku dibod ken, Negur yana dalesedig.
43001001	Gariya bun Od anĩ ibodon, Od anĩ Negur ado dibodon, Od anĩ Negur.
43001002	Gariya bun ĩ Negur ado dibodon.
43001003	Ĩ bunem ereb ereb ganan inon, Od anĩ sã bun ereb inodin taka to ibodok.
43001004	Mata ĩ bun ibodon, mata anĩ tamo neid fula fiya.
43001005	Fula fiya anĩ gugum bun lalan ifenek, anĩ ere, gugum ĩ fula fiya anĩ to kelein.
43001006	Tamo taka Negurem sur fe di, isin, ĩ yana Jon.
43001007	Ĩ fula fiya anĩ yaor fe, kurõ fesiyouf nigin isin, are tamo kayau ganan ĩ bunem momoi douf nigin age fen.
43001008	Ĩ anĩ fula fiya sã, ĩ fula fiya anĩ kurõ fesiyouf nigin isin.
43001009	Fula fiya bagai yogo tamo kayau ganan lalan ifenẽdif, ĩ tenebur isin.
43001010	Ĩ teneub bun ibodon, are ĩ bunem teneub inon, anĩ ere, tamo kayau tenebur ein, ĩ to kelein.
43001011	Ĩ yogon bagai anidi bun isin, anĩ ere, yogon bagai anidi ĩ to daleyen.
43001012	Anĩ ere, idi ĩ daleyen, ĩ yana nigin momoi den anidi bun, Negur idi Negur nẽ gere tar wowã douf nigin igirnẽdin.
43001013	Sina tama nẽ naud bunem to Negur gere tar wowã den, bouwa nẽ oroya bunem sã, tamo nẽ wau irõya buneg sã, anĩ ere, Negur yogo age fe di, wowã den.
43001014	Od anĩ tamo wõ ye fen, ada atun ibodon. Ada yogon fula fiya medeĩya tailen, fula fiya medeĩya are Naal Tekelei Yogo Dogol nẽ, ĩ Tama bun tamal wau ifenẽya ado momoi barikã isin.
43001015	Jon ĩ nigin kurõ falaisi wogõ yen. Ĩ iweig fen, iron, “Ĩ enei nigin aya arokenein, ‘Taka ĩ aya dumeun isif, ĩ aya wal fiyaya, ere nigin, ĩ ket ibodon.’”
43001016	In wau ifenẽya barikã bunem, ada adok el fiya tale fen, anĩ teten el fiya musei talen.
43001017	Are Moses bunem lo anĩ talen, anĩ ere, wau ifenẽya ado momoi anĩ, Jesus Kristus bunem isin.
43001018	Taka nem Negur to bagai ilen, anĩ ere, Negur Naal Tekelei Yogo Dogol, ĩ Tama wagen ibod ken, ĩ nigin yaor fen.
43001019	Juda tamo Jerusalem temeleid idim, pris tunĩ, Lewi nẽ ibor geid sur difedi di, Jon ĩ aim yeya anĩ to difiyẽ di, Jon ĩ eig ye kurõ fesin.
43001020	Ĩ wa fiya sã, kurõ falaisi, “Aya Kristus sã,” yen.
43001021	Idi ĩ to difiyen, “Age fiyauf are, õ ai? Õ Eliya de?” Ĩ iron, “Aya ĩ sã.” Idi diron, “Õ Profet amã tari mafef anim de?” Ĩ iron, “Sã.”
43001022	Age ye di, idi diron, “Õ ai bagai? Õ amã urokanamã len, idi amã sur difaman anidi gein ke ma malauf. Õ ogo nigin ere wof?”
43001023	Jon profet Asaia nẽ od bun solof iron, “Aya anĩ, ait taka gerere tuan iweig irok, ‘Odug nẽ naab madur gouf.’”
43001024	Farisia tamo tunĩ sur difedin anidim
43001025	to difiyen, “Õ Kristus sãf, Eliya sãf, Profet anĩ sãf are, ere nigin naan ugunẽdif?”
43001026	Jon aitedin yale iron, “Aya naan nem naan agunẽdif, anĩ ere, ã atun, taka ã keleĩ sã anĩ ifaref.
43001027	Ĩ anĩ aya dumeun dõ fiyaf, aya to biya nigin, in ye su nẽ malũ biru fediya kisi feleya sã.”
43001028	Enei ganan Betani oun Jordan naan sitakã, Jon naan igunẽdin nẽ an wõ yen.
43001029	Naa taka di, Jon, Jesus wagen iyok isi mog, ile fen, iron, “Ulegef, Negur nẽ Sipsip Naal, ĩ tamo ganan neid mosor yaleledif!
43001030	Enei nigin au fen, oron, ‘Taka ĩ aya dumeun isif, ĩ aya wal fiyaya, ere nigin, ĩ ket ibodon.’
43001031	Aya yug ĩ keleĩ san, anĩ ere, aya asi, naan nem naan agunẽdif nẽ gariya are, Israel tamo kayau bun ĩ yaor fouf nigin.”
43001032	Age ye fen, Jon enei kurõ feis iron, “Aya, Awa Uur saa ilun tamal kuburir gen isi, ĩ bun ibod mog, ailen.
43001033	Aya ĩ to kelein, anĩ ere, taka ĩ, aya naan nem naan agunẽdiyouf nigin sur fiyan im irokanan, ‘Tamo anĩ, Awa Uur isi, ĩ bun ibod mog, ulouf, im Awa Uur Fateul nem naan igunẽdiyouf.’
43001034	Aya ailen nigin kurõ afeis, ‘Eĩ Negur Naal,’ auf.”
43001035	Naa taka di, Jon, in dõ fiya tar uru geid, baban an difaren.
43001036	Ĩ, Jesus isi ile di, ile fen, ĩ iron, “Ulegef, Negur nẽ Sipsip Naal!”
43001037	Sain Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar uru enei karĩ de fen, idi Jesus dõ difiyen.
43001038	Jesus falei yel, idi ĩ dõ difiyẽ mog, ile fen, to fedin, “Ã ere oroyeik?” Idi diron, “Rabi (anĩ nẽ gariya, Tise), õ nain ubodõdig?”
43001039	Ĩ iron, “Umag fen, ulogouf.” Age ye di, idi dile, ĩ ibodõdig anĩ dile fen, naa anĩ bun, ĩ geid dibodon. Are aragau fo kilok age fiya.
43001040	Endru, Simon Pita ne tura ĩ, idi uruwom ereb Jon wogõ yen anĩ karĩ de fen, Jesus dõ difiyen anĩ taka.
43001041	Ereb uruwa Endru age fen are, ĩ tura Simon imir ile fen, irokenen, “Amã Mesia (anĩ Kristus) fotou mafen.”
43001042	Age ye fen, Endru, Pita Jesus wagen irou ile di, Jesus Pita lo fiye ken, iron, “Õ Simon, Jon naal. Õ yanã Sifas douf” (Sifas falei fiyauf are, Pita).
43001043	Naa taka di, Jesus Galili ileya nigin kisif fen, Jesus Filip fotou fiye ken, irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya.”
43001044	Filip ĩ, Endru Pita ado geid, Betsaida taun temeleid.
43001045	Filip Nataniel fotou fiye ken, ĩ irokenen, “Amã ĩ nigin Moses nẽ Lo bun itoton ado profet idig ditoton, Jesus Nasaret tamal, Josef naal anĩ, fotou mafen.”
43001046	Nataniel to fen, “Nasaret! Ereb biya taka, anenem wõya nigin kisi feleya de?” Filip iron, “Usi ule.”
43001047	Sain Jesus Nataniel non iyok isi mog, ile fen, ĩ nigin iron, “Eĩ Israel tamo bagai, ĩ bun ereb idegẽya taka sã.”
43001048	Nataniel Jesus to fiyen, “Naig wo fen, õ aya keleĩ?” Jesus aiten yale iron, “Aya õ Filip iweignõya sã mog, aa fig farumen ubod mog, ailiyon.”
43001049	Age ye di, Nataniel Jesus irokenen, “Rabi, õ Negur Naal, õ Israel neid King.”
43001050	Jesus iron, “Aya õ aa fig farumen ailiyon aul nigin, õ momoi wof. Õ anĩ wal fiya ereb ereb odug ulouf.”
43001051	Ĩ tobol fe iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ã, saa bobog kã fele di, Negur nẽ engel Tamo Naal bun diselef disif dife mog, ulogouf.”
43002001	Naa uru bure fele di, naa towo bun, tamo kayau ado bagu fiya, Galili distrik oun Kana fonõ wõ yen. Jesus sinag an ibodon.
43002002	Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid idig, tamo kayau ado bagu fiya bun diweignẽdin.
43002003	Sain wain sa kele di, sinam Jesus irokenen, “Idi wain taka sã.”
43002004	Jesus iron, “Kayau, õ ere nigin aya kababal wiyaf? Neu sain fau isiya sã.”
43002005	Jesus sina, kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, “Ereb ĩ irokeneĩf anĩ dõg, ago gouf.”
43002006	Nodin meein gulub sigis naan ifotũya nẽ difaren, are Juda neid tobonuneid bun imeid kulo fiya nigin, idi teke tekelei 100 lita age fiya naan iroudig.
43002007	Jesus kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, “Gulub bun naan utinẽdig.” Age ye di, idi ditineĩd eweid gere fesedin.
43002008	Age difele di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Gama tunĩ lolob ge fen, sifa marau uroule kenẽg.” Age ye di, idi age difen.
43002009	Sifa marau naan wain falei fen anĩ yõ ilen. Ĩ wain anĩ nainenem be isin anĩ to kelein, anĩ ere, kabĩ tamo naan lolob difen idi kelein. Agef fen, sifa marau ĩ, kayau marau yerin iweignẽ, ile di,
43002010	irokenen, “Ganan idi wain biya anĩ ket dirousi di, tamo disif idi anĩ fatuk dõ mog, to biya gen anĩ dum dirousidig, anĩ ere, õ biya bagai urou ubodom anĩ, gama bagai urousif.”
43002011	Jesus memelik gariya inon are enei bun, oun Galili distrik Kana fonõ. Anĩ bun, ĩ yogon fula fiya medeĩya yaor fe di, yogon dõ fiya tar dogo neid momoiya ĩ bun dinon.
43002012	Enei bure fele di, Jesus ĩ, sina, tura tar ado, yogon dõ diya tar geid, Kapenaum disilen. An naa musei to dibodon.
43002013	Juda neid Pasa naa sain melsã mog, Jesus Jerusalem iselen.
43002014	Tempel modoũ bun, tamo, bulmakau, sipsip ado, kuburir na sur difeid fen, tunĩg tebol bun dibod ken, moni solo de mog, iledin.
43002015	Anĩ ile fen, ĩ malũ nem wip inon, agef fen, tempel modoũ bun tamal, sipsip ado bulmakau ganan irudi di, serẽ dilelen, ĩ moni solo fiya tamo neid koin moni daũf firagagaũ fe fen, ĩ dogo neid tebol yale, falei feledin.
43002016	Idi kuburir na sur difen anĩ irokenẽdin, “Eneidi ein waleledig, neu Dei nẽ fõ anĩ maket modoũ to unog!”
43002017	Dum in dõ fiya tar, eig ye itotoya anĩ nigin wedereid fokõ yen, “Ogon fõ nigin wau itenẽya anim nameun isainaf.”
43002018	Age ye di, Juda tamo Jesus dirokenen, “Ere memelik anĩ ufelnamã di, enei ganan agof anĩ nigin õ igirĩya ado mauf?”
43002019	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Tempel enei narĩ weleg len, naa towo bun baban alesauf.”
43002020	Juda tamo diron, “Tempel enei dinon are, foti-sigis yar yalen, anĩ õ naa towo bun walesauf de?”
43002021	Anĩ ere, tempel ĩ wogõ yen are, yogo bouwa nigin.
43002022	Ĩ laa bunem kel fã yen anĩ bure fele di, in dõ fiya tar, ĩ iron anĩ, wedereid fokõ yen. Anĩ bunem, idi Negur nẽ Itotoya ado Jesus wogõ yen anĩ nigin momoi den.
43002023	Gama ĩ Jerusalem oun sain Pasa Sifa bun ibod ken, tamo kayau musei memelik inodin anĩ dilen, anĩ bun ĩ yana nigin momoi den.
43002024	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ yogo bagai, idi nigin to momoi yen, ere nigin, ĩ tamo ganan nigin keleĩ.
43002025	Jesus ĩ, tamo takam taka nigin ĩ irokenẽya anĩ kisi feleya san, ere nigin, ereb tamo name bun ibodok, ĩ yogo keleĩ.
43003001	Farisia tamo taka, yana Nikodemus ibodon, ĩ Juda uyu irouya neid kaunsel taka.
43003002	Ĩ bõ Jesus wagen isi fen, iron, “Rabi, amã keleĩ, õ tise Negur bunem usin. Ere nigin, taka nem Negur ĩ ado to ibodõf are, memelik õ unodif anĩ inodiya kisi feleya sã.”
43003003	Jesus aiten yale iron, “Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, taka nem Negur nẽ tano to ilouf, ĩ baban mata gõ fiyẽf dogol.”
43003004	Nikodemus Jesus to fiyen, “Tamo ĩ biyan anĩ, sina naig fe baban gõ fouf? Momoi bagai, ĩ sina namen baban ile di, gõ fiyẽya kisi feleya sã!”
43003005	Jesus solof iron, “Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, taka ĩ, naan ado Awa Uurem mata to wõ youf are, ĩ Negur nẽ tano bun ileya kisi feleya sã.
43003006	Bouwam gõ fef are, bouwa nẽ, anĩ ere, Awa Uurem gõ fef are, uur nẽ.
43003007	Õ neu od eig au wogõ auf bun, kisi to gurũ wouf, ‘Ã de baban mata wõ gouf.’
43003008	Yau in oroya bun isi iledig. Õ ait dogol karĩ wodig, anĩ ere, õ nainenem isif be, nain be ilef, to keleĩ youf. Ganan idi Awa Uurem gogũ fedif are, age fiya bagai.”
43003009	Nikodemus Jesus to fiyen, “Are naig fe, agef wõ youf?”
43003010	Jesus iron, “Õ Israel neid tise, anĩ ere, õ enei to keleik de?
43003011	Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, ereb amã keleĩ anĩ wogõ mauf, age ma fen, ereb amã mailen anĩ kurõ mafesif, anĩ ere, tamo kayau ã fau amã nemã od to walegef.
43003012	Aya ã ereb tenebur tamal nẽ anĩ wogõ ayeik, anĩ ere, ã to momoi gef, saa ilun tamal nẽ anĩ wogõ ayeĩfeg, naig ge momoi gouf?
43003013	Aibem taka saa ilun to iselen, Tamo Naal saa ilunem isin yogo dogol.
43003014	Moses gerere tuan gogour yalesen, age fiya bagai, Tamo Naaleg age de dalesnẽf.
43003015	Are ganan idi ĩ nigin momoi def, mata faimud ibodkeleya adouf nigin.
43003016	“Negur, tamo kayau teneub enei bun ganan nigin fatuk wau laa fen nigin, yogon Naal tekelei bagai anĩ ifenẽdin, are taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi youf are, to fõ yalauf, mata faimud ibodkeleya adouf nigin age fen.
43003017	Negur ĩ, yogon Naal teneub enei bun, tamo kayau es fediya nigin to sur fen, ĩ bunem tamo kayau teneub enei bun, kel gei fouf nigin sur fen.
43003018	Taka, ĩ nigin momoi yef are, to es fiyek, anĩ ere, taka, ĩ nigin momoiya sã are, ĩ mogo es fiya bun ifaref, ere nigin, ĩ Negur Naal tekelei bagai yana nigin to momoi yen.
43003019	Foi fiya eig fiya, fula fiya teneub enei bun mogo isin, anĩ ere, tamo idi dogo neid tobonuneid sane nigin, fula fiya ditor ken, gugum nigin waud laa fen.
43003020	Tamo idi sane age difef are, lalan to orodidig, ere nigin, dogo neid tobonuneid sane anĩ yaoreya kumĩ de fen, lalan namen to disiyouf.
43003021	Anĩ ere, aib taka ĩ momoi bun age fef, lalan namen isidig, age fe di, ereb ĩ age fen are, Negur bunem age fen anĩ, yaor dilouf.”
43003022	Anĩ bure fele di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid, Judia teneub bun dilen, an ĩ idi geid sain naal dibod ken, naan igunẽdin.
43003023	Joneg Ainon Salim non naan igunẽdin, ere nigin, an naan musei bagai, anĩ nigin, tamo kayau naan igunẽdiyouf nigin toku disidig.
43003024	(Are Jon fau kalabus bun to dinenẽ mog.)
43003025	Jon nẽ dõ fiya tar tunĩ, Juda tamo taka geid, dogo neid tobonuneid dõ de fen, imeid kulo difedig anĩ nigin luwa diroun.
43003026	Idi Jon wagen disi dirokenen, “Rabi, tamo õ uruwom Jordan naan sitakã ufareg fen, ĩ nigin kurõ weis uron, ĩ naan igunẽdif, age fe di, ganan ĩ bun dilef.”
43003027	Jon solof iron, “Tamo ĩ, ereb saa ilun tamal ifenek anĩ dogol yalouf.
43003028	Ã aug aya oron anĩ sã kurõ walaisi gef, ‘Aya Kristus sã, anĩ ere, aya ĩ ket sur fiyan.’
43003029	Mois kayau are, mois tamo nẽ. Mois nẽ mou ĩ, bagu fiya bun ifar fen, karĩ fiyek, ĩ mois tamo nẽ ait anĩ karĩ ye fen, kulĩya odug ado. Kulĩya are neu, anĩ gama kisi felef.
43003030	Ĩ yana odug isele di, aya yanau tenebur isilauf.
43003031	“Taka ĩ ilunem isif, ĩ ganan wal fiya, taka ĩ tenebur tamal are, tenebur nẽ, anĩ nigin, tenebur nẽ anĩ wogõ yedig. Taka ĩ saa ilunem isif, ĩ ganan wal fiya.
43003032	Ereb ĩ ilen ado karĩ yen anĩ, kurõ falaisif, anĩ ere, yogon od taka nem to yalef.
43003033	Taka ĩ yogon od yalen anim, Negur ĩ momoi bagai ye fen, anĩ megeir ifenen.
43003034	Taka ĩ Negurem sur fiyen are, ĩ Negur nẽ od wogõ yef, ere nigin, Negur ĩ Awa Uur idikeleya sã ifenek.
43003035	Tama ĩ Naal nigin wau laaf fen, ereb ereb ganan ĩ ima bun inon.
43003036	Aib ĩ Naal nigin momoi yef are, mata gai ibodkeleya ado, taka ĩ Naal nigin itorok are, ĩ mata to ilouf, Negur nẽ didi ĩ bun ibodok.”
43004001	Jesus Jon wal fiye ken, in dõ fiya tar musei geif naan igunẽdif ya anĩ, Farisia tamo karĩ den.
43004002	Anĩ ere, momoi bagai Jesusem naan igunẽdiya sã, are in dõ fiya tar anidim.
43004003	Sain Odug enei kelei ken, ĩ Judia distrik itor ken, baban Galili kel ilen.
43004004	Gama ĩ Samaria atu ilauf.
43004005	Anĩ nigin, ĩ Sikar taun oun Samaria, Jakop, ne naal Josef teneub kulu ifenen non, iyok isin.
43004006	An Jakop nẽ naan ifotokon tutuwõ ibodon, Jesus naab meluk iyok isi, tuwa yu kele di, naan ifotokon tutuwõ sirin ibodon. Are mogo gaa atun age fiya.
43004007	Agef mog, Samaria kayau taka naan ifotũya nigin isi di, Jesus kayau irokenen, “Aya naan tau wana di, ãf.”
43004008	(In dõ fiya tar, taun saaf na yaleya nigin dilelen.)
43004009	Samaria kayau Jesus irokenen, “Õ Juda tamo di, aya Samaria kayau. Naig fe di, ayam õ naan afon, wãf nigin to wiyaf?” (Juda tamo kayau idi, Samaria tamo kayau geid to uyu katõ difedig.)
43004010	Jesus kayau irokenen, “Õ safina ege luwa Negur ifonok ado, aibem naan nigin to yok anĩ keleim are, õ ĩ to wiyẽ di, mata ifenẽya nẽ naan anĩ ifonom.”
43004011	Kayau iron, “Odug, õ ifotũya nẽ safina sã, naan ĩ ilon bagai. Õ mata ifenẽya nẽ naan are nain walouf?
43004012	Tamamã Jakop naan ifotok kanama ken, ĩ yogog gere tar ado gaareg anĩ bun don, õ ĩ wal fiya de?”
43004013	Jesus kayau aiten yale iron, “Ganan naan enei doko, idi baban naan ail fediyouf.
43004014	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ aya naan anĩ afenẽ di, yoko, ĩ baban to bagai naan ail fouf. Naan aya ĩ afenek, warur naan ĩ namen faimud ulo ulõ yef yenẽ di, anim mata gai ibodkalauf.”
43004015	Kayau Jesus irokenen, “Odug, naan enei wanauf, ago di, aya baban naan ail to fiya fen, naan enei bun ifotũya nigin toku ein to kelauf.”
43004016	Ĩ kayau irokenen, “Ule, ogon tamo uroken ken, kel usig.”
43004017	Kayau iron, “Aya tamo sã.” Jesus kayau irokenen, “Õ tamo sã wof are, õ tutuk urok.
43004018	Ere nigin, õ mogo tamo faif adon, tamo gama õ ado are, ogon aiwã sã. Õ ogo urom, are momoi bagai.”
43004019	Kayau iron, “Odug, aya õ ailiyok, õ profet taka.
43004020	Amã tamamã tar, arei enei bun Negur yana dalesedig, anĩ ere, Juda ã urõgedig, Negur yana yaleseya modoũ are oun Jerusalem dogol.”
43004021	Jesus kayau irokenen, “Kayau, aya momoi wiya, sain fau isi di, baban arei enei bun ado, Jerusalemeg an, Dei yana to walesagauf.
43004022	Samaria ã, ereb ã keleĩ sã anĩ yana walesegedig, amã ereb amã keleĩ anĩ yana malesedig, ere nigin, tamo kayau kel yaleya nẽ are, Juda ibor bun tamal.
43004023	Sain isiyouf are, gama mogo yeir isil, Negur momoi bagai yana dalesedig are, uur ado momoi bunem Dei yana dalesauf, ere nigin, idi age fediya anĩ Dei ĩ imirnẽdif.
43004024	Negur ĩ uur, anĩ nigin, ĩ yana dalesedig idi, uur ado momoi bunem, yana dalesauf.”
43004025	Kayau iron, “Aya keleĩ, Mesia (Kristus dedig) fau isif. Ĩ isiyouf sain bun, ereb ereb ganan faded famãf.”
43004026	Age ye di, Jesus kayau irokenen, “Aya inim yeir od ayok.”
43004027	Agef mog bagai, in dõ fiya tar keku de disi, Jesus kayau anĩ ado od de mog, dileid fen, terẽ den. Anĩ ere, taka nem to, to fiyen, “Õ ere oroyok?” be “Õ ere nigin ĩ ado od gef?”
43004028	Kayau, ne naan gulub itor yen, taun kel ile, tamo kayau irokenẽdin,
43004029	“Umag, tamo taka, aya ereb ereb ganan age afef asin irokanal anĩ uleg. Ĩ anĩ Kristus be.”
43004030	Idi taun ditor disi, Jesus garan dilen.
43004031	Age de mog, in dõ fiya tar Jesus totol bagai dirokenen, “Rabi, ereb taka wõ.”
43004032	Anĩ ere, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Aya saaf ã keleĩ sã anĩ ãf nigin ado.”
43004033	Age ye di, in dõ fiya tar abob dirokenen, “Taka nem mogo saaf irousi ifenem de?”
43004034	Jesus iron, “Neu saaf are, aya sur fiyan in oroya dõ afe fen, in kabĩ bure afalauf anĩ.
43004035	Ã eig ge to urõgedig de, ‘Ogõ fo bure fele di, kusu fiya sain wõ youf’? Aya ã arokeneik, meleĩ fara weleg fen, kabĩ onoudi ulogouf! Idi mogo kusu fiya nẽ mayo bure felen.
43004036	Kusu fiya tamo ĩ gama mala solo yalef, ĩ gama mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ biya kususu fef, anĩ bun, itenẽya tamo ado kusu fiya tamo waud al fouf.
43004037	Anĩ nigin, od enei momoi bagai, ‘Tamo takam itenẽdig, tamo takam kusu fedig.’
43004038	Aya, ã kabĩ to walegen nẽ an, kusu fiya nigin sur ayein. Tunim kabĩ totol dalen, anĩ ã idi neid maab mala anĩ kusu gen.”
43004039	Samaria tamo kayau, taun anĩ bun temeleid musei, ĩ nigin momoi den, ere nigin, kayau anĩ eig ye kurõ fesin, “Ĩ ereb ereb ganan age afef asin anĩ irokanal.”
43004040	Anĩ nigin, Samaria tamo kayau ĩ gein disi, ĩ idi geid dibodõf nigin totol bagai dirokenẽ di, ĩ naa uru, idi geid dibodon.
43004041	In od bunem, musei fau fau momoi den.
43004042	Idi kayau anĩ dirokenen, “Amã ogon od bun dogol to momoi mauf, ere nigin, amã mug karĩ mau fen, amã keleĩ, tamo enei momoi bagai teneub ganan enei nẽ Isennẽya.”
43004043	Naa uru bure fele di, Jesus Galili ilen.
43004044	Jesus ĩ yogo iron, ‘Profet taka, yogon fõ gariyan, ĩ yana sã.’
43004045	Sain ĩ Galili wõ yen, Galili tamo kayau ĩ daleyen. Idi Jerusalem Pasa Sifa bun, ĩ ereb ereb age fen ganan dilen, ere nigin, idig an weim difaren.
43004046	Ĩ baban Galili distrik oun Kana fonõ ki fen, kulu an ĩ naan wain falei felen. Sain anĩ bun, king nẽ kabĩ mudur taka nẽ naal Kapenaum taun an dagi yenen.
43004047	Tamo enei, Jesus Judia distrik tamal Galili isin anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ Jesus gein ile, ne naal laa melsã yenen anĩ, isi el fiyẽf nigin igonen.
43004048	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ã memelik uris ado anĩ to ulogouf are, ã to bagai momoi gouf.”
43004049	King nẽ kabĩ mudur iron, “Odug, neu kesu fau laa fiya sã mog, õ usiyouf.”
43004050	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Õ wadã ule. Õ naal fau mata ibodõf.” Tamo anĩ, Jesus nẽ od momoi ye fen, ilen.
43004051	Ĩ fau naab iyok ile mog, yogon ferfer ĩ fotou difiye ken, yogon kesu mata ibodok anĩ wogõ difiyen.
43004052	Age de di, ĩ gaa mala ganĩ bun, ne naal dagi karikan anĩ to fiyẽdin. Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Bouwa uruwa, nor wan kilok aragau folõ fiye kelen.”
43004053	Age de di, tama ĩ kelein, sain anĩ bun bagai, Jesus irokenen, “Õ naal fau mata ibodõf.” Anĩ nigin, ĩ yogo, ne fõ tura tar ganan geid, momoi den.
43004054	Jesus Judia distrik bun tamalem Galili isi fen, memelik inon, are eneim anĩ uru.
43005001	Dum, Jesus Juda neid sifa bun Jerusalem iselen.
43005002	Jerusalem an Sipsip Bobog non, naan kolili fiya taka Hibru od nem Betesta dedig ibodok, naan kolili fiya anĩ sirin meein torem fõ faif dinodin dibodok.
43005003	An dagi tamo kayau musei denenãdig, meleid ifofakeleya, yeid kirorõya, bouweid ilolaisidin.
43005005	Difaren nẽ an, tamo taka dagi ado ibodok ile, teti-eit yar yalen.
43005006	Sain Jesus ĩ an yen mog, ile fen, ĩ sain meluk dagi ado an yenen anĩ kelei ken, ĩ to fiyen, “Õ biya leya oroyok de?”
43005007	Dagi tamo iron, “Odug, sain naan moyõ fe di, taka nem isenna di, naanũ isileya to ibodok. Aya asilauf au mog, taka ketem uyu wal fiya fen, isiledig.”
43005008	Age ye di, Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Fã wo! Ogon gogoũ wenẽdig anĩ wale fen, uyok ule.”
43005009	Age ye di, tamo kaisã bagai dagi sa kele di, ĩ yogon gogoũ yale fen, iyok ilen. Anĩ wõ yen naa are, Sabat naa.
43005010	Anĩ nigin, Juda tamo idi, tamo dagi sa kelen anĩ dirokenen, “Naa eĩ Sabat naa. Õ ogon gogoũ irouya nigin lo katũ yef.”
43005011	Anĩ ere, ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Tamo ĩ el fiyal anim, ‘Ogon gogoũ wenẽdig anĩ wale fen, uyok ule,’ fiyal.”
43005012	Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Tamo enei nanim, ‘Ogon gogoũ wale fen, uyok ule,’ yom?”
43005013	Tamo el fiyen, ĩ aib ya anĩ nene yelen, ere nigin, Jesus ĩ an guru difen anĩ namen iwaikelen.
43005014	Dum Jesus tamo anĩ tempel bun fotou fiye ken, irokenen, “Ulef, õ baban biya lel. Baban mosor to uno, are ereb sane bagai uruwa nẽ wal fiya anĩ, õ bun to wõ youf nigin.”
43005015	Tamo are ile, Juda tamo irokenẽdin, ‘Aya el fiyal tamo are Jesus,’ yen.
43005016	Jesus Sabat naa bun enei age fedig nigin, Juda tamo idi ĩ morõ difenen.
43005017	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Neu Dei ĩ faimud kabĩ yalef isi, gama naa enei buneg kabĩ yalef, anĩ nigin, ayag kabĩ alef.”
43005018	Jesus age yen nigin, Juda tamo idi ĩ dukesiyouf nigin kabĩ totol dalen, Sabat naa nẽ lo wal fiya bun nigin dogol sã, ĩ Negur nigineg neu Dei ye fen, aya Negur ado tekelei yen nigin.
43005019	Anĩ nigin, Jesus od enei idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, Naal ĩ yogon oroyam ereb taka to age fouf, ĩ Tama age fef anĩ dogol ile fen, ĩg age fedig, ere nigin, ereb Tama age fef are Naaleg age fouf.
43005020	Tama ĩ Naal nigin wau laaf fen, ĩ ereb ereb age fedig anĩ ganan ifelnek. Ĩ ereb ereb enei wal fiya Naal ifelnẽf, anĩ bun ã terẽ gouf.
43005021	Tama ĩ laa turĩ feid fen, mata ifenẽdidig, age fiya bagai, Naal ĩg aib ĩ orof anĩ mata ifenẽdig.
43005022	Tama ĩ aib taka to es fiyẽf, anĩ ere, ĩ es fiya kabĩ ganan Naal bun inon,
43005023	are tamo kayau ganan idi Temeid yana dalesedig gen, Naal nigineg yana dalesauf nigin ĩ age fen. Taka ĩ Naal yana to yalesef, ĩ Tamam Naal sur fiyen anĩ yana to yalesef.
43005024	“Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ neu od karĩ ye fen, aya sur fiyan ĩ nigin momoi yef, ĩ mata faimud ibodkeleya ado fen, es fiya bun to ilauf. Ĩ laa bun tamal ibal fen, mata bun ilen.
43005025	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, sain fau isif, are mogo yeir isil, laa tamo Negur Naal nẽ ait karĩ douf, idi karĩ def anidi mata dibodõf.
43005026	Tama ĩ yogo bun mata ado, age fiya bagai, ĩ mata de anĩ Naaleg adouf nigin ifenen.
43005027	Agef fen, Tama ĩ Naal es fediyouf nigin megeir ifenen, ere nigin, ĩ Tamo Naal.
43005028	“Eig fiya bun to terẽ gouf, sain fau isif, ganan nedi matmat bun dibodok idi, yogon ait karĩ de fen,
43005029	ulolõ desiyouf, idi biya age difen anidi mata dibodõf nigin fafã douf, idi sane age difen anidi es fedi di, hel bun dilauf nigin fafã douf.
43005030	Aya neu oroyam, ereb taka to naig be afouf. Aya karĩ auf kilei bagai, aya es afef, neu es fiya are madur bagai, ere nigin, aya yug nigin au fen, to age afedig, anĩ ere, aya sur fiyan ĩ wau al fouf nigin au fen, age afedig.
43005031	“Aya yug nigin aya mugu wogõ auf are, neu wogõya are, momoi be sã be anĩ yaor sã.
43005032	Taka ĩ aya nigin kurõ fesidig, agef fen, aya keleĩ, ĩ aya nigin kurõ fesif are momoi.
43005033	“Ã Jon garan tamo tunĩ sur wedige di, ĩ aya nigin momoi od anĩ kurõ falaisi irokenẽdin.
43005034	Aya tamom aya nigin kurõ fesif anĩ to aroudig, anĩ ere, aya ã isenneĩf au fen, od anĩ wogõ aun.
43005035	Jon ĩ lam futur fen, lalan ifenen, age fe di, ã sain tobega bagai waleg fen, in lalan nigin wauĩ al fen.
43005036	“Neu kurõ fesiya anĩ Jon nẽ wal fiya, ere nigin, kabĩ aya bure afalauf nigin Dei ifanan alef anim, Dei ĩ aya sur fiyan anĩ kurõ fesif.
43005037	Dei ĩ sur fiyan ĩ yogo, aya nigin kurõ fesin. Ã ĩ ait to karĩ gen, nog to ulegen,
43005038	in odeg ã bun to ibodok, ere nigin, ã sur fiyen anĩ ĩ nigin to momoi gedig.
43005039	Ã Negur nẽ Itotoya keleĩ youf nigin kabĩ totol walegedig, ere nigin, ã kisi gef, anĩ bunem amã mata faimud ibodkeleya malef ge fen, ago gedig. Negur nẽ Itotoya enei, aya nigin kurõ fesif.
43005040	Anĩ ere, ã mata yaleya nigin, aya wageun isiya utorõgedig.
43005041	“Aya tamom yanau dalesauf nigin to orok,
43005042	anĩ ere, aya ã nigin keleĩ. Aya keleĩ, ã wauĩ bun Negur nigin wauĩ laa fiya to ibodok.
43005043	Aya neu Dei yana bunem asin, anĩ ã aya to waleyagen, anĩ ere, aibem taka yogo yana bunem isif are, ã walogouf.
43005044	Ã abob yana yaleseya anĩ oroyei ken, yana yaleseya Negur Tekelei bunem isif anĩ to totol unog walogouf are, ã naig ge momoi gouf?
43005045	“Anĩ ere, ã ayam Dei mala bun ãgenei sane anĩ kurõ afesiyouf ge fen to kisig. Ãgenei sane kurõ fesiya are Moses, ĩ bun ãgenei wauĩ iseya unogedig anĩ.
43005046	Ã Moses nigin momoi gem are, aya nigineg momoi gem, ere nigin, im aya nigin itoton.
43005047	Anĩ ere, ereb ĩ itoton anĩ to momoi gef nigin, naig ge fen, aya wogõ auf enei nigineg momoi gouf?”
43006001	Enei dumen, Jesus Galili Maaĩ ub sitakã ibal ilen (Galili Maaĩ anĩ, yana taka Taiberias Maaĩ).
43006002	Age fe di, tamo kayau musei ĩ dõ difiyen, ere nigin, ĩ dagi tamo kayau bun memelik ino di, meledim dilen.
43006003	Agef fen, Jesus arein isel, yogon dõ fiya tar geid dibodon.
43006004	Juda neid sifa inoya Pasa naa melsã mog.
43006005	Sain Jesus mala irakel, tamo kayau musei ĩ garan disi mog, ileid fen, ĩ Filip irokenen, “Ada tamo kayau eneidi dãf nigin, bret nain na talouf?”
43006006	Ĩ Filip kisi fiye ken, enei to fen, ere nigin, Jesus ĩ ereb age fouf nigin are ĩ keleĩ.
43006007	Filip Jesus aiten yalen, “Ogõ eit nẽ mala anim, idi mugu mugu nigin bret na talouf are, tunĩ to dõ dilouf.”
43006008	In dõ fiya tamo taka Endru, Simon Pita nẽ tura anĩ Jesus irokenen,
43006009	“Kesu taka yeir baali bret faif gau uru ado, anim musei ganan enei tau kisi falauf?”
43006010	Jesus iron, “Tamo kayau urokenẽdig len, dibod.” Modoũ anĩ bun fisir musei ado, an tamo dibodadan faif tausen age fiya.
43006011	Gama Jesus bret anĩ geif, Negur de fiye ken, idi dibodadan neid oroya kilei, anĩ gadõ fedin. Ĩ gau buneg de age fen.
43006012	Idi ganan dõ kisi fele di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Tunĩ ditoraram anĩ kurug. To sekil fiyauf.”
43006013	Anĩ nigin, baali bret faif anĩ idi dokon, masak tunĩ ifaredin anĩ kuru dife di, karam tuwelf isokosedin.
43006014	Tamo kayau memelik inon anĩ dile fen, idi diron, “Momoi bagai, enei are Profet teneub enei bun isiyouf ya anĩ.”
43006015	Idi disi, Jesus king ibodõf nigin nugo difiyẽf ya anĩ, ĩ kelei ken, baban mugu arein kel iselen.
43006016	Gugumek isi di, yogon dõ fiya tar daliyoun disilen.
43006017	An idi waag taka bun sosõ de daliyou dibal fen, Kapenaum luwe dile mog, mogo gugumen, anĩ Jesus fau idi garan to isin.
43006018	Yau totol isi di, maaĩ moloun wĩ yen.
43006019	Idi waag sur de dira ken, ful de dile, faif kilomita be, sigis kilomita age fiya mog, Jesus naan tetenem waag garan iyok isi mog, dile fen, kumĩ tererẽ den.
43006020	Anĩ ere, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Are ayam, to kumĩ wog.”
43006021	Age ye di, ĩ waag bun dalesnẽf nigin waud yenen, kaisã bagai, idi dilauf nẽ waud iron ub anĩ bun, waag goro fen.
43006022	Naa taka di, tamo kayau daliyou ub sitakã difaren idi kelein, waag tekelei dogol an ibodon, anĩ Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid to sõ den, idi dogo dogol dilen.
43006023	Waag tunĩ Taiberias temeleid, Odug, bret Negur de fiye ken, tamo kayau ifeneĩd don modoũ anĩ non, goro difen.
43006024	Tamo kayau, Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid an to dibodon anĩ kelei ken, idi waag sosõ de fen, Jesus dimirnẽf nigin Kapenaum dilen.
43006025	Sain tamo kayau idi, daliyou sitakã Jesus fotou dife fen, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Rabi, ere sain õ ein usin?”
43006026	Jesus aitedin yalen, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ã aya umirnagef, ã memelik ulegen nigin sã, anĩ ere, ã bret ifoutneĩ di, wõg eweĩ gere fen nigin.
43006027	Saaf sane ledig anĩ nigin to kabĩ waleg, anĩ ere, saaf to sane le fen, mata faimud ibodkeleya bun ibodõdig anĩ nigin kabĩ waleg, are Tamo Naalem ifeneĩf. Ĩ dogol Tama Negurem igirne ken, yoya nẽ megeir ganan ifenen.”
43006028	Age ye di, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Amã Negur nẽ kabĩ malouf nigin, naig bagai mafouf?”
43006029	Jesus solof iron, “Negur nẽ kabĩ are yeir, Negurem sur fiyen ĩ nigin momoi gouf.”
43006030	Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Ere memelik bun uris wanamã di, mail fen, õ momoi mayõf? Ere anĩ õ unouf?
43006031	Amã nemã tubumã tar gerere tuan mana don, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye yenek kilei, ‘Ĩ idi saa ilun tamal bret dãf nigin ifenẽdin.’ ”
43006032	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, Moses im bret saa ilun tamal to ifenein, anĩ ere, neu Dei ĩ yogo bret kaũ bagai saa ilun tamal ifeneik.
43006033	Ere nigin, Negur nẽ bret saa ilun tamal isi fen, teneub enei mata ifenek.”
43006034	Idi diron, “Odug, gama ilauf enei bun bret anĩ wanamã.”
43006035	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya anĩ mata nẽ bret. Taka ĩ aya bun isif, to bagai naũ ilauf, taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, to bagai naan ail fouf.
43006036	Anĩ ere, aya ã arokenein kilei, ã mogo uleyagen, anĩ fau to momoi gef.
43006037	Idi ganan Deim ifanaf, aya bun disiyouf, taka ĩ aya bun isif, aya to bagai aruwauf.
43006038	Aya saa ilun tamal asin, aya neu oroya dõ afouf nigin sã, anĩ ere, aya sur fiyan nẽ oroya dõ afouf nigin.
43006039	Aya sur fiyan nẽ oroya are yeir, idi ganan ĩ ifanan taka to folõ afalauf, anĩ ere, aya idikeleya naa bun alesnẽdiyouf.
43006040	Neu Dei nẽ oroya anĩ, taka ĩ Naal ile fen, ĩ nigin momoi yef, mata faimud ibodkeleya yalouf, idikeleya naa bun aya alesnẽf.”
43006041	Od enei Juda tamo karĩ de fen, ĩ nigin nauseir den, ere nigin, Jesus iron, “Aya bret saa ilun tamal asin.”
43006042	Idi diron, “Eĩ Jesus sã de? Josef naal, in sina tama ado ada keleĩ. Naig fe di, ĩ irok, ‘Aya saa ilun tamal asin’?”
43006043	Jesus solof iron, “Ã aug to nauseir gouf.
43006044	Taka yogon oroyam, aya wageun isiya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, Dei aya sur fiyan inim, ĩ namen kabĩ yale fen, aya garan irou isiyouf. Age fe di, idikeleya naa bun, aya ĩ alesnẽf.
43006045	Profet neid itotoya bun eig ye yenek, ‘Idi ganan Negurem ifelnẽdiyouf.’ Taka ĩ Dei karĩ fiye ken, ĩ bun keleĩ yalef, aya bun isidig.
43006046	Taka nem Dei to ilen, Negur bunem isin im dogol. Ĩ yogo dogol Dei ilen.
43006047	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ momoi yef, mata faimud ibodkeleya ado.
43006048	Aya mata nẽ bret.
43006049	Ãgenei tubuĩ tar gerere tuan mana don, anĩ ere, idi gare den.
43006050	Anĩ ere, bret enei saa ilun tamal isif, are tamo yãf, to laa fouf.
43006051	Aya mata ibodõya bret, are saa ilun tamalem isin. Taka ĩ bret enei yoko, ĩ mata faimud ibodõf. Bret enei aya bouwau, are teneub ganan bun, tamo kayau mata dalouf nigin afenẽdiyouf.”
43006052	Age ye di, Juda tamo dogo dogol fatuk bagai luwa diroun, “Naig fe fen, tamo enei yogon bouwa ifanada tãf?”
43006053	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ã Tamo Naal nẽ bouwa to wãgauf, in naud to wãgauf are, ã namein mata to ibodok.
43006054	Taka ĩ neu bouwau yokon, neu naudou yoko, ĩ mata faimud ibodkeleya ado, anĩ aya fau idikeleya naa bun alesnẽf.
43006055	Ere nigin, neu bouwau are saaf bagai, neu naudou are naan bagai.
43006056	Taka ĩ neu bouwau yokon, neu naudou yoko, ĩ aya nameun ibodok, aya ĩ namen abodok.
43006057	Mata ibodõya Dei aya sur fiya di, aya Dei bunem mata abodok gen, taka ĩ aya yõyaf, aya bunem mata ibodõf.
43006058	Bret enei saa ilun tamal isin. Ãgenei tubuĩ tar mana don are gare desin, anĩ ere, taka ĩ bret enei yoko, faimud mata ibodkalauf.”
43006059	Ĩ od enei Kapenaum taun an, Juda neid uub fõ bun ifelneĩd fen, wogõ yen.
43006060	Od enei karĩ de fen, in dõ fiya tar musei diron, “Ifelnadaf eĩ totol bagai. Aim anĩ keleĩ youf?”
43006061	In dõ fiya tar od enei nigin nauseir de di, Jesus anĩ kelei ken, idi irokenẽdin, “Od enei ã morõ ifeneik de?
43006062	Ba, Tamo Naal ĩ ibodon nẽ kel isel mog ulogouf are, ã ere kisi gouf?
43006063	Awa Uurem mata ifenẽdig, bouwa are gorõ. Od aya wogõ ayein are Uur, od anĩ mata ifenẽdig.
43006064	Anĩ ere, ã tunĩ momoiya sã.” Ere nigin, Jesus idi nigin gariya bun kelein, aiyaim ĩ nigin to momoi den, aim ĩ nigin kiwai inouf.
43006065	Ĩ od tobol fe iron, “Anĩ nigin, aya od enei arokenein, Dei ĩ nigin wau to yalouf, ĩ aya bun isiya kisi feleya sã.”
43006066	Od enei bunem, in dõ fiya tar musei keku den, baban Jesus to dõ difiyen.
43006067	Jesus in dõ fiya tar tuwelf to fedin, “Ãg aya utornag ulagauf de?”
43006068	Simon Pita solof iron, “Odug, amã ai bun malauf? Õ mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ od ado.
43006069	Amã momoi mau fen, keleĩ, õ anĩ Negur nẽ Fateul.”
43006070	Age ye di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Tuwelf ã ayam to agirnein de? Anĩ ere, ã atun taka are Satan.”
43006071	(Ĩ Judas, Simon Iskariot naal nigin kisif fen, iron. Idi tuwelf anĩ taka Judas, fau dum Jesus kiwai ifenen.)
43007001	Enei dumen, Jesus Galili an iyon, Judia distrik so fiyen, ere nigin, an Juda tamo ĩ dukesiyouf nigin ololo difen.
43007002	Anĩ ere, Juda neid Salafat nẽ Sifa naa melsã di,
43007003	Jesus tura tarem ĩ dirokenen, “Õ ein utor ken, Judia ulauf, ago di, ogon dõ fiya tar, memelik uno di, dilouf.
43007004	Tamo taka ĩ, tamo kayau meleid bun mala yaor wõ you fenẽ, ĩ iminẽyan kabĩ to yaledig. Õ eneidi agof, õ ogo tamo kayau ganan ufelnẽdiyouf.”
43007005	Ĩ yogon tura tar bagaig, ĩ nigin to momoi den.
43007006	Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya neu sain bagai fau isiya sã, ã nigin sain ganan kisi feleya bagai.
43007007	Tenebur tamo kayau idi, ã to kiwai difeneik, aya nigin kiwai, ere nigin, ereb sane age difef anĩ kurõ afesidig.
43007008	Ã Sifa bun ulagauf, aya nigin fau Sifa enei bun to eselauf, ere nigin, neu sain bagai fau isiya sã.”
43007009	Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, Galili distrik an ibodon.
43007010	Anĩ ere, tura tar Sifa bun diselel mog, ĩg iselen, anĩ ere, mala yaor sã, iminẽyan.
43007011	Sifa bun, Juda tamo idi, ĩ nigin meleid dino fen, to difen, “Tamo are nain?”
43007012	Tamo kayau atun, ĩ nigin fatuk bagai kosesẽ kurã den. Tunĩ diron, “Ĩ tamo biya.” Tunĩ solo de diron, “Eo, ĩ tamo kayau idegnẽdidig.”
43007013	Anĩ ere, taka nem ĩ nigin yaor to kurõ fesin, ere nigin, idi Juda tamo nigin kumĩ den.
43007014	Sifa mogo atusil ifar mog, Jesus tempel modoũ bun isel fen, od ifelnẽdin.
43007015	Juda tamo idi terẽ de fen, diron, “Tamo enei tai fiya yaleya sã mog, naig fe fen, keleĩ eig fiya ado?”
43007016	Jesus solof iron, “Neu ifelnẽya are neu sã, aya sur fiyan ĩ bunem isif.
43007017	Taka ĩ Negur nẽ oroya dõ fiya nigin orof are, neu ifelnẽya Negur bunem isif be, aya neu oroya nem wogõ auf be anĩ, ĩ keleĩ youf.
43007018	Taka ĩ yogon kisim wogõ yef are, ĩ yogo yana yaleseya nigin age fef, anĩ ere, taka ĩ sur fiyen nẽ yana yaleseya nigin kabĩ yalef, tamo are momoi nẽ. Ĩ bun idegẽya taka sã.
43007019	Moses lo anĩ to ifenein de? Anĩ ere, ã atun, taka nem lo to dõ fedig. Ere nigin ã aya unakesigouf nigin ago gef?”
43007020	Tamo kayau solo de diron, “Õ kaa sane ado. Aim õ inokesiyouf nigin age fef?”
43007021	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya memelik taka ano di, ã ganan terẽ gen.
43007022	Anĩ ere, Mosesem mulũ ileya ifenein nigin, ã kesu Sabat naa bun mulũ ileya wenẽgedig (mulũ ileya are, Moses bunem to isin, teneub te bunem isin).
43007023	Moses nẽ lo to wal gouf nigin, Sabat naa bun kesu nẽ mulũ ileya wenẽgedig, ere nigin aya Sabat naa bun, tamo bou adok el afe di, ã aya nigin nameĩ sanedig?
43007024	Mala yaor anĩ dogol uleg fen, to es gei, tutuk bagai el ge, es gei.”
43007025	Sain anĩ bun, Jerusalem tamo kayau tunĩ diron, “Tamo enei are idi ĩ dukesiyouf nigin age difef anĩ sã de?
43007026	Ĩ de yeir, mal atun wogõ ye di, ereb od taka to dirokenek. Mudur adodo idi, ĩ anĩ Kristus ya anĩ mogo tutuk keleĩ de?
43007027	Anĩ ere, tamo enei nain be tamal, are amã keleĩ. Sain Kristus isiyouf, taka nem ĩ nainenem be isif to keleĩ youf.”
43007028	Age de di, Jesus fau tempel modoũ bun ifelneĩd fen, iweig iron, “Are de, ã aya nigin keleĩ, aya nainenem asin are ã keleĩ. Aya ein neu oroyam to asin, anĩ ere, ĩ aya sur fiyan are momoi. Ã ĩ keleĩ sã,
43007029	anĩ ere, aya ĩ keleĩ, ere nigin, aya ĩ bun tamal, im aya sur fiyan.”
