43007030	Od enei bun, idi ĩ dirounẽf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, taka nem ĩ bun ima to inon, ere nigin, yogon sain fau isiya sã.
43007031	Anĩ ere, tamo kayau musei fau ĩ nigin momoi de fen, diron, “Sain Kristus isiyouf, ĩ memelik tamo enei inodif anĩ wal fiya inodiyouf de?”
43007032	Tamo kayau ĩ nigin age de, kosesẽ kurã de mog, Farisia tamo idi karĩ den. Age de fen, pris odudug Farisia geid, tempel lo fiya tamo Jesus dalouf nigin sur difedin.
43007033	Jesus iron, “Aya ã geid sain modeg tabodok, age afe fen, aya ĩ aya sur fiyan bun alauf.
43007034	Ã aya umirnagauf, anĩ ere, ã to fotou wiyagauf. Aya abodõf nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã.”
43007035	Juda tamo abob dirokenen, “Tamo enei nari bagai ile di, anĩ ada ĩ to fotou tafouf? Ada neda tamo kayau firagagaũ difen, Grik tamo kayau atun dibodok nẽ an, ĩ ile fen, Grik tamo kayau ifelnẽdiyouf de?
43007036	Ere gariya nigin ĩ iron, ‘Ã aya umirnagauf, anĩ ere, ã to fotou wiyagauf. Aya abodõf nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã’?”
43007037	Sifa naa odug idikeleya bun, Jesus ifar fen, iweig iron, “Taka ĩ naan ail fouf, aya bun isi fen, naan yãf.
43007038	Taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, Negur nẽ Itotoya iron kilei, warur naan ĩ namenem ulo ulõ yef yenẽf.”
43007039	Ĩ od enei Awa Uur nigin wogõ yen, are idi Jesus nigin momoi den anidi fau dalouf. Sain anĩ bun, Awa Uur isiya san, ere nigin, Jesus fau fula fiya medeĩya yaleya sã.
43007040	Od enei karĩ de fen, tamo kayau tunĩ diron, “Momoi bagai, tamo enei Profet ada tari tafef anĩ.”
43007041	Tunĩ diron, “Ĩ Kristus.” Tunĩg diron, “Kristus ouf are, naig fe fen, Galilim isiyouf?
43007042	Kristus Dawid nẽ ibor bunem, Betlehem taun Dawid ibodon nẽ anenem isiyouf, anĩ Negur nẽ Itotoya to irok de?”
43007043	Anĩ nigin, tamo kayau Jesus nigin fara furu difen.
43007044	Tunĩ Jesus ka difiyẽf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, taka nem ĩ bun ima to inon.
43007045	Tempel lo fiya tamo idi, pris odudug Farisia tamo gedin keku de dile di, to difedin, “Ere nigin ã ĩ to urou usigel?”
43007046	Tempel lo fiya tamo solo de diron, “Taka nem, tamo enei wogõ yedig gen to wogõ yedig.”
43007047	Farisia tamo solo de diron, “Ĩ ãg idegnein de?
43007048	Mudur adodo Farisia tamo geid atun, taka ĩ nigin momoi yen de?
43007049	Sã, anĩ ere, tamo kayau eneidi idi lo keleĩ sã, idi Negurem gelu fedif.”
43007050	Nikodemus, idi neid taka, tetunem Jesus garan ilen, ĩ irokenẽdin,
43007051	“Ada neda lo bun, taka ĩ ereb age fef anĩ ileya nigin ketem karĩ tafiye ken, es tafedig. Age fiya sã de?”
43007052	Idi solo de diron, “Õg Galili tamal de? Umir ken, fau keleĩ youf, profet taka Galilim to isif.” [Itotoya tunĩ kulu bagai od gariya dino fen, ditoton anĩ bun, Jon 7:53-8:11 to ibodok.]
43007053	Age de fen, idi mugu mugu dogo neid fonõ fonõ dilen.
43008001	Anĩ ere, Jesus Moul Arei bun iselen.
43008002	Bonimei mumurei ado, ĩ baban tempel modoũ bun wõ yen, an tamo kayau ganan guru de salili difiyẽ di, ĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin ibodon.
43008003	Lo ifelnẽdiya tamo Farisia tamo geid idi, kayau taka noli ye mog, dale dirou disi, guru fiya mala bun dinenẽ di, ifaren.
43008004	Age dife fen, Jesus dirokenen, “Tise, kayau enei noli tobonunã ino di, malel.
43008005	Lo bun, kayau age fediya meein tulu fiya nigin Moses irokanaman. Gama õ ere wof?”
43008006	Idi ĩ bou bun od yũya nigin kor dino fen, age de, to difiyen. Anĩ ere, Jesus obũ yeis fen, ima gegem teneub bun itoton.
43008007	Idi ĩ to difiyẽtu di, ĩ fã ye, saules fen, irokenẽdin, “Ã atun, aib taka ĩ mosor sãf, ĩ ketem kayau bun meein irãf.”
43008008	Baban ĩ obũ yeis fen, teneub bun itoton.
43008009	Idi od anĩ karĩ de fen, idi mugu mugu ul de, diyalelen, biyedim uyu dirou di, age de dile, Jesus kayau ifaren anĩ ado dogol ditornẽdin.
43008010	Jesus saules fen, kayau to fiyen, “Kayau, idi nai difef? Idi takam baban õ bun od to yuk de?”
43008011	Kayau iron, “Odug, takam to age fef.” Jesus iron, “Ayag õ boũ bun od to auk. Ule fen, sain enei ilauf ganan, mosor baban to uno.”
43008012	Jesus baban tamo kayau irokeneĩd fen, ĩ iron, “Aya tenebur enei nẽ fula fiya. Taka ĩ aya dõ fiyauf, ĩ gugum namen to bagai iyõf, anĩ ere, ĩ mata nẽ fula fiya adouf.”
43008013	Age ye di, Farisia tamo idi Jesus dirokenen, “Õ ogo nigin wogõ wof, anĩ nigin, ogon wogõya are, momoi be sã be anĩ yaor sã.”
43008014	Jesus solof irokenẽdin, “Aya yug nigin wogõ auf, anĩ ere, neu wogõya are momoi, ere nigin, aya nainenem asin, nain be alauf anĩ, aya keleĩ. Anĩ ere, ã, aya nainenem asin, nain be alauf anĩ, keleĩ sã.
43008015	Ã tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem es gedig, aya aib taka to es afedig.
43008016	Anĩ ere, aya es afouf are, neu es fiya are tutuk, ere nigin, aya mugu sã. Aya Dei inim sur fiyan ado mafaref.
43008017	Ãgenei Lo bun itotoya irok, tamo urom wogõ tekelei dinof, are momoi.
43008018	Aya yug nigin kurõ afalaisidig, age afe di, Dei aya sur fiyan ĩ, aya nigin kurõ fesidig.”
43008019	Age ye di, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Õ tamã nain?” Jesus solof iron, “Ã aya nigin ado neu Dei nigineg keleĩ sã. Ã aya nigin keleim are, neu Dei nigineg keleim.”
43008020	Ĩ tempel bun kolekta inoya nẽ modoũ non ifelneĩd fen, od enei wogõ fiyẽdin. Anĩ ere, takam ĩ to ima ka fen, ere nigin, in sain fau isiya sã.
43008021	Jesus baban idi irokenẽdin, “Aya atorneĩ di, ã umirnagauf, agog fen, ã ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf. Aya elef nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã.”
43008022	Anĩ bunem, Juda tamo idi diron, “Ĩ yogo bouwa yukesiyouf de? Anĩ nigin, ĩ, ‘Aya elef nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã,’ yef de?”
43008023	Anĩ ere, Jesus tobol fe fen, irokenẽdin, “Ã tenebur temeleĩ, aya ilun temelou. Ã teneub enei nẽ, aya teneub enei nẽ sã.
43008024	Anĩ nigin, aya, ã ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf ayein. Aya yug nigin, aya im audig anĩ, to momoi gouf are, ã momoi bagai ãgenei mosor bun gare gouf.”
43008025	Age ye di, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Õ ai?” Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya aib anĩ, mogo gariya bunem arokeneik asin.
43008026	Aya ã nigin wogõya musei ado, es fiya nigineg musei. Anĩ ere, sur fiyan ĩ, momoi bagai, anĩ nigin, ereb aya ĩ bun karĩ aun anĩ, tamo kayau tenebur ein arokenẽdif.”
43008027	Idi, ĩ Tama nigin irokenẽdif ya anĩ, to kisi fokõ yen.
43008028	Anĩ nigin, Jesus iron, “Sain ã Tamo Naal walesagauf bun, aya yug nigin aya im audig anĩ, ã keleĩ youf, aya neu oroyam ereb taka to age afedig, anĩ ere, aya Dei ifelnan anĩ dogol wogõ audig anĩ, ã keleĩ youf.
43008029	Aya sur fiyan ĩ, amã urom mabodok, ĩ mugu to itornal, ere nigin, aya faimud, ereb ĩ wau al fouf anĩ, age afedig.”
43008030	Age wogõ ye di, musei ĩ nigin momoi den.
43008031	Jesus, Juda tamo ĩ momoi difiyen anidi irokenẽdin, “Aya afelnein anĩ uroug tokõ walagauf are, ã momoi bagai neu dõ fiya tar.
43008032	Agog fen, ã momoi anĩ keleĩ youf, momoi anim kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelneĩf.”
43008033	Idi aiten dale dirokenen, “Amã Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar, amã aib taka nẽ ferfer to mabodon. Ere wo fen, amã kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnamãya nigin urok?”
43008034	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ mosor inof are, ĩ mosor nẽ ferfer.
43008035	Ferfer ĩ, ibor anĩ bun gai ibodkeleya modoũ sã, anĩ ere, modoũ are naal nẽ faimud ibodkalauf.
43008036	Anĩ nigin, Naal ĩ kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelneĩf are, ã momoi bagai karika lauf.
43008037	Ã Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar are, aya keleĩ. Anĩ ere, ã aya unakesigouf nigin dodok gef, ere nigin, ã neu od nẽ modoũ namein to ibodok.
43008038	Ereb aya Dei mala bun ailen anĩ, aya ã arokeneik, ãg ereb ãgenei temeĩ bun karĩ gen anĩ ago gedig.”
43008039	Idi aiten dale dirokenen, “Abraham ĩ tamamã.” Age de di, Jesus iron, “Ã Abraham gere tarem are, Abraham age fedin anĩ ago gem.
43008040	Gama ã, aya Negur bun momoi anĩ karĩ au fen, arokenein anĩ, unakesigouf nigin naab umirẽgef. Abraham ĩ to age fen.
43008041	Ã temeĩ age fedig anĩ ago gef.” Age ye di, idi Jesus dirokenen, “Amã seseirã inoya naab bun temelamã sã. Nemã Tamamã are Negur yogo dogol.”
43008042	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur ĩ Temeim are, ã aya nigin wauĩ laa fem, ere nigin, aya Negur bunem asi fen, yeir afaref. Aya neu oroyam to asin, im sur fiyan.
43008043	Ere nigin neu od nigin wauĩ to fokõ yef? Are aya wogõ auf anĩ, ã karĩya kisi feleya sã nigin.
43008044	Ã, temeĩ Satan nẽ, anĩ nigin, ã temeĩ nẽ oroya dõ fiya nigin oroyeik. Ĩ gariya bunem isin, ĩ yukesiya kaa, momoi to iroudig, ere nigin, ĩ namen momoi sã. Ereb sain ĩ idegẽya od wogõ yedig, ĩ yogon od bagai wogõ yedig, ere nigin, ĩ kori tamal, idegẽya tama.
43008045	Anĩ ere, aya momoi anĩ wogõ audig nigin, ã to momoi wiyagedig!
43008046	Ã takam, aya neu mosor anĩ tau kurõ fesiya kisi feleya? Aya momoi wogõ auf are, ere nigin ã to momoi wiyagef?
43008047	Aib ĩ Negur nẽ, ĩ Negur ereb yef anĩ karĩ yedig. Ã to karĩ gef anĩ nẽ gariya are, ã Negur nẽ sã nigin.”
43008048	Juda tamo aiten dale dirokenen, “Amã õ Samaria tamal, kaa sanem irounon mauf are, momoi to morok de?”
43008049	Jesus solof iron, “Aya kaam to irounan, anĩ ere, aya neu Dei yana seli abidig, ã aya selu to wabigedig.
43008050	Aya yug nigin fula fiya medeĩya to amirek, anĩ ere, taka ĩ anĩ imirek are ibodok, ĩ anĩ es fiya tamo.
43008051	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ neu od irou kafĩ falauf are, ĩ laa to bagai gurug fouf.”
43008052	Juda tamo, anĩ bun Jesus dirokenen, “Gama amã keleĩ, õ kaa sanem irounon! Abraham laa fen, profeteg gare den, anĩ ere, õ, taka ĩ ogon od irou kafĩ falauf are, ĩ laa to bagai kobũf ilouf, wof.
43008053	Õ tamamã Abraham wal fiya de? Ĩ laa fen, profeteg age difen. Õ kisi wof, õ ai?”
43008054	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Aya yug selu alesauf are, neu seli alef are ege. Neu Dei, ĩ anĩ ãgenei Negur gef, ĩ aya yanau yalesedig.
43008055	Ã ĩ keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, aya ĩ keleĩ. Aya ĩ keleĩ sã auf are, aya ã gen idegẽya tamouf, anĩ ere, aya ĩ keleĩ bagai, in od dõ afedig.
43008056	Temeĩ Abraham ĩ, neu naa anĩ ilouf nigin kisif fen, wau al fen. Ĩ anĩ mogo ile fen, kulĩ yen.”
43008057	Anĩ nigin, Juda tamo Jesus dirokenen, “Õ fau yar fifti yaleya sã, anĩ õ mogo Abraham ulen de?”
43008058	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, Abraham gõ fiya sã mog, aya abodon.”
43008059	Anĩ nigin, idi ĩ meein tulu difouf nigin meein gei difen, anĩ ere, Jesus bouwa inokel fen, tempel modoũ bun tamal iya ilen.
43009001	Jesus iyok ile fen, tamo taka mala ifofakeleya gõ difen anĩ ilen.
43009002	In dõ fiya tar Jesus to difiyen, “Rabi, aim mosor ino di, ĩ mala ifofakeleya gõ difen, tamo enei yogo de, sina tamam de?”
43009003	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Tamo eneimeg sã, sina tama adomeg sã, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ kabĩ ĩ bunem yaorouf nigin eig fiya wõ yen.
43009004	Eĩ fau gaa ado, aya sur fiyan in kabĩ talouf bagai. Bõ fau isif, sain anĩ, taka nem kabĩ yaleya kisi feleya sã.
43009005	Sain aya tenebur abodok, aya teneub enei nẽ fula fiya.”
43009006	Age wogõ yel fen, ĩ tenebur isis fen, salina buru ado falei fe fen, tamo mala bun inon.
43009007	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Ule, Siloam naan kukor ugũ” (Siloam nẽ gariya, are ‘Sur fiyen’). Anĩ nigin, tamo ile, naan igun, agef fen, mala kelẽ yel, fõ bun isin.
43009008	In fõ tura tar ado, idi ĩ nonĩ ye mog diledig anidi diron, “Tamo de eneim ibod ken, nonĩ yedig anĩ sã de?”
43009009	Idi tunĩ diron, “Im.” Tunĩ diron, “Im sã, taka ĩ genem.” Anĩ ere, ĩ yogo iron, “Aya de tamo anim.”
43009010	Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Naig fe di, õ malã kelẽ yeledin?”
43009011	Ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Tamo yana Jesus dedig im, buru falei fe fen, malau uru bun inodin. Ĩ, aya ele, Siloam naan agũf nigin irokanan. Anĩ aya ele, naan agun, age afe fen, aya malau kelẽ aun.”
43009012	Idi ĩ to difiyen, “Tamo are nain?” Ĩ iron, “Aya keleĩ sã.”
43009013	Idi tamo mala ifofakelen anĩ, Farisia tamo gedin dale dirou disin.
43009014	Jesus buru falei fe fen, tamo mala el fedin nẽ naa are Sabat naa.
43009015	Anĩ nigin, Farisia tamo idig, ĩ naig fe fen, mala kelẽ yedin anĩ to difiyen. Tamo are irokenẽdin, “Ĩ malau buru inodin, age fe di, agun, anĩ aya gama kelẽ auf.”
43009016	Farisia tamo tunĩ diron, “Tamo enei Negur bun tamal sã, ere nigin, ĩ Sabat naa to dõ fef.” Anĩ ere, tunĩ diron, “Naig fe di, mosor tamo memelik age fediya inoya kisi feleya?” Anĩ nigin, idi fara difen.
43009017	Idi baban tamo mala ifofakelen anĩ dirokenen, “Ĩ õ malã el fen anĩ, õ ĩ nigin ere wof?” Age de di, ĩ iron, “Ĩ profet.”
43009018	Juda tamo idi, tamo mala ifofakeleya mala kelẽ yelen anĩ, fau to momoi den. Anĩ nigin, idi tamo anĩ sina tama diweignẽdin.
43009019	Idi to difen, “Eĩ ã naaluĩ de? De ĩ anĩ mala ifofakeleya gõ mafen gef? Naig fe di, ĩ gama sã mala kelẽ yelef?”
43009020	Sina tama diron, “Amã keleĩ, ĩ nemã kesu, anĩ ĩ mala ifofakeleya gõ mafen.
43009021	Anĩ ere, ĩ naig fe fen, gama sã lo fef, aim ĩ mala el fedin anĩ, amã keleĩ sã. Yogo to wiyẽg, ĩ biya, yogo nigin wogõ youf.”
43009022	Sina tama idi, Juda tamo kumĩ difiyeĩd fen, age de diron, ere nigin, Juda tamo idi mogo od difon, aib taka Jesus anĩ Kristus youf are, Juda neid uub fõ bun dalelnẽf.
43009023	Age fiya nigin, sina tama eig de diron, “Ĩ biya, yogo to wiyẽg.”
43009024	Baban Juda tamo idi, mala ifofakelen anĩ diweigne ken, diron, “Negur yana wales fen, momoi nẽ od dogol urõf, amã keleĩ, tamo are mosor tamal.”
43009025	Ĩ solof iron, “Ĩ mosor ado be sã be, aya keleĩ sã. Tekelei aya keleĩ are, aya malau ifofakelen, anĩ ere, gama lo afedig.”
43009026	Age ye di, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Ĩ õ ere naig yon? Naig fe di, õ malã birikã fedin?”
43009027	Ĩ aitedin yale iron, “Aya ã mogo arokenein, anĩ ere, ã to karĩ gen. Ere nigin ã baban karĩ gou fenẽ? Ãg in dõ fiya tar wowã gou fenẽ de?”
43009028	Age ye di, idi kono difiye ken, diron, “Õ tamo enei nẽ dõ fiya taka! Amã are Moses nẽ dõ fiya tar!
43009029	Negur Moses wogõ fiyen are amã keleĩ, anĩ ere, tamo enei nigin, ĩ nainenem isin areg, amã keleĩ sã.”
43009030	Tamo anĩ aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Ago ge di, terẽ auf. Ĩ nainenem isin, ã keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, aya malau birikaũ fedin.
43009031	Amã keleĩ, Negur ĩ mosor dinodidig anĩ to karĩ fiyẽdidig, anĩ ere, taka ĩ Negur anini fiye ken, Negur nẽ oroya dõ fef are, Negurem ĩ karĩ fiyẽdig.
43009032	Gariya bunem isi gama, taka nem, tamo mala ifofakeleya gõ difen anĩ birikã fedin yeya to karĩ yedig.
43009033	Tamo enei Negur bun tamal sam are, ĩ ereb taka to naig fem.”
43009034	Age ye di, idi diron, “Õ mosor barikã gõ diyon, naig fe di, õ amã ufelnamak?” Age de fen, idi ĩ mayarẽ diru dirã di, isin.
43009035	Jesus, idi tamo anĩ serẽ diran yeya anĩ karĩ yen. Jesus ĩ fotou fiye ken, iron, “Õ Tamo Naal nigin momoi wof de?”
43009036	Tamo to fen, “Odug, ai anĩ ĩ? Urokana di, aya ĩ nigin momoi auf.”
43009037	Jesus iron, “Õ gama ĩ ulel, de ĩ anĩ urom wogõ gef.”
43009038	Age ye di, tamo iron, “Odug, aya momoi auf.” Agef fen, ĩ Jesus seli yabin.
43009039	Jesus iron, “Es fiya nigin aya tenebur ein asin, are mala ifofakeleya meleid kelẽ youf, age fe di, idi meleid kelẽ yef, are meleid ifofakalauf nigin.”
43009040	Farisia tamo tunĩ Jesus geid difaren anĩ, agef wogõ ye di, karĩ de fen, to difen, “Ere? Amãg malamã ifofakeleya de?”
43009041	Jesus iron, “Ã momoi bagai meleĩ ifofakeleyam are, ã mosor sam, anĩ ere, gama ã malamã kelẽ yef gef, anĩ nigin, ãgenei mosor fau ibodok.
43010001	“Aya momoi bagai arokeneik, tamo taka ĩ, sipsip nẽ kauwor bobog bunem to ilauf, anĩ ere, naab taka bunem gar ye isilauf are, ĩ bẽ tamo, bẽ yaledig.
43010002	Tamo ĩ bobog bunem ilef are, ĩ yogo sipsip marau.
43010003	Lo fedig tamo ĩ bobog kãf kenẽdidig, age fe di, sipsip ĩ ait karĩ dedig. Ĩ yogon sipsip yana yaleid fen, mayarẽ guri feid, irouledig.
43010004	Sain ĩ yogon ganan mayarẽ guri feid iroule fen, ĩ ketem uyu iledig, age fe di, yogon sipsip dõ difedig, ere nigin, idi yogon ait keleĩ.
43010005	Anĩ ere, idi tamo urug to dõ difedig, idi ĩ mã diyawauf, ere nigin, ĩ ait urug nigin idi keleĩ sã.”
43010006	Jesus yaab od enei nem wogõ fiyẽdin, anĩ ere, ĩ idi ereb gariya nigin irokenẽdin anĩ, idi to kelein.
43010007	Anĩ nigin, Jesus baban iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, aya sipsip neid bobog.
43010008	Ganan uyulil disin are, idi bẽ tamo, bẽ daledig, anĩ ere, sipsip idi to karĩ difiyẽdin.
43010009	Bobog are aya, taka ĩ aya bunem isiyouf are, mata kel yalouf. Ĩ namen isi fen, ulõ yeis ilauf, agef fen, fisir yõya nẽ fotou fouf.
43010010	Bẽ tamo are bẽ nigin, yukesiyouf nigin ado, narĩ fouf nigin dogol isif, aya idi mata dale fen, barikãuf nigin asin.
43010011	“Aya sipsip lo fiya tamo biya, sipsip lo fiya tamo biya, yogon mata sipsip nigin itorõdig.
43010012	Oroi tamo are ĩ sipsip marau sã. Anĩ nigin, ĩ gaũ kuĩ isi di, ile fen, sipsip itorarã iyadig. Age fe di, gaũ kuĩ sipsip kaka feid fen, firagagaũ fedidig.
43010013	Tamo are iyadig, ere nigin, ĩ oroi tamo, sipsip nigin to karĩ yedig.
43010014	“Aya sipsip lo fiya tamo biya, aya neu sipsip keleĩ, neu sipsip idi aya keleĩ,
43010015	are Dei ĩ aya keleĩ, aya Dei keleĩ gen. Anĩ nigin, aya neu mata sipsip nigin atorok.
43010016	Aya sipsip tunĩ ado, are sipsip kau enei bun temeleid sã, aya idig de guri afeid, arou asiyouf. Idig aitou karĩ douf, age fe di, idi uũ tekelei, sipsip lo fiya tamo tekelei youf.
43010017	Neu Dei, aya nigin wau laa fef nẽ gariya are, aya neu mata baban kel yalouf nigin anĩ atorok.
43010018	Taka nem neu mata to son fiyauf, anĩ ere, aya neu oroyam neu mata atorok. Aya neu mata itorõya nigin megeir ado, kel yaleya nigineg megeir ado. Od enei neu Dei bun tamal alen.”
43010019	Juda tamo od enei nigin baban fara difen.
43010020	Musei idi diron, “Ĩ kaa sane ado, agef fen, wadak. Ere nigin ĩ karĩ wiyẽgef?”
43010021	Anĩ ere, tunĩ diron, “Wogõya enei are, tamo kaa sane ado nẽ sã. Kaa sane ĩ mala ifofakeleya birikã feleya kisi feleya de?”
43010022	Sain anĩ bun, Negur bun Kel Inoya nẽ Sifa naa Jerusalem wõ yen. Are saneya sain.
43010023	Anĩ Jesus tempel modoũ bun, Solomon nẽ Waranda dõ fef iyon.
43010024	Juda tamo guru de, Jesus salili difiye ken, dirokenen, “Sain ganĩ amã lo wamã di, nene mauf? Õ Kristus ouf are, amã el wo, faded wamãf.”
43010025	Jesus aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Aya mogo arokenein, anĩ ere, ã to momoi gef. Memelik neu Dei yana nem anodif, are aya nigin irok.
43010026	Anĩ ere, ã to momoi gef, ere nigin, ã neu sipsip sã.
43010027	Neu sipsip aya aitou karĩ dedig, aya idi keleĩ, anĩ nigin, idi aya dõ difiyadig.
43010028	Aya idi mata faimud ibodkeleya afenẽdidig, age afe di, idi to bagai inanakalauf. Takam idi imaun tamal to sosoin fiyauf.
43010029	Neu Dei idi aya ifanan ĩ, ereb ereb ganan wal fiya. Takam idi neu Dei ima bun tamal son fiya kisi feleya sã.
43010030	Aya Dei ado tekelei.”
43010031	Juda tamo baban ĩ meein tulu difiyẽf nigin, meein gei difen.
43010032	Anĩ ere, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Aya Dei bun tamal, ã memelik odudug musei afelnein. Anidi atun nanĩ anĩ nigin, ã aya meein tulu wiyagau fenẽ?”
43010033	Juda tamo aiten dale diron, “Amã anidi taka nigin meein to tulu mayõf, anĩ ere, Negur kono fiya nigin, ere nigin, õ tamo maug anĩ, ‘aya Negur’ wof.”
43010034	Jesus idi aitedin yale irokenẽdin, “Ãgenei Lo bun itotoya anĩ to ibodok de, ‘Aya aron, ã waitou’?
43010035	Negur nẽ od idi bun isin are, Negur idi anĩ waitou yen. Negur nẽ Itotoya are narĩ fiya kisi feleya sã.
43010036	Age yen ouf are, Dei yogon bagai igirna fen, ein tenebur sur fiyan anĩ, aya Negur Naal aul anĩ, ere nigin aya kono afel wiyagef?
43010037	Aya ereb neu Dei age fedig anĩ, to age afef are, aya to momoi wiyagauf.
43010038	Anĩ ere, aya age afe di, ã neu od to momoi goufeg, memelik anodif anĩ momoi gouf, anĩ bunem Dei aya bun ibodok, aya Dei bun abodok ya anĩ, ã karĩg fen, keleĩ youf.”
43010039	Idi baban Jesus ka difiyẽf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, ĩ oreis iyawon.
43010040	Agef fen, Jesus ĩ, Jordan naan sitakã, uruwa bun Jon naan igunẽdin modoũ bun, kel ile, an ibodõ di,
43010041	tamo kayau musei ĩ garan disi diron, “Jon memelik taka to inon, anĩ ere, Jon tamo enei nigin wogõ yen ganan, are momoi.”
43010042	Age de fen, an musei idi Jesus nigin momoi den.
43011001	Gama tamo Lasarus dedig dagin. Ĩ Betani tamal, Maria ĩ tura Marta ado neid fonõ.
43011002	Maria de anim, kulu moul sumeĩ biya ado, Jesus bun fi fel fen, fatiyam Jesus ye waĩ fen. Ĩ main Lasarus gama dagi yenek.
43011003	Anĩ nigin, main tar Jesus garan od sur difen, “Odug, ĩ nigin waũ laa fedig are dagi.”
43011004	Jesus ĩ enei karĩ ye fen, iron, “Dagi eneim to laa ilauf, are Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin, anĩ bunem, Negur Naal yana dalesauf.”
43011005	Marta, tura ado, maineid Lasarus nigin, Jesus wau laa fen.
43011006	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ Lasarus dagi yenek ya karĩ ye fen, ĩ ibodon nẽ an baban naa uru ibodon.
43011007	Anĩ bure fele di, Jesus in dõ fiya tar irokenẽdin, “Ada Judia distrik baban keku tagauf.”
43011008	Anĩ ere, idi diron, “Rabi, õ gama bagai Juda tamo meein tulu diyõf nigin age difen, anĩ õ an kel ulau fenẽ de?”
43011009	Jesus irokenẽdin, “Gaa tekelei bun aua tuwelf to ado de? Anĩ ege aa luwan to ilalauf. Tamo ĩ gaa ado iyok, ĩ ye to tũ fedig, ere nigin, ĩ teneub enei nẽ lalan anim lo fedig.
43011010	Sain ĩ bõ iyõf are, ye tũ fouf, ere nigin, ĩ lalan sã.”
43011011	Enei irokel fen, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Neda mou Lasarus ĩ mulã yenek, anĩ ere, aya turĩ afiyẽf nigin an elef.”
43011012	In dõ fiya tar Jesus solo de dirokenen, “Odug, ĩ yenek are, ĩ fau karikauf.”
43011013	Lasarus laa fen nigin Jesus iron, anĩ ere, in dõ fiya tar kisi difen, ĩ mulã yenẽya maug bagai nigin irok den.
43011014	Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi faded feid, irokenẽdin, “Lasarus laa fen.
43011015	Ã nigin au fen, aya an to abodon anĩ nigin, aya wau al fef, ere nigin, anĩ bunem ã momoi gouf. Anĩ ere, ada ĩ gein talauf.”
43011016	Anĩ nigin, Tomas Didimus dedig, dõ fiya tar tunĩ ganan irokenẽdin, “Weim gare tauf nigin, adag talauf.”
43011017	Sain Jesus ile wõ yen are, Lasarus mogo matmat bun naa fo ilelen anĩ karĩ yen.
43011018	Betani are Jerusalem melsã, tri kilomita age fiya.
43011019	Juda tamo kayau musei, Marta Maria ado maineid laa fen anĩ, waud yo difouf nigin idi gedin disin.
43011020	Marta Jesus isif ya karĩ ye fen, Jesus fotou fouf nigin ilen, anĩ ere, Maria ĩ fõ bun ibodon.
43011021	Marta Jesus irokenen, “Odug, õ ein udobom are, mainou to laa fem.
43011022	Anĩ ere, aya keleĩ, gamag õ ereb taka nigin Negur urokenẽf are, ifonõf.”
43011023	Jesus Marta irokenen, “Nẽ main baban kel fã youf.”
43011024	Marta Jesus aiten yale iron, “Aya keleĩ, idikeleya naa kel fãya sain bun, ĩ baban kel fã youf.”
43011025	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Aya dogol kel fãya nẽ ado mata nẽ. Taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef are, ĩ mata ibodõf, laa foufeg, ĩ mata ibodõf.
43011026	Taka ĩ mata ibod ken, aya nigin momoi yef are, ĩ to bagai laa fouf. Õ enei momoi wof de?”
43011027	Marta Jesus irokenen, “Momoi, Odug, aya momoi auf, õ Kristus, Negur Naal, teneub enei bun usin.”
43011028	Ĩ agef irokel fen, ĩ kel ile, tura Maria iweigne ken, mugun irokenen. Ĩ iron, “Tise yeir, ĩ iweignok.”
43011029	Maria od enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ kaisã bagai fã yale, Jesus garan ilen.
43011030	Jesus fonõ wõya sã, ĩ fau Marta fotou fiyen modoũ anĩ bun ibodon.
43011031	Juda tamo kayau, Maria geid, fõ bun dibod ken, ĩ wau wã difenen, ĩ kaisã bagai fã yale, ulõ yeis ile di, dile fen, ĩ matmat bun inã yalouf nigin ilef de fen, dõ difiyen.
43011032	Sain Maria Jesus ibodon nẽ modoũ anĩ bun wõ ye, Jesus ile fen, ĩ ye gariyan kubũ ye fen, iron, “Odug, õ ein ubodom are, mainou to laa fem.”
43011033	Sain Maria inã yalen ado, Juda tamo kayau Maria geid disin idig inã dalen, Jesus anĩ ile fen, wau fatuk bagai gudũf morõ fen.
43011034	Jesus to fen, “Ĩ nain mũ gen?” Idi diron, “Odug, usi fen, ule.”
43011035	Jesus ĩ inã yalen.
43011036	Age fe di, Juda tamo kayau diron, “Ulegef, ĩ nigin fatuk bagai wau laa fen anĩ!”
43011037	Anĩ ere, idi tunĩ diron, “Ĩ tamo mala ifofakeleya birikã fedin, tamo eneig laa bun ileya nigin katĩ feleya to kisi feleyan de?”
43011038	Jesus baban wau fatuk bagai gudũf fen, matmat bun isin. Matmat are ku, meein nem bobog katĩ difelen.
43011039	Jesus iron, “Meein waleleg.” Marta, laa tamo nẽ main iron, “Anĩ ere, Odug, are gama waai sane, ere nigin, ĩ an naa fo ibodon.”
43011040	Age ye di, Jesus iron, “Õ momoi wof are, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ulouf, to age ayon de?”
43011041	Anĩ nigin, idi meein are dalelen. Age dife di, Jesus itad fen, iron, “Dei, õ aya karĩ wiyal nigin, õ de ayok.
43011042	Aya kelein, õ faimud aya karĩ wiyadig, anĩ ere, aya tamo kayau yeir difaref nigin od enei orom, are idi onom aya sur wiyan anĩ momoi douf nigin.”
43011043	Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ait odug nem iwegin, “Lasarus, ulõ weis!”
43011044	Laa tamo, ye, ima gabar masak nem filu difen ado, nawa gabarem sile difen ulõ yesi di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Gabar waleleg fen, utornẽge di, ile.”
43011045	Anĩ nigin, Juda tamo kayau musei Maria gein disin, Jesus ereb age fen anĩ dile fen, ĩ nigin momoi den.
43011046	Anĩ ere, idi tunĩ Farisia tamo gedin dile fen, Jesus ereb age fen anĩ dirokenẽdin.
43011047	Anĩ nigin, pris odudug Farisia tamo geid, katõ difouf nigin Juda uyu irouya neid kaunsel guru fiya diwegin. Idi diron, “Ada naig tafouf? Ere nigin, tamo enei memelik musei inodif.
43011048	Ada lo tafe di, ĩ enei eig fef ilauf are, tamo ganan ĩ nigin momoi douf, age dife di, neda ibodõya ado teneub, Rom tamom disi dalouf.”
43011049	Age de di, idi atun taka, yana Kaiafas, ĩ yar anĩ bun pris neid mudur ibod ken, wogõ yen, “Ã ereb taka keleĩ sã!
43011050	Tamo kayau ganan inanakalauf ban, tamo tekeleim tamo kayau nigin laa fouf, are ã nigin deuf anĩ, ã to kisi gef.”
43011051	Ĩ yogon kisi bunem od enei to iron, anĩ ere, ĩ yar anĩ bun pris neid mudur ibodon nigin, profet od wogõ yen, Jesus Juda tamo kayau ganan nigin laa fouf yen.
43011052	Are Juda tamo kayau nigin dogol sã, Negur gere tar firagagaũ difen anidig, guri feid irousi kuru fedi di, idi tekelei youf nigin, Jesus laa fouf yen.
43011053	Anĩ nigin, naa anĩ bunem ilen, idi Jesus dukesiyouf nigin naab dimiren.
43011054	Age dife di, Jesus ĩ, Juda tamo kayau meleid bun mala yaor to iyon, ĩ an iminkele fen, teneub akor taka, gerere tuan melsã, fonõ yana Efraim ilen, an yogon dõ fiya tar geid dibodon.
43011055	Sain anĩ Juda neid Pasa naa melsã, musei fonõ fonõ temeleid, dogo neid nonorou lilik fiya nigin, Pasa naa wõya sã mog, Jerusalem diselen.
43011056	Idi Jesus nigin meleid dinof diyon. Idi tempel modoũ bun difar fen, abob to difen, “Ã ere kisi gef? Ĩ Sifa bun to isiyouf de?”
43011057	Anĩ ere, pris odudug Farisia tamo geid, taka nem Jesus nain be ibodok ya anĩ ile fen, irokenẽdi di, dirounẽf nigin wedereid diroun.
43012001	Pasa nẽ naa wõya nigin, naa sigis fau ibod mog, Jesus Betani wõ yen, an Lasarus ibodon, ĩ Jesusem laa bun tamal turĩ fiyen.
43012002	An Jesus nigin waud el fe fen, bõ saaf dabin, anĩ Marta aruna yalen. Idi Jesus geid tebol bun dibodon atun, Lasarus ibodon.
43012003	Age de mog, Maria moul sumeĩ biya, hap lita nad nem dinon, are moni odug nẽ anĩ yale fen, Jesus ye bun fi fel fen, fatiyam ye waĩ fen. Age fe di, moul sumeĩ biyam, fõ anĩ ino yalen.
43012004	Anĩ ere, Judas Iskariot, in dõ fiya taka, fau dum im Jesus kiwai imeid bun inouf, im iron,
43012005	“Ere nigin moul sumeĩ biya enei, na nigin sur fe fen, moni anĩ maleg tamo to ifenẽdiyam? Are yar tekelei bun, kabĩ tamo nẽ mala yaledig kilei.”
43012006	Ĩ maleg tamo nigin kisif fen, enei to iron, ĩ yogo bẽ tamo nigin age yen. Ĩ moni nẽ kodol lo fiya tamo, moni nẽ kodol bun dinodig are bẽ yaledig.
43012007	Anĩ nigin, Jesus iron, “Kayau are utornẽg, ĩ aya mũ difiyauf naa nẽ nigin, moul sumeĩ biya enei irouwauf.
43012008	Maleg idi, ã geid sain faimud ubodõgouf, anĩ ere, aya, ã geid sain faimud to tabodõf.”
43012009	Age de mog, Juda tamo kayau musei, Jesus an ibodok ya kelei ken, disin, are ĩ nigin dogol sã, Lasarus Jesusem laa bun tamal turĩ fiyen ĩg dilouf nigin.
43012010	Anĩ nigin, pris odudug Lasarus ĩg dukesiyouf nigin naab dimiren,
43012011	ere nigin, Lasarus bunem, Juda tamo kayau musei Jesus garan dile fen, ĩ nigin momoi den.
43012012	Naa anĩ ile di, tamo kayau musei Sifa bun disin, Jesus Jerusalem isif ya anĩ karĩ den.
43012013	Idi pam aarau anã aarau gen anĩ guri de, Jesus tarabã difiyẽf nigin dile fen, diweig diron, “Hosiana!” “Odug yana bunem isif, ĩ el fiya ado!” “Israel neid King, ĩ el fiya ado!”
43012014	Jesus donki naal fotou fe fen, teten ibodon, are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei,
43012015	“To kumĩg, Saion nẽ tamo kayau, uleg, ãgenei king, donki naal teten ibod ken, isif.”
43012016	Uruwa bagai, in dõ fiya tar, enei ganan nigin wedereid fokõya san. Dum Negur Jesus fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽ di, enei ĩ nigin ditoton ado, enei tamo kayau ĩ bun age difen anĩ, wedereid fokõ yen.
43012017	Tamo kayau Jesus geid difar fen, ĩ Lasarus matmat bun tamal iweigne ken, laa bun tamal turĩ fe di, lo difen idim wogagã def, dile di, od iyokelen.
43012018	Tamo kayau musei, Jesus memelik anĩ inon karĩ den nigin, ĩ fotou difiyẽf nigin dilen.
43012019	Age dife di, Farisia tamo idi abob dirokenen, “Ulegef, ada kabĩ ege talegef. Lo gouf are, tamo kayau ganan ĩ dõ difiyek!”
43012020	Sifa bun Negur yana dalesauf nigin diselen idi atun, Grik tunĩ difaren.
43012021	Idi Filip Betsaida tamal Galili teneub bun, ĩ garan disi fen, to difiyẽ diron, “Tamo biya, amã Jesus mailau fenẽ.”
43012022	Age de di, Filip ile, Endru iroken ken, uruwom Jesus dirokenen.
43012023	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Negur Tamo Naal fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽf nigin, sain anĩ mogo yeir isil.
43012024	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, wit faat taka teneub bun kubũ ye fen, to burauf are, faat tekelei dogol agef ibodõf, anĩ ere, ĩ burauf are, faat musei wowã douf.
43012025	Tamo ĩ yogon mata nigin wau laa fef are, ĩ mata anĩ itornẽf, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ teneub enei bun, yogon mata atorok bagai ye fen, itorok are, ĩ irounek ile, mata ibodkeleya bun ilauf.
43012026	Taka ĩ aya arunau yalef, ĩ aya dõ fiyauf bagai. Aya abodok nẽ an, neu kabĩ tamo ĩg an ibodõf. Taka ĩ arunau yalef, neu Dei ĩ yana yalesauf.
43012027	“Gama neu wau morok, anĩ aya ere auf? ‘Dei sain enei bun usenna,’ auf de? Sã, gariya enei nigin bagai, sain enei bun asin.
43012028	Dei ogo yanã selĩ kulõ!” Age ye di, ait taka saa ilunem isin, “Aya mogo anĩ selu abin, aya baban anĩ selu abiyouf.”
43012029	Tamo kayau an difaren anĩ karĩ de fen, diron, kolimei den, tunĩ diron, engel takam wogõ fiyem.
43012030	Jesus iron, “Ait enei, ã isenneĩ di, momoi gouf nigin, aya nigin sã.
43012031	Gama Negur ĩ, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau es fedif, gama teneub enei nẽ mudur iruwauf.
43012032	Anĩ ere, aya tenebur tamal dalesnauf sain, aya tamo ganan aya bun, didĩ afediyouf.”
43012033	Jesus yogo naig fe, laa fouf anĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin, od enei wogõ yen.
43012034	Tamo kayau aiten dale diron, “Lo bun amã Kristus gai gai ibodõf ya anĩ karĩ maun, naig fe di, õ urok, ‘Tamo Naal ĩ dalesnẽf bagai’? Ai anĩ Tamo Naal?”
43012035	Age de di, Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Sain naal bagai ã lalan adouf. Ã lalan ado mog, uyõg, anĩ bunem gugum to irousi kerũ yeĩf. Tamo ĩ gugum bun iyok, ĩ naib ilef are keleĩ sã.
43012036	Ã lalan ado mog, ãgenei momoiya lalan bun unog, ago gouf, ã lalan gere tar wowã gouf.” Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ĩ itorneĩd ile, iminkelen.
43012037	Jesus idi meleid bun memelik musei inodin, anĩ ere, idi fau ĩ nigin to momoi den.
43012038	Enei are profet Asaia nẽ od kisi falauf nigin wõ yen: “Odug, aim nemã od nigin momoi yen? Aiyai bun Odug nẽ megeir yaor fen?”
43012039	Gariya enei nigin, idi momoiya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, Asaia baban od enei iron:
43012040	“Negur idi meleid ifofa ken, waud ifofakelen, anĩ bunem, idi meledim ileya kisi feleya sã, waud fokõya kisi feleya sã, waud faleiya kisi feleya sã, age fiya sam, aya el afedim.”
43012041	Asaia od enei iron, ere nigin, ĩ Jesus nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ile fen, ĩ nigin iron.
43012042	Mudur adodo idi atun, museig ĩ nigin momoi den. Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idim Juda neid uub fõ bun dirudidiya nigin kumĩ de fen, dogo neid momoiya to yaor difen.
43012043	Ere nigin, idi Negurem yeneid yaleseya ban, tamom yeneid dalesauf anĩ orodidig.
43012044	Jesus iweig iron, “Tamo ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ĩ aya nigin dogol to momoi yef, ĩ aya sur fiyan nigineg momoi yef.
43012045	Ĩ aya lo fiyaf, im aya sur fiyan anĩ ilef.
43012046	Aya lalan anĩ, tenebur ein asin, are taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ĩ gugum bun to ibodõf nigin age afen.
43012047	“Taka ĩ neu od karĩ ye fen, to dõ fef, aya ĩ to es afiyek, ere nigin, aya tamo kayau es fiya nigin to asin, aya kel gei fiya nigin asin.
43012048	Taka ĩ aya itorna fen, neu od to irouf, ĩ nigin es fiya tamo ibodok. Od de wogõ aun anim, idikeleya naa bun ĩ es fiyẽf.
43012049	Ere nigin, aya neu kisi nem to wogõ aun, anĩ ere, Dei aya sur fiyan im, ere anĩ wogõ auf, naig afe wogõ auf anĩ, toli fiya di, wogõ aun.
43012050	Aya keleĩ, yogon si fiya are mata faimud ibodkeleya bun ileya nẽ, anĩ nigin, ereb aya wogõ auf, Dei aya wogõ auf nigin irokanan kilei bagai, aya wogõ auf.”
43013001	Pasa nẽ Sifa fau wõya sã mog, Jesus kelein, ĩ teneub enei itor ken, Tama garan ileya nẽ sain mogo wõ yel. Ĩ yogon tamo tar tenebur ein dibodok anidi nigin wau laa fedig, ĩ idi nigin wau laa fen are iroule idikeleya bun.
43013002	Bõ saaf dõ mog, Satanem Judas Iskariot, Simon naal namen Jesus kiwai imeid bun ifenẽf nigin, kisi mogo ifenen.
43013003	Tama ĩ ereb ereb ganan, Jesus ima bun inon, ĩ Negur bunem isin anĩ, Negur bun kel ilef, are Jesus ĩ keleĩ.
43013004	Jesus saaf bun ibodon anĩ fã ye, yogon kolos teten inukeis fen, taul yale, luwa gu fen.
43013005	Age fel fen, ĩ naan yale, beĩ bun yu ken, yogon dõ fiya tar yeid kulo fiya gariya inon, agef fen, taul luwa gu fen anim yeid waĩ fedin.
43013006	Jesus Simon Pita garan isi di, ĩ Jesus irokenen, “Odug, õ aya yeu kulo wou fenẽ de?”
43013007	Jesus Pita aiten yale irokenen, “Ereb aya age afef, õ gama keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, fau dum õ keleĩ youf.”
43013008	Pita iron, “Aya yeu to bagai kulo wouf.” Jesus Pita irokenen, “Aya õ to kulo ayõf are, õ aya ado nigal fiya sã.”
43013009	Simon Pita Jesus irokenen, “Odug, agouf are, yeu dogol sã, imau mudurou adog kulo wouf.”
43013010	Jesus aiten yale iron, “Taka ĩ naan igukelel, ye dogol kulo fouf, bouwa ganan filiya. Ã filiya ba, anĩ ere, ã ganan sã.”
43013011	Jesus ĩ aibem kiwai ifenẽf anĩ keleĩ, anĩ nigin, ganan filiya sã yen.
43013012	Jesus yeid kulof bure fel fen, yogon kolos ifounkel, yogon modoũ bun kelen. Agef fen, ĩ idi to fedin, “Aya ereb ã bun age afel anĩ, ã wedereĩ fokõ yef de?
43013013	Ã aya ‘Tise’ ado ‘Odug’ gedig, are tutuk, ere nigin, aya de anĩ.
43013014	Aya ãgenei Tise ado Odug, ã yeĩ kulo afel, anĩ nigin, ãg abob ye kulo gouf.
43013015	Aya malakanon anokeneim, are ã nigin age afel gen, ãg ago gouf.
43013016	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ferfer takam yogon odug to wal fiyẽdig, arũ tamom ĩ sur fiyen to wal fiyẽdig.
43013017	Gama ã enei keleĩ, anĩ nigin, enei dõg ago gouf are, ã el yeĩf.
43013018	“Aya ã ganan nigin to wogõ auf. Aya agirnẽdin idi, aya keleĩ, anĩ ere, enei are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ kisi falauf nigin, ‘Taka ĩ aya urom neu bret moko, ĩ aya kiwai ifana fen, dã fiyal.’
43013019	“Anĩ fau to wõ ye mog, gama aya ã arokeneik, anĩ bunem, anĩ wõ youf sain bun, aya de Im ya anĩ momoi gouf.
43013020	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ayam sur afe di, ĩ yalef are, ĩ aya yaleyaf, taka ĩ aya yaleyaf are, ĩ aya sur fiyan anĩ yalef.”
43013021	Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ĩ wau moro ken, kurõ feis iron, “Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ãgenei takam aya kiwai ifanauf.”
43013022	Yogon dõ fiya tar idi abob loli difen, ai nigin bagai wogõ yef de fen, nene den.
43013023	Idi neid taka, dõ fiya taka Jesus ĩ nigin wau laa fedig ĩ, Jesus sirin ibodon.
43013024	Simon Pita, dõ fiya tamo enei mudurem fiye ken, ĩ iron, “Ĩ ai nigin irok anĩ to wiyẽ.”
43013025	Dõ fiya tamo anĩ, Jesus akoron mudur isen ken, to fen, “Odug, õ ai wof?”
43013026	Jesus aiten yale iron, “Tamo bret enei beĩ bun nu afe fen, afenẽf anĩ.” Age ye fen, ĩ bret nuf fen, Judas Iskariot, Simon naal ifenen
43013027	Judas bret anĩ yale di, Satan ĩ namen ilen. Jesus Judas irokenen, “Ereb agou fenẽ, kaisã bagai ago.”
43013028	Anĩ ere, saaf bun dibodon anĩ takam, ere nigin Jesus od enei Judas irokenen anĩ, kisi to fokõ yen.
43013029	Judas ĩ moni lo fiya tamo nigin, tunĩ kisi difen, Sifa nẽ ereb ereb na yalouf nigin be, maleg ereb ereb ifenẽdiya nigin be, Jesusem Judas irokenẽ di, ilef den.
43013030	Judas ĩ bret yale fen, kaisã bagai oreis ilen. Sain anĩ bõ.
43013031	Judas iya ile di, Jesus iron, “Gama Tamo Naal fula fiya medeĩya yale di, Negur fula fiya medeĩya Tamo Naal bun yalef.
43013032	Negur fula fiya medeĩya Naal bun yalef are, Negur ĩ fula fiya medeĩya Yogo bun Naal ifenẽf, fula fiya medeĩya anĩ kaisã bagai Naal ifenẽf.
43013033	“Neu kesu tar, aya ã geid sain naal bagai tabodõf. Ã aya umirnagauf. Aya Juda tamo arokenẽdin kilei, gama ã arokeneik, aya elef nẽ an, ã isiya kisi feleya sã.
43013034	“Aya ĩtãfiya mata afeneik, abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf. Aya ã nigin wau laa fedig kilei, ãg abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf bagai.
43013035	Ã abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf, anĩ bunem tamo ganan idi keleĩ youf, ã neu dõ fiya tamo tar.”
43013036	Simon Pita Jesus to fiyen, “Odug, õ nai ulef?” Jesus iron, “Aya elef nẽ an, õ gama aya dõ fiyaya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, õ fau dum dõ wouf.”
43013037	Pita to fen, “Odug, ere nigin gama aya õ dõ yõya kisi feleya sã? Aya õ nigin neu mata atorõf.”
43013038	Age ye di, Jesus iron, “Õ aya nigin ogon mata utorõf de? Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, tataro fau kokorok yeya sã mog, õ aya nigin wa wo, towo wouf!
43014001	“Ã wauĩ to morõ yeĩ. Negur nigin momoi gouf, aya nigineg momoi gouf.
43014002	Neu Dei nẽ fõ bun aab musei ado, age fiya sam are, arokeneim. Aya eselef nẽ an, ãgenei modoũ dodok afouf.
43014003	Aya esel, ãgenei modoũ dodok afel fen, aya ã geid tabodõf nigin, aya kelau gei ayeĩf, are ãg aya abodok nẽ an ubodõgouf nigin.
43014004	Aya eselef nẽ naab anĩ, ã keleĩ.”
43014005	Tomas Jesus irokenen, “Odug, õ narib ulef are, amã keleĩ sã, anĩ nigin, naig mafe fen, amã naab anĩ keleĩ youf?”
43014006	Jesus Tomas irokenen, “Aya dogol naab anĩ, aya dogol momoi anĩ, aya dogol mata anĩ. Taka ĩ naab taka bunem, Dei wagen to isiyouf, aya bunem dogol.
43014007	Ã aya keleim are, ã neu Deig keleim. Gama sain enei bun ilauf, ã ĩ keleĩ, ĩ ulegel.”
43014008	Filip iron, “Odug, Tamada ufelnamã, anĩ amã nigin deuf.”
43014009	Jesus iron, “Filip, aya ã geid sain meluk tabodon, anĩ ere, õ aya keleĩ sã de? Taka ĩ aya ileyan are Dei ilen. Naig fe di, õ urok, ‘Tamada ufelnamã’?
43014010	Aya Dei bun abodok, Dei aya bun ibodok anĩ to momoi wof de? Od aya wogõ ayeik are, aya yug bun tamal sã, are Dei aya bun ibodok ĩ kabĩ yalef.
43014011	Aya Dei bun abodok, Dei ĩ aya bun ibodok anĩ, momoi wiyagauf, sãf are, aya kabĩ aledig bun, momoi wiyagauf.
43014012	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, taka ĩ aya nigin momoi yef, ereb aya age afedig, ĩg age fouf, enei age afedig anĩ wal fiyag age fouf, ere nigin, aya Dei gein eselef.
43014013	Ã ereb taka nigin, aya yanau nem to gouf, aya age afouf, anĩ bunem, Dei ĩ Naal bun, fula fiya medeĩya yalouf.
43014014	Ereb taka nigin, aya yanau nem to wiyagauf are, aya age afouf.
43014015	“Ã aya nigin wauĩ laa fouf are, neu ĩtãfiya anĩ dõ gouf.
43014016	Aya Dei arokenẽ di, ĩ Isenneĩya taka, ã geid gai gai ibodõf nigin ifeneĩf,
43014017	are momoi nẽ Awa Uur. Tenebur ein tamo kayau ĩ to dalouf, ere nigin, idi ĩ to dilef, to keleĩ. Anĩ ere, ã ĩ keleĩ, ere nigin, ĩ ã geid ibodok, ã bun ibodõf.
43014018	Aya ã madmad gen to atorneĩf. Aya ã gein asiyouf.
43014019	Sain naal bagai ile di, tenebur ein tamo kayau, aya to dileyauf, anĩ ere, ã uleyagauf. Aya mata abodok nigin, ãg mata ubodõgouf.
43014020	Naa anĩ bun, aya neu Dei bun abodok, ã aya bun ubodõgef, aya ã bun abodok anĩ, ã keleĩ youf.
43014021	Taka ĩ neu ĩtãfiya irou dõ fef, ĩ aya nigin wau laa fedig. Ĩ aya nigin wau laa fedig anĩ, neu Dei ĩ nigin wau laa fouf, ayag ĩ nigin wau laaf fen, aya yug ĩ bun yaor afouf.”
43014022	Age ye di, Judas taka (Judas Iskariot anĩ sã) iron, “Odug, ere nigin õ ogo, amã bun dogol õ yaorõf, tenebur ein tamo kayau bun sã?”
43014023	Jesus iron, “Taka ĩ aya nigin wau laa fef, ĩ neu od dõ fouf. Neu Dei ĩ nigin wau laa fouf, anĩ amã ĩ gein masi, weim mabodõf.
43014024	Taka ĩ aya nigin to wau laa fef, ĩ neu od to dõ fouf. Od enei ã karĩ gef, are aya bun tamal sã, are Dei aya sur fiyan nẽ od.
43014025	“Aya fau ã geid tabod ken, od enei ganan wogõ ayein.
43014026	Anĩ ere, Isenneĩya, Awa Uur Fateul anĩ, Deim aya yanau nem sur fouf, Awa Uur Fateul ĩ, ereb ereb ganan ifelnei ken, aya arokenein anĩ ganan wedereĩ fokõf fen, kisi turĩ fouf.
43014027	Wau inosiya atorkeneik, neu wau inosiya afeneik, aya afeneik are, tenebur ein tamo kayau wau inosiya difeneik gen sã. Ã wauĩ to morõ yei ken, kumĩg.
43014028	“Aya eig au di, karĩ gel, ‘Aya ele fen, ã gein kelau asiyouf.’ Ã aya nigin wauĩ laa fem are, aya Dei bun elef anĩ nigin, ã kulĩya adom, ere nigin, Dei ĩ aya wal fiyaya.
43014029	Anĩ wõya sã mog, aya mogo arokeneim, anĩ bunem, agef wõ ye di, ã momoi gouf.
43014030	Aya ã geid, sain meluk to wogõ tauf, ere nigin, teneub enei nẽ mudur mogo isif. Anĩ ere, ĩ aya lai fiyaya nigin megeir sã,
43014031	anĩ ere, tenebur ein tamo kayau keleĩ bagai youf, are aya Dei nigin wau laa fef, anĩ nigin, neu Dei irokanan kilei bagai age afedig. “Fafãg fen, modoũ enei tatorõg.
43015001	“Aya aa wain bagai, neu Dei ĩ kabĩ marau.
43015002	Were aya bun biya to yuk anĩ ganan, Deim kokour falauf, were biya yuk anĩ ganan, Deim dẽ fe di, biya musei imauf.
43015003	Aya od wogõ ayein anim, ã amuyẽ sã, ã mogo filiya.
43015004	Ã aya bun ubodõgouf, ayag ã bun abodõf. Were taka aa wain luwa ado to susu falauf are, yogo biya yũya kisi feleya sã. Age fiya bagai, ãg aya bun to ubodõgouf are, biya yũya kisi feleya sã.
43015005	“Aya aa wain gariya, ã were. Taka ĩ aya bun ibodõ di, ayag ĩ bun abodõf are, ĩ biya musei imauf. Aya utornagauf are, ã ereb taka to ago gouf.
43015006	Taka ĩ aya bun to ibodõf are, ĩ were diraile di, meti ledig gen. Were age fediya are gei de fen, yã dirarã di, isasaikelediyouf.
43015007	Ã aya bun ubodõge di, neu od ã bun ibodõf are, ereb taka oroyei ken, urokanage di, ifeneĩf.
43015008	Biya musei ũg fen, neu dõ fiya tar wowã gouf are, neu Dei ĩ fula fiya medeĩya yalouf.
43015009	“Neu Dei aya nigin wau laa fedig kilei, ayag ã nigin wau laa fedig. Gama ã neu wau laa fiya anĩ bun ubodõg.
43015010	Aya neu Dei nẽ ĩtãfiya dõ afe fen, yogon wau laa fiya bun abodok kilei, ã neu ĩtãfiya dõ gouf are, neu wau laa fiya bun ubodõgouf.
43015011	Aya enei arokeneim, are neu kulĩya ã namein ibod ken, ãgenei kulĩya barikãf nigin.
43015012	Neu ĩtãfiya are yeir, aya ã nigin wau laa fedig gen, ãg abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf.
43015013	Wau laa fiya enei wau laa fiya ganan wal fiya, are yogon mou tar nigin yogon mata itorok anĩ.
43015014	Ã aya ereb ĩtãfiya arokenein anĩ dõg, ago gouf are, ã neu mou tar.
43015015	Aya baban ã to ferfer ayeĩf, ere nigin, ferfer ĩ yogon tamo odug nẽ kabĩ keleĩ sã. Anĩ ere, aya ã neu mou tar ayeim, ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan aya Dei bun karĩ aun anĩ, aya ã afelneim.
43015016	Ãgem aya to ugirnagen, aya ã agirnei ken, uleg, biya ũg fen, biya anĩ ibodkalauf nigin ã ayein. Agog fen, aya yanau nem, ereb taka nigin Dei urokenẽge di, ifeneĩf.
43015017	Enei anĩ neu ĩtãfiya, abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf.
43015018	“Tenebur tamo kiwai difeneĩf are, aya ketem kiwai difanan anĩ, ã keleĩ youf.
43015019	Ã teneub enei nẽf are, ã yogon nigin, ã nigin wau laa fouf. Anĩ ere, ã teneub enei nẽ sã, aya ã tenebur tamal gei ayei ken, agirnein. Anĩ nigin, tenebur ein ã kiwai difeneik.
43015020	Aya od arokenein anĩ, ã karĩ walagauf, ‘Ferfer taka yogon odug to wal fedig.’ Idi aya darau difanan are, ãg age de darau difeneĩf. Idi neu od dõ difen are, idi ãgeneig age de dõ difouf.
43015021	Idi enei ganan ã bun age difouf, ere nigin, aya yanau ã ado, are aya sur fiyan idi ĩ keleĩ sã nigin.
43015022	Aya to asi fen, arokenẽdim are, idi mosor sam. Anĩ ere, idi neid mosor nigin to galã dũf.
43015023	Taka ĩ aya kiwai ifanaf, ĩ neu Deig kiwai ifenek.
43015024	Taka nem to age fen anĩ, aya idi atun to age afem are, idi mosor sam. Anĩ ere, gama idi memelik dile fen, aya neu Dei ado kiwai difanaman.
43015025	Anĩ ere, enei, idi neid Lo bun ditoton yenek anĩ, kisi falauf nigin, ‘Idi aya mura sã kiwai difanan.’
43015026	“Awa Uur Isenneĩya are, ayam Dei bun tamal ã bun sur afe di, isiyouf, are momoi nẽ Awa Uur, Dei bun tamal ulõ yeis isi fen, ĩ aya nigin kurõ fesiyouf.
43015027	Ãg agog kurõ wesigouf bagai, ere nigin, ã aya geid fen, gariya bunem tasin.
43016001	“Ã to felu rogouf nigin, od enei ganan mogo ã wogõ ayeim.
43016002	Idi ã Juda neid uub fõ bun diruyeĩf. Takag, sain fau isiyouf bun, taka ĩ ã ideneĩkeis fen, kisi fouf, Negur sesewi afiyek youf.
43016003	Idi enei age difouf, ere nigin, idi Dei keleĩ sã, aya nigineg keleĩ sã.
43016004	Aya enei mogo arokeneim, are sain isiyouf bun, ã wedereĩ aroul anĩ, karĩ walagauf nigin. Aya enei tetun to arokenein, ere nigin, aya ã geiden.
43016005	“Gama aya ĩ sur fiyan gein eselef, anĩ ere, ã takam to aya to fiyaf, ‘Õ nai ulef?’
43016006	Aya enei arokeneim nigin, ã fatuk bagai wauĩ gudũ fef.
43016007	Anĩ ere, aya momoi arokeneik, aya ãgenei biya fiya nigin eselef. Aya to eselauf are, Isenneĩya anĩ ã bun to isiyouf, aya eselauf are, aya ĩ, ã bun sur afouf.
43016008	Sain ĩ isiyouf, tenebur ein tamo kayau bun, mosor nigin, Negur nẽ madur fiya nigin ado, Negur nẽ es fiya nigin, idi neid kũ fenẽya anĩ yaor fe, faded fediyouf.
43016009	Mosor are, idi aya nigin to momoi def nigin.
43016010	Negur nẽ madur fiya are, aya Dei gein esele di, ã aya to uleyagauf nigin.
43016011	Negur nẽ es fiya are, teneub enei nẽ mudur mogo es fiyen nigin.
43016012	“Aya ã irokeneĩya nigin musei biya, anĩ ere, ã gama keleĩya kisi feleya sã.
43016013	Anĩ ere, sain momoi nẽ Awa Uur isiyouf bun, momoi nẽ anĩ ganan bun, im itoneĩf. Ĩ yogon kisim to wogõ youf, ereb ĩ karĩ yef anĩ wogõ youf, agef fen, ereb fau wõ youf anĩ irokeneĩf.
43016014	Ĩ neu bun tamal yale fen, ã ifelneĩf, anĩ bunem, aya fula fiya medeĩya ifanauf.
43016015	Dei nẽ ganan are neu, anĩ nigin, aya arom, Awa Uur neu bun tamal yale fen, ã ifelneĩf aul.
43016016	“Sain naal bagai ile di, ã to uleyagauf, agef fen, baban sain naal bagai ile di, aya uleyagauf.”
43016017	In dõ fiya tar tunĩ abob dirokenen, “Ere gariya nigin eig ye irok, ‘Sain naal bagai ile di, ã to uleyagauf, agef fen, baban sain naal bagai ile di, aya uleyagauf,’ takag, ‘Ere nigin, aya Dei gein eselef nigin,’ yef?”
43016018	Idi anĩ fau fau wogõ den, “Ĩ ere ye fen, ‘sain naal bagai’ yen? Ĩ irok anĩ, amã gariya keleĩ sã.”
43016019	Idi enei nigin Jesus to difou fenẽ mog, Jesus anĩ ile fen, idi irokenẽdin, “Aya eig aul anĩ nẽ gariya nigin abob to wiyẽgef de, ‘Sain naal bagai ile di, ã to uleyagauf, agef fen, baban sain naal bagai ile di, aya uleyagauf’?
43016020	Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, ã fau maruĩ isi fen, wauĩ gudũ fouf, tenebur tamo kayau kulĩ de mog. Ã wauĩ gudũ fouf, anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ gudũ fiya falei yel kulĩ youf.
43016021	Kayau kesu ibodõ fenẽ darau fef, ere nigin, yogon naa wõ yel, anĩ ere, yogon kesu wõ ye di, darau weder tu kelef, ere nigin, kesu tenebur wõ yel nigin kulĩ yef.
43016022	Ãg age fiya, gama ãgenei wauĩ gudũ fiya nẽ naa, anĩ ere, aya baban ailiyeĩ di, ã kulĩ gouf, taka nem ãgenei kulĩya to yalelkeneĩf.
43016023	Naa anĩ bun, ereb taka nigin ã to, to wiyagauf. Aya ã momoi bagai arokeneik, aya yanau bunem, ereb taka nigin neu Dei to wiyẽgouf are, ifeneĩf.
43016024	Uruwa bunem isi gama, aya yanau nem, ereb taka nigin to, to gen. To gouf, walogouf, ago gouf, ã kulĩya barikãf.
43016025	“Aya yaab od wogõ audig, anĩ naa taka isiyouf bun, aya yaab od to wogõ auf, anĩ ere, neu Dei nigin yaor arokeneĩf.
43016026	Naa anĩ bun, aya yanau bunem to gouf. Aya ã nigin Dei to afiyẽf ya anĩ to arokeneik,
43016027	ere nigin, ã aya nigin wauĩ laaf fen, aya Negur bun tamal asin anĩ, momoi gedig nigin, Dei ã nigin wau laa fedig.
43016028	Aya Dei bun tamal ulõ aus fen, tenebur asin, gama aya teneub enei ator ken, Dei bun kelauf.”
43016029	Age ye di, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar diron, “Gama õ yaor wogõ wof, yaab od nem sã.
43016030	Gama amã mailef, õ ereb ereb ganan keleĩ, are taka nem to yõf anĩg to tari wodig. Anĩ bunem, õ Negur bun tamal usin anĩ, momoi mauf.”
43016031	Jesus aitedin yale iron, “Ã gama momoi gef de?
43016032	Anĩ ere, naa fau isif, are mogo isil, anĩ bun, ã firagagaũ yeĩ, ãgenei fonõ fonõ yeĩf. Ã aya mugu utornagauf. Anĩ ere, aya mugu sã, ere nigin, neu Dei ĩ aya ado.
43016033	“Ã aya bun wauĩ inosiya adouf nigin, od enei arokeneim. Tenebur ein ã morõ adouf, anĩ ere, totol ado ufaragauf! Aya teneub enei nẽ megeir mogo wal afen.”
43017001	Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, saa ilun itad fen, kosẽ yen: “Dei, naa mogo isil, fula fiya medeĩya õ Naal wenẽ, ago di, õ Naal õ selĩ kulõ fouf.
43017002	Are õ Naal, idi ganan õ wenen bun, mata faimud ibodkeleya ifenẽdiyouf nigin, tamo kayau ganan lo fediya nẽ megeir õ wenen.
43017003	Mata faimud ibodkeleya are yeir, õ momoi Negur tekelei ado Jesus Kristus õ sur won anĩ, idi keleĩ youf anĩ.
43017004	Kabĩ õ wanan anĩ adikelen bunem, tenebur ein aya õ bun fula fiya medeĩya arou asin.
43017005	Dei, teneub kare fiya sã mog, ada urom fula fiya medeĩya adon anĩ, õ malã bun fula fiya medeĩya anĩ gama wana.
43017006	“Aya teneub enei bun tamal õ wanan idi bun, õ yaor ayon. Idi ogon, anĩ ere, õ idi wanan, ago di, idi ogon od dõ difedig.
43017007	Gama idi keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan aya wanan are õ bun tamal.
43017008	Aya od wanan anĩ afenẽdi di, idi dalen. Aya õ bun tamal asin anĩ, idi momoi bagai kelein, idi onom aya sur wiyan anĩ momoi den.
43017009	Aya idi nigin kosẽ auf. Aya teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau nigin to kosẽ auf, anĩ ere, idi õ wanan anidi nigin kosẽ auf, ere nigin, idi ogon.
43017010	Neu ganan are ogon, ogon are neu. Idi bunem, aya fula fiya medeĩya alel.
43017011	Aya tenebur ein to abodõf, anĩ ere, idi fau tenebur dibodok, aya õ gein esef. Dei Fateul, õ yanã wanan nẽ megeir bunem, kulatun wediyouf, anĩ bunem, ada tekelei gen idig tekelei youf.
43017012	Sain aya idi geid mabodon, õ aya yanã wanan anĩ bunem, kulatun afeid el afen. Taka to fõ yelen, tamo ĩ fõ yalauf nẽ dogol fõ yelen, are Negur nẽ Itotoya kisi falauf nigin.
43017013	“Gama aya õ gein esef, neu kulĩya idi namedin barikãf nigin, tenebur ein fau abod ken, od enei arok.
43017014	Aya ogon od afenẽdi di, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau idi kiwai difenẽdin, ere nigin, gama aya teneub enei nẽ sã, age fiya gen, idig teneub enei nẽ sã.
43017015	Aya teneub enei bun tamal walelnẽdiyouf nigin to kosẽ auf, anĩ ere, wadãgen tamo sane isi fen, daũ fediya nigin, kulatun wediyouf anĩ kosẽ auf.
43017016	Aya teneub enei nẽ sã, age fiya gen, idig teneub enei nẽ sã.
43017017	Momoi bunem fateul unenẽdiyouf, ogon od are momoi.
43017018	Õ teneubur ein sur wiyan gen, ayag teneub enei bun sur afiyẽdin.
43017019	Idi nigin, aya yug adok bagai afonok, are idig momoi bagai dogo adok Negur difenẽf nigin.
43017020	“Aya neu kosẽya are idi nigin dogol sã, idi neid od bunem, aya nigin momoi douf anidi nigineg, aya kosẽ auf,
43017021	idi ganan tekelei youf nigin kosẽ auf, Dei õ aya bun ubodok, aya õ bun abodok gen, idig ada bun dibodõ di, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau, onom aya sur wiyan anĩ, momoi douf nigin.
43017022	Fula fiya medeĩya õ wanan anĩ, idi afenẽdin, are ada tekelei gen, idig tekelei youf nigin.
43017023	Aya idi bun, õ aya bun, are idi tekelei youf nigin, anĩ bunem, onom aya sur wiya fen, aya nigin waũ laa fedig gen, idi nigineg waũ laa fedig anĩ, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau keleĩ youf.
43017024	“Dei, idi õ aya wanan anidi, aya abodok nẽ an, aya geid mabodõf anĩ orouf, are idi neu fula fiya medeĩya dilouf nigin, fula fiya medeĩya anĩ teneub kare fiya sã mog, õ aya nigin waũ laaf fen, wanan anĩ.
43017025	“Dei madur bagai, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau idi õ keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, aya õ keleĩ, neu dõ fiya tar idi, onom aya sur wiyan anĩ keleĩ.
43017026	Aya õ anĩ afelnẽdi di, idi õ keleĩ, õ nigin fau fau afelnẽdif alauf, are õ aya nigin waũ laa fiya anĩ, idi bun ibodõf ado, ayag idi bun abodõf nigin.”
43018001	Jesus od enei wogõ yel fen, ĩ yogon dõ fiya tar geid, Kidron naan uus atu dilen. Kidron sitakã kabĩ taka ibodon, ĩ yogon dõ fiya tar geid, kabĩ atu dilen.
43018002	Kiwai tamo Judas ĩ modoũ anĩ keleĩ, ere nigin, sain musei Jesus in dõ fiya tar geid an guru difedig.
43018003	Anĩ nigin, Judas, kusĩ tamo tunĩ ado, tempel lo fiya tamo tunĩ pris mudur adodo Farisia tamo geid idim sur difedin anidi geif fen, kabier uyu ile di, dilen. Idi yal, lam, kusĩ nẽ waila guri de fen, dilen.
43018004	Jesus, ĩ bun wõ youf anĩ ganan kelein, ĩ iyok ile to fedin, “Ã ai umirnẽgef?”
43018005	Idi diron, “Jesus Nasaret tamal.” Jesus iron, “Aya im.” Kiwai tamo Judas, idi geid an difaren.
43018006	Sain Jesus iron, “Aya im,” ye di, idi soso de dile, tenebur kuku den.
43018007	Jesus baban idi to fedin, “Ã ai umirnẽgef?” Idi diron, “Jesus Nasaret tamal.”
43018008	Jesus iron, “Aya ã arokeneim, aya im. Aya anĩ umirnagauf are, tamo eneidi utornẽdig len, dile.”
43018009	Agef iron are, od Jesus wogõ yen anĩ kisi falauf nigin, “Aya õ wanan anidi taka to folõ afelen.”
43018010	Age dife di, Simon Pita ĩ, dimig adon anĩ ul feis yale, pris neid mudur nẽ ferfer weder biya melem salõf iran. Ferfer anĩ yana Malkus.
43018011	Age fe di, Jesus Pita irokenen, “Ogon dimig yogon modoũ bun kel uno! Dei aya naan kap ifanan anĩ, aya to ãf de?”
43018012	Age ye di, kusĩ tamo, nedi mudur, Juda neid tempel lo fiya tamo geid, Jesus dalen. Idi ĩ difo ken,
43018013	Anas garan ket dirou dilen, Anas ĩ, Kaiafas ne ten, yar anĩ bun Kaiafas ĩ pris neid mudur ibodon.
43018014	Kaiafas im, Juda tamo kayau wedereid irou fen, tamo tekeleim tamo kayau ganan nigin laa fouf, are deuf, yen.
43018015	Simon Pita, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar taka ado, Jesus dõ difen. Pris neid mudur, dõ fiya tar taka anĩ keleĩ, anĩ nigin, ĩ Jesus ado, pris neid mudur nẽ fofomalan kau namen dilen.
43018016	Anĩ ere, Pita ĩ serẽ bobogen ifaren. In dõ fiya taka ĩ pris neid mudur ĩ nigin keleĩ, ĩ baban serẽ ke len, bobog lo fiya kayau iroken ken, Pita yale irou, namen dilen.
43018017	Kabĩ kayau bobog lo fedig ĩ, Pita to fiyen, “Õg be, in dõ fiya tamo taka anĩ sã de?” Pita iron, “Aya sã.”
43018018	Menig nigin, ferfer, tempel lo fiya tamo geid, yã kũ de fen, salili de, bouweid diroron. Pita ĩg weim difar fen, bouwa iroron.
43018019	Fõ namen, pris neid mudur, Jesus ĩ, in dõ fiya tar nigin ado, yogon od tai fedin nigin to fiyen.
43018020	Jesus solof iron, “Aya tamo kayau atun, mala yaor wogõ aun. Aya sain faimud Juda neid uub fõ bun be, tempel bun, Juda tamo kayau ganan guru de mog, wogõ audig. Aya iminẽyan taka to wogõ aun.
43018021	Ere nigin anĩ aya to wiyaf? Idi aya wogõ au di, karĩ difiyan onou idi to wiyeĩd. Ereb aya wogõ aun, idi keleĩ.”
43018022	Jesus age ye irõ di, tempel lo fiya tamo taka non ifaren anim, Jesus wala fãf fen, iron, “Pris neid mudur anĩ, õ ago urokenẽdig de?”
43018023	Jesus solof irokenen, “Aya ereb kũ fenẽya arom are, õ ereb kũ fenẽya anĩ urõf. Anĩ ere, aya momoi arom are, ere nigin õ walau fã wol?”
43018024	Age ye di, Anas Jesus difon ado, pris neid mudur Kaiafas gein sur fen.
43018025	Simon Pita bouwa irorouk ifar mog, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Õg be, in dõ fiya tamo taka anĩ sã de?” Ĩ waf fen, iron, “Aya sã.”
43018026	Pris mudur nẽ ferfer taka, ĩ Pitam weder salõf iran nẽ sirag anim iron, “Aya õ ĩ urom kabier to ailiyeim de?”
43018027	Pita baban waf mog, kaisã bagai tataro kokorok yen.
43018028	Age fe di, Juda tamo, Jesus Kaiafas bun tamal dale dirou, Rom gawaman mudur nẽ fõ bun dilen. Are bonimei bagai, Juda tamo idi Pasa nẽ saaf dãf nigin, kal sese de fen, gawaman mudur nẽ fõ namen to dilen.
43018029	Anĩ nigin, Pailat idi gedin ulõ yeis isi fen, to fedin, “Ere od ã tamo enei bou bun unogouf?”
43018030	Idi solo de diron, “Ĩ lo wal fiya tamo sam are, amã õ gein to marou masim.”
43018031	Pailat idi irokenẽdin, “Ã aug ĩ waleg fen, ãgenei lo bun es wiyẽg.” Juda tamo idi Pailat dirokenen, “Amam tamo yukesiya nigin Rom gawaman to yo faman.”
43018032	Are Jesus ĩ naig be fe, laa fouf nigin wogõ yen anĩ, kisi falauf nigin agef wõ yen.
43018033	Age de di, Pailat aaben kel ile, Jesus iweigne ken, to fiyen, “Õ Juda neid king de?”
43018034	Jesus solof iron, “Õ ogon kisim od enei urok de, tunim be aya nigin õ dirokonon?”
43018035	Pailat solof iron, “Aya Juda tamo de? Õ ogon tamo kayaum pris odudug geid, aya bun dirousiyom. Õ ere taka tau agon?”
43018036	Jesus iron, “Aya neu tano teneub enei nẽ sã. Aya neu tano teneub enei nem are, neu kabĩ tamo, Juda tamom aya to daleyauf nigin kusĩ dem. Anĩ ere, neu tano teneub enei nẽ sã.”
43018037	Age ye di, Pailat Jesus irokenen, “Age fouf, õ king de?” Jesus solof iron, “Õ ogo yer urok, aya king. Enei nigin aya wõ aun, are momoi anĩ wogõ auf nigin, anĩ nigin, aya tenebur asin. Momoi nẽ ganan, aya karĩ difiyadig.”
43018038	Pailat to fen, “Ere anĩ momoi?” Age yel fen, ĩ baban Juda tamo gedin serẽ ile, idi irokenẽdin, “Aya ĩ bun mosor taka to ailef.
43018039	Anĩ ere, ãgenei tobonuneĩ eig fiya, Pasa naa bun, kalabus tamo taka aliskeneĩdig. Ã Juda neid king aliskeneĩf anĩ oroyeik de?”
43018040	Idi baban diweig, solo de diron, “Sã, ĩ sã! Barabas anĩ wanamãf!” Barabas ĩ anĩ bẽ tamal.
43019001	Age de di, Pailat Jesus yale fen, irõ di, wagĩ difiyen.
43019002	Kusĩ tamo malũ duri ado dale, teter tanak kori de fen, ĩ mudur bun kurũ difiyen. Idi gabar kadaũ dale difounne ken,
43019003	idi baba baban ĩ wagen dile fen, diron, “O Juda neid king gai gai ibodõf!” Age de fen, wala fã difen.
43019004	Pailat baban serẽ kel isi fen, Juda tamo irokenẽdin, “Ulegef, aya ĩ bun mosor taka to ailef anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin, ĩ ã gein arou asif.”
43019005	Sain Jesus malũ duri kurũ difiyen, gabar kadaũ difounnen ado, serẽ isi di, Pailat idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo are yeir!”
43019006	Pris odudug, tempel lo fiya tamo geid, ĩ dile fen, diweig diron, “Aa tetek bun ũf! Aa tetek bun ũf!” Anĩ ere, Pailat idi irokenẽdin, “Ã aug waleg, aa tetek bun ũg. Aya ĩ bun mosor taka to ailef.”
43019007	Juda tamo idi solo de diron, “Amã nemã lo ado, lo anĩ kilei ĩ laa fouf, ere nigin, ĩ yogo aya Negur Naal yedig.”
43019008	Od enei Pailat karĩ ye fen, fatuk bagai kumĩ yen.
43019009	Ĩ baban fõ aaben kel ile fen, Jesus to fiyen, “Õ nain tamal?” Anĩ ere, Jesus aiten to yalen.
43019010	Pailat Jesus irokenen, “Õ aya od to urokanauf de? Aya õ kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnõya nigin megeir ado, õ aa tetek bun inõya nigineg megeir ado anĩ, õ keleĩ sã de?”
43019011	Jesus solof iron, “Ilun tamal megeir õ to ifonom are, aya ogon megeir farumen to abodom. Anĩ nigin, tamo taka ĩ aya õ imã bun inenan, ĩ yogon mosor odug bagai, ogon wal fiya.”
43019012	Jesus Pailat age fiyẽ di, Pailat Jesus kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalisnẽf nigin, naab imiren, anĩ ere, Juda tamo idi diweig diron, “Õ tamo enei utornẽ di, ilauf are, õ Sisa nẽ mou sã. Taka ĩ yogo anĩ king yef, ĩ Sisa kiwai ifenek.”
43019013	Pailat od enei karĩ ye fen, Jesus serẽ yale irou isi fen, es fiya tamo nẽ sia, Meein Bedu dedig modoũ bun ibodon (Meein Bedu are, Hibru od nem yana Gabata).
43019014	Naa are Pasa Sifa nigin dodok fiya naa, gaa atun age fiya, naa anĩ ilele di, Pasa naa wõ youf. Pailat Juda tamo idi irokenẽdin, “Ãgenei king yeir.”
43019015	Anĩ ere, idi diweig diron, “Uru uraile! Uru uraile! Aa tetek bun ũ!” Pailat to fen, “Aya ãgenei king aa tetek bun aũf de?” Pris odudug solo de diron, “Amã king taka sã, Sisa dogol.”
43019016	Anĩ nigin, Pailat Jesus aa tetek bun dũf nigin, idi imeid bun inon. Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo Jesus dalen.
43019017	Ĩ yogon aa tetek faali fe, modoũ Mudur Tuwan (Hibru od nem Golgota dedig) iselen.
43019018	An idi Jesus aa tetek bun dun, tamo uru idig, ĩ geid aa tetek bun didenen, idi urom si sitakã, Jesus atun.
43019019	Pailat irõ di, eig de ditot fen, aa tetek bun degẽ difen: JESUS NASARET TAMAL, JUDA NEID KING.
43019020	Juda tamo kayau musei itotoya enei diwesen, ere nigin, Jesus aa tetek bun dun modoũ are taun non. Itotoya are Hibru od nem, Rom od nem, Grik od nem.
43019021	Juda neid pris odudug Pailat dirokenen, “To ‘Juda neid King’ wo utot, anĩ ere, tamo enei yogo aya Juda neid king yen, ago utot.”
43019022	Pailat aitedin yale iron, “Ereb aya atoton, are de agef ibodõf.”
43019023	Sain kusĩ tamo Jesus aa tetek bun du ken, Jesus nẽ kolos gei difeid, aiwa adodo foi difen, are teke tekelei kusĩ tamo mugu mugum gei difen, kolos meluk ilon tamal dogol foi fiya sã. Kolos are meluk tekelei tokõ feleya diwan.
43019024	Idi abob dirokenen, “Ada anĩ to serek tafouf, ada aisaĩ tara ken, aibem yalouf anĩ tailauf.” Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok anĩ kisi falauf nigin, agef wõ yen, “Neu kolos idi atun foi difeid fen, neu kolos meluk nigin aisaĩ diran.” Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo idi enei age difen.
43019025	Jesus nẽ aa tetek sirin, Jesus sina, sina nẽ tura, Maria Kolopas aiwa, Maria Magdala tamal an difaren.
43019026	Sain Jesus mala irã, sina ado in dõ fiya tamo taka ĩ nigin wau laa fedig non difar mog, ileid fen, Jesus ĩ sina irokenen, “Kayau, õ naal yeir.”
43019027	Age ye fen, Jesus yogon dõ fiya tamo irokenen, “Enei ogon sinã.” Naa anĩ bunem ilen, dõ fiya tamo enei sinawau yale, yogon fõ bun iroule, kulatun fiyen.
43019028	Anĩ dumen, Jesus keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan mogo gama bure felel, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok anĩ kisi falauf nigin, Jesus iron, “Aya naan ail fiyaf.”
43019029	Wain makik yag ado an ibodon, idi spons dale, wain bun nu dife, aa hisop were bun dino fen, dales, Jesus sigoron dinon.
43019030	Jesus wain makik anĩ yale fen, iron, “Gama bure.” Age yel fen, guyu kureis, yogon uur itoron.
43019031	Gama naa are dodok fiya nẽ, we fele di, are Sabat naa, Sabat anĩ are, uub odug. Juda tamo idi, Sabat naa bun, bouweid aa tetek bun ifareya ditorõdig, anĩ nigin, idi yeid weweur difeid, bouweid gei difalaisiyouf nigin, Pailat dirokenen.
43019032	Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo disin, tamo taka ket ye weweur difen, takag age difen, idi Jesus geid, aa tetek bun didenen anidi.
43019033	Anĩ ere, idi Jesus wagen disi fen, ĩ mogo laa fen anĩ dilen, anĩ nigin, idi ĩ ye to weweur difen.
43019034	Anĩ fotokar, kusĩ tamo takam, ot nem Jesus siri gilĩ fe di, naud naan ado fi felen.
43019035	Tamo enei ilen im wogõ yen, yogon wogõya are momoi, ĩ keleĩ, ĩ momoi wogõ yef, are ãg momoi gouf nigin wogõ yef.
43019036	Negur nẽ Itotoya enei kisi falauf nigin agef wõ yen, “Yogon tuwa taka to were fouf,”
43019037	agef fen, Negur nẽ Itotoya takag irok, “Idi siri gilĩ difen tamo ĩ, idim dilouf.”
43019038	Anĩ dum, Josef Arimatea tamal, Jesus bouwa buru yalouf nigin Pailat irokenen. Josef ĩ, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tamo taka, anĩ ere, ĩ Juda tamo nigin kumĩ ye fen, iminẽyan Jesus dõ fen. Pailat yo ye di, ĩ isi, Jesus bouwa yalen.
43019039	Josef ĩ Nikodemus ado fen, disin, kulu tamo anim, bõ Jesus gein ilen. Nikodemus ĩ, marasin yana mer (myrrh) aloi (aloe) ado falei difen anĩ iroulen, anĩ nẽ morõ teti kilogram age fiya.
43019040	Idi urom Jesus bouwa dale, marasin ado gabar lalau nem filu difen. Juda neid tamo mũ fiya tobonunã bunem age difen.
43019041	Jesus aa tetek bun dun nẽ modoũ an, kabĩ taka ado, kabier an, ku mata taka ado, taka an to goro difen.
43019042	Naa are Juda neid dodok fiya nẽ naa nigin ado, tokõ kug melsã nigin, idi Jesus an goro difen.
43020001	Uub nẽ naa matu Sande bun, bonimei bagai gugum ado, Maria Magdala tamal matmat bun ile fen, mala irã, bobog bun meein yaleleya ilen.
43020002	Anĩ kayau, Simon Pita, dõ fiya taka Jesus ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anidi gedin gudu ref ile, irokenẽdin, “Idi Odug matmat bun tamal dale diroulen, ĩ nain be dinon, ada keleĩ sã!”
43020003	Anĩ nigin, Pita, dõ fiya tamo taka ado, matmat bun dilen.
43020004	Urom gududu den, anĩ ere, dõ fiya tamo takam Pita wal fe, ĩ ket matmat bun wõ yen.
43020005	Ĩ iti ken, fai yen, gabar lalau filu difen anĩ an yen mog, ilen, anĩ ere, ĩ kuren to ilen.
43020006	Age fe di, Simon Pita dum dõ fiyen, wõ ye fen, tokõ fel, matmat kuren ile, gabar lalau filu difen an yen mog, ilen,
43020007	mũ difen gabar Jesus mudur sile difen anĩg ilen. Mudur sile difen gabar are, yogo fire kori fel, gabar lalau filu difen anĩ firen ibodon.
43020008	Age fe di, dõ fiya tamo taka, ĩ ket matmat bun wõ yen ĩg, kuren ilen. Ĩ ile fen, momoi yen.
43020009	(Jesus laa bun tamal kel fã youf ya, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ, idi fau wedereid fokõya sã.)
43020010	Age de fen, dõ fiya tar, nedi fõ bun ke de dilen.
43020011	Anĩ ere, Maria matmat serẽ inã yalef ifaren. Ĩ inã ado inã ado iti ken, matmat namen fai yen.
43020012	Agef fen, ĩ, engel uru kolos lalau adodo, Jesus yenen modoũ bun dibod mog, iledin, taka muduren, taka yen.
43020013	Idi ĩ to difiyen, “Kayau, õ ere nigin inã walef?” Maria iron, “Idi neu Odug dale diroulen, ĩ nain be dinon anĩ, aya keleĩ sã.”
43020014	Age ye fen, ĩ falei yel, Jesus an ifar mog ilen, anĩ ere, are Jesusem ya anĩ to kelein.
43020015	Jesus iron, “Kayau, õ ere nigin inã walef? Õ ai anĩ umirnek?” Maria kisi fen, ĩ kabĩ lo fedig anim ye fen, irokenen, “Tamo biya, onom ĩ wale uroulen ouf are, nain be unon anĩ, aya urokana di, aya ĩ alouf.”
43020016	Jesus ĩ irokenen, “Maria.” Maria ĩ falei yel, Jesus wage ifen ken, Hibru od nem irokenen, “Raboni!” (anĩ nẽ gariya, Tise).
43020017	Jesus iron, “Aya to urouna, ere nigin, aya Dei gein fau kel iseleya sã. Anĩ ere, neu turau tar gedin ule urokeneĩd, ‘Aya neu Dei, ãgenei Temeĩ, neu Negur, ãgenei Negur bun kelau eselauf.’”
43020018	Anĩ nigin, Maria Magdala tamal, in dõ fiya tar gedin ile irokenẽdin, “Aya Odug ailel!” Age ye fen, Maria Jesus od enei irokenen anĩ, idi wogõ fiyẽdin.
43020019	Uub nẽ naa matu Sande aragau anĩ bun, Jesus nẽ dõ fiya tar, Juda tamo nigin kumĩ de fen, sukar kotũ difel, aaben guru de dibod mog, Jesus isi, idi atun ifar fen, iron, “Wau inosiya ã ado ibodõf!”
43020020	Od enĩ irokel fen, ĩ ima siri ado idi ifelnẽdin. In dõ fiya tar idi, Odug dile fen, fatuk bagai kulĩ den.
43020021	Jesus baban iron, “Wau inosiya ã ado ibodõf! Dei aya sur fiyan gen, ayag ã sur ayeik.”
43020022	Age ye fen, idi bun fuu fiyeĩd fen, iron, “Awa Uur Fateul waleg.
43020023	Ã, tamo neid mosor nigin, wedereĩ tu kalauf are, idi neid mosor nigin weder tu kelef, ã idi neid mosor nigin, wedereĩ to tu kalauf are, idi neid mosor nigin weder to tu kelef.”
43020024	Anĩ ere, Jesus in dõ fiya tar meleid bun wõ yen sain, tuwelf idi neid taka Tomas (yana taka Didimus), idi geid to ibodon.
43020025	Anĩ nigin, dõ fiya tar tunim ĩ dirokenen, “Amã Odug mailen!” Anĩ ere, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Aya yogon ima bun tuti ba to ailauf, aya imau gege tuti ba bun to ano fen, aya imau siri bun to anouf, aya to momoi auf.”
43020026	Uub tekelei ilele di, in dõ fiya tar baban fõ bun dibodon, are Tomas geid. Sukar kotũ difedin, anĩ ere, Jesus isi, idi atun ifar fen, iron, “Wau inosiya ã ado ibodõf!”
43020027	Agef fen, Jesus Tomas irokenen, “Ogon imã gege ein uno, neu imau uleid. Imã urã siru bun uno. Waũ to ilef isif fouf, momoi dogol wo.”
43020028	Tomas Jesus irokenen, “Neu Odug, neu Negur!”
43020029	Age ye di, Jesus Tomas irokenen, “Õ malam aya uleyaf nigin, momoi wof. Idi meledim to dile fen, momoi def, are el fedif.”
43020030	Jesus, in dõ fiya tar meleid bun, memelik musei inodin, are buk enei bun itotoya san.
43020031	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ Kristus, Negur Naal anĩ ã momoi ge fen, ĩ yana nigin momoiya bunem, ã mata walogouf nigin enei itoton.
43021001	Anĩ dum, Jesus baban in dõ fiya tar gedin, Taiberias daliyoun wõ yen. Anĩ eig fe wõ yen.
43021002	Simon Pita, Tomas (yana taka Didimus), Nataniel Kana tamal Galili teneub bun, Sebedi gere tar ado, dõ fiya tar uru anidim guru de dibodon.
43021003	Simon Pita idi irokenẽdin, “Aya gau nigin ayõ fenẽ.” Idi diron, “Amãg õ geid talauf.” Anĩ idi dile, waag bun sosõ den, anĩ ere, bõ anĩ bun, gau taka to dalen.
43021004	Bonimei bagai, Jesus maaĩ yerin ifaren, anĩ ere, dõ fiya tar idi, Jesusem ya anĩ to kelein.
43021005	Ĩ idi iweig irokenẽdin, “Mou tar, ã gau taka tau walegel?” Idi aiten dalen, “Sã.”
43021006	Ĩ irokenẽdin, “Waag siri biya melem kakãg urãg fen, tunĩ gei gouf.” Idi age difen sain, idi kakãg dĩ fiya kisi feleya san, ere nigin, gau musei biya.
43021007	Anĩ in dõ fiya tamo Jesus ĩ nigin wau laa fedig ĩ, Pita irokenen, “Are Odugem!” Ĩ, “Are Odugem,” ye di, Simon Pita karĩ ye fen, ĩ kolos teten tamal inũ inon anĩ yale, luwa guf fen, naanũ ifũ iran.
43021008	In dõ fiya tar tunĩ ganan, waag bun disi, kakãg gau isokosen ado dĩ de dilen, ere nigin, are idi daliyou yeri gerõ sã, handred mita age fiya.
43021009	Sain idi kutũ desin, yã kaureya anĩ bun, gau yã bẽ bret tunĩ ado dilen.
43021010	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Ã gau gama bagai walegel tunĩ urousig.”
43021011	Simon Pita waag sõ ye fen, kakãg dĩ falaisi, maaĩ yerin irousin. Kakãg are gau odudug isokosen, gau are 153, gai musei biya, anĩ ere, kakãg to kokour fen.
43021012	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Usig, saaf wõg.” In dõ fiya tar kukĩ de fen, takam ĩ to, to fiyen, “Õ aim?” Idi keleĩ, are Odug yogo.
43021013	Jesus isi, bret yale fen, idi ifenẽdin, gaug de age fen.
43021014	Jesus laa bun tamal kel fã ye fen, in dõ fiya tar meleid bun wõ yen are, gama eneim towo fen.
43021015	Sain idi saaf dakas fen, Jesus Simon Pita irokenen, “Simon Jon naal, õ aya nigin fatuk waũ laa fef, tunĩ eneidi neid wal fiya de?” Pita iron, “Odug, momoi, õ keleĩ, aya õ nigin wau laa fef.” Jesus iron, “Neu sipsip momou ufoutneĩd.”
43021016	Baban Jesus iron, “Simon Jon naal, õ aya nigin waũ laa fef de?” Pita solof iron, “Odug, momoi, õ keleĩ, aya õ nigin wau laa fef.” Jesus iron, “Neu sipsip kulatun wiyẽdiyouf.”
43021017	Jesus Pita iroken towo fe fen, iron, “Simon Jon naal, õ aya nigin waũ laa fef de?” Pita wau moron, ere nigin, Jesus ĩ to fiyẽ towo fen, “Õ aya nigin waũ laa fef de?” Pita iron, “Odug, ereb ereb ganan õ keleĩ, õ keleĩ, aya õ nigin wau laa fef.” Jesus iron, “Neu sipsip ufoutneĩd.
43021018	Aya õ momoi bagai arokonok, sain õ gaun, õ naki rel, ogon oroya dõ fen uledig, anĩ ere, sain õ tubau bun, imã walese di, taka nem ifõyo ken, õ to oroyok nẽ an irouleyõf.”
43021019	Pita naig be fe, laaf fen, Negur fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽf anĩ nigin, Jesus od enei iron. Age ye fen, Jesus Pita irokenen, “Aya dõ wiya!”
43021020	Pita falei yel fen, dõ fiya taka Jesus ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ, dõ feid mog, ilen. (Tamo enei bõ saaf yõya bun, Jesus akoron mudur isen ken, iron, “Odug, aim anĩ õ kiwai ifonõf?”)
43021021	Sain Pita tamo anĩ ile fen, Jesus to fiyen, “Odug, tamo enei ĩ naig fouf?”
43021022	Jesus solof irokenen, “Tamo enei mata ibod mog, aya kelauf anĩ aya orouf aufeg, õ nigin ere yok? Õ de aya dõ wiyauf.”
43021023	Enei nigin, dõ fiya tar idi atun, od enei iyokelen, are dõ fiya tamo enei to laa fouf den. Anĩ ere, Jesus, tamo anĩ to laa fouf ya nigin to iron, Jesus ĩ eig ye iron, “Tamo enei mata ibod mog, aya kelauf anĩ aya orouf aufeg, õ nigin ere yok?”
43021024	In dõ fiya tamo enei, anĩ ganan wogõ ye fen, itoton. Amã keleĩ, in od are momoi.
43021025	Jesus ĩ ereb ereb museig age fen. Aya kisi afef, anĩ ganan buk bun ditotlem are, teneub ganan bun modoũ sam.
44001001	Teofilus, uruwa buk aya atoton anĩ bun, Jesus gariya ino, ereb ereb age fen ado ifelnẽdif ile,
44001002	aposel ĩ igirnẽdin anidi Awa Uur Fateul bunem faded fiye keleid fen, Jesus saa ilun iselen nẽ naa bun, aya anĩ ganan nigin atoton.
44001003	Ĩ darau yale fen, laa fen, mata kel fã ye fen, tamo eneidi meleid bun wõ yen, agef fen, idi ĩ mata ibodok ya anĩ momoi douf nigin, ereb ereb musei age fen. Naa foti anĩ namen, ĩ idi meleid bun wõ ye fen, Negur tano nigin wogõ fiyẽdin.
44001004	Jesus idi geid saaf doko dibod ken, ĩ idi eig ye fadim yukenẽdin, “Ã Jerusalem to utorõgouf, anĩ ere, ereb aya wogõ au di, karĩ gen, are neu Dei ereb sur afouf yen anĩ tari gouf.
44001005	Are Jon ĩ naan nem dogol igunein, anĩ ere, naa tunĩ ilele di, ã Awa Uur Fateulem naan iguneĩf.”
44001006	Anĩ nigin, sain idi takai guru de dibod ken, idi ĩ to difiyen, “Odug, õ sain enei bun, Israel neid tano baban unouf de?”
44001007	Jesus idi irokenẽdin, “Are Dei ĩ yogon megeir bunem, sain nanĩ be naa inon ibodok anĩ, ã to keleĩ youf.
44001008	Anĩ ere, ã fau sain Awa Uur Fateul ã bun isiyouf are, megeir walogouf, agog fen, ã aya age afen anĩ nigin wogõg fen, Jerusalem bun, Judia distrik ado Samaria distrik ganan bun ile, teneub idikeleya buneg, aya nigin wogõ gouf.”
44001009	Ĩ enei irokel fen, idi meleid bun bagai, ĩ yale irou iselen, ĩ lalo bun iminkele di, to dilen.
44001010	Jesus isele di, idi saa ilun ditad se, lo difef den mog, kaisã bagai tamo uru kolos lalau adodo, idi siridin difaren.
44001011	Idi diron, “Galili tamo ã, ere nigin ein ufareg utadseg fen, saa ilun lo gef? Jesus enei ã bun tamal yale irou, saa ilun iselel, ã ĩ saa ilun isel mog, ulegel kilei bagai, agef ĩ kel isiyouf.”
44001012	Age de fen, idi Moul Arei dedig bun tamal, Jerusalem keku de dilen, Moul Areinem Jerusalem ileya are wan kilomita age fiya, anĩ nigin, Sabat naa bun iyõya kisi feleya.
44001013	Sain idi Jerusalem wõ de fen, idi aab ilun dibodõdig nẽ an diselen, idi eneidim, Pita, Jon, Jems, Endru, Filip, Tomas, Batolomyu, Matyu, Jems Alfeus naal, Simon Selot taka, Judas Jems naal.
44001014	Idi ganan guru de, waud tekelei dino fen, toku kosẽ dedig, kayau tunĩ geid, Maria Jesus sina, Jesus tura tar geid.
44001015	Sain anĩ bun, Pita, momoiya tamo kayau handred tuwenti age fiya idi atun, ifar fen, iron,
44001016	“Turau tar, kulu Awa Uur Fateulem Dawid sigoron, Judas ĩ tamo uyu iroukenẽdi di, Jesus dalen ĩ nigin wogõ yen anĩ, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, are de agef kisi felen.
44001017	Ĩ amã nemã taka, ĩ amã weim kabĩ enei malen.”
44001018	(Judas yogon sane bunem moni yale fen, teneub taka na yalen, an ĩ kubũ ye mudur iten ken, yogon bouwa faraf fen, te galelei adok ulõ yesin.
44001019	Age fe di, tamo kayau Jerusalem dibodon anĩ ganan, od anĩ karĩ den, anĩ nigin, teneub anĩ, dogo neid od nem yana dũ Akeldama den, anĩ nẽ gariya, Naud Teneub.)
44001020	Pita wogõ tobol fe, irokeneg iron, “Buk Sam bun eig ye itoton, “‘Yogon modoũ are fonou inouf, an taka nem to ibodõf,’ takag, “‘Taka nem ĩ fotokar yogon kabĩ yalouf.’
44001021	Anĩ nigin, Odug Jesus ada atun kabĩ yale ilef isif mog,
44001022	Jon naan igunẽdin sain bunem ile, Jesus ada bun tamal, yale irou iselen sain bun, sain ganan ada weim tabodon anidi taka tagirnẽf. Are idi eneidi atun, takam Jesus mata kel fãya nigin, ada geid od wogõ tauf.”
44001023	Anĩ nigin, idi tamo uru dinenẽdin, Josef Basabas dedig (yana taka Jastus), taka Matias.
44001024	Age de fen, idi kosẽ de fen, diron, “Odug, tamo ganan neid waud õ keleĩ, uru eneidi bun, õ aib ugirin anĩ ufelnamã,
44001025	are Judas ĩ itor ken, yogon modoũ bun ilen anĩ, ĩ fotokar aposel kabĩ yalouf nigin.”
44001026	Age de fen, idi aisaĩ dira ken, aisaĩ Matias wagen kubũ yen, anĩ bunem, Matias ĩ aposel ilewen baguf weimen.
44002001	Sain Pentikos naa isi di, idi ganan modoũ tekelei bun, guru de dibodon.
44002002	Idi an dibod mog, kaisã bagai, ait yau totol ado gugu redig gen, saa ilun tamal isi fen, fõ aab ino yalen.
44002003	Idi ereb yã bale gen isi di, dile mog, fara furu feid, idi mugu mugu tetedin ibodon.
44002004	Age fe di, idi ganan Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyẽdi di, gariya dino, od fire fire bunem wogõ den, Awa Uurem fiyẽdi di, age difen.
44002005	Sain anĩ bun, Juda tamo Negur nigin momoi den idi, teneub ganan bun temeleid disi, Jerusalem dibodon.
44002006	Sain idi ait anĩ karĩ de fen, tamo kayau musei idi nene de fen, guru difen, ere nigin, idi mugu mugu dogo neid od bun wogõ den anĩ karĩ den.
44002007	Idi fatuk bagai terẽ de fen, diron, “Tamo od wogõ def eneidi ganan, Galili temeleid sã de?
44002008	Naig fe di, ada mugu mugu, idi neda od bunem wogõ de di, karĩ tauf?
44002009	Ada fire firen temelada, Patia, Media, Elam kantri, Mesopotamia, Judia distrik, Kapadosia, Pontus, Asia provins,
44002010	Frigia, Pamfilia distrik, Isip kantri ado Libia distrik tunĩ Sairini taun non. Amã tunĩ Rom kantri temelamã, Juda temeleid ado haiden Juda neid momoiya bun falei maun,
44002011	Krit nuyo ado Arabia distrik. Ada mugu mugu neda od bun, Negur kabĩ odug age fen anĩ wogõ de di, karĩ tauf.”
44002012	Idi terẽ de nene de fen, abob toti difen, “Eĩ ere gariya nigin?”
44002013	Anĩ ere, tunĩ idi weli difiyeĩd diron, “Idi wain fatuk domõ.”
44002014	Pita aposel ilewen geid difar fen, ait odugem tamo kayau wogõ fiyẽdin, “Juda tamo kayau ado ã ganan Jerusalem ubodõgef, utorõg len, aya ã enei faded ayeĩf, kee releg fen, aya wogõ auf anĩ karĩg.
44002015	Ã kisi gef, tamo eneidi wain domõ gef, age fiya sã, gama eĩ nain kilok bonimei!
44002016	Anĩ ere, eĩ are Profet Joel eig ye wogõ yen:
44002017	“‘Negur irok, idikeleya naa bun, aya neu Awa Uur, tamo kayau ganan bun gõ afalauf. Age afe di, ãgenei kesu, kayau momoul ado, profet od wogõ douf, ãgenei tamo gaũ meleid bun seleulã kurã fouf, ãgenei tamo tubau dimĩdiyouf.
44002018	Neu ferfer tamo ado kayau geid buneg, aya neu Awa Uur naa anĩ bun gõ afalaisi di, idi profet od wogõ douf.
44002019	Aya saa ilun, memelik fire fire afelnẽdiyouf, tenebur ein uris anodiyouf. Naud, yã ado, kaau tubutubuya wõ youf.
44002020	Odug nẽ Naa odug fula fiya medeĩya ado, fau to isi mog, gaa gugum kele fen, ogõ naud gen wõ youf.
44002021	Age fe di, aib taka ĩ, Odug yana yale iweignẽf are, Odug ĩ kel yalouf.’
44002022	“Israel tamo kayau, od enei karĩg, ã aug keleĩ, Negur ã atun, Jesus Nasaret tamal bunem memelik, ereb urug bagai ado, uris inodin, anĩ bunem Jesus ĩ Negurem sur fiyen anĩ, Negur ã ifelnein.
44002023	Tamo enei nigin, Negurem ereb ereb wõya sã mog, yogon keleĩ ado kisi bunem, ĩ ã imeĩ bun inon, age fe di, ã tamo sesenem disenneĩ di, ĩ laa fouf nigin, aa tetek bun tuti nem ũgen.
44002024	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal turĩ fe di, mata kel fã yen, laa nẽ darau bun tamal yalelnen, ere nigin, laa anim ĩ irounẽya kisi feleya sã.
44002025	Are Dawid ĩ nigin iron: “‘Odug sain faimud malau bun ifar mog, ailedig. Ĩ aya imau biyalem ibodok nigin, aya to kumĩ au fen, terẽ auf.
44002026	Anĩ nigin, neu wau seref fen, sigorou seli abidig, aya, ereb Negur aya bun biya age fouf anĩ tari afedig,
44002027	ere nigin, õ neu malaukanon to utornẽ di, bouwau laa neid modoũ bun ibodõf, õ ogon Fateuleg to utorõ di, bura lauf.
44002028	Õ mata bun ileya nẽ naab ufelna fen, õ malã bun kulĩya barikã wiyauf.’
44002029	“Turau tar, aya ã yaor arokeneik, tubuda Dawid ĩ laa fe di, mũ difen. Yogon matmat, ada atun naa enei bun fau ibodok.
44002030	Anĩ ere, ĩ profet taka, anĩ nigin, ĩ keleĩ, Negur wau kuturol fen, Dawid yogon ibor nẽ tubu tar bun tamal taka, yogon king nẽ sia bun inenẽf nigin irokenen.
44002031	Dawid ĩ ereb fau wõya sã mog, anĩ tetunem ile fen, Kristus mata kel fã youf nigin eig ye wogõ yen, ‘Ĩ laa neid modoũ bun to ibodõf, ĩ bouwag to bura lauf,’ yen.
44002032	Negur Jesus enei turĩ fe di, ĩ mata kel fã yen anĩ, amã ganan mailen.
44002033	Negur ĩ ima biyalem yalesnẽ di, Jesus ĩ, Tama bun Awa Uur Fateul Negur afeneĩf yen anĩ yale fen, fi felen, are ã gama ulegef ado karĩ gef anĩ.
44002034	Dawid saa ilun to iselen, anĩ ere, ĩ iron, “‘Negur neu Odug irokenen: “Imau biya melem ubod mog,
44002035	ogon kiwai tar ogon ye inoya nẽ sawa anodiyouf.” ’
44002036	“Anĩ nigin, Israel tamo kayau ganan enei keleĩ bagai youf, Jesus enei ã aa tetek bun ukesigen anĩ, Negur yogo, Odug ado Kristus inenen.”
44002037	Tamo kayau od enei karĩ de fen, idi waud gudũ fe di, Pita aposel tunĩ ganan geid dirokenẽdin, “Turamã tar, amã naig mafouf?”
44002038	Pita solof irokenẽdin, “Ã mugu mugu wauĩ falei wog fen, Jesus yana bunem naan iguneĩ di, ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kalauf, ago ge di, ege luwa are Awa Uur Fateul walogouf.
44002039	Promis od are ãgenei, ãgenei kesu tar ado, idi gerõ difaref ani ganan neid, are Odug neda Negur iweignẽdiyouf anĩ ganan neid.”
44002040	Age ye fen, Pita od musei bun, idi wedereid irou fen, totol irokenẽdin, “Ã aug isenneĩf nigin, tamo kayau sane sain enei bun tamal urab uraileg.”
44002041	Yogon od dalen idi naan igunẽdin, age dife di, naa anĩ bun, tri tausen tamo kayau age fiya, idi neid bun tobol difen.
44002042	Idi aposel neid ifelnẽdiya, uyu kũ fiya, saaf weim yõya, kosẽya bun, idi neid kisi adok dino fen, age difen.
44002043	Tamo kayau ganan terẽ de inid ifitin. Age dife di, aposel idi, uris ado memelik musei dinon.
44002044	Momoiya tamo kayau ganan weim dibod ken, safineid ganan gadõ difedig.
44002045	Safineid na nigin sur difeid fen, taka ĩ lau fef anĩ difenẽdig.
44002046	Naa ganan idi toku waud tekelei fen, tempel modoũ bun guru difedig. Idi dogo neid fõ fõ bun, kulĩya ado waud adok an yen ken, weim saaf dõdig.
44002047	Idi Negur yana dalesedig, tamo kayau ganan, idi nigin biya difiyẽdidig, age dife di, Odug naa ganan bun, tamo kayau kel gei feid fen, idi neid bun tobol fedig.
44003001	Naa taka bun, Pita Jon ado, tri kilok aragau kosẽya sain nigin, tempel bun diselen.
44003002	Tamo taka sina namen ye ilolaisin gõ fen, tempel bobog yana ‘Meli Bagai’ dedig an faali de diroulen, an naa ganan bun dinenẽ di, ibod ken, tempel bun dilef anidi moni nigin nonĩ fiyẽdidig.
