44003003	Sain Pita Jon ado, tempel namen dilau fenẽ age dife di, ileid fen, moni nigin irokenẽdin.
44003004	Anĩ ere, Pita Jon ado, ĩ lo difel fen, Pita iron, “Amã lo wamã!”
44003005	Age ye di, ĩ ereb difanauf ye fen, lo feidlen.
44003006	Age fe di, Pita iron, “Silwa be gol are aya sã, anĩ ere, ereb aya ado anĩ, õ afonok, are Jesus Kristus Nasaret tamal yana bunem uyõ.”
44003007	Age ye fen, Pita tamo ima biyalẽ yale iroune ken, isennẽ yalesnen, kaisã bagai tamo nẽ ye guyu totoledin.
44003008	Ĩ gurusã ye ifar fen, iyõya gariya inon. Agef fen, ĩ weim tempel namen dilen, iyõ, gurusã ye fen, Negur yana yalesen.
44003009	Tamo kayau ganan ĩ iyo ken, Negur yana yalese di, dile fen,
44003010	idi, im bagai tempel bobog yana ‘Meli Bagai’ dedig bun ibod ken, nonĩ yedig den. Idi ĩ bun ereb wõ yen anĩ nigin, fatuk bagai terẽ de fen, inid ifitin.
44003011	Solomon nẽ Waranda dedig an, nonĩya tamo anĩ, Pita Jon ado irounẽdi di, tamo kayau ganan terẽ de fen, gududu de, idi gedin disin.
44003012	Pita anĩ ile fen, idi irokenẽdin, “Israel tamo, ere nigin eneim ã terẽ yeik de? Ere nigin nemã megeir bunem be, nemã Negur aniniya bunem, tamo enei el mafiyen gen amã lo wamãglef?
44003013	Abraham, Isak, Jakop idi neid Negur, tubuda tar neid Negur im, yogon kabĩ tamo Jesus fula fiya medeĩya ifenen. Ã ĩ dukesiyouf nigin wenẽdig fen, Pailat ĩ itornẽ di, ilauf nigin kisi ino mog, ã Pailat mala bun ĩ nigin wa gen.
44003014	Ã, ĩ Fateul Madur tamo anĩ wag fen, tamo yukesiya tamo anĩ yaliskeneĩf nigin urokenẽgen.
44003015	Ã mata nẽ gariya anĩ ukesigen, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal yalesnen. Amã enei mailen nigin wogõ mauf.
44003016	Jesus yana nigin momoiya bunem, Jesus yana anim, tamo enei ã kelei ken, ulegedig anĩ totol ifenem. Momoiya ĩ bunem isif anim, tamo enei ã ganan log mog, el fiye kelel.
44003017	“Turau tar, aya keleĩ, ã ãgenei uyu irouya geid, keleĩ sã nigin ago gen.
44003018	Anĩ ere, enei wõya sã mog, Negur profet ganan bun wogõ yen, are yogon Kristus darau yalouf bagai, anĩ Negurem agef kisi felen.
44003019	Anĩ nigin, wauĩ falei ge fen, Negur bun uleg, anĩ bunem ãgenei mosor isasalauf. Ago gouf, wauĩ mata wõya nẽ sain Odug bunem isi fen,
44003020	Negur, Kristus ã nigin igirin, are Jesus sur fouf.
44003021	Jesus fau de saa ilun ibod mog, Negur ereb ereb ganan mata inouf nẽ sain wõ youf, kulu yogon profet fateul sigoreid bun Negur wogõ yen kilei.
44003022	Moses iron, ‘Odug ãgenei Negur, profet taka aya gen, tamo kayau ã atun wõ ye keneĩf. Ã ereb irokeneĩf ganan, karĩ gouf bagai.
44003023	Taka nem profet anĩ to karĩ fiyẽf, ĩ tamo kayau atun gai gai gudũf irailauf.’
44003024	“Age fiya gen, profet ganan Samuel bun gariya ino fen, isin idig, gama naa eneidi bun ereb wowã yef isin anĩ nigin wogõ den.
44003025	Ã profet neid gere tar, Negur ãgenei tubuĩ tar geid bar itenẽya inon, ã bar itenẽya anĩ nẽ gere tar. Negur Abraham irokenen, ‘Ogon ibor bunem, tamo kayau teneub ganan bun el fediyouf.’
44003026	Negur yogon kabĩ tamo yalesne ken, ãgenei sane bun tamal, ã mugu mugu ganan falei ge di, el yeĩf nigin, ã bun ket Jesus sur fen.”
44004001	Pita Jon ado, tamo kayau od dirokeneĩd mog, pris tunĩ, tempel lo fiya tamo neid mudur, Sadusia tamo tunĩ geid, idi gedin disin.
44004002	Idi fatuk bagai waud moron, ere nigin, aposel idi tamo kayau difelneĩd fen, Jesus laa bun tamal mata kel fã yen anĩ wogõ den.
44004003	Idi Pita Jon ado dirouneĩd fen, aragau nigin idi kalabus bun dinenẽdi di, ile we felen.
44004004	Anĩ ere, od karĩ den idi musei momoi den, momoiya tamo faif tausen age fiya wõ den.
44004005	Naa taka di, nedi uyu irouya, mudur adodo, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid, Jerusalem guru difen.
44004006	Pris neid mudur Anas an ibodon, Kaiafas, Jon, Aleksanda, pris mudur neid ibor tunĩ ganan idig an dibodon.
44004007	Idi Pita Jon ado guri de dirousi, atũ difeid fen, to difedin, “Ere megeir bunem be, ere yana bunem enei ago gen?”
44004008	Age de di, Pita Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyen ĩ, idi irokenẽdin, “Tamo kayau neid uyu irouya, mudur adodo!
44004009	Amã gama, tamo ye ilolaisin bun ereb biya age mafe di, naig fe el fiyen nigin to wamãgouf are,
44004010	ã, Israel tamo kayau ganan geid enei keleĩ youf, ã Jesus Kristus Nasaret tamal aa tetek bun ukesigen, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal yalesnen, ĩ yana bunem, tamo ã meleĩ bun ifaref enei el fiyen.
44004011	Tamo are “‘meein fõ inoya tamo ãgem sane ge fen, utorõgen, anĩ gama monog tor wõ yen.’
44004012	Taka bun tamo kel gei fiya to ibodok, ere nigin, ada kel gei fadauf nigin, saa farumen yana taka to tamo ifenẽdin.”
44004013	Pita Jon ado skul ileya sã, fonõ tamo, are idi kelein, anĩ ere, idi kumĩ sã wogõ de di, dile fen, terẽ den. Age de fen, idi kelein, tamo eneidim Jesus geid diyon.
44004014	Anĩ ere, tamo el difiyen anĩ, Pita Jon ado geid difar mog, dilen nigin, idi ereb od irõya nigin od sã.
44004015	Anĩ nigin, Juda uyu irouya neid kaunsel guru fiya anĩ ditor dilauf nigin, idi dirokeneĩd, ditor dile di, idi dogo dogol katõ difen.
44004016	Idi diron, “Tamo eneidi ere naig tafiyẽdiyouf? Idi memelik enei fire bagai dinon anĩ, Jerusalem dibodok idi ganan keleĩ, are ada wa fiya kisi feleya sã.
44004017	Anĩ ere, enei, tamo kayau bun to iyokalauf nigin, tamo eneidi Jesus yana bunem taka to wogõ difiyẽf nigin, ada wedereid tarouwauf bagai.”
44004018	Age de fen, idi baban namen diweigneĩd, disi di, Jesus yana bunem to bagai wogõ douf be difelnẽdiyouf nigin, totol bagai dirokenẽdin.
44004019	Anĩ ere, Pita Jon ado solo de dirokenẽdin, “Negur mala bun, Negur dõ fiya ban, ã dõ mayeĩf, are tutuk de, sã de anĩ, ã aug es wog.
44004020	Ereb amã mailen, karĩ maun nigin, sigoramã ifõya kisi feleya sã.”
44004021	Uyu irouya idi baban kumĩ od difeneĩd le fen, folõ difeid le di, dilen. Uyu irouya idi darau ifenẽdiya nigin kisi taka to dalen, ere nigin, tamo kayau ganan ereb wõ yen anĩ nigin, Negur yana dalesen.
44004022	Tamo memelik dino fen, el difiyen are, yar foti wal feseya.
44004023	Sain Pita Jon ado dalisnẽdi di, idi dogo neid tamo kayau bun keku de dile fen, pris odudug mudur adodo geid, od dirokenẽdin anĩ ganan wogõ difiyẽdin.
44004024	Idi od anĩ karĩ de fen, idi aiteid tekelei dales fen, Negur kosẽ difiyẽ diron, “Odug ereb ereb ganan nẽ Marau, õ saa, teneub, maaĩ, anidi namen ereb ereb ganan unodin.
44004025	Tamamã Dawid, ogon kabĩ tamo sigor bun Awa Uur Fateulem wogõ won: “‘Ere nigin haiden idi Odug bun seye de fen, tamo kayau idi kiwai nẽ kisi are ege bagai dinof?
44004026	Tenebur nẽ king idi kusĩya nigin dodok difef, uyu irouya tamo guru de fen, Odug bun ado yogon Kristus bun kiwai dinof.’
44004027	Momoi, Herod, Pontius Pailat idim, haiden, Israel tamo kayau geid, taun enei bun guru de fen, ogon kabĩ tamo fateul Jesus õ ogo ugirin ĩ kiwai difenen.
44004028	Õ ogon megeir ado oroya bunem agef wõ youf wo fen, tetun ufon anĩ kilei, idi age difen.
44004029	Odug, gama idi dogo neid kumĩ od dinon anĩ kisi fen, amã ogon ferfer, ogon od kumĩ sã megeir ado wogõ mauf nigin megeir wanamã.
44004030	Imã ura ken, dagi el wo, ago fen, ogon kabĩ tamo fateul Jesus yana bunem memelik uris ado unodiyouf.”
44004031	Kosẽ de bure difel mog, idi guru difen nẽ modoũ anĩ guyoyõ fen. Age fe di, idi ganan Awa Uur Fateulem aura fiyeĩd fen, toli fedi di, kumĩ sã Negur nẽ od wogõ den.
44004032	Momoiya tamo kayau ganan waud ado kisi tekelein. Taka nem, yogon safina taka to neu mugu yen, anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan idi ado are weim dile dogolen.
44004033	Aposel idi megeir odug nem, Odug Jesus mata kel fã yen nigin wogõ den, age dife di, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya odug, idi ganan bun ibodon.
44004034	Age fe di, idi atun taka nem ereb taka to lau fen, ere nigin, teneub be fõ adodo anĩ na nigin sur difeid fen, moni dale dirou disi,
44004035	aposel imeid bun dinodig, anĩ gadõ de fen, taka ĩ lau fef anĩ difenẽdig.
44004036	Josef, Lewi ibor taka, Saipras nuyo tamal, aposel idi ĩ anĩ Banabas dedig (anĩ nẽ gariya, Wau Yaleya Tamo),
44004037	ĩ yogon teneub na nigin sur fe fen, moni yale, aposel imeid bun inon.
44005001	Tamo taka yana Ananias, aiwa Safira ado, nedi safina taka na nigin sur difen.
44005002	Ĩ, yogon aiwa anĩ ganan keleĩ mog, moni tunĩ yogon nigin irou fen, tunĩ anĩ yale iroule, aposel imeid bun inon.
44005003	Age fe di, Pita iron, “Ananias, naig fe di, Satan waũ bun isokose di, Awa Uur Fateul udegne ken, moni teneub nẽ walen anĩ tunĩ ogon nigin urouf?
44005004	Fau na sur fiya sã mog are ogonen, na nigin sur wol fen, moni areg ogonek. Ere nigin õ waũ bun enei ago wouf nigin kisi unol? Õ tamo to udegnẽdil, are õ Negur udegnem.”
44005005	Ananias od enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ kubũ ye laaf yenen. Ganan od enei karĩ den, idi kumĩ tererẽ den.
44005006	Age fe di, tamo gaũ gaũ disi, yogon bouwa sile de, faali de diroule, mũ difen.
44005007	Tri aua age fiya ilele di, aiwa gober ereb wõ yen anĩ keleĩ sa ken, isin.
44005008	Age fe di, Pita kayau to fiyen, “Urokana, õ aiwã ado teneub nẽ moni de enei kilei walegen de?” Kayau iron, “Ao, de enei kilei dogol.”
44005009	Age ye di, Pita kayau irokenen, “Naig fe di, õ aiwã ado wauĩ tekelei fen, Odug nẽ Awa Uur kisi wiyẽgel? Ulef, tamo idi ogon aiwã mũ difel, idi neid yebureid yer bobogẽ, õg idi age de faali de dirouleyõf.”
44005010	Agef irokenẽ di, kaisã bagai, Pita ye gariyan, kayau are kubũ ye laa fen. Age fe di, tamo gaũ namen disi, kayau laa fel dile fen, faali de diroule, aiwa mũ difen sirin mũ difen.
44005011	Sios adok, tamo kayau ganan od enei karĩ den idi geid, fatuk bagai kumĩ den.
44005012	Aposel idi tamo kayau atun memelik uris ado musei dinodin. Age dife di, momoiya tamo kayau ganan Solomon nẽ Waranda bun guru difedig.
44005013	Tamo kayau idi nigin yeneid dalesedig, anĩ ere, idi kumĩ de fen, taka nem idi geid to bagu difen.
44005014	Anĩ ere, tamo kayau musei Odug nigin momoi de di, momoiya tamo kayau baba baban tobol fef iselen.
44005015	Aposel age difef ya anĩ kelei ken, tamo kayau dagi adodo naabur guri difedi di, fatar bun ado gogoũ bun dinenãdin, are Pita ile di, yogon burig idi tunĩ bun irã di, el be fediyouf de fen, age difen.
44005016	Tamo kayau musei Jerusalem kalilĩ fiya taun temeleideg, dogo neid dagi adodo, kaa sesenem darau difenẽdin anidi guri de dirou disi di, idi ganan el difiyẽdin.
44005017	Age dife di, pris neid mudur ĩ, yogon katõ tura tar are Sadusia tamo geid, kiyeĩ beberĩdin.
44005018	Idi aposel dirouneĩd fen, kalabus bun dinenẽdin.
44005019	Anĩ ere, bõ anĩ bun, Odug nẽ engel kalabus fõ sukar kã feleid, gurif, mayarẽ disi fen, irokenẽdin,
44005020	“Ulagauf, tempel bun ufareg fen, tamo kayau mata enei nẽ od ganan urokenẽdig.”
44005021	Idi irokenẽdin kilei, bonimei bagai idi tempel bun dile fen, tamo kayau ifelnẽdiya gariya dinon. Sain pris neid mudur, yogon katõ tura tar geid disi di, idi Israel neid uyu irouya ganan neid guru fiya yana Sanhedrin dedig anĩ diroun, age de fen, idi aposel kalabus bun temeleid guri difeid dirou disiyouf nigin tamo sur difedin.
44005022	Anĩ ere, sain kabĩ tamo kalabus fõ bun dilen, aposel an to diledin. Anĩ nigin, idi keku de dile dirokenẽdin,
44005023	“Amã kalabus fõ kotũ feleya ado lo fiya tamo bobog bun difar mog, mailedil, anĩ ere, sukar kã mafel fen, an taka nem to ibod mog mailel.”
44005024	Od anĩ karĩ de fen, tempel lo fiya tamo neid mudur, pris odudug geid, nene de fen, enei bunem naig be fe wõ youf de fen, sii fedin.
44005025	Age de mog, taka nem isi iron, “Ulegef! Tamo kalabus bun unenẽdigen idi tempel bun difar fen, tamo kayau difelnẽdif.”
44005026	Age ye di, tempel lo fiya tamo neid mudur, yogon kabĩ tamo geid, dile, aposel gei difeid fen, dirou disin. Idi to sibu difiyeĩd fen, daũ difiyẽdin, ere nigin, idi tamo kayau meein tulu difiyẽdiya nigin kumĩ difiyẽdin.
44005027	Idi aposel gei de dirousi, Israel uyu irouya neid guru fiya meleid bun difarnẽdi di, pris neid mudur idi to fiyeĩd
44005028	iron, “Amã yana enei bunem to ufelnẽdigouf nigin, totol bagai katũ mayein, anĩ ere, ã wogõ ge di, ã ufelnẽdigen anĩ Jerusalem ganan bun iyokelen, ago ge di, tamo enei nẽ naud amã bouwamã bun unogef.”
44005029	Pita aposel ganan geid aiten dale diron, “Amã tamo aiteid dõ fiya ban, Negur ait anĩ dõ mafouf bagai.
44005030	Jesus laa fouf nigin aa bun useginnẽgen, anĩ ere, tamada tar neid Negurem Jesus laa bun tamal yalesnen.
44005031	Ĩ Negurem yalesne ken, ima biyalẽ neda King, neda Kel Gei Fadaya inenen, are Negurem Israel tamo kayau waud falei fe di, nedi mosor weder tu kalauf nigin age fen.
44005032	Amã enei mailen anĩ yaor ma wogõ mauf, Awa Uur Fateul, are Negur dõ difef anidi ifenẽdin, ĩg age fef.”
44005033	Idi od enei karĩ de fen, idi seye de, didenkesiyouf nigin age difen.
44005034	Anĩ ere, Farisia tamo taka yana Gamaliel, ĩ lo ifelnẽdiya tamo, tamo kayau ganan ĩ yana dalesedig, ĩ guru fiya atun ifar fen, aposel idi sain naal mayarẽ dinenẽdiyouf nigin irokenẽdin.
44005035	Age dife di, ĩ idi irokenẽdin, “Israel tamo, ã tamo eneidi ereb naig wiyẽdigou fenẽ are, ã kisi el ge waleg le fen, ago gouf.
44005036	Kulu sain taka bun, Teudas ĩ yogo anĩ tamo odug ye fen, wõ yen, age fe di, fo handred tamo age fiya dõ difiyen, anĩ ere, ĩ dukesi di, yogon dõ fiya tar ganan firagagaũ dife, ege sa kelen.
44005037	Tamo enei dumen, Judas Galili tamal, tamo kayau yeneid iweseya sain bun wõ ye fen, tamo kayau geif yalen, anĩ ere, ĩg dukesi di, yogon dõ fiya tar ganan firagagaũ difen.
44005038	Anĩ nigin, enei nigin aya ã arokeneik, tamo eneidi utornẽdig len dile! Idi ereb kisi difef be, ereb age difef, are tamo bun tamal ouf are, fau sa kalauf.
44005039	Anĩ ere, enei Negur bun tamal ouf are, ã tamo eneidi katũ fiyẽdiya kisi feleya sã, age fiya ban, ã aug Negur geid kusĩ gef anĩ ulogouf.”
44005040	Age ye di, idi yogon od diroun. Idi aposel diweigneĩd, namen dile di, wagagã difedin, age de fen, idi baban Jesus yana bunem to wogõ douf nigin dirokeneĩd fen, ditornẽdi di, dilen.
44005041	Aposel idi kaunsel guru fiya anĩ ditor dile fen, kulĩ den, ere nigin, Negur kisi fen, are idi Jesus yana nigin mama dalouf nigin kisi feleya.
44005042	Naa ganan, tempel bun ado fõ bun fõ bun dile, toku difelneĩd fen, biya od wogõ de, Jesus ĩ Kristus den.
44006001	Sain anĩ bun, dõ fiya tamo kayau musei di, Juda tamo kayau Grik od wogõ dedig anidim, Juda tamo kayau Hibru od wogõ dedig anidi nauseir difiyẽdin, ere nigin, idi neid kayau waab naa ganan saaf gadõ fiya bun ditornẽdidig.
44006002	Anĩ nigin, aposel tuwelf idim, dõ fiya tamo kayau ganan kuru difeid fen, diron, “Amam Negur nẽ od wogõya kabĩ mator ken, saaf lo fiya kabĩ malouf, are to biya.
44006003	Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, ã atun tamo sewen Awa Uur ado kisi biya barikã nigin yeneid walesegedig anidi ugirnẽdig. Kabĩ enei amã idi bun manouf.
44006004	Age ma fen, amã, kosẽya ado od wogõya kabĩ bun dogol, kabĩ totol malouf.”
44006005	Od enei karĩ de fen, idi ganan yo den. Idi digirin, Stiwen, ĩ tamo momoiya ado Awa Uur Fateul barikã, taka Filip, Prokoros, Nikanor, Timon, Pamenas, Nikolas Antiok tamal ĩ Juda neid momoiya bun falei ye fen, Kristus nẽ momoiya yalen.
44006006	Age dife fen, idi, tamo anidi aposel wagedin dinenẽdi di, aposel idi kosẽ del fen, imeid tetedin dinon.
44006007	Negur nẽ od iyokelen. Jerusalem an, dõ fiya tamo kayau tobol fe, musei biya wowã den. Age dife di, pris musei idig momoiya anĩ dõ difen.
44006008	Stiwen ĩ, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ado megeir barikã tamo, ĩ tamo kayau atun memelik uris ado odudug inodin.
44006009	Anĩ ere, fefeya yenen, Friman dedig neid uub fõ bun temeleid tamo, are idi Juda tamo Sairini ado Aleksandria taun temeleid ado, Silisia ado Asia provins bun temeleid anidim, Stiwen geid fefe den.
44006010	Anĩ ere, Stiwen ĩ kisi biya ado Awa Uur bunem wogõ yen anĩ, idim wal fiyẽya kisi feleya sã.
44006011	Age fe di, idi iminẽyan, tamo tunĩ eig de dirõf nigin waud dalen, “Stiwen ĩ Moses ado Negur nigin kono fiya od wogõ ye di, karĩ maun.”
44006012	Idi od anim, tamo kayau, uyu iroudiya tamo ado, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo geid nameid dalesen. Age dife di, idi Stiwen ka dife, Juda uyu irouya tamo neid guru fiya bun diroulen.
44006013	Idi, tamo tunĩ idegẽya od wogõ douf nigin, guri de disi di, diron, “Tamo enei faimud sigor taka to ifõdig, Negur nẽ tempel enei nigin ado, Moses nẽ Lo nigin, kiwai od wogõ yedig.
44006014	Ere nigin, amã karĩ mafiyẽ mog, ĩ iron, Jesus Nasaret tamal eneim, modoũ enei narĩ fel fen, Moses nẽ tobonunã ifanadan anĩ falei fouf yen.”
44006015	Ganan kaunsel guru fiya anĩ bun dibodon idi, Stiwen lo difelen, ĩ nawa engel nawa gen dilen.
44007001	Age de fen, pris neid mudur Stiwen to fiyen, “Od wogõ den enei, are momoi de?”
44007002	Stiwen solof iron, “Turau tar ado Dei geg, karĩ wiyag, tubuda Abraham Haran taun fau ileya san, Mesopotamia ibod mog, fula fiya medeĩya nẽ Negur ĩ bun wõ yen.
44007003	Negur Abraham irokenen, ‘Ogon teneub ado ogon tamo kayau utorneĩd fen, teneub aya afelnõf nẽ an ulauf.’
44007004	“Anĩ nigin, ĩ Kaldia teneub itor ken, Haran ile ibodon. Dum yogon tama laa fe di, Negur ĩ sur fiyẽ di, teneub gama ubodõgef enei bun ibodon.
44007005	Negur Abraham ein teneub taka to ifenen, teneub masak bagaig taka to ifenen. Anĩ ere, Negur, Abraham ĩ dumen yogon ibor nẽ tubu tar geid, teneub anĩ afenẽdiyouf yen, anĩ ere, sain anĩ bun Abraham ĩ kesu san.
44007006	Negur Abraham eig ye irokenen, ‘Ogon ibor nẽ tubũ tar, yaũ tamo teneub taka bun dibodõf, an idi ferfer dibodõf, fo handred yar to biya difiyẽdiyouf.
44007007	Anĩ ere, aya, idi ferfer dibod ken, aruneid dalef neid teneub darau afenẽf, anĩ dumen, idi teneub anĩ bun tamal diya disi, modoũ enĩ bun aya arunau dalouf.’
44007008	Agef fen, Negur Abraham bar itenẽya nẽ uris, mulũ anĩ ifenen. Age fe di, Abraham naal Isak wõ ye, naa eit ilele di, mulũ ifenen, dumen Isak naal Jakop wõ yen, Jakop ĩ tubuda tar tuwelf neid temeid ibodon.
44007009	“Tubuda tar, Josef kiyeĩ difen ken, Josef Isip neid ferfer wõ youf nigin, na nẽ sur difen. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ adon,
44007010	agef fen, Negur Josef morõ ganan bun isennen. Negur ĩ, Josef Isip nẽ king Farao mala bun, kisi biya ado wau ifenẽya anĩ ifenẽ di, Farao ĩ, Josef Isip teneub ado yogon fõ ganan lo fiya nigin uyu irouya inenen.
44007011	“Age fe di, Isip teneub ado Kanan teneub ganan bun, naũ odug wõ ye di, morõ odug dalen, age fe di, tubuda tar saaf fotou fiya kisi feleya san.
44007012	Anĩ ere, Jakop, Isip oun saaf ado ya karĩ ye fen, tamada tar urug bagai sur fedin.
44007013	Idi baban dile di, Josef ĩ yogo nigin tura tar bun yaor fen, age fe di, Farao ĩ Josef nẽ ibor nigin kelein.
44007014	Anĩ dumen, Josef, tama Jakop ado yogon ibor ganan Isip dilauf nigin od sur fen, idi ganan sewenti-faif.
44007015	Age fe di, Jakop Isip ilen, an ĩ ado tubuda tar gare desin.
44007016	Idi neid bouweid keku de, Sikem taun guri de diroule, kulu Abraham Sikem oun, Hamor gere tar bun moni nem matmat na yalen anĩ bun mumã difen.
44007017	“Negur Abraham irokenen anĩ kisi falauf nigin sain dodol mog, Isip oun neda tamo kayau musei biya isoran.
44007018	Age dife di, king taka ĩ Josef nigin keleĩ sã, ĩ bagam Isip nẽ king wõ yen.
44007019	Ĩ ada neda tamo kayau idegneĩd fen, darau ifenẽdin, are tubuda tar nugo fiyẽdi di, idi neid kesu momou sineid gogũ difedif anĩ, mayarẽ dirarã di, gare douf nigin age fen.
44007020	“Sain anĩ bun, Moses wõ yen, ĩ Negur mala bun kesu meli bagai. Ogõ towo, tama nẽ fõ bun kulatun difen.
44007021	Sain ĩ mayarẽ dinenẽ di, Farao ne baraim yalen, ĩ yogon kesu ouf nigin yale iroulen.
44007022	Moses ĩ, Isip neid keleĩ biya adok difelnẽ di, wogõya bun ado ereb ereb age fediya nigin, tamo megeir ado wõ yen.
44007023	“Moses ĩ yogon yar foti mog, ĩ Israel tura tar ki fediyouf nigin kisi fen.
44007024	Moses ĩ, idi neid taka Isip tamom to biya fiyẽ mog, ilen, anĩ nigin, ĩ Israel tura isenne ken, aba solof Isip tamo anĩ yukesin.
44007025	Moses kisi fen, yogon tamo kayau keleĩ youf, are Negurem idi kafĩ fiya bun tamal gei fediyouf nigin, ĩ itonek, anĩ ere, idi to kelein.
44007026	We fele di, Israel tamo kusĩ de mog, Moses wõ yen. Ĩ, idi komo difouf nigin daũ gudũf fen, iron, ‘Are ã tutur, ere nigin ã abob darau wenẽgef?’
44007027	“Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ, ne tã darau ifenen anim, Moses sur fiyẽ ira ken, iron, ‘Aim õ amã bun, uyu irouya ado es fiya tamo inenon?
44007028	Õ nor Isip tamo ukesin gen, ayag ago unakesiyou fenẽ de?’
44007029	Moses od enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ Midian teneub bun iya ilen, an ĩ yaũ tamo ibod ken, kesu monog uru adon.
44007030	“Yar foti ilele di, engel taka, gerere tuan Sinai Arei non, aa balai duri ado an yã bale namen, Moses bun wõ yen.
44007031	Moses anĩ ile fen, terefeit yen. Ĩ tutuk ilouf nigin aa non iyok ile mog, ĩ Odug nẽ ait karĩ yen,
44007032	‘Aya tubuĩ tar neid Negur, Abraham, Isak, Jakop idi neid Negur.’ Moses kumĩ tererẽ ye fen, lo fiya itoron.
44007033	“Age fe di, Odug Moses irokenen, ‘Ogon sendel unukakã, ere nigin, modoũ õ ufaref nẽ are fateul teneub.
44007034	Momoi, aya neu tamo kayau Isip oun darau fatuk bagai dale mog, ailen. Aya idi neid kaĩya karĩ au fen, idi kafĩ fiya bun tamal alelnẽdiyouf nigin asin. Anĩ nigin, gama usi, aya sur ayõ di, Isip kel ulauf.’
44007035	“Moses enei, idi kulu ĩ nigin eig de diro ken, ditoron, ‘Aim õ amã bun uyu irouya ado es fiya tamo inenon?’ De ĩ anĩ, Negurem idi uyu iroukenẽdiyouf nigin ado kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnẽdiyouf nigin, engel aa balai bun yã bale namen Moses mala bun wõ yen anĩ bunem sur fiyen.
44007036	Moses ĩ, tamo kayau Isip temeleid uyu iroukeneĩd fen, Isip an, Maaĩ Giriya bun ado, yar foti gerere tuan, memelik uris ado inodin.
44007037	“Moses de anim, Israel tamo kayau eig ye irokenẽdin, ‘Negur ĩ, ãgenei tamo kayau bun tamal, profet taka aya gen sur feneĩf.’
44007038	Ĩ, engel Sinai Arei bun wogõ fiyen anĩ ado tubuda tar geid, gerere tuan tamo kayau guru fiya atun ibod ken, mata ibodõya od ifenẽdi di, tobol fe isi, ã bun isiyouf nigin od anĩ yalen.
44007039	“Anĩ ere, tubuda tar, Moses nẽ od dõ fiya ditoron. Idi Moses anĩ ditor ken, Isip kel ileya nigin waud iron.
44007040	Age de fen, idi Aron dirokenen, ‘Uyu diroukanamãf nigin, waitou uneye kanamãdiyouf. Ere nigin, Moses enei, Isip tamal gei famã irousin ĩ bun ereb wõ yen are, amã keleĩ sã.’
44007041	Sain anĩ bun, idi idegẽya waitou bulmakau lubu dinon. Idi anĩ bun sesewi dife fen, idi imedim dinon anĩ nigin seli dabiyou fenẽ, tar odug dinon.
44007042	Anĩ nigin, Negur idi itornẽdi di, saa ilun nẽ megeir anĩ seli dabiyouf nigin folõ feid len. Are profet neid buk bun itotoya yenek kilei: “‘O Israel tamo kayau, ã gerere tuan oun, foti yar bun, sesewi fiya ado ofa wanagen, anĩ ere, ã aya yanau to seli wabigen.
44007043	Ã idegẽya waitou Molek nẽ salafat unog fen, ãgenei waitou Refan nẽ barisa yana walesegen, are idegẽya waitou ã selid wabidigouf nigin unodigen. Anĩ nigin, aya ã ãgenei teneub bun tamal alelnei ken, oun Babilon kantri ubodõgouf nigin sur ayeĩf.’
44007044	“Sain neda tubuda tar gerere tuan dibodon, idi Negur nẽ salafat adon, salafat anĩ bun Negur ibod ken, od wogõ yedig. Salafat are, Negur Moses irokenẽ di, Negur Moses ifelnen kilei bagai dinon.
44007045	Neda tubuda tar, salafat dalen anĩ dirou fen, Josuam uyu irou di, Negur tubuda tar meleid bun haiden irud iraile, diya di, teneub anĩ dalen an salafat dirou disin. Salafat anĩ, teneub anĩ bun ibodon, ile Dawid nẽ sain bun.
44007046	Negur Dawid isennẽ el fe di, Dawid wau el fen, anĩ Jakop nẽ Negur ibodõf nẽ modoũ, inim inouf nigin Negur irokenen.
44007047	Anĩ ere, Dawid naal Solomon im, Negur nẽ fõ inon.
44007048	“Anĩ ere, Negur Ilun Bagai ĩ, tamo imedim fõ dinof anĩ bun to ibodõdig, are profet eig ye irok kilei:
44007049	“‘Odug irok, saa are neu king nẽ sia, teneub are yeu inoya nẽ sawa. Ã ere fõ anĩ aya unokanagauf? Neu si inoya nẽ modoũ nain ibodok?
44007050	Aya imaum eneidi ganan to anodin de?’
44007051	“Ã uleĩ teregein yediya tamo, ã wauĩ ado wedereĩ fitok yukeledin! Ã ãgenei tubuĩ tar gen, faimud Awa Uur Fateul dudum wiyẽgedig!
44007052	Tubuĩ tar profet taka to darau difenen de? Tubuĩ tar idi, Madur Tamo anĩ fau isiyouf de fen, wogõ den tamo anidig didenkesin. Are gama Madur Tamo anĩ kiwai wenẽg fen, ukesigen.
44007053	Ã, lo engel bunem kabĩ bun difenen anĩ walegen, anĩ ere, ã anĩ to dõ gen.”
44007054	Idi enei karĩ de fen, idi nameid fatuk bagai sane fen, ĩ nigin goboreid kikokõ yedin.
44007055	Anĩ ere, Stiwen, Awa Uur Fateulem barikã, saa ilun mala ira ken, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya ado Negur ima biya melẽ Jesus ifar mog, ilen.
44007056	Agef fen, Stiwen iron, “Ulegef, aya saa kã fele di, Tamo Naal Negur ima biyalẽ ifar mog, ailef.”
44007057	Age ye di, idi aiteid odugem kakaĩ de, imedim wedereid fitok du ken, idi adok ĩ garan gududu den.
44007058	Idi taun tamal Stiwen dĩ de dirou dile, serẽ meein tulu difiyen. Age dife mog, Stiwen bou bun od dun idi, nedi kolos dinukaka ken, tamo gaũ yana Sol ĩ ye gariyan gõ difen.
44007059	Idi Stiwen meein tulu difiyẽ mog, Stiwen kosẽ yen, “Odug Jesus, neu uur wale.”
44007060	Age ye fen, ĩ ibor itenana ken, wade iweig iron, “Odug, mosor age difef enei mala solo to wenẽdiyouf.” Ĩ agef irokel fen, laa fen.
44008001	Sol ĩ Stiwen dukesiyouf nigin, idi geid waud tekelein. Naa anĩ bun, darau odug Jerusalem sios bun wõ yen. Age fe di, momoiya tamo kayau ganan firagagaũ dife, Judia ado Samaria distrik bun dilelen, aposel dogol Jerusalem difaren.
44008002	Negur oroya dõ difedig tamo tunĩ Stiwen mũ difel fen, ĩ nigin waud fatuk gudũf, inã loguren.
44008003	Anĩ ere, Sol gariya ino, sios daũ fouf nigin age fen. Ĩ fõ bun fõ bun ile fen, momoiya tamo kayau geif fen, kalabus bun inenẽdin.
44008004	Momoiya tamo kayau firagagaũ de dilelen, idi dilelen nẽ an biya od wogõ den.
44008005	Filip Samaria neid taun taka bun ile fen, an Kristus nigin wogõ yen.
44008006	Tamo kayau, Filip nẽ od karĩ den ado ĩ memelik inodin anĩ dile fen, idi ganan Filip wogõ yen anĩ bun kisi fatuk dino, karĩ difiyen.
44008007	Tamo kayau musei bun tamal, kaa sesen kakaĩ de ulolõ deis diyalelen, ilolaisin musei ado yeid fefu fedin musei el fedin.
44008008	Anĩ nigin, taun anĩ bun kulĩya odug adon.
44008009	Tamo taka yana Simon dedig an ibodon, ĩ taun anĩ bun idegẽya kosẽ inodidig, anĩ bunem Samaria tamo kayau ganan terẽ fiyẽdidig. Ĩ yogo nigin anĩ, aya tamo odug yedig.
44008010	Age fe di, tamo kayau yeneid adodo, yeneid sãsã geid ganan, ĩ bun kisi fatuk dino karĩ difiye ken, diron, “Tamo enei, Negur nẽ megeir, Megeir Odug dedig anĩ.”
44008011	Idi ĩ bun kisi fatuk dino karĩ difiyen, ere nigin, ĩ sain meluk idegẽya kosẽ bunem terẽ fiyẽdidig.
44008012	Anĩ ere, sain Filip Negur nẽ tano ado Jesus Kristus yana nigin biya od wogõ ye di, idi in od momoi den, age dife di, idi naan igunẽdin, tamo ado kayau geid.
44008013	Simon ĩg momoi ye di, naan igunen. Agef fen, Filip nain be ilef are, ĩ dõ felef iyo ken, memelik uris ado odudug wõ yedin anĩ ileid fen, terẽ yen.
44008014	Aposel Jerusalem dibodon idi, Samaria tamo kayau, Negur nẽ od mogo dalen anĩ karĩ de fen, idi, Pita Jon ado, idi gedin sur difedin.
44008015	Idi an wõ de fen, Samaria tamo kayau Awa Uur Fateul dalouf nigin kosẽ den,
44008016	ere nigin, Awa Uur Fateul idi taka bun fau isiya san, idi Odug Jesus yana bunem naan igunẽdin dogol.
44008017	Age dife fen, Pita Jon ado, imeid idi tetedin dino di, idi Awa Uur Fateul dalen.
44008018	Aposel imeid tamo kayau tetedin dino di, tamo kayau Awa Uur ifenẽdin, Simon anĩ ile fen, aposel moni ifenẽdiyouf nigin agef fen,
44008019	iron, “Ayag megeir enei wanage di, taka teten imau ano di, Awa Uur Fateul yalouf.”
44008020	Age ye di, Pita ĩ irokenen, “Ogon moni õ ado inanakalauf, ere nigin, õ Negur nẽ ege luwa, Awa Uur Fateul moni nem na yaleya kisi feleya wol.
44008021	Õ amã nemã kabĩ bun, amã geid katõ tekelei sã, nemã kabĩ taka to walef, ere nigin, Negur mala bun waũ tutuk sã.
44008022	Ani nigin, sane enei nigin waũ falei wo fen, Odug bun kosẽ wo. Õ waũ bun kisi agef yenek anĩ nigin Odug weder tu kalauf be.
44008023	Ere nigin, õ waũ bun dirikeĩ bagai fen, mosorem irounok anĩ ailef.”
44008024	Age ye di, Simon solof iron, “Ereb ã wogõ gel anĩ, aya bun to wõ youf nigin, Odug kosẽ wiyẽg.”
44008025	Pita Jon ado, Odug nẽ od kurõ difeis fen, wogõ difiyẽdin, age difel fen, idi Jerusalem keku de, naab luwen Samaria fonõ musei bun biya od wogõ de dilen.
44008026	Odug nẽ engel Filip irokenen, “Fã wo fen, õ saut melem naab gerere tuan ibodok an ule, naab are Jerusalemem isil, Gasa taun wõ yen.”
44008027	Anĩ nigin, Filip fã ye fen, ilen, luwen Itiopia tamo faat korõ feleya anĩ ĩ ket ile mog, fotou fiyen, tamo are Itiopia nẽ kuin Kandasi nẽ safina ganan lo fiya tamo, yana odug ado. Ĩ Negur yana yalesauf nigin Jerusalem ilen,
44008028	ĩ karis bun ibod ken, kel yogon fonõ naab yale ile fen, profet Asaia nẽ buk iwesef ilen.
44008029	Awa Uur Filip irokenen, “Karis anĩ garan ule fen, non ufar.”
44008030	Age ye di, Filip karis anĩ garan gududu ye isel, tamo anĩ profet Asaia nẽ buk iwes mog, karĩ ye fen, to fiyen, “Õ uwesef anĩ nẽ gariya keleĩ de?”
44008031	Ĩ iron, “Tamo takam to faded fiyauf are, naig fe di, aya keleĩ youf?” Anĩ nigin, ĩ Filip isel, urom karis bun dibodõf nigin irokenen.
44008032	Faat korõ feleya tamo are, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek enei iwesen: “Ĩ sipsip dukesiyouf nigin dirou dilen gen dirou dilen, ĩ, sipsip momou siwi gudũ fiya tamo wagen dẽ yeledig gen, od taka to wogõ yen.
44008033	Ĩ lai difiye ken, ĩ to tutuk es difiyen. Taka nem yogon ibor nẽ tubu tar nigin to wogõ youf, ere nigin, yogon mata tenebur ein dalelen.”
44008034	Faat korõ feleya tamo Filip to fiyen, “Profet ai nigin enei wogõ yef anĩ urokana, ĩ yogo nigin de, tamo taka nigin?”
44008035	Age ye di, Filip Negur nẽ Itotoya enei bun gariya ino fen, Jesus nigin biya od wogõ fiyen.
44008036	Idi naab diyok dile fen, naan taka bun disi fen, faat korõ feleya tamo iron, “Ulef, naan yeir, erem anĩ aya naan igunauf nigin katũ fiyaf?”
44008038	Age ye fen, ĩ karis irou dẽ yalauf nigin irokenen. Age fe di, ĩ Filip ado kututũ deis, naanũ disil fen, Filipem naan igunen.
44008039	Sain idi naanũ tamal disele di, Odug nẽ Awa Uur Filip yale irou ilen, age fe di, faat korõ feleya tamo Filip baban to ilen, anĩ ere, ĩ kulĩya odug ado naab iyok ilen.
44008040	Anĩ ere, Filip Asdot taun wõ ye, naab iyok ile fen, taun ganan bun biya od wogõ yef ile, Sisaria taun wõ yen.
44009001	Sain anĩ bun, Sol ĩ fau fau Odug nẽ dõ fiya tar idenkesiya nigin wau ifokel fen, kumĩ ifenẽdif isin. Anĩ nigin, ĩ pris neid mudur garan ile fen,
44009002	Damaskus taun oun Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun pas itotkenẽdiyouf nigin irokenen, are ĩ an Odug nẽ naab dõ difef anidi, tamo be kayau be, taka fotou fiyẽf are, ifokel yale, Jerusalem irou ilauf nigin age fen.
44009003	Sol ĩ ile Damaskus wõ you fenẽ mog, kaisã bagai, fula fiya taka saa ilun tamal, ĩ bun fulaf irailen.
44009004	Age fe di, ĩ tenebur kubũ ye isil fen, ait taka wogõ fiyẽ mog, karĩ yen, “Sol, Sol, ere nigin õ aya daig wiyaf?”
44009005	Age ye di, Sol to fen, “Odug, õ aim?” Ĩ iron, “Aya Jesus, õ daig wiyaf anim.
44009006	Fã wale fen, taun ule, an õ ereb ago wouf nigin irokonõf.”
44009007	Tamo tunĩ Sol geid dilen idi, an terefeit de mã, mutũ difaren. Idi ait karĩ den, anĩ ere, aib taka to dilen.
44009008	Sol tenebur tamal fã yale, mala birikã felen, anĩ ere, ĩ ereb taka ileya kisi feleya san. Anĩ nigin, idi ima gim de, Damaskus diroulen.
44009009	Ĩ naa towo lo fiya kisi feleya san, agef fen, saaf ado naaneg to yon.
44009010	Damaskus an, dõ fiya tamo taka yana Ananias ibodon. Ĩ mala seleulã kurã fen sain, Odug ĩ irokenen, “Ananias!” fiyẽ di, ĩ iron, “Odug, aya yeir.”
44009011	Odug Ananias irokenen, “Fã wale, naab yana Naab Madur dedig an, Judas nẽ fõ bun ule fen, tamo taka Tasus tamal, yana Sol nigin to wouf. Ĩ kosẽ yef ibodok.
44009012	Ĩ mala seleulã kurãf fen, tamo taka yana Ananias isi, baban mala lo fouf nigin ima teten ino mog, ilen.”
44009013	Ananias solof iron, “Odug, aya tamo enĩ nẽ od, Jerusalem oun ogon tamo kayau fateul daig fiyẽdin, are museim mogo dirokana di, karĩ aun.
44009014	Ĩ, tamo kayau ganan õ yana seli dabidig anidi, kafĩ fiya bun inenẽdiyouf nigin, pris odudug bun tamal megeir yale fen, ein isin.”
44009015	Anĩ ere, Odug Ananias irokenen, “Õ ulauf, tamo enei are, neu yanau, haiden, dogo neid king ado, Israel tamo kayau bun irou ilauf nigin agirnen.
44009016	Ĩ aya yanau nigin darau naig be fiya yalouf are, fau aya yug afelnẽf.”
44009017	Age ye di, Ananias fõ anĩ bun ilen, aaben ile fen, ima Sol teten ino fen, iron, “Turau Sol, Odug Jesus õ ein usi mog, naabur õ bun wõ yen ĩ, õ baban malã kelẽ wol fen, Awa Uur Fateul aura yõf nigin sur fiyal.”
44009018	Kaisã bagai, Sol mala bun tamal, ereb gau genĩ gen anĩ kuku ralaisin, age fe di, ĩ baban mala kelẽ yelen. Ĩ fã yale di, naan igunen.
44009019	Age fel fen, saaf yõ di, ĩ bouwa baban totol kel yalen. Sol ĩ, Damaskus an, naa tunĩ dõ fiya tar geid dibodon.
44009020	Ĩ kaisã bagai gariya ino, Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun od wogõ ye iron, Jesus ĩ Negur Naal yen.
44009021	Idi ganan ĩ karĩ difiyen idi terẽ de fen, to difen, “Im anĩ, Jerusalem oun Jesus yana diweignẽdig tamo kayau tadũ fedin anĩ sã de? Im anĩ, tamo kayau ifofã, pris odudug gedin irou ilauf nigin isin anĩ sã de?”
44009022	Anĩ ere, Sol nẽ od wogõya totolef ilen, agef fen, Jesus anĩ Kristus ye yaor fe, wogõ ye di, Juda tamo idi Damaskus dibodon anidi, yogon od solo fiyẽya kisi feleya sã.
44009023	Naa musei ilele di, Juda tamo idi, Sol yukesiya nigin kisi katõ difen,
44009024	anĩ ere, Sol idi kisi dinon are kelein. Idi Sol dukesiyouf nigin, naa ganan bõ ado gaa ado, taun nẽ kau bobog bun ololo difiyen.
44009025	Anĩ ere, bõ taka bun, in dõ fiya tar ĩ dale, karam bun dife fen, kau kurenem folo folõ dife di, tenebur isilen.
44009026	Sain Sol Jerusalem ile fen, dõ fiya tar geid weim bagu difouf nigin age fen. Anĩ ere, idi Sol ĩ dõ fiya tamo taka wõ yen anĩ to momoi de fen, ganan ĩ nigin kumĩ den.
44009027	Anĩ ere, Banabas ĩ Sol yale, aposel gedin iroule fen, Sol ĩ naab luwen Odug ile di, ĩ wogõ fiyen ado, Sol Damaskus oun, kumĩ sã Jesus yana bunem wogõ yen anĩ, aposel faded fedin.
44009028	Anĩ nigin, Sol idi weim dibod ken, Jerusalem oun karika bagai iyo ken, Odug yana bunem, kumĩ sã biya od wogõ yef iyon.
44009029	Ĩ Juda tamo Grik od wogõ dedig anidi geid, od wogõ de fefe den, ani ere, idi ĩ dukesiyouf nigin age difen.
44009030	Kabĩ tura tar enei kelei ken, idi ĩ dale, Sisaria taun dirou dilen, anenem Tasus taun sur de dirã di, ilen.
44009031	Anĩ nigin, sios an Judia, Galili ado Samaria teneub ganan bun, idi wau inosiya sain biya ado fen, megeir ifenẽdin. Idi Awa Uur Fateul nem waud yalese di, Odug nigin aniniya ado dibodok dile di, momoiya tamo kayau musei len.
44009032	Pita ĩ modoũ ganan iyokelen, agef fen, ĩ Lida tauneg Negur nẽ tamo kayau ki fediyouf nigin ilen.
44009033	Pita, an tamo taka yana Ainias bouwa ilolaisin, ĩ yar eit fataren yenẽyai yedig fotou fiyen.
44009034	Pita Ainias irokenen, “Ainias, Jesus Kristus õ el yok. Fã wale fen, ogon bedu madur wo.” Kaisã bagai, Ainias fã yalen.
44009035	Tamo kayau, Lida taun ado Saron fonõ dibodon idi ganan ĩ dile fen, waud falei ye, Odug nigin momoi den.
44009036	Jopa an, dõ fiya kayau taka, yana Tabita (anĩ Grik od bun Dokas dedig) ibodon. Ĩ faimud tobonunã biya inodidig ado maleg isennẽdidig.
44009037	Sain anĩ bun, Tabita dagi yale fen, laa fen. Ĩ laa fe di, yogon bouwa buru naan digune kel, fõ aab ilun dinenẽ di, yenen.
44009038	Lida taun are Jopa taun non. Anĩ nigin, dõ fiya tar, Pita Lida ibodok yeya karĩ de fen, tamo uru sur dife di, ĩ gein dile, totol bagai dirokenen, “Kaisã bagai talauf!”
44009039	Anĩ nigin, Pita idi geid dile, an ulõ yesi di, idi Pita fõ aab ilun dale dirou diselen. Kayau waab ganan an Pita salili difiye ken, idi inã dale fen, Dokas ĩ fau matan ibod ken, kolos ado saket iwadin anĩ ganan difelnen.
44009040	Anĩ ere, Pita idi ganan mayarẽ sur feid fen, ĩ ibor bobou fe kosẽ yen. Agef fen, ĩ falei yel, kayau nẽ bouwa buru irokenen, “Tabita, fã wale.” Kayau ĩ mala birikã feid, Pita ile fen, fã yale ibodon.
44009041	Age fe di, Pita kayau ima irou yalesnẽ di, ĩ fã ye ifaren. Age fel fen, Pita, momoiya tamo kayau ado kayau waab geid iweigneĩd fen, Dokas ĩ mata kel fã yel anĩ ifelnẽdin.
44009042	Pita enei age fen are, Jopa taun ganan od iyokelen, age fe di, tamo kayau musei Odug nigin momoi den.
44009043	Pita Jopa an, gaar gabar el fiya tamo yana Simon dedig ĩ ado, naa musei dibodon.
44010001	Sisaria taun oun, tamo taka yana Konelius ibodon, ĩ wan handred kusĩ tamo neid orowa taka, ‘Itali kusĩ tamo mala’ dedig anĩ bun tamal.
44010002	Ĩ Rom tamal, Juda tamo sã, anĩ ere, Negur yana yalesedig, agef fen, ĩ yogon ibor adok geid, Negur nigin anini dedig. Ĩ Juda maleg tamo musei isennẽdidig, takag, ĩ toku Negur kosẽ fiyẽdig.
44010003	Naa taka bun tri kilok aragau age fiya, Konelius ĩ mala seleulã kurãf fen, ĩ yaor bagai ilen, Negur nẽ engel isi fen, irokenen, “Konelius!”
44010004	Konelius kumĩ ado lo fiyekel fen, ĩ to fen, “Odug, ere?” Engel ĩ irokenen, “Ogon kosẽ ado wau sã maleg tamo bun agodig are, Negur wagen sesewi fiya gen isele di, Negur wau kulĩ yen.
44010005	Gama tamo tunĩ Jopa taun sur wodi di, dile, tamo taka yana Simon, Pita dedig dirou disiyouf.
44010006	Ĩ gaar gabar el fiya tamo Simon ado dibodok, Simon nẽ fõ are maaĩ yerin ibodok.”
44010007	Engel Konelius od wogõ fiyekel fen, ĩ itornẽ di, Konelius yogon kabĩ tamo uru ado kusĩ tamo taka iweignẽdin, kusĩ tamo are Negur yana yalesedig ado Konelius aruna daledig anidi taka.
44010008	Konelius ĩ, ereb wõ yen anĩ ganan irokeneĩd le fen, Jopa taun sur fedin.
44010009	Naa anĩ ile di, idi naab diyok dile, Jopa taun kelẽ difiyẽ mog, Pita kosẽ youf nigin, fõ sokoron iselen, are gaa atun age fiya.
44010010	Pita ĩ naũ fe di, ereb taka yõya nigin oron. Saaf dodok dife mog, ĩ mulã fe di, yen mog, mala seleulã kurã fen.
44010011	Ĩ, saa kã fele di, anenem ereb taka gabar odug gen, iri aiwa adodo kaleya bun irou fen, tenebur folõ fele di, isil mog, ilen.
44010012	Anĩ namen, gaar fire fire yeid imeid adodo, gaar luwedim diyõdig ado, ninã ilun temeleid dibodon.
44010013	Anĩ ait taka Pita irokenen, “Pita, fã wale, udenkeis fen, wõ.”
44010014	Anĩ ere, Pita iron, “Odug, sã bagai! Aya sesen amuyẽ adodo yõya nigin katũ difaman taka to bagai õdig.”
44010015	Ait anĩ baban Pita wogõ fiyen, “Ereb taka Negur ĩ amuyẽ sã inon anĩ, to amuyẽ ado wouf.”
44010016	Agef towo fe fen, kaisã bagai gabar kel yale, saa ilun irou iselen.
44010017	Pita mala seleulã kurãf fen, ilen anĩ nẽ gariya nigin, nene ye kisif mog, Konelius tamo sur fedin idi, Simon nẽ fõ nain be ifaref anĩ to dife kelei ken, dile, fõ bobogẽ difaren.
44010018	Idi diweig fen, Simon, yana taka Pita dedig an ibodok be anĩ to difen.
44010019	Pita ĩ mala seleulã kurãf fen, ilen anĩ nigin fau kisif mog, Awa Uur ĩ irokenen, “Simon, tamo towo õ dimirnok.
44010020	Ani nigin, fã wale, tenebur kutũ weis usil. Idi geid ileya nigin to utor, ere nigin, ayam idi sur afedin.”
44010021	Pita kutũ yeis isil fen, idi irokenẽdin, “Aya anĩ umirnagef. Anĩ ã ere nigin usigel?”
44010022	Idi diron, “Amã Konelius kusĩ tamo neid orowa takam sur famã di, masil. Ĩ madur tamo, Negur nigin anini yedig. Juda tamo kayau ganan, ĩ tamo biya difiyẽdig. Engel fateul, õ Konelius nẽ fõ bun ule fen, õ urõf anĩ Konelius karĩ youf nigin ĩ irokenen.”
44010023	Age de di, Pita, idi bõ anĩ bun an denẽf nigin, aabẽ geif iroulen. We fele di, Pita ĩ fã yale, tamo anidi weim dilen. Jopa taun temeleid kabĩ tura tar tunĩg, Pita geid weim dilen.
44010024	Naa anĩ ile di, Pita Sisaria taun wõ yen. Konelius idi tari feid fen, ĩ yogon sirag tar ado mou tar melsã difaref anidi geid iweig laisi difaren.
44010025	Pita Konelius nẽ fõ aaben isour iroule di, Konelius ĩ tarabã fiye ken, ĩ yogo lai feis, ye gariyan bobou fen.
44010026	Anĩ ere, Pita ĩ yalesne ken, iron, “Ufar, ayag tamo maug.”
44010027	Pita Konelius aaben wogõ fiyek dile fen, tamo kayau musei guru difen anĩ iledin.
44010028	Pita idi irokenẽdin, “Ã aug keleĩ bagai, Juda tamo taka, haiden tamo taka ado nigal difouf be, ĩ ki fiyẽf, are lo wal fiya. Anĩ ere, aya, tamo taka sane be, amuyẽ ado be, to age auf nigin, Negur aya mogo ifelnan.
44010029	Anĩ nigin, aya uweignag fen, tamo sur wedigen sain, aya wau uruya sã asil. Anĩ nigin, aya to ayeik, ere nigin ã uweignagen?”
44010030	Konelius iron, “Naa fo mogo ilelen, sain anĩ bun, aya neu fõ bun sain eig fe mog, tri kilok aragau kosẽ aun. Kaisã bagai, tamo taka kolos medeĩya ado, wageun ifar fen,
44010031	iron, ‘Konelius, Negur, ogon kosẽya karĩ yen ado, maleg bun ogon wau sã ifenẽya anĩ karĩ yelen.
44010032	Anĩ nigin, oun Jopa taun, tamo Simon, yana taka Pita dedig gein, tamo sur wo di, idi Pita õ bun isiyouf nigin dirokenẽf. Ĩ gaar gabar el fiya tamo Simon nẽ fõ maaĩ yerin ifaref an ibodok.’
44010033	Anĩ nigin, aya kaisã bagai õ bun tamo sur afedin, õ usil are de agol. Odug, urokanamãf nigin irokonon anĩ ganan karĩ mauf nigin, amã ganan Negur mala bun gama yeir.”
44010034	Age ye di, Pita iron, “Aya gama momoi bagai keleĩ, are Negur ĩ taka nigin dogol to wau yenẽdig,
44010035	anĩ ere, teneub ganan bun, tamo taka ĩ Negur nigin anini ye fen, tobonunã biya age fedig are, Negur ĩ nigin wau yenek.
44010036	Israel tamo kayau bun, Negur od sur fen anĩ ã keleĩ, biya od eig ye wogõ yen, Jesus Kristus, ĩ ganan neid Odug, ĩ bunem maur gudũ fiya wõ yen.
44010037	Ã keleĩ, Jon naan igunẽdiya nigin od wogõ yele di, Galili distrik oun gariya ino fen, Judia distrik ganan bun ereb wõ yen anĩ.
44010038	Ã keleĩ, Negur, Jesus Nasaret tamal bun, Awa Uur Fateul ado megeir fi fele di, Jesus iyo ken, tobonunã biya agef fen, Satan nẽ megeir farumen dibodok anidi ganan el fiyẽdin, ere nigin, Negur ĩ ado ibodon.
44010039	“Amã, Jerusalem ado Juda neid teneub bun, ereb Jesus age fen anĩ ganan malamã mailen. Idi ĩ aa tetek bun dũ di, laa fen.
44010040	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ naa towo ilele di, laa bun tamal ĩ turĩ fiyẽ di, tamo kayau dilouf nigin age fen.
44010041	Anĩ ere, tamo kayau ganan ĩ dilouf nigin to age fen, Negur mogo igirnẽdin anidim dogol dilouf nigin age fen, are amam Jesus laa bun tamal mata kel fã ye fen, weim saaf ado naan mon anim.
44010042	Ĩ, amã tamo kayau biya od wogõ mafiyeĩd fen, Jesus ĩ mata nẽ ado laa nẽ es fiya tamo ĩ Negurem igirnen anĩ, kurõ mafesiyouf nigin irokanaman.
44010043	Profet ganan ĩ nigin kurõ difeis wogõ den, are taka ĩ Jesus nigin momoi youf are, Jesus yana bunem yogon mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.”
44010044	Pita ĩ fau od enei wogõ ye mog, Awa Uur Fateul od karĩ den anidi ganan bun isin.
44010045	Juda momoiya tamo mulũ bun temeleid Pita geid disin idi, Negurem Awa Uur Fateul wau sã haiden buneg fi fele di, dile fen, terefeit den.
44010046	Ere nigin, haiden idi od fire fire bun wogõ de, Negur yana dales mog, karĩ den. Age dife di, Pita iron,
44010047	“Taka nem, tamo kayau eneidi naan igunẽdiya nigin katũ fediyouf de? Idi amã Awa Uur Fateul malen age fiya bagai dalel.”
44010048	Anĩ nigin, Pita, idi Jesus yana bunem naan digunẽdiyouf nigin irokenẽdin. Age fe di, Pita idi geid naa tunĩ dibodõf nigin idi Pita dirokenen.
44011001	Aposel ado, momoiya tamo kayau Judia distrik ganan bun dibodon anidi, haiden idig Negur nẽ od dalen yeya anĩ karĩ den.
44011002	Sain Pita Jerusalem isele di, Juda momoiya tamo mulũ bun temeleid kekeir od diroken ken,
44011003	diron, “Õ haiden mulũ to dilen neid fõ bun ule fen, weim saaf wõgen.”
44011004	Age de di, Pita gariya ino, ereb ereb ganan wõ yen anĩ dir fe faded fiyẽdin,
44011005	“Aya Jopa taun abod ken, kosẽ au mog, aya mulam malau gelele fe, malau seleulã kurãf fen, ailen. Aya ereb taka gabar odug gen, iri aiwa adodo kaleya bun irou fen, saa ilun tamal, aya abodon nẽ an folõ fele di, isil mog, ailen.
44011006	Aya anĩ fele afe fen, tenebur tamal gaar fire fire yeid imeid adodo, gaar kuĩ, gaar luwedim diyõdig ado, ninã ilun temeleid ailedin.
44011007	Agef fen, ait taka karĩ au mog, irokanan, ‘Pita, fã wale, udenkeis fen, wõ.’
44011008	“Anĩ ere, aya aron, ‘Odug, sã bagai! Aya sesen amuyẽ adodo yõya nigin katũ difaman taka to bagai õ ailen.’
44011009	“Ait anĩ baban saa ilunem wogõ yen, ‘Ereb taka Negur ĩ amuyẽ sã inon anĩ, to amuyẽ ado wouf.’
44011010	Agef towo fe fen, anĩ ganan baban kel dĩf, saa ilun irou iselen.
44011011	“Sain anĩ bun bagai, tamo towo aya gein Sisariam sur difedin idi, fõ aya abodõdig nẽ an wõ den.
44011012	Awa Uur aya idi weim ileya to atorõf nigin irokanan. Kabĩ turau tar sigis eneidig, aya weim mele, tamo anĩ nẽ fõ namen melen.
44011013	Age mafe di, ĩ engel taka naig be fe fen, yogon fõ bun wõ ye fen, eig ye irokenen, ‘Jopa taun oun, Simon yana taka Pita dedig gein tamo sur woid.
44011014	Õ ado ogon ibor tar ganan kel gei yeĩf nigin, ĩ od õ gein irou isiyouf,’ ye di, ilen anĩ irokanaman.
44011015	“Aya od gariya ano, wogõ au mog, Awa Uur Fateul uruwa bun ada bun isin gen, idi buneg agef isin.
44011016	Age fe di, aya Odug eig ye iron anĩ, wederou fokõ yen, ‘Jon ĩ naanem igunẽdin, anĩ ere, ã Awa Uur Fateulem iguneĩf.’
44011017	Anĩ nigin, ada Odug Jesus Kristus nigin momoi tau di, Negur wau sã ege luwa ifanadan anĩ, idig ifenẽdin anĩ youf are, aya ai nigin Negur naabura gudũ afiyẽf?”
44011018	Idi od enei karĩ de fen, idi kekeir od ditor ken, Negur yana dales diron, “Age fiyauf are, Negur ĩ haiden idig waud falei de fen, mata bun dilauf anĩ ifenẽdin.”
44011019	Stiwen dukesin sain bun, kafĩ fiya wõ ye di, momoiya tamo kayau firagagaũ dife fen, tunĩ Fonisia distrik, Saipras nuyo ado, Antiok taun dile fen, Juda tamo kayau bun dogol biya od wogõ difiyẽdin.
44011020	Anĩ ere, idi tunĩ Saipras nuyo ado Sairini taun temeleid, Antiok taun dile fen, Grik tamo kayau buneg wogõ de fen, Odug Jesus nigin biya od dirokenẽdin.
44011021	Odug nẽ megeir idi adon, age fe di, tamo kayau musei momoi de fen, Odug bun falei den.
44011022	Od enei, Jerusalem taun oun sios bun iyokele di, idi Banabas Antiok taun sur difiyen.
44011023	Banabas an wõ ye, Negur wau ifenẽdin anĩ ilen, ĩ kulĩ ye fen, idi waud adok Odug bun momoi dibodõf nigin ganan waud yalesen.
44011024	Banabas ĩ tamo biya, Awa Uur Fateul ado momoiya barikã. Tamo kayau musei Odug bun geif iroulen.
44011025	Age dife di, Banabas Sol imirnẽf nigin Tasus ilen.
44011026	Banabas Sol fotou fiye ken, Sol Antiok taun irou isin. Agef fen, Banabas Sol ado yar tekelei adok, sios geid dibod ken, tamo kayau musei difelnẽdin. Antiok an, dõ fiya tar anidi bun yana mata dun, are Kristen den.
44011027	Sain anĩ bun, profet tunĩ Jerusalem anenem Antiok disin.
44011028	Idi neid taka, yana Agabus fã ye fen, Awa Uur bunem profet od wogõ yen, kadir odug Rom teneub ganan bun iyokalauf yen. (Sisa Klodius nẽ sain bun, kadir enei wõ yen.)
44011029	Dõ fiya tar, idi mugu mugu, dogo neid megeir bunem, momoiya tamo kayau Judia distrik bun dibodon anidi disennẽdiyouf nigin, kisi difon.
44011030	Idi enei age de fen, moni wau sã Banabas Sol ado imeid bun dino, sios nẽ uyu irouya anidi bun sur difen.
44012001	Sain anĩ bun, King Herod sios bun temeleid tunĩ kafĩ fiya ifenẽdiyouf nigin, gei fedin.
44012002	Ĩ irõ di, Jon tura Jems dimig nem dukesin.
44012003	Herod ĩ Jems laa fe di, Juda tamo kayau waud al fen anĩ ile fen, ĩ Pitag dalouf nigin ari fedin. Enei are, Bret Yis Sã Sifa sain bun wõ yen.
44012004	Idi Pita dale di, ĩ kalabus bun inenen, ĩ kusĩ tamo mala aiwa adodo, mala mugu mugu kusĩ tamo aiwa adodom lo difouf nigin idi imeid bun inon. Herod ĩ, Pasa naa ilele di, ganan meleid bun, Pita kot bun inenẽf nigin kisi yalen.
44012005	Anĩ nigin, Pita kalabus bun dinenẽ ibodon, anĩ ere, sios idi Pita nigin Negur totol bagai kosẽ difiyen.
44012006	Herod ĩ Pita fau nil kot bun ifarauf ye mog, bõ anĩ bun, Pita sen uru nem ifokeleya ado kusĩ tamo uru atun mulã yenen, kalabus bobog lo fiya tamo, bobog tari de difaren.
44012007	Kaisã bagai, Odug nẽ engel wõ ye di, kalabus Pita ibodon aab namen fula felen. Agef fen, engel Pita siri yu ken, turĩ fiyẽ iron, “Gama nem, fã wale!” Age fe di, Pita ima bun tamal sen irokakakesin.
44012008	Age fe di, engel Pita irokenen, “Ogon let luwã gu fen, sendel ufounkel.” Age fele di, engel Pita irokenen, “Ogon kolos meluk ufounkel, dõ wiya.”
44012009	Pita engel dõf kalabus bun tamal ilen, anĩ ere, ĩ engel age fen are, momoi bagai be anĩ to kelein, ĩ malau seleulã kurã fe di, ailef yen.
44012010	Idi, kusĩ tamo kalabus bobog lo difedig uyulil ado anĩ dõ fiya, wal difeid fen, taun isileya ain bobog bun disi di, sukar are yogo kã fel kenẽdin, age fe di, idi ulolõ desin. Idi naab taka luwe diyok disil fen, kaisã bagai engel Pita itornen.
44012011	Age fe di, Pita weder fokõf mã, iron, “Momoi bagai aya gama keleĩ, Odug engel sur fe di, aya Herod nẽ megeir bun ado Juda tamo idi ereb wõya nigin kisi difen anĩ ganan bun tamal yalelnal.”
44012012	Enei nigin weder fokõ yel fen, Pita ĩ, Jon yana taka Mak dedig sina Maria nẽ fõ bun ilen, an tamo kayau musei guru de fen, kosẽ def dibodon.
44012013	Pita fõ sukar godu godu fe di, kabĩ kayau taka yana Roda dedig sukar kã fouf nigin isin.
44012014	Ĩ Pita ait karĩ ye fen, fatuk bagai kulĩ ye fen, ĩ sukar kã fiya sã, kel gudu ref ile fen, iron, “Pita yeir bobogẽ ifaref!”
44012015	Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Õ wadak.” Anĩ ere, kayau ĩ totol bagai ino fen, agef irõ di, idi diron, “Are Pita nẽ engel.”
44012016	Age de mog, Pita ĩ fau fau sukar godu godu fe di, idi sukar kã difel, Pita dile fen, terẽ den.
44012017	Pita foro dalauf nigin imam dogol fiyeĩd le fen, Odug ĩ kalabus bun tamal yalis irou isil anĩ faded fiyeĩd fen, iron, “Jems tura tar geid od enei urokenẽdigouf.” Age ye fen, Pita idi itorneĩd, uyu takã ilen.
44012018	Bonimei di, kusĩ tamo Pita to dile fen, fatuk bagai nene de, abob to difen.
44012019	Herod Pita dimirnẽf nigin irokenẽdin, anĩ ere, idi ĩ to fotou difiyẽn. Age dife di, Herod kalabus lo fiya tamo Pita lo difen idi to fiyeĩd le fen, kalabus lo fiya tamo anidi didenkesiyouf nigin irokenẽdin. Agef fen, Herod Judia distrik bun tamal Sisaria taun ile, sain naal an ibodon.
44012020	Herod ĩ, Taia ado Saidon taun tamo kayau nigin name fatuk bagai sanen, anĩ ere, gama idi waud tekelei fen, Herod dilouf nigin disin. Uyulil idi Blastus, king nẽ ibodõya modoũ nẽ lo fiya mudur, ĩ idi isennẽdiyouf nigin dirokenẽ di, Blastus yo yen. Age de fen, idi Herod garan dile, maur gudũ fiya nigin dirokenen, ere nigin, idi king nẽ akor bun tamal saaf daledig.
44012021	Naa inon anĩ bun, Herod ĩ king nẽ kolos ifounkel, king nẽ sia bun ibod ken, tamo kayau od wogõ fiyẽdin.
44012022	Tamo kayau diweig diron, “Eĩ waitou ait, tamo nẽ sã.”
44012023	Kaisã bagai, Odug nẽ engel Herod yũ iran, ere nigin, ĩ Negur yana to yalesen. Ĩ mamatem dõ di, laa fen.
44012024	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ od bilalaũ fel iyokelen.
44012025	Banabas Sol ado, dogo neid kabĩ bure difel fen, Jerusalemem keku de disin, idi Jon, yana taka Mak dedig dale fen, weim disin.
44013001	Antiok sios bun, profet ado tise difaren, are Banabas, Simeon yana taka Karos dedig, Lusius Sairini taun tamal, Manain (ĩ king Herod ado bibiyedin) ado, Sol.
44013002	Idi Odug yana dales fen, kuri de mog, Awa Uur Fateul idi irokenẽdin, “Banabas Sol ado kabĩ aya agirkenẽdin anĩ dalouf nigin, gadi weleid kanag.”
44013003	Anĩ nigin, idi kuri de kosẽ del, imeid idi tetedin dino fen, sur difedin.
44013004	Awa Uur Fateul, Banabas Sol ado sur fedi di, idi Selusia taun dile fen, anenem waag dale, Saipras nuyo dilen.
44013005	Idi Salamis taun wõ de fen, Negur nẽ od Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun wogõ den. Jon idi isennẽdiyouf nigin, ĩ dale weim dilen.
44013006	Idi nuyo anĩ ganan atu diyok dile, Pafos taun wõ den. Idi an idegẽya kosẽ tamo taka, idegẽya profet Juda tamal, yana Bar-Jesus dedig fotou difen.
44013007	Bar-Jesus ĩ nuyo anĩ nẽ gawaman mudur Segius Paulus ado dibodon. Segius Paulus ĩ tamo kisi biya ado. Gawaman mudur ĩ, Negur nẽ od karĩ youf nigin, Banabas Sol ado iweignẽdin.
44013008	Anĩ ere, idegẽya kosẽ tamo Elimas (yana are Grik od nem ‘idegẽya kosẽ tamo’) idi naabureid gudũ fe di, gawaman mudur to momoi youf nigin age fen.
44013009	Age fe di, Sol, yana taka Pol dedig, Awa Uur Fateul barikã, ĩ idegẽya kosẽ tamo lo fiyekel fen, iron,
44013010	“Õ Satan naal, õ Negur nẽ madur fiya ganan nẽ kiwai! Idegẽya ado sesen ganan, õ bun isokosef. Õ ere sain anĩ, Odug nẽ naab madur anĩ, idegẽya bun falei fiyai wodig utorlauf?
44013011	Gama Odug ima, õ teten isif. Õ malã ifofakalauf, õ sain naal meluk, gaa lalan to ulouf.” Kaisã bagai, budũ ado gugum isi, kerub fiyẽ di, ĩ taka nem ima gim fouf nigin, ima ra yef iyon.
44013012	Gawaman mudur ĩ agef wõ yen anĩ ile fen, ĩ momoi yen, ere nigin, ĩ Odug nigin ifelnẽ di, ilen anĩ nigin terẽ yen.
44013013	Pol yogon kabĩ tura tar geid, waag dale, Pafosem, Pamfilia provins oun Perga taun dilen, an Jon idi itorneĩd fen, Jerusalem kel ilen.
44013014	Idi Perga taun anenem, Pisidia distrik nediwon Antiok taun dilen. Sabat naa bun, idi Juda neid uub fõ bun dile dibodon.
44013015	Lo ado profet neid itotoya diwesleid fen, Juda neid uub fõ nẽ mudur adodo, Banabas Pol ado gein od sur dife fen, diron, “Turamã tar, ã tamo kayau waud yaleseya nigin od adouf are, wogõg.”
44013016	Pol fã ye, foro dalauf nigin imam fiyeĩd le fen, iron, “Israel tamo kayau ado, haiden Juda tamo kayau geid Negur nigin anini gedig ã, karĩ wiyag!
44013017	Israel tamo kayau neid Negur, tubumã tar igirneĩd fen, idi Isip dibodon sain, Negurem age fe di, idi fulus difen. Negur ĩ megeir odug nem, idi Isip tamal gurif irou ilen.
44013018	Negur ĩ, foti yar age fiya gerere tuan, idi tobonunã sane age difen anĩ lolou fesif isin.
44013019	Ĩ Kanan teneub bun, tamo ibor sewen adok daũf iraile fen, dogo neid teneub, yogon tamo kayau idi akorouf nigin ifenẽdin.
44013020	Enei ganan fo handred fifti yar age fiya ilelen. “Enei bure fele di, Negur ĩ, Israel tamo kayau es fiya tamo ifenẽdif ile, profet Samuel nẽ sain bun.
44013021	Anĩ bure fele di, tamo kayau king nigin dirõ di, Negur, Sol Kis naal, Benjamin nẽ ibor bun tamal ifenẽdin, Sol foti yar king ibodon.
44013022	Negur Sol yalelne ken, ĩ Dawid idi neid king inenen. Negur Dawid nigin eig ye iron, ‘Aya, Jesi naal Dawid ĩ, tamo aya wau irok kilei anĩ ailen, ĩ ereb ereb ganan, neu oroya yenek anĩ dõf age fouf.’
44013023	“Negur ĩ age afouf yen kilei, Dawid nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar bun tamal, kel yaleya tamo Jesus Israel ifenẽdin.
44013024	Jesus fau isiya sã mog, Jon Israel tamo kayau ganan waud falei ye di, naan igunẽdiyouf nigin od wogõ yen.
44013025	Jon ĩ yogon kabĩ idikalau fenẽ mog, ĩ iron, ‘Aya nigin ã aim gef? Aya tamo ĩ tari gef anim sã. Anĩ ere, ĩ aya dumeun dõ fiyaf, aya to biya nigin yogon su malũ biru fediya kisi feleya sã.’
44013026	“Turau tar, Abraham gere tar ado, haiden ã Negur nigin anini gedig, Negur tamo kayau kel yaleya nẽ od, amã bun sur fen.
44013027	Jerusalem tamo kayau, dogo neid mudur adodo geid, Jesus ado, profet neid od Sabat naa ganan bun diwesedig anĩ to kelei ken, Jesus bouwa bun od dun, anĩ bunem profet neid od kisi fel wõ yen.
44013028	Idi Jesus dukesiyouf nigin, gariya taka to dilen, anĩ ere, idi ĩ dukesiyouf nigin, Pailat dirokenen.
44013029	Idi Jesus nigin Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ ganan, dõ de age difel fen, idi ĩ aa tetek bun tamal dalisne ken, matmat bun dinenen.
44013030	Anĩ ere, Negur Jesus laa bun tamal kel turĩ fe di, mata kel fã yen.
44013031	Agef fen, Jesus, tamo idi, ĩ geid Galili teneub bun tamal Jerusalem dilen anidi bun, naa musei wõ yen. Idi anidim gama, tamo kayau bun, ĩ nigin wogõ def dilef.
44013032	“Amã biya od ã marokeneik, Negur tubumã tar age afouf fiyẽdin are,
44013033	Jesus kel turĩ fiyen anĩ bunem, amã idi gereneid tar kisi fel naman. Sam tu bun itotoya yenek kilei: “‘Õ neu Kesu, aya gama õ Tamã wõ aul.’
44013034	Negur ĩ laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiyẽ di, ĩ to bagai bura lauf nigin, Negur eig ye iron: “‘Aya momoi bagai nẽ ado fateul nẽ el fiya, are aya Dawid afenẽf aun anĩ, ã afeneĩf.’
44013035	Negur nẽ Itotoya taka buneg eig ye irok: “‘Õ ogon Fateul Tamo to utorõ di, bura lauf.’
44013036	“Dawid ĩ yogon sain bun, Negur nẽ oroya anĩ aruna yale fen, laa fen. Ĩ tubu tar geid mũ dife di, bouwa bura len.
44013037	Anĩ ere, Negurem laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen ĩ, bura leya san.
44013038	“Anĩ nigin, turau tar, ã keleĩ youf, Jesus bunem mosor weder tu keleya nigin od wogõ yeik.
44013039	Tamo ganan Jesus nigin momoi def, mosor ganan yalelkeneĩd fen, madur fedif, anĩ ere, Moses nẽ Lo bunem, tamo neid mosor ganan yalelkeneĩd fen, madur fediya kisi feleya sã.
44013040	Anĩ nigin, profet wogõ den anĩ, ã bun to wõ youf nigin lo weleg:
44013041	“‘Ulegef, ã kono fiya tamo! Terẽg fen, gare gouf, ere nigin, aya ãgenei sain bun ereb taka age afouf, are taka nem irokeneĩfeg, ã to bagai momoi gouf.’ ”
44013042	Pol Banabas ado, Juda neid uub fõ ditor dile mog, tamo kayau, Sabat naa taka bun, od enei baban tobol difouf nigin dirokenẽdin.
44013043	Tamo kayau dilele di, Juda tamo kayau musei ado, haiden Juda neid momoiya bun falei de fen, Negur nigin anini dedig musei idi, Pol Banabas ado dõ difedin. Age dife di, Pol Banabas ado weim wogõ de fen, idi Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bun toku dibodõf nigin waud dalesen.
44013044	Sabat naa taka bun, taun dibodõdig anidi musei ganan, Odug nẽ od karĩ douf nigin guru difen.
44013045	Anĩ ere, Juda tamo idi, tamo kayau guru difen anidi dileid fen, kiyeim aura fiyẽdi di, Pol wogõ yen anĩ nigin kiwai difen ken, kono difiyen.
44013046	Age dife di, Pol Banabas ado kumĩ sã wogõ eig de diron, “Amã Negur nẽ od, ã bun ketem sã wogõ mayeim. Anĩ ere, ã Negur nẽ od utorõg fen, amã to biya nigin mata faimud ibodkeleya to malouf gen. Anĩ nigin, amã gama haiden gedin melef.
44013047	Are Odug eig ye irokanaman: “‘Aya õ haiden neid lalan anenon, anĩ bunem, teneub idikelediya bun, tamo kayau usenneĩd, kel gei wediyouf.’ ”
44013048	Haiden idi od enei karĩ de fen, waud kulĩ ye, Odug nẽ od seli dabin. Mata faimud ibodkeleya nigin igirnẽdin anidi ganan momoi den.
44013049	Age dife di, Odug nẽ od, teneub anĩ ganan bun iyokelen.
44013050	Anĩ ere, Juda tamo idi, haiden kayau yeneid adodo Negur nigin anini dedig ado, taun uyu irouya tamo anidi nameid dalesen. Idi Pol Banabas ado darau difenẽdiyouf nigin, tamo kayau nameid dalese di, dogo neid teneub bun tamal dirudidin.
44013051	Anĩ nigin, Pol Banabas ado, idi neid tobonunã sane anĩ difelnẽdi di, keleĩ youf nigin, yeid aas tu difel fen, Ikonium taun dilen.
44013052	Dõ fiya tar idi, kulĩya ado Awa Uur Fateul barikan.
44014001	Oun Ikonium taun, Pol Banabas ado, idi gai age difedig gen, Juda neid uub fõ bun dile fen, an tamo waud yaleya bun wogõ de di, Juda tamo kayau ado Grik tamo kayau musei momoi den.
44014002	Anĩ ere, Juda tamo momoiya sã anidim, haiden idi nameid dalese di, haiden idi, momoiya tamo kayau kiwai difenẽdin.
44014003	Anĩ nigin, Pol Banabas ado, sain meluk an dibod ken, Odug nigin kumĩ sã wogõ den. Age dife di, Odug ĩ, idi memelik uris ado dinodiyouf nigin, megeir ifenẽdin, anĩ bunem, Odug yogon wau ifenẽya nẽ od anĩ megeir fen.
44014004	Tamo kayau taun temeleid faraf fen, tunĩ Juda tamo geideid, tunĩ aposel geid.
44014005	Age de fen, Juda tamo ado haiden, dogo neid uyu irouya geid, aposel to biya difiyeĩd fen, meein tulu difiyẽdiyouf nigin age difen.
44014006	Anĩ ere, aposel idi anĩ kelei ken, idi diya, Likonia distrik nediwon Listra taun, Derbe taun, anĩ kalilĩ fiya bun diyok dile fen,
44014007	an biya od wogõ den.
44014008	Oun Listra taun, tamo taka ye ilolaisin ibodon, ĩ sina namenem ye ilolaisin wõ yen, anĩ to iyõdig.
44014009	Ĩ, Pol od wogõ ye mog, karĩ fiyen. Pol ĩ lo fiyekel fen, ĩ bouwa biya lauf nigin momoiya ado anĩ ile fen,
44014010	Pol ait odugem iweig iron, “Fã wale ufar!” Age ye di, ĩ gurusã ye, iyok ilen.
44014011	Tamo kayau musei Pol age fen anĩ dile fen, Likonia od nem diweig diron, “Waitou tamo falei difel fen, ada gein disil!”
44014012	Idi Banabas ĩ Sus difiye ken, Pol ĩ Hermes difiyen, ere nigin, Pol ĩ ait ado tamo.
44014013	Waitou Sus nẽ tempel, taun yerin ibodon. Waitou Sus nẽ pris, bulmakau bobõ gĩ fediya adodo, taun bobogẽ irou isin, ere nigin, ĩ tamo kayau musei geid, aposel sesewi fiya difenẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
44014014	Anĩ ere, aposel Banabas Pol ado, anĩ karĩ de fen, dogo neid kolos serek difeid fen, tamo kayau musei atun gududu de dile diweig diron,
44014015	“Tamo kayau, ã ere nigin enei ago gef? Amãg tamo maug, ã gen. Amã ã gein biya od marou masif, are ã kaũ sã enei utorõg fen, mata ibodõya Negur ĩ, saa, teneub, maaĩ ado, anidi namen ereb ereb ganan inodin, ĩ bun falei gouf nigin marokeneik.
44014016	Kulu Negur ĩ tamo kayau teneub ganan bun itornẽdi di, dogo neid oroya dõ difen.
44014017	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ yogo nigin yaor fiya to itor ken, faimud ereb ereb biya age fedig anĩ bunem, yogo nigin yaor fedig. Ĩ saa bunem uyẽ ado, saaf dogo neid sain dõf fen, ifeneĩdig. Ĩ saaf musei biya ifenei ken, wauĩ bun kulĩya ifeneĩdig.”
44014018	Od enei nemeg, tamo kayau musei aposel sesewi difenẽdiyouf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, aposel idi naabureid gudũ difenẽdiyouf nigin lakĩ difen.
44014019	Age dife di, Juda tamo tunĩ, Antiok ado Ikonium taun temeleid disi fen, tamo kayau musei waud dalen. Age de fen, idi Pol meein tulu difiyẽ, laa fel de fen, taun yerin diror diroulen.
44014020	Anĩ ere, dõ fiya tar guru de, Pol salili difiyẽ di, ĩ fã yale fen, baban taun kel ilen. Naa taka di, ĩ Banabas ado Derbe taun dilen.
44014021	Idi taun anĩ bun biya od wogõ de fen, dõ fiya tar musei dalen. Age difel fen, idi Listra, Ikonium ado, Antiok taun keku de dile,
44014022	dõ fiya tar megeir difiyeĩd fen, idi momoiya bun dibodõf nigin waud dalesen. Idi diron, “Ada Negur nẽ tano bun ileya nigin, morõ musei talouf bagai.”
44014023	Pol Banabas ado, sios mugu mugu bun, uyu irouya digirneĩd fen, kosẽya ado kuriya bunem, Odug idi ĩ nigin momoi dedig, ĩ ima bun dinenẽdin.
44014024	Idi Pisidia distrik atu diyok dile, Pamfilia provins bun wowã den.
44014025	Age de fen, idi Perga taun an od wogõ del fen, Atalia taun disilen.
44014026	Idi Ataliam waag dale, Antiok keku de dilen, kulu an, sios, kabĩ gama bure difelel anĩ nigin, aposel idi Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bun dinenẽdin.
44014027	Idi Antiok taun wowã de fen, sios kuru difeid fen, Negur idi bunem ereb age fen anĩ ganan ado, Negur ĩ haiden momoi douf nigin sukar kã fen anĩ, wogõ difiyẽdin.
44014028	Age dife fen, idi, dõ fiya tar geid, sain meluk an dibodon.
44015001	Tamo tunĩ, Judia distrik bun temeleid Antiok taun disi fen, momoiya tamo kayau eig de difelnẽdin, “Ã Moses nẽ tobonunã kilei, mulũ to ulagauf are, ã kel gei yeĩya kisi feleya sã.”
44015002	Od enei nigin, idi Pol Banabas ado geid fatuk bagai fefe de fen, luwa diroun. Anĩ nigin, momoiya tamo kayau enei nigin Jerusalem disel fen, aposel ado uyu irouya geid to difiyẽdiyouf nigin, Pol Banabas ado momoiya tamo tunĩ geid digirnẽdin.
44015003	Sios idi sur difedi di, Fonisia ado Samaria distrik atu dile fen, haiden idi Negur bun falei den anĩ dirokenẽdin. Od eneim, momoiya tamo kayau ganan fatuk bagai kulĩ den.
44015004	Idi Jerusalem wõ de di, sios, aposel geid, uyu iroudiya anidim idi aan difiyẽdin. Age dife di, Negur idi bunem ereb age fen anĩ ganan, sios, aposel geid, uyu iroudiya wogõ difiyẽdin.
44015005	Age dife di, momoiya tamo tunĩ Farisia mala bun temeleid, fã de fen, diron, “Haiden idi mulũ dile fen, Moses nẽ Lo dõ difouf nigin dirokenẽdiyouf bagai.”
44015006	Age de di, aposel idi, uyu iroudiya geid, od enei nigin guru de katõ difen.
44015007	Od musei sain meluk katõ difen sain, Pita fã yale irokenẽdin, “Turau tar, ã keleĩ, kulu, sain taka bun, haiden idi aya sigorou bun biya od karĩ de fen, momoi douf nigin, ã atun Negur aya igirnan.
44015008	Negur ĩ, tamo nẽ wau keleĩ, ĩ Awa Uur Fateul, ada ifanadan gen, haiden idig ifenẽdin anĩ bunem, idig yaledin anĩ ifelnẽdin.
44015009	Negur, ada ado idi geid atun daũ taka to inon, ere nigin, momoiya bunem ĩ waud kulo feledin.
44015010	Anĩ ere, ere nigin ã gama Negur kisi wiyẽg fen, morõ adag age fiya, tubuda tareg faali fiya kisi feleya san anĩ, dõ fiya tar tetedin unogouf nigin ago gef?
44015011	Sã! Ada, idi agef kel gei fedif gen, neda Odug Jesus nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem, adag agef kel gei fadaf anĩ momoi tauf.”
44015012	Tamo kayau ganan guru difen anidi ganan foro del fen, Banabas Pol ado, Negur idi bunem memelik ado uris fire fire haiden atun inodin anĩ wogõ de di, karĩ den.
44015013	Idi wogõ dele di, Jems ĩ iron, “Neu turau tar, karĩ wiyag.
44015014	Simon mogo faded fadal, are Negur ĩ yogo yana nigin ye fen, haiden atun tamo kayau yaledin anĩ bunem, ĩ urug bagai haiden nigin wau yenen anĩ ifelnadan.
44015015	Profet neid od are, enei ado susu felef, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok kilei:
44015016	“‘Enei dumen, aya kelau fen, Dawid nẽ salafat kubũ yen anĩ baban alesauf. Aya sesen ledin anĩ madur afeleid fen, baban anouf,
44015017	anĩ bunem, tamo kayau ganan atun tunĩ ado, haiden ganan neu nigin agirnẽdin geid, Odug dimirnẽf.’
44015018	Odug ĩ enei kulu bagai yaor fen, ĩ anĩ agef irok.
44015019	“Anĩ nigin, neu es fiya bun, ada haiden Negur bun falei def anidi, morõ to tafenẽdiyouf.
44015020	Age fiya ban, ada pas tatot fen, idi saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen anĩ to dãf nigin, noli tobonunã bun to dilauf nigin, yaro uleid kakã difeid fen, didenkesif anĩ to dãf nigin ado, yaro naud adodo to dãf nigin torokenẽdiyouf.
44015021	Ere nigin, sain meluk bagai, Moses nẽ Lo taun ganan bun wogõ de fen, Sabat naa ganan bun Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun diwesedig.”
44015022	Age ye di, aposel idi, uyu iroudiya ado, sios ganan geid, idi atun tamo tunĩ digirneĩd fen, Pol Banabas ado weim Antiok taun sur difediyouf nigin kisi difon. Idi Judas (yana taka Basabas dedig) ado Sailas digirnẽdin, tamo uru anidi, momoiya tamo kayau atun, idi uyu irouya.
44015023	Idi bun pas eig de ditoton anĩ sur difen: Amã aposel, uyu iroudiya geid, ãgenei tureĩ tar, haiden bun temeleĩ turamã tar Antiok taun, Siria ado, Silisia provins bun ubodõgef aan mayeik.
44015024	Amã nemã tamo tunĩ, yoya to dale fen, dile, idi neid wogõya bunem gelele diyei ken, wauĩ morõ difenein anĩ, amã karĩ maun.
44015025	Anĩ nigin, amã ganan kisi tekelei mano fen, tamo tunĩ magirneĩd fen, nemã oboimã tar bagai Banabas Pol ado geid ã gein sur mafedif.
44015026	Banabas Pol ado idi, neda Odug Jesus Kristus yana nigin, dogo neid mata itorõya nigin to fese den.
44015027	Anĩ nigin, amã matotkeneik anĩ sigoredim megeir fiya nigin, Judas Sailas ado sur mafedif.
44015028	Awa Uur Fateul, amã geid, kisi tekelei fen, ã bun nun enei teten baban morõ taka to mafeneĩf nigin yo maun:
44015029	Ã saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen anĩ to wãgauf, yaro naud adodo to wãgauf, yaro uleid kakã difeid fen, didenkesif anĩ to wãgauf ado, noli tobonunã bun to ulagauf. Ã enei adok irok kilei sese gouf are, ã nigin deuf. Dabuo.
44015030	Tamo idi sur difedi di, Antiok taun disil, sios kuru difeid fen, pas anĩ difenẽdin.
44015031	Tamo kayau pas anĩ diwes fen, waud yaleseya od anĩ nigin kulĩ den.
44015032	Judas Sailas ado, idi dogo profet, momoiya tamo kayau waud dales fen, megeir difenẽdiyouf nigin od fatuk wogõ den.
44015033	Idi an sain naal meluk dibodon, age dife di, momoiya tamo kayaum waud inosiya ado sur difedi di, idi sur difedin anidi gedin keku de dilen.
44015035	Anĩ ere, Pol Banabas ado Antiok dibodon, an idi tunĩ museig geid fen, Odug nẽ od difelneĩd fen, wogõ den.
44015036	Naa tunĩ ilele di, Pol Banabas irokenen, “Ada keku tau fen, taun ganan Odug nẽ od wogõ tafiyẽdin nẽ an turada tar ki tafiyeĩd fen, idi naig difef anĩ tailauf.”
44015037	Banabas ĩ, Jon yana taka Mak dedig, idi geid dilauf nigin oron,
44015038	anĩ ere, Pol ĩ weim dilauf are to biya ye kisi fen, ere nigin, Jon ĩ Pamfilia provins oun idi itorneĩd fen, idi geid kabĩ to dalef dilen.
44015039	Idi fatuk bagai fe de fen, fara difen. Banabas ĩ Mak yale fen, waag bun Saipras nuyo dilen,
44015040	anĩ ere, Pol ĩ Sailas igirnẽ di, momoiya tamo kayaum Odug nẽ wau ifenẽya bun dinenẽdi di, dilen.
44015041	Ĩ Siria ado Silisia provins atu ile fen, sios megeir fiyẽdif ilen.
44016001	Pol ĩ Derbe taun isi fen, anenem Listra taun ilen, an dõ fiya tamo taka yana Timoti ibodõdig, ĩ sina Juda tamal momoiya kayau, anĩ ere, ĩ tama Grik tamal.
44016002	Momoiya tamo kayau Listra ado Ikonium taun temeleid, Timoti biya difiyẽdig.
44016003	Pol ĩ Timoti ado dilauf nigin oron, anĩ nigin, ĩ, Juda tamo modoũ anĩ bun dibodõdig anidi nigin, Timoti mulũ inenen, ere nigin, idi ganan keleĩ, Timoti ĩ tama Grik tamal.
44016004	Idi taun mugu mugu bun diyok dile fen, oun Jerusalem aposel idi uyu iroudiya tamo geid, tamo kayau dõ difouf nigin od difon anĩ wogõ difiyẽdif dilen.
44016005	Anĩ bunem, sios idi momoiya megeir dale fen, naa ganan momoiya tamo kayau ifagaf ilen.
44016006	Pol yogon kabĩ tura tar geid, Frigia distrik ado Galesia provins bun diyok dilen, ere nigin, Awa Uur Fateul, idi Asia provins bun od wogõya nigin katũ fiyẽdin.
44016007	Idi Misia distrik nẽ daũ bun disi fen, Bitinia provins bun dilauf nigin age difen, anĩ ere, Jesus nẽ Awa Uur ĩ katũ fiyẽdin.
44016008	Anĩ nigin, idi Misia distrik wal dife fen, Troas taun disilen.
44016009	Bõ anĩ bun, Pol mala seleulã kurãf fen, Masedonia provins tamal tamo taka ifar fen, igonen, “Masedonia usi fen, usennamã,” fiyẽ mog, ilen.
44016010	Pol mala seleulã kurãf fen, anĩ ilen, age fel fen, amã kaisã bagai Masedonia provins malauf nigin dodok mafen, ere nigin, amã kisi mafen, Negur idi bun biya od wogõ mauf nigin iweignaman.
44016011	Troas taun anenem, amã waag bunem madur kilei Samotres nuyo melen, naa taka di, Neapolis melen.
44016012	Anenem amã Filipai melen, Filipai are Rom gawamanem lo fedig, Masedonia provins bun taun anĩ uyu irouf. An naa tunĩ mabodon.
44016013	Sabat naa bun, amã taun mator ken, taun bobog serẽ naan yerin an, amã kosẽya nẽ modoũ mamirẽf nigin melen. Amã mabod ken, kayau an guru difen anidi wogõ mafiyẽdin.
44016014	Idi neid taka karĩ faman, kayau anĩ yana Lidia, Taiataira taun tamal, ĩ gabar kadaũ na nigin susur fedig, ĩ Negur yana yalesedig. Odug, ĩ Pol nẽ od karĩ youf nigin wau bun sukar kãf kenen.
44016015	Kayau anĩ yogon ibor tar geid naan diguneĩd kele di, ĩ yogon fõ bun malauf nigin irokanama ken, iron, “Aya Odug nigin momoi auf agef kisi gouf are, umag, neu fõ bun ubodõg.” Ĩ nugo famã di, amã dõ mafiyen.
44016016	Naa taka bun, kosẽya nẽ modoũ bun mele mog, ferfer kayau momoul taka fotou faman, ĩ kaa sane ado, anĩ bunem ereb fau wõ youf anĩ wogõ yedig. Yogon marau tar, ĩ ereb fau wõ youf anĩ wogõ yedig anĩ bunem, moni musei daledig.
44016017	Kayau momoul enei, amã Pol geid dõ fama ken, iweig iron, “Tamo eneidi Negur Ilun Bagai nẽ ferfer tar. Idi ã isennẽya walogouf nẽ naab dirokeneik.”
44016018	Kayau ĩ naa musei age fe di, Pol wau fatuk bagai moro ken, falei ye, kaa sane irokenen, “Jesus Kristus yana bunem, aya ĩ bun tamal ulõ wesiyouf nigin arokonok!” Sain anĩ bun bagai, kaa sane kayau anĩ itornen.
44016019	Ferfer kayau momoul nẽ marau tar, moni yaleya nẽ naab gudũ felen anĩ kelei ken, Pol Sailas ado gei de didũ difeid, maket modoũ bun yeneid adodo tamo gedin dirouledin.
44016020	Idi Rom neid lo es fiya tamo bun guri difeid dile fen, diron, “Tamo eneidi are Juda temeleid, idi neda taun bun morõ odug dinof.
44016021	Idi tobonunã difelnẽdif are neda lo to irok anĩ, ada Rom tamo, anĩ nigin, ada tobonunã enei to talouf, to dõ tafouf.”
44016022	Age de di, tamo kayau, idi geid bagu de fen, Pol Sailas ado kiwai difenẽdin. Age dife di, Rom es fiya tamo kolos dinukaka keneĩd fen, wagagã difediyouf nigin dirokenẽdin.
44016023	Idi fatuk bagai wagagã difiyeĩd kele fen, kalabus bun dinenẽdin. Age dife fen, kalabus lo fiya tamo el fe lo fediyouf nigin dirokenen.
44016024	Kalabus lo fiya tamo od anĩ yale fen, kalabus fõ aab namen ineneĩd fen, yeid aam kotũ feledin.
44016025	Bõ atun age fiya, Pol Sailas ado Negur kosẽ difiye ken, seg dale mog, kalabus tamo ganan karĩ difiyẽdin.
44016026	Kaisã bagai, mimĩ odug fã ye fen, kalabus fõ gariya anĩ guyõ fen. Kaisã bagai, kalabus fõ nẽ sukar ganan kã feleid fen, kalabus tamo ganan bun sen irokaka kalaisi keledin.
44016027	Kalabus lo fiya tamo irik yel fen, kalabus fõ nẽ sukar kã felediya ilen, agef fen, ĩ kisi fen, kalabus tamo diyalelel ye fen, yogon dimig ul feis, yogo bouwa yukesiyouf nigin age fen.
44016028	Anĩ ere, Pol iweig iron, “Õ ogo bouwã to tũ wo! Amã ganan yeir!”
44016029	Kalabus lo fiya tamo yal nigin iweig fen, namen gudu ref ile, Pol Sailas ado yedin kubũ ye, tererẽ yen.
44016030	Agef fen, idi gurif irou, mayarẽ isi fen, to fiyẽdin, “Tamo bibiyeĩ, aya naig afe fen, isennẽya alouf?”
44016031	Idi diron, “Odug Jesus nigin momoi wouf are, õ isennõf, õ ogon ibor tar geid.”
44016032	Age de fen, idi Odug nẽ od, ĩ ado ganan yogon fõ bun dibodon anidi geid, wogõ difiyẽdin.
44016033	Sain anĩ bun bagai bõ, kalabus lo fiya tamo, Pol Sailas ado gurif iroule, bouweid gali gedin anĩ kulo fedin. Age fel fen, kaisã bagai ĩ yogon ibor tar ganan geid, naan digunẽdin.
44016034	Kalabus lo fiya tamo, idi yogon fõ aaben gurif iroule, saaf ifenẽdin. Ĩ wau kulĩya barikan, ere nigin, ĩ Negur nigin momoi yen, yogon ibor tar ganan geid.
44016035	We fele di, Rom es fiya tamo, dogo neid kabĩ tamo anidi bun, kalabus lo fiya tamo gein od sur difen, “Tamo anidi walisneĩd.”
44016036	Age difiyẽ di, kalabus lo fiya tamo Pol irokenen, “Rom es fiya tamo, õ Sailas ado alisneĩf nigin dirokanal. Gama ã wadã ulagauf. Wauĩ inosiya ado ulagauf.”
44016037	Anĩ ere, Pol kabĩ tamo irokenẽdin, “Amã Rom tamo ba, anĩ ere, idi to es difama ken, amã mal atun wagagã difaman. Age dife fen, amã kalabus bun dinenaman. Anĩ gama idi iminẽyan dirumã fenẽ de? Sã! Idi dogo disi, dalisnama ken, dinenamãf.”
44016038	Kabĩ tamo, od enei Rom es fiya tamo dirokenẽdin. Pol Sailas ado idi Rom tamo yeya anĩ karĩ de fen, idi kumĩ den.
44016039	Idi Pol Sailas ado gedin bobo difiyẽdiyouf nigin disi fen, kalabus bun tamal dalis dinenẽdin. Age dife fen, Rom es fiya tamo idi, Pol Sailas ado taun anĩ ditor dilauf nigin dirokenẽdin.
44016040	Pol Sailas ado, kalabus bun tamal ulolõ deis fen, Lidia nẽ fõ bun dilen, idi an momoiya tamo kayau fotou difeid, waud dales le fen, ditorneĩd dilen.
44017001	Pol Sailas ado, Amfipolis ado Apolonia taun atu diyok dile fen, Tesalonika taun wõ den, an Juda neid uub fõ ibodon.
44017002	Pol ĩ gai age fedig gen, Juda neid uub fõ bun ilen. Sabat naa towo bun, ĩ Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok anĩ, tamo kayau geid katõ de, ifelneĩd fen,
44017003	Kristus ĩ darau yale fen, laa bun tamal mata kel fã youf bagai nigin, el fe faded fiyẽdin. Pol iron, “Jesus enei aya ã arokeneik are, ĩ anĩ Kristus.”
44017004	Juda tamo kayau tunĩ karĩ de, momoi de fen, Pol Sailas ado dõ difedin, Grik tamo kayau museig Negur nigin anini dedig ado, kayau yeneid adodo museig age difen.
44017005	Anĩ ere, Juda tamo, Pol Sailas ado kiyeĩ difeneĩd fen, maket modoũ bun tamo sesen tunĩ kuru difeid waud dalese di, tamo kayau guru difalasi fen, taun anĩ bun kakaĩ den. Idi Pol Sailas ado, tamo kayau bun diroulediyouf nigin, Jeson nẽ fõ bun dile dimirnẽdin.
44017006	Anĩ ere, idi Pol Sailas ado to fotou difeid fen, Jeson momoiya tamo tunĩ geid didũ difeid, taun nẽ uyu iroudiya gedin dirouleid fen, diweig diron, “Tamo eneidi teneub ganan bun morõ difenẽdin anĩ gama yeir disin.
44017007	Age dife di, Jeson idi aan fiyeĩd fen, yogon fõ aaben gurif iroulen. Idi ganan Sisa nẽ lo difodul ken, king taka yana Jesus dedig ibodok, age de wogõ dedig.”
44017008	Tamo kayau ado, taun nẽ uyu iroudiya geid, od enei karĩ de fen, ninibur den.
44017009	Age dife fen, taun nẽ uyu iroudiya, Jeson ado tamo tunĩ geid kot na dalouf nigin dirokenẽdi di, na dalen, age difele di, ditornẽdi di, dilen.
44017010	Bo kele di, kaisã bagai momoiya tamo kayau, Pol Sailas ado Berea taun sur difedin. Idi an wõ de fen, Juda neid uub fõ bun dilen.
44017011	An Berea tamo kayau idi, Tesalonika tamo kayau gen sã, idi wedereid dino fen, od karĩ dedig. Idi waud adod fen, od karĩ den, age de fen, idi Pol wogõ yen anĩ, momoi be dilouf nigin, naa ganan Negur nẽ Itotoya felei difedig.
44017012	Juda tamo kayau musei momoi den, age fiya bagai, Grik kayau yeneid adodo musei ado Grik tamo museig momoi den.
44017013	Tesalonika taun an Juda tamo idi, Pol Negur nẽ od oun Berea tauneg irok ya karĩ de fen, idig an dile, tamo kayau nameid dalese di, seye den.
44017014	Age dife di, momoiya tamo kayau, kaisã bagai Pol maaĩ ubun sur difiyen, anĩ ere, Sailas Timoti ado idi an Berea taun dibodon.
44017015	Tamo tunĩ Pol dinenekel fen, weim Atens taun dilen, Pol ĩ, Sailas Timoti ado kaisã bagai ĩ gein disiyouf nigin, irokenẽdi di, idi keku de dilen.
44017016	Pol, oun Atens Sailas Timoti ado tari fedin, agef fen, ĩ idegẽya waitou taun anĩ bun isokosen anĩ ile fen, wau fatuk moron.
44017017	Anĩ nigin, Pol ĩ, Juda tamo kayau ado, Grik tamo kayau Negur nigin anini dedig geid, Juda neid uub fõ bun wageid yalouf nigin od solo difedin, ĩ naa ganan maket modoũ bun, tamo kayau idi dilef disif difedig geideg, wageid yalouf nigin od solo difedin.
44017018	Epikurian ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ ado, Stoik ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩg, Pol geid fefe den. Idi tunĩ to difen, “Golẽ tamal enei, ere od wogõ you fenẽ?” Tunĩ diron, “Ĩ yaũ waitou nigin wogõ yef be.” Idi age de diron, ere nigin, Pol ĩ Jesus nigin ado, laa bun tamal mata kel fãya nigin, biya od wogõ yen.
44017019	Age fe di, idi Pol dale, taun uyu irouya neid guru fiya, yana Areopagus dedig, an dirou dile fen, diron, “Keleĩ mata enei urokanamak anĩ, amã tau keleĩ youf?
44017020	Õ keleĩ mata bagai wederaman urou usif, ereb gariya nigin irok anĩ, amã keleĩ you fenẽ.”
44017021	(Atens tamo kayau ganan ado yaũ tamo kayau an difaredig idi, sain ganan kisi mata mata nigin karĩ yei dedig, wogoĩ dedig, idi kabĩ taka to daledig.)
44017022	Age de di, Pol Areopagus guru fiya atun ifar fen, iron, “Atens tamo, ereb ereb ganan bun, ã waitou karĩ fiyẽya nigin kisi fatuk unogedig anĩ ailef.
44017023	Ere nigin, aya ayo ken, ereb ereb yana walesegedig fele afedin, aya alta takag itotoya enei ado ailen: WAITOU, ADA KELEĨ SÃ ANĨ BUN. Ã keleĩ sã anĩ yana walesegedig nigin, aya yaor afe arokeneik.
44017024	“Negur ĩ, teneub ado ereb ereb ganan anĩ namen difaref inodin, ĩ anĩ, saa ado teneub nẽ Odug nigin, ĩ tamo imedim tempel dinodin anĩ bun to ibodõdig.
44017025	Ĩ ereb taka to lau fedig, anĩ nigin, tamo imam ereb taka ifenẽya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, ĩ yogo tamo ganan mata, si neseya ado, ereb ereb ganan ifenẽdidig.
44017026	Tamo tekelei bunem, ĩ tamo kayau fire fire ganan inodin, idi teneub adok ino yalouf nigin age fen. Ĩ dogo neid sain ifeneĩd fen, idi ibodõya nẽ modoũ daũ fire fire ifenẽdin.
44017027	Tamo ĩ dimirnẽf nigin, imeid ra de dimirek dile, fotou difiyẽf nigin be, ĩ age fen. Anĩ ere, ĩ ada mugu mugu bun gerõ to ibodok.
44017028	‘Ĩ bun ada mata tabod ken, telef tasif tafef, tabodok.’ Ãgenei itotoya tamo tunĩg eig de diron, ‘Ada yogon gere tar.’
44017029	“Age fiya bagai, ada Negur nẽ gere tar, anĩ nigin, ada kisi to eig tauf, waitou ĩ, gol nem, silwa nem, meein nem be, tamo nẽ kisim ado imam malakanon inodig age fiya, to tauf.
44017030	Tamo kayau Negur nigin to kelein sain, idi to kelei ken, age difedig anĩ, Negur to eweid yon, anĩ ere, gama ĩ, tamo kayau adok teneub ganan bun waud falei youf nigin irokenẽdif.
44017031	Ĩ naa inon anĩ bun, ĩ tamo igirnen ĩ bunem, teneub ganan madur fiya bun es fouf. Negur ĩ laa bun tamal mata kel turĩ fe di, fã yen anĩ bunem, enei agef wõ youf anĩ tamo ganan ifelnẽdin.”
44017032	Laa bun tamal mata kel fãya nigin, Pol wogõ yen anĩ karĩ de fen, tunĩ Pol kasã difiyen, anĩ ere, tunĩ diron, “Amã enei nigin baban karĩ mayõ fenẽ.”
44017033	Age de di, Pol guru fiya anĩ itor ilen.
44017034	Tamo tunĩ Pol dõ dife fen, momoi den. Idi atun, Dionisius, guru fiya yana Areopagus neid taka, kayau taka yana Damaris ado, tunĩ geid, dibodon.
44018001	Enei bure fel fen, Pol Atens taun itor ken, Korin taun ilen.
44018002	Pol ĩ, an Juda tamo taka yana Akwila, Pontus provins tamal, fotou fiyen, Akwila ĩ aiwa Prisila ado Italim disi dibod dirubkelen, ere nigin, Sisa Klodius, Juda tamo kayau ganan Rom taun ditorõf nigin totol od irokenẽdin. Pol idi ilediyouf nigin ilen.
44018003	Agef fen, Pol ĩ an idi geid dibod ken, weim kabĩ dalen, ere nigin, ĩg idi gen salafat inoya tamo.
44018004	Sabat naa ganan, Pol Juda neid uub fõ bun, Juda tamo kayau ado Grik tamo kayau geid, od kuruwa difedig, are idi kisi falei de momoi douf nigin age fedig.
44018005	Sailas Timoti ado Masedoniam disi di, Pol ĩ Juda tamo kayau bun, Jesus ĩ anĩ Kristus fiyeĩd fen, wogõ ye kurõ fesin, ĩ yogon sain adok kabĩ anĩ bun inon.
44018006	Anĩ ere, Juda idi Pol kiwai difen ken, kono difiyẽ di, ĩ so fiyeĩd fen, yogon kolos tu fel fen, irokenẽdin, “Ã naudeĩ aug mudureĩ bun ibodõf! Aya to kababal fiyauf. Gama sain enei bunem ilef, aya haiden gedin alauf.”
44018007	Pol age ye fen, Juda neid uub fõ itor ken, Negur yana yalesedig tamo Titius Justus nẽ fõ bun ilen, fõ are Juda neid uub fõ anĩ non.
44018008	Krispus, Juda neid uub fõ nẽ mudur, ĩ yogon ibor ganan geid, Odug nigin momoi den. Korin tamo kayau museig biya od karĩ de fen, momoi den. Age dife di, naan dalen.
