44018009	Bõ taka bun, Pol mala seleulã kurãf fen, Odug ĩ wogõ fiyẽ mog, karĩ yen, “To kumĩ wo, õ od wogõya tobol wof ulauf, ait to ufokalauf,
44018010	ere nigin, aya õ ado. Taka nem to irounokon, tadũ yõf, ere nigin, taun enei bun, neu tamo kayau musei dibodok.”
44018011	Anĩ nigin, Pol ĩ yar tekelei ado ogõ sigis an ibod ken, tamo kayau Negur nẽ od ifelnẽdin.
44018012	Galio ĩ Akaia provins nẽ gawaman mudur ibod mog, Juda tamo kayau idi weim kori de, Pol kiwai difen ken, ĩ kot bun diroulen.
44018013	Idi diron, “Tamo enei neda lo wal fe fen, tamo kayau waud yale di, Negur yana, tobonunã fire bun dalesauf nigin age fef.”
44018014	Pol od wogõ you fenẽ mog, Galio ĩ Juda tamo kayau irokenẽdin, “Juda tamo kayau ã, mosor be, tobonunã sane nigin urokanagauf are, aya ã karĩ yeĩya nigin kisi feleya.
44018015	Anĩ ere, morõ enei, od nigin, yeneid nigin ado, ãgenei lo nigin ouf are, ã aug madur gouf. Aya age fediya to es afouf.”
44018016	Age ye fen, ĩ idi kot bun irudidin.
44018017	Age fe di, idi Juda neid uub fõ mudur Sostenes dale fen, kot fofomala bun dun. Anĩ ere, Galio to eweid yon.
44018018	Pol ĩ oun Korin taun naa musei ibodon. Agef fen, ĩ momoiya tamo kayau itorneĩd fen, Prisila Akwila ado weim waag dale, Siria distrik dilen. Ĩ fau waag sõya sã mog, Senkria taun an yogon fatiya gudũ difelen, ere nigin, ĩ Negur mala bun wau kuturol fen, iron, age afouf yen.
44018019	Idi Efesus taun wowã den, an Pol, Prisila Akwila ado itornẽdin. Pol ĩ yogo Juda neid uub fõ bun ile fen, Juda tamo kayau geid od kuruwa difen.
44018020	Ĩ idi geid sain naal meluk dibodõf nigin dirokenẽ di, itoron.
44018021	Anĩ ere, ĩ ilau fenẽ mã, idi irokenẽdin, “Negur orouf are, aya kelauf.” Age ye fen, ĩ waag bun Efesus taun itor ilen.
44018022	Pol ĩ Sisaria taun kutũ yeis fen, Jerusalem isel, sios aan fiyẽdin. Agef fen, ĩ Antiok taun isilen.
44018023	Pol sain naal an Antiok taun ibodkele fen, anenem fã ye, Galesia provins ado Frigia distrik ganan bun iyo ken, dõ fiya tamo kayau ganan megeir fiyẽdin.
44018024	Sain anĩ bun, Juda tamo taka yana Apolos, Aleksandria fõ morou, Efesus isin. Ĩ keleĩ biya ado tamo, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok anĩ nigin keleĩ biya bagai ado.
44018025	Ĩ Odug nẽ naab anĩ difelnen, age dife di, ĩ totol ado wogõ ye fen, Jesus nigin tutuk bagai ifelnẽdidig, anĩ ere, ĩ Jon nẽ naan igũya anĩ dogol kelein.
44018026	Ĩ Juda neid uub fõ bun, kumĩ sã od wogõ yen. Prisila Akwila ado, ĩ wogõ yen anĩ karĩ de fen, idi ĩ dogo neid fõ bun dale diroule, Negur nẽ naab tutuk faded difiyen.
44018027	Age difel fen, Apolos Akaia provins bun ilauf nigin age fe di, momoiya tamo kayau idi ĩ wau dales fen, Akaia teneub an dõ fiya tamo kayau ĩ aan difiyẽf nigin, pas ditotkenẽdin. Apolos an wõ ye fen, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem momoi den idi, fatuk bagai isennẽdin.
44018028	Ere nigin, ĩ Juda tamo kayau geid mal atun fefe de fen, od megeir ado nem lai feid fen, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun Jesus ĩ anĩ Kristus ya anĩ, agef ifelnẽdin.
44019001	Apolos ĩ fau Korin taun ibod mog, Pol ĩ teneub atu iyok ile, Efesus taun wõ yen. An ĩ, dõ fiya tamo kayau tunĩ fotou fiyeĩd fen,
44019002	to fiyẽdin, “Ã momoi ge fen, Awa Uur Fateul walegen de?” Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Sã, amã Awa Uur Fateul ibodok ya anĩg to karĩ maun.”
44019003	Age de di, Pol idi to fedin, “Age fiyauf are, ere naan anĩ ã walegen?” Idi ĩ dirokenen, “Jon nẽ naan igũya anĩ.”
44019004	Pol iron, “Jon nẽ naan igũya are wau faleiya nẽ naan igũya. Jon ĩ yogo, dumen tamo taka isif ĩ nigin momoi douf nigin, tamo kayau irokenẽdin, tamo are Jesus.”
44019005	Idi od enei karĩ de fen, Odug Jesus yana bunem naan dalen.
44019006	Pol ima tetedin ino di, Awa Uur Fateul idi bun isin. Age fe di, idi od fire fire nem wogõ de fen, profet odeg wogõ den.
44019007	Idi ganan tamo tuwelf age fiya.
44019008	Pol Juda neid uub fõ bun ile fen, an ogõ towo bun, kumĩ sã od wogõ yen, ĩ tamo kayau geid od kuruwa de, idi waud falei ye, Negur nẽ tano nigin momoi douf nigin age fen.
44019009	Anĩ ere, idi tunĩ waud totol le fen, to momoi den. Age dife fen, idi mal atun Odug nẽ naab nigin od sesen diron. Anĩ nigin, Pol idi itorneĩd fen, dõ fiya tamo kayau geif fen, naa ganan Tiranus nẽ ifelnẽya fõ bun od katõ difen.
44019010	Enei age fen are yar uru ilelen, anĩ bunem, Juda tamo kayau ado, Grik tamo kayau ganan Asia provins an dibodon idi, Odug nẽ od karĩ den.
44019011	Negur ĩ Pol bunem memelik fire bagai age fedin,
44019012	are hankisip ado gabar masakeg, Pol bouwa kobũ dife fen, dagi tamo bun diroule dinodi di, dagi el feledin, are kaa sesen idi ditornẽdin.
44019013	Juda tamo tunĩ, kaa sesen dirudiyouf nigin diyõdig, idi kaa sesenem dirounẽdin anidi bun Odug Jesus yana dale fen, idi eig de dirõdig, “Jesus ĩ nigin Pol wogõ yedig, ĩ yana bunem, aya õ ulõ wesiyouf nigin arokonok.”
44019014	Juda neid pris odug taka, Skeba nẽ gere tar sewen idig age difedig.
44019015	Naa taka bun, kaa sanem idi irokenẽdin, “Aya Jesus keleĩ, aya Pol nigin keleĩ, anĩ ere, ã aiyaim?”
44019016	Age ye fen, tamo kaa sane ado tetedin gurusã ye, ganan lalai feid fen, fatuk bagai idenẽdin. Age fe di, idi fõ anĩ bun tamal, gemũ naud adodo diyalelen.
44019017	Juda tamo kayau ado Grik tamo kayau Efesus taun dibodon idi, enei karĩ de fen, idi ganan fatuk bagai kumĩ de, Odug Jesus yana ilun bagai dalesen.
44019018	Tamo kayau momoi den musei disi, sane age difedig anĩ, mal atun yaor dife, kurõ difesin.
44019019	Idi idegẽya bunem kosẽ dedig musei, dogo neid buk kori fiya guri de dirousi, kuru de, mal atun yã diraran. Idi buk kori fiya anĩ nẽ mala diwesen, are fifti tausen silwa moni wõ yen.
44019020	Anĩ bunem, Odug nẽ od bilalaũ fe fen, megeiref ilen.
44019021	Enei ganan agef wõ yele di, Pol Masedonia ado Akaia provins atu iyok ile anenem, Jerusalem ilauf nigin kisi yalen. Ĩ iron, “Aya an wõ au fen, aya Romeg ki afouf.”
44019022	Age ye fen, ĩ yogon isennẽya tamo uru, Timoti Erastus ado Masedonia provins bun sur feid fen, ĩ Efesus an Asia provins bun sain naal ibodon.
44019023	Sain anĩ bun, Odug nẽ Naab nigin, kiwai ado monẽya odug wõ yen.
44019024	Silwa nem ereb ereb inoya tamo, yana Demetrius, ĩ silwa nem kayau waitou yana Atemis dedig anĩ nẽ tempel malakanon inodig, anĩ bunem yogon kabĩ tamo moni musei daledig.
44019025	Demetrius ĩ, yogon kabĩ tamo tar ado, yogon kabĩ gen age fiya tutur iweig laisi fen, irokenẽdin, “Tamo ã, ã keleĩ, ada kabĩ enei bun moni biya taledig.
44019026	Anĩ ã gama uleg fen, karĩ gef, tamo Pol enei, ein Efesus ado mogo Asia provins ganan melsã bagai bun, tamo kayau musei waud yale fen, eig ye irok, tamo ima nem waitou inodif are anĩ waitou sã, yef.
44019027	Are karĩya sane yenek, ada neda moni kabĩ yana sane yalouf, takag, karĩya sane yenek are, kayau waitou odug Atemis nẽ tempel are ege bagai kaũ sãf. Age fe di, kayau waitou, Asia provins ganan bun ado teneub adok ganan bun, yana dalesedig, ĩ yana odug iseledig are lai difesilauf.”
44019028	Idi od enei karĩ de fen, fatuk bagai seye ise di, kakaĩ de diweig diron, “Efesus neid Atemis ĩ odug bagai!”
44019029	Age de di, taun anĩ bun ganan kuru dalesen. Tamo kayau idi, Gaius Aristakus ado, are idi Masedonia temeleid Pol geid diyõdig anidi, kaka difeid, guru fiya nẽ fõ odug namen, tamo tekeleim gudu ref ileya gen gududu den.
44019030	Pol ĩ guru fiya atun ilauf nigin age fen, anĩ ere, dõ fiya tamo kayau Pol katũ difiyen.
44019031	Asia gawaman nẽ uyu irouya tunĩ, are Pol nẽ mou tar idig, Pol guru fiya nẽ fõ anĩ bun to ilauf nigin digone ken, od sur difenen.
44019032	Guru fiya anĩ bun nene delen. Tunĩ od taka diweig dirõ di, tunĩ od fire taka diweig diron. Musei ganan ereb nigin an guru difen anĩ, idi keleĩ san.
44019033	Juda tamo kayau, Aleksanda, tamo kayau wagedin mal atun sur dife, isel ifare di, tamo kayau tunĩ ĩ dile fen, Aleksanda ĩ anĩ morõ gariya den. Age dife di, Aleksanda ĩ tamo kayau meleid bun yogo bouwa isennẽf nigin, ĩ foro dalauf nigin imam dogol fiyẽdin.
44019034	Anĩ ere, idi ĩ Juda tamo ya kelei ken, idi ganan aiteid tekelei dino fen, aua uru age fiya eig de diweig diron, “Efesus neid Atemis ĩ odug bagai!”
44019035	Age de di, taun uyu irouya nẽ kabĩ tamo ĩ, tamo kayau foro weleg fiyẽdi di, foro delen, age dife di, iron, “Efesus tamo ã, teneub ganan bun tamo kayau ganan, Efesus taun anĩ, Atemis odug nẽ tempel ado yogon malakanon saa ilunem isin anĩ nẽ kulatun fiya taun anĩ, idi to keleĩ de?
44019036	Taka nem enei wa fiya kisi feleya sã, anĩ nigin, ã foro weleg fen, age fiya nigin to buroro gei.
44019037	Tamo eneidi ereb taka tempel buneg to bẽ dalen, idi neda kayau waitoug to kono difiyen, anĩ ere, ã idi ein guri wedig urousigel.
44019038	Age fiyauf are, Demetrius yogon kabĩ tura tar geid, tamo taka nigin nauseirya adouf are, kot ibodok, gawaman nẽ mudur adodo difaref. Idi an nauseirya anĩ diroulauf.
44019039	Ã nauseir anĩ teten ereb taka manouf gouf are, tamo kayau neid kot guru fiya bun madur gouf.
44019040	Gama wõ yel enei nigin, karĩya sane yenek, kuru talesel enei nigin are ada kot bun dinenadauf. Age difouf are, ada guru fiya sane enei nigin faded fiya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, are gariya sã.”
44019041	Agef irokel fen, ĩ guru fiya anĩ irudin.
44020001	Kuru anĩ bure fele di, Pol ĩ od ino di, dõ fiya tamo kayau disin, age dife di, idi waud yales le fen, dabuo fiyeĩd lel, Masedonia provins ilen.
44020002	Pol ĩ Masedonia provins atu iyok ile, wau yaleseya od musei tamo kayau irokenẽdif ile, Grik kantri bun ulõ yeis fen,
44020003	ĩ an ogõ towo ibodon. Ĩ waag bun Siria distrik bun ilauf nigin agef mog, Juda tamo idi, ĩ dukesiyouf nigin lalĩ difiyek anĩ karĩ yen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ Masedonia provins atu kel ilauf nigin kisi yalen.
44020004	Pirus naal Sopata Berea taun tamal, Aristakus, Sekundus Tesalonika taun tamal, Gaius Derbe taun tamal, Timoti, Tikikus Trofimus ado Asia provins temeleid anidim, Pol geid diyon.
44020005	Tamo eneidi idi ket Troas taun dile, an tari difaman.
44020006	Anĩ ere, Bret Yis Sã nẽ Sifa bure fele di, amã waag male, Filipai taun mator ken, naa faif ilele di, Troas taun wõ mau fen, fata mafiyẽdin, an naa sewen mabodon.
44020007	Uub nẽ naa matu bun, amã weim bret mumã mafouf nigin guru mafalaisin. Pol tamo kayau od wogõ fiyẽdif ile bõ atunen, ere nigin, ĩ, we fele di, itornẽdiyouf nigin kisi fen.
44020008	Guru mafen nẽ aab ilun an, lam musei futu redin.
44020009	Tamo gaũ yana Yutikus, yau yaleya bobog ilun sõ yesel ibod ken, mulã kusu yalen. Pol od wogõ yef ile mog, ĩ mulã kusu yalef ile yen kele fen, fõ ilunenem tenebur kubũ ye isilen. Age fe di, idi ĩ laa dalesnen.
44020010	Anĩ ere, Pol isil, tamo anĩ teten kubũ ye, kakarai fiye ken, iron, “To terẽg, ĩ mata!”
44020011	Age ye fen, ĩ baban fõ ilun isel, bret mumãf fen, yon. Ĩ wogõ yef ile we fele di, ĩ itorneĩd ilen.
44020012	Tamo kayau, tamo gaũ anĩ mata dale dirou, fõ bun dile fen, waud el bagai fen.
44020013	Amã ket waag bun mele, sõ mau fen, Asos taun melen, an Pol waag bun malouf nigin kisi mafen. Pol ĩ, amã age mafouf nigin tetun irokanaman, ere nigin, ĩ ye naab iyok ile, an ilauf yen.
44020014	Ĩ oun Asos fotou famã di, amã ĩ waag bun male fen, Mitilin taun melen.
44020015	Anenem waag bun mele, we fele di, Kios nuyo non wõ maun. Naa anĩ ile di, Samos taun mele wõ maun, naa anĩ ile di, Miletus taun mele wõ maun.
44020016	Pol ĩ, Asia provins bun an sain taka to ilalauf nigin, waag bun Efesus wal fouf nigin kisi yalen, ere nigin, kisi falauf are, ĩ Jerusalem Pentikos naa bun wõ youf nigin sibu yen.
44020017	Miletus taun an, Pol ĩ Efesus sios neid uyu irouya fata difiyẽf nigin od sur fen.
44020018	Idi disi wõ de di, ĩ irokenẽdin, “Aya Asia provins bun, uruwa bagai asi wõ au fen, aya ã geid tabod ken, sain ganan naig be afe abodon are ã keleĩ.
44020019	Juda tamo idi aya kiwai difana fen, kisi sane dinon anim fatuk bagai kisi fiyan, anĩ ere, aya wau aukesil, maru ado fen, Odug aruna alen.
44020020	Ã keleĩ, aya ã isenneĩf nigin ereb taka wogõya bun to afon, are aya mal atun ado fõ fõ bun afelnein.
44020021	Aya Juda tamo kayau ado Grik tamo kayau idi waud falei ye, Negur bun dino fen, neda Odug Jesus nigin momoi douf nigin totol bagai arokenẽdin.
44020022	“Gama aya Awa Uurem toli fiyaf anĩ bunem, Jerusalem elef, an aya bun ereb wõ youf are aya keleĩ sã.
44020023	Taun ganan bun Awa Uur Fateul, kalabus ado morõ tari difiyaf anĩ nigin wederou irouf, anĩ dogol aya keleĩ.
44020024	Anĩ ere, aya neu naab adikalauf nigin ado, kabĩ Odug Jesus ifanan, are Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya nẽ biya od wogõya kabĩ anĩ bure afalauf nigin dogol, kisi afef. Anĩ kisi afalauf are, aya neu mata are ege au fen, neu mata nigin to kisi afef.
44020025	“Aya ã atun ayo ken, Negur nẽ tano nigin wogõ ayein, are gama aya keleĩ, ã atun takam baban to ileyauf.
44020026	Anĩ nigin, naa enei bun, aya tutuk bagai yaor afe arokeneik, tamo ganan neid naudeid nigin, aya neu mosor sã.
44020027	Ere nigin, aya Negur nẽ oroya ganan yaor afe arokeneĩf nigin, taka to afokelen.
44020028	Ã aug nigin ado, sipsip ganan Awa Uur Fateulem lo wedigouf nigin imeĩ bun inon anĩ nigin, meleĩ adouf. Negur nẽ sios, ĩ yogon naud bunem na yalen anĩ nẽ sipsip lo fiya tamo ubodõgouf.
44020029	Aya keleĩ, aya atorneĩ mog, gaũ kuĩ sane ã atun disi, sipsip daũ difeidlauf.
44020030	Ã tutur buneg tamo tunĩ fã de, dõ fiya tamo tunĩ momoi bun tamal didegneĩd fen, idi dõ difediyouf nigin weleid dino diroulauf.
44020031	Anĩ nigin, ã lo welegei! Yar towo bun, bõ ado gaa ado, maru ado ã mugu mugu ganan wedereĩ aroun anĩ karĩ walagauf.
44020032	“Gama aya ã, Negur ado yogon wau ifenẽya nẽ od bun, aneneik, od anim ã totolouf nigin megeir ifenei ken, yogon momoiya tamo tar ganan atun, in akor mata ibodkeleya anĩ ifeneĩf.
44020033	Aya takan nẽ silwa be, gol be, kolos yaleya nigin to wau yenen.
44020034	Ã aug keleĩ, aya imau eneim kabĩ ale di, aya neu kabĩ turau tar geid, ereb lau mafen anĩ ifanaman.
44020035	Ereb ereb ganan aya age afen anĩ bunem, aya ã afelnein, are ada kabĩ totol age taf tale fen, anĩ bun tamalem maleg tasennẽdiyouf. Odug Jesus yogo eig ye iron anĩ karĩ taulauf, ‘Ifenẽya are el fiya barikã, yaleya nẽ wal fiya.’”
44020036	Pol ĩ od enei wogõ yel fen, ĩ ibor bobou fe, idi ganan geid kosẽ den.
44020037	Idi ĩ kakarai difiyẽ, umã difiye ken, ganan inã dalen.
44020038	Idi ĩ nawa baban to dilouf fiyẽdin od anim waud gudũ fen. Age dife fen, idi weim waag bun dinenen.
44021001	Amã dabuo mafiyeĩd matorneĩd fen, waag sõ mau, Kos nuyo tokõ mafelen. Naa anĩ ile di, amã Rodes nuyo mele fen, anenem Patara taun melen.
44021002	Amã waag taka Fonisia distrik bun ile mog, fotou mafe fen, waag anĩ sõ mau melen.
44021003	Amã Saipras nuyo mail fen, wal mafe, anĩ ki melem Siria provins melen. Amã Taia taun kututũ maun, ere nigin, an waag udũ gei falaisiyouf nigin age fen.
44021004	Amã an dõ fiya tamo kayau fotou mafeid fen, weim naa sewen mabodon. Idi Awa Uurem Pol Jerusalem to ilauf nigin totol bagai dirokenen.
44021005	Anĩ ere, nemã sain bure fele di, amã matorneĩd fen, delẽ mayon. Dõ fiya tamo ganan dogo neid kayau kesu tar geid, taun tamal dinenamã, mele, maaĩ ubun ulõ maus fen, an amã iboramã bobou mafe fen, kosẽ maun.
44021006	Amã abob dabuo mafiye ken, amã waag sõ mau di, idi fonõ keku de dilen.
44021007	Amã Taia taun anenem tokõ mafel, Ptolemais taun kututũ maun, an amã momoiya tamo kayau aan mafiyeĩd fen, idi geid naa tekelei mabodon.
44021008	Naa anĩ ile di, amã matorneĩd mele, Sisaria taun wõ mau fen, an biya od wogõya tamo Filip nẽ fõ bun mabodon, ĩ kulu oun Jerusalem momoiya tamo sewen digirnẽdin anidi taka.
44021009	Filip ĩ, ne barai tar aiwa adodo tamo sãsã, idi profet od wogõ dedig.
44021010	An naa tunĩ mabodon, age mã mog, profet taka yana Agabus Judia distrik bun tamal isin.
44021011	Ĩ amã garan isi, Pol nẽ lũ yale fen, yogo ye ima ado ifofa ken, iron, “Awa Uur Fateul eig ye irok, ‘Jerusalem oun Juda tamo idi lũ enei nẽ marau eig de difo ken, haiden imeid bun dinenẽf.’”
44021012	Amã od enei karĩ mau fen, amã an tamo kayau geid Pol Jerusalem to ilauf nigin magonen.
44021013	Age mafe di, Pol iron, “Ã ere nigin inã walege di, aya wau gudũ fef? Aya Odug Jesus yana nigin, Jerusalem oun difõyauf nigin ado laa fiyauf nigineg, dodok afel.”
44021014	Amã ĩ wala inoya kisi feleya sa ken, folõ mafiye kele fen, moron, “Odug nẽ oroya anĩ kisi falauf.”
44021015	Age mafel fen, amã dodok mafel, Jerusalem meselen.
44021016	Dõ fiya tamo tunĩ Sisaria taun temeleid dinenama ken, Nason nẽ fõ bun mabodõf nẽ an dirouleman. Nason ĩ, dõ fiya tamo uruwa bun temeleid anidi taka, Saipras nuyo tamal.
44021017	Amã Jerusalem wõ mau di, momoiya tamo idi waud sere fiya ado aan difaman.
44021018	Naa anĩ ile di, amã Pol geid Jems mailauf nigin melen, sios uyu irouya ganan an difaren.
44021019	Pol idi aan fiyeĩd fen, yogon kabĩ bunem Negur haiden atun ereb age fen anĩ, teke tekelei dir fenẽdin.
44021020	Idi od enei karĩ de fen, Negur yana dalesen. Age dife fen, idi Pol dirokenen, “Turamã, õ ulef, ganĩ tausen Juda idi momoi den, anĩ ere, idi ganan Moses nẽ Lo dõ fiya nigin waud totol bagai yenek.
44021021	Õ, Juda idi haiden neid teneub bun difaref ganan, Moses nẽ Lo ditor ken, dogo neid kesu tar mulũ bun to dinenẽdiyouf, dogo neid tobonunã to dõ difouf nigin ufelnẽdin ya anĩ, idi mogo karĩ den.
44021022	Idi õ usil ya anĩ fau karĩ douf. Age difouf are, ada ere naig tafouf?
44021023	Anĩ nigin, amã marokonok anĩ, ago dõ wo. Tamo aiwa adodo Negur mala bun age mafouf bagai den, idi yeir amã geid.
44021024	Tamo eneidi geid uleg fen, nonorou lilik fiya nẽ tobonunã bun ulagauf. Agog fen, na walekenẽdiyouf, ago di, idi fatiyeid korerẽ difalauf. Ago ge di, õ nigin od enei are momoi sã, õ ogo Moses nẽ Lo dõ wedig anĩ, tamo kayau ganan keleĩ youf.
44021025	Haiden tamo kayau idi momoi den anidi bun, amã kisi mafon anĩ matotkenẽdin, are idi saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen anĩ to dãf, yaro naud adodo to dãf, yaro uleid kakã difeid fen, didenkesif anĩ to dãf ado, noli tobonunã bun to dilauf.”
44021026	Naa anĩ ile di, Pol tamo anidi geif fen, ĩ yogo weim nonorou lilik difen. Age difel fen, ĩ tempel bun ile, ere sain nonorou lilik fiya naa bure fele di, idi mugu mugu sesewi difouf anĩ, pris keleĩ youf nigin irokenẽdin.
44021027	Naa sewen anĩ bure falau fenẽ mog, Juda tamo tunĩ Asia provins temeleid idi, tempel bun Pol dilen. Idi tamo ganan waud dalese di, seye de fen, Pol dale,
44021028	diweig diron, “Israel tamo, usennamãg! Tamo enei anĩ, neda tamo kayau, neda lo ado, modoũ enei nigin, od sane teneub ganan bun, tamo ganan ifelnẽdidig. Takag, ĩ Grik tamo tempel modoũ bun gurif isi di, fateul modoũ enei amuyẽ ifenen.”
44021029	(Idi uruwa bun, Trofimus Efesus taun tamal, Pol ado an taun diledin, anĩ nigin, idi kisi difen, Trofimus Pol im tempel modoũ namen iroulen den.)
44021030	Taun tamo kayau ganan fafã de fen, naab uyu fire fire bunem gududu de disin. Idi Pol dale, tempel bun tamal dĩ de diror diroule di, kaisã bagai sukar kotũ difeledin.
44021031	Idi Pol dukesiyou fenẽ age de mog, od isel, Rom kusĩ tamo neid odug, Jerusalem taun tamo kayau ganan kuru dalesef ya anĩ karĩ yen.
44021032	Kaisã bagai, kusĩ tamo neid odug ĩ, kusĩ tamo neid orowa tunĩ ado kusĩ tamo geif fen, tamo kayau musei gedin gududu de disilen. Tamo kusĩ dalesen idi, kusĩ tamo neid odug ado yogon kusĩ tamo geid dileid fen, Pol dun anĩ folõ difelen.
44021033	Kusĩ tamo neid odug isi, Pol dale, sen uru nem difõf nigin iron. Age ye fen, Pol ĩ ai anĩ, ereb ĩ age fen anĩ ado nigineg, Juda tamo to fiyẽdin.
44021034	Tamo kayau musei atun, tunĩ od gariya fire diweig diron, tunim od gariya fire taka diweig diron. Kusĩ tamo neid odug ĩ, idi kuru dalesen nigin momoi od yaleya kisi feleya san anĩ nigin, ĩ Pol kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun dirou dilauf nigin irokenẽdin.
44021035	Pol lata garan wõ ye mog, tamo musei idi didid aus fele di, kusĩ tamom Pol faali difiyen.
44021036	Tamo musei idi dõ difeid fen, diweig diron, “Ukesig!”
44021037	Kusĩ tamo idi, Pol kusĩ tamo neid fõ aaben diroulau fenẽ mog, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid odug to fiyen, “Aya od taka tau arokonõf?” Ĩ aba solof iron, “Õ Grik od wogõ wodig de?
44021038	Õ Isip tamal sã de? Kulu gawaman kiwai wene ken, gerere tuan fo tausen kiwai tamo uyu urou ulen anĩ.”
44021039	Pol iron, “Aya Juda tamo, Silisia provins oun Tasus taun tamal, taun yana ado nẽ fõ morou. Utorna len, tamo kayau od arokenẽdiyouf.”
44021040	Kusĩ tamo neid odug yo fiyẽ di, Pol lata bun ifar fen, tamo kayau imam fiyẽdin. Idi ganan foro dele di, Pol Hibru od nem irokenẽdin,
44022001	“Turau tar ado dei geg, gama aya yug nigin isennẽya od enei karĩ wog.”
44022002	Pol Hibru od nem irokenẽdi di, karĩ de fen, idi fatuk foro delen. Age dife di, Pol iron,
44022003	“Aya Juda tamo, Silisia provins oun Tasus taun an wõ au fen, taun enei bun biyaun. Aya Gamaliel bun tubuda tar neid lo nigin tai fiya fatuk alen. Age afe fen, ã ganan gama ago gef gen, ayag Negur nigin kisi totol alen.
44022004	Aya Naab enei dõ difedig tamo kayau, darau afeneĩd fen, adenkesin, tamo ado kayau gei afeid fen, kalabus araran.
44022005	Pris neid mudur ado, kaunsel neid uyu irouya ganan geideg, aya age afen anĩ nigin wogõ douf. Aya tureid tar Juda idi oun Damaskus taun difaref anidi bun paseg idi bun ale fen, tamo kayau eneidi darau difenẽdiyouf nigin afofa ken, Jerusalem guri afeid alauf nigin an elen.
44022006	“Gaa atun age fiya, aya ele, Damaskus wõ au fenẽ mog, kaisã bagai, lalan fula fiya taka saa ilun tamal aya bun fula felen.
44022007	Aya tenebur kubũ au asil fen, ait taka wogõ fiya mog, karĩ aun, ‘Sol, Sol, ere nigin õ aya daig wiyaf?’
44022008	“Aya to afen, ‘Odug, õ aim?’ “Ĩ solof irokanan, ‘Aya Jesus Nasaret tamal, õ daig wiyaf anim.’
44022009	Neu kabĩ turau tar fula fiya anĩ dilen, anĩ ere, idi ait wogõ fiyan anĩ to karĩ den.
44022010	“Aya to afen, ‘Ere naig afouf?’ “Odug iron, ‘Fã wale fen, Damaskus taun ule, an õ ereb agouf nigin Negur igirkonon anĩ ganan irokonõf.’
44022011	Neu kabĩ turau tar, imau gim de, Damaskus dirouleyan, ere nigin, lalan fula fiya anim malau gugum kelen.
44022012	“Tamo taka yana Ananias ileyauf nigin isin. Ĩ lo el fe dõ fedig tamo, Juda idi an difaref ganan, ĩ nigin biya difiyẽdig.
44022013	Ĩ aya sirun ifar fen, iron, ‘Turau, Sol, õ malã kelẽ yalauf!’ Sain anĩ bun bagai, aya ĩ ileya kisi feleyan.
44022014	“Age afe di, ĩ iron, ‘Tubuda tar neid Negur, õ yogon oroya keleĩ youf nigin, Madur Bagai Tamo anĩ ulouf nigin ado, ĩ awa bun od karĩ wouf nigin igirnon.
44022015	Õ ereb ulen ado karĩ won anĩ, tamo ganan bun ĩ nigin wogõ wouf.
44022016	Anĩ gama õ ere tari wof? Fã wale, naan wale, ĩ yana uweigne ken, ogon mosor kulo wol.’
44022017	“Aya Jerusalem kelau ele fen, tempel bun kosẽ au mog, malau seleulã kurãf fen,
44022018	Odug wogõ ye mog, ailen. Ĩ aya irokanan, ‘Gama nem, kaisã bagai Jerusalem utor ule, ere nigin, idi aya nigin ogon od to karĩ douf.’
44022019	“Age ye di, aya oron, ‘Odug, idi dogo keleĩ, are aya Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun ele fen, õ nigin momoi den anidi kalabus bun aneneĩd fen, adenẽdidig.
44022020	Takag, ogon od wogõ yedig tamo Stiwen naud fi felen sain bun, ayag an afaren, ĩ dukesiyouf nigin wau iro ken, tamo idi ĩ dukesin neid kolos tari afen.’
44022021	“Age au di, Odug irokanan, ‘Ule, aya haiden gedin gerõ sur ayõf.’”
44022022	Tamo kayau musei Pol karĩ difiyek dile, ĩ od enei irõ di, idi kakaĩ de fen, diweig diron, “Ukesig, tenebur tamal uraileg! Ĩ mata ibodõya to biya!”
44022023	Idi diweig diro ken, dogo neid kolos dinukakã dirara ken, aas ilun diraran.
44022024	Age dife di, kusĩ tamo neid odug, Pol kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun dirou dilauf nigin irokenẽdin. Tamo idi Pol eig de diweig dirokenen anĩ nẽ gariya keleĩ youf nigin, Pol wagĩ difiye ken, to difiyẽf nigin, ĩ irokenẽdin.
44022025	Idi ĩ wagĩ difiyẽf nigin yaĩ difiyẽ mog, Pol kusĩ tamo neid orowa an ifaren anĩ irokenen, “Ã, Rom tamo, mosor ado be ya kelei sa ken, wagĩ fiya are lo dõ fiya de?”
44022026	Kusĩ tamo neid orowa od enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid odug garan ile fen, ĩ irokenen, “Õ ere naig wou fenẽ? Tamo enei ĩ Rom tamo.”
44022027	Kusĩ tamo neid odug Pol garan ile fen, to fiyen, “Õ urokana, õ Rom tamo de?” Pol ĩ iron, “Are momoi.”
44022028	Age ye di, kusĩ tamo neid odug iron, “Aya Rom tamo wõ auf nigin, moni odugem na alen.” Pol iron, “Anĩ ere, aya Rom tamo gõ difiyan.”
44022029	Age ye di, tamo Pol to difiyẽf nigin age difen idi, kaisã bagai folõ difelen. Kusĩ tamo neid odug ĩg, Pol ĩ Rom tamo, sen nem ifon anĩ weder fokõ yel fen, kumĩ yen.
44022030	Naa anĩ ile di, kusĩ tamo neid odug ĩ, Juda idi Pol bou bun od dun anĩ nẽ gariya tutuk bagai keleĩ youf nigin oron, anĩ nigin, ĩ Pol yalisne ken, pris odudug ado Juda neid uyu irouya ganan guru difouf nigin irokenẽdin. Agef fen, ĩ Pol yale irousi, idi wagedin ifarnen.
44023001	Pol guru fiya anĩ lo feid le fen, iron, “Turau tar, aya Negur kabĩ ifanan anĩ, wau karẽtut bagai ado age alef asi, gama naa enei bun.”
44023002	Od enĩ irõ di, pris neid mudur Ananias, tamo Pol non difaren anidi ĩ sigor daũ difouf nigin irokenẽdin.
44023003	Age ye di, Pol Ananias irokenen, “Negur õ inõ irãf, õ pen lalaum garaĩ naki fiya! Õ lo kilei es wiyauf nigin an ubodok, anĩ ere, õ lo wal wo fen, aya dinauf nigin urokenẽdif!”
44023004	Tamo Pol non difaren anidim ĩ dirokenen, “Õ Negur nẽ pris neid mudur kumĩ sã kono wiyek de?”
44023005	Age de di, Pol iron, “Turau tar, ĩ pris neid mudur anĩ aya to kelein. Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, ‘Ogon tamo kayau neid uyu irouya nigin od sane to urõf.’ ”
44023006	Age ye fen, Pol idi tunĩ Sadusia tamo, tunĩ Farisia tamo anĩ kelei ken, uyu irouya neid guru fiya mala bun iweig iron, “Turau tar, aya Farisia tamo taka, Farisia tamo naaluid. Aya laa bun tamal mata kel fãya nigin wau iseya ado nigin, kot bun afaref.”
44023007	Pol od enei irõ di, Farisia tamo ado Sadusia tamo geid fefe de fen, guru fiya anĩ faraf uru fen.
44023008	(Sadusia tamo idi dirõdig, laa bun tamal mata kel fãya sã, engel sã, uureg sã, anĩ ere, Farisia tamo idi dirõdig, anĩ ganan are dibodok.)
44023009	Aiteid oduduge di, lo ifelnẽdiya tamo tunĩ, idig Farisia bun temeleid fafã de fen, totol bagai fe de diron, “Amã tamo enei bun kũ fenẽya taka to mailef. Ĩ uurem be engel takam be irokenen are, naig fiyauf?”
44023010	Fefeya anĩ ile, sane le di, kusĩ tamo neid odug Pol fisik difouf ye fen, kumĩ yen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ kusĩ tamo disil, imedin tamal totol ado son difeid, kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun diroulauf nigin, irokenẽdin.
44023011	Bõ anĩ bun, Odug Pol non ifar fen, iron, “Totol uno! Õ Jerusalem ein, aya nigin wogõ wol gen, õ Rom ouneg ago wogõ wouf.”
44023012	Bonimei di, Juda idi guru de fen, Pol yukesiya nigin kisi katõ difen. Pol yukesiya sã mog, idi saaf ado naan to dãf nigin waud kuturol fen, od difon.
44023013	Tamo foti wal fiya anidim, enei nigin kisi katõ difen.
44023014	Idi pris odudug ado uyu iroudiya bun dile fen, diron, “Pol yukesiya sã mog, amã ereb taka to mãf nigin waumã kuturol fen, od mafon.
44023015	Anĩ nigin, gama ã uyu irouya neid guru fiya geid, tamomoi ge fen, Pol nigin tutuk bagai keleĩ youf ge fen, ĩ ã gein dirou disiyouf nigin, kusĩ tamo neid odug urokenẽgouf. Amã, ĩ ein wõya sã mog, ĩ maukesiyouf nigin dodok mafef.”
44023016	Anĩ ere, Pol main nẽ naal kisi enei karĩ ye fen, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun ile fen, Pol irokenen.
44023017	Age ye di, Pol kusĩ tamo neid orowa taka iweignẽ isi di, iron, “Tamo gaũ enei wale, kusĩ tamo neid odug gein uroule. Ĩ od taka irokenẽf nigin ado.”
44023018	Anĩ nigin, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid odug garan yale iroule fen, iron, “Kalabus tamo Pol iweigna fen, tamo gaũ enei õ gein arou asiyouf nigin irokanal, ere nigin, ĩ od taka irokonõf nigin ado.”
44023019	Kusĩ tamo neid odug, tamo gaũ ima yale irou, yerin dile fen, to fiyen, “Aya ere od anĩ urokanau fenẽ?”
44023020	Tamo gaũ iron, “Juda idi waud tekeleil, tamomoi de fen, Pol nigin tutuk bagai keleĩ youf de fen, nil uyu irouya neid guru fiya mala bun, ĩ diroulauf nigin dirokonõf.
44023021	Are idi to karĩ wiyẽdiyouf, ere nigin, tamo foti wal fiya anidim ĩ nigin dimin ken, tari difef. Pol yukesiya sã mog, idi saaf ado naan to dãf nigin waud kuturol fen, od difon. Idi dodok difel fen, Pol idi garan sur fiya nigin ogon yoya anĩ tari difef.”
44023022	Kusĩ tamo neid odug tamo gaũ anĩ weder irou fen, sur fen, “Õ enei urokanal anĩ, aib taka to urokenẽf.”
44023023	Age fel fen, ĩ kusĩ tamo neid orowa uru iweigneĩd, disi di, irokenẽdin, “Kusĩ tamo tu handred ado, kusĩ tamo sewenti hos adodo, kusĩ tamo tu handred ot adodo anidim, bõ nain kilok Sisaria taun ulagauf nigin, dodok gouf.
44023024	Pol teten ibod ken, Gawaman nẽ Mudur Feliks bun biya ile wõ youf nigin, hos tunĩ dodok gouf.”
44023025	Ĩ pas eig ye itoton:
44023026	Aya Klodius Lisias, Odug Gawaman nẽ Mudur Feliks aan ayok.
44023027	Tamo enei Juda tamom dale fen, dukesiyou fenẽ age difen, anĩ ere, aya neu kusĩ tamo geid masi masennen, ere nigin, aya ĩ nigin kelein, ĩ Rom tamo.
44023028	Idi ĩ bun od dun anĩ, aya gariya keleĩ youf nigin, ĩ dogo neid uyu irouya guru fiya bun aroulen.
44023029	Ĩ bun od dun are dogo neid lo nigin age difen, anĩ ere, ĩ laa fiya nẽ be, kalabus ilauf nẽ ereb taka to age fen anĩ aya kelein.
44023030	Aya ĩ dukesiyouf nigin naab dimirek ya anĩ karĩ au fen, aya kaisã bagai ĩ, õ gein sur afiyen. Ĩ bou bun od dun idig, õ malã bun nedi morõ yaor difouf nigin arokenẽdin.
44023031	Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo idi irokenẽdin kilei, dõ def age difen, idi bõ Pol dale dirou, Antipatris taun dilen.
44023032	We fele di, idi, kusĩ tamo hos adodo, Pol geid dilauf nigin dirokeneĩd fen, idi kusĩ tamo neid fõ bun keku de dilen.
44023033	Kusĩ tamo hos adodo Sisaria taun wõ de fen, pas anĩ gawaman nẽ mudur difen ken, Pol ĩ ima bun dinon.
44023034	Gawaman nẽ mudur ĩ pas anĩ iwes fen, Pol ĩ teneub nanĩ bun tamal anĩ to fiyen. Gawaman nẽ mudur ĩ, Pol Silisia provins bun tamal anĩ kelei ken,
44023035	ĩ iron, “Aya ogon od, tamo õ bun od dun anidi ein disiyouf bun, karĩ auf.” Age ye fen, ĩ Pol Herod nẽ fõ bun dinene ken, lo difouf nigin irokenẽdin.
44024001	Naa faif ilele di, pris neid mudur Ananias, uyu irouya tunĩ ado, lo keleĩ tamo yana Tertulus dedig geid, Sisaria taun disilen. Idi Pol bouwa bun od dũf nigin, gawaman nẽ mudur mala bun wõ den.
44024002	Anĩ Pol diweignẽ, isi di, Tertulus Feliks mala bun, Pol bun bou yũya od anĩ gariya ino irokenen, “Amã õ farumen wau inosiya sain meluk mabodok masin. Ogon lo fiya biya bun, neda teneub bun ereb ereb biya musei wowã den.
44024003	Odug Feliks, modoũ ganan ado naab ganan bun, amã enei kelei ken, anĩ nigin fatuk bagai de mayok.
44024004	Anĩ ere, aya ogon sain to akasiyouf nigin, õ waũ ino ken, sain naal bagai karĩ wamãf nigin arokonok.
44024005	“Tamo enei morõ inoya tamo, teneub ganan bun, Juda tamo atun kuru yalesedig anĩ amã mailen. Ĩ Nasaret idegẽya momoiya mala neid uyu irouya.
44024006	Ĩ tempeleg amuyẽ ifenẽf nigin age fen, anĩ nigin, amã ĩ malen.
44024008	Õ ogo tamo enei to wiyẽf are, od ĩ bou bun manof anĩ ganan momoi bagai ya anĩ, õ keleĩ youf.”
44024009	Juda tamo idi, ĩ bou bun od yũya bun megeir dife fen, are momoi, den.
44024010	Gawaman nẽ mudur, Pol wogõ youf nigin mudurem dogol fiyẽ di, Pol iron, “Aya keleĩ, yar musei õ teneub enei bun es fiya tamo ubodon, anĩ nigin, aya wau el fe fen, aya yug nigin megeir afouf.
44024011	Malai sã, õ yaor bagai keleĩ youf, are naa tuwelf dogol mogo ilef, aya Negur yana alesauf nigin Jerusalem eselen.
44024012	Aya bouwau bun od dun tamo idi keleĩ, aya aib taka ado tempel bun to fe maun be, Juda neid uub fõ bun be taun nameneg, tamo kayau waud to alesen.
44024013	Idi gama aya bouwa bun od duk are momoi yeya anĩ, õ ifelnõya kisi feleya sã.
44024014	Anĩ ere, aya Naab idi idegẽya dedig anĩ dõ afe fen, tubuda tar neid Negur yana alesedig, are momoi auf. Aya Moses nẽ Lo ado, profet neid buk bun ditoton anĩ ganan nigin, momoi auf.
44024015	Ayag tamo eneidi gen Negur bun wau iseya ado, are madur tamo ado tamo sesen laa bun tamal mata ke de fã douf anĩ.
44024016	Anĩ nigin, Negur mala bun ado tamo meleid bun, aya wau karẽtut abodõf nigin sain ganan kabĩ totol aledig.
44024017	“Aya yar tunĩ firen abodkele fen, aya neu tamo kayau maleg nigin safina wau sã ado, Negur bun sesewi fiya nẽ safina, Jerusalem arou asin.
44024018	Aya nonorou lilik afel fen, enei age afe mog, idi aya tempel modoũ bun fotou difiyan. Aya an tamo guru fiya mala taka geid san, katã san.
44024019	Anĩ ere, Juda tamo tunĩ Asia provins temeleid an difaren anidi, dogo bagai õ gein disi fen, bouwau bun od yũya idi adouf are, wogõ dem bagai.
44024020	Sãf are, tamo eneidim, aya uyu irouya neid guru fiya meleid bun afaren sain, idi aya bun ereb mosor fotou difen anĩ wogõ douf.
44024021	Tekelei dogol, aya idi meleid bun afar fen, aweig aron, are eig fiya, ‘Laa bun tamal mata kel fãya anĩ nigin, aya gama ã melein kot bun afaref.’”
44024022	Age ye di, Feliks ĩ yogo, Naab anĩ nigin keleĩ bagai, ĩ kot gudũ fel fen, iron, “Kusĩ tamo neid odug Lisias isiyouf sain, aya ogon kot nigin od afõf.”
44024023	Ĩ, Pol lo difouf, anĩ ere, ĩ karika difen ken, yogon mou tar ĩ ereb lau fef anĩ kulatun difouf nigin yo fiyẽdiyouf nigin, kusĩ tamo neid orowa irokenen.
44024024	Naa tunĩ ilele di, Feliks ĩ aiwa Drusila Juda kayau ado disin. Ĩ Pol nigin od sur fe, isi fen, ĩ Kristus Jesus bun momoiya nigin wogõ ye di, karĩ yen.
44024025	Pol ĩ Negur nẽ madur fiya nigin, tamo yogon oroya kulatun fiya nigin ado, es fiya fau isiyouf anĩ nigin dir fe di, Feliks ĩ kumĩ ye fen, iron, “Are de bure welef! Wadã ule. Sain biya adouf are, õ nigin od sur afouf.”
44024026	De sain anĩ bun, Feliks ĩ, Polem moni ifenẽf nigin oron, anĩ nigin, sain musei Feliks Pol nigin od sur fe fen, urom wogõ dedig.
44024027	Yar uru ilele di, Porsius Festus, Feliks nẽ modoũ yalen. Anĩ ere, Feliks Juda tamo meleid yalouf nigin, Pol kalabus bun itornẽ ibodon.
44025001	Festus provins anĩ bun wõ ye, naa towo ilele di, ĩ Sisariam Jerusalem iselen,
44025002	an pris odudug ado Juda neid uyu iroudiya geid, ĩ mala bun wõ de fen, Pol bou yũya od anĩ dirokenen.
44025003	Festus ĩ wau ifeneĩd fen, Pol Jerusalem sur fe di, ilauf nigin totol bagai dirokenen, ere nigin, idi naab luwen dimin ken, Pol dukesiyouf nigin dodok difen.
44025004	Age de di, Festus ĩ irokenẽdin, “Pol oun Sisaria kalabus bun ibodok. Aya yug mogo an alau fenẽ.
44025005	Anĩ nigin, tamo anĩ ereb kũ fenen ouf are, ãgenei uyu irouya tunĩ aya weim Sisaria mele fen, an ĩ bou yũya od wogõ douf.”
44025006	Festus ĩ idi geid, naa eit be ten dibodkele fen, Sisaria isilen. Naa anĩ ile di, ĩ es fiya modoũ bun ibod ken, Pol ĩ wagen dirousiyouf nigin irokenẽdin.
44025007	Pol wõ ye di, Juda idi Jerusalem temeleid disin ĩ salili difiye ken, ĩ mosor sane bagai inon de fen, ĩ bou yũya od musei diron, anĩ ere, idi anĩ nẽ gariya to yaor difedin.
44025008	Age dife di, Pol yogo nigin isennẽya od iron, “Aya Juda neid lo nigin, tempel nigin, Sisa nigin be, ereb kũ fenẽya taka to age afen.”
44025009	Anĩ ere, Festus ĩ, Juda tamo ĩ nigin waud yenẽf nigin wau iro ken, Pol irokenen, “Õ Jerusalem usel fen, boũ yũya od eneidi nigin an aya malaun kot bun ufarauf de?”
44025010	Pol iron, “Aya gama Sisa nẽ kot bun yeir afaref, ein aya kot difiyauf. Õ ogo keleĩ bagai, aya Juda tamo bun kũ fenẽya taka to anon.
44025011	Anĩ ere, aya laa nẽ mosor taka anon ouf are, aya laa nigin to atorok. Anĩ ere, Juda tamo eneidi bouwau bun od dun anĩ momoi sãf are, aya taka nem idi imeid bun inenaya kisi feleya sã. Aya Sisa bun kot afouf.”
44025012	Festus ĩ, yogon lo keleĩ tamo geid, katõ difel fen, iron, “Õ Sisa bun kot afouf wol. Õ Sisa gein ulauf.”
44025013	Naa tunĩ ilele di, King Agripa Bernis ado, Festus aan difiyẽf nigin Sisaria taun disin.
44025014	Idi naa musei an dibodõ di, Festus Pol nigin king ado katõ de fen, ĩ iron, “Feliks ĩ, kalabus tamo taka ein itornen ibodok.
44025015	Aya Jerusalem ele di, pris odudug Juda neid uyu irouya geid, ĩ bun bou yũya od dirou disi fen, ĩ mosor ado afiyẽf nigin dirokanan.
44025016	“Anĩ ere, aya arokenẽdin, Rom neid tobonunã bun, tamo taka bou bun od duk ĩ, yogon kiwai tar meleid bun ifar fen, bou bun od dun anĩ nigin, yogo bou isennẽya od wogõya sã mog, are kaisã tamo anidi imeid bun to dinenẽf.
44025017	Idi aya weim ein masi fen, aya to foi aun, we fele di, aya es fiya modoũ bun abod ken, tamo are dale dirou disiyouf nigin arokenẽdin.
44025018	Yogon kiwai tar fã de wogõ den, anĩ ere, aya mosor kisi afen anĩ nigin taka to bou bun dun.
44025019	Anĩ ere, idi dogo neid momoiya nigin ado, laa tamo yana Jesus, Pol ĩ nigin mata ibodok yedig anĩ nigin, ĩ geid fefe den.
44025020	Aya enei nigin naig afe tutuk keleĩ youf au fen, nene aun, anĩ nigin, aya ĩ Jerusalem ile fen, bou bun od dun enei nigin an kot bun ifarauf nigin to afiyen.
44025021	Anĩ ere, Pol ĩ kusĩ tamom lo difiyẽ dile, fau dum Sisam es fiyẽf nigin irokanan. Anĩ nigin, aya ĩ lo difiyek dile, ĩ Sisa gein sur fiya nigin naab amir ken, sur afiyẽf sain bun anĩ nigin arokenẽdin.”
44025022	Age ye di, Agripa Festus irokenen, “Aya yug tamo enei karĩ afiyẽ fenẽ.” Festus iron, “Õ nil karĩ wiyẽf.”
44025023	Naa anĩ ile di, Agripa Bernis ado, biya biyamã de disi, guru fiya fõ aaben, kusĩ tamo neid odudug, taun nẽ uyu iroudiya geid dilen. Festus irõ di, Pol aaben dirou disin.
44025024	Festus iron, “King Agripa ado tamo ganan weim tafaref ã, tamo enei ulegef. Juda tamo kayau ganan Jerusalem ado ein Sisaria, ĩ nigin totol bagai dirokanan. Idi ĩ mata to ibodõf nigin diweig diron.
44025025	Aya, ĩ laa fouf nẽ ereb taka to age fen anĩ ailen. Anĩ ere, ĩ Sisa bun kot fouf nigin iron, anĩ nigin, aya ĩ Rom sur fiya nigin kisi afon.
44025026	Anĩ ere, aya ĩ nigin ereb od Sisa bun atotkenẽf anĩ yaor sã. Anĩ nigin, aya ã ganan meleĩ bun ĩ arou asil, King Agripa õ bun bagai, anĩ bunem aya ĩ to afiyẽ kelei ken, ĩ nigin ereb od itotoya nigin adouf be.
44025027	Ere nigin, aya kisi afef, kalabus tamo ĩ ereb mosor inon anĩ to yaor mog, sur afouf, are to biya.”
44026001	Age ye di, Agripa Pol irokenen, “Aya õ ogo nigin wogõ wouf nigin arokonok.” Anĩ nigin, Pol imam fe fen, yogo isennẽf nigin wogõ yen,
44026002	“King Agripa, bolẽ bagai, aya gama õ malã bun afar fen, Juda tamo aya bouwau bun od dun anĩ ganan nigin, aya yug isennauf nẽ od wogõ auf.
44026003	Bolẽ bagai auf, ere nigin, õ Juda neid tobonunã ado luwa irouya anĩ ganan keleĩ. Anĩ nigin, õ folo reis fen, karĩ wiyauf nigin agonok.
44026004	“Aya kesu naalun naig be afe abodon are, Juda tamo ganan keleĩ. Uruwa bun, aya neu teneub bun abodon, age afe fen, Jerusalemeg abodon are idi keleĩ.
44026005	Idi aya nigin sain meluk kelein, anĩ idi orodiyouf are, idi sã wogõ douf, are ada neda momoiya mala bun, Farisia tamo idi lo totol bagai dõ difedig anidi neid taka abodon.
44026006	Negur ada tubuda tar bun age afouf bagai fiyẽdin anĩ bun, aya wau iseya ado, anĩ nigin, aya gama kot bun afaref.
44026007	Negur age afouf bagai fiyẽdin anĩ nigin, ada neda ibor tuwelf, gaa ado bõ ado totol bagai Negur aruna dales fen, anĩ kisi fele di, dilouf nigin waud iseya adon. O king, wau iseya enei nigin, Juda idi aya bouwau bun od duk.
44026008	Ere nigin ã, Negur laa tamo kel turĩ fiyek anĩ kisi feleya sã gef?
44026009	“Aya yugeg, Jesus Nasaret tamal yana kiwai afenẽf nigin ereb ereb ganan age afouf aun.
44026010	Are aya Jerusalem an age afen. Pris odudug bun yoya ale fen, Negur nẽ tamo kayau musei kalabus bun anenẽdin. Idi laa bun dinenẽdin sain, ayag idi laa bun dinenẽdiyouf nigin yo aun.
44026011	Sain musei, aya idi darau afenẽdiyouf nigin, Juda neid uub fõ fõ bun elen, age afe fen, idi Negur kono difiyẽf nigin nugo afiyẽdin. Aya idi nigin nameu sane bagai yen ken, aya idi kafĩ fiya afenẽdiyouf nigin yaũ tauneg elen.
44026012	“De anĩ nigin sain taka bun, aya pris odudug neid od ado, yoya bun Damaskus taun elen.
44026013	O king, gaa atun age fiya naab luwe ele mog, aya saa ilun tamal fula fiya taka, gaa nẽ medeĩya wal fiya, aya neu kabĩ turau tar geid bun, fula felen anĩ ailen.
44026014	Amã ganan tenebur kuku mau fen, ait taka Hibru od nem eig ye irokana mog, karĩ aun, ‘Sol, Sol, ere nigin õ aya daig wiyaf? Õ aa waila ado bun yẽ urak are, õ nigin malai bagai.’
44026015	“Age ye di, aya to afen, ‘Odug, õ aim?’ “Odug iron, ‘Aya Jesus, õ daig wiyaf anim.
44026016	Gama õ fã wale yem ufar. Aya õ bun wõ aul, ere nigin, õ neu kabĩ tamo wõ wo fen, õ aya nigin ereb ulen ado ereb afelnõf anĩ wogõ wouf nigin agirnon.
44026017	Aya Israel tamo kayau bun ado haiden buneg asennõf. Aya idi bun õ sur ayok,
44026018	idi meleid fokõ yel fen, gugum bun tamal lalan bun disiyouf ado, Satan nẽ megeir bun tamal Negur bun disiyouf, anĩ bunem idi neid mosor nigin weder tu keleya dale fen, aya nigin momoi de fen, fateuledin anidi atun dogo neid modoũ gei difouf.’
44026019	“King Agripa, anĩ nigin, aya saa ilun tamal malau seleulã kurãf fen, ailen anĩ to adodon.
44026020	Uruwa, oun Damaskus taun difaref anidi bun, Jerusalem ado Judia distrik ganan bun difaref anidi bun ado, haiden buneg, idi waud falei ye, Negur bun falei dife fen, ereb age difef bunem, idi waud falei yen anĩ yaor difouf nigin wogõ aun.
44026021	Anĩ nigin, Juda idi tempel modoũ bun daleya fen, dinakesiyou fenẽ nigin age difen.
44026022	Anĩ ere, Negur aya isennaf isi, gama naa enei bun, anĩ nigin, aya ein afar fen, nanaal ado odudug bun wogõ auf. Aya Moses profet geid agef wõ youf den anĩ to adod ken, wogõ auf,
44026023	are Kristus darau yale fen, ĩ ket laa bun tamal mata kel fã ye fen, Israel tamo kayau ado haiden geid bun, fula fiya anĩ nigin kurõ fesiyouf anĩ.”
44026024	Pol yogo bouwa isennẽf nigin od enei wogõ ye di, Festus iweig iron, “Pol, õ wadã inok. Ogon keleĩ odug anim wadã bun irouleyok.”
44026025	Pol iron, “Odug Festus, aya wadã sã. Ereb aya orok enei are momoi, gariya ado.
44026026	King ĩ enei nigin keleĩ, anĩ nigin, aya kumĩ sã wogõ ayok. Aya momoi auf, are enei taka ĩ mala bun to iminen, ere nigin, enei iminẽyan to wõ yen.
44026027	King Agripa, õ profet ganan nigin momoi wof de? Aya keleĩ, õ momoi wof.”
44026028	Age ye di, Agripa Pol irokenen, “Õ kisi wof, are sain tobega eig fiya bun aya Kristen wõ auf nigin neu kisi falei wouf de?”
44026029	Pol iron, “Sain tobega be, sain meluk, aya Negur kosẽ afiyẽdig are õ nigin dogol sã, ganan gama aya karĩ wiyagef ãg, aya gen wowã gouf nigin, anĩ ere, sen enei dogol anĩ to difõyeĩf.”
44026030	Age ye di, king, gawaman nẽ mudur, Bernis ado, idi weim dibodon ganan fafã den.
44026031	Age de fen, idi aab ditor dile, abob diroken ken, diron, “Tamo enei ereb taka laa fouf nẽ be, kalabus ileya nẽ to age fef.”
44026032	Agripa Festus irokenen, “Tamo enei Sisa bun to kot fem are, ĩ yalisnẽya kisi feleyam.”
44027001	Amã waag bun Itali kantri malauf nigin od difõ di, Pol kalabus tamo tunĩ geid, kusĩ tamo neid orowa taka yana Julius ima bun dinenẽdin, ĩ Sisa nẽ Kusĩ Mala bun tamal taka.
44027002	Amã waag taka, Adramitium taun tamal Asia provins bun maaĩ ub ub ilau fenẽ agef mog, sõ mau fen, melen. Aristakus, Tesalonika taun tamo oun Masedonia provins bun tamal, ĩ amã weim.
44027003	Naa ile di, Saidon taun wõ maun. Julius ĩ Pol wau ifen ken, ĩ mou tar gedin ile fen, ereb ĩ lau fef anĩ difenẽf nigin yo fiyen.
44027004	Anenem amã baban waag bun sõ mau fen, Saipras nuyo wagenem melen, ere nigin, yau naaburamã gudũ fen.
44027005	Amã Silisia ado Pamfilia maaĩ atu mele fen, Lisia provins bun Maira taun wõ maun.
44027006	An kusĩ tamo neid orowa, Aleksandria taun tamal waag taka Itali kantri ilau fenẽ mog, ile fen, ĩ amã waag bun inenaman.
44027007	Amã naa musei, foinenem waag bun, Nidus taun non wõya nigin darau nem melen. Yau naaburamã gudũ fe di, amã Krit nuyo uyu Salmone wal mafe fen, Krit nuyo wagenem melen.
44027008	Amã darau kininem maaĩ ub dõ maf masil, modoũ yana Basis Biya dedig, Lasea taun non an wõ maun.
44027009	Naa musei ilelen, agef fen, waag bun ileya are mogo sane bagai len, ere nigin, naa are Kuriya Naa dumen. Anĩ nigin, Pol wedereid iroun,
44027010	“Tamo, aya ailef are, neda waag bun delẽ sanel fen, waag adoi, udũ adoi, tamo adag daũf sa kalauf.”
44027011	Anĩ ere, kusĩ tamo neid orowa, Pol wogõ yen anĩ to karĩ ye fen, waag irouya tamo ado waag marau idi neid od dõ fen.
44027012	Basis are yau sain bun ifareya to biya nigin, musei ganan, waag bun tokõ mafel, Finiks wõ mau fen, an mabodõf nigin kisi difon. Finiks are Krit nuyo nẽ basis taka, gaa ileyan saut ado not melem wage ifenek.
44027013	Yau saut melem foinenem fũ fe di, idi neid oroya kilei agef wõ yen anĩ kisi difen. Anĩ nigin, idi anka dĩ difesel fen, waag bun Krit nuyo maaĩ ub dõ de dilen.
44027014	Sain meluk ileya sã mog, yau odug totol ado, yana ‘Gaa iseyan not tamal’ dedig anĩ, fã ye fen, nuyo bunem fũf irou isilen.
44027015	Yau odug totol ado waag yũ di, waag yau bun ileya kisi feleya san. Anĩ nigin, amã waag ulum irouya matorõ di, yaum irouleman.
44027016	Amã nuyo naal taka Kauda dedig dumenem wal mafe fen, isennẽya nẽ waag naal darau nem dĩ mafen.
44027017	Tamo, isennẽya nẽ waag naal, waag odug teten dalesel dino fen, gama idi malũ nem waag odug anĩ to fara fouf nigin luwa filu difen. Idi waag, maaĩ kulum yana Sirtis bun sõya nigin kumĩ de fen, anka folõ difesi di, yaum waag iroulen.
44027018	Yau fatuk bagai waag yuk ile, we fele di, idi udũ tunĩ naanũ diraran.
44027019	Naa anĩ ile di, idi imedim waag nẽ safina naanũ diraran.
44027020	Naa musei, gaa ado barisa to mailen, agef fen, yau odug totol ado de agef yenen. Anĩ bunem, amã isennẽya malouf nigin waumã iseya ganan sa kelen.
44027021	Tamo idi sain meluk saaf sã denek dilen nigin, Pol meledin ifar fen, iron, “Tamo ã, neu od Kritem waag bun to talauf nigin arokenein anĩ karĩ gem, are dem, ago gem are, daũ fiya ado iraraileya enei to fotou gem.
44027022	Anĩ ere, aya totol unogouf nigin totol bagai arokeneik, ere nigin, ãgenei taka to fõ yalauf, waag dogol narĩ fouf.
44027023	Nor bõ, Negur, aya yogon, aya ĩ aruna aledig, yogon engel sirun ifar fen,
44027024	iron, ‘Pol, to kumĩ wo. Õ de Sisa malan kot bun ufarauf. Negur õ wau ifon ken, ganan õ geid waag bun ulegef idi neid mata õ ifonon.’
44027025	Anĩ nigin, tamo, totol unogouf, ere nigin, aya Negur bun momoiya anof, are ĩ irokanan kilei fau agef wõ youf.
44027026	Anĩ ere, ada nuyo taka bun sõ tauf.”
44027027	Naa fotin nẽ bõ anĩ bun, amã fau Mediterenian Maaĩ bun yaum iroulemã mog, bõ atun age fiya waag tamo idi teneub melsã melef ya anĩ kerẽ fedin.
44027028	Idi naan nẽ mala es difouf nigin malũ folõ difele di, isil fen, naan nẽ mala foti mita dilen. Sain naal bagai dile fen, idi baban malũ folõ difele di, isil fen, naan nẽ mala teti mita dilen.
44027029	Idi waag meein tuwa bun ileya nigin kumĩ de fen, idi waag dumen anka aiwa adodo folo folõ difeledi di, disil fen, gaa nigin kosẽ den.
44027030	Waag tamo idi, waag bun tamal diyalalau fenẽ nigin, idi isennẽya nẽ waag naal folõ difele di, maaĩwõ isilen, tamomoi de fen, waag uyu bun anka dirarãf nigin de fen, age difen.
44027031	Age dife di, Pol kusĩ tamo neid orowa, kusĩ tamo geid irokenẽdin, “Tamo eneidi waag bun to dibodõf are, ã isenneĩya to walogouf.”
44027032	Anĩ nigin, kusĩ tamo idi, malũ isennẽya nẽ waag naal iroun anĩ gudũ difele di, ilen.
44027033	We kurã fiya sã mog, idi ganan saaf dãf nigin, Pol ĩ totol bagai irokeneĩd fen, iron, “Naa fotin bun ã sii yei ken, saaf sã usigen, ã saaf taka to wõgen.
44027034	Anĩ nigin, gama aya ã saaf wãgauf nigin totol bagai arokeneik. Ã mata ubodõgouf nigin wãgauf. Ãgenei taka, mudur bun fatiya tekelei bagai taka to kusuf irãf.”
44027035	Pol od enei wogõ yel fen, idi ganan meleid bun, ĩ bret tunĩ yale, Negur de fiyekel fen, mũf gariya ino yon.
44027036	Idi ganan waud yalese di, saaf don.
44027037	Amã waag bun mafaren ganan gu feleya are 276.
44027038	Idi dakas kisi fele di, idi waag karikauf nigin, wit ganan maaĩwõ diraran.
44027039	Lalan ise di, teneub uyu nain be ya anĩ idi keleĩ san, anĩ ere, alelei ub mumul ado anĩ dilen, kisi falauf are, idi an waag dirou dilauf nigin kisi difon.
44027040	De sain tekelei bun maaĩwõ anka kokour de ditorarã yen ken, malũ waag uyu gadi fiya nẽ pul difon anĩ biru difeledin. Age difel fen, idi yau bun sel dalesel fen, yau difenẽ di, waag ubun irou ilauf nigin age difen.
44027041	Anĩ ere, maaĩ irak isi abob bun dũdig nẽ an, waag maaĩ kulum yu ken, anĩ teten sõ yesen. Waag uyu degẽ fel fen, tonoya kisi feleya san, age fe di, waag ibu maaim yũ di, faraf fisik fe irailen.
44027042	Kalabus tamo idi maaĩwõ to gaõgĩ de diyawauf nigin, kusĩ tamo idi didenkesiyouf nigin katõ difen.
44027043	Anĩ ere, kusĩ tamo neid orowa Pol isennẽf nigin wau iro ken, kusĩ tamo idi dogo neid kisi to dõ de age difouf nigin gudũ felen. Idi yoyõya kisi feleya anidi, ketem waag bun tamal gurusã de fen, teneub bun dilauf nigin, ĩ ari fedin.
44027044	Tunĩ ganan aa bun be, waag masasak bun an dilen. Anĩ bunem, idi ganan biya bagai totoũ teneub bun wowã den.
44028001	Amã biya bagai ubun wõ mau fen, nuyo are yana Malta ya anĩ kelein.
44028002	Tamo kayau an temeleid waud fatuk bagai difanaman. Uyẽ isi fen, feluken nigin, idi yã kũ dife fen, amã ganan aan difaman.
44028003	Pol ĩ aa were gurif fen, yã teten ino mog, gogour sane yã uruwam iru di, Pol ima bun degẽ felen.
44028004	Tamo kayau an temeleid, gogour anĩ Pol ima bun kuuri ye mog, dile fen, idi abob dirokenen, “Tamo enei tamo yukesiya tamo bagai, ere nigin, ĩ maaĩwõ tamal iyawol, anĩ ere, neda waitou Madur Fiya anim ĩ mata ibodõf nigin to oron.”
44028005	Age de di, Pol ĩ gogour wiri fe di, yã malan isilen, anĩ ere, ĩ bun ereb taka to wõ yen.
44028006	Tamo kayau ĩ ima dĩ youf be, kaisã bagai kubũ ye laa fouf de fen, kisi difen. Anĩ ere, idi sain meluk lo difef dile, ereb taka ĩ bun to wõ yen anĩ dile fen, idi kisi falei del diron, ĩ waitou den.
44028007	Teneub akor melsã are, nuyo anĩ nẽ mudur, Publius nẽ teneub ibodon. Ĩ aan fama ken, yogon fõ bun gei famã iroule, naa towo el fe kulatun faman.
44028008	Ĩ tama dagi di, fataren yenen, bouwa uruwa ado te fururũ yalen. Pol ĩ ilouf nigin ile kosẽ yel fen, ima teten ino di, dagi fara felen.
44028009	Enei wõ ye di, nuyo bun dagi tamo tunĩ ganan ĩ garan disi di, el feid ledin.
44028010	Idi naab fire fire bunem el difama ken, amã waag sõ mauf nigin dodok mafe di, idi amã ereb ereb lau mafen anĩ difanaman.
44028011	Ogõ towo ilele di, amã, waag taka yau sain bun nuyo an si inon anĩ, sõ mau fen, melen. Waag are Aleksandria taun tamal, anĩ uyu bun, waitou aina ado Kastor Polluks ado meleidkanon dinon.
44028012	Amã Sirakus taun wõ mau fen, naa towo an mabodon.
44028013	Anenem amã waag bun mele, Regium taun wõ maun. Naa anĩ ile di, yau saut melem fã yen, baban naa anĩ ile di, amã Puteoli taun wõ maun.
44028014	An amã momoiya tamo tunĩ fotou mafiyẽdi di, idi geid naa sewen mabodõf nigin dirokanaman. Age mafel fen, Rom taun masin.
44028015	Momoiya tamo an, amã masif ya anĩ karĩ de fen, idi diyok disi, Apius Maket ado Tamo Yenẽya Fõ Towo bun an fotou difamãf nigin disin. Pol tamo anidi ileid fen, Negur de fiye ken, wau megeir yalen.
44028016	Amã Rom wõ mau fen, Pol ĩ mugu kusĩ tamo takam tari fiyek dibodõf nigin yo difiyen.
44028017	Naa towo ilele di, Pol Juda neid uyu irouya iweig laisi, guru dife di, idi irokenẽdin, “Turau tar, aya, neda tamo kayau ado, neda tubuda tar neid tobonunã to adodon, anĩ ere, aya Jerusalem oun daliya fen, Rom imeid bun dinenan.
44028018	Idi aya fele difiyale fen, dalisnau fenẽ age difen, ere nigin, aya laa nẽ mosor taka to anon.
44028019	Anĩ ere, Juda idi anĩ nigin kiwai dinon, aya neu tamo kayau nigin bouwa yũya od taka san, anĩ ere, naab taka san nigin Sisa bun kot afen.
44028020	Gariya anĩ nigin, aya fotou ayei ken, ã geid wogõ tauf nigin to ayein. Israel neid waud iseya anĩ nigin, aya sen enei nem difõyan.”
44028021	Idi diron, “Amã õ nigin Judia distrik bun tamal pas taka to malen, agef fen, turada tar idi anenem disin õ nigin od taka be, od sane taka to dirokanaman.
44028022	Anĩ ere, amã ogon kisi anĩ karĩ mauf nigin waumã irok, ere nigin, amã keleĩ, tamo kayau teneub ganan bun, ogon momoiya mala enei nigin kiwai od wogõ dedig.”
44028023	Idi Pol dilouf nigin naa taka dinon, naa anĩ bun, idi musei bagaim Pol ibodon nẽ an disin. Pol ĩ bonimei nem ile bõ, Negur nẽ tano nigin faded fiyeĩd fen, kurõ feis irokenẽdin, ĩ Moses nẽ Lo ado profet neid itotoya bun, Jesus nigin idi neid kisi falei ye fen, momoi douf nigin age fen.
44028024	Tunĩ Pol wogõ yen anĩ bun waud falei yen, anĩ ere, tunĩ to momoi den.
44028025	Pol idikeleya od enei wogõ ye di, idi dogo dogol fefe de fen, dilelen, “Awa Uur Fateul profet Asaia sigor bunem eig ye wogõ yen, are ĩ tubuĩ tar momoi bagai od anĩ wogõ fiyẽdin:
44028026	“‘Tamo kayau enei bun ule fen, urõ, “ã wedereim karĩ gouf, anĩ ere, wedereĩ to fokõ youf, ã meleim ulogouf, anĩ ere, meleĩ to fokõ youf.”
44028027	Ere nigin, tamo kayau enei, idi waud katĩ felen, idi wederedim karĩya kisi feleya sã, age de fen, idi meleid difofakelen, age fiya sam are, idi meledim dilem, wederedim karĩ dem ado, idi waud fokõ ye fen, falei de di, aya idi el afedim.’
44028028	“Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ isennẽya haiden bun sur fen anĩ, ã keleĩ youf. Age fe di, idi anĩg karĩ douf!”
44028030	Yar uru adok, Pol ĩ yogon fõ na yaledig bun ibod ken, ĩ dilouf nigin disin ganan aan fiyẽdin.
44028031	Kumĩ sã ado kafĩ fiya sã, ĩ Negur nẽ tano nigin wogõ ye fen, Odug Jesus Kristus nigin ifelnẽdin.
45001001	Aya Pol, Kristus Jesus nẽ ferfer, aposel wõ auf nigin iweigna fen, Negur nẽ biya od wogõ auf nigin igirnan.
45001002	Biya od anĩ, Negur kulu bagai yogon profet promis od irokenẽdi di, Negur nẽ Itotoya Fateul bun ditoton,
45001003	are yogon Naal, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nigin, ĩ tamo nẽ ibor bun are, Dawid nẽ ibor bun wõ yen,
45001004	agef fen, fateul nẽ Awa Uur bunem, ĩ laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen anim, Negurem Jesus ĩ Yogo Naal megeir barikã ado anĩ yaor kurõ fesin.
45001005	Ĩ bunem, amã yogon yana seli kulõ fiya nigin, haiden ganan atun temeleid, tamo kayau maweignẽdi di, idi momoi de fen, dõ difouf nigin, amã wau ifenẽya ado aposel nẽ kabĩ malen.
45001006	Ãg, Jesus nẽ tamo kayau wowã douf nigin iweignẽdif anidi atun, ubodõgef.
45001007	Tamo kayau ganan Rom taun ubodõgef, Negur ã nigin wau laaf fen, tamo kayau fateul wõ gouf nigin iweignein, ã bun pas enei atotof. Wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, neda Tamada Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, ã bun isiyouf.
45001008	Uruwa bagai, aya ã ganan nigin, Jesus Kristus bunem, neu Negur de afiyek, ere nigin, ãgenei momoiya nigin teneub ganan bun od iyokelen.
45001009	Negur ĩ nigin aya wau adok iro ken, ĩ Naal nẽ biya od wogõya bun aruna aledig, ĩ ileya mog, aya ã nigin toku neu kosẽya bun faimud karĩ auledig.
45001010	Age afe fen, gama Negur orouf are, naab kã fele di, aya ã gein asiyouf nigin aya kosẽ auf.
45001011	Aya ã ileyeĩya nigin bagai wau irok, are aya uur nẽ ege luwa tunĩ megeir ifareya nẽ anĩ afeneĩf nigin age afef,
45001012	anĩ bunem, aya ã geid, mugu mugu ãgenei momoiya ado neu momoiya bunem abob tasennẽf.
45001013	Turau tar, aya ã enei to keleĩ youf anĩ to orouf, aya, sain musei, ã gein isiya nigin kisi afen, anĩ ere, aya age fiya nigin, naab katĩ felef isi, gama enei bun, are aya, Juda sã anidi tunĩ ganan atun, age afen gen, ã atuneg gei ayeĩf nigin age afen.
45001014	Negur aya isennan nigin, aya ĩ bun wareg ado. Anĩ nigin, Aya, tamo Grik od ado dogo neid tobonuneid keleĩ anidi ado, tamo Grik od ado dogo neid tobonuneid keleĩ sã anidi bun, kisi biya adodo, nene yedidiya buneg, wareg enei aũf.
45001015	Age fiya nigin, aya Rom taun ubodõgef ã buneg, biya od anĩ wogõya nigin kisi totol alef.
45001016	Aya biya od nigin to mama fiyaf, ere nigin, are Negur nẽ megeir, tamo ganan momoi def, kel gei fouf nigin, Juda idi bun keteme di, Juda sã anidi idi buneg age fouf.
45001017	Ere nigin, biya od bun, Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ kurõ fesif, Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ momoiya bunem dogol isif, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Madur tamo momoiya bunem mata ibodõf.”
45001018	Negur nẽ didi, saa ilun tamal, tamo idi dogo neid sanem momoi anĩ lai difedig anidi neid mosor ado sane ganan bun yaoref,
45001019	ere nigin, ereb Negur nigin idi keleĩ youf are, idi bun yaor, ere nigin, Negur ĩ idi bun anĩ yaor fen.
45001020	Negur teneub saa ado kare fen sain bunem isi gamag, Negur nẽ tobonunã ileya kisi feleya sã anĩ, are in ibodkeleya megeir ado ĩ Negur ya anĩ, idi yaor diledig. Ereb Negur inodin anĩ bunem idi keleĩ, anĩ nigin, tamo idi galã taka sã.
45001021	Idi Negur kelein, anĩ ere, idi ĩ Negur gen to yana dales fen, de difiyẽdig, anĩ ere, idi neid kisi nene yel fen, idi neid waud neneya anĩ bunem dogo neid waud gugum kerũ felen.
45001022	Idi amã kisi biya ado dedig, anĩ ere, idi neneya wowã de fen,
45001023	idi to bura leya Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anĩ falei difel, bura leya nẽ tamo, ninã, gaar ado, gaar luwedim diyõdig imedim meleidkanon dinon anĩ bun dinon.
45001024	Anĩ nigin, Negur idi itornẽdi di, idi neid waud irõya sane dõ de, noli mosor dino amuyẽ bun dile fen, idi neid bouwedim abob mama difenẽdig.
45001025	Idi Negur nẽ momoi anĩ falei difel, idegẽya bun dinon, age de fen, idi Negur ereb ereb kare fen anĩ ban, ereb ereb Negurem kare fen idi yeneid anĩ dales fen, aruneid daledig. Negur ĩ faimud yana yaleseyauf. Momoi.
45001026	Enei nigin, Negur idi mama nẽ oroya bun itornẽdi di, dilen. Idi neid kayaug, Negur bagu fedin geid bouweid bagu fiya ditor ken, falei del, kayau tutur Negur bagu fediya sã anidi geid bouweid bagu difedig.
45001027	Age fiya bagai, tamog Negur kayau ado bagu fedin anĩ ditor ken, idi abob bun noli nigin yã gaĩ de genen. Tamo, tamo tunĩ geid mama tobonunã age dife fen, idi neid idodõya mala darau dogo ke de dalen.
45001028	Idi Negur nigin keleĩ yaleya ditoron, anĩ nigin, Negur idi itornẽdi di, idi neid kisi sanel fen, idi ereb ereb to age fiya nẽ anĩ age difedig.
45001029	Idi tobonunã madur fiya sã fire fire ganan, sane, safina nigin neu dogol yeya ado, to ile oroya anim isokosen. Idi kiyeĩ, tamo yukesiya, kusĩ, idegẽya ado, sanem barikã. Idi dumen od wogõ dedig,
45001030	idi bou yũya od wogõ dedig, Negur dudum difiyẽdig, idi kono difedig, idi akoreid dũdig, idi dogo yeneid dalesedig. Idi sane age fiya nigin naab dimirẽdig. Idi sineid temeid tar sigoreid to dõ difedig.
45001031	Idi kisi biya sã, momoiya sã, waud laa fiya sã, waud yũya sã.
45001032	Idi Negur nẽ lo keleĩ, are idi anĩ age difef laa gurug difouf, anĩ ere, idi anĩ dogol to age difef diledig, anĩ ere, idi tunĩ anĩ age difedig anidig waud difenẽdidig.
45002001	Anĩ nigin, õ galã taka sã, õ aib taka es wiyẽdig, ereb taka bun es wiyek, õ ogo boũ uk, ere nigin, õ taka es wiyek, õ ogog de ago wodig.
45002002	Ada keleĩ, Negur nẽ es fiya idi age difef anidi bun isif, are momoi nẽ bun Negur es fedig.
45002003	Anĩ nigin, tamo õ aib, tunĩ age difef anidi es wiyeĩd fen, õg anĩ ago wodig, õ Negur nẽ es fiya anĩ wal afouf wof de?
45002004	Õ, Negur nẽ biya fiya õ waũ faleiya bun irouyõ isif anĩ to kelei ken, yogon biya fiya, molol ado, feseya sã, idi kisi feleya bagai anĩ, õ kono wof de?
45002005	Anĩ ere, ogon waũ totol ado ogon waũ faleiya sã bunem, õ ogo nigin Negur nẽ didi wõ youf naa bun walouf nigin didi kuru wof, sain anĩ bun Negur nẽ es fiya madur bagai anĩ yaorouf.
45002006	Negur ĩ “mugu mugu ereb age difen kilei ifenẽdiyouf.”
45002007	Idi feseya sã ereb biya age difen bunem, fula fiya medeĩya, yana ado, to bura leya dimirẽdig anidi, mata ibodkeleya ifenẽdiyouf.
45002008	Anĩ ere, idi dogo nigin dogol kisi de fen dimirẽ di, idi momoi anĩ ditor ken, sane dõ difedig anidi bun, didi ado seyeya wõ youf.
45002009	Morõ ado darau, tamo sane age difedig ganan bun wõ youf, Juda idi bun keteme di, haiden idi buneg age fouf.
45002010	Anĩ ere, fula fiya medeĩya, yana ado, wau inosiya, idi biya age difedig ganan bun wõ youf, Juda idi bun keteme di, haiden idi buneg age fouf.
45002011	Ere nigin, Negur ĩ Juda ado haiden, es fiya tekelei bunem es fediyouf.
45002012	Idi Moses nẽ lo sa ken, mosor dinof gananeg, Moses nẽ lo sã daũ falauf, idi Moses nẽ lo farumen dibod ken, mosor dinof ganan, Moses nẽ lo nem es fediyouf.
45002013	Negur mala bun, idi lo karĩ dedig anidi madur bagai sã, anĩ ere, idi lo dõ difedig anidi, Negur mala bun madur bagai youf.
45002014	Haiden idi lo sã dogo neid kisim ereb ereb lo irok kilei age difedig, idi lo sã, anĩ ere, idi dogo, dogo nigin lo.
45002015	Idi ereb ereb lo irok anĩ dogo neid waud bun itoton anĩ yaor difef, anĩ nigin, dogo neid kisi es fiya waud bun ibodok animeg, are momoi anĩ, yaor fe di, dogo neid kisim dogo bouweid yu ken, isenneĩd mog fef.
45002016	Neu biya od, Jesus nigin tamo kayau arokenẽdif anĩ irok kilei, Negur Jesus Kristus bunem, tamo nẽ wau bun iminek anĩ es fouf naa bun, enei agef bagai wõ youf.
45002017	Õ ogo nigin aya Juda tamo wof; õ lo bun ufar fen, aya Negur ado nigal mauf wo fen, yanã walesef;
45002018	õ lom faded yõ di, õ Negur nẽ oroya kelei ken, ereb madur bagai anĩ õ biya wof;
45002019	õ ogo nigin momoi wof, are õ mala ifofakeleya neid ulum irouya tamo, õ idi gugum bun difaref anidi neid lalan,
45002020	õ neneya tamo neid tai fiya tamo, õ momou neid tise, ere nigin, õ lo bun keleĩ ado momoi anĩ barikã,
45002021	age fiyauf are, õ tunĩ ufelnẽdidig, õ ogo to ufelnẽdig de? Õ to bẽ walegei wodig, õ ogo bẽ waledig de?
45002022	Õ to seseirã unoi wodig, õ seseirã unodig de? Õ idegẽya waitou anĩ to bagai oroyõdig, õ dogo neid tempel bun bẽ waledig de?
45002023	Õ aya lo ado wo fen, yanã walesedig, õ lo ifodulũya bunem Negur mama wenẽdig de?
45002024	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Ã bunem, haiden atun Negur yana kono difiyek.”
45002025	Õ lo dõ wof are, mulũ are isennok, anĩ ere, õ lo ufodulõf are, õ mulũ ileya sã gen wõ wof.
45002026	Anĩ nigin, idi mulũ ileya sã anidim lo irok kilei dõ difouf are, idi mulũ ileyan gen to ilediyauf de?
45002027	Taka ĩ mulũ to ile fen, lo dõf el fouf are, ĩ, õ lo itotoya ado fen, mulũ ulen, anĩ ere, õ lo ifodulũya tamo ye fen, to es yõf de?
45002028	Tamo ĩ bouwam dogol Juda tamouf, ĩ Juda tamo bagai sã. Bouwam dogol mulũ ilef, areg mulũ bagai sã.
45002029	Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ name bun Juda tamouf, ĩ Juda tamo bagai. Mulũ bagai are, Awa Uurem, waud bun age fedig, lo itotoya bunem sã. Tamo age fiya, tamo bunem yana yaleseya to yaledig, anĩ ere, Negur bunem yaledig.
45003001	Age fiyauf are, tamo ĩ aya Juda tamo yef bun, ere biya yalouf? Mulũ bun ere biya adouf?
45003002	Naab ganan bun musei! Uruwa bagai, Negur nẽ od idi kulatun difouf nigin imeid bun inon.
45003003	Juda tunĩ momoiya sãf are, naig fouf? Idi neid momoiya sã anim, Negur age fouf yen anĩ to age fouf de?
45003004	To bagai agef ilauf! Negur ĩ momoi bagai, age fe di, tamo ganan idegẽya temeleid tauf. Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Are sain õ wogõ wouf bun, õ madur bagai anĩ yaorouf, sain õ es diyõf bun, õ wal wediyouf nigin.”
45003005	Anĩ ere, ada neda madur bagai sã anim, Negur nẽ madur bagai fatuk bagai yaor fouf are, ada ere tauf? Negur ĩ ada bun yogon didi ifanadauf nigin, ĩ madur sã tauf de? Aya tamo nẽ luwa irouya anĩ wogõ auf.
45003006	To bagai agef ilauf! Age fiyauf are, Negur tamo kayau naig fe es fediyouf?
45003007	Taka nem monẽ ye fen, irõf, “Neu idegẽya anim Negur nẽ momoi bagai anĩ yaau du fe di, anĩ bunem, yogon fula fiya medeĩya odugouf are, ere nigin aya fau mosor tamal ya ani, bouwau bun inouf?”
45003008	Ere nigin to eig youf, “Biya anĩ wõ youf nigin, ada sane age tafouf” youf? Tunĩ amam od enei wogõ maudig de fen, amã bouwamã yũya od dirõdig. Negur idi es feid fen, mala solo ifenẽdiyouf.
45003009	Amã ere mauf? Juda amã haiden wal fediya de? Gai sã bagai! Amã mogo, Juda ado haiden geid ganan mosor farumen kilei kilei dibodok ya anĩ, moron.
45003010	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Madur bagai taka to ibodok, tekelei bagaig sã;
45003011	taka nem kisi fokõya sã, taka nem Negur imirẽya sã.
45003012	Ganan Negur nẽ naab fasis dife fen, ganan sesen len; aibem taka to biya age fedig, tekelei bagaig sã.”
45003013	“Idi neid uleidbanĩ, laa nẽ meku awa dede fiya sã gen; idi neid baleid idegẽya wogõ dedig.” “Gogour sane nẽ mũ sigoredin ibodok.”
45003014	“Idi neid eweid, isisĩya ado dirikeĩ bagai.”
45003015	“Idi neid yeid, tamo didenkesiyouf nigin tuninirya sã kaisã bagai dirãdig;
45003016	idi neid iyõya bun, daũ fiya ado morõ dinodig,
45003017	age de fen, wau inosiya nẽ naab idi keleĩ sã.”
45003018	“Idi neid meleid bun, idi Negur nigin kumĩ sã.”
45003019	Gama ada keleĩ, ereb lo irok are, idi lo farumen dibodok anidi irokenẽdif, anĩ bunem, eweid ganan omutukul del fen, tenebur tamo kayau ganan Negur nẽ es fiya farumen dibodõf.
45003020	Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ, lo dõ fiya bunem, ĩ mala bun taka ĩ madur bagai to youf. Age fiya nigin, lom ada mosor tanon anĩ yaor fadadig.
45003021	Anĩ ere, gama Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab, are lo bunem sã anĩ yaor fen, are Lo ado profet neid wogõya bun kurõ difesin.
45003022	Negur ĩ tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab enei, Jesus Kristus nigin momoiya bunem, idi momoi def ganan bun isif. Juda ado haiden bun de tekelei,
45003023	ere nigin, ganan mosor dinon, anĩ nigin, taka nem Negur fula fiya medeĩya bun ibodok ĩ wagen ileya kisi feleya sã.
45003024	Age dife di, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya anim, kel gei fiya Kristus Jesus na yaledin bunem isin anĩ bunem, idi ege bagai madur bagai inodif.
45003025	Negur ĩ, Jesus nẽ naud bun momoiya bunem, Negur nẽ didi yof fen, tamo kayau neid mosor yalelkenẽdiya kabĩ yalouf nigin, Negurem Jesus sesewi fouf nigin inenen. Ĩ yogo madur bagai ya anĩ yaor fiya nigin, enei age fen, ere nigin, in molol bunem, uruwa mosor dinon anĩ mala solo ifenẽdiya sã itornẽdin.
45003026	Sain enei bun, ĩ yogo madur bagai ya anĩ, yaor fiya nigin age fen, are ĩ yogo madur bagai ye fen, taka ĩ Jesus bun momoiya ado ĩ madur bagai youf nigin age fen.
45003027	Age fiyauf are, yana yaleseya anĩ nain? Yana yaleseya are sã. Ere gariya bunem? Lo dõ fiya bunem de? Sã, momoiya bunem.
45003028	Ere nigin, ada keleĩ, Negur ĩ tamo nẽ momoiya bunem madur bagai youf, lo dõ fiya bunem sã.
45003029	Negur ĩ Juda neid dogol de? Ĩ haiden neid sã de? Eo, ĩ haiden nedig Negur.
45003030	Negur ĩ tekelei, ĩ mulũ dilen anidi, momoiya bunem madur bagai youf, agef fen, mulũ ileya sãg, momoiya de tekelei anim madur bagai youf.
45003031	Age fiyauf are, ada momoiya eneim lo anĩ tadodõf de? Sã bagai. Age fiya ban, ada lo tarou kafĩ tafalauf.
45004001	Age fiyauf are, ada Juda tubuda Abraham, ere anĩ ĩ gurug fen nigin, ere tauf?
45004002	Abraham yogon kabĩ bunem, madur bagai inenem are, Abraham ĩ yogo yana yaleseya nigin ereb taka adom, anĩ ere, Negur mala bun sã.
45004003	Negur nẽ Itotoya ere ye irok? “Abraham Negur nigin momoi ye di, Negur ĩ Abraham madur bagai yen.”
45004004	Tamo taka ĩ kabĩ yalef, yogon mala solo are ege luwa ifenẽya gen sã, are kabĩ mala.
45004005	Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ madur bagai wõ youf nigin kabĩ to yale fen, Negur, ĩ dõ fiya sã anidi madur fedidig, ĩ nigin momoi yef, Negur yogon momoiya are madur bagai yef.
45004006	Dawid ĩg, tamo kabĩ bunem sã, Negur madur bagai yen, tamo anĩ nẽ el fiya nigin wogõ yen:
45004007	“Idi neid kũ fenẽya nigin weder tu keledig, idi neid mosor yaleledig, are el fedif.
45004008	Tamo ĩ yogon mosor nigin Odug to bagai iwesnẽf, ĩ el fiyek.”
45004009	El fiya enei mulũ ileya neid dogol de? Sã, are mulũ ileya san neideg. Age fiya nigin, amã morõdig, Negur Abraham nẽ momoiya bunem ĩ madur bagai yen.
45004010	Ere sain bun Negur ĩ age yen? Ĩ mulũ ilel mog de, mulũ ileya sã mog? Ĩ mulũ ilel mog sã, ĩ mulũ ileya sã mog.
45004011	Ĩ mulũ ileya nẽ uris, are ĩ fau mulũ ileya sã mog, momoiya bunem Negur madur bagai yen anĩ nẽ uris yalen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ mulũ ileya san momoi def ganan neid temeid, anĩ bunem, Negur idi madur bagai youf.
45004012	Ĩ mulũ ileya nedig temeid, idi mulũ dilen dogol sã, anĩ ere, idi tubuda Abraham ĩ mulũ ileya sã mog, momoiya ado iyon anĩ yebura dõ de diyõdig anidi nedig.
45004013	Negur, Abraham ado in tubu tar irokenẽdin, are Negurem ereb ereb ganan idi afenẽdi di, akorediyouf yen anĩ, lo bunem sã, anĩ ere, madur bagai momoiya bunem isif anĩ bunem.
45004014	Idi lo dõ difedig anidim, Negurem ereb ereb ganan idi afenẽdi di, akorediyouf yen anĩ akorediyouf are, momoiya are ege ile di, ereb Negur iron are ege kilẽf,
45004015	are lo didi irou isidig nigin. Lo sãf are, lo ifodulũyag sã.
45004016	Anĩ nigin, ereb Negur age afouf yen are, wau ifenẽya bunem, kabĩ yalef ya anĩ yaorouf nigin, momoiya bunem isidig, are Negur ĩ, ege luwa Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar ganan afenẽdiyouf yen anĩ, megeir fiya nigin age fedig, idi lo dõ difedig anidi bun dogol sã, anĩ ere, idi Abraham nẽ momoiya dõ difedig anidi buneg. Age fiya nigin, Abraham ĩ, ada ganan neda tamada.
45004017	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Aya õ teneub akor musei neid temeid anenon.” Negur mala bun, ĩ neda tamada, Abraham Negur nigin momoi yen, Negur ĩ tamo gare den mata ifeneĩd fen, ereb to ibodok anĩ iweig di, agef wõ yedig, Negur ĩ anĩ.
45004018	Wau iseya nigin gariya taka sã bun, Abraham in wau iseya bun momoi yen, are ĩ teneub akor musei neid temeid wõ youf nigin age fen, are Negur ĩ eig ye irokenen kilei, “Ogon ibor agef yenẽf.”
45004019	In momoiya bun felu reya sã, ĩ handred yar age fiya ibodon nigin, yogon bouwa anĩ laa gen ile fen, Sara kesu yaleya nigineg laa gen ilen.
45004020	Anĩ ere, ereb ĩ Negur iron anĩ nigin to wau uru fen, in momoiya to ilef isi fen, anĩ ere, ĩ yogon momoiya megeir fe fen, Negur fula fiya medeĩya ifenen.
45004021	Abraham ĩ, ereb Negur age afouf yen anĩ age fiya nigin, ĩ megeir ado, ye fen, momoi bagai yen.
45004022	Anĩ nigin, Negur, Abraham nigin ĩ madur bagai yen.
45004023	Od “Negur ĩ nigin madur bagai yen” are, ĩ nigin dogol to itoton,
45004024	anĩ ere, Negur ada nigin madur bagai youf anĩ nigineg itoton, are ada, Negur, neda Odug Jesus tamo gare den bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen nigin, momoi tauf anĩ.
45004025	Negur ĩ Jesus neda mosor nigin laa bun inene ken, ada madur bagai youf nigin, Jesus mata kel turĩ fiyen.
45005001	Anĩ nigin, momoiya bunem, Negur ada madur bagai yen nigin, ada neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, Negur ado maror bun tabodok.
45005002	Neda momoiya bunem, Jesus Kristus ĩ, ada Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya enei ada gama an tafaref anĩ namen irou ileda di, telen. Anĩ nigin, ada Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin, wauda ise fen, kulĩ taudig.
45005003	Anĩ nigin dogol sã, ada neda morõ nigineg kulĩ taudig, ere nigin, ada keleĩ, morõ bunem feseya sã anĩ wõ yedig,
45005004	feseya sã anĩ bunem atĩya biya wõ yedig, atĩya biya bunem wau iseya wõ yedig.
45005005	Wau iseya anim ada to fõ fadadig, ere nigin, Awa Uur Fateul Negurem ifanadan anĩ bunem, in wau laa fiya ada wauda bun fi felen.
45005006	Ada fau maleg tabod mog, in sain bun bagai, Kristus ĩ, ada Negur dõ fiya sã anidi nigin laa fen.
45005007	Tamo takam, taka madur bagai nigin, laa fiya malai bagai, agef fen, tamo takam aib taka tobonunã biya ado nigin totol ino fen, laa fouf be.
45005008	Anĩ ere, Negur ada nigin yogon wau laa fiya anĩ, enei bun ada ifelnadaf, are ada fau mosor bun tabod mog, Kristus ada nigin laa fen.
45005009	Gama yogon naud bunem, Negur ada madur bagai yen nigin, ada ĩ bunem Negur nẽ didi bun tamal baban momoi bagai yalelkanadauf!
45005010	Sain ada Negur nẽ kiwai tamo tar tabod mog, yogon Naal nẽ laa bunem, ada ĩ geid komo fadan. Gama ada ĩ geid komo fadan nigin, baban momoi bagai, Kristus nẽ mata bunem ada kel gei fadauf!
45005011	Enei dogol sã, anĩ ere, ada, ereb Negur neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem age fen nigineg kulĩ taudig, are Jesus Kristus bunem, ada gama komo fiya talen.
45005012	Anĩ nigin, tamo tekelei bunem, mosor ket tenebur wõ ye di, laa mosor bunem wõ yen, age fiya bagai, ganan mosor dinon nigin, laa, tamo ganan bun wõ yen.
45005013	Lo wõya sã mog, mosor tenebur ibodon. Anĩ ere, lo sãf are, mosor to iwesauf.
45005014	Anĩ ere, Adam nẽ sain bunem ile Moses nẽ sain bun, idi Adam age fen gen, to Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya wal difen anidig laa farumen dibodon, Adam ĩ taka fau isiyouf nẽ malakanon.
45005015	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ ege luwa are mosor Adam inon gen sã. Tamo tekelei nẽ mosor bunem musei gare den ouf are, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ado ege luwa, tamo tekelei Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem isin, naig fiya bagai tamo musei bun gogũ fouf!
45005016	Takag age fiya, Negur nẽ ege luwa are, tamo tekelei nẽ mosor mala age fiya sã. Es fiya mosor tekelei dõf fen, mosor inon nigin bouwa bun od yũya irou isin, anĩ ere, ege luwa mosor musei dõf fen, madur bagai anĩ irou isin.
45005017	Tamo tekelei nẽ mosor bunem, laa anĩ, tamo tekelei anĩ bunem mudur ibodon ouf are, idi Negur bunem, wau ifenẽya barikã ado, madur bagai anĩ nẽ ege luwa barikã dalef anidi, momoi bagai, tamo tekelei Jesus Kristus bunem, mata bun mudur dibodõf!
45005018	Anĩ nigin, mosor tekelei bunem, Negur tamo ganan mosor temeleid yen, age fiya gen, madur bagai tekelei age fen bunem, Negur tamo nigin madur bagai ye fen, tamo ganan nigin mata irou isin.
45005019	Tamo tekelei nẽ od wal fiya bunem, musei mosor adodo wowã den, age fiya gen, tamo tekelei nẽ dõ fiya bunem, musei madur bagai wowã douf.
45005020	Mosor ifageya nigin, lo isin. Anĩ ere, mosor ifaga di, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya fatuk bagai ifagan,
45005021	are mosor laa bun mudur ibodon gen, wau ifenẽya madur bagai bunem mudur ibod ken, neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem mata ibodkeleya irou isiyouf nigin age fen.
45006001	Age fiyauf are, ada ere tauf? Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ifagauf nigin, ada mosorei tauf de?
45006002	Sã bagai! Ada mosor bun gare taun; naig fe di, ada anĩ bun tau tabodõf?
45006003	Ada ganan Kristus Jesus bun naan talen, are yogon laa bun naan talen anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
45006004	Anĩ nigin, ada, laa bun naan talen bunem, ĩ geid mũ fadan, are Kristus, Tama nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nẽ megeir bunem, tamo gare den bun tamal kel turĩ fen gen, adag ibodõya mata bun mata tabodõf nigin age fen.
45006005	Ada yogon laa bun, enei gen ĩ geid bagu fadan ouf are, ada momoi bagai yogon kel fãya buneg, ĩ geid bagu fadauf.
45006006	Ada keleĩ, mosor nẽ bouwada yukesiyouf nigin, neda oroya tubu ĩ geid aa tetek bun yun, are ada mosor nẽ ferfer to tabodõf nigin age fen,
45006007	ere nigin, taka ĩ laa fen are, ĩ mosor nẽ megeir bun tamal yalelnen.
45006008	Ada Kristus geid gare taun ouf are, adag ĩ geid mata tabodõf nigin momoi tauf.
45006009	Ere nigin, ada keleĩ, Kristus tamo gare den bun tamal, kel turĩ fiyen nigin, ĩ baban to bagai laa fouf, ĩ laa nẽ megeirem baban to irounẽf.
45006010	Ĩ laa fen are, ĩ mosor nẽ megeir yukesiyouf nigin, sain tekelei bun dogol laa fen, anĩ ere, mata ĩ ibodok are, ĩ Negur bun mata ibodok.
45006011	Age fiya bagai, ã aug nigin, mosor bun gareg fen, Kristus Jesus bunem, Negur bun mata ubodõgef anĩ kisi gouf.
45006012	Anĩ nigin, ãgenei bouweĩ bura leya nẽ anĩ bun, mosor mudur ibodõ di, ã in oroya sane anĩ dõ gouf nigin to ago gouf.
45006013	Ãgenei bouweĩ tunĩ, sane nẽ aruna yaleya nigin mosor bun to wenẽgouf, anĩ ere, idi laa bun tamal kel turĩ fedin gen, ã aug Negur wenẽg fen, ãgenei bouweĩ tunĩ, madur bagai nẽ aruna yaleya nigin Negur bun wenẽgouf.
45006014	Mosor ãgenei odug to ibodõf, ere nigin, ã lo farumen sã, wau ifenẽya farumen ubodõgef.
45006015	Age fiyauf are, naig fiya? Ada lo farumen sã, wau ifenẽya farumen tabodok nigin, mosor tanouf de? Gai sã bagai!
45006016	Sain ã aug, taka sigor dõg fen, ferfer gen ĩ aruna walegef, ã taka sigor dõ gef anĩ nẽ ferfer ubodõgef anĩ, ã to keleĩ de? Ã mosor nẽ ferfer ubodõgef, are laa bun irouleyeik, ã Negur dõ fiya nẽ ferfer ubodõgef, are madur bagai bun irouleyeik.
45006017	Anĩ ere, ada Negur de tafiyẽf, ere nigin, ã uruwa bun mosor nẽ ferfer ubodõgen, anĩ ere, ã tai fiya difenein anĩ, ãgenei wauĩ adok dõ gen.
45006018	Ã mosor bun tamal yalelneĩ di, madur bagai nẽ ferfer wõ gen.
45006019	Aya, ã bouweĩ bun felu reya nigin, tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem wogõ auf. Ã uruwa bun ferfer gen, ãgenei bouweĩ, sane amuyẽ ado bun unogen, ago ge di, fatuk bagai sane len, age fiya gen, gama ã ferfer gen, ãgenei bouweĩ, madur bagai bun unoge di, fateul bagai wõ gouf.
45006020	Sain ã mosor nẽ ferfer ubodõgen, ã madur bagai nẽ farumen to ubodõgen.
45006021	Sain anĩ bun, ereb ã gama mama yeik bun tamal, ã ere mala biya walegen? Anĩ ganan are, laa bun irou isif.
45006022	Anĩ ere, ã gama mosor bun tamal yalelneĩ di, Negur nẽ ferfer wõ gen, anĩ nẽ mala biya are, fateul bun irouleyeik, anĩ nẽ kaũ are, mata faimud ibodkeleya.
45006023	Ere nigin, mosor mala, are laa, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ ege luwa, are neda Odug Kristus Jesus bun mata faimud ibodkeleya.
45007001	Turau tar, aya, Moses nẽ lo keleĩ tamo ã arokeneik, lo are tamo mata ibodok sain bun dogol, ĩ bun megeir ado anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
45007002	Eig fiya gen, lo irok, kayau tamo aiwaf, ĩ tamo mata ibodok sain bun dogol ĩ aiwaf, anĩ ere, ĩ aiwa laa fouf are, kayau ĩ bagu fiya nẽ lo farumen to ibodõf.
45007003	Age fiya nigin, kayau ĩ aiwa monog fau mata ibod mog, ĩ baban tamo taka yalouf are, ĩ seseirã kayau douf. Anĩ ere, yogon tamo laa fouf are, lo anim kayau to irounẽ di, ĩ tamo taka yaloufeg, ĩ to seseirã kayau douf.
45007004	Anĩ nigin, neu turau tar, ãg Kristus bouwa bunem lo bun gare gen, are ã, taka ĩ tamo gare den bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nẽ wowãg fen, ada Negur bun faat biya taũf nigin ago gen.
45007005	Sain ada bouwa nẽ oroyam irounadan bun, lo anim mosor nẽ oroya turĩ fe di, mosor nẽ oroya anim bouwada bun kabĩ yalen, anĩ bun, ada laa nẽ faat taun.
45007006	Anĩ ere, gama ada ereb mogo irounadan bun gare taun nigin, ada lo bun tamal yalelnadan, anĩ nigin, ada Awa Uur nẽ naab mata bun aruna talef, naab tubu lo itotoya bun sã.
45007007	Age fiyauf are, ada ere tauf? Lo anĩ mosor de? Sã bagai! Momoi, lo sam are, aya mosor are ereb yef anĩ to keleim. Ere nigin, taka nẽ safina ile to oroya nigin lo to age ye irom are, aya taka nẽ safina ile to oroya nigin to keleim.
45007008	Anĩ ere, ĩtãfiya anim mosor modoũ ifenẽ di, aya nameun mosorem taka nẽ safina ile oroya fire fire ganan inodin. Ere nigin, lo sãf are, mosor are laa fen.
45007009	Uruwa aya lo sã bun mata abodon, anĩ ere, ĩtãfiya isi di, mosor mata fã ye di,
45007010	aya laa fiyan. Lo anĩ mata irousiyouf aun, anĩ ere, ĩ momoi bagai laa irousin anĩ ailen.
45007011	Ere nigin, ĩtãfiya anim mosor modoũ ifenẽ di, mosorem aya idegna fen, ĩtãfiya bunem laa bun inenan.
45007012	Age fiyauf are, lo are fateul, ĩtãfiya are fateul, madur fen, biya.
45007013	Age fouf are, ereb biya anim aya bun laa irousin de? Sã bagai! Anĩ ere, mosor are mosor ya anĩ yaorouf nigin, mosorem ereb biya bunem aya bun laa irousin, are mosor ĩtãfiya bunem mosor bagai wõ youf nigin age fen.
45007014	Ada keleĩ, lo are Negur bun tamal, anĩ ere, aya bouwa buru nẽ, mosor nẽ ferfer gen na nẽ sur fiyan.
45007015	Ereb aya age afef, are aya keleĩ sã. Ere nigin, ereb aya age fiya nigin orouf, are aya to age afedig, anĩ ere, ereb aya to orouf anĩ, aya age afedig.
45007016	Ereb aya age fiya nigin to orouf anĩ, aya age afouf are, aya lo are biya auf anĩ ifelnadaf.
45007017	Anĩ nigin, aya yug anĩ to age afef, anĩ ere, mosor aya nameun ibodok anim age fef.
45007018	Aya keleĩ, ereb biya taka, aya nameun, are mosor nẽ bouwau enei bun to ibodok. Ere nigin, aya ereb biya age fiya nigin orouf, anĩ ere, aya age fiya kisi feleya sã.
45007019	Ere nigin, ereb aya age afef, are ereb biya age fiya nigin orouf anĩ sã, anĩ ere, ereb sane aya age fiya nigin to orouf anĩ, aya faimud age afedig.
45007020	Aya ereb to orouf anĩ age afouf are, ayam anĩ to age afef, anĩ ere, mosor aya nameun ibodok anim age fef.
45007021	Anĩ nigin, aya tobonunã eig fiya kabĩ yale mog, ailef: Sain aya biya age afou fenẽ di, sane anĩ aya ado ibodõdig.
45007022	Ere nigin, aya nameun Negur nẽ lo nigin wau kulĩ yedig,
45007023	anĩ ere, aya lo taka anĩ bouwau tunĩ bun kabĩ yale mog, ailef, are neu kisi biya nẽ lo ado kusĩ de fen, aya, mosor, bouwau tunĩ bun kabĩ yalef anĩ nẽ lo nẽ kalabus tamo inenadig.
45007024	O aya malaulon bagai! Aim anĩ aya laa nẽ bouwau enei bun tamal yalelnauf?
45007025	Neda Odug Jesus Kristus age fen bunem Negur ada yalelnadan nigin ĩ de tafiyẽf! Age fiyauf are, aya yug neu kisi bun are, Negur nẽ lo nẽ ferfer, anĩ ere, aya mosor nẽ bouwau enei bun, mosor nẽ lo nẽ ferfer.
45008001	Anĩ nigin, idi Kristus Jesus bun dibodok anidi bun, mosor dinon nigin bou yũya taka gama to ibodok,
45008002	ere nigin, Kristus Jesus bunem, mata nẽ Awa Uur nẽ lo anim, mosor ado laa nẽ lo bun tamal yalelnan.
45008003	Mosor nẽ bouwa felu reya nigin, lo anim age fiya nigin kisi feleya sã anĩ Negur age fen, are ĩ yogon Naal, mosor tamo nẽ bouwa gen bun, mosor yaleleya nẽ sesewi fiya ibodõf nigin sur fiyen anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ, mosor, mosor tamo nẽ bouwa bun ibodok anĩ nẽ megeir yukesin,
45008004	are madur bagai wõ youf nigin lo irok anĩ, bouwa nẽ oroya tator ken, Awa Uur nẽ oroya bun tabodõdig ada bun, kisi falauf nigin, Negur ĩ age fen.
