45008005	Idi bouwa nẽ oroya bun dibodõdig anidi, dogo neid kisi are, ereb mosor nẽ bouwa orof anĩ bun yenẽdig, anĩ ere, idi Awa Uur nẽ oroya bun dibodõdig anidi, dogo neid kisi are, ereb Awa Uur orof anĩ bun yenẽdig.
45008006	Kisi mosor nẽ bouwa bun yenẽdig, are laa nẽ, anĩ ere, kisi Awa Uur bun yenẽdig, are mata nẽ ado wau inosiya nẽ,
45008007	ere nigin, kisi mosor nẽ bouwa bun inodig, are Negur kiwai ifenẽdig, are Negur nẽ lo farumen to ibodõdig, ĩ age fiya nigineg kisi feleya sã.
45008008	Idi mosor nẽ bouwa bun dibodõdig anidi, Negur wau al fiya ifenẽya kisi feleya sã.
45008009	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Awa Uur ã namein ibodõf are, ã mosor nẽ bouwam to ulum iroukeneĩf, anĩ ere, ã Awa Uurem ulum iroukeneĩf. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ Kristus nẽ Awa Uur sãf are, ĩ Kristus nẽ sã.
45008010	Anĩ ere, Kristus ã namein ibodõf are, ãgenei bouweĩ mosor nigin laa foufeg, ãgenei uur madur bagai nigin mata ibodok.
45008011	Ĩ Jesus tamo gare den bun tamal, kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nẽ Awa Uur, ã namein ibodõf are, ĩ Kristus tamo gare den bun tamal, kel turĩ fiyen, yogon Awa Uur ã namein ibodok anĩ bunem, ãgenei bura leya nẽ bouweĩ matag ifeneĩf.
45008012	Anĩ nigin, turau tar, ada wareg ado, are ada mosor nẽ bouwa to dõ tafouf, bouwa nẽ oroya bun to tabodõf.
45008013	Ã bouwa nẽ oroya bun ubodõgouf are, ã gare gouf, anĩ ere, Awa Uur bunem ã bouwa nẽ tobonunã anĩ ukesigouf are, ã mata ubodõgouf,
45008014	ere nigin, idi Negur nẽ Awa Uurem uyu iroukenẽdif are, idi Negur nẽ gere tar.
45008015	Ã kumĩya nẽ ferfer ineneĩya nẽ uur to walegen, anĩ ere, ã Negur nẽ gere tar ineneĩya nẽ Awa Uur walegen. Anĩ nigin, ĩ bunem ada taweig fen, “Aba, Dei” taudig.
45008016	Awa Uur yogo, ada neda uur bun kurõ falaisi, ada Negur nẽ gere tar yedig.
45008017	Ada in gere tar ouf are, ada ereb el fiya biya Negur ifanadauf nigin promis od iron anĩ talouf. Ada Kristus geid weim yogon fula fiya medeĩyag talouf nigin ada momoi bagai ĩ geid weim yogon darau talouf are, ada Kristus geid weim ereb el fiya biya Negur ifanadauf nigin promis od iron anĩ talouf.
45008018	Aya kisi afef, fula fiya medeĩya ada bun yaorouf, are ada neda darau gama talef anĩ wal fiya bagai.
45008019	Ereb ereb ganan Negur inodin are, Negur yogo gere tar yaor fediyouf nigin, fatuk bagai tari difedig.
45008020	Ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan Negur inodin are, Negur uruwa idi yogon oroya dõ difouf nigin kisi fen anĩ idi to dõ difedig, are dogo neid oroya bunem sã, anĩ ere, ĩ agef inodin anĩ nẽ oroya bunem. Anĩ ere, waud iseya ado,
45008021	are ereb ereb ganan Negur inodin, idig dogo bura leya nẽ kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelneĩd fen, Negur nẽ gere tar neid fula fiya medeĩya nẽ karika ibodõya bun gurif iroulediyouf.
45008022	Ada keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan Negur inodin, idi kesu gõ fiya nẽ darau bun gen, gariya bunem osi def disi, gama sain enei bun bagaig, age difef.
45008023	Anĩ dogol sã, anĩ ere, ada, Awa Uur, are dumen fula fiya medeĩya ada talouf nẽ faat uyulil yũya anĩ talen, ada dugeg, Negur ada bouwada kel geif fen, ada yogon gere tar bagai ya anĩ yaor fe kurõ falaisiyouf nigin, fatuk bagai tari tafe fen, namedan osi taudig.
45008024	Ada kel gei fadan sain bun, ada wauda iseya enei talen. Anĩ ere, wau iseya malam ileya are, wau iseya bagai sã. Aim anĩ, ereb ĩ mogo ilef nigin wau isauf?
45008025	Anĩ ere, ada ereb ada fau ileya sã nigin wauda isauf are, ada totol tano fen, tari tafouf.
45008026	Age fiya gen, Awa Uur ĩ neda felu reya bun isennadadig. Ada ereb nigin kosẽ tauf anĩ ada keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, Awa Uur yogo od faded fiya kisi feleya sã anĩ, osi ye fen, ada nigin kosẽ yedig.
45008027	Age fe di, Negur ada wauda fele fedig, ĩ Awa Uur nẽ kisi keleĩ, ere nigin, Awa Uur ĩ tamo kayau fateul nigin Negur nẽ oroya kilei kosẽ yedig.
45008028	Ada keleĩ, ereb ereb ganan bun, Negur yogo nigin waud laa fedig anidi neid biya fiya nigin Negur kabĩ yaledig, idi yogon oroya kilei iweignẽdin anidi.
45008029	Idi Negurem mogo kelein anidi, Negur idi yogo Naal gen wowã douf nigineg mogo igirnẽdin, are yogon Naal, tura tar musei atun, kesu matu wõ youf nigin age fen.
45008030	Agef fen, idi Negur igirnẽdin anidig, ĩ iweignẽdin, idi Negur iweignẽdin anidig, ĩ madur bagai fiyẽdin, idi Negur madur bagai fiyẽdin anidig, ĩ fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽdin.
45008031	Age fiyauf are, ada enei nigin ere tauf? Negur ĩ nedauf are, aim anĩ ada daũ fadaya kisi feleya?
45008032	Ĩ yogo Naal bagai nigin to katũ ye fen, ada ganan nigin yogo Naal itornen anĩ, naig fe di, ĩ yogo Naal ado ereb ereb gananeg, ege kilẽ to ifanadauf?
45008033	Aim anĩ, Negur igirnẽdin anidi kot bun inenẽdiyouf? Negur yogo idi madur bagai fiyẽdidig.
45008034	Aim anĩ, idi mosor dinon ye fen, idi bouweid bun od yũf? Kristus Jesus ĩ mogo laa fen, agef feneg, ĩ kel turĩ fe di, matan, ĩ Negur ima biyalẽ ibod ken, ada nigineg kosẽ yedig.
45008035	Aim anĩ, ada Kristus nẽ wau laa fiya bun tamal fara fadauf? Kafĩ fiya, morõ, darau, naũ, gemũ, waila be, dimigem age fouf de?
45008036	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Õ nigin amã naa tekelei adok laa gurug mafef; amã sipsip didenkesiya nigin age fiya gen dileman.”
45008037	Anĩ ere, enei ganan bun, ada, ĩ ada nigin wau laa fen bunem, ada kusĩ wal difen anidi wal fediya tabodok.
45008038	Aya momoi auf, laa, mata, engel, kaa sesen, ereb gama nẽ, ereb dumen nẽ, ereb megeir taka,
45008039	ilun, kuren bagai be, ereb ereb ganan inodin bun ereb takam, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya, neda Odug Kristus Jesus bun ibodok anĩ bun tamal, ada fara fadaya nigin kisi feleya sã.
45009001	Aya Kristus bun momoi orok, aya idegẽya sã, neu kisi es fiya wau bun ibodok, Awa Uur Fateul bunem, aya bun anĩ megeir fef,
45009002	are aya fatuk bagai wau gudũf fen, aya faimud wau bun morõ ado.
45009003	Ere nigin, aya, neu turau tar, neu ibor anidi nigin, aya yug isisna fen, Kristus bun tamal yalelnauf anĩg, aya orouf.
45009004	Idi Israel tamo kayau. Negur nẽ gere tar ya anĩ dogo neid, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anĩ, idi bun yaor fen, Negur ado bar itenẽya, lo yaleya, tempel bun Negur yana yaleseya ado, ereb Negur age afouf ye fen igirin, are dogo neid.
45009005	Tubuid tar Abraham, Isak, Jakop are dogo neid, idi neid ibor anĩ isi isi Kristus wõ yen, Kristus ĩ Negur, ganan ĩ farumen dibodok, faimud ĩ yana talesauf! Momoi.
45009006	Are Negur nẽ od irofosiya gen sã. Ere nigin, Israel ibor bun wõ den anĩ, ganan Israel sã.
45009007	Idi Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar ba, anĩ ere, ganan Abraham nẽ gere tar bagai sã. Age fiya ban, “Isak bunem, ogon ibor tar douf.”
45009008	Are, tamo nẽ tobonunã nẽ naud bunem Abraham nẽ gere tar wowã den anidi ganan, Negur nẽ gere tar sã, anĩ ere, promis nẽ gere tar idi, Abraham nẽ ibor tar youf.
45009009	Negur nẽ promis od anĩ eig fiya, “Yogon sain bun bagai, aya kelauf, Sara kesu adouf.”
45009010	Anĩ dogol sã, anĩ ere, Rebeka nẽ gere tar tama tekelei ado, are tubuda Isak.
45009011	Anĩ ere, kesu uru fau gõ fiya sã bun, ereb biya be sane be age fiya sã mog, Negur nẽ oroya anĩ, kabĩ bunem sã, iweignẽdif ĩ bunem, yogon igirĩya bun ifarauf nigin,
45009012	ĩ Rebeka irokenen, “Matu anĩ, ibuye nẽ aruna yaleyẽf.”
45009013	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Aya Jakop nigin wau laa fen, anĩ ere, Esau to oroun.”
45009014	Age fiyauf are, ada ere tauf? Negur madur sã de? Sã bagai!
45009015	Ere nigin, Negur Moses irokenen, “Aya aib nigin wau yuk anĩ bun, wau yũya afenẽf, aya aib nigin wau irok, ĩ nigin wau yenẽf.”
45009016	Anĩ nigin, are, tamo nẽ oroya be kabĩ totol yaleya bunem sã, Negur nẽ wau yũya bunem.
45009017	Negur nẽ Itotoya bun, Isip nẽ king Farao nigin eig ye irok, “Aya õ enei nigin bagai king anenon, are aya õ bun neu megeir yaor afe di, teneub ganan bun, neu yanau kurõ difalaisiyouf nigin age afen.”
45009018	Anĩ nigin, Negur aib ĩ wau yũya ifenẽya nigin orof bun, ĩ wau yũya ifenẽdig, agef fen, ĩ aib nẽ wau katĩ feleya nigin orof bun, ĩ katĩ feledig.
45009019	Ã takam aya irokanauf, “Age fiyauf are, ere nigin Negur fau ada bouwada bun od yuk? Aim anĩ yogon oroya katĩ felef?”
45009020	Anĩ ere, tamo õ ai anĩ Negur od solo urokenẽf? “Ereb kare fen anim ĩ kare fen anĩ, ‘Ere nigin eig wo unoyan?’ fiyẽf de?”
45009021	Mis inoya tamo ĩ mafer de tekelei anim, mis uru, taka kabĩ biya ifenẽya nẽ, taka kabĩ sane ifenẽya nẽ, yogon oroyam inoya kisi feleya sã de?
45009022	Negur ĩ yogon didi anĩ yaor fe di, yogon megeir anĩ tamo kayau keleĩ youf nigin wau iro ken, yogon didi idi bun ile, daũ feidlauf anidi nigin molol bunem loloum fedi di, sain meluk ibodon ouf are, ada ere tauf?
45009023	Negur ĩ idi fula fiya medeĩya dalouf nigin dodok fe fen, yogon wau yũya ifenẽdiyouf anidi bun, yogon fula fiya medeĩya barikã anĩ yaor fiya nigineg wau iron ouf are, ada ere tauf?
45009024	Ada buneg Negur iweignadan, Juda temeleid dogol sã, haiden buneg.
45009025	Are Hosia nẽ itotoya buneg Negur wogõ yef kilei, “Aya idi neu tamo kayau sã anidi, neu tamo kayau auf, age afe fen, aya neu oboiyou sã anĩ, neu oboiyou auf,”
45009026	takag, “Negur ‘Ã neu tamo kayau sã’ yen nẽ modoũ anĩ bun, idi anĩ ‘Negur mata ibodõya nẽ gere tar’ youf.”
45009027	Asaia Israel nigin iweig iron, “Israel tamo kayau maaĩ ubun mumul gen musei bagai, anĩ ere, musei sã dogol kel gei fediyouf.
45009028	Ere nigin, Odug ĩ teneub bun, yogon tamo kayau es fediyouf nẽ od ganan kaisã bagai dõf agef kisi falauf.”
45009029	Are Asaia mogo iron kilei, “Odug saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri feid uyu iroudig anĩ, neda ibor nẽ tubu tar tunĩ to itornẽdim are, ada Sodom gen wõ taum, ada Gomora gen tabodom.”
45009030	Anĩ nigin, ada ere tauf? Haiden idi madur bagai anĩ to dimiren anidi, momoiya bunem madur bagai anĩ dalen.
45009031	Anĩ ere, Israel idi madur bagai nẽ lo dõ difen, idi madur bagai anĩ yaleya sã.
45009032	Ere nigin yaleya sã? Idi Negur nigin momoiya bunem dõ fiya sã, anĩ ere, lo dõ fiya bunem, Negur mala bun madur bagai dalouf nigin age difen nigin. Idi ye tũ fiya nẽ meein anim yeid tũ fen.
45009033	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Lo weleg, aya Saion oun tamo yeid tũ fiya nigin meein taka, idi kubũ douf nigin sa tuwa taka anof, age afe di, taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi youf, ĩ mama to bagai yalouf.”
45010001	Turau tar, aya Negur ĩ Israel kel gei fediyouf nigin wau iro ken, Negur bun kosẽ audig.
45010002	Aya idi nigin kurõ afeis eig auf, idi Negur nigin kisi totol dinodig, anĩ ere, idi neid kisi totol are keleĩ bunem sã.
45010003	Ere nigin, idi madur bagai Negur bunem isif anĩ to kelei ken, dogo neid madur bagai anĩ dalouf nigin dimiren, age dife fen, idi, Negur tamo kayau yogon mala bun madur bagai inenẽdiya nẽ naab anĩ ditoron.
45010004	Kristus ĩ, idi momoi def ganan madur bagai wowã douf nigin, lo nẽ idikeleya wõ yen.
45010005	Moses ĩ madur bagai lo ganan dõ fiya bunem isif nigin eig ye itoton, “Tamo ĩ lo enei dõ fef, ĩ anĩ bunem mata ibodõf.”
45010006	Anĩ ere, madur bagai momoiya bunem isif anĩ eig ye irok, “Õ waũ bun to eig wo urõf, ‘Aim anĩ saa ilun iselauf?’ ” (are, Kristus irou isiyouf nigin)
45010007	“oo ‘Aim anĩ teneub kur bagai isilauf?’ ” (are, tamo gare den bun tamal Kristus irou isauf nigin).
45010008	Anĩ ere, ĩ ere ye irok? “Od anĩ õ wagen ibodok, are ogon sigor bun, ogon waũ bun ibodok,” are momoiya nẽ od amã wogõ maudig anĩ.
45010009	Are õ ogon sigorom, “Jesus ĩ Odug,” wo fen, õ waũ bun, Negur ĩ Jesus tamo gare den bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen anĩ, momoi wouf are, õ kel yaleyõf.
45010010	Are, taka ĩ wau bun momoi ye di, Negur ĩ madur bagai yef, age fe di, taka ĩ sigorom momoi auf ye di, Negurem ĩ kel yalouf.
45010011	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi youf, ĩ mama to bagai yalouf.”
45010012	Juda ado haiden bun fire fire sã, Odug de tekelei anĩ ganan nẽ Odug, ĩ idi diweignek ganan bun el fiya fatuk bagai ifenẽdidig,
45010013	are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Idi Odug nẽ yana dale diweignek ganan, Negurem kel gei fediyouf.”
45010014	Age fiyauf are, naig fe di, idi ĩ nigin to momoi den ani diweignẽf? Naig de fen, idi to karĩ den anĩ nigin momoi douf? Taka nem to irokenẽdiyouf are, naig de fen, idi karĩ douf?
45010015	Idi to sur fediyouf are, idi naig de fen, od wogõ douf? Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Idi biya od diroulef anidi, yeid gai meli bagai!”
45010016	Anĩ ere, Israel tunĩ biya od anĩ to dalen. Idi age difen nigin, Asaia eig ye iron, “Odug, aim anĩ nemã od nigin momoi yen?”
45010017	Anĩ nigin, momoiya anĩ biya od karĩya bunem isidig, biya od karĩya are Kristus nẽ od bunem isidig.
45010018	Anĩ ere, aya to afef; Idi to karĩ dedig de? Momoi, idi karĩ den, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Neu arũ tamo neid aiteid, teneub ganan bun iyokelen, dogo neid od teneub idikeleya bun ilen.”
45010019	Baban aya to afef: Israel idi to kelein de? Uruwa bun, Negur Moses bunem iron, “Aya tamo kayau yeneid sã idi bun age afe di, idi nigin ã kiyeĩ unogouf. Aya tamo kayau keleĩ sã idi bun age afe di, idi nigin ã nameĩ saneuf.”
45010020	Takag, Asaia kukĩya sã eig ye iron, “Idi aya to dimirnan, aya dileyauf. Idi aya nigin to fiya san anidi bun, aya yug yaor afouf.”
45010021	Anĩ ere, Israel nigin ĩ eig ye iron, “Naa tekelei adok, aya tamo kayau dõ fiya sã, fe temeleid bun imau dõ au fen, tari afedif abodon.”
45011001	Age fiyauf are, aya to afef: Negur ĩ yogon tamo kayau aulel fedin de? Sã bagai! Aya yug Israel temelou, Abraham nẽ ibor, Benjamin nẽ gĩ bun temelou.
45011002	Negur ĩ, yogon tamo kayau, ĩ mogo gariya bunem kelei ken igirnẽdin anidi to aulel fedin. Ereb Negur nẽ Itotoya bun Eliya nigin irok, are ĩ Negur ado, Israel idi nigin bou yũya od wogõ den anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
45011003	“Odug, idi mogo ogon profet didenkeis fen, ogon alta narĩ difedin. Aya mugu dogol ditorna fen, idi aya dinakesiyouf nigin age difef.”
45011004	Age ye di, Negur ere od solof irokenen? “Aya, aya yug nigin sewen tausen tamo idi idegẽya waitou Bal bun to iboreid bobou difen anidi, foi afen.”
45011005	Age fiya gen, sain enei buneg, Negur wau ifenẽya bunem musei sã igirnẽdin anidi fau dibodok.
45011006	Igirĩya anĩ, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem isin, are tamo nẽ kabĩ bunem sã. Igirĩya anĩ tamo nẽ kabĩ bunem isin ouf are, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya anĩ, wau ifenẽya sa ken, mala ifenẽya yenem.
45011007	Anĩ nigin, ada ere tauf? Ereb Israel idi kabĩ totol dale fen, dimiren anĩ, idi to dalen, anĩ ere, Israel tunĩ musei sã Negur igirnẽdin anidim dogol dalen. Israel tunĩ ganan Negur waud ifofakelen.
45011008	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Negur, idi kisi kurã fiya sã nẽ uur, meleid to dilouf nẽ ado, wedereid to karĩ douf nẽ anĩ ifenẽdin, anĩ bunem isi gama naa enei bun.”
45011009	Takag, Dawid eig ye iron, “Neu kiwai tar, idi neid sifa nẽ tebol bun, saaf dokon waud kulĩ yen sain bun, idi suk bun gei difediyouf, idi kor bun gei difediyouf, idi neid el fiyam, dogo yeid tũ difouf nigin ado, mala solo fiya nẽ darau, idi bun wõ youf nigin aya orouf.
45011010	Dogo neid meleid gugum kele fen, to dilouf, dogo neid bagiyeid gai gai nigin fe fesilauf anĩ orouf.”
45011011	Age fiyauf are, aya to afef: Idi yeid tũ fe di, kubũ de fen, baban fãya kisi feleya sã de? Sã bagai! Anĩ fotokar, idi neid mosor nigin, kel gei fiya are haiden bun isin, are Israel idi kiyeĩ dinouf nigin age fen.
45011012	Anĩ ere, idi neid mosor nigin tenebur tamo kayau bun el fiya kisi feleya bagai wõ ye fen, idi neid kũ fenẽya nigin haiden bun el fiya kisi feleya bagai wõ youf are, idi neid gire fiya anim naig fiya el fiya kisi feleya bagai irousiyouf!
45011013	Aya ã haiden bun wogõ auf. Aya haiden bun aposel nigin, aya neu kabĩ nigin fatuk bagai yanau alesef,
45011014	are aya neu Israel tamo kayau turĩ afeid, idi kiyeĩ dinouf bun, idi tunĩ kel gei afouf nigin age afef.
45011015	Negur idi aulel fedin bunem, tenebur tamo kayau idi Negur geid komo fiya dalen ouf are, sain Negur idi yalediyouf bun, ere anĩ wõ youf? Are idi tamo kayau ganan gare den bun tamal mata kel fã den gen ouf.
45011016	Wit uyulil faat yun anĩ bunem sesewi fiya nẽ bret dinof, anĩ nẽ masak fateul ouf are, bret gananeg fateul. Warumutei anĩ fateul ouf are, were gananeg fateul.
45011017	Were tunĩ kokour fele fen, õ oliv aa kuĩ nẽ were, oliv aa bun bagu yõ di, oliv aa nẽ warumutei bun saaf tekelei waledig,
45011018	anĩ nigin, Israel idi bun, õ haiden yanã to wales. Õ yanã walesauf are, enei kisi wo: Õ warumutei to usennek, anĩ ere, warumutei anĩ õ isennok.
45011019	Anĩ ere, õ eig wo urõf, “Aya aa anĩ bun bagu fiyauf nigin were kokour feledin.”
45011020	Are momoi. Ani ere, idi momoiya sã nigin kokour feledin, age fe di, õ momoiya bunem ufaref. Õ yanã to wales, anĩ ere, õ kumĩ wouf.
45011021	Ere nigin, Negur ĩ Israel idi oliv aa nẽ were bagai yalelnẽdiyouf nigin to katũ yen ouf are, ĩ õ nigineg to katũ youf.
45011022	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ molol ado wau itenẽya nigin kisi gouf, ĩ idi kubũ den anidi bun wau itenen, anĩ ere, ã in molol bun toku ubodõgouf are, ĩ ã bun molol ibodõf. Anĩ ere, ã in molol bun to ubodõgouf are, ãg kokour yeikalauf.
45011023	Israel idi momoiya sã bun toku to dibodõf are, idi baban aa oliv bun bagu fediyouf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ baban idi bagu fediya nigin kisi feleya.
45011024	Õ ogon gariya oliv aa kuĩ bagai bun tamal kokour fele fen, ogon gariya sã oliv aa bagai kulatun fedig anĩ bun bagu yon ouf are, oliv aa bagai nẽ were eneidi, naig fiya karika bagai dogo neid oliv aa bagai bun bagu fediyouf!
45011025	Turau tar, aya waa enei ã to keleĩ youf nigin to orouf, are ã aug nigin keleĩ biya ado to gouf nigin age afef. Waa are, Negurem Israel tunĩ waud ifofakelen, anĩ bunem idi dibodok disi mog, haiden idi Negurem igirnẽdin anidi ganan Negur wagen disiyouf sain anĩ bun.
45011026	Age dife di, Israel ganan kel gei fediyouf, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Kel yaleya tamo Saion bun tamal isiyouf, ĩ Jakop bun tamal Negur nẽ od dõ fiya sã nẽ tobonunã anĩ yalelauf.
45011027	Aya, idi geid bar itenẽya nẽ enei atenẽf, anĩ bunem aya dogo neid mosor alelauf.”
45011028	Biya od nigin, idi ã nigin kiwai, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ igirĩya nigin, idi tubuid tar nigin, Negur idi nigin wau laa fedig,
45011029	ere nigin, Negur nẽ ege luwa ado yogon igirĩya anĩ falei fiya kisi feleya sã.
45011030	Ã uruwa bun Negur dõ fiya sã, anĩ ere, ã gama, Israel Negur dõ fiya sã nigin, Negur nẽ wau yũya walegen.
45011031	Age fiya gen, idig gama Negur dõ fiya sã, are Negur nẽ wau yũya ã ifenein anĩ bunem, idig gama Negur nẽ wau yũya dalouf nigin age fen.
45011032	Age fiya nigin, Negur ĩ tamo ganan, dõ fiya sã nẽ kafĩ fiya bun inenẽdin, are ĩ idi ganan wau yũya ifenẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
45011033	O Negur nẽ kisi biya ado keleĩ biya, are kisi feleya bagai ilon bagai isilef. Yogon es fiya anĩ imir ken, keleĩya kisi feleya sã, yogon delẽ iyõdig anĩ dir feleya kisi feleya sã.
45011034	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Aim anĩ Odug nẽ kisi kelein? Aim anĩ ĩ ulum iroukenen?”
45011035	“Aim anĩ Negur ifenen nigin Negur ĩ aba kel ifenẽf?”
45011036	Ada keleĩ, od enei are momoi, ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bun tamal isif, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bunem ibodok, ereb ereb ganan ĩ bun ilef. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya faimud ibodõf! Momoi.
45012001	Anĩ nigin, turau tar, aya, ã, Negur nẽ wau yũya ada ifanadan bunem totol bagai arokeneik, ãgenei bouweĩ, mata ibodõya nẽ sesewi fiya, fateul ado Negur wau kulĩya nẽ anĩ gen Negur wenẽgouf. Enei anĩ, ãgenei uurem Negur yana yaleseya.
45012002	Tenebur enei nẽ oroya baban to dõg, anĩ ere, Negur ãgenei kisi falei fe mata inoyeĩ di, ãgenei kisi mata anĩ dõ gouf, anĩ bunem, ã Negur nẽ oroya, are yogon biya nẽ, kulĩya nẽ ado, kisi feleya nẽ oroya anĩ keleĩ youf.
45012003	Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem, aposel kabĩ yaleya nẽ yana aya ifanan nigin, aya ã ganan arokeneik: Taka ĩ yogo nigin kisi fouf anĩ to wal fe fen, kisi fouf, anĩ ere, momoiya Negur ifenen anĩ kilei, es fiya biya bun yogo nigin kisi fouf.
45012004	Ada bouwada tekelei bun fara fiya musei ado, anĩ ere, fara fiya ganan bun kabĩ tekelei sã,
45012005	age fiya gen, ada fara fiya musei, anĩ ere, Kristus bun, bouwada tekelei, fara fiya mugu mugu tunĩ ganan geid bagu fedif.
45012006	Negur wau ifenẽya ada ifanadan kilei, ada Negur nẽ igirĩya ege luwa fire fire ado. Tamo ĩ profet od wogõya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ yogon momoiya kilei wogõ youf.
45012007	Ĩ aruna yaleya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ aruna yalouf. Ĩ ifelnẽya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ ifelnẽya kabĩ yalouf.
45012008	Ĩ wau yaleseya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ taka nẽ wau yalesauf. Ĩ tunĩ lau fiya isennẽya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ wau sã ifenẽdiyouf. Ĩ uyu irouya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ fõ fiya sã uyu irouya kabĩ yalouf. Ĩ wau yũya ifelnẽya nẽ igirĩya ege luwa adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ wau kulĩya ado age fouf.
45012009	Wau laa fiya are mala yaleya sã. Ereb sane anĩ seseg fen, ereb biya anĩ kafĩ weleg.
45012010	Ã abob bun tureĩ tar bagai nigin gen, wauĩ laa fiya bun wauĩ wenẽgouf. Ã atun abob yana ketem ilun walesagauf.
45012011	Ã to fõ yei ken, kabĩ totol waleg. Ãgenei uur nẽ totol bunem, Odug aruna walogouf.
45012012	Wau iseya bun wauĩ kulĩ youf, morõ bun megeir ufaragauf, toku kosẽ gouf.
45012013	Negur nẽ tamo kayau lau difef anidi wenẽdigouf. Tamo urug waledigouf.
45012014	Idi ã darau difeneik anidi el fiya wenẽdigouf, el fiya wenẽdig fen, to usisnẽdigouf.
45012015	Idi waud kulĩ yef geid kulĩ gouf, idi inã dalef geid inã walogouf.
45012016	Ã abob nigin wauĩ tekelei yenẽf. Ã yeneĩ to walesagauf, anĩ ere, ã tenebur difaref geid nigal yũya nigin ago gouf. Ã aug nigin keleĩ biya ado to gouf.
45012017	Ã aib taka sane age yeik anĩ, aba sane to wiyẽgouf. Tamo ganan meleid bun ereb madur age fiya nigin karĩ walagauf.
45012018	Ã kisi feleyauf are, ganan geid wau inosiya bun ubodõgouf.
45012019	Neu oboiyou tar, ã aug mala solo to wenẽdigouf, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ didi nigin modoũ unogouf, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ya ibodok, “Odug irok, mala solo ifenẽya are neu. Ayam mala solo afenẽf.”
45012020	Age fiya ban, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ya ibodok, “Ogon kiwai naũ fouf are, saaf wenẽ yãf, ĩ naan ail fouf are, naan wenẽ yãf. Anĩ agouf bun, ĩ yogon ereb sane age fen nigin mama sane falauf.”
45012021	Ã sane anim to wal yeĩf, anĩ ere, ãgem biya bunem sane anĩ wal gouf.
45013001	Tamo kayau ganan gawaman farumedin dibodõf, ere nigin, gawaman Negurem to inodin anĩ taka to ibodok. Gawaman gama dibodok are Negur yogo inodin.
45013002	Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ gawaman kiwai ifenek, ĩ ereb Negurem inon anĩ kiwai ifenek. Idi anĩ age difef, idi es fiya dogo bouweid bun dinouf.
45013003	Ere nigin, uyu irouya tamo, idi biya age difef anidi kumĩ to difiyẽdidig, anĩ ere, idi sane age difef anidi kumĩ difiyẽdidig. Uyu irouya ĩ õ to kumĩ ifonõf anĩ, õ oroyok de? Agouf are, ereb tobonunã biya anĩ ago wo di, ĩ õ yanã yalesauf.
45013004	Ere nigin, ĩ ogon biya fiya nigin Negur nẽ kabĩ tamo inenen. Anĩ ere, sane ago wouf, õ kumĩ wouf, ere nigin, ĩ dimig ege to irouf. Ĩ Negur nẽ kabĩ tamo, ĩ mala ifenẽya tamo, idi sane age difef anidi bun Negur nẽ didi irou isif.
45013005	Anĩ nigin, ã gawaman farumen bagai ubodõgouf, are darau kumĩya bunem dogol sã, Negur mala bun ada biya be sane es fiya nẽ kisi nigineg ago gouf.
45013006	Anĩ nigin, ã takiseg unogedig, ere nigin, gawaman nẽ kabĩ tamo are Negur nẽ kabĩ tamo, idi dogo neid sain ganan gawaman kabĩ nigin difenẽdig.
45013007	Ã ereb ganan ifenẽya nigin yenek are wenẽgouf, ã takis ifenẽya nigin ouf, takis unogouf, ã safina yaleya nẽ takis ifenẽya nigin ouf, safina yaleya nẽ takis unogouf, ã anini fiyẽya nigin ouf, anini wiyẽgouf, ã seli yabiya nigin ouf, seli wabigouf.
45013008	Wareg taka to utorõge di, ibodõf, abob nigin wauĩ laa fiya nẽ wareg dogol ã atun ibodõf, ere nigin, taka ĩ ne tã nigin wau laa fef, ĩ lo dõf kisi felef.
45013009	Ĩtãfiya eig ye irok, “Seseirã to uno,” “Tamo to ukeis,” “Bẽ to ule,” “Taka nẽ safina to malã ile orouf,” ĩtãfiya eneidi ado ereb lo tunĩ ifaredif are, ĩtãfiya tekelei eneim ganan irouf, “Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigin ago waũ laa fouf.”
45013010	Wau laa fiya anim, ne tã bun sane to age fedig. Anĩ nigin, wau laa fiya are lo dõf kisi felef.
45013011	Anĩ nigin, sain enei nigin wedereĩ fokõf fen, enei ago gouf. Ã mulaĩ itorõya nẽ sain mogo isif, ere nigin, ada uruwa bun momoi taun bunem isi, gama ada neda kel gei fadaya nẽ sain anĩ melsak.
45013012	Bõ are mogo sa kalau fenẽ, naa mogo wõ you fenẽ. Anĩ nigin, ada gugum nẽ tobonunã tator, yerin gadi tafel fen, lalan nẽ tobonunã biya anĩ dõ tafouf. Age tafe fen, ada, kusĩ nigin kusĩ nẽ naki totol difonũdig gen, tobonunã biya anĩ, ada bun ibodõf nigin age tafouf.
45013013	Tamo kayau we feleyan lo difeid le di, tobonunã biya age difedig gen, ada tobonunã biya dõ tafouf, bilãya ado naan yõya bun sã, noli tobonunã ado bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya bun sã, kusĩ ado kiyeĩ buneg sã.
45013014	Anĩ ere, Odug Jesus Kristus anĩ waleg, aug bun ufonũgouf, agog fen, bouwa nẽ oroya dõ fiya nẽ kisi anĩ bun to ufaragauf.
45014001	Taka ĩ momoiya felu ref are waleg fen, yogon keleĩ ã geid tekelei sã nigin to monẽ wiyẽgouf.
45014002	Tamo taka in momoiya anim irõ di, ĩ ereb ereb ganan yõya nigin age fedig, anĩ ere, tamo taka in momoiya felu reya, ĩ sako dogol yõdig.
45014003	Tamo ereb ereb ganan yõdig anim, ne tã sako dogol yõdig to kono fiyẽf, age fe di, tamo ereb ereb ganan to yõdig anim, tamo ereb ereb ganan yõdig bou bun od to yũf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ yalen.
45014004	Õ ai anĩ taka nẽ kabĩ tamo es wof? Ĩ kubũ be youf, ifar bẽf, are yogon Odug bun ibodok. Anĩ nigin, ĩ ifarauf, ere nigin, Odug ĩ yogo, ĩ ifareya nigin age fiya kisi feleya.
45014005	Tamo taka ĩ, naa taka anĩ naa ganan wal fiya gen iledig. Tamo taka naa ganan are de kilei kilei iledig. Idi mugu mugu dogo neid kisi bun anĩ nigin waud ditenẽf.
45014006	Taka ĩ naa taka anĩ odug gen ilef, Odug nigin ye fen, ĩ age fef. Age fiya gen, taka ĩ yaro muda yoko, Odug nigin ye fen, yoko, ere nigin, ĩ Negur de fiyek. Taka ĩ ereb ereb tunĩ yõya nigin itorok, ĩ Odug nigin ye fen, agef fen, Negur de fiyek.
45014007	Ere nigin, ada takam yogo nigin mata to ibodok, ada takam yogo nigin to laa fef.
45014008	Ada mata tabodok are, ada Odug nigin mata tabodok. Ada gare tauf are, ada Odug nigin gare tauf. Anĩ nigin, ada mata tabodok be, gare taufeg, ada Odug nẽ.
45014009	Gariya enei nigin, Kristus laaf fen, mata kel fã yen, are ĩ tamo gare den ado tamo mata dibodok neid Odug ibodõf nigin age fen.
45014010	Age fiyauf are, õ ere nigin ogon turã es wiyek? Õ ere nigin ogon turã kono wiyek? Ada ganan Negur nẽ es fiya nẽ sia wagen tafarauf.
45014011	Age fiya nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ya ibodok, “Odug irok, aya momoi bagai mata abodok nigin, iboreid ganan aya bun bobou difouf, baleid ganan kurõ difeis, Negur yana dalesauf.”
45014012	Age fiya nigin, ada mugu mugu, ada dug nigin Negur kurõ tafeis tarokenẽf.
45014013	Anĩ nigin, ada abob es fiyẽya tatorõf. Anĩ ban, ã tureĩ nẽ naab bun ereb naabura gudũf kenẽya nẽ taka be, ye tũf kenẽya nẽ taka to unogouf nigin lo walagauf.
45014014	Odug Jesus kisi fokõ fel kana di, aya momoi bagai kisi afef, are saaf, Negur mala bun amuyẽ ado taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ saaf taka amuyẽ ado youf are, ĩ yogo bun saaf anĩ amuyẽ ado.
45014015	Ereb õ woko anĩ bunem ogon turã ĩ wau morõ wenẽf are, õ waũ laa fiya bunem to agof. Ereb õ woko anĩ bunem, turã Kristus ĩ nigin laa fen anĩ to daũ wiyẽ.
45014016	Anĩ nigin, ereb ã biya gef anĩ, tamo kayau idi to sane douf nigin ago gouf.
45014017	Ere nigin, Negur nẽ tano are, saaf yõya ado naan yõya nẽ sã, anĩ ere, Awa Uur Fateul bun madur bagai, wau inosiya ado, kulĩya nẽ.
45014018	Taka ĩ naab enei bunem Kristus aruna yalef, ĩ Negur wau kulĩya ifenẽ di, tamo dile fen, biya douf.
45014019	Anĩ nigin, ada ereb maror inoya nigin ado abob yalesnẽya nigin, kabĩ totol talouf.
45014020	Saaf bunem Negur nẽ kabĩ to daũ gouf. Saaf ganan amuyẽ sã, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ saaf yõya bunem, ne tã, Negur nigin momoiya nẽ naab dõf mog ye isog yale di, kubũ youf, are sane.
45014021	Õ, nẽ turã kubũya nigin yaro to wãf be, aai to wãf be, ereb takag to agouf, are biyauf.
45014022	Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb enei bun ogon momoiya naig be fe yenẽf, are õ ogo ado Negur bun dogol ibodõf. Tamo ĩ, ereb ĩ momoi bagai kisi fen biya yef anĩ, age fef bun, ĩ yogo bou bun od to yuk are, Negur ĩ el fiyek.
45014023	Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ kisi toguf fen, saaf yoko, ĩ yogo bou bun od yuk, ere nigin, yogon saaf yõya are momoiya bunem sã. Ereb ereb ganan momoiya bunem isiya sã, are mosor.
45015001	Ada momoiya totol ado, idi momoiya totol sã neid morõ faali tafouf. Ada dug wauda al fouf nigin to age tafouf.
45015002	Ada mugu mugu, neda tã tar, idi neid biya fiya nigin ado idi yalesnẽdiyouf nigin, wau al fiya tafenẽdiyouf.
45015003	Ere nigin, Kristus ĩ yogog yogo wau al fouf nigin to age fen, are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Idi õ kono diyon anidi neid kono fiya, aya bun isin.”
45015004	Ereb ereb ganan kulu ditoton are, ada ifelnadauf nigin ditoton, are morõ bun feseya sã ifareya bunem ado wau yaleseya Negur nẽ Itotoya ani ifanadaf anĩ bunem, ada wauda iseya adouf nigin age difen.
45015005	Negur, morõ bun feseya sã ifareya ado wau yaleseya ifeneĩdig ĩ, ã Kristus Jesus dõg mog, ã atun wau tekelei nẽ uur ifeneĩf nigin aya orouf,
45015006	anĩ bun, wauĩ tekelei ado sigoreĩ tekelei bunem, ã Negur, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Tama fula fiya medeĩya wenẽgouf.
45015007	Anĩ nigin, Negur yana fula fiya medeĩya bun iselauf nigin, Kristus ã yaleyein gen, ãg abob walogouf.
45015008	Aya ã arokeneik, Kristus ĩ, Juda neid kabĩ tamo wõ yen, are Negur tubuda tar bun age afouf yen anĩ kilei bagai, Negur age fouf anĩ, megeir fe ifelnẽdiyouf nigin ado,
45015009	haiden idi Negur nẽ wau yũya nigin, Negur fula fiya medeĩya difenẽf nigin age fen, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Anĩ nigin, aya haiden atun õ yanã alesauf, aya õ yanã bun seg alouf.”
45015010	Baban ĩ irok, “O haiden ã, in tamo kayau geid wauĩ kulĩ ye.”
45015011	Baban, “Haiden ã ganan, Odug yana waleseg! Tamo kayau ã ganan, ĩ yana waleseg fen, seg waleg!”
45015012	Baban, Asaia iron, “Jesi nẽ warumutei bun bali mata fokũ youf, ĩ wõ ye fen, teneub ganan nẽ mudur ibodõf, haiden idi ĩ nigin waud isauf.”
45015013	Wau iseya nẽ Negur, ã Negur momoi wiyẽg mog, wau kulĩya ado wau inosiya ganan, ã namein fi fele di, ise isokosauf, anĩ bunem, ã bun Awa Uur Fateul nẽ megeir bunem wauĩ iseya gogũ fouf nigin aya orouf.
45015014	Neu turau tar, aya yug momoi auf, ã aug tobonunã biya barikã, keleĩ barika ken, abob ifelnẽya nigin kisi feleya bagai.
45015015	Anĩ ere, wau ifenẽya Negur aya ifanan anĩ nigin, aya ã gariya tunĩ baban wedereĩ fokõ youf nigin totol ado atotkenein,
45015016	wau ifenẽya anĩ bunem, aya haiden bun Kristus Jesus nẽ kabĩ tamo wõ au fen, pris gen Negur nẽ biya od wogõ auf, are haiden idi, Negur mala bun sesewi fiya biya, Awa Uur Fateulem fateuledin, wowã douf nigin age afef.
45015017	Anĩ nigin, aya Kristus Jesus bun, neu kabĩ Negur bun aledig nigin yanau alesef.
45015018	Aya ereb taka to wogõ au fen, ereb Kristus aya bunem age fen anĩ dogol wogõ auf, are aya ereb aya wogõ aun ado ereb aya age afen bunem, haiden idi uyu arou di, idi Negur sigor dõ difef anĩ, wogõ auf,
45015019	are aya Awa Uur nẽ megeir bunem, uris ado memelik nẽ megeir bun age afen. Anĩ nigin, aya Jerusalem anenem gariya ano fen, tokõ afel, Ilirikum provins ayo kele fen, Kristus nẽ biya od kisi feleya bagai yaor afen.
45015020	Aya, idi Kristus keleĩ sã anidi bun, an biya od wogõ auf nigin, faimud kisi totol aledig, are aya takam gariya inon anĩ bun, kabĩ to alouf nigin age afedig.
45015021	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok kilei, “Idi ĩ nigin to karĩ den are dilouf, agef fen, idi to karĩ den are keleĩ youf.”
45015022	Aya biya od modoũ age fediyan wogõya nigin sain musei aledig anim, aya ã gein isiya nigin sain musei naaburau gudũ fedig.
45015023	Anĩ ere, gama aya kabĩ yaleya nigin, akor enei bun modoũ taka sa ken, aya yar musei ã gein isiya nigin kisi totol aledig nigin,
45015024	aya Spein alauf bun asi fen, ailiyeĩf nigin kisi afen. Aya ileya bunem ki ayei ken, aya ã geid sain naal uyu kũ ta tabod ken, ã neu delẽ nigin usennagauf nigin wau isef.
45015025	Anĩ ere, gama aya Negur nẽ tamo kayau aruneid yaleya nigin Jerusalem elef.
45015026	Ere nigin, Masedonia provins nẽ sios ado Akaia provins nẽ sios idi, Jerusalem oun Negur nẽ tamo kayau atun maleg anidi isennẽdiya nigin waud al fen.
45015027	Idi age fiya nigin waud al fen, momoi bagai idi, Juda idi bun wareg ado. Ere nigin, haiden idi, Juda idi neid uur nẽ el fiya dalen nigin, haiden idi Juda idi bun safina nẽ el fiya bunem wareg dũf.
45015028	Anĩ nigin, aya kabĩ enei bure afel fen, idi isennẽya enei dalen anĩ ail fen, Spein ileya nigin asi fen, ki ayeĩf.
45015029	Aya keleĩ, sain aya ã gein asiyouf bun, aya Kristus nẽ el fiya barikã ado asiyouf.
45015030	Turau tar, neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem ado Awa Uur nẽ wau laa fiya bunem, aya ã totol bagai arokeneik, ã, neu kabĩ nẽ morõ bun, aya nigin Negur kosẽ wiyẽgouf bunem usennagauf.
45015031	Aya Judia teneub bun momoiya sã imedin tamal yalelna di, neu kabĩ Jerusalem oun Negur nẽ tamo kayau an anidim dirouwauf nigin kosẽ gouf,
45015032	ago ge di, aya Negur nẽ oroya bunem kulĩya ado ã gein asi fen, aya ã geid si tano fen, megeir alouf.
45015033	Wau inosiya nẽ Negur ã ganan bun ibodõf. Momoi.
45016001	Aya nemã mainamã Foibe, Senkria taun nẽ sios neid kabĩ kayau biya ya anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin arokeneik.
45016002	Ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau ago wiyẽdigedig gen, ĩ Odug bun waleg fen, ĩ ã bun ereb lau fef anĩ usennẽgouf, ere nigin, ĩ tamo kayau musei isenneĩd fen, ayag isennan.
45016003	Kristus Jesus bun, neu kabĩ turau tar, Prisila Akwila ado, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
45016004	Idi aya nigin laa uyu ditoron. Aya dogol sã, haiden neid sios gananeg idi de difiyẽdif.
45016005	Sios idi neid fõ bun guru difedig anidig, neu aanya wenẽdigouf. Neu oboiyou Epenetus, Asia provins bun Kristus nigin ĩ ketem momoiya tamo wõ yen anĩ, neu aanya wenẽgouf.
45016006	Maria ã nigin kabĩ totol yalen anĩ, neu aanya wenẽgouf.
45016007	Neu sirag tar, Andronikus ado Junia idi aya geid kalabus bun mabodon anidi, neu aanya wenẽdigouf. Aposel atun idi ilun bagai difaref, aya momoiya sã mog, idi ketem Kristus nigin momoi den.
45016008	Ampliatus, Odug bun neu oboiyou, neu aanya wenẽgouf.
45016009	Urbanus, Kristus bun neda kabĩ turada ado, neu oboiyou Stakis, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
45016010	Apeles ĩ nigin Kristus bun, tamo kayau biya difiyẽdig anĩ, neu aanya wenẽgouf. Idi Aristobulus nẽ ibor anidi, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
45016011	Herodion, neu sirag, neu aanya wenẽgouf. Idi Narsisus nẽ ibor Odug bun dibodok anidi, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
45016012	Trifena ado Trifosa, kayau idi Odug bun kabĩ totol daledig anidi, neu aanya wenẽdigouf. Neu oboiyou Persis, kayau taka Odug bun kabĩ totol yaledig anĩ, neu aanya wenẽgouf.
45016013	Rufus Odug bun igirnen ado, yogon sina, ĩg aya neu naai, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
45016014	Asinkritus, Flegon, Hermes, Patrobas, Hermas ado, turada tar idi geid difaref anidi, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
45016015	Filologus, Julia, Nereus ĩ main ado, Olimpas ado, Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan idi geid difaref anidi, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
45016016	Abob fateul bunem umã wiyẽg fen, aan wiyẽgouf. Kristus nẽ sios ganan ã bun aanya sur difef.
45016017	Turau tar, idi, ã Negur nigin keleĩ walegen anĩ, ditor ken, ã fara diyei ken, naabureĩ gudũ difedig anidi lo walagauf nigin, aya ã totol bagai arokeneik. Idi sese wedigouf.
45016018	Ere nigin, tamo age fediya are, neda Odug Kristus aruna to daledig, anĩ ere, idi dogo neid oroya aruna daledig. Od dan biya ado mala yaleya nẽ od bunem, idi tamo kisi sã gen anidi didegnẽdidig.
45016019	Tamo ganan ãgenei Negur nẽ od dõ fiya biya anĩ karĩ den, anĩ nigin, aya ã nigin wau fatuk bagai kulĩ yef, anĩ ere, aya ã ereb biya nigin kisi biya waleg fen, sane nigin soso gouf anĩ orouf.
45016020	Wau inosiya nẽ Negur, mogo melsã Satan ã yeĩ farumen orok fouf. Neda Odug Jesus nẽ wau ifenẽya ã bun ibodõf.
45016021	Timoti, neu kabĩ turau, yogon aanya ã bun sur fef. Neu sirag tar, Lusius, Jeson ado, Sosipater idig age difef.
45016022	Aya, Tertiusem pas enei atotof, Odug bun neu aanya ã bun sur afef.
45016023	Gaius ĩ, aya ado ein sios ganan isennẽdidig, yogon aanya ã bun sur fef. Erastus ĩ taun nẽ moni lo fiya tamo ado, neda turada Kwartus, idi neid aanya ã bun sur difef.
45016025	Negur ĩ, neu biya od ado Jesus nigin wogõya anĩ bunem, ã yalesneĩya kisi feleya. Biya od nẽ waa kulu bagai iminẽyan ibodon,
45016026	anĩ ere, Negur mata ibodkeleya anĩ, profet irokenẽdi di, ditoton anĩ bun, kurõ falaisi gama yaoren, are teneub ganan ĩ nigin momoi de fen, dõ difouf nigin age fen.
45016027	Negur ĩ yogo dogol kisi biya barikã, Kristus Jesus bunem fula fiya medeĩya faimud ĩ bun ibodkalauf! Momoi.
46001001	Aya Pol, Negur nẽ oroyam Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ auf nigin iweignan, neda turada Sostenes ado,
46001002	Korin oun Negur nẽ sios ã bun, pas enei matotkeneik. Ã Kristus Jesus bun fateuleĩ fen, fateul ubodõgouf nigin iweignein, are tamo kayau ganan fire firen difar fen, neda Odug Jesus Kristus, idi neid Odug ado neda Odug ĩ yana dalesedig anidi geid weim iweignein.
46001003	Negur neda Tamada ado Odug Jesus Kristus neid wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, ã bun ibodõf.
46001004	Aya wededem ã nigin Negur de afiyẽdig, ere nigin, yogon wau ifenẽya Kristus Jesus bun ã ifenein.
46001005	Ere nigin, Jesus bunem ereb ereb ganan bun, ã kisi feleya ifenein, are ãgenei wogõ ganan ado keleĩ ganan bun,
46001006	ere nigin, Kristus nigin neda wogõya, ã bun megeir ifaren.
46001007	Anĩ nigin, ã neda Odug Jesus Kristus yaorouf nigin wauĩ fatuk unog fen, tarig mog, ã Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa taka to lau gef.
46001008	Jesus ã totol irouyeik ile, idikeleya bun ilauf, anĩ bunem, neda Odug Jesus Kristus isiyouf nẽ naa bun, ã bouweĩ od sãf.
46001009	Negur ĩ, yogon Naal Jesus Kristus, neda Odug geid, ã nigal gouf nigin iweignein, ĩ ereb yef, de age fouf bagai.
46001010	Turau tar, aya neda Odug Jesus Kristus yana bunem totol bagai arokeneik, are ã atun fara fiya taka to ibodõf nigin, ã ganan abob nigin wauĩ tekelei yen ken, ã wauĩ ado kisi tekelei bagai ubodõgouf.
46001011	Neu turau tar, tunĩ Kloe nẽ ibor bun tamal dirokanan, are ã atun luwa irouya ibodok.
46001012	Aya enei wogõ auf, are eig fiya, ã atun takam irok, “Aya Pol dõ afef,” takam irok, “Aya Apolos dõ afef,” takam irok, “Aya Pita dõ afef,” takag irok, “Aya Kristus dõ afef.”
46001013	Kristus ĩ fara furu fen de? Aya Pol ĩ, ã nigin aa tetek bun dun de? Ã aya Pol yanau bunem naan digunein de?
46001014	Aya Negur de afiyek, are aya ã taka to naan agunen, Krispus ado Gaius dogol naan agunẽdin.
46001015	Anĩ nigin, taka nem to irõf, “Aya Pol yana nem naan agun.”
46001016	(Momoi, aya Stefanas nẽ ibor tareg naan agunẽdin, anĩ teten, takag naan agunen be anĩ, to kisi afef.)
46001017	Ere nigin, Kristus ĩ aya naan agunẽdiyouf nigin to sur fiyan, anĩ ere, biya od wogõ auf nigin sur fiyan, are Kristus nẽ aa tetek nẽ megeir to yalelauf nigin, tamo nẽ kisi biya wogõya anĩ bunem sã.
46001018	Jesus aa tetek bun laa fen ya od anĩ, idi inanakelediyouf anidi bun are neneya, anĩ ere, ada isennadaf bun, od are Negur nẽ megeir.
46001019	Ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok: “Aya tamo kisi biya adodo neid kisi biya daũ afalauf, aya tamo keleĩ odug adodo neid keleĩ alelauf.”
46001020	Tamo kisi biya adodo nain? Tamo keleĩ odug adodo nain? Sain enei nẽ keleĩ yaleya nigin luwa irouya tamo nain? Negur ĩ tenebur enei nẽ kisi biya anĩ to neneya inon de?
46001021	Negur nẽ kisi biya bunem, tenebur tamo dogo neid kisi biya anim, Negur nigin to kelein, anĩ nigin, neneya od dedig anĩ wogõ taudig bunem, idi momoi def anidi isennẽdiya nigin, Negur wau al fen.
46001022	Juda idi memelik nẽ uris dilouf nigin dirõdig, Grik idi kisi biya anĩ dimirẽdig.
46001023	Anĩ ere, ada Kristus aa tetek bun dun anĩ wogõ taudig, od anĩ Juda idi bun, ye tũ fiya od, haiden idi bun, are neneya od,
46001024	anĩ ere, idi Juda ado Grik Negurem iweignẽdin anidi bun, Kristus ĩ Negur nẽ megeir, Negur nẽ kisi biya.
46001025	Ere nigin, Negur nẽ neneya kisi are, tamo nẽ kisi biya wal fiya, Negur nẽ folo reya are, tamo nẽ megeir wal fiya.
46001026	Turau tar, ã naig be fiya ufareg mog, ã iweignein anĩ kisi gouf. Ã musei sam, tamo nẽ keleĩ bunem, kisi biya ado wowã gen. Musei sam totol ado wowã gen. Musei sam yeneĩ ado wowã gen.
46001027	Anĩ ere, Negur kisi biya adodo mama ifenẽdiyouf nigin, tenebur enei nẽ neneya igirnẽdin. Negur ĩ megeir adodo mama ifenẽdiyouf nigin, tenebur enei nẽ folo reya igirnẽdin.
46001028	Negur ĩ tenebur enei nẽ yeneid sãsã, meleid irim lai difedig ado, ereb taka sã dedig anĩ igirnẽdin, are ereb ado dedig anĩ, yana sa kalauf nigin age fen,
46001029	anĩ bunem, Negur mala bun, taka nem yogo yana to yalesauf.
46001030	Negur nigin ã Kristus Jesus bun ubodõgef, Jesus ĩ ada nigin Negur bunem kisi biya wõ yen, are ada ĩ bunem madur bagai, fateul wowã tau fen, isennẽya talen.
46001031	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, “Tamo ĩ yogo yana yalesef are, Odug ereb age fen anĩ nigin yana yalesauf.”
46002001	Turau tar, aya ã gein asi fen, Negur yaor afouf nigin wogõ ayein sain bun, aya od biya odug nem be, kisi biya odug nem to wogõ aun.
46002002	Ere nigin, aya ã geid tabodon sain, aya ereb ereb ganan wederou tu kel fen, Jesus Kristus ado, ĩ aa tetek bun laa fen anĩ dogol kisi afouf nigin kisi afokelen.
46002003	Sain aya ã gein asin, aya totolou sã, fatuk bagai kumĩ tererẽ aun.
46002004	Neu od ado neu wogõya, are kisi biya nẽ, wauĩ faleiya nẽ od bunem sã, Awa Uur nẽ megeir nẽ ifelnẽya bunem,
46002005	are ãgenei momoiya, tamo nẽ kisi biya bun to ibodõf, Negur nẽ megeir bun ibodõf nigin age afen.
46002006	Ada kisi biya nẽ od atĩya anidi atun wogõ taudig, anĩ ere, kisi biya anĩ, are sain enei nẽ sã, sain enei nẽ uyu irouya, fau inanakelediyouf anidi neid sã.
46002007	Anĩ ere, ada, Negur nẽ waa kisi biya anĩ, wogõ taudig, are iminẽyan ibodok, teneub kare fiya sã mog Negur neda fula fiya medeĩya nigin mogo igirin anĩ.
46002008	Sain enei nẽ uyu irouya takam, kisi biya anĩ to kelein. Idi kisi biya anĩ keleim are, idi fula fiya medeĩya nẽ Odug aa tetek bun to dum.
46002009	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei: “Negur nigin waud laa fedig idi nigin Negur dodok fen anĩ, malam taka to ilen, weder takam to karĩ yen, kisi takam to fokõ yen.”
46002010	Anĩ ere, Negur yogon Awa Uurem ada bun anĩ yaor fen. Awa Uur ĩ ereb ereb ganan fai yeledig, Negur nẽ ereb ereb ilon bagaig fai yeledig.
46002011	Tamo atun aim, tamo taka nẽ kisi keleĩ? Are tamo anĩ nẽ uurem dogol keleĩ. Age fiya bagai, tamo takam Negur nẽ kisi keleĩ sã, Negur nẽ Awa Uurem dogol keleĩ.
46002012	Ada teneub enei nẽ uur to talen, anĩ ere, ada Awa Uur Negur bun tamal talen, are ereb Negur wau sã ifanadan anĩ, ada keleĩ youf nigin age tafen.
46002013	Ada enei anĩ wogõ taudig, are tamo nẽ kisi biya bunem od difelnadan anĩ bunem sã, are od Awa Uurem ifelnadan anĩ bunem. Ada Awa Uur nẽ od bunem Awa Uur nẽ kisi wogõ taudig.
46002014	Tamo Awa Uur sã ĩ, Negur nẽ Awa Uur bun tamal ereb isif anĩ to yale iroudig, ere nigin, yogon karĩya bun, are neneya. Ĩ anĩ keleĩya nigin kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, are Awa Uur adodom dogol es difedig.
46002015	Awa Uur ado tamo ĩ, ereb ereb ganan nigin es fedidig, anĩ ere, ĩ yogo taka nem to es fiyẽf.
46002016	Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok: “Aim Odug nẽ kisi kelei ken, ĩ faded fiyẽf?” Anĩ ere, ada Kristus nẽ kisi ado.
46003001	Turau tar, aya ã momoiya nigin atĩya gen to ayein, ã teneub enei nẽ dogol, ã Kristus bun momou gen ayein.
46003002	Aya su afenein, saaf totol anĩ to afenein, ere nigin, ã anĩ nigin to saika gen. Momoi, ã gamag fau to saika gef.
46003003	Ã fau teneub enei nẽ dogol ubodõgef. Ã atun, kiyeĩ ado luwa irouya ibodok, anĩ nigin, ã fau teneub enei nẽ sã de? Ã teneub enei nẽ tamo gen to ago gef de?
46003004	Takam irok, “Aya Pol dõ afef,” takam irok, “Aya Apolos dõ afef,” ago gouf are, ã teneub enei nẽ tamo sã de?
46003005	Agef ilauf are, Apolos ĩ ai? Pol ĩ ai? Amã Negur nẽ kabĩ tamo dogol, amã bunem ã momoi gen, are Odugem kabĩ morou morou ifanaman kilei.
46003006	Ayam faat atenẽ di, Apolosem naan fen, anĩ ere, Negurem odugouf nigin age fen.
46003007	Anĩ nigin, faat itenẽya tamo ado naan fiya tamo are ege, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ yogo dogol odug, ere nigin, ĩ ereb odugouf nigin age fedig.
46003008	Faat itenẽya tamo ado naan fiya tamo, idi karĩya tekelei ado. Negur idi mugu mugu kabĩ dalen kilei, mala solo ifenẽdiyouf.
46003009	Ere nigin, amã Negur nẽ kabĩ tura tar, ã Negur nẽ kabĩ akor, Negur nẽ fõ.
46003010	Negur ĩ aya wau ifenẽya ifanan anĩ bunem, aya fõ inoya keleĩ biya tamo gen, fõ inoya nigin gariya anon, age afe di, taka nem anĩ teten fõ inof. Anĩ ere, tamo mugu mugu el de, lo de fen, fõ dinouf nigin lo difalauf.
46003011	Ere nigin, fõ gariya inon, are Jesus Kristus, taka nem fõ gariya fire inoya kisi feleya sã.
46003012	Tamo takam fõ gariya enei teten, gol, silwa, meein moni odug, aa, yeye be, wit turu nem fõ inouf are,
46003013	yogon kabĩ naig be fiya are yaorouf, ere nigin, Kristus nẽ naa bun, anĩ lalan bun irousi inouf. Are yã ado wõ ye di, yã anim tamo mugu mugu nẽ kabĩ nẽ kaũ es fouf.
46003014	Ĩ ereb inon anĩ ifarlauf are, ĩ yogon mala solo yalouf.
46003015	Ĩ ereb inon anĩ isaikalauf are, ĩ agogon youf. Ĩ yogo Negurem kel yalouf, anĩ ere, ĩ yã malan tamal ulõ yesiya tamo gen ibodõf.
46003016	Ã aug are Negur nẽ tempel, Negur nẽ Awa Uur ã namein ibodõdig anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
46003017	Taka ĩ Negur nẽ tempel daũ fouf are, Negur ĩ tamo anĩ daũf irailauf, ere nigin, Negur nẽ tempel are fateul, are ã tempel anĩ.
46003018	Ã aug to udegnẽgouf. Ãgenei taka ĩ, gama sain enei nẽ keleĩ bunem, aya kisi biya ado yef are, ĩ neneya wõ youf bagai, are ĩ kisi biya ado wõ youf nigin age fouf.
46003019	Ere nigin, Negur mala bun, teneub enei nẽ kisi biya are neneya. Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Negur ĩ, kisi biya adodo tamo dogo neid keleĩ anim kor bun dilelel mog, gei fedidig,”
46003020	Negur nẽ Itotoya takag irok, “Odug ĩ keleĩ, kisi biya adodo tamo neid kisi, are ege.”
46003021	Anĩ nigin, tamo yeneid to walesagauf! Ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan are ãgenei,
46003022	Pol, Apolos, Pita, teneub enei, mata ibodõya, laa, gama be, dumen, ereb ereb ganan, are ãgenei,
46003023	ã Kristus nẽ, Kristus ĩ Negur nẽ.
46004001	Anĩ nigin, tamo idi, amã nigin, idi Kristus nẽ kabĩ tamo tar, Negur nẽ waa lo fiya nigin idi imeid bun inon de fen, kisi difouf.
46004002	Tamo idi ereb lo difouf nigin imeid bun inon anidi, dogo neid marau sigor dõ difef dile, age difouf anĩ, marau orof.
46004003	Ã aya es wiyagef be, tamo nẽ kot bun es difiyaf, are aya to sii fiyaf. Momoi, aya yug nigineg to es afedig.
46004004	Neu kisi are karẽtut, anĩ ere, anim aya mosor sã to auf. Odug im aya es fiyaf.
46004005	Anĩ nigin, es fiya nẽ sain fau wõya sã mog, to es gouf. Tari gef uleg, Odug isiyouf bun. Ĩ ereb gugum bun iminek anĩ lalan bun irou isi fen, tamo neid waud bun kisi ibodok anĩ yaor fouf. Sain anĩ bun, idi mugu mugu Negur bun yana odug dalouf.
46004006	Turau tar, gama aya, ãgenei biya fiya nigin, ereb enei arokenein, aya yug ado Apolos bunem, afelnein, anĩ bunem, ã wogõya eig fiya nẽ gariya, are amã bun keleĩ walogouf, “Itotoya bun yenek anĩ to ufodulagauf.” Ã anĩ keleĩ youf are, ã tamo taka anĩ yana waleseg fen, taka to lai gouf.
46004007	Ere nigin, aim õ, taka wal fiya inenok? Õ mogo ado, ere anĩ õ to walen? Õ mogo anĩ walen ouf are, ere nigin õ anĩ to walen gen, ogo yanã walesef?
46004008	Ereb ã oroyeik ganan ã mogo ado. Ã mogo safina kisi feleya bagai ubodõgef. Ã mogo king wowã gen, are amã geid sã. Amã ã geid king wowã tauf nigin, ã momoi bagai king wowã gem anĩ, aya orouf bagai.
46004009	Ere nigin, aya kisi afef, Negur ĩ amã aposel, tamo yukesiya nigin dinenẽdig gen, tamo dilouf nigin, gĩ bun idikeleyan bagai inenaman. Saa teneub ado, are tamo ado engel meleid bun, amã fele difamãf nigin inoman.
46004010	Amã Kristus nigin neneya mabodok, anĩ ere, ã Kristus bun kisi biya bagai ubodõgef. Amã totol sã mabodok, anĩ ere, ã totol ubodõgef. Ã yeneĩ dalesedig, amã yanamã to dalesedig.
46004011	Kulu nem isi gama sain enei bun, amã naũ ado naan ail mayok, amã gabar masasak mafilaik, amã darau difanamak, amã fõ sã.
46004012	Amã mug imamam kabĩ totol maledig. Sain amã disisnamak are, amã el fiya mafenẽdidig. Amã darau difanamak are, darau anĩ faali mafedig.
46004013	Bouwamã bun od duk sain, amã molol nem od solo mafedig. Mabodok masi gama sain enei bun, amã teneub enei nẽ ido gen ado, ereb ereb ganan nẽ moto gen wõ maun.
46004014	Aya ã mama ifeneĩya nigin enei to atotof, anĩ ere, ã neu kesu tar oboiyou gen wedereĩ arouf nigin age afef.
46004015	Ere nigin, Kristus bun, ã ten tausen kulat tamo ado, anĩ ere, ã temeĩ musei sã, are aya Kristus Jesus bun biya od bunem temeĩ wõ aun.
46004016	Anĩ nigin, aya ã madẽ wiyagauf nigin totol bagai arokeneik.
46004017	Gariya enei nigin, aya neu kesu Timoti, ĩ Odug bun aya oboiyou ado dõ fiya biya, ã gein sur afef. Im Kristus Jesus bun, neu mata ibodõya nẽ suma anĩ, ã wedereĩ fokõ fouf, are aya modoũ ganan sios ganan bun afelnẽdidig age fiya bagai.
46004018	Ã tunĩ, Pol ĩ amã garan to isiyouf ge fen, ã aug yeneĩ walesegen.
46004019	Anĩ ere, Odug orouf are, aya kaisã bagai ã gein asiyouf, age afe fen, aya dogo yeneid yaleseya tamo eneidi naig de wogõ def anĩ sã, anĩ ere, ereb megeir idi ado anĩ fele afouf.
46004020	Ere nigin, Negur nẽ tano are ege wogõya nẽ sã, are megeir nẽ.
46004021	Ere anĩ ã oroyeik? Aya wagagã yeĩya nigin tibog ado ã gein asiyouf de, wau laa fiya ado molol bunem asiyouf?
46005001	Ã atun, noli tobonunã age fiya, are haiden atuneg to wõ yedig anĩ, ibodok yeya karĩ aun. Tamo taka ĩ tama nẽ kayau we fedig.
46005002	Age fe di, ã aug selĩ wabigedig! Age fiya ban, ã wauĩ gudũf fen, tamo tobonunã enei inof anĩ, ãgenei uyu kũ fiya bun walelnẽgouf, are deuf.
46005003	Aya bouwau ã geid to ibodok, anĩ ere, uur bun are, aya ã geid tabodok. Aya ã geid ibodõya gen, tamo enei age fen, are ĩ mogo es afiyen.
46005004	Ã neda Odug Jesus yana bunem guru gouf bun, aya uur bun ã geid tabodõf, are neda Odug Jesus nẽ megeir ibodõf sain bun,
46005005	tamo enei Satan ima bun unenẽg, anĩ bunem, mosor nẽ bouwa daũf iraile fen, Odug nẽ naa bun yogon uur isennẽya yalouf.
46005006	Ã yeneĩ yaleseya are to biya. Yis naal bagai flawa obu namen kabĩ yaledig anĩ, ã to keleĩ de?
46005007	Ã flawa mata yis sã gen wõ gouf nigin, yis tubu anĩ waleleg, are ã anĩ flawa mata yis sã. Ere nigin, Kristus, neda Pasa naa nẽ sipsip naal, sesewi difiyen.
46005008	Anĩ nigin, ada Pasa Sifa naa anĩ tarouwauf, are yis tubu, sesen ado to biya nẽ yis bunem sã, anĩ ere, bret yis sã, karẽtut ado momoi nẽ bret bunem age tafouf.
46005009	Aya ã noli tobonunã dinodig tamo kayau geid to nigal gouf nigin, neu pas mogo atotkenein,
46005010	anĩ ere, aya teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau geid to nigal gouf nigin to orok, are idi noli tobonunã, ereb ereb nigin akorouya, idegẽya bunem taka nẽ safina bẽ yaleya be, idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya age difedig. Ã idi geid to nigal gouf are, ã teneub enei utorõgouf.
46005011	Anĩ ere, gama aya ã bun atotof are, ã taka ĩ yogo nigin tura ye fen, noli tobonunã, ereb ereb nigin akorouya, idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya, bou yũya od wogõya, naan yõya be, idegẽya bunem taka nẽ safina bẽ yaleya age fedig, ĩ weim to nigal gouf. Tamo age fiya ado weim saafeg to wãgauf.
46005012	Ere nigin aya idi sios mayarẽ difaref anĩ es afediyouf? Are, idi sios namen difaref anĩ ã to es wiyẽdigef de?
46005013	Negur idi sios mayarẽ difaref anĩ es fediyouf. Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok kilei, “Ã atun tamo sane anĩ walelnẽgouf.”
46006001	Ãgenei takam, taka ado fefuya yenẽf are, ere nigin ĩ Negur nẽ tamo kayau wagedin irouleya ban, ĩ idi momoiya sã anidi bun, mama sã gen es fiya nigin irouledig?
46006002	Are Negur nẽ tamo kayau teneub enei es difouf anĩ, ã to keleĩ de? Ã teneub enei es gouf are, ã morõ naal bagai es fiya nigin kisi feleya sã de?
46006003	Are amã engel es mafediyouf anĩ, ã to keleĩ de? Age fouf are, mata ibodõya enei nẽ morõ es fiya nigin naig fiyauf?
46006004	Anĩ nigin, ã teneub enei nẽ morõ age fediya nigin fefuya adouf are, ã haiden idi, sios bun tamo yeneid sã anidi, es fiya tamo nigin ugirnẽdigef de?
46006005	Aya ã mama yeĩf nigin od enei orok. Are ã atun, momoiya tamo kayau fefuya idi atun ibodok anĩ, es fiya nigin kisi biya ado tamo taka sã de?
46006006	Anĩ ere, momoiya tamo takam tura taka kiwai ifen ken, kot bun iledig, are enei momoiya sã anidi wagedin irouledig.
46006007	Momoi bagai, ã atun abob nigin kot bun fefuya ibodok anim, ã mogo kuku gen anĩ yaoref. Ere nigin ã idi to utornẽdige di, sane diyeĩf? Ere nigin ã idi to utornẽdige di, didegneĩf?
46006008	Age fiya ban, ã aug udegẽg fen, sane ago gedig, are ã tureĩ tar bun enei ago gedig.
46006009	Tamo tobonunã sesen idi, Negur nẽ tano to akorouf anĩ, ã to keleĩ de? Are ã idi to utornẽdige di, didegneĩf. Idi noli tobonunã dinodig, idi idegẽya waitou yana dalesedig, idi seseirã tobonunã dinodig, tamo idi bouweid na nẽ sur difedig, tamo tutur, kayau tutur noli tobonunã dinodig,
46006010	idi bẽ daledig, idi ereb ereb safina nigin akorou dedig, idi naan dõdig, idi bou yũya od wogõ dedig, idi idegẽya bunem taka nẽ safina daledig anidi ganan, Negur nẽ tano to akorouf.
46006011	Are ã tunĩ age fiya anĩ ago gedig. Anĩ ere, ã mosor bun tamal kulo yein, are ã fateul inenein, are ã, Odug Jesus Kristus yana bun ado neda Negur nẽ Awa Uur bunem, Negur mala bun madur bagai wowã gen.
46006012	Taka irõf, “Aya ereb ereb ganan nigin sã age afeid kisi feleya.” Are de momoi, anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan to isennadauf. Aya ereb ereb ganan nigin sã age afeid kisi feleya, anĩ ere, aya ereb takam to irouna di, ferfer abodõf.
46006013	Taka irõf, “Saaf are te guroub nẽ, te guroub are saaf nẽ.” Anĩ ere, Negur anĩ ganan daũ falauf. Bouwa are noli tobonunã nẽ sã, anĩ ere, Odug nẽ, are Odug ĩ bouwa anĩ nẽ.
46006014	Are, Negur yogon megeir bunem Odug laa bun tamal yalesnen, are adag ĩ yalesnadauf.
46006015	Ã bouweĩ are, Kristus yogo bouwa nẽ tunĩ anĩ ã to keleĩ de? Age fiyauf are, aya Kristus bouwa nẽ tunĩ ale fen, kayau bouwa na sur fedig ado bagu afouf de? Sã bagai!
46006016	Tamo ĩ yogo, kayau taka bouwa na nẽ sur fedig ado bagu difouf are, ĩ kayau anĩ ado bouwa tekelei youf anĩ, ã to keleĩ de? Ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, “Idi urom bouweid tekelei youf.”
46006017	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ yogo Odug ado bagu difouf are, ĩ uur bun Odug ado tekelei youf.
46006018	Noli tobonunã bun tamal uyagauf. Mosor tunĩ ganan tamo taka inof, are ĩ yogo bouwa serẽ inof, anĩ ere, taka ĩ yogon bouwam noli mosor inof, are ĩ yogo bouwa bun mosor inof.
46006019	Ã bouweĩ are Awa Uur Fateul nẽ tempel, Awa Uur Fateul are ã namein ibodok anĩ Negur bun tamal walegen are, ã to keleĩ de? Ã aug, ãgenei sã,
46006020	ere nigin, ã mala odugem na yaleyein. Anĩ nigin, bouweĩ anim Negur yana walesagauf.
46007001	Gama od anĩ ã utotogen nigin arokeneik, tamo ĩ kayau to yalouf, are deuf.
46007002	Anĩ ere, noli tobonunã musei bagai ibodok nigin, are tamo mugu mugu ĩ yogon kayau adouf, are kayau mugu mugu ĩ yogon tamo adouf.
46007003	Tamo ĩ yogon bouwa nigin, yogon kayau to katũ fiyẽf, age fiya gen, kayau ĩg yogon bouwa nigin yogon tamo to katũ fiyẽf.
46007004	Kayau ĩ yogon bouwa nẽ mudur to ibodõf, are yogon tamo nẽ, age fiya gen, tamo ĩ yogon bouwa nẽ mudur to ibodõf, are yogon kayau nẽ.
46007005	Ã abob nigin bouweĩ to katũ gouf, anĩ ere, ã kosẽ gouf nigin, sain naal bagai yo ge fen, bouweĩ katũ gouf, are kisi falauf. Agog fen, ã bouweĩ kulatun fiya anĩ, malai nigin, are Satanem to kisi yeĩf nigin, baban ã bouweĩ bagu gouf.
46007006	Aya od enei karĩ gouf nigin orok, are ĩtãfiya sã.
46007007	Tamo ganan aya gen dibodok, are aya orouf. Anĩ ere, tamo mugu mugu idi, Negur bun dogo neid ege luwa dalef, taka ege luwa enei, taka ege luwa anĩ.
46007008	Anĩ ere, aya kayau tamo yaleya sã, tamo kayau yaleya sã ado, waab arokenẽdif, are idi aya gen age de dibodok dilauf, are deuf.
46007009	Anĩ ere, idi dogo bouweid nigin kulatun fiya kisi feleya sãf are, tamo idi kayau dalouf, kayau idi tamo dalouf, ere nigin, noli kisi waud bun yã gen bobo reya anĩ ban, tamo idi kayau yaleya, kayau idi tamo yaleya are deuf.
46007010	Tamo idi kayau adodo, kayau idi tamo adodo bun, aya od enei arokenẽdif, are ayam sã, Odugem. Are kayau ĩ ne tamo to itornẽf.
46007011	Anĩ ere, kayau ĩ tamo itornẽf are, ĩ tamo taka to yalouf be, are ĩ yogon tamo ado komo difouf. Are tamo ĩ yogon kayau to iru irailauf.
46007012	Ã tunĩ ganan bun, aya od enei arokenẽdif, are ayam, Odugem sã. Tura taka ĩ kayau ado, are kayau ĩ momoiya sã, anĩ ere, ĩ tamo ado ibodõya nigin oro fouf are, tamo ĩ kayau anĩ to iru irailauf.
46007013	Kayau taka ĩ tamo ado, are tamo ĩ momoiya sã, anĩ ere, ĩ kayau ado ibodõya nigin oro fouf are, kayau ĩ tamo anĩ to iru irailauf.
46007014	Ere nigin, tamo momoiya sã ĩ, yogon kayau bunem fateulen, are kayau momoiya sã ĩ, yogon momoiya tamo bunem fateulen. Age fiya sãf are, ã gereĩ tar idi karẽtut to dibodõf. Anĩ ere, idi gama fateul dibodok.
46007015	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ momoiya sã, iyawau fenẽ nigin oro fouf are, utornẽge di, age fouf. Suma age fiya bun, momoiya tamo be kayau, ereb taka anim to katĩ fiyek. Are Negur ĩ ada wau inosiya bun tabodõf nigin iweignadan.
46007016	Kayau õ, nẽ tamo usennẽf be sã be anĩ, naig fe di, õ keleĩ youf? Tamo õ, nẽ kayau usennẽf be sã be anĩ, naig fe di, õ keleĩ youf?
46007017	Odug ada mugu mugu igirnadan kilei ado, Negur ada mugu mugu iweignadan kilei bagai, age tag, mata tabodõgouf. Are, aya sios ganan bun nun enei anof.
46007018	Sain Negur ĩ tamo taka iweignen, tamo ĩ mogo mulũ ilen de? Are tamo ĩ mulũ ileya sã to ilauf. Sain Negur ĩ tamo taka iweignen, tamo ĩ mulũ ileya sã de? Are tamo ĩ to mulũ ilauf.
46007019	Mulũ ileya are ege, mulũ ileya sã areg ege. Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya dõ fiya anĩ odug bagai.
46007020	Tamo mugu mugu ĩ Negur iweignen sain bun, ĩ ibodon suma anĩ bun, agef ibodõf.
46007021	Sain Negur ĩ iweignon, õ ferfer ubodon de? Õ anĩ nigin to morõ yõf, anĩ ere, õ ferfer itorõya nigin kisi falauf are, anĩ õ agouf.
46007022	Ere nigin, taka ĩ, Odugem iweignen sain bun, ferfer ibodon, ĩ Odug nẽ karika tamo ibodok, age fiya gen, taka ĩ iweignen sain bun, karika tamo ibodon, ĩ Kristus nẽ ferfer ibodok.
46007023	Ã mala odugem na yaleyein. Ã tamo neid ferfer to wowã gouf.
46007024	Turau tar, tamo mugu mugu ĩ Negur iweignen sain bun ibodon suma anĩ bun, agef Negur ado dibodõf.
46007025	Kayau taulei nigin, aya Odug bun tamal ĩtãfiya taka to alen. Anĩ ere, aya, taka ĩ Odug nẽ wau yũya bunem momoi bagai tamo wõ yen anĩ, aya neu kisi afeneik.
46007026	Gama enei nẽ morõ odug nigin, aya kisi afef, are tamo ĩ gama ibodok gen, agef ibodõf, are deuf.
46007027	Õ kayau ado de? Age fiyauf are, õ kayau iru iraileya nigin naab to umirẽf. Õ kayau to walen de? Age fiyauf are, õ kayau taka yaleya nigin to umirẽf.
46007028	Anĩ ere, õ kayau walef are, õ mosor to unof. Kayau taulei taka tamo yalef are, ĩ mosor to inof. Anĩ ere, tamo kayau dalef, kayau tamo dalef, idi mata ibodõya enei bun morõ musei dalouf, are aya morõ enei ã bun to wõ youf anĩ orouf.
46007029	Turau tar, aya od enei arokeneik, are sain mogo tobegaf, anĩ nigin, gama sain enei ilef bun, idi kayau ado, idi kayau sã gen dibodõf;
46007030	idi maruid isif, idi to maruid isif gen dibodõf; idi waud al difef, idi waud to al difef gen dibodõf; idi ereb taka na dalef, idi ereb taka sã gen dibodõf;
46007031	idi teneub enei nẽ safina diroudif, are idi waud adok anĩ bun to dinouf. Ere nigin, teneub enei, gama agef ibodok anĩ, inanakalauf.
46007032	Aya ã to suwẽ gouf nigin orouf. Tamo kayau sã, ĩ Odug nẽ kabĩ nigin kisi fedig, are ĩ ereb age fe di, Odug al fouf nigin kisi fedig.
46007033	Anĩ ere, tamo kayau ado, ĩ teneub enei nẽ bouwa isennẽya nigin kisi fedig, are ĩ ereb age fe di, yogon kayau al fouf nigin kisi fedig.
46007034	Age fe di, yogon kisi fara fedig. Kayau tamo sã be, kayau taulei, ĩ Odug nẽ kabĩ nigin kisi fedig, are ĩ bouwa ado uur bun fateul wõ youf nigin age fedig. Anĩ ere, kayau tamo ado, ĩ teneub enei nẽ bouwa isennẽya nigin kisi fedig, are ĩ ereb age fe di, yogon tamo al fouf nigin kisi fedig.
46007035	Aya od enei ãgenei biya fiya nigin orok, aya ã ifõyeĩf nigin to age afef, anĩ ere, ã madur agog fen, ã aug nigin Odug bun fara fiya sã wenẽgouf nigin age afef.
46007036	Anĩ ere, tamo taka ĩ, kayau taulei yaleya nigin digirnen anĩ, ĩ bun tobonunã biya sã age afef ye fen, kayau ĩ tamo yaleya nẽ sain mogo wal fe di, tamo ĩ kayau yaleya nigin kisi fef are, tamo ĩ yogon oroya kilei age fouf. Ĩ mosor to inof, are idi bagu difouf.
46007037	Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ yogon wau bun totol ifar fen, taka nẽ kisim to we fiyẽf, anĩ ere, yogon oroya dõf fen, kayau taulei anĩ to yalouf nigin yogon kisi ifõf are, areg ĩ tutuk age fouf.
46007038	Anĩ nigin, tamo ĩ kayau taulei yalef are, ĩ tutuk age fef, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ kayau to yalef are, ĩ tutuk bagai age fef.
46007039	Kayau ĩ yogon tamo fau mata ibodõf are, ĩ yogon tamo ado dibodõf. Anĩ ere, yogon tamo laa fouf are, ĩ yogon oroya dõf fen, taka bun ileya kisi feleya, anĩ ere, tamo ĩ Odug nigin momoi yef anĩ bun dogol.
46007040	Anĩ ere, neu es fiya bun, kayau ĩ gama ibodok gen, ibodõf are, ĩ fatuk bagai al fouf. Aya kisi afef, are ayag Negur nẽ Awa Uur ado.
46008001	Gama, saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difedig nigin, ada keleĩ, are ada ganan keleĩ ado. Keleĩ are yogo yana yaleseya inodig, anĩ ere, wau laa fiya anim biya yalesedig.
46008002	Tamo ĩ ereb taka nigin aya keleĩ yef are, ĩ ereb taka keleĩ youf anĩ ĩ fau keleĩ sã.
46008003	Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ Negur nigin wau laa fef are, Negur ĩ nigin keleĩ.
46008004	Anĩ nigin, saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difedig anĩ yõya nigin, ada keleĩ, are tenebur ein idegẽya waitou are ege, anĩ ere, Negur taka sã, tekelei dogol ibodok.
46008005	Ere nigin, saa be teneub bun, idi waitou dedig anĩ dibodok, are momoi bagai waitou musei ado odug musei dibodok,
46008006	anĩ ere, ada bun Negur tekelei dogol ibodok, are Dei, ĩ bun tamal ereb ereb ganan wõ yen, ĩ nigin ada mata tabodok. Odug tekelei dogol ibodok, are Jesus Kristus, ĩ bunem ereb ereb ganan wõ yen, ĩ bunem ada mata tabodok.
46008007	Anĩ ere, tamo ganan enei keleĩ sã. Tamo kayau tunĩ fau idegẽya waitou nigin fatuk bagai kisi difedig nigin, sain idi saaf anĩ doko, idi saaf anĩ idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen de fen, kisi difedig, age dife di, idi waud totol sã nigin, amuyẽdig.
46008008	Anĩ ere, saafem ada Negur non to irouladauf, are ada saaf to tãf are, anim ada to daũ fadauf, ada saaf tãfeg, anim ada to isennadauf.
46008009	Anĩ ere, ereb ã karika ago gouf anim, idi momoiya totol sã anidi bun, naabura gudũ fiya to wenẽdigouf nigin lo walagauf.
46008010	Ere nigin, taka ĩ wau totol sã anĩ, õ keleĩ enei ado, idegẽya waitou nẽ tempel bun saaf wõ mog ileyõf are, ĩ saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen anĩ, kumĩ sã to yãf de?
46008011	Anĩ nigin, turã totol sã, ĩ nigin Kristus laa fen, are ogon keleim ĩ daũ fiyek.
46008012	Sain ã naab enei bun tureĩ tar bun mosor unog fen, dogo neid waud totol sã anĩ daũ wedigef are, ã Kristus bun mosor unogef.
46008013	Anĩ nigin, ereb aya ãf anim neu turau mosor bun inenẽf are, ayam ĩ mosor bun to anenẽf nigin, aya muda baban to bagai ãf.
46009001	Ereb takam aya katĩ fiyaf de? Aya aposel sã de? Aya Jesus neda Odug to ailen de? Ã Odug bun neu kabĩ bunem to wõ gen de?
46009002	Tunĩ bun aya aposel sã be, anĩ ere, momoi bagai aya ã bun aposel. Ere nigin, ã Odug bun aya aposel kabĩ alef anĩ nẽ uris.
46009003	Idi aya es difiyauf nigin dibodok anidi bun, isennaya od enei orok.
46009004	Amã saaf ado naan yõya nigin to kisi feleya de?
46009005	Amã, aposel tunĩ ganan, Odug nẽ tura tar ado Pita age difedig gen, kayau momoiya ado amã geid marou malauf, are to kisi feleya de?
46009006	Takag, aya ado Banabas dogol mata ibodõya nigin kabĩ malouf de?
46009007	Aim kusĩ tamo kabĩ yale fen, yogo nigin ereb ereb na yaledig? Aim wain kabier wain iten ken, dogo neid biya to yõdig? Aim sipsip lof fen, dogo neid su sumin to yõdig?
46009008	Aya tamo nẽ lo fiya bunem dogol, od enei orok de? Lo anĩg enei nigin tekelei bagai to irok de?
46009009	Ere nigin, Moses nẽ Lo bun eig ye itoton, “Õ bulmakau, wit faat biya nẽ gabar loko fediyouf nigin lalai feid mog, yogon awa to ufokalauf.” Negur ĩ bulmakau nigin kisi fef de?
46009010	Momoi, Negur ĩ od enei ada nigin to irok de? Momoi, od enei ada nigin itoton, ere nigin, tamo teneub gudũ fedig ado, tamo wit faat biya nẽ gabar yaleledig, idi kusu fiya sain bun dogo neid morou morou dalouf nigin waud ise fen, age difedig.
46009011	Amã ã atun ãgenei uur nigin faat mararan ouf are, amã ã bun bouwa buru nẽ safina kusu mafouf are, anĩ odug biya de?
46009012	Tunĩ ã bun isennẽya enei yaleya nigin kisi falauf are, amã idi wal fiya anĩ, to malouf de? Anĩ ere, amã ã bun safina yaleya nigin kisi feleya enei to age mafen. Age fiya ban, amã Kristus nẽ biya od to naabura gudũ mafouf nigin, ereb ereb ganan faali mafef masin.
46009013	Idi tempel bun kabĩ daledig anidi, dogo neid saaf tempel bun daledig, idi alta bun aruna daledig anidi, ereb alta bun sesewi difen anĩ dale dogoledig, are ã to keleĩ de?
46009014	Naab tekelei anĩ bun, Odug iron, are idi biya od wogõ def anidi, biya od bunem mata ibodõya nẽ safina dalouf.
46009015	Anĩ ere, aya safina yaleya nigin kisi feleya eneidi, anĩ taka to age afen. Age afe fen, aya, ã aya nigin ago gouf nigin, enei to atotof. Takam yanau yaleseya enei aya bun yalelauf are, aya laa fiyauf anĩ orouf.
46009016	Aya biya od wogõ auf sain bun, aya yug nigin yanau to alesedig, ere nigin, Negurem biya od wogõ auf nigin nugo fiyadig. Aya biya od to wogõ auf are, aya bun morõ odug bagai wõ youf.
46009017	Aya neu oroya bunem kabĩ enei alouf are, aya mala yaleya kisi feleya. Are neu oroyam sã, anĩ ere, aya Negurem kabĩ ifanan nigin age afef.
46009018	Age afouf are, ere anĩ neu mala solo? Are, sain aya biya od wogõ auf, aya mala yaleya sã biya od wogõ audig, are aya biya od bun mala yaleya nigin kisi feleya anĩ to age afedig.
46009019	Aya tamo taka nẽ sã, are aya karika, anĩ ere, aya tamo musei kisi feleya bagai gei afouf nigin, aya yug tamo ganan nẽ ferfer wõ auf.
46009020	Juda idi bun, aya Juda idi gei afouf nigin, Juda tamo gen wõ aun. Idi lo farumen dibodok anidi bun, aya yug lo farumen to abodok, anĩ ere, aya idi lo farumen dibodok anidi gei afouf nigin, aya tamo lo farumen ibodok gen wõ aun.
46009021	Idi lo sã anidi bun, aya Negur nẽ lo bun karika sã, are aya Kristus nẽ lo farumen abodok, anĩ ere, aya idi lo sã anidi gei afouf nigin, aya tamo lo sã gen wõ aun.
46009022	Idi furũya anidi bun, aya idi furũya anidi gei afouf nigin, aya tamo furũya gen wõ aun. Aya ereb ereb ganan kisi feleya anĩ bunem, tunĩ kel gei afouf nigin, tamo ganan bun, idi dibodok gen tobonunã age fiya gen wõ aun.
46009023	Aya biya od nigin enei ganan age afedig, are aya biya od nẽ el fiya weim talouf nigin.
46009024	Gududuya bun, tamo ganan gududu dedig, anĩ ere, tekeleim dogol mala yaledig anĩ ã to keleĩ de? Naab age fiya bun, gududu ge fen, mala walogouf.
46009025	Tamo ganan kodẽ wal difouf nigin age difedig anidi, ereb ereb ganan bun totol bagai tai difedig. Idi mala fau sa kalauf anĩ dalouf nigin age difedig, anĩ ere, amã mala gai gai ibodkalauf anĩ yaleya nigin age mafedig.
46009026	Anĩ nigin, aya tamo gariya sã gudu redig gen, to gudu raudig. Aya yau yũdig gen, to ege imau warũ yeledig.
46009027	Anĩ ere, aya yug bouwau au ken, anĩ neu ferfer ibodõf nigin age afedig, are aya tunĩ wogõ afiyeĩd fen, aya yug mala solo yaleya nigin, kisi feleya sã to bagai wõ auf nigin age afedig.
46010001	Turau tar, aya ã enei to keleĩ youf nigin to orouf, are Moses nẽ sain bun, tubuda tar ganan budũ farumen difar fen, idi ganan Maaĩ Giriya atu diyok dilen.
46010002	Idi ganan budũ bun ado maaĩ bun naan dale fen, Moses nẽ ibor tar wowã den.
46010003	Are, idi ganan uur nẽ saaf tekelei anĩ don,
46010004	idi ganan uur nẽ naan tekelei anĩ don, are uur nẽ meein idi geid weim diyok dilen anĩ bun, idi naan don, meein are Kristus.
46010005	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ idi musei ganan nigin wau to al fen, anĩ nigin, dogo neid bouweid gerere tuan firagagaũ difen.
46010006	Enei ganan ada wederada irouya nigin wõ yen, anĩ bunem ada idi age difen gen, ereb sane nigin wauda to tanouf.
46010007	Idi neid tunĩ gen, ã idegẽya waitou yana to walesagauf. Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, “Tamo kayau saaf naan doko dibod ken, fafã de dale, noli tobonunã dinon.”
46010008	Ada idi tunĩ age difen gen, noli tobonunã to tanouf. Age dife di, naa tekelei bun, idi atun tuwenti tri tausen tamo kayau gare den.
46010009	Ada idi tunĩ age difen gen, Odug kisi fiya bun to tanenẽf. Idi age difen, gogourum didenkesin.
46010010	Ada idi tunĩ gen, to nauseir tauf. Idi age difen, daũ fiya nẽ engelem idenkesin.
46010011	Eneidi ada ifelnadauf nigin idi bun wõ yen, are idikeleya sain, ada bun mogo wõ yen anĩ bun, wederada irouya nigin itoton.
46010012	Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ kisi fef, totol ifaref yef, ĩ to kubũ youf nigin lo falauf.
46010013	Kisi fiya ganan ã bun wõ yedig, are tamo bun wõ yedig dogol. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ age afouf yef anĩ, age fedig, ĩ kisi fiya ã yaleya kisi feleya sã anĩ, ã bun to wõ youf nigin age fouf. Anĩ ere, ã kisi yeĩf sain bun, Negur ĩ iyawoya nẽ naab anĩg ifelneĩf, anĩ bunem ã totol ufaragauf nigin sã kisi falauf.
46010014	Anĩ nigin, neu turau tar oboiyou, idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya bun tamal uyalalagauf.
46010015	Aya ã tamo kayau kisi biya ado gen arokeneik, ereb aya arok anĩ, ã aug es gouf.
46010016	De fiyẽya nẽ kap, ada de fiya tafenẽdig, are Kristus nẽ naud bun bagu fiya sã de? Bret ada mumã tafedig, are Kristus nẽ bouwa bun bagu fiya sã de?
46010017	Bret tekelei dogol ibodok nigin, ada musei, anĩ ere, bouwada tekelei, ere nigin, ada ganan bret tekelei anĩ bun bagu tafedig.
46010018	Israel tamo kayau nigin kisi walogouf, idi sesewi fiya nẽ saaf dõdig anidi, alta bun to bagu difedig de?
46010019	Age fouf are, ere anĩ kisi afef, are sesewi fiya nẽ saaf idegẽya waitou difenek anĩ odug de, oo idegẽya waitou anĩ odug de?
46010020	Sã, anĩ ere, haiden neid sesewi fiya anĩ kaa sesen bun difenẽdidig, are Negur bun sã. Are aya ã kaa sesen geid bagu gouf nigin to orouf.
46010021	Ã Odug nẽ kap bun ado kaa sesen neid kap buneg yõya nigin kisi feleya sã. Ã Odug nẽ tebol bun ado kaa sesen neid tebol buneg bagu fiya nigin kisi feleya sã.
46010022	Ada Odug kiyeĩ ifanadauf nigin age tafef de? Ada neda megeir ĩ wal fiya de?
46010023	Tunĩ dirõdig, “Ada ereb ereb ganan nigin, sã age tafeid, age fiya nigin kisi feleya,” anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan to isennadauf. Tunĩ dirõdig, “Ada ereb ereb ganan nigin, sã age tafeid, age fiya nigin kisi feleya,” anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan biya fiya to inouf.
46010024	Taka ĩ yogon biya fiya nigin to imirẽf, anĩ ere, tunĩ neid biya fiya nigin imirẽf.
46010025	Ereb ereb yaro maket bun na sur difedig anĩ, ãgenei kisi bun to fiya sã wãgauf,
46010026	ere nigin, “Teneub ado ereb ereb ganan anĩ namen yenek are Odug nẽ.”
46010027	Momoiya sã tamo taka, saaf yõya nigin ã iweigneĩ di, ã ileya nigin oroyeĩf are, ereb ereb ã meleĩ bun inodin anĩ, ãgenei kisi bun to fiya sã wãgauf.
46010028	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ ã irokeneĩf, “Enei are sesewi fiya bun difenen,” youf are, tamo irokenein ĩ nigin ado kisi es fiya yaor karẽtut ibodõf nigin, saaf anĩ to wãgauf.
46010029	Neu wogõya nẽ gariya are, tamo anĩ nẽ kisi es fiya nigin, are ãgenei kisi es fiya nigin sã. Taka nem irõf, “Age fiyauf are, ere nigin neu ereb ereb nigin kisi feleya anĩ, tamo taka nẽ kisim es fouf?
46010030	Aya de fiya bunem saaf ãf are, ere nigin taka nem saaf anĩ nigin, Negur de afiyek nigin bou yũya od irok?”
46010031	Anĩ ere, ã saaf wãgauf, naan wãgauf ado, ereb ereb ganan ago gouf are, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin anĩ ganan ago gouf.
46010032	Juda tamo, Grik tamo be, Negur nẽ sios bun tamo taka, to ye tũ fouf nigin ago gouf.
46010033	Ayag naab ganan bun tamo ganan al afiyẽdiyouf nigin age afedig gen, ago gouf. Ere nigin, aya neu biya fiya to amirek, anĩ ere, musei isennẽdiyouf nigin, dogo neid biya fiya amirek.
46011001	Ayag Kristus madẽ afiyẽdig gen, ã aya madẽ wiyagauf.
46011002	Aya ã yeneĩ alesef, ere nigin, ã ereb ereb ganan bun aya nigin karĩ weleg fen, ifelnẽya anĩ aya ale fen, ã afenein anĩ, kafĩ weleg uroug usigef.
46011003	Anĩ ere, aya ã eig fiya anĩ keleĩ youf nigin orouf, are tamo ganan neid mudur are Kristus, kayau nẽ mudur are tamo, Kristus nẽ mudur are Negur.
46011004	Tamo ganan, taka ĩ yogon mudur kerũ fel fen, kosẽ yef be, profet od wogõ yef, ĩ yogon mudur Kristus mama ifenek.
46011005	Kayau ganan, taka ĩ yogon mudur to kerũ fel fen, kosẽ yef be, profet od wogõ yef, ĩ yogon mudur, are aiwa anĩ mama ifenek, are ĩ yogon fatiya korerẽ feleya gen.
46011006	Kayau taka ĩ yogon mudur kerũ fiya sãf are, ĩ yogon fatiya gudũ falauf. Kayau taka ĩ yogon fatiya gudũ fouf be, korerẽ fouf anim, mama ifenẽf are, ĩ yogon mudur kerũ fouf.
46011007	Tamo taka ĩ yogon mudur to kerũ fouf, ere nigin, ĩ Negur nẽ malakanon ado fula fiya medeĩya, tamo bun. Anĩ ere, kayau ĩ tamo nẽ fula fiya medeĩya, kayau bun.
46011008	Ere nigin, tamo ĩ kayau bunem to isin, anĩ ere, kayau ĩ tamo bunem isin.
46011009	Takag, tamo ĩ kayau isennẽf nigin to inon, anĩ ere, kayau ĩ tamo isennẽf nigin inon.
46011010	Age fiya nigin, kayau ĩ, engel idi neid meleid bun, ĩ tamo farumen ibodok anĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin, yogon mudur kerũ fouf.
46011011	Anĩ ere, Odug bun kayau ĩ tamo bun yogo mugu to ifaref, tamo ĩg kayau bun yogo mugu to ifaref.
46011012	Ere nigin, kayau ĩ tamo bunem isin gen, tamo ĩg kayau bunem wõ yen. Anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan Negur bun tamal isif.
46011013	Ã aug es gouf, are kayau taka ĩ yogon mudur to kerũ fel fen, Negur kosẽ fiyek, are de de?
46011014	Tamo taka fatiya salo isiya adouf anim mama ifenek anĩ, tamo nẽ tobonunã anĩ to ifelneik de?
46011015	Anĩ ere, kayau taka ĩ fatiya salo isiya adouf, are yogon fula fiya medeĩya. Ere nigin, fatiya salo isiya are, yogon mudur kerũ fiya nigin ifenen.
46011016	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ od enei kiwai ifenẽf are, ada suma taka sã, Negur nẽ sios buneg suma taka sã.
46011017	Faded fiya dõ fiya enei bun, aya ã yeneĩ to alesef, ere nigin, ãgenei guru fiya biya anĩ fotokar sane isidig.
46011018	Uruwa bun, aya karĩ aun, are ã sios nigin guru gef ã atun, fara fiya yenẽdig, age afe fen, od tunĩ aya momoi auf.
46011019	Ã atun fara fiya bagai yenek, anĩ bunem, ã atun ai anĩ Negur yo fiyen anĩ ifelneĩf.
46011020	Anĩ nigin, sain ã guru gef, are Odug nẽ Saaf bagai anĩ to wõgedig,
46011021	ere nigin, sain ã saaf wõgef bun, ã abob tari fediya sã, mugu mugu saaf wõgedig, anĩ nigin, taka ĩ naũ ibodõdig, taka ĩ naan yõdig.
46011022	Saaf ado naan yõya nigin ã fõ sã de? Ã Negur nẽ sios lai ge fen, idi safina sã anidi mama wenẽdigef de? Aya ã ere ayeĩf? Aya enei nigin ã yeneĩ alesauf de? Sã bagai! Aya enei nigin ã yeneĩ to alesauf.
46011023	Ere nigin, aya enei Odug bun tamal ale fen, ãg afenein. Are Odug Jesus, Judas ĩ kiwai ifenen bõ anĩ bun, bret yale,
46011024	Negur de fiye ken, bret anĩ mumãf fen, iron, “Enei neu bouwau, are ã nigin. Aya nigin karĩ walagauf nigin enei ago gouf.”
46011025	Naab tekelei bun, bõ saaf bure difel fen, ĩ kap yale fen, iron, “Kap wain enei neu naudou bun bar itenẽya mata. Sain ganan ã wãgauf, aya nigin karĩ walagauf nigin enei ago gouf.”
46011026	Ere nigin, sain ganan ã bret enei wõg fen, kap enei bun wãgauf, ã Odug nẽ laa nigin kurõ wesig mog, ĩ fau isiyouf.
46011027	Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ tutuk sã bret anĩ yãf be, Odug nẽ kap bun yãf are, ĩ Odug nẽ bouwa ado naud bun mosor inouf.
46011028	Taka ĩ yogo nigin es fel fen, bret anĩ yoko, kap anĩ bun yãf.
46011029	Ere nigin, taka ĩ Odug nẽ bouwa nigin to kisif fen, bret yoko, kap bun yãf are, ĩ yogon es fiya anĩ yogo yoko.
46011030	Anĩ nigin, ã atun musei malegeid fen, dagi didig, ãgenei tunĩ gare den.
46011031	Anĩ ere, ada nigin es tafouf are, ada es fiya bun to tabodõf.
46011032	Sain ada Odugem es fadauf, are ada Odugem madur fadauf, are ĩ teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau geid ada mosor ado to youf nigin age fouf.
46011033	Anĩ nigin, neu turau tar, sain ã yõya nigin guru gouf are, ã abob nigin tari gouf.
46011034	Taka ĩ naũ fouf are, ĩ fõ bun yãf, anĩ bunem, sain ã guru gouf, ã es fiya bun to ulagauf. Sain aya asiyouf, aya faded fiya tobol afeneĩf.
46012001	Turau tar, aya ã Awa Uur Fateul nẽ ege luwa nigin to keleĩ youf anĩ to orouf.
46012002	Ã keleĩ, sain ã haiden ubodõgen, naab fire fire bun ditonei ken, eweid ifofakeleya idegẽya waitou bun, fõ yeleya nigin dirou dileyein.
46012003	Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, are taka ĩ Negur nẽ Awa Uur bunem wogõ yef, ĩ to irõdig, “Jesus sane lauf.” Takag, taka nem eig ye irõya kisi feleya sã, “Jesus ĩ Odug,” are Awa Uur Fateulem dogol.
46012004	Ege luwa nigin fire fire dibodok, anĩ ere, Awa Uur anĩ tekelei.
46012005	Kabĩ gariya fire fire dibodok, anĩ ere, Odug tekelei.
46012006	Kabĩ nẽ megeir fire fire dibodok, anĩ ere, Negur tekelei ĩ, tamo ganan bun, kabĩ nẽ megeir ganan nigin kabĩ yaledig.
46012007	Tamo ganan isennẽdiyouf nigin, tamo mugu mugu bun Awa Uur yaor fedig.
46012008	Taka bun Awa Uur bunem kisi biya nẽ od ifenek, taka bun Awa Uur tekelei bunem keleĩ nẽ od ifenek,
46012009	taka bun Awa Uur tekelei bunem momoiya anĩ ifenek, taka bun Awa Uur tekelei anĩ bunem dagi el fiya nẽ ege luwa ifenek,
46012010	taka bun memelik inoya nẽ megeir ifenek, taka bun profet od ifenek, taka bun uur es fiya ifenek, taka bun od fire fire nem wogõya ifenek, taka bun od fire fire nem wogõya anĩ falei fiya ifenek.
46012011	Enei ganan Awa Uur tekelei dogol ĩ yogon kabĩ, ĩ yogon oroya dõf fen, tamo kayau mugu mugu anĩ ifenẽdidig.
46012012	Bouwa anĩ tekelei, anĩ ere, bouwa anĩ fara fiya musei bunem inof. Yogon fara fiya ganan are musei, anĩ ere, idi bouwa tekelei dinof. Kristus ĩg age fiya.
46012013	Ere nigin, ada ganan, Juda tamo be Grik tamo, ferfer be kafĩ fiya sã tamo, Awa Uur tekelei bunem naan tale fen, bouwada tekelei wõ taun, agef fen, ada ganan Awa Uur tekelei naan gen tokon, megeir talouf nigin ifanadan.
46012014	Bouwa ĩ fara fiya tekeleim to inof, anĩ ere, fara fiya museim inof.
46012015	Ye ĩ, aya ima sã, anĩ nigin, aya bouwa nẽ tunĩ sã youf, anĩ ere, gariya anĩ bun ĩ aya bouwa nẽ tunĩ sã yeya kisi feleya sã.
46012016	Takag, weder ĩ, aya mala sã, anĩ nigin, aya bouwa nẽ tunĩ sã youf, anĩ ere, gariya anĩ bun ĩ aya bouwa nẽ tunĩ sã yeya kisi feleya sã.
46012017	Bouwa adok malauf are, nainenem karĩ wouf? Bouwa adok wederouf are, nainenem sumeĩ walouf?
46012018	Anĩ ere, momoi, Negur ĩ bouwa nẽ fara fiya, ĩ orof kilei bagai, mugu mugu ganan inenẽdin.
46012019	Bouwa nẽ fara fiya anĩ ganan tekelei youf are, bouwa ĩ nain ibodõf?
46012020	Age fiya gen, bouwa nẽ fara fiya musei dibodok, anĩ ere, bouwa de tekelei.
46012021	Mala ima to irokenẽf, “Aya õ to orouf!” Are, mudur ye to irokenẽf, “Aya õ to orouf!”
46012022	Age fiya ban, bouwa nẽ fara fiya tunĩ totol sã tailedig anĩ sãf are, bouwa ibodõya kisi feleya sã.
46012023	Ada bouwa nẽ fara fiya yana sã gen tauf anĩ, ada yana talesedig. Ada bouwa nẽ fara fiya yaor fiya kisi feleya sã anĩ, dede ta, ed tafedig,
46012024	anĩ ere, bouwada nẽ fara fiya yaor fiya kisi feleya anĩ, ada to dede ta, ed tafedig. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ bouwa nẽ fara fiya bagu feleid fen, fara fiya yana sã idi yana odug ifenẽdin,
46012025	anĩ bunem, bouwa bun foi fiya to ibodõf, anĩ ere, bouwa nẽ fara fiya idi abob nigin kilei kilei kisi difouf.
46012026	Bouwa nẽ fara fiya takam darau yalouf are, bouwa nẽ fara fiya ganan ĩ geid darau daledig. Bouwa nẽ fara fiya takam yana yalouf are, bouwa nẽ fara fiya ganan ĩ geid kulĩ dedig.
46012027	Gama, ã Kristus nẽ bouwa, are ã mugu mugu anĩ nẽ fara fiya.
46012028	Sios bun Negur ĩ uyulil aposel ganan igirnẽdin, anĩ dõ fiya profet, anĩ dõ fiya tise, age fe di, memelik inoya tamo ado, dagi el fiya nẽ megeir dalen anidi, tunĩ isennẽdiya nigin kisi feleya anidi, ereb ereb lo fiya nigin megeir dalen anidi, od fire fire nem wogõya nigin kisi feleya anidig igirnẽdin.
46012029	Idi ganan aposel de? Idi ganan profet de? Idi ganan tise de? Idi ganan memelik dinof de?
46012030	Idi ganan dagi el fiya nẽ megeir dalef de? Idi ganan od fire fire nem wogõ def de? Idi ganan od fire fire nem wogõya anĩ falei difef de?
46012031	Anĩ ere, Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa odug yaleya nigin kisi totol walogouf. Gama aya naab gai biya bagai taka afelneĩf.
46013001	Aya tamo nẽ od fire fire nem ado engel nẽ od nem wogõ aufeg, wau laa fiya sãf are, aya belo gaõya be, kadod ait gũya gen dogol.
46013002	Aya profet od wogõya nigin Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa ado fen, Negur nẽ waa ganan ado keleĩ ganan kelei ken, arei godo fiya nigin momoiya odug ado, anĩ ere, wau laa fiya sãf are, aya tamo ege.
46013003	Aya ereb aya ado ganan maleg afeneĩd fen, bouwau atorõ di, yã malan dirãf, anĩ ere, aya wau laa fiya sãf are, aya mala biya taka to alouf.
