46013004	Wau laa fiya are molol, wau laa fiya are dor yaleya. Ĩ to kiyeĩ inodig. Ĩ yogo yana to yalesedig. Ĩ yogo to seli yabidig.
46013005	Ĩ tobonunã sane sã, ĩ yogo nigin aya dogol to yedig, ĩ kaisã to seye yedig, ĩ sane difiyek anĩ to karĩ yeledig.
46013006	Wau laa fiya anĩ sane nigin to kulĩ yedig, anĩ ere, momoi nigin kulĩ yedig.
46013007	Ĩ faimud kulatun fedig, ĩ faimud momoi yedig, ĩ faimud wau isedig, ĩ faimud feseya sã megeir ifaredig.
46013008	Wau laa fiya are to bagai sa kalauf. Anĩ ere, profet od wogõya are sa kalauf, od fire fire nem wogõya are sa kalauf, keleĩ are sa kalauf.
46013009	Ere nigin, ada keleĩ tunĩ dogol kelei ken, profet od tunĩ dogol wogõ taudig,
46013010	anĩ ere, sain kibo feleya bagai anĩ isiyouf, kibo feleya bagai sã anĩ sa kalauf.
46013011	Aya simõ bun, aya simõ gen wogõ aun, aya simõ gen kisi afen, aya simõ gen karĩ aun. Sain aya biyau fen, aya simõ nẽ tobonunã dumeun arailen.
46013012	Gama ada dodo bun gen malakanon yaor sã tailedig, sain ada tarabã fadauf bun tutuk bagai tailauf. Gama aya tunĩ dogol keleĩ, sain anĩ bun Negur aya nigin ganan keleĩ gen, aya ganan keleĩ youf.
46013013	Are gama towo eneidi difaref, momoiya, wau iseya ado, wau laa fiya. Anĩ ere, anĩ atun wau laa fiya anĩ odug bagai, ganan wal fiya.
46014001	Wau laa fiya nẽ naab dõg fen, Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa yaleya nigin kisi totol walogouf, Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa bun profet od wogõya nẽ anĩ bagai walogouf.
46014002	Ere nigin, taka ĩ od fire nem wogõ yef, ĩ tamo to wogõ fiyẽdif, anĩ ere, ĩ Negur wogõ fiyek. Are, taka nem in od to keleĩ youf. Ĩ Awa Uur bunem Negur nẽ waa wogõ yef.
46014003	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ profet od wogõ yef, ĩ tamo megeir ifenẽdiyouf nigin, waud yalesauf nigin ado, waud yo fouf nigin wogõ fiyẽdif.
46014004	Taka ĩ od fire nem wogõ yef, ĩ yogo dogol isennek, anĩ ere, taka ĩ profet od wogõ yef, ĩ sios isennek.
46014005	Aya ã ganan od fire fire nem wogõ gouf nigin orouf, anĩ ere, aya ã profet od wogõ gouf nigin orouf bagai. Taka ĩ od fire nem wogõ yef, ĩ sios isennẽf nigin taka nem yogon od to falei fouf are, taka ĩ profet od wogõ yef anim, taka ĩ od fire nem wogõ yef anĩ wal fiya.
46014006	Turau tar, aya ã gein asi fen, od fire nem wogõ auf sain bun, aya kurõ fesiya od tunĩ, keleĩ, profet od be, faded fiya nẽ od, ã bun to arou asiyouf are, ere biya aya ã afeneĩf?
46014007	Ereb idi mata sã aitedif, digẽ be gita age fiya, idi ailõ fire fire to dinouf are, naig fe di, taka nem ere seg kodẽ def anĩ keleĩ youf?
46014008	Takag, taur ait tutuk to wõ youf are, aim kusĩ nigin dodok fouf?
46014009	Ãg age fiya. Ã, ãgenei baleim od fire nem yaor to wogõ gouf are, taka ĩ naig fe fen, ã wogõ gef anĩ keleĩ youf? Ã ege od yau bun urarãgouf dogol.
46014010	Tenebur ein od fire fire musei dibodok, anĩ ere, idi gariya sã taka to ibodok.
46014011	Aya ereb taka nem wogõ yef, anĩ nẽ gariya to keleĩ youf are, aya wogõ yef anĩ nẽ yaũ tamo, age fe di, ĩ aya bun yaũ tamo.
46014012	Ãg age fiya. Ã Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa yaleya nigin kabĩ totol walegedig, anĩ nigin, sios isennẽya nẽ ege luwa yaleya nigin kabĩ totol walogouf.
46014013	Age fiya nigin, taka ĩ od fire nem wogõ yef, ĩ ereb wogõ yef anĩ falei fouf nigin kosẽ youf.
46014014	Ere nigin, aya od fire nem kosẽ auf are, neu uur kosẽ yef, anĩ ere, neu kisi faat yũya sã.
46014015	Anĩ nigin, aya naig afouf? Aya neu uur bun kosẽ auf, anĩ ere, aya neu kisi buneg kosẽ auf. Aya neu uur bun seg alouf, anĩ ere, aya neu kisi buneg seg alouf.
46014016	Õ ogon uur bun Negur yana walesauf are, taka ĩ idi anĩ to keleĩ anidi atun ibodok, ĩ ereb õ urok anĩ keleĩ sã nigin, naig fe fen, ĩ ogon de fiyẽya bun “Momoi” youf?
46014017	Õ ogon de fiya are biya bagai, anĩ ere, taka to usennek.
46014018	Aya ã ganan wal yeĩya, od fire nem wogõ auf nigin Negur de afiyek.
46014019	Anĩ ere, sios bun, aya ten tausen od od fire nem wogõya anĩ fotokar, tunĩ tai fediya nigin od faif bun yaor wogõ auf anĩ orouf.
46014020	Turau tar, ãgenei kisi bun simõ gen to ufareg. Sane nigin, momou nẽ kisi gen ufareg, anĩ ere, ãgenei kisi bun biyeĩ ufareg.
46014021	Lo bun eig ye itoton: Odug irok, “Tamo od fire nem wogõ def anidi bunem ado, yaũ tamo sigoreid bunem, aya tamo kayau eneidi wogõ afediyouf, anĩ ere, sain anĩ buneg idi aya to karĩ difiyauf.”
46014022	Anĩ nigin, od fire nem wogõya are, momoiya tamo kayau bun uris sã, anĩ ere, momoiya sã tamo kayau bun uris. Anĩ ere, profet od wogõya are, momoiya tamo kayau bun, momoiya sã tamo kayau bun sã.
46014023	Anĩ nigin, sios guru fiya odug bun, tamo kayau ganan od fire nem wogõ de di, tunĩ anĩ keleĩ sã be, tunĩ momoiya sã disiyouf are, idi ã nigin wadã ideneik to douf de?
46014024	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ momoiya sã be, taka ĩ anĩ keleĩ sã, tamo kayau ganan profet od wogõ de mog, isiyouf are, ĩ tamo kayau ganan neid wogõya bunem ĩ mosor tamo ya anĩ kisi fokõ ye di, tamo kayau ganan ĩ es difiyẽf,
46014025	age dife di, yogon wau bun iminẽdig anĩ yaorouf. Anĩ nigin, ĩ kusureis fen, Negur yana yales, “Momoi bagai, Negur ã atun ibodok,” youf.
46014026	Anĩ nigin, turau tar, ada naig tafouf? Sain ã guru gef, ã ganan atun taka seg ado, taka faded fiya nẽ od ado, taka kurõ fesiya od ado, taka od fire nem wogõya be, od fire nem wogõya anĩ falei fiya adof. Anĩ ganan sios megeir fiya nigin ago gouf.
46014027	Taka ĩ od fire nem wogõ youf are, uru be, towom dogol age fiya sain dale fen, teke tekeleim wogõ douf. Age fe di, taka nem od fire nem wogõya anĩ falei fouf.
46014028	Od fire nem wogõya anĩ falei fiya tamo sãf are, wogõya tamo ĩ sios bun foro yel fen, yogo ado Negur bun wogõ youf.
46014029	Profet uru be, towom age fiya wogõ douf, age de mog, tunĩ ganan, ereb wogõ yef anĩ el de es difouf.
46014030	Anĩ ere, idi guru fiya dibodok anidi atun, kurõ fesiya od taka, taka bun isiyouf are, uyu wogõ yef are dẽ yalauf.
46014031	Ere nigin, ã ganan sain waleg fen, teke tekeleim profet od wogõ gouf, anĩ bunem, ganan keleĩ dale fen, waud yalesauf.
46014032	Profet neid uur are profet dogo kulatun dife fen, dogo neid wogõya sain bun dogol wogõ douf.
46014033	Ere nigin, Negur ĩ ekul fiya nẽ Negur sã, ĩ wau inosiya nẽ Negur. Tamo kayau fateul neid sios ganan bun age difedig gen,
46014034	kayau idi sios bun foro del difarauf. Idi wogõya nẽ modoũ to difenẽdiyouf, anĩ ere, idi Lo irok kilei, anĩ dõ difouf.
46014035	Idi ereb taka nigin to fiya orodiyouf are, idi neid fõ bun dogo neid tamo to difediyouf, ere nigin, kayau taka sios bun wogõya are mama ado.
46014036	Negur nẽ od ã bunem gariya inon de? Od anĩ ã bun dogol isin de?
46014037	Taka ĩ kisif, ĩ profet taka be, ĩ Awa Uur nẽ ege luwa alen youf are, ĩ ereb aya atotkeneik are Odug nẽ ĩtãfiya ya anĩ keleĩ youf.
46014038	Taka ĩ enei welebi fouf are, ĩ yogo welebi fiyẽf.
46014039	Anĩ nigin, turau tar, profet od wogõ gouf nigin kisi totol walogouf. Agog fen, od fire nem wogõya nigin to katũ wiyẽdigouf.
46014040	Anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan suma bagai dõg fen, biya bagai ago gouf.
46015001	Turau tar, aya biya od wogõ ayeĩ di, waleg fen, anĩ teten ufaregef anĩ, baban ã kisi turĩ ayeĩf nigin orouf.
46015002	Ã od aya wogõ ayein anĩ, uroug kafĩ waleg fen, ege to momoi gen ouf are, biya od enei bunem ã kel gei yeĩf.
46015003	Ere nigin, ereb aya alen, are odug bagai nigin, uyulil anĩ aya ã afenein, are Kristus ĩ, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek kilei, neda mosor nigin laa fe di,
46015004	ĩ mũ difen, are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek kilei, naa towo bun ĩ mata kel fã yen,
46015005	are ĩ Pita bun wõ ye fen, anĩ dumen in dõ fiya tar tuwelf bun wõ yen.
46015006	Anĩ bure fele di, ĩ sain tekelei bun tura tar faif handred wal fiya meleid bun wõ yen, anidi ganan musei fau dibodok, tunĩ gare den.
46015007	Agef fen, ĩ Jems mala bun wõ yen, anĩ dumen aposel ganan meleid bun wõ yen.
46015008	Anĩ ganan bure fel fen, idikeleya bun, ĩ, aya kesu gõ fiya sain sã bun gõ difiyan gen anĩ, malau buneg wõ yen.
46015009	Ere nigin, aya aposel idi atun naal bagai, aya to biya nigin aposel yeya nigineg kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, aya Negur nẽ sios darau afenen.
46015010	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem, aya gama afaref gen age wõ aun. Aya bun yogon wau ifenẽya anĩ ege to ilen. Sã, aya kabĩ totol idi ganan wal fediya alen, are ayam sã, anĩ ere, Negur aya ado ibodon in wau ifenẽya anim.
46015011	Age fiya nigin, ayam be, idim, amã enei wogõ mauf, are ã enei momoi gen.
46015012	Amã Kristus gare den anidi bun tamal mata kel fã yen anĩ wogõ maudig, anĩ ere, naig fe di, ã tunĩ, gare den anidi mata to ke de fã douf gedig?
46015013	Gare den anidi, mata to ke de fã douf are, Kristus ĩg mata to kel fã yem.
46015014	Kristus ĩ mata to kel fã yem are, nemã wogõya anĩ kaũ sã di, ãgenei momoiya areg kaũ sam.
46015015	Age fiyam are, amã Negur nigin idegẽya od wogõ maudig anĩ dilemam, ere nigin, amã Negur ĩ Kristus gare den anidi bun tamal turĩ fiyen anĩ kurõ mafesidig. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ gare den anidi to turĩ fediyouf anĩ momoi ouf are, ĩ Kristus to turĩ fiyem.
46015016	Ere nigin, Negur ĩ gare den anidi to turĩ fediyouf are, ĩ Kristuseg to turĩ fiyem.
46015017	Negur ĩ Kristus to turĩ fiyem are, ãgenei momoiya are ege, ã ãgenei mosor bun fau ubodõgef.
46015018	Age fiyam are, idi Kristus nigin momoi de fen, gare den anidig fõ delem.
46015019	Ada ein mata ibodõya enei nigin dogol, Kristus bun wauda iseya adouf are, ada tamo ganan wal fediya maladalon ado.
46015020	Anĩ ere, Kristus momoi bagai gare den anidi bun tamal kel turĩ fiyen, are idi gare den anidi bun tamal faat uyulil yun gen.
46015021	Are, laa are tamo tekelei bunem isin nigin, gare den neid kel fãya areg tamo tekelei bunem isif.
46015022	Are, Adam bun ganan gare dedig, age fiya gen, Kristus bun ganan mata ifenẽdiyouf.
46015023	Anĩ ere, idi mugu mugu dogo neid sain bun age difouf: Kristus ĩ uyulil faat yũya, anĩ dumen, ĩ isiyouf sain bun, idi yogon dibodok anidi, mata ke de fã douf.
46015024	Anĩ bure fele di, idikeleya sain isiyouf, sain anĩ bun, Kristus ĩ gawaman ganan, yeneid ado ganan, megeir ganan daũ fel fen, tano anĩ yale, Dei Negur ima bun inouf.
46015025	Ere nigin, ĩ king ibodok ile, yogon kiwai tar ganan yogo ye farumen inenẽdiyouf sain anĩ bun.
46015026	Kiwai idikeleya bun daũ fiya nẽ, are laa.
46015027	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok kilei, “Negur ĩ ereb ereb ganan yogo ye farumen inenẽdin.” Sain ĩ irok, are ereb ereb ganan ĩ farumen inenẽdin, are Negur ĩ ereb ereb ganan Kristus farumen inenẽdin, Negur ĩ yogo enei farumen to ibodok ya anĩ yaor.
46015028	Sain Negur ĩ enei age fel fen, Naal yogo, Negur ĩ ereb ereb ganan Kristus farumen inenẽdin anĩ, farumen inenẽf, anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ ereb ereb ganan nẽ mudur ibodõf.
46015029	Mata kel fãya anĩ sãf are, idi tamo gare den anidi nigin naan dalef idi naig difouf? Tamo gare den anidi to bagai kel turĩ fediyouf are, ere nigin tamo kayau idi nigin naan daledig?
46015030	Takag, amã nigin, ere nigin amã mug sain ganan bouwamã waila bun manenẽdig?
46015031	Turau tar, aya ã neda Odug Kristus Jesus bun ubodõgef nigin, yanau alesedig anĩ bunem, momoi bagai enei totol bagai arok, are aya naa ganan laa bun eledig.
46015032	Aya tamo nẽ kisi bunem dogol, Efesus oun gaar kuĩ geid kusĩ aun ouf are, ere mala biya anĩ aya alen? Tamo gare den anidi to kel turĩ fediyouf are, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek kilei, “Saaf ado naan tãf, ere nigin, nil gare tauf.”
46015033	Ã taka nem to idegneĩf. “Sane geid nigal yũya bun, tobonunã biya daũ fedig.”
46015034	Kisi biya bun kel usig ufareg fen, mosor inoya utorõg, ere nigin, ã atun tunĩ Negur nigin keleĩ sã difaref. Aya ã mama yeĩf nigin enei wogõ auf.
46015035	Anĩ ere, taka nem to fouf, “Tamo gare den anidi, naig fe kel turĩ fediyouf? Bouweid naig fiya bagai ado disiyouf?”
46015036	Ã neneya bagai! Ereb õ tu wouf anĩ, to laa fouf are, anĩ mata to wõ youf.
46015037	Sain õ tu wof, õ fau ibodõf nẽ bouwa anĩ to utenek, anĩ ere, wit be, ereb taka nẽ faat dogol.
46015038	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ oron kilei, bouwa ifenẽdig, agef fen, ĩ faat fire fire dogo neid bouweid fire fire ifenẽdidig.
46015039	Bouwa ganan tekelei sã. Tamo nẽ bouwa are fire, gaar bouwa fire, ninã bouwa fire, gau bouwa fire.
46015040	Saa ilun nẽ bouweid ado di, tenebur nẽ bouweideg ado. Anĩ ere, saa ilun nẽ bouweid fula fiya medeĩya fire di, tenebur nẽ bouweid fula fiya medeĩya areg fire.
46015041	Gaa are futu reya fire di, ogõ are futu reya fire, age fe di, barisa are futu reya fire. Barisa idi atuneg futu reya fire fire ado.
46015042	Age fiya gen, tamo gare den anidi neid mata kel fãya areg age fouf. Bouwa tu fiyaf nẽ are bura le di, bouwa kel fã yef nẽ are to bura ledig.
46015043	Sane bun tu fiya di, fula fiya medeĩya bun kel fã yef. Totol sã tu fiya di, totol ado kel fã yef.
46015044	Bouwa buru maug are tu fiya di, uur nẽ bouwa are kel fã yef. Bouwa buru maug ibodok are, uur nẽ bouwag ibodok.
46015045	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, “Uyulil inon tamo Adam ĩ mata ibodõya wõ yen.” Idikeleya Adam ĩ mata ifenẽya nẽ uur wõ yen.
46015046	Uur nẽ bouwa ketem to isin, anĩ ere, bouwa buru maug ketem isin. Age fe di, anĩ dumen, uur nẽ bouwa.
46015047	Uyulil inon tamo are tenebur aas nẽ, anĩ dõ fiya tamo are saa ilun nẽ.
46015048	Tenebur nẽ tamo idi, tamo teneub nem inon gen. Saa ilun nẽ tamo idig, tamo saa ilun tamal gen.
46015049	Ada tenebur tamo inon age fiya tabodok gen, adag tamo saa ilun tamal age fiya tabodõf.
46015050	Turau tar, aya ã arokeneik, are tenebur nẽ bouwam Negur nẽ tano to akorou youf. Ereb bura ledig anĩg to bura lauf anĩ to akorou youf.
46015051	Karĩ wog, aya waa taka arokeneĩf: Ada ganan to gare tauf, anĩ ere, ada ganan bouwada falei fouf,
46015052	are ereb fili yeleya be, mala kamisãya gen idikeleya nẽ taur aitouf bun, bouwada agef falei fouf. Taur aite di, tamo gare den anidi kel turĩ fedi di, to buraya nẽ ado fã douf, age fe di, ada bouwada falei fouf.
46015053	Are, buraya nẽ anĩ to burauf nẽ anĩ ifonũf. Laa fiya nẽ anĩ to laa fouf nẽ anĩ ifonũf.
46015054	Buraya nẽ anĩ to burauf nẽ anĩ ifonũf, laa fiya nẽ anĩ to laa fouf nẽ anĩ ifonũf sain anĩ bun, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok enei agef kisi fel wõ youf, “Negurem kusĩ bun laa wal fe fen, anĩ adok itob len.”
46015055	“O laa, ogon kusĩ wal fiya nẽ megeir nain? O laa, ogon waila nain?”
46015056	Laa nẽ waila are mosor, mosor nẽ megeir are lo.
46015057	Anĩ ere, Negur de tafiyẽf! Ĩ neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem kusĩ wal fiya ifanadadig.
46015058	Anĩ nigin, neu turau tar oboiyou, totol ufareg. Ereb takam to yokũ yeĩf. Faimud Odug nẽ kabĩ fatuk bagai walogouf, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, are ã Odug bun kabĩ walegef anĩ, ege to ilauf.
46016001	Gama Negur nẽ tamo kayau isennẽdiya nẽ kolekta nigin, ereb aya Galesia sios age difouf nigin arokenẽdin anĩ ago gouf.
46016002	Uub ganan nẽ naa matu bun, ã mugu mugu, augeneĩ moni walegedig anĩ foig, fire unog fen, kuru gouf, anĩ bunem, sain aya asiyouf bun, kolekta baban to unogouf.
46016003	Sain aya wõ auf, tamo ã ugirnẽdigen anidi bun, pas afeneĩd fen, ãgenei ege luwa ado Jerusalem sur afediyouf.
46016004	Ayag idi geid ileya nigin deuf are, idi aya geid weim malauf.
46016005	Aya Masedonia provins atu atu ele fen, ã gein asiyouf, ere nigin, aya Masedonia atu atu alauf.
46016006	Aya ã geid sain naal tabodõf be, yau ado menig sain bun ã geid tabodõf, anĩ bunem, ã neu iyõya nain be alauf bun usennagauf.
46016007	Aya gama ã ailiyei ken, sain naal ki yeĩya anĩ to orouf. Odug yo youf are, aya sain naal meluk ã geid tabodõf anĩ wau irok.
46016008	Anĩ ere, aya Efesus ein abodok ele, Pentikos naa wõ youf,
46016009	ere nigin, kabĩ kaũ ado nẽ sukar odug, aya bun kã fen, age fe di, musei aya kiwai difanaf.
46016010	Timoti isiyouf are, ĩ ã geid ibodõf bun, ĩ ereb taka nigin to kumĩ youf nigin lo welegei, ere nigin, ĩ aya gen Odug nẽ kabĩ faali fef.
46016011	Anĩ nigin, taka nem ĩ yaleya nigin to itorõf. Yogon delẽ bun wau inosiya ado sur wiyẽge di, ĩ aya gein kel isiyouf. Ĩ tura tar geid disiyouf nigin, aya ololo afedif.
46016012	Neda turada Apolos nigin, ĩ tura tar geid ã gein dilauf nigin, aya totol bagai arokenen. Ĩ gama ileya nigin wau yenẽya sã, anĩ ere, ĩ ileya nigin sain biya isiyouf are, ĩ ilauf.
46016013	Lo welegei, momoiya bun totol ufareg, tamo totol ado kumĩ sã wõg, totol waleg.
46016014	Ereb ereb ganan wau laa fiya bun ago gouf.
46016015	Ã keleĩ, are Stefanas nẽ ibor, Akaia provins oun uyulil momoiya tamo kayau wõ de fen, idi dogo neid oroya dõ de, Negur nẽ tamo kayau disennẽdiyouf nigin, kabĩ totol daledig. Turau tar, aya totol bagai arokeneik,
46016016	are ã eneidi age fediya ado, idi ganan kabĩ bun disi fen, kabĩ dalef anidi farumen ubodõg.
46016017	Sain Stefanas, Fotunatus ado, Akaikus wõ den, aya wau al fen, ere nigin, ereb ã bun tamal ifanamãya anĩ, idim ã fotokar difanaman.
46016018	Are, idi age dife di, neu uur ado ãgeneig filolõ fen. Anĩ nigin, tamo age fediya nigin de fiyẽdiya nẽ kisi walogouf.
46016019	Asia provins bun sios idi, ã bun aanya sur difef. Akwila Prisila ado aanya, wau sere fiya ado Odug bunem ã bun sur difef. Sios idi neid fõ bun guru difedig idig age difef.
46016020	Ein tureĩ tar ganan ã bun aanya sur difef. Ã abob aan wiyẽg fen, fateul bunem umã gouf.
46016021	Aya, Pol imaum bagai aanya enei atotof.
46016022	Taka ĩ Odug nigin wau to laa fouf are, isisĩya ĩ bun isiyouf. O Odug, usi!
46016023	Odug Jesus nẽ wau ifenẽya, ã bun ibodõf.
46016024	Neu wau laa fiya, Kristus Jesus bunem ã ganan bun ibodõf. Momoi.
47001001	Pol, Negur nẽ oroya bunem Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun, neda turada Timoti ado, pas enei Negur nẽ sios Korin bun ado, tamo kayau fateul ganan Akaia provins bun dibodok bun matotof.
47001002	Tamada Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus neid wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, ã bun ibodõf.
47001003	Negur, neda Odug Jesus Kristus Tama, wau yũya nẽ Tama, wau yo fiya ganan nẽ Negur yana talesauf,
47001004	ĩ neda morõ ganan bun wauda yo fedig, anĩ nigin, ada dug wau yo fiya Negur bun tamal talen anĩ bunem, idi morõ adodo anidi waud yo tafedig.
47001005	Kristus nẽ darau gogũf, ada namedan isif gen, neda wau yo fiya anĩg Kristus bunem gogũ felef.
47001006	Amã darau malef are, anĩ ãgenei wauĩ yo fiya nigin ado, kel gei yeĩya nigin. Amã waumã yo fef are, anĩ ãgenei wauĩ yo fiya nigin, anĩ bunem darau de tekelei amãg malef anĩ, ã faali gef ulegef.
47001007	Ã nigin nemã waumã iseya totol ifaref, ere nigin, amã keleĩ, are ã nemã darau walegef gen, ã nemã waumã yo fiyag walegef.
47001008	Turamã tar, darau amã Asia provins bun malen anĩ, ã to keleĩ youf anĩ, to oromak. Amã morõ faali fiya kisi feleya sã bagai bun mabodon, anĩ nigin, amã mata ibodõya nẽ kisig matoron.
47001009	Momoi, amã waumã bun, es fiya tamo kot bun taka laa fouf ye di, kisi fedig gen, kisi mafen. Anĩ ere, amã mug bun to mafar fen, Negur tamo gare den anidi kel turĩ fedidig ĩ bun mafarauf nigin enei wõ yen.
47001010	Ĩ laa nẽ waila ado kafĩ fiya age fiya bun tamal yalelnaman, anĩ nigin, ĩ fau yalelnamãf. Ĩ toku yalelnamãf nigin waumã iseya ĩ bun manon.
47001011	Are ã, ãgenei kosẽya bunem usennamãge di, Negurem age fouf. Negur ĩ musei neid kosẽya solof fen, wau ifenẽya nẽ ege luwa ifanamãf nigin, museim amã nigin Negur de difiyẽf.
47001012	Amã mug nigin seli yabiya are yeir: Nemã kisi es fiya bun kurõ fesif, are amã tenebur ein, Negur nẽ fateul ado momoi bunem, ã bun bagai age mafedig. Amã tenebur ein bouwa buru isennẽya nẽ kisi biya bunem to age mafedig, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem age mafedig.
47001013	-
47001014	Amã ereb ã uweseg fen, ã keleĩ anĩ wal fiya to matotkeneik. Gama ã amã nigin naal keleĩ, anĩ ere, ã amã nigin keleĩ bagai youf anĩ oromak, anĩ bunem amã Odug Jesus nẽ naa bun ã nigin selĩ malesauf gen, ãg amã nigin selimã walesagauf.
47001015	Aya enei momoi bagai agef wõ youf au fen, ã sain uru el fiya walogouf nigin, ã ket ki yeĩya anĩ kisi afen.
47001016	Aya Masedonia provins ileya nigin asi, ki ayei ken, Masedonia ele fen, anenem ã gein baban kela asi di, ã aya Judia distrik ileya nigin sur wiyagauf nigin kisi afen.
47001017	Sain aya enei kisi afen, aya karika bagai age afen de? Aya, tenebur nẽ tamo kayau age difedig gen, nameun “Sã” au fen, sigoroum “Yo” auf de?
47001018	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ age afouf ye fen, agef bagai dõ fedig gen, nemã od ã gein isif are yo ye fen, sãya sã.
47001019	Ere nigin, Negur Naal, Jesus Kristus ĩ nigin, aya, Sailas Timoti ado geid ã atun wogõ mayeĩdig anĩ, ĩ sain tekelei bun, yo ye fen, to sã yedig, anĩ ere, ereb ĩ yo yef anĩ, ĩ faimud agef dõf kisi feledig.
47001020	Ereb Negur age afouf yen od anĩ ganan Kristus bun yoya dogol. Anĩ nigin, ĩ bunem ada Negur bun fula fiya medeĩya tarousiyouf nigin, sigoradam “Momoi” taudig.
47001021	Negurem, amã ado ã, Kristus bun totol tafarauf nigin age fef. Ĩ igirnada fen, ada bun moul fi fel fen,
47001022	ĩ, ada yogon nigin, ada bun yogon uris ino fen, ĩ wauda bun, ereb isiyouf anĩ momoi bagai isiyouf ye fen, yogon Awa Uur iben.
47001023	Negur ĩ aya nigin keleĩ bagai nigin, ĩ neu od megeir fe fen, isennẽdidig, ĩ aya isennauf nigin aweignek, are aya ã nigin wauĩ ina fen, morõ ifeneĩya ator ken, Korin to kela asin.
47001024	Amã ãgenei momoiya nugo fiyẽya nigin to age mafef, anĩ ere, amã ã wauĩ al fouf nigin ã geid kabĩ malef, ere nigin, momoiya bunem ã totol ufaregef.
47002001	Anĩ nigin, aya ã gein morõ ado baban to ki ayeĩf nigin, neu kisi afon.
47002002	Ere nigin, aya ã wauĩ morõ afeneĩf are, aim anĩ aya wau al fiya ifanauf, are ã aya morõ afenein anim dogol sã de?
47002003	Aya enei bagai nigin atotkenein, are sain aya asiyouf bun, idi aya wau al fiya difanauf anidi bun, aya morõ to alouf nigin age afen. Aya enei momoi auf, are sain aya wau al fef, ã gananeg wauĩ al fef.
47002004	Aya morõ odug ado wau gudũ fiya bun, inã odug ado atotkenein, are aya ã morõ afeneĩf nigin to age afen, anĩ ere, ã bun neu wau laa fiya odug bagai anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin age afen.
47002005	Tamo anim morõ ifenen ouf are, ĩ aya morõ to ifanan, anĩ ere, ĩ ã ganan morõ sau fiya ifenein. Aya totol bagai to arõf nigin ‘sau fiya’ auf.
47002006	Ã musei gananem ĩ darau wenẽgen are, ĩ nigin kisi feleya.
47002007	Age fiya ban, gama ã in mosor wedereĩ tu kel fen, ĩ wau yo gouf, anĩ bunem, ĩ wau gudũ fiya fatuk bagaim to kuroub fiyẽf.
47002008	Anĩ nigin, aya ĩ ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya baban ufelnẽgouf nigin totol od arokeneik.
47002009	Aya, pas bun ã atotkenein, ere nigin, aya ã kisi ayeĩ di, ã ereb ereb ganan bun neu od dõ gouf anĩ ailauf nigin age afen.
47002010	Ã taka nẽ mosor nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf are, ayag in mosor nigin wederou tu kalauf. Ereb taka weder tu keleya nẽ ibodõ di, aya wederou tu kelen, are aya ãgenei biya fiya nigin, Kristus mala bun wederou tu kelen,
47002011	are Satanem ada to wal fada fen, bilã youf nigin age afen. Ere nigin, ada yogon kisi keleĩ.
47002012	Sain aya Kristus nẽ biya od wogõ auf nigin Troas taun ele fen, Odug ĩ aya nigin sukar kã fel mog ailen,
47002013	aya fau nameun wau inosiya san, ere nigin, aya turau Taitus an to ailen. Anĩ nigin, aya idi dabuo afiyeĩd fen, Masedonia provins elen.
47002014	Anĩ ere, Negur de mafiyẽf, ĩ faimud amã Kristus bun kusĩ wal fiya bun uyu iroukanamãdig, agef fen, ĩ, amã bunem, Kristus nigin keleĩ anĩ nẽ sumeĩ biya, modoũ ganan bun firagagaũ feledig.
47002015	Ere nigin, amã idi kel gei fedif anidi ado idi isaikalauf anidi atun, Negur mala bun, Kristus nẽ sumeĩ biya.
47002016	Taka bun amã laa nẽ sumeĩ, taka bun amã mata ifenẽya nẽ sumeĩ biya. Aim anĩ kabĩ age fiya yaleya kisi feleya?
47002017	Amã, musei idi Negur nẽ od nigin moni mala kabĩ daledig gen sã. Age fiya ban, Kristus bun, amã, tamo Negurem sur fedin gen, Negur mala bun momoi nẽ bunem wogõ maudig.
47003001	Amã baban yanamã yaleseya nigin gariya manof de? Amã, tamo tunĩ age difedig gen, kabĩ biya daledig nẽ isennẽya pas, amam ã gein sur mafouf be, ãgem amã bun sur gouf de?
47003002	Ã aug anĩ, nemã pas, are waumã bun itoton, age fe di, tamo ganan kelei ken, diwesedig.
47003003	Ã aug anĩ, Kristus nẽ pas, nemã kabĩ nẽ kaũ anĩ yaor gef, itoton are ink bunem sã, are mata ibodkeleya Negur nẽ Awa Uur bunem, meein fadaleya bun sã, are tamo waud bun.
47003004	Amã enei morok, ere nigin, amã Kristus bunem, Negur nigin momoiya ado.
47003005	Amã ereb taka amã mug bunem isif yeya kisi feleya sã, anĩ ere, amã nemã kisi feleya Negur bunem isif.
47003006	Negur ĩ amãg bar itenẽya mata nẽ kabĩ tamo wõya kisi feleya inenaman, are lo itotoya nẽ sã, Awa Uur nẽ, ere nigin, lo itotoya anim idenkesidig, anĩ ere, Awa Uur im mata ifenẽdidig.
47003007	Kabĩ laa irou isidig, are meein bun gegẽ itoton anĩ fula fiya medeĩya ado isin, anĩ nigin, Israel tamo kayau yogon fula fiya medeĩya nigin meleid dẽ yel fen, Moses nẽ nawa lo feleya kisi feleya san, anĩ ere, fula fiya medeĩya anĩ komomor fen. Kabĩ age fiya fula fiya medeĩya ado isin ouf are,
47003008	Awa Uur nẽ kabĩ nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anim lo nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anĩ to wal fouf de?
47003009	Tamo neid mosor nigin bouweid bun od yũdig nẽ kabĩ anĩ, fula fiya medeĩyauf are, kabĩ madur bagai irou isidig in fula fiya medeĩya nẽ odug naig fiya bagai!
47003010	Ereb kulu fula fiya medeĩya yenen, are gama nẽ fula fiya medeĩya odug bagai nigin, kulu nẽ are sa kelen.
47003011	Ereb komomor falauf nẽ anĩ, fula fiya medeĩya ado isin ouf are, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ fula fiya medeĩya, yogon odug naig fiya bagai!
47003012	Anĩ nigin, amã waumã iseya age fiya ado nigin, amã wogõya bun tuninirya sã.
47003013	Amã Moses gen sã, ĩ yogo nawa bun lalan komomor fe mog, Israel tamo kayau to dilouf nigin, yogo nawa bun gabar dede fedig.
47003014	Anĩ ere, idi neid kisi totolen, are sain enei bun, bar itenẽya tubu iweseya bun gabar de anim fau ibodok. Gabar anĩ fau yaleleya sã ibodok, ere nigin, Kristus bun dogol anĩ yaleleyauf.
47003015	Sain enei buneg, Moses nẽ itotoya iweseya bun, gabar dogo neid waud dede fedig.
47003016	Anĩ ere, ereb sain taka ĩ Odug bun falei youf are, gabar are lelek felef.
47003017	Gama, Odug ĩ Awa Uur, Odug nẽ Awa Uur ibodok nẽ an, are katĩ feleya taka sã.
47003018	Anĩ nigin, ada ganan, nawada bun gabarem dede fiya sã are, Odug nẽ fula fiya medeĩya tail fen, ada bun so fe di, ada ĩ gen falei fada di, neda fula fiya medeĩya odugef iledig, are Odug bunem isidig, ĩ anĩ Awa Uur.
47004001	Anĩ nigin, amã Negur nẽ wau yũya bunem kabĩ enei ado nigin, amã waumã bun to folo redig.
47004002	Anĩ ere, amã inokõya ado mama nẽ naab matoron, amã to madeg ken, Negur nẽ od to falei mafeledig. Anĩ ere, amã momoi nẽ anĩ yaor mafe fen, Negur mala bun, tamo ganan dogo neid kisi es fiya bun, amã mug nigin yanamã iseledig.
47004003	Amã nemã biya od dede fiyauf are, idi inanakalauf nẽ anidi bun dede fedif.
47004004	Teneub enei nẽ waitou, idi momoiya sã anidi neid kisi ifofakelen, anĩ nigin, Kristus ĩ anĩ Negur nẽ malakanon, yogon fula fiya medeĩya nẽ biya od anĩ nẽ lalan, idi ileya kisi feleya sã.
47004005	Amã, amã mug nigin to wogõ maudig, anĩ ere, Jesus Kristus ĩ Odug mau fen, amã Jesus nigin ãgenei ferfer maudig.
47004006	Negur ĩ iron, “Gugum namen lalan fula fei,” yen, inim Kristus nẽ nawa bun yogon fula fiya medeĩya anĩ, amã keleĩ youf nigin, yogon lalan waumã bun fula fouf nigin inon.
47004007	Anĩ ere, amã nameman mis namen gen, safina biya bagai enei ado, are ereb ereb ganan wal fiya nẽ megeir, are amã nemã sã, Negur nẽ anĩ yaorouf nigin.
47004008	Amã siri ganan bun totol bagai lai difamak, anĩ ere, narĩ famãya sã; ereb taka age mafouf nigin neneya difanamak, anĩ ere, amã waumã folo reya sã;
47004009	darau difanamak, anĩ ere, to folõ famalef; didenamã dirarak, anĩ ere, daũ famaleya sã.
47004010	Amã faimud Jesus nẽ laa anĩ, bouwamã bun faali ma mayõdig, are Jesus nẽ matag bouwamã bun yaorouf nigin.
47004011	Amã mata mabodok, anĩ ere, faimud Jesus nigin laa bun dinenamãdig, are yogon matag nemã laa nẽ bouwamã bun yaorouf nigin.
47004012	Anĩ nigin, laa, amã bun kabĩ yaledig, anĩ ere, mata, ã bun kabĩ yaledig.
47004013	Negur nẽ Itotoya eig yef, “Aya momoi aun, anĩ nigin, aya wogõ aun.” Momoiya de tekelei anĩ nẽ kisi bunem, amãg momoi mauf, anĩ nigin, amãg wogõ mauf,
47004014	ere nigin, amã keleĩ, Negur ĩ Odug Jesus laa bun tamal kel turĩ fen anim, amãg Jesus geid kel turĩ fama ken, amã ã geid in mala bun inenadauf.
47004015	Enei ganan are, ãgenei biya fiya nigin, anĩ bunem, wau ifenẽya anĩ tamo kayau bun kaka fef ile di, dogo neid Negur de fiyẽya gogũ fef anim, Negur fula fiya medeĩya ifenẽf.
47004016	Anĩ nigin, amã waumã to folo redig. Amã bouwamã buru foinenem ilumuk iledig, anĩ ere, amã nameman naa ganan bun mataya tobol fe iledig.
47004017	Nemã karika ado sain modeg nẽ morõ anim, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ fula fiya medeĩya, are morõ anĩ ganan fatuk bagai wal fiya anĩ, amã malouf nigin kabĩ yaledig.
47004018	Anĩ nigin, ada ereb maladam tailef ani to lo tafalauf, anĩ ere, ereb maladam to tailef anĩ lo tafalauf. Ere nigin, ereb tailef, are sain tobega nẽ, anĩ ere, ereb to tailef, are faimud ibodkeleya nẽ.
47005001	Ada keleĩ, tenebur nẽ salafat ada anĩ namen tabodõdig anĩ narĩ fouf are, ada fõ taka Negur bun tamal ado, are saa ilun oun faimud ibodkeleya nẽ fõ, are tamo imam inoya sã.
47005002	Gama ada fõ enei bun tabod ken, osi taudig, age tafe fen, saa ilun neda ibodõya modoũ bunem ifounnadauf nigin wauda fatuk irõdig,
47005003	ere nigin, ada saa tanon ibodõya nẽ bouwa ifounnadauf sain bun, ada gemũ to diledauf.
47005004	Ada salafat enei bun tabod mog, morõ faali tafe fen, osi taudig, ere nigin, ada salafat enei lelek fel kanadauf nigin to orodadig, anĩ ere, saa ilun neda ibodõya modoũ bun ifounnadauf nigin orodadig, anĩ bunem, ereb laa nẽ anĩ, mata anim itob lauf.
47005005	Negur ĩ enei nigin bagai ada inoda fen, ada wauda bun, ereb isiyouf anĩ momoi bagai isiyouf ye fen, Awa Uur iben.
47005006	Anĩ nigin, ada faimud kisi totol ado fen keleĩ, are ada bouwada buru ado tabodok sain anĩ bun, ada Odug weim to tabodõdig.
47005007	Ada momoiya bunem tabodõdig, ereb maladam tailef bunem sã.
47005008	Aya arok, ada kisi totol ado fen, ada bouwada enei tator ken, Odug geid takai tabodõf nigin orodaf bagai.
47005009	Anĩ nigin, ada bouwada buru ado tabodok be tatorok be, ĩ wau al fouf nigin ada kisi tatenẽf.
47005010	Ere nigin, ada ganan Kristus nẽ es fiya sia wagen wõ tauf bagai, are mugu mugu, ereb biya be sane be, ada bouwada buru ado tabod ken, age tafen anĩ kilei, yogon mala solo yalouf.
47005011	Amã Odug anini fiyẽya anĩ keleĩ nigin, amã tamo waud yaleya nigin age mafedig. Amã naig fiya anĩ Negur keleĩ bagai, age fiya gen, amã nigineg ãgenei kisi es fiya bun yaorouf nigin, aya wau irok.
47005012	Amã ã bun baban yanamã yaleseya nigin to age mafef, anĩ ere, ã amã yanamã walesagauf nigin sain mafeneik, anĩ bunem, idi ereb waud bun ibodok anĩ fotokar, ereb meledim dilef anĩ nigin yeneid dalesedig anidi bun, ã solof irõya kisi feleya.
47005013	Amã wadã idenamãf, are Negur nigin. Amã kisi biya adouf, are ã nigin.
47005014	Kristus nẽ wau laa fiya anim amã toli famãdig, amã kisi mafef, tekeleim ganan nigin laa fen, anĩ nigin, yogon laa bun, ganan gare den.
47005015	Ĩ ganan nigin laa fen, anĩ nigin, idi mata dibodok anidi dogo nigin to dibodõf, anĩ ere, ĩ idi nigin laa fe di, kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nigin dibodõf.
47005016	Anĩ nigin, gama einenem ilef ganan, ada tamo nẽ karĩya bunem taka to keleĩ youf. Ada kulu naab enei bunem Kristus kelein, anĩ ere, ada baban to age tafedig.
47005017	Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ Kristus bun ibodok, Negur ĩ yale, mata bagai inon. Tubu are ilele di, mata anĩ isin.
47005018	Enei ganan Negur bun tamal, ĩ Kristus bunem ada ĩ geid komo fada fen, komo fiya nẽ kabĩ anĩ ada ifanadan.
47005019	Are Negur ĩ tamo nẽ mosor idi bun to iwes fen, Kristus bun tenebur tamo kayau ĩ geid komo fedin. Agef fen, Negur ĩ komo fiya nẽ od ada bun inon.
47005020	Anĩ nigin, amã Kristus nẽ soosi tamo, are Negur ĩ yogon wau irõya, amã bunem wogõ yedig gen. Amã Kristus fotokar ã magoneik, Negur geid komo gouf.
47005021	Negur ĩ, ada nigin ye fen, Kristus mosor sã anĩ, mosor ĩ bun inon, are ĩ bunem, ada Negur nẽ madur bagai wowã tauf nigin age fen.
47006001	Negur nẽ kabĩ tura tar amã, ã totol bagai marokeneik, are Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya walegen anĩ, ege to aaluwan ilauf.
47006002	Ere nigin, Negur ĩ irok, “Neu wau ifenẽya sain bun, aya õ karĩ ayon, kel yaleya nẽ naa bun, aya õ asennon.” Aya ã arokeneik, gama eĩ Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya nẽ sain, gama eĩ kel yaleya nẽ naa.
47006003	Amã taka delẽ ilauf bun ye to tũ fouf nigin meein to manodig, are nemã kabĩ yana sane to ilauf nigin age mafedig.
47006004	Age fiya ban, amã, naab ganan bun, amã Negur nẽ kabĩ tamo bagai ya anĩ mafelnẽdidig, are feseya sã ifareya bun, darau, morõ, wau morõ bun,
47006005	didenamak bun, kalabus bun, kusĩ bun, kabĩ totol bun, bõ mulaĩ itorõya bun ado, naũ bun,
47006006	karẽtut bun, keleĩ bun, molol bun, dor yaleya bun, Awa Uur Fateul bun ado, wau laa fiya bagai bun,
47006007	momoi nẽ wogõ bun, Negur nẽ megeir bun, madur bagai nẽ waila ima biyalẽ ado ima kilẽ bun,
47006008	tunĩ yanamã dalesedig ado tunĩ to yanamã dalesedig bunem, yana sane inoya ado yana biya inoya bunem; amã momoi marok, anĩ ere, amã idegẽya tamo gen kisi difedig;
47006009	idi amã nigin keleĩ, anĩ ere, keleĩ sã gen kisi difedig; gare mauf, anĩ ere, amã mata mabodok; didenaman, anĩ ere, to didenamakesin;
47006010	waumã gudũ fef, anĩ ere, faimud waumã kulĩ yedig; maleg, anĩ ere, musei safina kisi feleya manenẽdidig; ereb taka sã, anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan ado.
47006011	Korin tamo kayau, amã karika wogõ mayein. Age ma fen, amã ã bun waumã sukar fatuk bagai kã mafen.
47006012	Amã nemã waumã laa fiya ã bun to mafokeledig, anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya amã bun ufokelegedig.
47006013	Aya neu kesu tar bun gen ã wogõ ayeik, ã solog fen, wauĩg sukar fatuk bagai kãg.
47006014	Momoiya sã geid to bagu gouf. Madur bagai sane ado naig de nigal dũf? Lalan gugum ado ere bunem nigal dũf?
47006015	Kristus Satan ado naig fe di, waud tekelei youf? Ere anĩ momoiya ado, momoiya sã atun tekelei?
47006016	Negur nẽ tempel, idegẽya waitou atun, ere mamad katõ fiya ado? Are ada mata ibodõya Negur nẽ tempel. Negur iron kilei, “Aya idi geid mabod ken, idi atun ayõf, age afe fen, aya idi neid Negur ouf, age afe di, idi neu tamo kayau ouf.”
47006017	“Anĩ nigin, utornẽdig fen, fire ufareg, Odug irok. Ereb amuyẽ ado to kobũg, ago ge di, aya ã aleyeĩf.”
47006018	“Aya ãgenei temeĩ di, ã nau kesu tar, nau barai tar ouf, Odug saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri feid uyu iroudig anĩ irok.”
47007001	Ã neu oboiyou, ada Negur age afouf yen od enei ado nigin, ada dug ereb ereb ganan bouwa ado uur amuyẽ ifenẽdig anĩ lilik tafe fen, Negur anini fiyẽya bunem fateul bagai wõ tauf.
47007002	Ãgenei wauĩ bun, amã nigin modoũ unog. Amã aib taka bun to kũ mafenen, amã aib taka sane bun to manenen, amã aib taka idegnẽya bunem ereb ereb to son mafen.
47007003	Aya ã bouweĩ yũya nigin od enei to wogõ auf. Ere nigin, aya mogo oron, are ãgenei ibodõya modoũ, amã waumã bun ado nigin, amã ã geid mata tabodõf be, gare tauf.
47007004	Aya ã nigin fatuk bagai momoi au fen, fatuk bagai ã yeneĩ alesef. Aya wau fatuk bagai yalesef, nemã morõ ganan bun, neu wau kulĩya gogũ felef.
47007005	Sain amã Masedonia masin, nemã bouwamã enei si inoya san, anĩ ere, amã siri ganan bun darau difanaman, serẽ kiwai difanamã mog, nameman kumĩ ado.
47007006	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ waud morõ adodo waud yo fedidig, Taitus isin bunem ĩ waumã yo fen.
47007007	Are, in isin bunem dogol sã, anĩ ere, wau yo fiya ĩ wenẽgen anĩ bunem ado. Ã aya uleyagauf nigin bagai oroyein, ereb wõ yen anĩ nigin ãgenei awaun yeya odug fen, ã aya nigin kisi fatuk bagai walegedig anĩ ĩ irokanaman, anĩ bunem, neu kulĩya odug bagai iselen.
47007008	Aya neu pas bunem wauĩ gudũ fiya afenein, anĩ nigin, aya uruwa bun awaun aun. Anĩ ere, gama aya anĩ nigin to awaun auf, ere nigin, aya ailef, are neu pas anim, sain naal bagai dogol wauĩ gudũ fen.
47007009	Anĩ ere, gama aya wau al fef, are wauĩ gudũ fiya afenein anĩ nigin sã, anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ gudũ fiya anim, wauĩ faleiya bun irouleyein nigin. Ere nigin, ã Negur nẽ oroya kilei wauĩ gudũ fen, anĩ nigin, amã ã daũ fiya to mafenein.
47007010	Wau gudũ fiya Negur nẽ orof kilei anĩ, wau faleiya irousi, kel yaleya bun irouledig, anĩ nigin, ada to awaun taudig, anĩ ere, tenebur nẽ wau gudũ fiya laa irousidig.
47007011	Negur nẽ wau gudũ fiya eneim, ã bun faat yun anĩ ulogouf, are ereb totol bagai wauĩ irõdig, morõ wõ yen anim to lai yeĩf nigin ereb ã aug madur gedig, ereb sane nigin seye gedig, ereb Negur nigin anini gedig, ereb taka nigin bagai oroyeĩdig, ereb kabĩ totol walegedig, ereb sane age fen bun mala solo wenẽgedig. Ereb ereb ganan bun, ã aug enei nigin kũ fenẽya taka sã anĩ yaor gen.
47007012	Anĩ nigin, aya ã bun atoton are, taka ĩ sane age fen be, takam ĩ bun sane age fen anĩ nigin sã, anĩ ere, ã amã nigin naig ge wauĩ wanamãgef anĩ, Negur mala bun aug ulogouf nigin age afen.
47007013	Enei ganan nigin amã waumã yo fef. Amã waumã yo fiya anĩ teten, amã Taitus ĩ fatuk bagai wau al fen anĩ mail fen, fatuk bagai waumã al fen, ere nigin, yogon uur ã ganan bunem filolõ fen.
47007014	Aya ĩ bun yeneĩ alesen, age afe di, ã aya mama to wanagen. Anĩ ere, ereb amã wogõ mayein anĩ ganan momoi, age fiya gen, amã Taitus bun yeneĩ malesen areg, momoi anĩ yaoren.
47007015	Ã ganan ĩ dõg fen, aniniya ado tererẽya bunem ĩ walegen anĩ, ĩ kisif fen, ã nigin yogon wau laa fiya mugi bagai ilen.
47007016	Aya, ereb ereb ganan bun, ã nigin, sã momoi auf nigin, wau al fef.
47008001	Turamã tar, amã, ã wau ifenẽya Negur Masedonia sios ifenẽdin anĩ keleĩ youf nigin oromak.
47008002	Idi morõ odug bagai dale fen, maleg bagai dibodon, anĩ ere, idi neid waud kulĩya mugi ado bun, idi isennẽdiya nigin kolekta moni musei difenẽdin.
47008003	Aya kurõ afeis eig au arokeneik, idi ifenẽdiya kisi feleya ado, anĩ wal fesiyag difenẽdin. Dogo neid oroyam,
47008004	idi Negur nẽ tamo kayau isennẽdiya kabĩ amã geid malouf, are dem de fen, anĩ nigin totol bagai dirokanaman.
47008005	Age dife fen, idi, amã idi nigin kisi mafen kilei, to age difen, anĩ ere, idi anĩ wal fiya age difen. Idi dogo anĩ ketem Odug difen ken, anĩ dumen Negur nẽ oroya dõ de, idi dogo amã difanaman.
47008006	Anĩ nigin, amã Taitus totol bagai marokenen, ĩ uruwa bun gariya inon nigin, wau ifenẽya nẽ kabĩ enei ã buneg bure falauf nigin marokenen.
47008007	Anĩ ere, ã ereb ereb ganan bun, momoiya bun, wogõ bun, keleĩ bun, wauĩ adok irõya ganan bun, ãgenei wauĩ amã nigin laa fiya bun, kisi feleya ago gef gen, wau ifenẽya nẽ kabĩ enei buneg ã kisi feleya ago gouf.
47008008	Aya ã ago gouf bagai nigin sii fiya to afeneik, anĩ ere, aya sios tunĩ kabĩ totol dalef anĩ bunem, ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya anĩ, momoi be sã be anĩ es ayeĩf.
47008009	Ere nigin, ã neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya keleĩ, are ĩ safina kisi feleya, anĩ ere, ã nigin ĩ maleg wõ yen, are yogon maleg bunem ã safina kisi feleya wõ gouf nigin, ĩ age fen.
47008010	Aya enei nigin neu kisi, ãgenei biya fiya nigin afeneik. Yar tubu bun, ã ket wenẽdigen anĩ dogol sã, ã ago gouf nigin wauĩ iseya anĩg adon.
47008011	Gama kabĩ anĩ udikalagauf, anĩ bunem, ã ago gouf nigin, ãgenei oroya totol bagai ibodon gen, ã safina kisi feleya kilei kabĩ anĩ bure walagauf.
47008012	Oroya anĩ an ibodõf are, Negur ereb tamo taka safina ado kilei anĩ yalouf, ereb tamo taka safina sã bunem sã.
47008013	Amã nemã oroya, tunĩ waud karika ifenẽdi di, ã wauĩ morõ ifeneik anĩ sã, anĩ ere, ganan kisi kisi feleya ibodõya nigin oromak.
47008014	Sain enei bun, ãgenei ereb ereb musei anim, ereb idi lau difef anĩ gadõ gouf, anĩ bunem, dogo neid ereb ereb musei animeg, abag ereb ã lau gef anĩ gadõ difouf, age dife di, kisi kisi feleya ubodõgouf,
47008015	are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Taka ĩ safina musei kuru fen, ĩ musei bagai to yalen, taka ĩ naal kuru fen, ĩ to lau fen.”
47008016	Aya, Negur ĩ, kisi aya ã nigin ado kisi de tekelei, Taitus nẽ wau bun inon nigin, Negur de afiyek.
47008017	Ere nigin, Taitus ĩ, nemã od ã ki yeĩya nigin anĩ, de ye fen, ĩ yogon wau irõya odug bagai ado, yogon oroyam ã gein isif.
47008018	Amã, turamã taka biya od bun yogon kabĩ nigin, sios ganan yana dalesedig anĩ, Taitus ado sur mafedif.
47008019	Enei dogol sã, turamã ĩ anĩ, wau ifenẽya nẽ kabĩ enei bun, amã geid mayok malauf nigin, siosem digirnen, kabĩ are, amã Odug bun fula fiya medeĩya marousiyouf nigin ado, amã nemã isennẽdiya nigin waumã irõya mafelnẽdiyouf nigin kabĩ malef anĩ.
47008020	Amã, wau ifenẽya bunem ege luwa musei dinon enei, lo ma mog, tunĩ anĩ nigin od sane to dirõf nigin oromak.
47008021	Ere nigin, amã Odug mala bun ado, tamo meleid buneg, ereb madur bagai anĩ age mafouf nigin lo mafedig.
47008022	Amã, turamã taka, idi geid sur mafedif, ĩ amã sain musei es mafiye ken, ĩ ereb ereb musei bun kabĩ totol yaledig anĩ mailedig, ĩ ã nigin fatuk bagai momoi yef nigin, ĩ gama isennẽdiya nigin kabĩ totol yaleya orib yef.
47008023	Taitus nigin, ĩ neu tã tar taka, ĩ ã nigin neu kabĩ turau; nemã turamã tar nigin, idi sios neid arũ tamo, Kristus bun fula fiya medeĩya dirousidig.
47008024	Anĩ nigin, ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya nẽ kaũ ado, amã ã yeneĩ malesedig anĩ nẽ gariya nẽ kaũ, tamo eneidi ufelnẽdigouf, anĩ bunem, sios idi anĩ dilouf.
47009001	Ã mogo keleĩ nigin, aya Negur nẽ tamo kayau bun kabĩ enei nigin baban to atotkeneĩf.
47009002	Ere nigin, aya isennẽdiya nigin ãgenei wauĩ irõya totol anĩ kelei ken, Masedonia tamo kayau bun yeneĩ alesedig, are yar tubu bun tamal isi, gama ã Akaia an isennẽdiya nigin dodok gen anĩ arokenẽdi di, isennẽdiya nigin ãgenei wauĩ irõya totol anim, idi musei waud fã yen.
47009003	Anĩ ere, aya turau tar sur afedin, are amã ã yeneĩ malesedig anĩ enei bun ege to ilauf, anĩ ere, ã aya aron gen dodok gouf nigin, age afen.
47009004	Ere nigin, Masedonia tamo tunĩ aya geid masi fen, ã dodok fiya sã anĩ dilouf are, amã ã nigin momoiya age fiya ado nigin mama malouf, ãg mama yeĩf nigin ereb od taka sã.
47009005	Anĩ nigin, aya kisi afen, aya turau tar totol bagai arokenẽdi di, idi ketem ã gein dile fen, ã wau ifenẽya nẽ ege luwa musei wenẽdigouf urõgen anĩ nigin dodok fiya bure difalauf, are deuf, aun. Age dife di, wau ifenẽya nẽ ege luwa dodok fiyauf, are nugo yeĩya bunem ege luwa inoya sã.
47009006	Enei karĩ walagauf, aib taka faat musei sã irarak, ĩ musei sãg kusu fouf, aib taka faat musei irarak, ĩ museig kusu fouf.
47009007	Tamo mugu mugu, ereb yogon wau bun ifenẽya nigin kisi ifon anĩ ifenẽf, are wau morõ bunem sã, takam nugo fiya bunem sã, ere nigin, Negur ĩ tamo wau kulĩya bunem ifenek nigin wau laa fef.
47009008	Negur ĩ wau ifenẽya ganan ã kisi feleya bagai ifeneĩya kisi feleya, are ereb ereb ganan bun, ã faimud ereb ã kisig fen, lau gef anĩ ganan waleg fen, kabĩ biya ganan kisi feleya bagai ago gouf nigin age fef.
47009009	Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei: “Ĩ yogon safina firagagaũ feid fen, maleg ifenẽdin; yogon madur bagai faimud ibodkalauf.”
47009010	Negur ĩ, faat irarãya tamo, faat ado yõya nẽ bret ifenẽdig, ĩ ãgenei faat irarãya nigineg ifen ken, musei inouf, agef fen, ĩ ãgenei madur bagai nẽ kusu fiya odug inouf.
47009011	Negur ĩ ereb ereb ganan bun, ã safina ado inoyeĩf, anĩ bunem, ã sain ganan wau ifenẽya bunem musei wenẽdigouf, ago ge di, idi amã bunem ãgenei ege luwa dale fen, Negur de difiyẽf.
47009012	Kabĩ enei ã walegedig anim, ereb Negur nẽ tamo kayau lau difef anĩ nigin dogol to isennẽdif, anĩ ere, ago ge di, musei idi Negur de difiyek buneg gogũ felef.
47009013	Kabĩ ã walegedig anĩ bunem, ã aug nigin yaor gen, anĩ nigin, tamo idi Negur yana dalesauf, ere nigin, ã Kristus nẽ biya od kurõ wesig fen, anĩ dõg fen, ã wau ifenẽya bunem idi adok ganan bun musei wenẽdigen.
47009014	Age de fen, ã nigin idi neid kosẽ bun, dogo neid waud ã bun isiyouf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ wau ifenẽya ereb ereb ganan wal fiya anĩ ã ifenein.
47009015	Negur nẽ ege luwa dir feleya kisi feleya sã anĩ nigin, Negur de tafiyẽf!
47010001	Aya, Pol, tunĩ dirõdig, aya ã geid tabodok sain bun, are yukeleya dedig, aya ã geid to tabodok sain bun, are totol od irõdig dedig, aya Kristus nẽ imatkesiya ado molol nem eig au, ã arokeneik.
47010002	Aya asiyouf sain bun, aya tunĩ amã teneub enei nẽ lo fiya bun mabodõdig dedig anidi bun, aya totol od arõf nigin kisi afef gen, to age afouf nigin, aya ã agoneik.
47010003	Momoi, amã tenebur ein mabodok, anĩ ere, amã kusĩ nigin, tenebur ein age difedig gen to age mafedig.
47010004	Amã nemã kusĩ nẽ waila are, teneub enei nẽ sã, anĩ ere, idi kau totol narĩ fiya nigin Negur nẽ megeir ado.
47010005	Amã, monẽya ado, ereb ereb ganan Negur nigin keleĩya nẽ naabura gudũ fiya nigin yogo iselef anĩ, narĩ mafedidig, age mafe fen, amã kisi ganan male fen, Kristus dõ fiya nigin marouledidig.
47010006	Sain ã, ãgenei dõ fiya ganan bun, kisi feleya bagai wõ gouf, amã fe temeleid ganan darau ifenẽdiya nigin dodok mafef anĩ kisi falauf.
47010007	Ã ereb ereb teten nẽ anĩ dogol lo gedig. Taka ĩ yogo nigin Kristus nẽ ye fen, anĩ nigin totol bagai momoi youf, amãg ĩ gen Kristus nẽ anĩ, ĩ baban kisi fouf.
47010008	Aya, ã daũ yeĩya ban yalesneĩya nigin Odug yana ifanaman anĩ nigin, yanau naal yaor afe alesaufeg, aya anĩ nigin to mama fiyauf.
47010009	Aya neu pas bunem, ã kumĩ ifeneĩya nigin age afef gen, ã kisi gef anĩ to orouf.
47010010	Ere nigin, tunĩ dirõdig, “In pas are morõ ado fen, totol ado, anĩ ere, ĩ amã geid mabodok sain bun, ĩ maleg le fen, yogon wogõ are ege iledig.”
47010011	Tamo age fediya idi keleĩ youf, amã ã geid to tabodok sain bun, nemã pas bun amã naig be fiya anĩ, amã ã geid tabodok sain bun, amã de dõ maf, age mafouf bagai.
47010012	Amã, tunĩ dogo neid yeneid dalesedig idi geid, kerẽ sã dede to mauf. Idi dogo, dogo nigin dogo bun fele dife fen, dogo nigin dogo bun es difef anidi, idi kisi biya sã.
47010013	Anĩ ere, amã yanamã to daũ wal ma fen, malesauf, anĩ ere, amã kabĩ Negur igirkanaman bun dogol yanamã malesauf, kabĩ are ã buneg ilef.
47010014	Amã yanamã gerõ bagai to males maroulef, amã ã gein to masim are, amã yanamã gerõ bagai males maroulem, ere nigin, amã Kristus nẽ biya od ado, ã geineg masin.
47010015	Amã tunim kabĩ dalen anĩ bun to daũ wal mafe fen, yanamã malesedig. Nemã waumã iseya are eig fiya, ãgenei momoiya odugef isele di, ã atun amã nemã kabĩ akor fatuk bagai bilalaũ fef ilauf,
47010016	anĩ bunem, amã ãgenei akor wal mafesil fen, biya od wogõ mauf. Ere nigin, amã tamo taka nẽ akor bun kabĩ dalen anĩ nigin, yanamã yaleseya to oromak.
47010017	Anĩ ere, “Taka ĩ yana yalesef, ĩ Odug bun yana yalesauf.”
47010018	Ere nigin, taka ĩ yogo yana yalesef nigin, Negur to de yedig, anĩ ere, taka ĩ Odugem yana yalesef anĩ, Negur de yedig.
47011001	Ã aya utornag len, neneya od naal wogõ auf nigin aya wau irok, anĩ ere, ã mogo yeir ago gef.
47011002	Aya ã bun Negur nẽ kiyeĩ bunem kiyeĩ afeneik. Aya ã aiweĩ tekelei, Kristus bun agirnein, are aya ã kayau taulei bagai gen, ĩ gein arouliyeĩf nigin age afen.
47011003	Anĩ ere, Eva gogourem ed fe idegnen gen, ãgenei kisi sane le di, ã ãgenei wauĩ bun, Kristus bun ãgenei momoiya ado kisi karẽtut utorõg fen, sane lauf nigin, aya kumĩ auf.
47011004	Takam ã gein isi fen, Jesus taka nigin, amã wogõ mayein anĩ nigin gen sã, wogõ youf be, ã uur fire, uur ã walegen gen sã anĩ walogouf be, ã biya od fire, biya od ã walegen gen sã anĩ walogouf are, ã anĩ karika bagai karĩ wedigedig.
47011005	Anĩ ere, aya kisi afef, aya aposel yeneid odug anidi farumen to bagai abodok.
47011006	Aya wogõya nigin biya sã be, anĩ ere, aya keleĩ ado. Amã, enei, ã bun naab ganan bun, ereb ereb ganan bun yaor mafen.
47011007	Aya yug nigin aukesil fen, Negur nẽ biya od mala sã ege bagai wogõ ayein bunem, ã alesnein anĩ mosor de?
47011008	Aya ã aruneĩ yaleya nigin, sios tunĩ bun tamal isennaya alen anĩ, sios tunĩ idi bun tamal bẽ alen gen.
47011009	Takag, sain aya ã geid tabod ken, ereb taka nigin lau afen, aya ã taka to morõ afenein, ere nigin, turau tar Masedonia bun tamal disin idi, ereb aya lau afen kisi feleya bagai difanan. Ereb ereb ganan bun, aya yug ã morõ ifeneĩya ator ken, toku age afouf.
47011010	Kristus nẽ momoi anĩ, aya nameun ibodok nigin, taka nem Akaia provins bun neu yanau yaleseya enei to katĩ falauf.
47011011	Ere nigin? Aya ã nigin wau laa fiya sã nigin de? Negur ĩ keleĩ, aya ã nigin wau laa fedig!
47011012	Aya ereb ereb nigin idi yeneid dalesedig anĩ bun, amã idi geid tekelei ya anĩ karĩ douf nigin orodidig anidi neid naabureid gudũ fiya nigin, ereb aya age afef anĩ, toku age afouf.
47011013	Ere nigin, tamo age fediya are idegẽya aposel fen, idegẽya kabĩ tamo, idi Kristus nẽ aposel neweid dale fen, kabĩ daledig.
47011014	Are terẽya sã, ere nigin, Satan ĩ yogo bagai fula fiya nẽ engel nawa yaledig.
47011015	Anĩ nigin, Satan nẽ kabĩ tamo idi, madur bagai nẽ kabĩ tamo neweid dalouf are, to terẽ tauf. Idi neid didikalauf bun, idi age difedig kilei dalouf.
47011016	Aya baban arok, taka nem aya nigin neneya tamo to youf. Anĩ ere, ã ago gouf are, aya neneya tamo gen waleyag, anĩ bunem, ayag yanau naal alesauf.
47011017	Aya yug yanau yaleseya enei bun, aya Odug gen to wogõ auf, anĩ ere, neneya tamo gen wogõ auf.
47011018	Musei idi, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau age difedig gen, yeneid dalesedig nigin, ayag yanau alesauf.
47011019	Ã kisi biya bagai ado nigin, ã wauĩ al fiya ado neneya tamo karĩ wedigedig!
47011020	Ere nigin, taka nem ã ferfer ineneik, ereb ereb ganan bun ã kadir ineneik, idegẽya bun yaleyeik, yogo yana yaor falaisi ilun iselef be, weleĩ fã fef bun, ã karĩ wiyẽgedig.
47011021	Aya momoi eig au arok nigin mama fiyaf, are amã felu reya bagai nigin to age mafedig! Anĩ ere, taka ĩ totol ino fen, ereb taka nigin yana yalesauf are–aya neneya tamo gen wogõ auf–ayag totol ano fen, yanau alesauf.
47011022	Idi Hibru tamo de? Ayag anĩ. Idi Israel tamo de? Ayag anĩ. Idi Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar de? Ayag anĩ.
47011023	Idi Kristus nẽ kabĩ tamo de? (Aya wadã gen eig au wogõ auf.) Aya idi wal fediya. Aya idi wal fediya kabĩ aledig, aya kalabus bun idi wal fediya abodõdig, aya idi wal fediya wagĩ difiyadig, age de fen, aya laa bun baba baban dinenan.
47011024	Juda idi aya sain faif bun teti nain wagĩ difiyan.
47011025	Sain towo bun, aya tibogem wagĩ difiyan, sain tekelei bun, aya meeinem dinan, waag aya abodon sain towo sanen, aya, bõ taka ado gaa taka ado, maaĩ atun abodon.
47011026	Aya toku ayok bun, kuwei sane waila wal afen, bẽ tamo nẽ waila wal afen, neu fõ turau tar geid kiwai wal afen, haiden geid kiwai wal afen, taun bun kiwai waila wal afen, gerere tuan kiwai waila wal afen, maaĩ bun waila wal afen, idegẽya turau tar nẽ kiwai waila wal afen.
47011027	Aya kabĩ totol ale, morõ ado fen, sain musei mulaĩ to ainẽdig. Aya naũ ado naan ail fiya fen, sain musei saaf sã aledig. Aya menig fiya fen, gemũ abodõdig.
47011028	Ereb ereb ganan anĩ sirin, aya naa ganan bun, sios ganan nigin suwẽya morõ anim lai fiyadig.
47011029	Aib felu re di, aya to felu rauf de? Aib mosor bun iroule di, aya to wau morõ fiyauf de?
47011030	Aya yanau yaleseya nigin bagai youf are, aya ereb ereb neu felu reya anĩ yaor fedig anĩ nigin yanau alesauf.
47011031	Odug Jesus nẽ Dei, Negur, ĩ anĩ yana faimud yaleseya, ĩ keleĩ, aya to adegek.
47011032	Damaskus oun, gawaman nẽ mudur, King Areta farumen ĩ, aya yaleya nigin taun bobog bun lo fiya tamo inenẽdin.
47011033	Anĩ ere, aya karam kuren dinena fen, kau mosokoronem folo folõ difiya di, yogon iman tamal ulõ aran.
47012001	Aya yanau alesef alauf. Ereb mala to aloufeg, aya Odug bunem malau seleulã kurã fen ado, kurõ fesiya od alen anĩ wogõ auf alauf.
47012002	Aya tamo taka Kristus bun ibodok anĩ keleĩ, ĩ kulu yar fotin ilelen bun, Negurem yale, saa tano towo bun irou iselen. Ĩ bouwa ado be, bouwa sã be, aya keleĩ sã, Negur keleĩ.
47012003	Aya keleĩ, tamo enei–ĩ bouwa ado be, bouwa sã be, aya keleĩ sã, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ keleĩ–
47012004	ĩ paradis bun irou iselen. Ĩ ereb ereb tamom faded feleya kisi feleya sã, tamom wogõya nigin katũ fiyen anĩ karĩ yen.
47012005	Aya tamo age fiya anĩ yana alesauf, anĩ ere, aya yug nigin yanau to alesauf, aya neu felu reya nigin dogol yanau alesauf.
47012006	Aya yana yaleseya nigin agirĩfeg, aya neneya to abodõf, ere nigin, aya momoi anĩ wogõ auf. Anĩ ere, aya yana yaleseya nigin atorok, are taka nem ereb aya age afef be, wogõ auf anĩ wal fe fen, aya nigin fatuk to kisi fouf nigin age afef.
47012007	Kurõ fesiya odug bagai enei alen anĩ bunem, aya yug yanau yaleseya katĩ feleya nigin, bouwa bun kudag ifanan, Satan nẽ arũ tamo darau ifanauf nigin bouwa bun yun, are aya yug yanau yaleseya katĩ feleya nigin.
47012008	Sain towo, Odug aya bun anĩ yalelkanauf nigin, aya ĩ agonen.
47012009	Anĩ ere, ĩ irokanan, “Neu wau ifenẽya õ nigin kilei bagai, ere nigin, neu megeir felu reya bun kisi feleya bagai wõ yef.” Anĩ nigin, aya fatuk bagai wau al fiya bun neu felu reya nigin yanau alesauf, are Kristus nẽ megeir aya bun ibodõf nigin age afouf.
47012010	Anĩ nigin, Kristus nigin, aya felu reya bun, kono fiya bun, wau morõ bun, darau bun, morõ bun, wau kulĩ yedig. Ere nigin, sain aya felu rauf bun, aya totol adodig.
47012011	Aya yug nigin neneya tamo wõ aun, anĩ ere, ã aya nugo wiyage di, aya age afen. Ã aya nigin yanau walesegem, are dem, ere nigin, aya ege, anĩ ere, aya aposel yeneid odug farumen to bagai abodok.
47012012	Aya ã atun abod ken, ereb aposel bagai nẽ anĩ, uris, ereb urug bagai ado, memelik, morõ ganan bun, feseya sã anodin.
47012013	Aya sios ganan bun age afedig anĩ, ã buneg age afen, anĩ ere, ereb tekelei dogol ã bun to age afen, are aya ã isennaya nigin morõ taka to afenein anĩ dogol. Neu kũ fenẽya enei nigin wedereĩ tu kel!
47012014	Gama aya eneim sain towo ki ayeĩf nigin saika afef, aya ã isennaya nigin morõ to afeneĩf, ere nigin, ereb aya orouf are, ãgenei safina sã, ã aug anĩ. Kesum sina tama nigin moni to kuru difedig, anĩ ere, sina tamam nedi gereneid tar nigin age difedig.
47012015	Anĩ nigin, aya wau al fiya odug bun, neu safinau ganan ã nigin araile fen, aya yugeg arailauf. Aya ã nigin wau fatuk afeneĩ di, ã aya nigin wauĩ naal bagai wanagauf de?
47012016	Ã tunĩ aya nigin urõgedig, ‘Ĩ amã masennẽf nigin morõ to ifanaman, anĩ ere, ĩ idegẽya keleĩ bagai, idegẽya kor bunem gei famãdig,’ gedig.
47012017	Aya tamo susur afedin anidi taka bunem, ã adegnei ken, ãgenei safina alen de?
47012018	Aya Taitus ã gein ileya nigin totol bagai aroken ken, aya amã turamã ĩ ado sur afedin. Taitus ĩ to idegnei ken, safineĩ yalen, ĩ age fen de? Amã kisi tekelei bun age mafe fen, naab tekelei dõ mafen, anĩ sã de?
47012019	Ã sain enei ganan, amã mug isennamãf nigin ã bun age mafedig be, kisi gedig. Amã, Negur mala bun, tamo Kristus nigin momoi def anidi gen, wogõ maudig. Ã nemã oboimã, ereb ereb ganan amã age mafef, are ã megeir walogouf nigin.
47012020	Sain aya asiyouf, aya ã nigin kisi afef gen to ailiyeĩya nigin be, ã aya nigin kisi gef gen to uleyageya nigin, aya kumĩ auf. Ã bun an, kusĩ, kiyeĩ, seyeya, fara fiya, ne tã bou yũya, dumen od irõya, aya aya yeya be, ekul ge ufaregeya nigin, aya kumĩ auf.
47012021	Sain aya baban asiyouf, neu Negur ã meleĩ bun aya mama ifana di, musei kulu mosor dino fen, amuyẽ, noli tobonunã fire fire ado, bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya bunem waud to falei difen anidi nigin, aya wau gudũ fouf nigin kumĩ auf.
47013001	Eneim sain towo ã gein asif. “Od ganan isennẽya urom be, towom sigoredim kurõ difesiyouf anĩ megeir gouf.”
47013002	Uruwa aya asi fen, baban asi ã geid tabodon sain bun, aya wedereĩ irouya od arokeneĩ bure afelen. Gama aya ã geid to tabod ken, anĩ ket, idi uruwa mosor dinodin anidi geid tunĩ ganan arokeneik: Aya kelau asiyouf sain bun, idi to loloum afediyouf, anĩ ere, kafĩ fiya afenẽdiyouf,
47013003	ere nigin, ã Kristus ĩ aya bunem wogõ yef anĩ ileya oroyeik. Ĩ ã bun kabĩ yaleya nigin to felu ref, anĩ ere, ĩ ã atun megeir ado.
47013004	Ere nigin, momoi bagai, ĩ felu reya bun aa tetek bun dun, anĩ ere, ĩ Negur nẽ megeir bunem mata ibodok. Age fiya gen, amãg ĩ bun felu reya, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ megeir bunem, amã ĩ geid mata mabodõf. Age mafe fen, amã Negur nẽ megeir ã atun yaor mafouf.
47013005	Ã momoiya bun ubodõgef be sã be anĩ, ulogouf nigin ã aug es gouf. Ã aug kisig uleg. Kristus Jesus ĩ, ã bun ibodok anĩ ã to keleĩ de? Sãf are, momoi bagai, ã es fiya bun kubũ gef.
47013006	Anĩ ere, amã es fiya bun to kubũ maun anĩ ã ulogouf nigin, aya momoi auf.
47013007	Ã ereb sane taka to ago gouf nigin, amã Negur bun kosẽ mauf. Are amã es fiya bun to kubũ maun anĩ tamo kayau dilouf nigin sã, anĩ ere, amã es fiya bun kubũ maun gen dilemãfeg, ã ereb madur ago gouf nigin.
47013008	Ere nigin, amã ereb taka momoi anĩ to kiwai mafenek, anĩ ere, momoi nẽ nigin dogol age mafef.
47013009	Amã felu mauf bun, ã megeir adof nigin, amã waumã al fef. Ã kisi feleya bagai wõ gouf nigineg, amã kosẽ mauf.
47013010	Gariya eig fiya nigin, aya ã geid to tabod ken, enei atotof, are sain aya asiyouf, aya neu yanau bunem totol od ã to arokeneĩf nigin age afef, yanau are ã daũ yeĩya ban yalesneĩya nigin Odug ifanan.
47013011	Idikeleya bagai, turau tar, dabuo. Kisi feleya bagai wõ gouf nigin ago gouf, aya neu wogõ anĩ karĩg, kisi tekelei waleg, wauĩ inosiya bun ubodõg. Ago ge di, wau laa fiya ado wau inosiya nẽ Negur ã geid ibodõf.
47013012	Fateul umãya bunem, abob aan wiyẽg.
47013013	Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan, nedi aanya ã bun sur difef.
47013014	Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya ado, Awa Uur Fateul nẽ nigal yũya ã ganan bun ibodõf.
48001001	Aya Pol, aya aposel, tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem to wõ aun, tamomeg aya to sur difiyan, anĩ ere, Jesus Kristus ado Tamada Negur ĩ Jesus Kristus laa bun tamal turĩ fe di, kel fã yen anim aya sur difiyan,
48001002	are aya neu turau tar aya weim mafaref anidi ganan geid, pas enei Galesia sios bun sur mafef.
48001003	Negur neda Tamada ado Odug Jesus Kristus bun tamal, wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun ibodõf,
48001004	Kristus ĩ, neda Tamada Negur nẽ oroya dõf fen, sain sane enei bun tamal, ada kel gei fadauf ye fen, neda mosor nigin yogo luwa itoron.
48001005	Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
48001006	Aya, ã kaisã bagai Negur ĩ Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem ã iweignein anĩ utornẽg fen, biya od fire bun falei ge di, terẽ auf.
48001007	Od are biya od bagai sã. Momoi bagai, tamo tunĩ, ã neneya bun dirãyei ken, Kristus nẽ biya od anĩ falei difalauf nigin age difef.
48001008	Anĩ ere, amam be, engel taka saa ilun tamalem, biya od fire, amã biya od wogõ mayein anĩ to wogõ yeĩf are, utornẽg len, ĩ gai gai daũ fiye kalauf!
48001009	Amã mogo marokenein gen, aya gama baban arokeneik: Aibem taka ã biya od fire, ã walegen anĩ to wogõ yeĩf are, utornẽg len, ĩ gai gai daũ fiye kalauf!
48001010	Aya tamo nẽ yo ya yaleya nigin age afef de, Negur nẽ yo ya yaleya nigin age afef? Aya tamo waud al fouf nigin age afef de? Aya fau tamo waud al fouf nigin age afouf are, aya Kristus nẽ ferfer sã.
48001011	Turau tar, aya ã enei keleĩ youf nigin orouf, biya od aya wogõ ayein, are tamo nẽ kisim to dinon.
48001012	Aya anĩ tamo taka bun tamal to alen, takameg to ifelnan, anĩ ere, aya Jesus Kristus nẽ kurõ falaisiya bunem alen.
48001013	Aya kulu Juda neid momoiya bun abod ken, naig be afen are ã karĩ gen. Aya Negur nẽ sios darau fatuk bagai afen ken, daũ afalauf nigin age afen.
48001014	Aya, Juda neid momoiya bun, Juda tamo aya gegen atun idi musei wawal afedin, age afe fen, aya neu tubu tar neid tobonuneid dõ fiya nigin fatuk bagai kisi totol anon.
48001015	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ, aya sinau fau gõ fiyaya sã mog, igirna fen, yogon wau ifenẽya bunem aya iweigna di,
48001016	aya haiden atun yogon Naal nigin wogõ auf nigin, yogon Naal aya bun yaor fiya nigin wau iron, sain anĩ bun, aya aib bun keleĩ yaleya nigin tamo taka to, to afiyen.
48001017	Aya, idi aya aposel wõya sã mog, aposel dibodon anidi ailediyouf nigin Jerusalemeg to eselen. Anĩ ere, aya kaisã bagai Arabia kantri ele fen, dum Damaskus kelau elen.
48001018	Yar towo ilele di, aya Pita ado uyu kũ mafouf nigin Jerusalem esel fen, ĩ ado naa fiftin mabodon.
48001019	Aya aposel anidi taka to ailen, Odug nẽ tura, Jems dogol.
48001020	Aya Negur mala bun momoi arokeneik, aya atotkeneik are idegẽya sã.
48001021	Anĩ dumen, aya Siria ado Silisia provins elen.
48001022	Judia distrik oun sios Kristus bun dibodok idi, aya nigin keleĩ sã.
48001023	Idi od enei dogol karĩ den: “Tamo ĩ kulu ada darau ifanadan, ĩ momoiya daũ fouf nigin kulu age fen anĩ, gama wogõ yef.”
48001024	Age de fen, idi aya nigin Negur yana dalesen.
48002001	Yar fotin ilele di, aya baban Jerusalem eselen, sain anĩ are Banabas ado. Aya Taituseg ale fen, meselen.
48002002	Aya Negur kurõ fesiya ifelnan kilei, esel fen, biya od aya haiden atun wogõ aun anĩ, idi faded afiyẽdin. Anĩ ere, aya, ganan keleĩ sã mog, iminẽyan idi sios nẽ uyu irouya gen ailedin anidi bun age afen, ere nigin, aya neu kabĩ alef ado mogo alen anĩ, ege ileya nigin kumĩ aun.
48002003	Anĩ ere, Taitus ĩ aya weim mabodon, ĩ Grik tamal, anĩ ere, idi ĩ mulũ ileya nigin to nugo difiyen.
48002004	Morõ are, idegẽya turamã tar tunĩ, amã atun iminẽyan disin anidi nigin fã yen, idi amã atun dimin ken, Kristus Jesus bun karika mabodon anĩ kofo de fen, amã lo nẽ kafĩ fiya bun diroulemãf nigin disin.
48002005	Biya od nẽ momoi anĩ, ã bun ibodõf nigin, amã idi neid od anĩ, sain naal bagaig to maroun.
48002006	Idi sios bun yeneid ado anidi–idi naig be fediya are aya bun fire to ailedig, Negur ĩ tetenem lo fiya bunem to es fedig–tamo sios bun yeneid ado anidi neu od anĩ taka to tobol difen.
48002007	Age fiya ban, idi, Pita Juda idi bun biya od wogõya nẽ kabĩ ifenen gen, aya haiden bun biya od wogõya nẽ kabĩ ifanan anĩ dilen.
48002008	Negur ĩ, Pita Juda idi atun aposel kabĩ yalen anĩ bun kabĩ yalen gen, aya haiden atun aposel kabĩ alen buneg Negur kabĩ yalen.
48002009	Jems, Pita, Jon, idi sios nẽ monog tor gen diledin anidi, idi Negur aya wau ifenẽya ifanan anĩ dile fen, aya Banabas ado nigal maũf nigin, imamã biyalẽ bagu difen. Idi, amã haiden bun mele di, idi Juda anidi bun dilauf nigin, yo den.
48002010	Idi amã faimud maleg masennẽdiyouf nigin dogol dirokanaman, kabĩ are, aya age afouf nigin kisi totol aledig anĩ age afedig bagai.
48002011	Sain Pita Antiok taun isi di, aya ĩ mala bun ou afiyen, ere nigin, ĩ yaor bagai kũ fenen.
48002012	Jems tamo tunĩ sur fedin anĩ fau isiya sã mog, Pita ĩ haiden geid saaf dõ don. Anĩ ere, idi disi wõ de di, ĩ haiden itorneĩd fen, so fedin, ere nigin, ĩ idi mulũ bun temeleid anidi kumĩ fiyeĩd fen.
48002013	Juda tunĩ ganan, yogon mala yaleya anĩ dõ difen, age dife di, dogo neid mala yaleya bunem, Banabaseg naab anĩ dõ fen.
48002014	Sain aya, idi neid tobonuneid, biya od nẽ momoi anĩ to dõ dife di, ail fen, aya idi ganan meleid bun Pita arokenen, “Õ Juda tamo, anĩ ere, õ haiden gen ubodok, Juda tamo gen sã. Agouf are, naig fe di, haiden idi Juda neid tobonunã dõ difouf nigin, nugo wiyẽdif?”
48002015	Ada Juda temelada gogũ difadan, haiden mosor temelada sã.
48002016	Anĩ ere, ada keleĩ, tamo ĩ lo dõ fiya bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai to wõ yedig, anĩ ere, Jesus Kristus nigin momoiya bunem. Anĩ nigin, adag, Kristus Jesus nigin momoi taudig, are Kristus nigin momoiya bunem, lo dõ fiya bunem sã, Negur mala bun madur bagai wõ tauf nigin age tafedig, ere nigin, lo dõ fiya bunem, aibem taka Negur mala bun madur bagai to wõ youf.
48002017	Ada, Kristus nigin momoiya bunem, Negur mala bun madur bagai wõ tauf tau fen, ada dug mosor temelada anĩ dilouf are, Kristus ĩ mosor nẽ kabĩ tamouf de? Gai sã bagai!
48002018	Ereb aya daũ afen anĩ, baban kare afouf are, aya yug, aya lo narĩ fiya tamo wõ auf.
48002019	Lo bunem, aya lo mala bun laa fiyan, are aya Negur mala bun mata abodõf nigin age afen.
48002020	Aya Kristus ado aa tetek bun dinakesin, anĩ nigin, aya baban mata to abodok, anĩ ere, Kristus aya bun mata ibodok. Gama aya bouwau mata ibodok, are aya Negur Naal nigin momoiya bunem mata abodok, ĩ aya nigin wau laaf fen, aya nigin yogo luwa itoron.
48002021	Aya Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya to tadũ afouf, ere nigin, lo bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai wõya anĩ isiyouf are, Kristus ĩ ege laa fen.
48003001	Galesia tamo kayau, ã neneya! Aim ã idegnein? Ã meleĩ bun bagai, Jesus Kristus aa tetek bun dukesin anĩ, yaor bagai mafelnein.
48003002	Ereb taka dogol, aya ã bun keleĩ you fenẽ: Ã lo dõ fiya bunem Awa Uur walegen de, oo ereb karĩ gen anĩ nigin momoi ge di?
48003003	Ã fau neneya ufaregef de? Awa Uur bunem gariya unog fen, gama ã tamo nẽ totol bunem udikalagau fenẽ de?
48003004	Ã darau fatuk bagai ege walegen de? Are momoi, ege bagai walegen de?
48003005	Negur ĩ, ã, lo dõ fiya bunem yogon Awa Uur ifeneĩ di, ã atun memelik inodin de, oo ereb ã karĩ gen anĩ nigin momoi ge di?
48003006	Abraham bun kisi gouf: “Ĩ Negur nigin momoi yen, age fe di, Negurem ĩ madur bagai fiyen.”
48003007	Anĩ nigin, karĩ gouf, idi momoi def anidi, are idi Abraham gere tar.
48003008	Negur nẽ Itotoya ketem, Negur ĩ haiden idi neid momoiya bunem madur bagai fediyouf anĩ ifelnadan, Negur ĩ, anĩ fau wõya sã mog, biya od anĩ ketem Abraham irokenen: “Teneub ganan õ bunem el fediyouf.”
48003009	Anĩ nigin, idi momoiya ado are, momoiya tamo Abraham geid el fedif.
48003010	Idi lo dõ fiya bunem dedig anidi ganan, are isisĩya farumen dibodok, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun eig ye irok, “Idi ganan Lo nẽ Buk bun itotoya ibodok anĩ ganan toku to dõ difouf are, isisĩya farumen difaref.”
48003011	Taka ĩ lo bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai to wõ youf, are yaor, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Tamo madur bagai ĩ, momoiya bunem mata ibodõf.”
48003012	Lo are, momoiya bunem to ifaref, age fiya ban, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Tamo ĩ enei age fedif, ĩ anĩ bunem mata ibodõf.”
48003013	Kristus ĩ, ada fotokar isisĩya nẽ wõ ye fen, ada lo nẽ isisĩya bun temelada kel yaledan, ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Ganan aa bun diseginnẽdif, idi isisĩya farumen dibodok.”
48003014	Ĩ, el fiya Negurem Abraham ifenen anĩ, Kristus Jesus bunem, haiden bun isiyouf nigin, ada kel yaledan, are ada, momoiya bunem, Awa Uur nẽ promis anĩ talouf nigin age fen.
48003015	Turau tar, aya tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem wogõ auf: Tamo nẽ bar itenẽya anĩg, tamo waud iro ken, bar ditenek anĩ, to dalelef be, to tobol difedig gen, eneig age fiya.
48003016	Negur ĩ, promis od anĩ, Abraham ado yogon ibor irokenẽdin. Negur nẽ Itotoya to eig yef, “yogon ibor tar bun,” age youf are, are musei nigin, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya, “ogon ibor bun,” yef, are tamo tekelei, ĩ Kristus nigin.
48003017	Aya wogõ auf anĩ nẽ gariya, are eig fiya: 430 yar ilele di, lo wõ yen anĩ, Negur kulu bar itenẽya inon anĩ to we fel fen, Negur nẽ promis to yalelef.
48003018	Lo bunem akor anĩ yaleya nigin ouf are, promis bunem akor are to dalouf. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ, yogon wau ifenẽya bun promis bunem akor anĩ Abraham ifenen.
48003019	Age fiyauf are, lo are ere nigin? Lo are mosor yaor fouf nigin ifenẽdi di, anĩ ibodok ile, Abraham nẽ ibor ĩ nigin promis iron anĩ, wõ youf bun bure falauf. Lo are, engelem, atun tamo Moses difenẽ di, lo anĩ yaor fen.
48003020	Atun tamo ĩ, tamo foi fiya tekelei nẽ dogol to ibodõdig. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ tekelei dogol, ĩ yogo bagai Abraham promis anĩ ifenen. (Anĩ bun, atun tamo taka to ibodok.)
48003021	Anĩ nigin, lo ado Negur nẽ promis kiwai youf de? Gai sã bagai! Lo ifenen anim tamo mata ifenem are, Negur mala bun madur bagai wõya are, momoi bagai, lo bunem isim.
48003022	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya kurõ falaisi, tenebur tamo kayau ganan mosor nẽ kafĩ fiya bun difaref yef, are Negur nẽ promis Jesus Kristus nigin momoiya bunem ifenẽf anĩ, idi momoi def anidi ifenẽdiyouf nigin, Negur age fen.
48003023	Momoiya enei isiya sã mog, ada lo nẽ kafĩ fiya bun tabodon, tabodok tele mog, momoiya anĩ yaoren.
48003024	Anĩ nigin, lo anim ada ulum iroukanada di, Kristus wagen tele di, ĩ ada momoiya bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai fadauf nigin, inon.
48003025	Gama momoiya mogo isin nigin, ada gama baban lo farumen to tabodok.
48003026	Ã ganan, Kristus Jesus nigin momoiya bunem, Negur gere tar ubodõgef,
48003027	ere nigin, ã Kristus bun naan walegen ganan, are mogo Kristus ufonũgen.
48003028	Ã gama, Juda tamo be Grik tamo, ferfer be kafĩ fiya sã, monog be gober to ufaregef, ere nigin, Kristus Jesus bun ã ganan tekelei ufaregef.
48003029	Ã Kristus nẽ ufaragauf are, ã Abraham gere tar, anĩ nigin, in promis bunem yogon akor anĩ walogouf.
48004001	Aya eig au wogõ auf, kesu monog tama fotokar ĩ fau simõf are, are ĩ tama nẽ akor ganan yaloufeg, ĩ fau ferfer gen ibodok.
48004002	Ĩ fau simõ ibod mog, ĩ idi kulatun fiya tamo ado idi lo fiya tamo farumen ibodõ di, idi yogon kabĩ nigin lo difef, ile, tama sain ifenek anĩ bun didikalauf.
48004003	Age fiya gen, adag Kristus fau isiya sã mog, simõ bun, tenebur nẽ uur sesen farumen, ferfer gen kafĩ fiya bun tabodon.
48004004	Anĩ ere, yogon sain bagai wõ ye di, Negur yogo Naal sur fe di, kayau bunem wõ yen, lo farumen wõ yen,
48004005	are idi lo farumen difaref anidi kel gei fediyouf nigin, age fe di, ada Negur gere tar ya bagai anĩ talouf nigin age fen.
48004006	Ã Negur gere tar nigin, Negur ĩ yogo Naal nẽ Awa Uur, ada wauda bun sur fe di, Awa Uurem iweig irõdig, “Abba, Dei.”
48004007	Anĩ nigin, õ baban ferfer sã, õ in kesu. Õ in kesu ubodok nigin, Negur ĩ õg yogon akor walouf nigin ineyon.
48004008	Uruwa bun, ã Negur keleĩ sa ken, ã idi waitou bagai sã anĩ farumen ferfer ubodõgen.
48004009	Anĩ ere, gama ã Negur keleĩ, oo Negur ã nigin keleĩ youf auf are deuf, naig fe di, ã falei weleg fen, feseya ado maleg nẽ ifelnẽya bun ulegef? Ã baban idim ferfer dineneĩf nigin oroyeik de?
48004010	Ã naa tunĩ, ogõ tunĩ, saneya tunĩ ado, yar tunĩ anĩ bun, anĩ nẽ lo dõg fen, ãgenei kisi unogedig!
48004011	Aya ã nigin kumĩ auf, are aya ã nigin ege be kabĩ alen.
48004012	Turau tar, aya ã agoneik, aya gen wowãg, ere nigin, ayag ã gen wõ aun. Ã aya bun ereb sane taka to ago gen.
48004013	Ã keleĩ, are aya dagi nigin, aya ã bun urug bagai biya od wogõ ayein.
48004014	Neu dagi are ã morõ ifenein, anĩ ere, ã aya to meleĩ irim wiyag fen, soso wiyagen. Age fiya ban, ã, aya Negur nẽ engel gen, Kristus Jesus yogo bagai gen, waleyagen.
48004015	Ãgenei wauĩ kulĩya ganan gama nain ibodok? Ãgenei meleĩ kusuf yale, aya ifanaya nigin kisi feleyam are, ã kusug waleg aya wanagem, aya agef kurõ feis irokeneĩya nigin kisi feleya.
48004016	Aya age a momoi arokeneik bunem, ãgenei kiwai wõ auf de?
48004017	Tamo anidi are ã gei diyeĩf nigin kabĩ totol daledig, anĩ ere, biya nigin sã. Idi ã ama bun tamal dalelneĩf nigin orodif, are ã idi nigin kabĩ totol walogouf nigin age difef.
48004018	Ereb biya nigin kabĩ totol yaleya, are biya, sain aya ã geid tabodok bun dogol sã, wededem ago gouf, are biya.
48004019	Neu kesu tar, aya ã nigin baban darau kesu gõ fiya nigin gen alef ele, Kristus ã namein kare fouf.
48004020	Aya ã geid gama tabod ken, aya neu ailõ falei afouf nigin aya wau adok irok, ere nigin, aya ã nigin nene auf!
48004021	Aya urokanag, ã lo farumen ibodõya oroyeik, ã lo irok anĩ to keleĩ de?
48004022	Negur nẽ Itotoya bun irok, Abraham ĩ kesu uru ado, taka ferfer kayau bunem wõ yen, agef fen, taka kafĩ fiya sã kayau bunem wõ yen.
48004023	Yogon kesu ferfer kayau bunem wõ yen are, tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem gõ fen. Age fe di, yogon kesu kafĩ fiya sã kayau bunem wõ yen are, promis od anĩ dõf fen, wõ yen.
48004024	Enei are yaab od gen tailauf: Kayau are, bar itenẽya uru nigin. Bar itenẽya taka are, Sinai Arei bun tamal anĩ kesu gogũ fen, are ferfer wowã douf nigin. Are Hagar.
48004025	Hagar are Sinai Arei Arabia teneub bun ibodok anĩ nigin, takag, falei fel Jerusalem taun gama ibodok anĩ, ere nigin, ĩ yogon gere tar geid idi ferfer dibodok.
48004026	Anĩ ere, Jerusalem ilun ibodok, are kafĩ fiya sã. Agef fen, ĩ neda sinada.
48004027	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok: “O kayau dali, õ kesu to gogũ wodig, waũ al fe. Õ kesu gõ fiya nẽ darau to walef, uweig fen, fatuk kaĩ wouf, ere nigin, kayau dali nẽ kesu are musei biya fen, kayau tamo ado nẽ kesu wal fiya.”
48004028	Turau tar, ã, Isak gen, promis nẽ gere tar.
48004029	Anĩ ere, sain anĩ bun, kesu tamo nẽ tobonunã bunem gõ fen are, kesu Awa Uur nẽ megeir bunem gõ fen anĩ darau ifenen. Gamag agef yenek.
48004030	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya ere yef? “Ferfer kayau ado yogon kesu uru uraileid, ere nigin, ferfer kayau nẽ kesu ĩ, kafĩ fiya sã kayau nẽ kesu akor anĩ to foi fenẽf.”
48004031	Anĩ nigin, turau tar, ada ferfer kayau gere tar sã, kafĩ fiya sã kayau nẽ gere tar.
48005001	Ada karika tabodõf nigin, Kristus ĩ ada kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnadan. Anĩ nigin, megeir ufareg fen, baban ferfer nẽ kafĩ fiya farumen to ubodõg.
48005002	Karĩ weleg! Aya Pol, ã arokeneik, ã mulũ bun ulalagauf are, Kristus ĩ, ã bun kabĩ sã bagai youf.
48005003	Tamo ganan mulũ bun dilef are, aya baban arokenẽdif, idi lo ganan bagai dõ difouf.
48005004	Ã lo bunem Negur mala bun madur bagai wõ gouf nigin ago gef, ã Kristus bun tamal fara yein. Ã wau ifenẽya utorõg fen, uyagen.
48005005	Anĩ ere, ada momoi tau fen, Awa Uur bunem madur bagai wõ tauf nigin, wauda ise fen, totol bagai tari tafef.
48005006	Ere nigin, taka ĩ Kristus Jesus bun ibodok are, mulũ ileya be, mulũ ileya sã, anĩ ganan ege. Ereb odug bagai are, momoiya, wau laa fiya bunem kabĩ yalef anĩ dogol.
48005007	Ã meli bagai gududu gen. Aim anĩ ã momoi anĩ dõ fiya nigin naabureĩ gudũ fen?
48005008	Weder te yabiya od age fiya, are ĩ ã iweigneik anĩ bunem to isif.
48005009	“Yis naal bagai anim bret ganan gẽ yedig.”
48005010	Aya Odug bun ã nigin momoi auf, are ã kisi fire to walogouf. Aib ĩ ã neneya bun iraileyeik are, mala solo sane yalouf.
48005011	Turau tar, aya mulũ ileya nigin fau wogõ auf are, ere nigin aya fau darau difanaf? Aya age afem are, Kristus nẽ aa tetek, are tamo yeid tũ fiya nẽ meein to ibodom.
48005012	Idi ã wauĩ tũ fiya difeneik anidi, idi dile, dogo bouweid gudũ difouf nigin, aya wau irok.
48005013	Neu turau tar, ã kafĩ fiya sã ufaragauf nigin iweignein. Anĩ ere, ãgenei kafĩ fiya sã anĩ bunem, bouwa nẽ oroya to dõ gouf, age fiya ban, wauĩ laa fiya bunem, abob aruna walogouf.
48005014	Lo ganan are lo tekelei bun bagu felef: “Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigin waũ laa fouf.”
48005015	Ã atun monẽg fen, waila kaka gouf are, ã abob daũ wiyẽgouf nigin, lo walagauf.
48005016	Anĩ nigin, aya orok, Awa Uur bunem ubodõgouf, ago gouf are, ã bouwa nẽ oroya to dõ gouf.
48005017	Ere nigin, bouwa nẽ oroya ĩ, Awa Uur nẽ oroya anĩ to orodig, age fe di, Awa Uur ĩ, bouwa nẽ oroya to orodig. Idi urom abob kiwai difenẽdig, are ã ereb oroyeik anĩ to ago gouf nigin age difedig.
48005018	Anĩ ere, ã Awa Uurem ulum iroukeneĩf are, ã lo farumen to ubodõgef.
48005019	Bouwa nẽ oroya nẽ tobonunã are yaor: noli tobonunã, amuyẽ ado, bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya;
48005020	idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya ado idegẽya kosẽya; abob kiwai ifenẽya, kusĩya, kiyeĩ inoya, seyeya, aya dogol yeya, fara fiya, foi fiya ado,
48005021	name nameya, aai naanueiya, bilãya ado, tobonunã age fiya anĩ ganan. Aya ã kulu arokenein gen, gama totol bagai arokeneik, idi age de difaref anidi, Negur nẽ tano to dalouf.
48005022	Anĩ ere, Awa Uur nẽ faat are, wau laa fiya, wau kulĩya, wau inosiya, wau yukeleya, wau ifenẽya, tobonunã biya, dõ fiya biya,
48005023	molol ado yogon bouwa tobonunã biya bun kulatun fiya. Lo takam enei ganan to katĩ felef.
48005024	Aib idi Kristus Jesus nẽ dibodok, mogo mosor nẽ bouwa anĩ, yogon mala ile oroya ado bouwa nẽ oroya geid, aa tetek bun dukesin.
48005025	Ada Awa Uur bunem tabodok nigin, ada Awa Uur bunemeg tayõf.
48005026	Ada yanada to talesauf, to seye talesauf, age ta feneg, abob nigin kiyeĩ to tanouf.
48006001	Turau tar, taka mosor ino mog ulogouf are, Awa Uur bun ufaregef ã, ĩ molol nem madur wiyẽgouf. Anĩ ere, ãg kisi fiya bun to ulagauf nigin, ã aug nigin lo walagauf.
48006002	Abob nẽ morõ faali ge, agog fen, naab anĩ bunem, Kristus nẽ lo anĩ ã bun kisi falauf.
48006003	Taka ĩ aya odug ye fen, ĩ yana sã ege ibodõf are, ĩ yogo idegnek.
48006004	Tamo mugu mugu yogon kabĩ anĩ es fouf. Agef fen, ĩ yogo nigin dogol yogon yana yales fen, taka yogo ad nigin to es fouf.
48006005	Ere nigin, mugu mugu yogon morõ anĩ faali fouf.
48006006	Taka ĩ Negur nẽ od nigin keleĩ yalef, ĩ ereb ereb biya anĩ ganan, yogon tise ado foi difouf.
48006007	Takam to idegneĩf: Takam Negur iseilnẽya kisi feleya sã. Tamo ĩ ereb itenek de anĩ yaledig.
48006008	Taka ĩ yogo bouwa nẽ oroya dõ fiya nigin itenek, ĩ bouwa nẽ oroya bunem daũ fiya yalouf. Taka ĩ Awa Uur dõ fiya nigin itenek, ĩ Awa Uur bunem mata ibodkeleya anĩ yalouf.
48006009	Ada ereb biya age fiya nigin wauda to folo rouf, ere nigin, ada to fese tauf are, ada tatenek anĩ, yogon sain bun bagai talouf.
48006010	Anĩ nigin, ada anĩ age fiya nigin naab wõ youf are, ada, tamo kayau ganan bun biya age tag, are idi momoiya nẽ ibor dibodok anidi bun bagai.
48006011	Aya imaum bagai od nẽ ereb gegẽ odug atotkenein anĩ uleg.
48006012	Idi mayarẽ lo tafef anĩ bunem biya difamãf def anidim, ã mulũ ileya nigin totol bagai dirokeneik. Idi enei age difef are, idi Kristus nẽ aa tetek bunem darau yaleya ditor ken nigin dogol, age difef.
48006013	Idi mulũ dilen anidig lo to dõ difedig, anĩ ere, idi ãgenei bouweĩ bunem yeneid dalesauf nigin ã mulũ ileya nigin orodif.
48006014	Aya yug nigin to bagai yanau alesauf, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ aa tetek nigin dogol. Aa tetek bunem, teneub enei nẽ oroya, aya bun laa fen, age fe di, ayag neu oroya, teneub enei nẽ oroya bun laa fiyan.
48006015	Mulũ ileya, mulũ ileya sã be, are ganan ege. Safina odug are, mata wõya.
48006016	Wau inosiya ado wau yũya, idi od enei mogo wogõ aul anĩ dõ difef anidi ganan bun isiyouf, Negur nẽ Israel tamo kayau buneg isiyouf.
48006017	Sain enei bunem ilauf ganan bun, taka nem morõ to ifanauf, ere nigin, aya bouwau bun Jesus nẽ uris ibodok.
48006018	Turau tar, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ãgenei uur bun ibodõf. Momoi.
49001001	Aya Pol, Negur nẽ oroya bunem, Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun, Efesus Negur nẽ tamo kayau, Kristus Jesus el de dõ difedig anidi bun, pas enei atotof.
49001002	Negur neda Tamada ado Odug Jesus Kristus neid wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, ã bun ibodõf.
49001003	Ada, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Tama Negur, ĩ yana talesauf, ĩ uur nẽ el fiya Kristus bun saa ilun dibodok anĩ ganan bunem el fadan.
49001004	Negur ĩ saa teneub ado kare fiya sã mog, ada yogon mala bun, fateul ado amuyẽ sã tabodõf nigin, Jesus bun igirnadan.
49001005	Wau laa fiya bun, Negur ĩ yogon wau kulĩya ado oroya kilei, Jesus Kristus bunem, ada yaleda fen, Negur nẽ gere tar wowã tauf nigin, mogo igirnadan.
49001006	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya, are Jesus Negurem ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ bun, ege luwa ifanadan anĩ nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin, Negur yana talesauf.
49001007	Jesus bun, ada, yogon naud bunem kel yaleya, mosor nigin weder tu keleya anĩ, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya barikã bunem, talen.
49001008	Negur ĩ yogon wau ifenẽya bunem, kisi biya ado kisi fokõya ganan, ada bun foula fen.
49001009	Agef fen, ĩ yogon oroya nẽ waa anĩ ifelnadan, are yogon wau kulĩya nẽ kisi Kristus bun kisi fen kilei,
49001010	yogon sain anĩ kisi fel wõ youf bun kabĩ yalouf, sain anĩ bun, Negur ĩ saa teneub ado bun ereb ereb ganan dibodok anĩ, mudur tekelei, Kristus farumen gurif iroulauf.
49001011	Negur ĩ yogon oroya dõf fen, ereb ereb ganan age fedig, ĩ yogon kisi dõf fen, ada mogo igirnadan, age fe di, adag Kristus bun yogon akor talen,
49001012	are ada uyulil Kristus bun wauda iseya talen anĩ, Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya yana talesauf nigin age fen.
49001013	Ã momoi anĩ nẽ od, ãgenei kel yaleya nẽ biya od anĩ karĩ ge fen, ãg Kristus bun ubodõgen. Ã Kristus nigin momoi ge di, Negur ã bun uris, are Awa Uur Fateul Negur afeneĩf yen anĩ inon.
49001014	Negur ĩ, idi Negur nẽ anidi kel yaleya fau wõya sã mog, ada neda akor momoi bagai talouf nigin megeir fe fen, Awa Uur Fateul iben, are ada yogon fula fiya medeĩya yana talesauf nigin age fen.
49001015	Age fiya nigin, aya Odug Jesus nigin ãgenei momoiya ado, Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya anĩ karĩ au fen,
49001016	aya ã nigin Negur de fiyẽya to folõ afelen. Aya neu kosẽya bun ã nigin karĩ aul fen,
49001017	neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Negur, Tamada fula fiya medeĩya barikã, ĩ, ã ĩ nigin keleĩ bagai youf nigin, kisi biya ado kurõ fesiya nẽ Awa Uur ifeneĩf nigin, kosẽ audig.
49001018	Aya ãgenei wauĩ nẽ meleĩ fokõ fouf nigineg kosẽ audig, are ã, wau iseya ĩ anĩ bun iweignein, yogon fula fiya medeĩya barikã nẽ akor Negur nẽ tamo kayau bun ibodok anĩ ado,
49001019	yogon megeir barikã momoi tauf ada bun kabĩ yalef anĩ, keleĩ youf nigin, age afedig. Megeir are, yogon totol barikã anim kabĩ yalef gen,
49001020	megeir de tekelei anim Kristus bun kabĩ yale fen, ĩ laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiye ken, saa ilun Negur ima biyalẽ inenen.
49001021	Negur ĩ, Kristus, uyu irouya ganan, yeneid adodo ganan, megeir ganan, odudug ganan ado, yeneid sain enei bun ado sain fau isiyouf buneg ifenẽdiyouf ani ganan wal fiya bun inenen.
