49001022	Agef fen, Negur ĩ, ereb ereb ganan Kristus ye farumen gõ fel fen, ĩ sios nigin ereb ereb ganan neid mudur ibodõf nigin igirnen.
49001023	Sios are, yogon bouwa, ĩ naab ganan bunem ereb ereb ganan kisi feledig anĩ nẽ kisi feleya.
49002001	Ã kulu ãgenei kũ fenẽya ado mosor bun gare gen.
49002002	Sain anĩ bun, ã teneub enei nẽ naab ado, owõbẽ tano nẽ mudur, are uur idi dõ fiya sã anidi bun gama kabĩ yalef anĩ nẽ naab dõ gen.
49002003	Idi atun ada gananeg, uruwa bun bouwada nẽ oroya anĩ dõ tafe fen, yogon oroya ado kisi dõ tafen. Ada, tamo tunĩ ganan idi gogũ difedin gen, adag age de gogũ difadan bunem, Negur nẽ didi farumen tabodon.
49002004	Anĩ ere, ada nigin yogon wau laa fiya odug bunem, Negur wau yũya barikã,
49002005	ĩ, ada kũ fenẽya bun gare taun sain buneg, ada Kristus geid turĩ fadan. Are wau ifenẽya bunem, ã kel yaleyein.
49002006	Agef fen, Negur ĩ, ada Kristus geid kel turĩ fada fen, Kristus Jesus bun ada ĩ geid saa ilun tabodõf nigin inenadan,
49002007	are, fau isiyouf sain bun, ĩ yogon biya fiya Kristus Jesus bun ifanadan anĩ bunem, yogon wau ifenẽya barikã ifelnẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
49002008	Wau ifenẽya bunem, ã momoiya bunem kel yaleyein, are aug bunem sã, Negur nẽ ege luwa ifenein,
49002009	are kabĩ bunem sã, anĩ nigin, taka nem to yana yalesauf.
49002010	Ada Negur nẽ imaba, kabĩ biya talouf nigin Kristus Jesus bun ada kare fadan, kabĩ biya are Negur ada age tafouf nigin uruwa bun mogo dodok fanadan.
49002011	Anĩ nigin, uruwa bun, ã gõ diyein bunem haiden ubodõge di, idi mulũ dilen anidim (are tamo bouwa bun tamo imedim age difen) ã mulũ ileya sã diyein anĩ karĩ weleg.
49002012	Sain anĩ bun, ã Kristus nigin gerõ ufaregen, ã Israel buneg yeneĩ sã, promis nẽ bar itenẽya buneg ã yaũ, tenebur ein wau iseya sã, Negur nigin keleĩ sã ubodõgen anĩ karĩ weleg.
49002013	Anĩ ere, gama ã uruwa gerõ ufaregen anĩ, Kristus Jesus bun, Kristus nẽ naud bunem, Negur non guri yeĩ irousiyein.
49002014	Ere nigin, Kristus yogo ĩ neda maror, uru anĩ yale, tekelei inon, agef fen, kiwai fara fiya nẽ garaĩ anĩ narĩ fen.
49002015	Ĩ yogo bouwa bunem lo, ĩtãfiya ado, nun anĩ yaleledin. Ĩ yogo bun tamo uru anĩ bunem, tamo mata tekelei ino fen, maror inouf nigin age fen.
49002016	Ĩ bouwa tekelei enei bun, idi uruwom aa tetek bunem Negur bun komo fediyouf nigin agef fen, ĩ aa tetek bunem dogo neid kiwai yukesin.
49002017	Ĩ isi fen, ã haiden gerõ ufaregen bun maror nigin wogõ yei ken, idi Juda temeleid non difaren anidi buneg, maror nigin wogõ fiyẽdin.
49002018	Ĩ bunem, ada uruwom Awa Uur tekelei bunem, Tamada wagen ileya kisi feleya.
49002019	Anĩ nigin, ã yaũ tamo ado tamo urug sã, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ tamo kayau geid tekelei fen, Negur nẽ ibor tar.
49002020	Ã, aposel ado profet fõ gariya dinon anĩ teten fõ gen inoyein, are Kristus Jesus yogo ĩ monog tor gen.
49002021	Kristus bun, fõ ganan katõ fel fen, Odug bun tempel fateul wõ youf nigin fã yef.
49002022	Kristus bun, ãg, mata ibodõya nẽ modoũ Negur yogon Awa Uur bunem ibodõf nẽ anĩ wõ gouf nigin, weim inoyeik.
49003001	Age fiya nigin, aya Pol, haiden ã nigin, Kristus Jesus nẽ kabĩ nigin au fen, kalabus bun abodok.
49003002	Momoi bagai, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ã nigin aya ifanan anĩ, naig fe kabĩ yalen are, ã karĩ gen.
49003003	Are waa Negurem kurõ fesiya bunem aya ifelnan, are aya mogo tobega bagai atoton gen.
49003004	Ã enei uweseg fen, Kristus nẽ waa nigin aya wederou fokõ felen anĩ, keleĩ youf.
49003005	Are Awa Uurem Negur nẽ fateul aposel ado profet bun gama kurõ fesin gen, sain mogo ilelen anĩ nẽ tamo kayau bun tamo idi to agef ifelnẽdin.
49003006	Waa are, biya od bunem, haiden idi Israel geid Negur nẽ akor dalouf, idi ganan bouwa tekelei nẽ bagu fiya dibodõf, agef fen, Kristus Jesus bun promis nẽ akor anĩ weim dalouf.
49003007	Negur nẽ megeir kabĩ yale di, aya Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ege luwa ifanan anĩ bunem, biya od enei nẽ kabĩ tamo wõ aun.
49003008	Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan atun, tamo naal farumen aya gai naal bagai anĩ, wau ifenẽya enei aya ifanan, are Kristus nẽ kisi feleya, are imir ken, ileya kisi feleya sã anĩ, haiden bun wogõ auf nigin ado,
49003009	waa enei, kulu isin ganan Negur ereb ereb ganan kare fen anĩ bun iminẽyan ibodon anĩ, naig fe kabĩ yalef anĩ, tamo kayau ganan bun yaor afouf nigin ifanan.
49003010	Negur nẽ kisi are, gama sios bunem, Negur nẽ kisi biya fire fire, saa ilun uyu iroudiya ado yeneid adodo ifelnẽdiyouf,
49003011	are Negur ĩ, yogon mata ibodkeleya nẽ oroya, neda Odug Kristus Jesus bun kisif bure felen anĩ kilei, age fen.
49003012	Kristus bun, ada Kristus nigin momoiya bunem, karika ado kumĩ sã, Negur wagen ileya kisi feleya.
49003013	Anĩ nigin, aya ã arokeneik, aya ã nigin darau alef ge fen, to felu gouf, darau are ã fula fiya medeĩya ifeneĩya nigin.
49003014	Gariya enei nigin, Dei ĩ bunem, yogon ibor ganan saa ilun ado tenebur ein dibodok,
49003015	dogo neid yeneid yaledig, aya ĩ wagen iborou bobou afef.
49003016	Aya kosẽ auf, ĩ yogon fula fiya medeĩya kisi feleya bunem, yogon Awa Uur bunem megeir ã namein ife fen, megeir yeĩf nigin,
49003017	are Kristus ĩ momoiya bunem ãgenei wauĩ bun ibodõf nigin. Age afe fen, aya kosẽ auf, ã warumutei ado gariya, wau laa fiya bun utenẽg fen,
49003018	ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan geid, Kristus nẽ wau laa fiya anĩ, odug naig be fiya, meluk, ilun ado, namen naig be fiya anĩ ulogouf nigin megeir walogouf,
49003019	agog fen, wau laa fiya enei, keleĩ ganan wal fiya anĩ keleĩ youf, anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ kisi feleya ganan ã bun kisi falauf nigin kosẽ auf.
49003020	Ĩ gama yogon megeir ada namedan kabĩ yalef anĩ bunem, ereb ada to tafef be, kisi tafef anĩ ganan wal fiya, age fiya kisi feleya,
49003021	sios bun ado Kristus Jesus bun, fula fiya medeĩya, ibor ganan gai gai ibodok ilauf bun, ĩ bun ibodõf! Momoi.
49004001	Aya Kristus nigin kalabus bun abod ken, iweigya ã walegen kilei, mata ubodõgouf nigin totol bagai arokeneik.
49004002	Ã wauĩ adok ukalaisileg fen, molol bagai ubodõgouf. Ã to feseg, wauĩ laa fiya bun abob nẽ morõ uteĩgouf.
49004003	Awa Uur maror bunem bagu yein anĩ uroug kafĩ walagauf nigin, kabĩ totol waleg.
49004004	Sain ã iweignein, ã wau iseya tekelei bun iweignein, age fiya gen, bouwa tekelei, Awa Uur tekelei,
49004005	Odug tekelei, momoiya tekelei, naan igũya tekelei,
49004006	Negur tekelei, ĩ ganan neid Temeid, ĩ ganan wal fiya, ĩ ganan atun, ĩ ganan namen ibodok.
49004007	Anĩ ere, ada mugu mugu wau ifenẽya, Kristus ege luwa ifenẽya nigin kisi fen kilei, ifanadan.
49004008	Negur nẽ Itotoya anĩ nigin eig ye irok, “Ĩ ilun iselen sain, ĩ tamo musei geif irou iselen, agef fen, ĩ tamo ege luwa ifenẽdin.”
49004009	(“Ĩ ilun iselen” ya nẽ gariya are ere? Anĩ nẽ gariya are, ĩ tenebur farumen bagai buneg isilen.
49004010	Ĩ isilen are, ĩ anĩ saa ilun ganan wal fiya iselen, are owõ ganan inolauf nigin age fen.)
49004011	Inim anĩ, tunĩ aposel kabĩ, tunĩ profet kabĩ, tunĩ soosi kabĩ, tunĩ pastor kabĩ ado tise kabĩ ifenẽdin,
49004012	are Negur nẽ tamo kayau, aruna yaleya kabĩ dalouf nigin dodok fedi di, Kristus nẽ bouwa odugouf nigin age fen.
49004013	Agef ile ile, ada ganan, momoiya tekelei ado Negur Naal nigin keleĩ tekelei bun tasi fen, tamo kisi feleya bagai wõ tau fen, Kristus nẽ kisi feleya bagai bun talauf.
49004014	Age tafouf, ada baban momou gen to tabodõf, maaĩ moloun wĩya gen to age ta fen, tai fiya ganan, tamo neid beugya ado, idegẽya tamo neid kisi anidim, yaum fũ fe di, aarau ilef isif fedig gen, to wewu fadauf.
49004015	Age fiya ban, ada wau laa fiya bun momoi anĩ wogõ tau fen, ereb ereb ganan bun Mudur ibodok bun biya daf iselauf, Mudur are Kristus.
49004016	Ĩ bunem, dirumunã ganan bouwa isenne ken, katokitĩ fe, bagu fele di, bouwa nẽ fara fiya mugu mugu yogon kabĩ yalef bunem, bouwa adok odug fen, wau laa fiya bun yogo inof.
49004017	Anĩ nigin, aya enei Odug bun totol bagai arokeneik, ã baban, haiden idi difaredig gen, kisi sã gen to ufaragauf.
49004018	Idi neid kisi gugum kel fen, Negur nẽ mata bun ibodõya ditoron, ere nigin, idi wedereid to fokõ ye fen, waud totolen.
49004019	Idi es fiya kisi ganan ditor ken, idi dogo bouweid adok sane bun difen ken, ereb ereb sane ganan, dogo nigin dogol, es fiya sã age difedig.
49004020	Anĩ ere, ã Kristus nigin naab anĩ bunem to kelein.
49004021	Momoi bagai, ã ĩ nigin karĩ gen ado, ĩ bun difelnein, are momoi Jesus bun ibodok anĩ kilei.
49004022	Ã uruwa ubodõgen, ãgenei oroya tubu, yogon idegẽya oroya bunem sane len anĩ, utorõg fen,
49004023	ãgenei kisi nẽ tobonunã bun mata wõg fen,
49004024	oroya mata, madur bagai ado momoi nẽ fateul bun Negur gen inon anĩ, ufonũgouf nigin difelnein.
49004025	Anĩ nigin, ã mugu mugu idegẽya utorõg fen, ã neĩ tã momoi nem urokenẽgouf, ere nigin, ada ganan bouwa tekelei nẽ tunĩ.
49004026	“Ãgenei seyeya bun, mosor to unog.” Ã wauĩ bun to seye yef ile, gaa kuru kalauf.
49004027	Agog fen, ã Satan nẽ modoũ taka to utoumkenẽgouf.
49004028	Aib ĩ bẽ ilenouf, baban to bẽ ilauf, anĩ ere, yogo imam ereb biya nigin kabĩ yale di, ĩ lau difef anidi ifenẽdiya nigin safina adouf.
49004029	Ãgenei eweĩ bun od sesen to wõ youf, anĩ ere, idi lau difef anidi fã de dalouf nigin isennẽya od anĩ dogol urõge di, idi karĩ def are isennẽdiyouf.
49004030	Negur nẽ Awa Uur Fateul to wau morõ wenẽg, ĩ bunem kel yaleya nẽ naa nigin uris ã bun inon.
49004031	Ereb ereb dirikeĩ ganan, didi fatuk iseya, seyeya, gurũya, dumen od irõya ado, ereb ereb sane ganan utorõg.
49004032	Abob el wiyẽg fen, abob nigin wauĩ yu ken, Negur ĩ Kristus bun ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kelen gen, abob nẽ mosor nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf.
49005001	Anĩ nigin, ã Negur gere tar oboi nigin, ĩ gen bagai ago gouf.
49005002	Kristus ada nigin wau laaf fen, ada nigin yogo bouwa ofa ado sesewi fiya sumeĩ biya gen Negur ifenen gen, wauĩ laa fiya bun agog ubodõgouf.
49005003	Anĩ ere, ã atun, naal bagai noli tobonunã be, ereb amuyẽ ado taka be, safina musei youf nigin ima su lai fe fen sũ we fiya taka to ibodõf, ere nigin, eneidi are Negur nẽ fateul tamo kayau bun to biya.
49005004	Takag, od sesen, neneya od be, od sane nem weli to unogouf, are ada nigin to biya, anĩ ere, de fiyẽya od wogõ gouf.
49005005	Ere nigin, ã momoi bagai enei keleĩ: Tamo noli tobonunã ado, amuyẽ ado be, safina musei youf nigin ima su lai fe fen sũ we fiya (tamo age fiya are idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya tamo), ĩ Kristus ado Negur nẽ tano bun akor to yalouf.
49005006	To lo ge di, taka nem od egem idegneĩf, ere nigin, age fediya bunem Negur nẽ didi, idi nokũ difef anidi bun isidig.
49005007	Anĩ nigin, idi geid to nigal ũgouf.
49005008	Ere nigin, ã uruwa bun gugum, anĩ ere, gama Odug bun ã lalan. Lalan nẽ gere tar gen agog ufareg.
49005009	Ere nigin, lalan nẽ faat are, biya fiya, madur bagai ado, momoi anĩ ganan bun ibodok.
49005010	Agog fen, ereb Odug wau al fouf anĩ keleĩ youf.
49005011	Ereb gugum bun tamal tobonunã faat biya sã anĩ geid to nigal ũgouf, anĩ ere, yaor wedigouf.
49005012	Ere nigin, ereb fe temeleid iminẽyan age difedig anĩ nigin irõya, areg mama ado.
49005013	Anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan lalan bun yaor fef, are yaoredig,
49005014	ere nigin, lalan anim age fe di, ereb ereb ganan yaoredig. Enei nigin wogõya eig yef, “Fã wale, mulaĩ tamal, laa bun tamal fã wo, ago di, Kristus õ bun fula fouf.”
49005015	Anĩ nigin, ãgenei ibodõya nigin el ge lo walagauf. Kisi sã gen to ufaragauf, anĩ ere, kisi biya ado gen ufaragauf.
49005016	Naa biya ã nigin wõ youf ganan to sekil gouf, ere nigin, naa are sane.
49005017	Anĩ nigin, to neneg, anĩ ere, Odug nẽ oroya naig fiya anĩ ã keleĩ youf.
49005018	Ã wain musei to wõ ge di, meleĩ waĩ youf, are bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya bun irouleyeĩf. Age fiya ban, Awa Uurem nameĩ isokosauf.
49005019	Od Negur nẽ Itotoya Sam bun ibodok, Negur yana yaleseya seg ado, uur nẽ seg bunem abob wogõ wiyẽgouf. Ãgenei wauĩ bun Odug bun seg waleg fen, kakũ gouf.
49005020	Sain ganan bun, Negur Tamada ereb ereb ganan nigin, neda Odug Jesus Kristus yana bun de wiyẽgouf.
49005021	Kristus anini wiyẽg fen, abob farumen ubodõg.
49005022	Kayau, ã Odug farumen ubodõgedig gen, aiweĩ tar farumen ubodõgouf.
49005023	Ere nigin, Kristus ĩ, sios nẽ mudur ibodok gen, tamo ĩ kayau nẽ mudur ibodok, agef fen, Kristus ĩ sios, yogon bouwa nẽ kel yaleya tamo.
49005024	Sios Kristus farumen ibodok gen, kayau idig ereb ereb ganan bun, dogo neid aiweid tar farumen dibodõf.
49005025	Tamo, Kristus sios nigin wau laaf fen, yogo bouwa ĩ nigin ifenen gen, aiweĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fouf.
49005026	Kristus ĩ anĩ age fen, are sios fateul ibodõf nigin od bunem naan nem fili youf nigin kulof fen,
49005027	are sios medeĩya bagai, diri sã, ifokoĩya be, ereb age fiya taka sã, anĩ ere, fateul fen bouwa od sã, yogo bun iroulauf nigin age fen.
49005028	Age fiya bagai, tamo dogo bouweid nigin waud laa fedig gen, aiweid tar nigin agef waud laa fouf. Aib ĩ aiwa nigin wau laa fef, are yogo nigin wau laa fef.
49005029	Aibem taka yogo bouwa to sane fiyẽdig, anĩ ere, ĩ ifout ken, kulatun fedig, Kristus sios nigin age fedig gen,
49005030	ere nigin, ada yogon bouwa nẽ tunĩ.
49005031	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Age fiya nigin, tamo ĩ yogon tama sina ado itorneĩd fen, yogon aiwa ado bagu difouf, age de fen, idi uruwom bouweid tekelei youf.”
49005032	Waa enei are, odug bagai, anĩ ere, aya Kristus ado sios nigin wogõ auf.
49005033	Anĩ ere, ã aug nigin wauĩ laa fedig gen, ã mugu mugu ãgenei kayau tar nigineg agog wauĩ laa fouf. Age fe di, kayau ĩ yogon tamo farumen ibodõf.
49006001	Kesu, Odug bun sineĩ temeĩ tar sigoreid dõ gouf, ere nigin, anĩ madur.
49006002	“Sinã tamã yeneid walesauf,” are ĩtãfiya matu promis ado bagu fen,
49006003	“anĩ bunem, õ ibodõya biya ile di, tenebur ein sain meluk ubodõf.”
49006004	Tama tar, gereneĩ tar waud saneya to wenẽdig, age fiya ban, Odug nẽ tai fiya ado ifelnẽya bunem lo wedigouf.
49006005	Ferfer, ã Kristus dõ gounẽ gen, tenebur ein ãgenei marau tamo, kumĩ ado aniniya ado, wauĩ adok bunem sigoreid dõ gouf.
49006006	Ã meleid yaleya bunem to sigoreid dõ gouf, anĩ ere, Kristus nẽ ferfer gen, Negur nẽ oroya, ãgenei wauĩ adok bunem ago gouf.
49006007	Ã Odug aruna walogounẽ gen, tamo nigin sã, wauĩ adok yen ken, aruneid walogouf,
49006008	ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ĩ ferfer be, kafĩ fiya sã, Odug ĩ mugu mugu ganan, ereb biya age difef anĩ kilei, mala solo ifenẽdiyouf.
49006009	Marau tamo ã, ãgenei ferfer naab de anĩ bunem el wedigouf. To kumĩya wenẽdig, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã ado idi nigin, ãgenei Marau saa ilun ibodok, ĩ bun taka nigin dogol anĩ, kinau ya sã.
49006010	Od idĩya nigin, Odug bun ado yogon megeir barikã bun, totol ufareg.
49006011	Negur nẽ kusĩ nẽ saki ganan waleg, naki weleg fen, Satan nẽ kisi, fe fiyẽya nigin, sã megeir ufaragauf.
49006012	Ere nigin, ada neda kusĩ are, bouwa ado naud nẽ oroya fe fiyẽya nigin sã, anĩ ere, uyu iroudiya, yeneid adodo, tenebur nẽ gugum nẽ megeir ado, saa ilun kaa sesen nẽ megeir nẽ totol fe fiyẽya nigin.
49006013	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ kusĩ nẽ saki ganan waleg, naki weleg, anĩ bunem, sesen nẽ naa wõ ye di, ã tutub yũ ifareya nigin kisi feleya, agog fen, ã ereb ereb ganan agog fen, ufaragauf.
49006014	Anĩ nigin, totol ufareg, momoi nẽ lũ luweĩ gug fen, madur bagai nẽ siot kapam akoreĩ dedeg,
49006015	agog fen, ãgenei yeĩ bun su ufonũg fen, maror nẽ biya od wogõya nigin dodok fiya saika ufaragauf.
49006016	Enei ganan bun tobol fe fen, momoiya nẽ makanam waleg, anĩ bunem, ã sesen nẽ magir yã bale ado isif anĩ ganan, sã gare walagauf.
49006017	Agog fen, kel yaleya nẽ hat kapa ado Awa Uur nẽ dimig, are Negur nẽ od, anĩ waleg.
49006018	Kosẽya ado to fiya ganan bun, sain ganan Awa Uur bun kosẽ gouf. Enei kisi bun unog fen, saika ge fen, sain ganan Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin kosẽ gouf.
49006019	Aya nigineg kosẽ gouf, are sain aya od arõf bun ganan, Negurem od ifana fen, aya kumĩ sã biya od nẽ waa anĩ wogõ auf nigin ago gouf.
49006020	Biya od enei nigin, aya soosi tamo wõ au fen, kalabus bun abodok. Aya to kumĩ au fen, biya od sã kurõ afalaisiyouf nigin kosẽg.
49006021	Tikikus, turau oboiyou fen Odug bun kabĩ tamo dõ fiya biya, ĩ ereb ereb ganan irokeneĩf, age fe di, ãg, aya naig be afef ado aya ere kabĩ alef anĩ, keleĩ youf.
49006022	Aya, ĩ, gariya enei nigin bagai ã gein sur afef, are ã amã naig be fiya mabodok anĩ keleĩ youf nigin ado, ĩ ãgenei wauĩ megeir fouf nigin.
49006023	Tamada Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, turau tar, wau inosiya ã bun ibodõf, agef fen, wau laa fiya momoiya ado ã bun isiyouf.
49006024	Idi, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nigin waud laaf fen, waud laa fiya anĩ to folõ difeledig anidi ganan bun, wau ifenẽya ibodõf.
50001001	Pol ado Timoti, Kristus Jesus nẽ ferfer, Filipai oun Kristus Jesus bun Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan ado, uyu iroudiya ado uyu iroudiya farumen sios kabĩ daledig anidi bun pas enei matotof.
50001002	Neda Tamada Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun ibodõf.
50001003	Sain aya ã nigin karĩ aulef ganan bun, aya neu Negur de afiyẽdig.
50001004	Ã ganan nigin neu kosẽya ganan bun, aya sain ganan bun wau kulĩya ado kosẽ audig,
50001005	ere nigin, ã gariya bunem biya od nigin, amã geid uyu kũ ta tasin isi, gama sain enei bun.
50001006	Aya enei nigin momoi auf, are taka ĩ ã namein kabĩ biya gariya inon are, tokõ fel ile, Kristus Jesus nẽ naa bun idikalauf.
50001007	Aya ã ganan nigin eig afe kisi afef, are tutuk, ere nigin, ã neu wau bun ufaregef, ere nigin, aya kalabus bun be abodok, biya od asen ken, kurõ afeis fen megeir afef bun, ã ganan Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bun, aya geid tabodõgedig.
50001008	Kristus Jesus nẽ wau laa fiya bunem, aya ã ganan nigin wau naig be fe laa fedig, are Negur ĩ keleĩ.
50001009	Enei nigin aya kosẽ auf, are ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya anĩ, keleĩ ado es fiya kisi ganan bun, odugef ilauf,
50001010	anĩ bunem, ã ereb biya bagai ya es fiya kelei ken, ã karẽtut fen, od sã ubodõgef uleg, Kristus nẽ naa bun wõ gouf,
50001011	ago ge di, madur bagai nẽ faat Jesus Kristus bunem isif anĩ, ã bun barikãf, anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ fula fiya medeĩya ado yana yaleseya yalouf.
50001012	Turau tar, gama aya ã enei keleĩ youf anĩ orouf, ereb aya bun wõ yen anim, biya od el fe isennẽ di, fou yelen.
50001013	Anĩ bunem, Sisa nẽ fõ lo fiya tamo ganan ado tamo kayau ganan idi, aya Kristus nigin kalabus bun abodok ya anĩ keleĩ.
50001014	Aya kalabus bun abodok anĩ bunem, neu turau tar musei ganan, Odug bun dibodok idi, Negur nẽ od nigin, totol ado kumĩ sã, wogõ douf nigin waud yalesen.
50001015	Momoi, tunĩ kiyeĩ ado kiwai bunem Kristus nigin wogõ dedig, anĩ ere, tunĩ kisi biya bunem age difedig.
50001016	Idi kisi biya bunem age difedig anidi, wau laa fiya bunem age difedig, are aya biya od asennen bunem kalabus bun abodok anĩ idi keleĩ.
50001017	Idi kiyeĩ ado kiwai bunem age difedig anidi, kisi karẽtut ban, dogo yeneid nigin de fen, Kristus nigin wogõ def, are sain aya kalabus bun abod mog, morõ aya bun tobol fiya nigin de fen age difedig.
50001018	Anĩ ere, ere naig fouf? Ereb odug bagai are, naab ganan bun, kisi kũ fenẽya bunem be, kisi tutuk bunem age difef, are Kristus nigin wogõ def. Anĩ age dife di, aya wau al fef. Momoi, aya neu wau al fiya tokõ afalauf,
50001019	ere nigin, aya keleĩ, ãgenei kosẽya bunem ado Jesus Kristus nẽ Awa Uurem isennẽya bunem, ereb aya bun wõ yen anim, aya kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnauf.
50001020	Aya totol bagai kisi afe fen, wau irok, are aya naab taka bunem to mama fiyauf, anĩ ere, aya kumĩ sã totol barikã ano di, Kristus ĩ, sain ganan age fedig gen, gamag neu bouwau bun, mata ibodõya bun be laa buneg, yana ilun iselauf.
50001021	Ere nigin, aya bun, mata ibodõyauf are Kristus nigin, laa fiyauf areg aya biya alouf.
50001022	Aya fau bouwau bun mata abodok alauf are, aya faat biya yũf nigin kabĩ alouf. Anĩ ere, ere anĩ aya dõ afouf? Aya keleĩ sã!
50001023	Aya uru anidim si sitakã dĩ difiyaf. Aya ile, Kristus ado ibodõya nigin orouf, are gai biya bagai,
50001024	anĩ ere, aya bouwau mata ibodõf are, ã nigin biya bagai youf.
50001025	Aya enei nigin momoi bagai au fen, aya keleĩ, aya fau abodõf, age afe fen, aya, ãgenei momoiya biya ilauf nigin ado ã momoiya bun wauĩ kulĩ youf nigin, ã ganan geid tabodõf.
50001026	Age fe di, aya ã geid baban tabodõf anĩ bunem, aya bunem, ãgenei wauĩ kulĩya Kristus Jesus nigin ise gogũ fouf.
50001027	Ereb wõ youf, Kristus nẽ biya od kisin bagai ereb ereb ago gouf. Anĩ bunem, aya asi ã ailiyeĩf be, aya ã atun ibodõya sa ken karĩ be dogol auf, aya keleĩ youf, are ã uur tekelei bun totol ufareg fen, biya od nẽ momoiya nigin tamo tekelei gen, bagug fen, kabĩ totol walogouf.
50001028	Idi naab fire fire bunem, kiwai difeneĩf anidi nigin, ã kumĩ sã ufaragauf. Are idi bun, idi daũ feidlauf anĩ nẽ uris, anĩ ere, ã bun, Negurem ã kel yaleyeĩf anĩ nẽ uris.
50001029	Ere nigin, ã Kristus nigin momoi gouf nigin dogol, Kristus aruna yaleya nẽ el fiya to ifenein, anĩ ere, ã ĩ nigin daraug walogouf nigin ifenein.
50001030	Ã aya kusĩ aun ulegen, gamag fau kusĩ auf karĩ gef anĩ, ãg ago gef.
50002001	Anĩ nigin, ã Kristus bun wauĩ yaleseya adouf are, Kristus nẽ wau laa fiya bunem wauĩ yo fiya adouf are, Awa Uur geid nigal yũya adouf are, molol ado wauĩ yũya adouf are,
50002002	neu wau kulĩya anĩ, wauĩ tekelei, wauĩ laa fiya tekelei, uur ado kisi bun tekelei bunem tobol ge di, neu wau kulĩya barikãf.
50002003	Aug nigin dogol be, ege yeneĩ yaleseya bunem ereb taka to ago gouf, anĩ ere, wauĩ yukesileya bun, ã aug nigin kisi gef anĩ wal fiya, taka nigin agog kisi gouf.
50002004	Ã mugu mugu ãgenei biya fiya nigin dogol to kisi gouf, anĩ ere, tunĩ neid biya fiya nigineg kisi gouf.
50002005	Ãgenei tobonuneĩ, Kristus Jesus nẽ ado tekelei youf:
50002006	Ĩ yogo Negur bagai, anĩ ere, ĩ Negur gen ibodõya anĩ itoron,
50002007	anĩ ere, ĩ yogon kisi ganan yukalaisil fen, ferfer gen ibod ken, tamo bagai gen wõ yen.
50002008	Agef fen, tamo bagai gen wõ ye mog, dilen. Ĩ yogo wau yukesil fen, laa nigineg sigor dõ fen, agef fen, aa tetek buneg laa fen!
50002009	Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ ilun bagai yaleselne ken, ĩ yana, yana ganan wal fiya anĩ ifenen.
50002010	Age fe di, Jesus yana anĩ bun, iboreid ganan bobou difouf, saa ilun ado, tenebur ado, teneub farumeneg.
50002011	Age de fen, sigoreid ganan kurõ difalaisi, Jesus Kristus ĩ Odug de fen, Tama Negur fula fiya medeĩya difenẽf.
50002012	Anĩ nigin, neu oboiyou tar, aya malau bun dogol sã, anĩ ere, fatuk bagai aya ã geid to tabodok buneg, ã gai dõ gedig gen, ãgenei kel yaleya nigin, kumĩ ado tererẽya bunem, kabĩ totol walogouf,
50002013	ere nigin, Negur nẽ kisi biya kilei, ã kisig fen, dõ gouf nigin, Negur ĩ ã namein kabĩ yaledig.
50002014	Ereb ereb ganan, nauseirya sã, monẽya sã bunem, ago gouf,
50002015	ago ge di, ã bouweĩ od sa ken, karẽtut bagai, tenebur tamo kayau waud gogileya ado sane atun, Negur gere tar kũ fenẽya sã wowã gouf, ã idi atun owõbẽ barisa gegen fula gouf.
50002016	Mata ifenẽya nẽ od uroug kafĩ walagauf, ago ge di, aya Kristus nẽ naa bun, aya ege to gudu raun be kabĩ alen anĩ nigin, yanau alesauf.
50002017	Anĩ ere, aya, ãgenei momoiya anĩ nẽ sesewi fiya ado aruna yaleya bun, wain ofa gen, naudou fi falaufeg, aya wau al fe fen, ã ganan geid wauda kulĩ youf.
50002018	Anĩ nigin, ãg wauĩ al fe fen, aya geid wauda kulĩ youf.
50002019	Odug Jesus bun, aya Timoti ã bun kaisã bagai sur fiya nigin, wau isef, are aya ã nigin od ale fen, ayag wau al fouf nigin age afef.
50002020	Aya ein, aib taka ĩ gen, ãgenei biya fiya nigin wau fãya anĩ to ailen.
50002021	Ere nigin, ganan dogo nigin dogol kisi difedig, Jesus Kristus nẽ biya fiya nigin to kisi difedig.
50002022	Anĩ ere, ã keleĩ, Timoti ĩ yogo nigin yaor fen, ere nigin, ĩ aya urom, kesu yogon tama ado gen, biya od nigin kabĩ malen.
50002023	Anĩ nigin, aya bun ereb ereb naig fe wõ youf anĩ ail fen, ĩ ã bun kaisã bagai sur fiya nigin, wau irok.
50002024	Age afe fen, aya Odug bun momoi auf, aya yug kaisã bagai asiyouf.
50002025	Anĩ ere, aya kisi afef, aya Epafroditus ã gein baban sur afiyẽf are deuf auf, ĩ neu turau, neu kabĩ turau ado, kusĩ tamo turau, ĩg ãgenei soosi tamo, ĩ ereb aya lau afef anĩ kulatun fiyauf nigin sur wiyẽgen anĩ.
50002026	Ĩ ã ganan ileyeĩya nigin wau fatuk bagai irok, agef fen, ĩ dagi ado ya anĩ karĩ gen bunem wau morõ ado.
50002027	Momoi ĩ dagi fen, laaf genen. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ nigin wau yun, ĩ nigin dogol sã, aya nigineg wau yu ken, aya wau gudũ fiya teten, wau gudũ fiya baban to alouf nigin age fen.
50002028	Anĩ nigin, aya ĩ sur fiyẽya nigin wau totol bagai irok, age afe di, sain ã ĩ baban uleg fen, wauĩ al fe di, aya wau morõ are wau warasa youf.
50002029	Ã Odug bun wauĩ al fiya odug bunem aan wiyẽgouf, agog fen, tamo ĩ gen yeneid walesagauf,
50002030	ere nigin, ĩ Kristus nẽ kabĩ nigin laaf genen, ĩ ã aya isennẽya ifanaya kisi feleya sã anĩ, aya ifanauf nigin, yogon bou itoron.
50003001	Od idĩya nigin, neu turau tar, Odug bun wauĩ kulĩ ye! Aya ã bun de tekelei enei baban itotoya nigin morõ sã. Are ã kulatun yeĩya nigin, age afef.
50003002	Gaũ anidi nigin lo walagauf, tamo idi sane age difedig, idi mulũ ileya nigin bouweid gudũ difedig anidi.
50003003	Ere nigin, ada anĩ mulũ telen, ada anĩ Negur nẽ Awa Uur bunem Negur yana talesedig, ada anĩ Kristus Jesus nigin yanada talesedig, age ta fen, ada bouwa nẽ oroya nigin to momoi taudig.
50003004	Anĩ ere, aya yug bouwa nẽ oroya bun yanau yaleseya nigin gariya ado. Aib taka ĩ bouwa nẽ oroya bun yana yaleseya nigin gariya ado youf, aya ĩ wal fiya.
50003005	Naa eit bun aya mulũ elen, aya Israel tamo, Benjamin nẽ ibor bun tamal, Hibru tamo bagai, aya lo bunem Farisia tamal,
50003006	aya Negur nigin au fen, kabĩ totol aledig, age afe fen, sios darau afenẽdidig, lo dõ fiya bunem madur bagai wõya nigineg, aya bouwau bun od sã.
50003007	Anĩ ere, ereb ereb anĩ ganan aya isennauf aun are, Kristus nigin au fen, atoron.
50003008	Anĩ dogol sã, neu Odug Kristus Jesus nigin keleĩya anĩ, ereb ereb ganan wal feid fen, odug bagai nigin, aya ereb ereb ganan are ege auf. Aya ĩ nigin ereb ereb ganan ator ken, sisik gen kisi afef, are aya Kristus anĩ ale fen,
50003009	ĩ ado bagu mafouf nigin age afen. Neu madur bagai aya bun ibodok are, lo bunem isiya sã, anĩ ere, madur bagai Kristus nigin momoiya bunem isif, are madur bagai Negur bun tamal momoiya bunem isif.
50003010	Aya, Kristus nigin, yogon mata kel fãya nẽ megeir nigin ado, yogon darau bun ifareya nigin kelei ken, yogon laa bun ĩ gen wõ auf nigin orouf,
50003011	are aya laa bun tamal kel fãya anĩ alouf nigin age afef.
50003012	Aya enei ganan mogo alen be, kisi feleya bagai wõ aun gen to kisi afef, anĩ ere, aya, ereb aya yaleya nigin Kristus Jesus igirnan anĩ, yaleya nigin totol bagai gudu rauf.
50003013	Turau tar, aya anĩ mogo alen to auf. Anĩ ere, ereb aya age afef are, ereb aya dudum afen are wederou tu kel fen, ereb malabag ifaref anĩ bun gudu rauf.
50003014	Aya, mala solo Negurem saa ilunem Kristus Jesus bun iweignan anĩ, alouf nigin daũ bun gudu rauf.
50003015	Ada atĩya wõ taun ganan, eig ya dogol kisi tafouf. Ã kisi tunĩ nigin fire kisi gouf, areg Negur ã bun yaor fouf.
50003016	Anĩ ere, ereb ada mogo talen anĩ dõ tafouf.
50003017	Turau tar, ã tunĩ geid bagug fen, aya dõ wiyagauf, agog fen, ã, idi amã tobonunã mafelnein bun difaref anidi dõ wedigouf.
50003018	Ere nigin, aya mogo sain musei arokeneik asin anĩ, gama baban maru isi fen arokeneik, musei idi Kristus nẽ aa tetek nigin kiwai dibodok.
50003019	Idi neid idikeleya are daũ feleya bun, idi neid waitou are dogo neid naumeid, agef fen, dogo neid fula fiya are dogo neid mama bun ibodok. Dogo neid kisi are tenebur nẽ safina bun ibodok.
50003020	Anĩ ere, ada neda ibodõya modoũ are, saa ilun ibodok. Agef fen, ada kel yaleya tamo Odug Jesus Kristus an tamal fatuk bagai tari tafef.
50003021	Kristus ĩ, ereb ereb ganan ĩ farumen irouleya nẽ megeir bunem, ada bouwada tenebur nẽ enei falei fele di, ĩ yogon bouwa fula fiya medeĩya gen wõ douf.
50004001	Anĩ nigin, neu turau tar, aya ã nigin wau laaf fen, kisi totol anodig, ã neu wau kulĩya ado teter. Neu oboiyou tar, ã Odug bun agog ufareg, megeir lauf.
50004002	Aya Yuodia õ agonok, Sintike õg agonok, ã Odug bun wauĩ tekelei youf.
50004003	Kabĩ turau bagai, aya õ arokonok, kayau eneidi biya od nigin aya isennaya nigin kabĩ totol daledig anidi usenneĩd fen, Klemen ado neu kabĩ turau tar ganan, dogo neid yeneid mata ibodõya nẽ buk bun ifaref anidig, usennẽdiyouf.
50004004	Sain ganan Odug bun wauĩ kulĩ youf. Aya baban arokeneik: Wauĩ kulĩ ye!
50004005	Ãgenei molol anĩ tamo ganan bun yaor gouf. Odug ĩ mogo melsak.
50004006	Ã ereb taka nigin to suwẽ gouf, anĩ ere, ereb ereb ganan bun, kosẽya ado to fiya bunem, Negur de wiyẽg fen, ãgenei to fiya Negur bun unogouf.
50004007	Ago ge di, Negur nẽ wau inosiya tamo nẽ karĩya ganan wal fiya anim, Kristus Jesus bun, ãgenei wauĩ ado ãgenei kisi kulatun fediyouf.
50004008	Od idĩya nigin, turau tar, ereb momoi anĩ, ereb biya anĩ, ereb madur anĩ, ereb karẽtut anĩ, ereb wau laa fiya nẽ anĩ, ereb yana iseleya nẽ anĩ, ereb taka biya bagai fen, yana iseleya nẽ bagai anĩ, ereb ereb age fiya nigin kisi gouf.
50004009	Ereb aya bunem ã kelein, walegen, karĩ gen be, aya bun ulegen anĩ, agog dõ gouf. Ago ge di, wau inosiya nẽ Negur, ã geid ibodõf.
50004010	Gama ã aya isennaya nigin baban kisi fã yen nigin, aya Odug bun fatuk bagai wau kulĩ yef. Momoi, ã aya isennaya nigin kisi gen, anĩ ere, ã anĩ yaor fiya nigin naab taka to wõ yen.
50004011	Aya ereb lau afef nigin, enei to orok, ere nigin, sain naig be fe isiyoufeg, aya wau inois ibodõya nigin kelein.
50004012	Aya maleg bun ibodõya are aya keleĩ, aya safina ado ibodõyag aya keleĩ. Nain be, ereb sain naig be fe wõ youf bun, aya nameu isokosauf be, naũ abodõf, aya safina musei ado be, aya safina naal bagai adoufeg, aya wau inois ibodõya nẽ waa are aya kelein.
50004013	Aya ereb ereb ganan, ĩ aya megeir ifanadig bunem, sã age afouf.
50004014	Anĩ ere, aya neu morõ bun isennaya nigin kisi gen are, ã biya ago gen.
50004015	Filipai tamo kayau ã gai keleĩ bagai, aya Masedonia provins ator ken, asi, biya od uyulil wogõ ayein sain bun, sios takam safina yaleya bun be, ifenẽya bun to isennan, ãgem dogol.
50004016	Sain aya Tesalonika taun abodoneg, ã safina aya isennẽya nigin aya lau afe mog, baba baban sur wanagen.
50004017	Aya safina ege luwa yaleya nigin to kisi afef, anĩ ere, aya ãgenei dumen mala solo biya walogouf nigin kisi afef.
50004018	Aya ereb ereb ganan kisi feleya ale fen, anĩ wal fiyag alen. Aya fatuk bagai wanagen, gama aya Epafroditus bunem safina fire fire ege luwa sur gen anĩ alen. Anĩ ganan are, sesewi fiya sumeĩ biya ado anĩ, Negur wau al fiya ado yalouf.
50004019	Agef fen, neu Negur ĩ, Kristus Jesus bun, yogon kisi feleya fula fiya medeĩya barikã bunem, ãgenei lau gef ganan ifeneĩf.
50004020	Neda Tamada Negur bun fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
50004021	Kristus Jesus bun Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan aan wiyẽdigouf. Turau tar aya geid mafaref anidim aanya sur difef.
50004022	Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan, ã bun aanya sur difef, idi atun, idi Sisa nẽ ibor bun kabĩ daledig anidim bagai anĩ, ã bun aanya sur difef.
50004023	Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ãgenei uur bun ibodõf. Momoi.
51001001	Aya Pol, Negur nẽ oroya bunem Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun ado, neda turada Timoti adom,
51001002	oun Kolosi taun, Negur nẽ fateul tamo kayau, Kristus bun momoiya turamã tar bun pas enei matotkeneik. Wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, Tamada Negur bunem ã bun ibodõf.
51001003	Sain amã ã nigin kosẽ mauf bun, amã faimud neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Tama, Negur de mafiyẽdig,
51001004	ere nigin, amã Kristus Jesus bun ãgenei momoiya ado, ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin wauĩ laa fiya anĩ karĩ maun.
51001005	Ã mogo momoi nẽ od, biya od ã bun isin anĩ karĩg fen, ereb ã nigin saa ilun inon nigin wauĩ ise fen, momoiya ado wauĩ laa fiya anĩ wõ yen.
51001006	Sain ã biya od anĩ karĩg fen, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya momoi bagai kelein sain anĩ bunem ilauf ganan, biya od anĩ ã atun age fen gen, teneub ganan bun, biya od enei faat yu ken, odugef.
51001007	Ã, nemã oboimã ferfer turamã Epafras bun keleĩ anĩ walegen, ĩ amã nawamã yaleya, Kristus nẽ kabĩ tamo dõ fiya biya,
51001008	agef fen, inimeg ãgenei Awa Uur bun wauĩ laa fiya nigin irokanaman.
51001009	Age fiya nigin, sain amã ã nigin karĩ maun bunem isif ganan, amã ã nigin Negur kosẽ mafiye ken, uur nẽ kisi biya ado kisi fokõya ganan bunem Negur nẽ oroya nigin keleĩ aura yeĩf nigin to fiyẽya to matorõdig.
51001010	Age mafe fen, amã, ã Odug nẽ oroya bun ubodõg fen, ereb ereb ganan bun Odug wau al fouf nẽ anĩ ago gouf nigin kosẽ maudig: faat biya kabĩ biya ganan bun yũf nigin, Negur nigin keleĩ, ã bun odugouf nigin,
51001011	yogon fula fiya medeĩya nẽ megeir bunem megeir ganan ifeneĩ di, ã ereb ereb ganan bun, feseya sã megeir bagai ufaragauf nigin, agef fen, wauĩ kulĩya ado,
51001012	Tamada ĩ, ã lalan nẽ tano bun Negur nẽ tamo kayau neid akor weim walogouf nigin age fen anĩ, de wiyẽgouf nigin kosẽ maudig.
51001013	Ere nigin, ĩ ada gugum nẽ megeir bun yalelnada fen, in Naal Negurem ĩ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ nẽ tano bun gei fada irou isidan.
51001014	Ĩ Naal bun ada kel yaledan, neda mosor nigin weder tu kelen.
51001015	Kristus ĩ, Negur ada to tailef anĩ nẽ malakanon, ĩ Negur nẽ kesu matu, ereb ereb inodin ganan anĩ nẽ mudur inenen.
51001016	Are, Kristus ĩ bunem ereb ereb ganan inodin, ereb ereb saa ilun ifaredif ado tenebur ein ifaredif, ereb ereb tailef ado to tailef, king, megeir, uyu iroudiya be, yeneid adodo; ereb ereb ganan Kristus bunem Kristus nigin ye fen, inodin.
51001017	Kristus ĩ ereb ereb ganan wõya sã mog, ibodon, agef fen, ĩ bun ereb ereb ganan ifaref.
51001018	Ĩ bouwa are sios, ĩ yogo anĩ nẽ mudur. Ĩ gariya, tamo gare den bun tamal uyulil kel fã yen, are ereb ereb ganan bun ĩ mudur ibodõf nigin age fen.
51001019	Negur ĩ yogon kisi feleya bagai anĩ ganan, Kristus bun ibodõf nigin oro fen,
51001020	ĩ Kristus nẽ naud aa tetek bun fi felen anĩ bunem maror ino fen, Kristus bunem ereb ereb ganan tenebur ifaredif be, saa ilun ifaredif, ĩ geid komo difouf nigin oron.
51001021	Uruwa bun, ã Negur nigin gerõ ufareg fen, ãgenei tobonunã sane bunem, ãgenei kisi bun Negur nigin kiwai ubodõgen.
51001022	Anĩ ere gama, Negur ĩ, Kristus nẽ bouwam laa bunem, yogon lo fiya bun ã fateul, amuyẽ sã, od sã ineneĩf nigin ĩ geid komo yein.
51001023	Ã ãgenei momoiya tobol ge fen, feseya sã totol ufareg fen, biya od karĩ gen sain bun wauĩ iseya walegen anĩ bun to ulegef usigef gouf are, agog wõ gouf. Biya od enei are, ereb ereb ganan saa farumen ifaref anidi bun kurõ fesin, agef fen, aya Pol biya od anĩ nẽ kabĩ tamo wõ aun.
51001024	Gama aya ã nigin darau alef anĩ nigin wau al fef, age afe fen, Kristus ĩ yogon bouwa sios nigin darau yalen bun fau to kisi felef anĩ kisi falauf nigin, aya bouwaum darau anĩ ale di, kisi falauf.
51001025	Aya Negur nẽ od anĩ kisi feleya bagai afeneĩf nigin, Negur kabĩ ifanan anĩ nẽ kabĩ tamo wõ aun.
51001026	Negur nẽ od are ĩ waa, kulunem ibor isin ganan bun iminẽyan ibodon anĩ, gama Negur nẽ momoiya tamo kayau bun yaor fen.
51001027	Negur nẽ tamo kayau bun, Negurem waa enei nẽ fula fiya medeĩya barikã anĩ naig be fiya anĩ, haiden atun yaor fouf nigin wau iron, waa are Kristus ã namein ibodok, anĩ nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin wau iseya anĩ.
51001028	Amã ĩ nigin kurõ mafalaisi, tamo kayau ganan wedereid maroud fen, kisi biya ganan bun, tamo kayau ganan mafelnẽdidig, are amã tamo kayau ganan Kristus bun, kisi feleya bagai manenẽdiyouf nigin age mafef.
51001029	Enei kisi falauf nigin, aya kabĩ totol alef, yogon megeir aya nameun ibod ken, kabĩ totol yalef anim aya gunĩ auf.
51002001	Aya ã nigin, idi Laodisia taun difaref anidi nigin ado, idi aya to bagai dileyaf anidi ganan nigin, naig afe gunĩ auf anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin orouf.
51002002	Neu kisi bagai are, idi waud alese di, wau laa fiya bunem waud katõ difouf, age fe di, idi kisi fokõ feleya nigin keleĩ barikãf, anĩ bunem, idi Negur nẽ waa keleĩ youf, are Kristus.
51002003	Ĩ bun kisi biya ado keleĩ nẽ safina biya ganan inokon ibodok.
51002004	Aya taka nem meleĩ yaleya od biyai biyai bunem to idegneĩf nigin enei arokeneik.
51002005	Momoi, aya bouwaum ã geid to tabodok, anĩ ere, aya uur bun ã geid tabod ken, ã naig be ge tutuk ufareg fen, ãgenei Kristus bun momoiya naig be fe megeir ifaref anĩ, ileya nigin wau irok.
51002006	Ã Kristus Jesus ãgenei Odug walegen, anĩ nigin, ã ĩ bun mata ubodõgouf.
51002007	Ĩ bun warei urarãg fen, fõ kare gen walesagauf, ã difelnein kilei, ãgenei momoiya bun megeir ge fen, de fiyẽya anĩ ã bun ise gogũ fouf.
51002008	Taka nem ã, tamo nẽ idegẽya keleĩ kaũ sã bunem to gurar yeĩ irouleyeĩf nigin lo walagauf, are Kristus dõ fiya ban, tamo nẽ tobonunã ado tenebur enei nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya nigin.
51002009	Ere nigin, Kristus bun Negur nẽ kisi feleya bagai ganan bouwa bun ibodok.
51002010	Agef fen, ã Kristus bun kisi feleya bagai ifenein, Kristus ĩ megeir ganan ado yeneid adodo ganan neid mudur.
51002011	Ĩ bun ãg mulũ ulegen, are tamo imam mulũ bun ineneĩya sã, anĩ ere, mosor nẽ oroya yaleleya nigin, Kristusem mulũ bun inenein.
51002012	Ã, ĩ geid naan yaleya bun mũ yei ken, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal Kristus kel turĩ fiyen anĩ nẽ megeir bun, ãgenei momoiya bunem ĩ geid kel turĩ yein.
51002013	Sain ã, ãgenei mosor nigin ado ãgenei mosor nẽ oroya nigin mulũ ileya sã nigin, laa bun ufareg mog, Negur ĩ, ã Kristus geid kel turĩ yein. Ĩ neda mosor adok nigin weder tu kelen.
51002014	Ĩ lo nẽ ĩtãfiya itotoya, are ada weteda kiwai ibodon anĩ isasalen, ĩ anĩ yalel fen, aa tetek bun yun.
51002015	Agef fen, ĩ, megeir adodo yeneid adodo neid totol ganan, ye farumen gõ fel fen, Kristus nẽ aa tetek bunem kusĩ bun idi wal fedin anĩ dilouf nigin, ganan meleid bun yaor fen.
51002016	Anĩ nigin, ã saaf be naan wãgauf, uub sifa naa fire fire be, ogõ mata sigigi fiya naa be, Sabat naa to dõ gouf bun, taka nem to es yeĩf.
51002017	Eneidi are, ereb fau isiyouf nẽ malakanon. Anĩ ere, ereb momoi bagai are Kristus bun fotou fiyauf.
51002018	Aib taka ĩ, mala yaleya nigin wau yukesileya ado engel yeneid yaleseya nigin wau al fef anim, ã mala solo walogouf anĩ to wal yeĩf. Tamo age fiya ĩ ereb ilen anĩ nigin nenerĩ meluk dir fe fen, yogon bouwa nẽ oroya anim, gariya sã fagã yedig.
51002019	Ĩ bouwa nẽ mudur Kristus anĩ folõ fel fen ifaren, mudur are Kristus, ĩ bunem bouwa ganan tuwa katõ fiya ado dirumunã anidim disennẽ di, katõ fel ifar fen, Negur yogo age fe di, odugedig.
51002020	Ã Kristus geid tenebur enei nẽ tobonunã bun laa yein, age fiyauf are, ere nigin anĩ ã fau anĩ nẽ gen ufareg fen, yogon ĩtãfiya eig fiya farumen ufaregef,
51002021	“Ã to uroug! Ã to kobũg uleg! Ã to dorõg uleg!”?
51002022	Enei ganan are, kabĩ wenẽge di, sa kalauf, ere nigin, idi tamo nẽ ĩtãfiya ado tai fiya dogol.
51002023	Momoi, ĩtãfiya age age fediya are, dogo neid kisim seli kulõ fiya, dogo neid idegẽya waud yukesileya ado, dogo neid bouweid kafĩ fiya ifenẽya bun, kisi biya gen ulegedig, anĩ ere, idi bouwa nẽ oroya lai fesileya nigin kisi feleya sã.
51003001	Age fiya nigin, ã mogo Kristus geid keg fã gen nigin, ãgenei wauĩ ereb ereb ilun nẽ nigin, Kristus Negur ima biyalẽ ibodok nẽ an, unogouf.
51003002	Ãgenei kisi ereb ereb ilun nẽ nigin unogouf, ereb ereb tenebur nẽ nigin sã.
51003003	Ere nigin, ã gareg fen, ãgenei mata gama Kristus geid Negur bun inokon.
51003004	Kristus ĩ ãgenei mata, ĩ wõ youf sain bun, ãg ĩ geid fula fiya medeĩya bun wõ gouf.
51003005	Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb ãgenei tenebur nẽ oroya nẽ anĩ udenkesig: noli tobonunã, amuyẽ tobonunã, noli kisi, oroya sesen ado, safina musei youf nigin ima su lai fe fen sũ we fiya (are idegẽya waitou seli yabiya).
51003006	Eig fediya nigin, Negur nẽ didi isif.
51003007	Ã uruwa ubodõgen, naab enei bun uyõgen.
51003008	Anĩ ere, ã gama naab eig fediya, wau saneya, didi iseya, tobonunã sesen inoya, dumen od irõya ado, sigoreĩ bun od sesen wogõya, anĩ ganan utorõgouf.
51003009	Ã abob to udegnẽgouf, ere nigin, ãgenei bouweĩ nẽ oroya tubu yogon tobonunã ado uraileg fen,
51003010	oroya mata ufonũgen, are Negur nẽ malakanon nigin keleĩ bun mata falei yeĩdig.
51003011	Ein baban, Grik tamo be Juda tamo, mulũ ileya be mulũ ileya sã, yaũ tamo be tamo kuĩ gen, ferfer be kafĩ fiya sã tamo gen, fire fire to ibodok, anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ anĩ ganan, ĩ ganan anĩ namedin ibodok.
51003012	Anĩ nigin, ã tamo kayau Negurem igirnein, fateul ado Negur nẽ oboi tar nigin, wau yũya, tobonunã biya, wau yukesileya, molol ado, kaisã to seyeya anĩ ufonũgouf.
51003013	Molol ufareg fen, abob nigin morõ faali gouf, agog fen, ã atun abob ereb morõ ibodõf anĩ nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf. Odug ãgenei mosor nigin weder tu kelen gen, ãg mosor nigin wedereĩ tu kalauf.
51003014	Agog fen, enei ganan teten, wauĩ laa fiya ufonũgouf, anim ereb ereb ganan tekelei guf irouwauf.
51003015	Kristus nẽ wau inosiya ãgenei wauĩ bun utorõg len, ulum irouwauf, ere nigin, ã bouwa tekelei bun wau inosiya bun iweignein. Agog fen, Negur de wiyẽgouf.
51003016	Utorõg len, Kristus nẽ od fatuk bagai ã namein ibodõ di, ã kisi biya ganan bunem abob ufelnẽdig fen, abob weder urougauf, agog fen, od Negur nẽ Itotoya Sam bun ibodok, Negur yana yaleseya seg ado, uur nẽ seg, ãgenei wauĩ bun Negur de fiyẽya ado walogouf.
51003017	Agog fen, ereb ã ago gef, od bun be kabĩ yaleya bun, anĩ ganan Odug Jesus yana bun agog fen, ĩ bunem Dei Negur de wiyẽgouf.
51003018	Kayau, ãgenei tamo farumen ubodõgouf, are Odug nẽ lo fiya bun biya bagai.
51003019	Tamo, ãgenei aiweĩ tar nigin wauĩ laaf fen, idi waud morõ to wenẽdigouf.
51003020	Kesu, ã ereb ereb ganan bun sineĩ temeĩ tar sigoreid dõ gouf, anim Odug wau al fouf.
51003021	Tama, ã gereneĩ tar to waud saneya wenẽdigouf, ago gouf, idi agogon de fen, waud to al fouf.
51003022	Ferfer, ã ereb ereb ganan bun, ãgenei marau tenebur enei nẽ sigoreid dõ gouf, idi meledin dogol idi biya difamãf ya bunem meleid yaleya nigin dogol to ago gouf, anĩ ere, ã wauĩ momoi nẽ ado Odug nigin anini ge fen, ago gouf.
51003023	Ereb ago gef ganan, wauĩ adok iro ken, ago gouf, tamo nigin sã, Odug nigin kabĩ alef ge fen, kabĩ walogouf,
51003024	ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã Odug bun tamal in akor mala solo walogouf. Are Odug Kristus anĩ ã aruna walekenẽgef.
51003025	Aib taka ĩ sane age fouf, yogon sane age fiya nigin mala solo sane yalouf, ere nigin, an anĩ kinau ya sã.
51004001	Marau ã, ãgenei ferfer ereb madur ado biya anĩ wenẽdigouf, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ãg saa ilun ãgenei Marau ibodok.
51004002	Kosẽya anĩ totol uroug, lo weleg fen, Negur de wiyẽgouf.
51004003	Agog fen, amã nigineg kosẽ gouf, are Negur amã od wogõ mauf nigin bobog kã fel kanamã di, amã Kristus nẽ waa kurõ mafalaisiyouf nigin kosẽ gouf, anĩ nigin aya kalabus bun abodok.
51004004	Negur aya biya od wogõ auf nigin ifanan anĩ, sã yaor kurõ afalaisiyouf nigin kosẽ gouf.
51004005	Ereb tamo kayau serẽ temeleid bun ago gou fenẽ, kisi biya ado ago gouf. Sain biya ã nigin wõ youf ganan to sekil gouf.
51004006	Ãgenei wogõya sain bun ganan wau ifenẽya barikãf, od karĩya biya dogol wogõ gouf, anĩ bunem, ã, tamo kayau ganan naig be fe solof irokenẽdiya nigin keleĩ youf.
51004007	Tikikusem aya nigin od ganan wogõ yeĩf. Ĩ neu turau oboiyou, kabĩ tamo dõ fiya biya fen, Odug bun kabĩ turau.
51004008	Aya, ĩ, ã bun enei nigin bagai sur afiyek, are ã, amã naig ma mafaref anĩ keleĩ di, anĩ bunem ĩ ãgenei wauĩ yalesauf nigin, age afef.
51004009	Ĩ Onesimus ado disiyouf, Onesimus ĩ neda turada dõ fiya biya oboida, ĩ ãgenei taka. Idi ereb ereb ganan ein agef wõ yef anĩ dirokeneĩf.
51004010	Neu kalabus turau Aristakus, ã bun yogon aanya sur fef, Mak, Banabas ne tam, ĩg agef aanya sur fef. (Ã ĩ nigin faded fiya walegen. Ĩ ã garan isiyouf are, ã ĩ walogouf.)
51004011	Jesus ĩ yana taka Jastus dedig, ĩg aanya sur fef. Negur nẽ tano nigin neu kabĩ tamo turau tar atun, idi dogol anĩ Juda temeleid. Age de fen, idi momoi bagai de fen, neu wau dalesen.
51004012	Epafras ĩ ãgenei taka, Kristus Jesus nẽ kabĩ tamo, ã bun aanya sur fef. Ĩ faimud kosẽya bun ã nigin totol inodig, are ã Negur nẽ oroya ganan bun, kisi feleya bagai ado momoiya odug bun totol ufaragauf nigin age fef.
51004013	Aya, ĩ, ã nigin, idi Laodisia taun difaref anidi nigin ado, idi Hierapolis taun difaref anidi nigin kabĩ totol yaledig anĩ, sã ĩ nigin kurõ afesif.
51004014	Nemã oboimã dokta Luk ado Demas aanya sur difef.
51004015	Tureĩ tar Laodisia taun dibodok anidi bun ado, Nimfa ado sios yogon fõ bun guru difef anidi bun, neu aanya wenẽdigouf.
51004016	Pas enei uweseg le di, Laodisia sios buneg diwesauf, abag, Laodisia tamal paseg uwesagauf.
51004017	Akipus urokenẽg, “Õ Odug bun kabĩ walen anĩ, el wo udikalauf nigin karĩ walauf.”
51004018	Aya, Polem aanya enei imaum bagai atotof. Aya kalabus bun abodok anĩ karĩ walagauf. Wau ifenẽya ã ado ibodõf.
52001001	Pol, Sailas, Timoti, amã, Tesalonika sios Tamada Negur, Odug Jesus Kristus ado bun ufaregef ã bun, pas enei matotof: Wau ifenẽya wau inosiya ado ã bun ibodõf.
52001002	Amã faimud ã ganan nigin Negur de mafiye ken, nemã kosẽ bun ã nigin marokenẽdig.
52001003	Amã neda Negur Tamada mala bun, momoiya bunem ãgenei kabĩ faat yuk, wauĩ laa fiya bunem ãgenei kabĩ yaleya ado, neda Odug Jesus Kristus bun wauĩ ise fen, ã to fese gen anĩ toku karĩ mauledig.
52001004	Turamã tar, Negur ã nigin wau laa fedig anĩ, amã keleĩ, are Negur ĩ ã igirnein,
52001005	ere nigin, nemã biya od ã bun isin, are od dogol bunem sã, anĩ ere, megeir ado, Awa Uur Fateul ado, momoiya bagai ado, ã bun isin. Ã atun, ã nigin naig be ma mabodon anĩ ã keleĩ.
52001006	Ã, amã Odug Jesus geid madẽ wamãgen. Ã darau odug adon, anĩ ere, Awa Uur Fateulem kulĩya ifenein anĩ bun, ã od anĩ walegen.
52001007	Anĩ nigin, ã Masedonia Akaia provins ado bun, momoiya tamo kayau ganan neid dodo gen wowã gen.
52001008	Odug nẽ od ã bunem ilen, Masedonia Akaia provins ado bun dogol sã, ãgenei Negur nigin momoiya anĩ fõ fõ ganan iyokelen. Anĩ nigin amã baban ã ereb to mayeĩf.
52001009	Idi dogo, ã amã naig ge walemãgen anĩ kurõ difalaisi kanamak. Age de fen, ã naig ge idegẽya waitou utorõg fen, Negur bun falei ge, mata ibodõya nẽ ado momoi nẽ Negur aruna waleg fen,
52001010	ĩ Naal ĩ laa bunem turĩ fiyen, are Jesus ĩ didi dumen isiyouf bun tamal kel yaledadig anĩ, saa ilun tamal tari gen anĩ dirokanamak.
52002001	Turamã tar, ã keleĩ, amã nemã ki yeĩya ege to ilen.
52002002	Ã keleĩ, amã Filipai taun oun darau ado kono fiya malen, anĩ ere, neda Negur nẽ isennẽya bunem amã totol mano fen, naabura gudũ fiya totol ibod mog, in biya od wogõ mayein.
52002003	Amã totol bagai marokeneik are, kũ fenẽya bunem sã, kisi sane bunem sã, idegneĩya bunemeg sã.
52002004	Age fiya ban, Negur biya od wogõya nigin igirneĩd fen, yo fiyẽdin anidim gen, amã wogõ maudig. Amã tamo waud al fouf nigin to kabĩ malef, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ wauda es fedig, ĩ wau al fouf nigin kabĩ malef.
52002005	Ã keleĩ, amã meleĩ yaleya nigin to bagai wogõ mau fen, naumamã nigin to nawamã dede mafedig. Are amã momoi morok anĩ Negur ĩ keleĩ.
52002006	Amã tamom yanamã seli kulõ difouf nigin to mamiren, ã bunem sã, taka bunemeg sã. Amã Kristus nẽ aposel mau fen, amã sã morõ mafeneĩ yoũ nẽ,
52002007	anĩ ere, ã atun, amã molol nem kesu sina gere tar kulatun fedidig gen, age mafen.
52002008	Amã ã nigin waumã fatuk laaf fen, amã Negur nẽ biya od ifeneĩya nigin dogol sã, nemã mata ã nigin iraileya nigineg waumã iron, ere nigin, ã amã bun oboimã bagai wowã gen.
52002009	Turamã tar, momoi, amã kabĩ totol morõ ado malen anĩ ã karĩ welegef. Amã morõ ã taka to mafeneĩf nigin, bõ ado gaa ado kabĩ male fen, Negur nẽ biya od ã bun wogõ maun.
52002010	Ã, momoiya tamo atun, amã naig be mafen, fateul, madur bagai, od sã mafaren, are ã keleĩ, Negureg keleĩ.
52002011	Ã keleĩ, are amã, tama ĩ gere tar nigin suma inodig gen, ã mugu mugu bun suma manon,
52002012	amã wauĩ malesedig, wowor mayeĩdig, Negur ĩ yogon tano ado fula fiya medeĩya bun ulagauf nigin iweigneik, ĩ orof kilei ã ubodõgouf nigin, wedereĩ maroudig.
52002013	Age ma fen, amãg toku Negur de mafiyẽdig, ere nigin, sain ã Negur nẽ od amã bunem karĩg fen, walegen, are tamo nẽ od gen to walegen, Negur nẽ od bagai walegen, Negur nẽ od anĩ, momoi gef ã bun kabĩ yalef.
52002014	Turamã tar, ã oun Judia distrik Negur nẽ sios madẽ wiyẽdigen. Sios Judia distrik oun Kristus Jesus bun difaref, Juda tamo bun darau dalen gen bagai, ãg fõ tureĩ tar bun darau walegen.
52002015	Juda tamo idi, Odug Jesus profet geid didenkeis fen, amãg dirumã dirailen. Idi Negur wau al fiya to difenen, idi tamo ganan kiwai difenẽdif.
52002016	Idi neid tobonuneid bun, amã haiden wogõ mafiyẽdi di, isennẽya dalouf nigin naaburamã gudũ difedig. Naab anĩ bunem, faimud idi neid mosor tete tete dife di, mudu isedig. Age fiya nigin, Negur nẽ didi kisi feleya bagai, idi bun mogo isin.
52002017	Anĩ ere, turamã tar, sain modeg bun, ã geid tabodon anĩ fara mafen (are bouwamam, kisim sã), amã ã ileyeĩya nigin fatuk bagai waumã iro ken, naab ganan bun kabĩ totol malen.
52002018	Amã ã gein masiyouf nigin waumã yenen. Momoi, aya, Pol, baba baban lakĩ afen. Anĩ ere, Satan naaburamã katĩ felen.
52002019	Neda Odug Jesus isiyouf bun, ere anĩ ĩ mala bun, nemã wau iseya, kulĩya, yana yaleseya nẽ teter youf? Are ã anĩ sã de?
52002020	Momoi, ã nemã fula fiya medeĩya ado, nemã kulĩya.
52003001	Anĩ nigin, amã foiya kisi feleya sã nigin, amã kisi ma fen, amã mugu ein Atens mabodõf are deuf maun.
52003002	Amã, ã ãgenei momoiya bun megeir yei ken, wauĩ yalesauf nigin, Timoti, ĩ nemã turamã ado Kristus nẽ biya od nigin Negur nẽ kabĩ tura, sur mafiyen.
52003003	Are takam morõ eneidi bun to kisi rori youf nigin age mafen. Ã gai keleĩ bagai, are ada morõ eneidi nigin igirnadan.
52003004	Momoi, amã ã geid tabodon bun, amã, ada fau darau difanadauf nigin toku marokenein. Age fiya bagai, agef wõ yen, are ã keleĩ.
52003005	Anĩ nigin, aya foiya kisi feleya sã kisi afe fen, aya ãgenei momoiya ileya nigin sur afen. Aya, naab taka taka bun kisi fiya tamo kisi yeĩ di, nemã kabĩ totol ege ileya nigin kumĩ aun.
52003006	Anĩ ere, Timoti gama bagai, ã bun tamal amã gein isi fen, ãgenei momoiya ado wauĩ laa fiya nigin od biya irou isin. Ĩ irokanaman, are ã, amã nigin faimud biya karĩ welegedig ado, amã ã ileyeĩya nigin waumã irõdig gen, ãg ilemãya nigin wauĩ irõdig yen.
52003007	Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, amã nemã waumã morõ ado, darau ganan bun, ãgenei momoiya bunem, amã ã nigin waumã yalesen.
52003008	Gama amã waumã kulĩya ado mata mabodok, ere nigin, ã Odug bun megeir ufaregef.
52003009	Neda Negur mala bun, amã ã nigin waumã kulĩya ifanaman enei ganan nigin, naig ma abag kisi mafel, ã nigin Negur de mafiyẽf?
52003010	Amã masi mailiyei ken, ereb ã fau ãgenei momoiya bun lau gef anĩ isenneĩya nigin, bõ ado gaa ado Negur totol bagai kosẽ mafiyẽdig.
52003011	Gama, neda Negur Tamada ĩ yogo, neda Odug Jesus ado, nemã naab ã gein isiya nigin dũf nigin oromak.
52003012	Odug ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya gire fese di, amã ã nigin waumã laa fedig age fiya gen, abob nigin ado ganan nigin wauĩ laa fiya gogũ fouf nigin oromak.
52003013	Negur ĩ, ãgenei wauĩ megeir fe di, neda Odug Jesus, in fateul tamo kayau ganan geid disiyouf sain bun, neda Negur Tamada mala bun, ã bouweĩ od sã fateul wõ gouf nigin oromak.
52004001	Od idĩya nigin, turamã tar, amã, ã Negur wau al fiya wenẽgouf nigin naig ge ufaragauf nigin mafelnein, are gama agog ufaregef. Gama amã ã enei baba baban ago gouf nigin to mayei ken, Odug Jesus bun totol bagai marokeneik.
52004002	Odug Jesus nẽ totol bunem, amã ã faded fiya mafenein, are ã keleĩ.
52004003	Negur nẽ oroya are ã fateul wowã gouf anĩ, are ã noli tobonunã sese wiyẽgouf.
52004004	Ã mugu mugu bouweĩ kulatun ge di, fateul fen, yeneĩ biyauf nigin keleĩ youf.
52004005	Haiden Negur keleĩ sam, noli nigin mudureid ditenẽdig gen to ago gouf.
52004006	Enei bun, takam ne tura sane to age fiyẽf, idegẽya bunem morõ to ifenẽf. Amã mogo marokenei ken, wedereĩ maroun, are Odug fau mosor age fediya ganan nigin tamo mala solo ifenẽdiyouf.
52004007	Negur ada amuyẽ adouf nigin to iweignadan, anĩ ere, fateul ibodõya nigin iweignadan.
52004008	Anĩ nigin, taka ĩ od enei idodõf, ĩ tamo to idodnek, are Negur in Awa Uur Fateul ifeneĩdig anĩ idodnek.
52004009	Gama tureĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fiya anĩ nigin amã to matotkeneĩf, ere nigin, ã aug abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf nigin Negurem ifelnein.
52004010	Momoi, ã tureĩ tar ganan Masedonia provins ganan bun difaref anidi nigin wauĩ laa fedig. Anĩ ere, turamã tar, ã baba baban ago gouf nigin totol bagai marokeneik.
52004011	Amã marokenein gen, ã molol ibodõya nigin kisi totol walogouf, ãgenei kabĩ nigin kisig fen, aug imeim kabĩ walogouf.
52004012	Anĩ bunem, ãgenei ibodõya bun tamo serẽ temeleid dileyei ken, anini douf, taka bun to utobõgouf.
52004013	Turamã tar, amã ã gare den onudi nigin to keleĩ youf anĩ to oromak, takag, tamo tunĩ ganan, wau iseya sã gen wauĩ gudũ fouf anĩ to oromak.
52004014	Jesus laaf fen, kel fã yen nigin ada momoi tauf, anĩ nigin, Negur, idi Jesus bun gare den anidi, Jesus geid guri feid isiyouf nigin momoi tauf.
52004015	Odug nẽ od bunem, amã ã marokeneik, are ada fau mata tabodok, Odug isiyouf bun tafaref ada, idi gare den anidi to bagai wal tafediyouf.
52004016	Odug yogo bagai saa ilunem isiyouf, ait odugem irõ di, engel uyu irouya nẽ ait ado, Negur nẽ taur bunem iweig di, Kristus bun gare den anidi ketem fafã douf.
52004017	Anĩ bure fele di, ada fau mata tabod ken, tafaref anĩ geif, idi geid bagu fada fen, lalo bun kutũ fada se, Odug fotou fiya nigin saa ilun irou iselnadauf. An ada Odug geid mata gai gai tabodkalauf.
52004018	Anĩ nigin, od enei bunem abob wau talesauf.
52005001	Gama, turamã tar, amã sain ado naa nigin to matotkeneĩf.
52005002	Ere nigin, ã keleĩ bagai, Odug nẽ naa, bẽ tamo bõ isiyouf gen wõ youf.
52005003	Tamo kayau wau inosiya ado morõ sã tabodok de mog, daũ fiya nunũ idi bun, kayau kesu gõ fiya nigin firi yedig gen isi di, idi to diyalalauf.
52005004	Anĩ ere, turamã tar, ã gugum bun to ufaregef, anĩ nigin, naa anĩ bẽ tamo gen to isi fen, ba yeĩf.
52005005	Ã ganan lalan ado we bun temeleĩ. Ada bõ ado gugum nẽ sã.
52005006	Anĩ nigin, ada, idi tunĩ denek gen to tafarauf, anĩ ere, ada lo tafel fen, karĩ adouf.
52005007	Are idi mulaĩ temeleid, bõ anĩ denẽdig, idi aai meleid waĩ yedig, bõ anĩ aai meleid waĩ yedig.
52005008	Anĩ ere, ada we nẽ nigin, ada dug nigin karĩ ado fen, momoiya wau laa fiya ado siot kapa gen tafoun ken, kel gei fiya nẽ wau iseya anim hat kapa gen kurũ tafouf.
52005009	Negur ada didi yaleya nigin to igirnadan, anĩ ere, ada neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem kel gei fadauf nigin igirnadan.
52005010	Ĩ ada nigin laa fen, are ada mata be tabodok, gare be tauf are, ĩ geid tabodõf nigin age fen.
52005011	Anĩ nigin, abob wau tales fen, abob walesagauf, gama ago gef gen.
52005012	Turamã tar, gama amã marokeneik, idi ã atun kabĩ totol dalef, idi Odug bun ãgenei uyu irouya difar fen, wedereĩ dirouf anidi karĩ wiyẽdigouf.
52005013	Idi kabĩ dirouf nigin ge fen, idi nigin wauĩ laaf fen, fatuk bagai karĩ wiyẽdigouf. Abob nigin wau inosiya bun ufaragauf.
52005014	Turamã tar, amã totol bagai marokeneik, fõ temeleid wedereid uroug, anini temeleid waud waleseg fen, forõ temeleid usennẽdigouf, ganan nigin nameĩ ukeleg ubodõgouf.
52005015	Taka nem taka nẽ mosor to solo fouf, anĩ ere, abob nigin ado ganan nigin, faimud tobonunã biya ago gouf.
52005016	Wauĩ bun faimud kulĩ youf,
52005017	toku kosẽ gouf,
52005018	ereb ereb ganan bun de wiyẽgouf, ere nigin, are ã nigin Kristus Jesus bun Negur nẽ oroya.
52005019	Awa Uur nẽ yã to uroroukeleg,
52005020	profet neid od to welebi ge.
52005021	Ereb ereb ganan es gouf. Biya anĩ uroug, kafĩ walagauf.
52005022	Ereb sesen fire fire ganan sese gouf.
52005023	Negur ĩ yogo, wau inosiya nẽ Negur, fateul kisi feleya bagai inoyeĩf. Ãgenei uur, meleĩkanon ado, bouweĩ anĩ ganan, neda Odug Jesus Kristus isiyouf bun od sãf.
52005024	Ĩ iweigneik ĩ yogon od dõ fiya biya, ĩ de age fouf.
52005025	Turamã tar, amã nigin kosẽg.
52005026	Tureĩ tar ganan, umã fiya fateul bunem aan wedig.
52005027	Aya, tureĩ tar ganan bun pas enei uwesagauf nigin, Odug mala bun totol bagai arokeneik.
52005028	Neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ã ado ibodõf.
53001001	Pol, Sailas, Timoti weim, Tesalonika sios, Tamada Negur, Odug Jesus Kristus ado bun ufaregef ã bun, pas enei matotof:
53001002	Wau ifenẽya wau inosiya ado, Tamada Negur, Odug Jesus Kristus ado bunem, ã bun ibodõf.
53001003	Turamã tar, amã ã nigin faimud Negur de mafiyẽf bagai, are de age mafiyẽf, ere nigin, ãgenei momoiya fau fau odugef iselef, agog fen, ã ganan abob nigin wauĩ laa fiya anĩ odugef.
53001004	Anĩ nigin, amã Negur nẽ sios atun, ã momoi ge fen, ã kafĩ fiya darau ganan ado walegef bun to fese gef nigin selĩ kulõ mafedig.
53001005	Enei ganan anim, Negur nẽ es fiya are tutuk anĩ yaoref. Anĩ bunem, ã Negur nẽ tano nigin kisi falauf, ã anĩ nigin kafĩ fiya walegef.
53001006	Negur ĩ madur bagai. Ĩ morõ difeneik anidi morõ ifenẽdiyouf,
53001007	ã morõ walegef, ĩ karika ifeneĩf, amãg ifanamãf. Anĩ Odug Jesus, in engel megeir adodo geid, yã bale fitotoleya bun saa ilunem isiyouf bun wõ youf.
53001008	Idi Negur keleĩ sã ado, neda Odug Jesus nẽ biya od to dõ difedig anidi, darau ifenẽdiyouf.
53001009	Idi daũ fiya faimud ibodkeleya nẽ kafĩ fiya dale fen, Odug mala bun tamal ado, yogon megeir nẽ fula fiya medeĩya bun tamal, irudiyouf.
53001010	Naa anĩ bun, ĩ isi, yogon fateul tamo kayau bun tamal, fula fiya medeĩya yale di, ĩ nigin momoi den anidi ganan, ĩ nigin meleid yũ yalouf. Are ã gediyouf, ere nigin, ã nemã od nigin momoi gen.
53001011	Anĩ nigin amã ã nigin toku kosẽ maudig, are neda Negur iweigneik anĩ kilei, ã kisi feleya inoyeĩf nigin, takag, Negur in megeir bunem, ereb ereb biya ganan ã ago gouf nigin kisi gef anĩ ado, ãgenei momoiya nẽ kabĩ ganan kisi falauf nigin.
53001012	Amã age ma kosẽ maudig, are neda Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus neid wau ifenẽya bunem, neda Odug Jesus yana ã atun fula fiya medeĩya yale di, ãg ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya walogouf nigin age mafedig.
53002001	Turamã tar, Neda Odug Jesus Kristus isiyouf nigin ado, ĩ wagen guru tagauf nigin, amã ã marokeneik,
53002002	Odug nẽ naa mogo isin yeya anĩ, profet od, wogõya be, pas amã bunem isin ya anĩ karĩg fen, to kaisã terẽg fen, wauĩ kui youf.
53002003	Naab taka taka bun, taka nem to idegneĩf nigin lo weleg, ere nigin, fau kiwai ketem wõ ye fen, lo wal fiya tamo, are daũ fiya bun ileya nẽ anĩ wõ ye bure fele di, naa are isiyouf.
53002004	Ĩ kiwai ino fen, ereb ereb ganan waitou de fen, seli dabidig anĩ ĩ farumen ineneĩd fen, ĩ yogo Negur nẽ tempel bun ibod ken, ĩ yogo nigin Negur ye kurõ fesiyouf.
53002005	Aya ã geid tabod ken, enei nigin arokeneĩdig anĩ, ã to karĩ welegef de?
53002006	Gama erebem irounek are ã keleĩ, age fe di, fau yogon sain bun bagai, ĩ wõ youf.
53002007	Lo wal fiya nẽ waa megeir mogo kabĩ yalef, anĩ ere, ĩ gama irounek anim irouf ile iwaikalauf.
53002008	Age fe di, lo wal fiya tamo yaorouf, ĩ Odug Jesus in awa yau neseyam yukeis fen, Odug isiya nẽ medeĩya anim ĩ daũ falauf.
53002009	Lo wal fiya tamo nẽ isiya, de Satan nẽ kabĩ ado susu fel, idegẽya memelik, uris ado, ereb urug bagai fire fire ganan inodiyouf.
53002010	Agef fen, sesen ganan bunem idi inanakelef anidi idegnẽdiyouf. Idi inanakelef, ere nigin, idi momoi nigin waud laaf fen, kel gei fediyouf anĩ ditoron.
53002011	Age fiya nigin, Negur idegẽya totol sur fe di, idi anĩ nigin momoi douf.
53002012	Are idi momoi nẽ nigin to momoi de fen, sesen nigin waud al fen anidi ganan, Negurem es fediyouf nigin age fef.
53002013	Anĩ ere, amã faimud, ã, turamã tar Odug nẽ oboi nigin, Negur de mafiyẽf bagai, ere nigin, gariya bun, Negur, Awa Uur ã fateul ineneĩya nigin kabĩ yalef bunem ado, ã momoi nẽ nigin momoi gef bunem, kel gei yeĩf nigin igirnein.
53002014	Ĩ nemã biya od bunem enei bun iweignein, are ã neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ fula fiya medeĩya anĩ walogouf nigin age fen.
53002015	Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, megeir ufareg fen, sigoramam wogõya bunem ado pas bunem, mafelnein anĩ uroug kafĩ walagauf.
53002016	Neda Odug Jesus Kristus ĩ yogo ado Tamada Negur, ĩ ada nigin wau laa fen ado, yogon wau ifenẽya bunem, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ wau yaleseya ado wau iseya biya ifanadan anĩ,
53002017	ã wauĩ yaleseya difenei ken, ereb ereb biya ganan ago gef ado od wogõya bun megeir difeneĩf nigin oromak.
53003001	Od idĩya nigin, turamã tar, Odug nẽ od, ã bun age fef gen, kaisã bagai iyokel fen, tamo kayau atun fula fiya medeĩya yalouf nigin, amã nigin kosẽ gouf.
53003002	Agog fen, amã tamo idodõya ado sesen bun tamal yalelnamãf nigin kosẽ gouf, ere nigin, tamo gananem momoiya sã.
53003003	Anĩ ere, Odug ĩ yogon od dõ fiya biya, ĩ ã megeir ifenei ken, Satan bun tamal kulatun yeĩf.
53003004	Amã Odug bun momoi mauf, are amã ã marokeneik anĩ ago gef ulagauf.
53003005	Odug ãgenei wauĩ itoneĩ di, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya ado Kristus nẽ feseya sã megeir ifareya bun ilauf nigin oromak.
53003006	Odug Jesus Kristus yana bunem, turamã tar, amã ã marokeneik, tureĩ tar fõ temeleid ganan, amã mafelnein kilei to mata dibodõdig anidi so wiyẽdigouf.
53003007	Amã age mafen anĩ naig ge dõ gouf nigin, ã aug keleĩ. Amã ã geid tabodon sain bun, amã to fõ faman.
53003008	Age ma fen, amã taka nẽ saaf na yaleya sã to mon. Age fiya ban, amã ã atun taka morõ to mafenẽf nigin, bõ ado gaa ado kabĩ totol malen.
53003009	Amã ã bun tamal isennẽya yaleya kisi feleya, anĩ ere, to age mafen, ere nigin, ã amã bun ulemãg fen, ãg agog dõ gouf nigin.
53003010	Amã ã geid tabodon sain bun, amã nun enei mafenein: “Taka ĩ kabĩ to yalouf are, ĩ saaf to yãf.”
53003011	Amã ã atun tunĩ fõ temeleid yeya anĩ karĩ maun. Idi fõ temeleid, anĩ ere, idi dogo nigin kabĩ to dale fen, taka nigin dogol wogoĩ dedig.
53003012	Tamo age fediya nigin, Odug Jesus Kristus yana bunem, amã totol bagai moro ken, wedereid marouf, dẽ desil fen, dogo naumeid nigin kabĩ dalouf.
53003013	Aug nigin, turamã tar, biya ago gouf nigin to fõ yeĩf.
53003014	Taka ĩ pas enei bun marokeneik anĩ to dõ fouf are, dẽ wiyẽ kalagauf. Ĩ mama fouf nigin, weim to nigal ũgouf.
53003015	Anĩ ere, ĩ kiwai gen to ulogouf, ĩ tureĩ gen weder urougauf.
53003016	Gama wau inosiya nẽ Odug ĩ yogo, sain ganan bun, naab ganan bun, wau inosiya ifeneĩf. Odug ã ganan geid ibodõf.
53003017	Aya, Pol, aya imaum aanya enei atotof, are neu pas ganan bun aya yug imauba. Aya eig afe atotodig.
53003018	Neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ã ganan bun ibodõf.
54001001	Aya, Pol, Negur neda Isennadaya ado Kristus Jesus neda wauda iseya neid nigiya od bunem Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun,
54001002	Timoti, momoiya bun neu kesu bagai, bun pas enei atotof. Tamada Negur ado neda Odug Kristus Jesus neid wau ifenẽya, wau yũya ado, wau inosiya, õ bun ibodõf.
54001003	Aya Masedonia provins alauf sain bun, aya õ totol bagai arokonon, Efesus an ubod ken, tamo tunĩ urokenẽdi di, idegẽya keleĩ anĩ baban to tai difediyouf.
54001004	Ago di, idi nenerĩ ege ado ibor idikeleya sã dir difedidig anĩ so difediyouf. Age fediya are momoiya bunem Negur nẽ kabĩ yaleya ban, luwa irouya dogol dalesedig.
54001005	Weder irouya od enei nẽ gariya are, wau laa fiya, are ĩ wau karẽtut, es fiya kisi biya ado, momoiya bagai bun tamal isidig.
54001006	Tunĩ enei bunem diya dile, od kaũ sã wogõya bun dilelen.
54001007	Idi lo tai fiya tamo wõya orodif, anĩ ere, idi ereb wogõ def ado, ereb nigin totol dinof are idi keleĩ sã.
54001008	Ada keleĩ, taka ĩ lo dõf el fouf are, lo ĩ biya.
54001009	Ada keleĩ, lo ĩ madur tamo nigin to inof, ĩ lo wal fiya, idodõya, Negur dudum fiya, mosor temeleid, idi fateul sã, idi buru naumeĩ nigin kisi difedig, idi sineid temeid tar didenkesif, tamo yukesiya,
54001010	noliya, tamo tutur kayau tutur noliya, ferfer inouf nigin tamo bẽ yaleya, idegẽya, momoi nẽ od wa fiya, ereb ganan ifelnẽya biya wal difef anidi nigin lo inof.
54001011	Ifelnẽya biya anĩ, biya od fula fiya medeĩya, Negur el fiya barikã aya wogõya nigin ifanan anĩ susu felef.
54001012	Aya neda Odug Kristus Jesus megeir ifanan anĩ de afiyek, ere nigin, ĩ aya yogon od dõ fiya biya anĩ ile fen, in kabĩ alouf nigin igirnan.
54001013	Aya kulu kono fiya tamo, tadũ fediya tamo, seye tamo, anĩ ere, aya wau yũya ifanan, ere nigin, aya to kelei ken, momoiya sa ken, age afen.
54001014	Neda Odug nẽ wau ifenẽya, Kristus Jesus nẽ momoiya wau laa fiya ado, mugi bagai aya bun foula felen.
54001015	Od enei momoi bagai, ganan dale fen, momoi douf nigin: Kristus Jesus mosor tamo kel gei fiya nigin tenebur isin. Idi atun aya sane bagai, idi ganan wal fediya.
54001016	Anĩ ere, gariya eig fiya nigin, aya wau yũya ifanan, are aya mosor temeleid ganan wal fediya bun, Kristus Jesus in imatẽya mugi bagai aya bun ifelnẽdin, anĩ bunem idi momoi douf anidim dile fen, ĩ nigin momoi de fen, mata ibodkeleya anĩ dalouf nigin ĩ age fen.
54001017	Gama King ibodkeleya, ĩ mata ibodkeleya, ileya kisi feleya sã, Negur yogo dogol anĩ bun yana ado fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
54001018	Timoti, neu kesu, aya tai fiya od eig fiya afonok, are õ nigin profet od wogõya yenen anĩ dõ wo di, õ sã biya kusĩ wouf nigin.
54001019	Momoiya ado wau karẽtut biya urou kafĩ wol. Tunĩ anĩ ditoraran nigin dogo neid momoiya tadũ difelen.
54001020	Age difen atun are Himeneus Aleksanda ado, idi Negur to kono difiyẽf anĩ keleĩ youf nigin, Satan ima bun anenẽdin.
54002001	Aya õ totol bagai orokonok, uruwa bagai, are nonĩ fiya, kosẽya, taka nigin Negur irokenẽya, de fiyẽya anĩ, tamo ganan nigin agouf.
54002002	King ado kabĩ nẽ mudur ganan nigin agouf, are ada wauda inosiya ado foro tausil, Negur orof ganan ado fateul bun tabodõf nigin agouf.
54002003	Agouf are biya, Negur neda Isennadaya wau al fef,
54002004	Negur ĩ tamo adok ganan kel gei fouf nigin ado, momoi nẽ keleĩ bun disiyouf nigin orof.
54002005	Are, Negur ĩ tekelei, agef fen, atun tamo tekelei, Negur ado tamo atun ifaref, tamo are Kristus Jesus,
54002006	tamo ganan fotokar ĩ yogo bouwa itoron, anĩ yogon sain bun bagai Negurem tenebur tamo kayau keleĩ youf nigin yaoren.
54002007	Age fiya nigin, aya arũ tamo, aposel igirnan, aya momoi bagai orok, aya idegẽya sã, aya, haiden atun, momoiya bagai nẽ ifelnẽdiya tamo igirnan.
54002008	Tamo fõ fõ ganan imeid fateul ilun dales fen, kosẽ douf anĩ aya orouf, seye sã, monẽ sã.
54002009	Takag, aya kayau kolos biya, taka mama ifenẽya nẽ ani sã, tamo kayau nẽ lo fiya biya bun ifonũya anĩ orouf, fatiya kori fiya sã, gol sã, maaĩ tuwa meli bagai pel nẽ kilelei sã, meein odug nẽ kolos sã anĩ orouf.
54002010	Anĩ ere, aya idi tobonunã biya dõ difouf anĩ orouf, are kayau Negur yana dalesef ya anĩ susu falauf.
54002011	Kayau ĩ foro yel dẽ yesil fen, dõ fouf anĩ bunem keleĩ yalouf.
54002012	Aya kayaum tamo ifelnẽya be, wal fiye ken, uyu iroukenẽya nigin to yo auf, ĩ foro yalauf bagai.
54002013	Ere nigin, Adam ketem inon, agef fen, Eva inon.
54002014	Agef fen, Adam anĩ to idegnen, kayau anĩ idegnẽ di, mosor bun kubũ yen.
54002015	Anĩ ere, kayau idi toku tobonunã biya bun momoi douf, waud laa fouf, fateul dibodõf are, idi kesu gõ fiya bun isennẽya dalouf.
54003001	Od enei are momoi bagai: Taka ĩ uyu irouya wõ youf nigin wau irõf, ĩ kabĩ biya yaleya nigin orof.
54003002	Uyu irouya, yana sane sã, ĩ kayau aiwauf, anĩ ere, ĩ kayau tekelei youf, ĩ molol tamo, yogo nigin el fe kulatun fouf, ĩ karĩ difiyẽf, tamo dor yalouf, tai fiya kisi feleya,
54003003	aai to yõdig, to kusĩ youf, imatẽya, monẽya sã, moni nigin wau laa fiya sã.
54003004	Ĩ kayau kesu el fe, lo fediyouf bagai. Age fe di, in kesu el de dõ de fen, karĩ difiyẽf.
54003005	(Taka ĩ yogon kayau kesu lo feid fen, tutuk fediya kisi feleya sãf are, naig fe fen, ĩ Negur nẽ sios lo fouf?)
54003006	Ĩ gama bagai momoiya tamo wõ ye fen, to uyu irouya ifarauf bagai, age fouf are, ĩ bilãya bunem fasikor fele di, Negur Satan es fiyen gen, ĩg es fiyẽf be.
54003007	Ĩ serẽ temeleid buneg yana biya adouf bagai, anĩ bunem, ĩ yana sane to yale fen, Satan nẽ kor bun to ilauf.
54003008	Uyu iroudiya farumen kabĩ tamo anidi, areg age fiya, tamo idi karĩ difiyẽdidig, idi baleid to kara urudig, aai fatuk to dõdig, idegẽya bunem safina to daledig.
54003009	Idi momoiya nẽ keleĩ mugi, kisi karẽtut atata feleya ado dirouwauf bagai.
54003010	Uruwa idi kisi difediyouf, age de fen, idi bun od taka sãf are, utornẽdig len, uyu irouya farumen kabĩ tamo wõ de fen, tamo kayau disennẽdiyouf.
54003011	Naab tekelei anĩ bunem, nedi aiweid tar idig karĩ difiyẽdiyouf, idi dumen od to wogõ douf, anĩ ere, idi molol fen, ereb ereb ganan kulatun fiya kisi falauf.
54003012	Uyu irouya farumen kabĩ tamo ĩ kayau aiwauf, anĩ ere, kayau tekelei fen, in kesu tar ado fõ ereb ereb ganan anĩ el fe, kulatun fediyouf bagai.
54003013	Idi kabĩ biya dalen, are yeneid biya bagai dalef, age de fen, idi Kristus Jesus bun momoiya nigin kukĩya sã wogõ def.
54003014	Aya õ gein kaisã bagai isiya nigin wau yenek, anĩ ere, aya faded enei atotkonok, anĩ bunem,
54003015	aya foi auf are, tamo kayau Negur nẽ fõ bun naig de age difouf are õ keleĩ youf, Negur nẽ fõ anĩ mata ibodõya Negur nẽ sios, are momoi nẽ monog tor ado gariya.
54003016	Neda momoiya nẽ waa anĩ odug, are taka nem wa fiya kisi feleya sã: Ĩ bouwa ado wõ yen, Awa Uurem ĩ madur bagai anĩ yaoren, age fe di, engelem dilen, age de fen, teneub ganan bun ĩ nigin wogõ de, momoi de di, fula fiya medeĩya bun yalesnen.
54004001	Awa Uur yaor bagai irok, dum bun tunĩ fau momoiya ditor ken, idegẽya uur ado ereb ereb kaa sesen idim difelnẽdiyouf anĩ, idi dõ difouf.
54004002	Ifelnẽdiya age fediya are, idegẽya tamo neid meleid yaleya bunem isif, idi neid kisi ain uruwam ifalege di, galig leya gen.
54004003	Idi tamo kayau yaleya katũ difiyeĩd fen, saaf tunĩ nigineg katũ difiyẽdiyouf, saaf are Negurem tamo momoi de fen, momoi nigin keleĩ anidi Negur de difiye ken, dãf nigin inodin.
54004004	Ereb ereb ganan Negur inon are biya, ereb ereb Negur de fiye ken, yaleyauf anĩ, to sese fiyẽyauf,
54004005	ere nigin, are Negur nẽ od ado kosẽ bunem fateul ifenek.
54004006	Ereb ereb enei turã tar bun ufelnẽdiyouf are, momoiya od ado ifelnẽya biya dõ wodig anim megeir ifonõ di, Kristus Jesus nẽ kabĩ tamo biya wõ wouf.
54004007	Negur ditoron anĩ nẽ od ado kayau tubau neid nenerĩ ege anĩ to urou, Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya biya wõ wouf nigin, õ ogo tai wouf.
54004008	Bouwa buru nẽ tai fiya are naal isennadaf, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya biya are ereb ereb ganan nigin isennadaf, anim gama mata ibodõya nẽ ado dumen mata ibodõya nẽ promis od irouf.
54004009	Od enei momoi bagai, ganan dale fen, momoi douf nigin
54004010	(enei nigin, ada kabĩ tale fen, lakĩ tafef), are ada neda wauda iseya mata ibodõya Negur bun tanon, ĩ tamo ganan nẽ isennẽya, idi momoi def anidi neid bagai.
54004011	Ereb ereb eneidi urokeneĩd, su agog wiyeĩd fen, ufelneĩd.
54004012	Õ kesu oosi de fen, takam to lai yõi, anĩ ere, wogõya bun, ibodõya bun, wau laa fiya bun, momoiya bun, amuyẽ sã karẽtut bun, momoiya tamo neid suma ago fen, idi age de dõ difouf nigin ufelnẽdiyouf.
54004013	Atun meleid bun Negur nẽ Itotoya uwesauf, faded wediyouf, ago fen, ufelnẽdif ule mog, aya asiyouf.
54004014	Uyu irouya imeid õ teten dino fen, profet od bunem uur nẽ ege luwa walen anĩ to welebi wo.
54004015	Õ suma enei ganan dõ fen, waũ adok wenẽdiyouf, anĩ bunem, tamo kayau ganan ogon kabĩ naig fe ilef anĩ dilouf.
54004016	Õ ogo nigin ado ogon ifelnẽdiya nigin lo walauf. Anĩ feseya sã toku agouf, anĩ bunem, õ ogo ado idi karĩ diyõf anidi isennẽya walogouf.
54005001	Tamo tubau totol bagai to kãkã wiyẽf, anĩ ere, õ tamã gen urokenẽf. Kesu oosi, turã tar gen walediyouf,
54005002	kayau biyeid are sinã gen, kayau momoul are main tar gen, kisi karẽ bagai ado walediyouf.
54005003	Kayau waab bagai kesu sã anidi el ge lo wedigouf.
54005004	Anĩ ere, waab taka ĩ gere tar be, tubu tar adouf are, uruwa idi neid Negur dõ fiya nẽ tobonunã biya tai fiya nigin, idi neid ibor el de kulatun difouf, nedi sineid temeid tar simõ bun lo difedin anĩ kilei abag age de kulatun difediyouf, anim Negur wau al fouf.
54005005	Kayau waab bagai taka, ĩ mugu bagai, isennẽya yaleya nigin yogon wau iseya Negur bun ino fen, bõ ado gaa ado toku kosẽ ye fen, Negur bun isennẽya yaleya nigin to fiyẽf.
54005006	Anĩ ere, waab taka ĩ bouwa sigigi fiya nigin dogol ibodõf are, ĩ mata ibodok, anĩ ere, ĩ laa fen.
54005007	Faded eneig tamo kayau wenẽdiyouf, ago di, taka bouwa bun od to dinouf.
54005008	Taka ĩ yogon ibor tar to kulatun fediyouf, yogon sina tama kayau kesu bagai anĩ to kulatun fediyouf are, in wau momoiya wa fef, anĩ bunem, ĩ sane bagai, taka to momoi yef anĩ wal fiya.
54005009	Waab taka ĩ aiwa tekelei ado el de dibodok dile 60 yar wal fen ouf are, waab neid daũ bun unenẽf,
54005010	agef fen, ĩ yogo tobonunã biya nigin yana ado, ĩ kesu kulat biya, ĩ tamo yaledig, momoiya tamo kayau yeid kulo fedig, morõ adodo isenneĩd fen, ĩ yogo ereb ereb biya ganan age fedig.
54005011	Kayau waab fau gaũ idi, waab neid daũ bun to unouf. Ere nigin, idi neid bouwa nẽ oroya anĩ, Kristus nigin momoiya anĩ wal fese di, idi tamo yaleya nigin orodiyouf.
54005012	Anĩ bunem, idi es fiya dogo bouweid bun dinof, ere nigin, idi uruwa bun waud kuturol fen iron anĩ narĩ difen.
54005013	Takag, idi fõ fiya tobonuneid ado fen, fõ fõ dalef diyõdig. Fõ fiya dogol sã, dumen od wogõya ado, taka nigin wogõ yef iyõya, idim to wogõya nẽ anĩ wogõ dedig.
54005014	Anĩ nigin, kayau waab fau gaũ, tamo dalouf, kesu adouf, nedi fõ el de lo difouf, kiwaim idi dumedin irõya nigin naab to dukenẽdiyouf anĩ aya orouf.
54005015	Tunĩ mogo ditor ken, Satan dõ difen.
54005016	Kayau taka ĩ momoiya ado, in ibor bun waab adodiyouf are, ĩ yogo isennẽdiyouf, idi nigin sios morõ to ifenẽf, anĩ bunem, sios waab idi isennẽdiya nigin bagai yenek anidi isennẽdiyouf.
54005017	Uyu irouya sios nẽ kabĩ el de diroulef, yana biya ado mala solo biya bagai dalouf, are idi biya od wogõ def ado difelnẽdif anidi, age difouf bagai.
54005018	Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Bulmakau wit faat biya nẽ gabar yalelauf nigin lalai feid mog, yogon awa to ufokol,” takag, “Kabĩ tamo, yogon kabĩ mala yalouf.”
54005019	Uyu irouya taka nigin bouwa yũya od to urouwauf, fau uruwom be towom dirõ di, anĩ urouwauf.
54005020	Idi mosor dinof are tamo kayau meleid bun ou wiyẽdiyouf, are tunĩ wedereid fokõ youf nigin agouf.
54005021	Negur, Kristus Jesus ado, engel igirnẽdin meleid bun, aya õ totol bagai orokonok, faded enei dõ fen, taka dogol waũ to wenẽf, õ anĩ kinau ya anĩ bunem ereb taka to agouf.
54005022	Tetedin imã inoya nigin to sibu wo, tunĩ neid mosor bun to kababal wo. Õ karẽ bagai ubodõf.
54005023	Naan dogol to wãf, wain naal bagai walouf, ere nigin, ogon name darau nigin ado, ogon dagi baba baban wõ yedig nigin.
54005024	Tamo tunĩ neid mosor are yaor, anĩ ketem es fiya bun ifaref, anĩ ere, tunĩ neid mosor dum yaorouf.
54005025	Age fiya gen bagai, biya age fiya are yaor, idi biya age fiya gama yaor sã areg, iminẽya kisi feleya sã.
54006001	Ferfer idi ganan, nedi moroid tar yana biya dino fen, karĩ difiyẽdiyouf, anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ yana ado ama mafelnẽdif anĩ, to kono difouf.
54006002	Tunĩ idi, nedi moroid tar momoiya adouf are, amã tura tura de fen, to karĩ difiyẽdig gen to age difouf. Age fiya ban, idi el de aruneid dalouf, ere nigin, idi neid kabĩ bunem biya dalef are momoiya tamo, idi neid oboiyeid. Enei ganan anĩ ufelneĩd fen, totol bagai urokenẽdiyouf.
54006003	Taka ĩ idegẽya keleĩ ifelneĩd fen, Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ faded fiya biya ado fateul ibodõya ifelnẽdiya anĩ nigin wau to irõf are,
54006004	ĩ idegẽyam idegnẽ di, bilã yef, ĩ ereb taka to keleĩ. Ĩ monẽya ado od luwa irouya nigin oroya sane ado, anĩ bunem, kiyeĩ, kusĩ, bou yũya od, sisiniya kisi sane irou fen,
54006005	tamo kisi sesen ado atun toku koũkã ya ibodõf, tamo kisi sesen ado anidi, momoi anĩ ditor ken, fateul ibodõya are moni odug yaleya nigin de fen, kisi difedig.
54006006	Anĩ ere, safina nigin wau morõ sã ado fateul ibodõya anĩ, mala biya ado.
54006007	Ere nigin, ada teneub enei bun gemũ tasin nigin, age fiya bagai gemũ ke tauf.
54006008	Anĩ ere, ada saaf ado kolos adouf are, ada nigin de tauf.
54006009	Tamo kayau safineid ado ibodõya kisi difef anidi, kisi fiya bun, kor bun ado, neneya kisi ado waila dĩ fiya kisi musei bun kuku def, kisi anim tamo daũf sane lauf.
54006010	Moni nigin wau laa fiya, are ereb ereb sesen ganan nẽ gariya. Tamo kayau tunĩ moni nigin waud ditenen, momoiya ditor ken, idi dogo waud darau musei dalen.
54006011	Anĩ ere, õ, Negur nẽ tamo, enei ganan nigin so rel fen, madur bagai ibodõya, fateul ibodõya, momoiya, wau laa fiya, feseya sã ifareya ado, molol dõ wouf.
54006012	Momoiya nigin kusĩ biya walouf. Mata ibodkeleya are, õ musei meleid bun el wo, kurõ wesin sain bun, õ anĩ nigin iweignon anĩ urou kafĩ wol.
54006013	Negur ereb ereb ganan mata ifenẽdidig ado, Kristus Jesus ĩ Pontius Pailat mala bun el fe kurõ fesin, idi meleid bun, aya õ orokonok,
54006014	od enei dõ, kerema sã dõ wo ule, neda Odug Jesus Kristus wõ youf,
54006015	are Negur yogon sain bun irou isiyouf, Negur ĩ el fiya ado ĩ dogol Uyu Irouya, king neid King ado odudug neid Odug,
54006016	ĩ dogol ĩ mata ibodkeleya, agef fen, ĩ lalan medeĩya barikã tamom an ileya nigin kisi feleya sã anĩ bun ibodõdig, taka nem to ilen, taka nemeg to ilouf. Ĩ bun yana ado megeir faimud ibodkalauf. Momoi.
54006017	Teneub enei bun safina musei adodo urokenẽdig len, yeneid to dales fen, moni nigin waud to diten, moni are gai to ibodkalauf, anĩ ere, idi neid waud Negur bun dinouf, ĩ ada wauda al fouf nigin, ereb ereb ganan kisi feleya ifanadadig.
54006018	Idi tobonunã biya age dife di, tobonunã biya inid ado dibodõf nigin, dor yaleya nigin ado, ne tã isennẽya nigin urokenẽdiyouf.
54006019	Naab enei bunem, idi safina biya dogo neid dumen nẽ nigin gariya megeir ado dino fen, mudu dino di, iselauf, age de fen, idi mata are mata bagai anĩ dalouf.
54006020	Timoti, ereb ereb õ bun inon anĩ kulatun wo. Momoiya sã neid od ado, kiwai kisi are idegẽya bunem keleĩ biya dedig anĩ so wiyẽ,
54006021	are tunĩ mogo wogõ den, anĩ age de fen, idi momoiya bun tamal ditor diyalelen. Wau ifenẽya õ bun ibodõf.
55001001	Aya, Pol, mata nẽ promis od, are Kristus Jesus bun ibodok anĩ kilei, Negur nẽ oroya bunem Kristus Jesus nẽ aposel wõ aun,
55001002	Timoti, neu kesu oboiyou bun pas enei atotof. Tamada Negur ado neda Odug Kristus Jesus neid wau ifenẽya, wau yũya ado, wau inosiya, õ bun ibodõf.
55001003	Aya õ nigin, toku bõ ado gaa ado, neu kosẽ bun karĩ aul fen, aya, neu talik tar age difen gen, Negur mala bun kisi karẽ bunem, Negur aruna aledig anĩ, de afiyek.
55001004	Ogon maru nigin karĩ aul fen, ileyõya nigin wau fatuk irok, are aya wau fatuk al fouf nigin age afef.
55001005	Aya ogon momoiya idegẽya sã anĩ karĩ aulen, momoiya anĩ, uruwa bun ogon tubũ Lois sinã Yunis ado bun ibodon gen, aya momoi auf, are õ buneg agef ibodok.
55001006	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ ege luwa anĩ kebu wo di, futu rouf nigin wederẽ fokõ afef, Negur nẽ ege luwa are imau teten anon anĩ bunem õ bun ibodok anĩ.
55001007	Negur ada kumĩ nẽ uur to ifanadan, anĩ ere, megeir nẽ, wau laa fiya nẽ ado, ada dug kulatun fiya nẽ uur ifanadan.
55001008	Anĩ nigin, õ neda Odug kurõ fesiya nigin õ to mama yõf, aya ĩ nigin kalabus bun abodok nigineg to mama yõf. Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ megeir bunem, õ aya ado bagu ta fen, biya od nigin darau talouf.
55001009	Negur ĩ kel gei fada fen, fateul ibodõya bun iweignadan, are ada ereb taka age tafen anĩ bunem sã, anĩ ere, ĩ yogon wau irõya ado wau ifenẽya bunem ĩ age fen. Wau ifenẽya enei, Kristus Jesus bun tetunem fau sain gariya inoya sã mog, ifanadan.
55001010	Anĩ ere, wau ifenẽya anĩ gama neda Isennadaya, Kristus Jesus wõ yen anĩ bunem yaoren, ĩ laa anĩ narĩ felen, agef fen, biya od bunem, mata ado faimud ibodkeleya anĩ yaor fen.
55001011	Biya od enei nigin aya soosi tamo, aposel ado ifelnẽya tamo igirnan.
55001012	Age fiya nigin, aya darau enei alef, anĩ ere, aya to mama fiyaf, ere nigin, aya aib nigin momoi aun are aya keleĩ, Odug nẽ naa anĩ nigin, ereb aya ĩ kulatun fouf nigin afenen are, ĩ lo fiya kisi feleya are aya keleĩ.
55001013	Ereb aya bun tamal karĩ won, ifelnẽya biya anĩ, Kristus Jesus bun momoiya waũ laa fiya ado, el wo dõ fen, urou.
55001014	Awa Uur Fateul ada namedan ibodok anĩ nẽ megeir bunem, ereb ereb biya ifonon anĩ kulatun wo.
55001015	Õ keleĩ, Asia provins bun ganan ditornan, idi atun Figelus Hermogenes adog.
55001016	Odug, Onesiforus nẽ ibor bun wau yũya ifelnẽdiyouf nigin aya orouf, ere nigin, ĩ sain musei wau filolõ fiya bunem el fiyadig, aya kokolin difiyan nigin to mama fen.
55001017	Ĩ Rom taun ibodon sain, aya nigin fatuk bagai imirnaf ile, dum fotou fiyan.
55001018	Odug nẽ wau yũya, Odug nẽ naa anĩ bun, Odug ĩ ifenẽf nigin aya orouf! Õ keleĩ bagai, ĩ naig fe naab musei bun Efesus taun oun isennan.
55002001	Anĩ nigin, õ, neu kesu, Kristus Jesus nẽ wau ifenẽya bun megeir uno.
