55002002	Musei meleid bun aya wogõ au di, karĩ won anĩ, karĩya biya tamo anidi ufelnẽdiyouf, ago di, idi bagam tunĩ ifelnẽdiya kisi feleyauf.
55002003	Kristus Jesus nẽ kusĩ tamo biya gen, õ amã geid darau karĩ taul fen, tafarauf.
55002004	Kusĩ tamo ĩ tamo ege neid tobonuneid to kababal fef, ĩ yogon mudur ado anĩ wau al fouf nigin orof.
55002005	Age fiya gen, gudu reya tamo ĩ gudu ref, ĩ gudu reya nẽ suma to dõ fouf are, ĩ uyu irouya nẽ teter to yalouf.
55002006	Kabĩ tamo kabĩ totol yaledig ĩ, ketem kaũ yalouf.
55002007	Aya orok anĩ kisi wo, Odug enei ganan nigin kisi fokõ fonõf.
55002008	Jesus Kristus laa bunem kel fã yen ĩ, Dawid nẽ ibor bun tamal anĩ karĩ walauf. Enei are neu biya od,
55002009	enei nigin aya darau ale fen, mosor tamo gen kokolin difiyan. Ani ere, Negur nẽ od kokolin fiya sã.
55002010	Anĩ nigin, aya igirnẽdin anidi nigin, ereb ereb ganan bun feseya sã afaredig, are idig isennẽya Kristus Jesus bun ibodok anĩ, fula fiya medeĩya ibodkeleya ado dalouf nigin age afedig.
55002011	Od enei momoi bagai: Ada ĩ weim gare taun ouf are, adag ĩ weim mata tabodõf.
55002012	Ada feseya sã tafarauf are, adag ĩ weim lo fiya nẽ mudur tabodõf. Ada ĩ nigin wa tafouf are, ĩg ada nigin wa fouf.
55002013	Ada to dõ tafoufeg, ĩ de agef dõ fouf, ere nigin, ĩ yogo nigin wa fiya kisi feleya sã.
55002014	Idi ereb ereb enei nigin toku wedereid fokõ wouf. Negur mala bun, od luwa irouya nigin wedereid urou, are kaũ sã, are karĩ def anidi tadũ difedidig dogol.
55002015	Õ Negur mala bun, kabĩ tamo ile fen, de youf, are kabĩ tamo ĩ yogon kabĩ nigin to mama fouf, ĩ momoi od tutuk ifelnẽdiya nẽ kabĩ el fe irouwauf anĩ, wõ wouf nigin, kabĩ totol bagai walouf.
55002016	Negur sã ado kaũ sã nẽ od so wiyẽf, ere nigin, idi anĩ bun dilelef are, fau gai momoiya sã bagai wowã douf.
55002017	Idi neid ifelnẽya kaisã bagai gedi gen iyokalauf, idi atun are Himeneus Filetus ado,
55002018	idi momoi nẽ anĩ so difiyẽ diyalelen. Idi dirõdig, mata kel fãya are mogo wõ yen, age de fen, tunĩ neid momoiya daũ difef.
55002019	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ gariya totol ifaref, itotoya enei bun megeir fef, “Aib idi yogon are Odug ĩ keleĩ,” ado, “Ganan idi Odug yana kurõ difesif, sesen bun tamal falei douf bagai.”
55002020	Fõ odug taka bun, safina ereb ereb gariya fire fire nem dinon are dibodok, tunĩ gol ado silwa nem, tunĩ aa nem ado mafer nem dinon, tunĩ kabĩ odug ifenẽya nẽ ado tunĩ kabĩ nanaal ifenẽya nẽ.
55002021	Tamo taka ĩ, sesen enei bun tamal amuyẽ anĩ kulo felef are, ĩ fau kabĩ biya ifenẽya nẽ wõ youf, ĩ fateulouf, Marau mala bun, kabĩ biya yaleya kisi feleya wõ ye fen, kabĩ biya ganan ifenẽya nẽ wõ youf nigin saika fouf.
55002022	Oosi nẽ bouwa oroya sane so wiyẽ, ago fen, madur bagai ibodõya, momoiya, wau laa fiya ado, wau inosiya anĩ, aib idi waud karẽtut bun Odug diweignek anidi geid, dõg.
55002023	Neneya ado wadã keleĩ nẽ luwa irouya anĩ to fedẽ wo, ere nigin, õ keleĩ, are anĩ bunem kiwai wõ yedig.
55002024	Odug nẽ ferfer to kusĩ youf bagai, age fiya ban, ĩ tamo kayau ganan nigin imatẽya ifelnẽdiyouf, ifelnẽdiya kisi feleyauf, to seye youf bagai.
55002025	Idi ĩ kiwai difenek anidi molol nem wedereid urouwauf, ago di, Negur idi waud falei fe di, idi momoi nigin keleĩ youf nigin wau iseya adouf.
55002026	Anĩ bunem, idi wedereid fokõ ye fen, Satan nẽ kor bun tamal, in oroya dõ difouf nigin Satan gei fedin anidi ditor diyawauf.
55003001	Anĩ ere, enei keleĩ youf. Idikeleya naa bun, morõ odug wõ youf.
55003002	Tamo kayau dogo nigin waud laa fouf, moni nigin waud laa fouf, yeneid dalesauf, aya aya yeya, Negur kono difouf, sineid temeid sigoreid wal difouf, disennẽdi di to de difiyẽdiyouf, fateul to dibodõf,
55003003	wau laa fiya sã, kiwai nigin weder tu keleya sã, taka dumen wogõya, yogo nigin kulatun fiya biya sã, nirãya, tobonunã biya nigin kiwai inoya,
55003004	ne tã kiwai ifenẽya, sibuya, kisim aya aya yeya, Negur nigin wau laa fiya ban bouwa nẽ oroya nigin wau laa fiya,
55003005	bouwedim dogol Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ dife fen, in megeir wa difouf. Idi age fediya so weid.
55003006	Age fediya anidim naab dimirek dile, fõ bun dile fen, kayau maleg didegneĩd, dogo neid kisi ulum diroukenẽdidig, kayau mosor beberikã anidi, oroya sane fire fire bun waud dalesedig,
55003007	kayau idi gai toku keleĩ daledig, anĩ ere, momoi anĩ to bagai keleĩdig.
55003008	Janes Jambres ado Moses kiwai difenen gen, tamo enidig momoi anĩ kiwai difenek, tamo anidi kisi gelele fiya ado, momoiya sã nigin itornẽdin.
55003009	Anĩ ere, idi gerõ bai to dilauf, ere nigin, tamo uru age difen gen, idi neid kũ fenẽya tamo kayau ganan meleid bun kaisã yaorouf.
55003010	Anĩ ere, neu ifelnẽya, neu tobonunã, neu kisi gariya, neu momoiya, sain meluk totol ifareya, wau laa fiya, feseya sã ifareya,
55003011	kafĩ fiya, darau, naig be fiya Antiok, Ikonium ado, Listra taun bun darau morõ aya alen anĩ ganan õ keleĩ. Anĩ ere, Odug anĩ ganan bun tamal yalelnan.
55003012	Momoi, tamo kayau ganan, idi Kristus Jesus bun Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ difouf nigin orodiyouf are, idi morõ dalouf.
55003013	Agef mog, tamo sesen ado idegẽya tamo, sane bunem sane bagai lauf, tunĩ didegneĩd mog, abag didegnẽdiyouf.
55003014	Anĩ ere, ogo nigin, ereb õ keleĩ wale fen, momoi won anĩ toko tokõ wo ule, ere nigin, idi difelnon are õ idi nigin keleĩ.
55003015	Agef fen, õ simõ bunem Negur nẽ Itotoya fateul kelein, are õ isennõ di, kisi biya wale fen, Kristus Jesus nigin momoiya bunem, kel yaleyõya kisi feleyauf.
55003016	Negur nẽ Itotoya ganan are Negur awa uur neseya bunem, are ifelnẽya, sakãya, madur fiya ado, madur ibodõya tai fiya nigin biya.
55003017	Age fe di, Negur nẽ tamo, kabĩ biya ganan yaleya nigin kisi feleya bagai youf.
55004001	Negur ado, Kristus Jesus ĩ isi fen, in tano inouf sain bun, ĩ mata dibodok ado gare den anidi es fediyouf anĩ, idi meleid bun, aya od enei totol bagai arokonok.
55004002	Biya od wogõ wo; biya od wogõya nigin, sain biya bun ado sain sane bun dodok wo, sain meluk feseya sã ifareya ado faded fiya bunem, madur wo, totol od urokeneĩd, waud walesauf.
55004003	Sain fau isiyouf bun, tamo biya od nigin to wedereid dinouf. Age fiya ban, idi dogo neid oroya dõ dife fen, wederedim karĩya nigin gegeĩ fedidig anĩ karĩ douf nigin, idegẽya ifelnẽdiya tamo musei gou difediyouf.
55004004	Idi fau momoi anĩ ditor ken, wedereid fitok du ken, nenerĩ ege anĩ karĩ douf.
55004005	Anĩ ere, õ ereb ereb ganan bun kisi fokõ wol fen, morõ faali wo, soosi kabĩ wale, ogon kabĩ ganan walel anĩ kisi falauf.
55004006	Aya mogo wain sesewi fiya gen fi afalau fenẽ, agef fen, neu ileya sain mogo isil.
55004007	Aya biya kusĩ aun, aya gudu reya mogo bure afelen, aya momoiya kafĩ afelen.
55004008	Gama aya nigin, madur bagai nẽ teter dodok fe ibodok, are Odug, Es Fiya Tamo madur bagai, fau naa anĩ bun ifanau fenẽ, anĩ ere, aya dogol sã, idi in isiya tari difef anidig ifenẽdiyouf.
55004009	Aya gein kaisã bagai usiyouf nigin kabĩ totol wale.
55004010	Ere nigin, Demas ĩ tenebur enei nẽ nigin wau laa fen nigin, itorna fen, Tesalonika taun ilen. Kresen ĩ Galesia provins ilen, age fe di, Taitus ĩ Dalmesia distrik ilen.
55004011	Luk dogol aya ado mabodok. Mak wale fen, urom usig, ere nigin, ĩ neu kabĩ nigin isennaya kisi feleya.
55004012	Aya Tikikus Efesus taun sur afen.
55004013	Õ usiyouf sain bun, neu saket meluk Karpus nẽ fõ bun Troas taun oun atoron anĩ wale urou usiyouf, neu buk kori fediya anĩg urou usiyouf, anĩ atun neu buk kori fediya meme gabar bun itotoya nẽ anĩ to bagai utorõf.
55004014	Aleksanda ain kabĩ tamo ĩ, aya gai kiwai totol bagai ifanan. Odug fau ĩ ereb age fen anĩ nigin mala solo sane ifenẽf.
55004015	Õg ĩ nigin lo welei, ere nigin, ĩ neda od nigin totol bagai kiwai inon.
55004016	Aya uruwa kot bun afaren sain, takam to isennan, anĩ ere, ganan ditornan. Anĩ nẽ mala solo to ifenẽdiyouf nigin aya orouf.
55004017	Anĩ ere, Odug aya sirun ifar fen, megeir ifanan. Age fe di, aya bunem biya od kisi feleya bagai wogõ au di, haiden ganan karĩ douf nigin age fen. Agef fen, aya laion awa bun tamal yalelnan.
55004018	Odug fau kiwai sane ganan bun tamal yalelna fen, karika bagai in saa tanon irou iseleyauf. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
55004019	Prisila, Akwila ado, Onesiforus nẽ ibor tar geid, aanya enei wenẽdiyouf.
55004020	Erastus Korin taun ibodon, agef mog, aya Trofimus dagi mog, Miletus taun oun atornen.
55004021	Yau sain fau mog, ein kaisã usiyouf nigin kabĩ totol wale. Yubulus, Pudens, Linus, Klodia ado momoiya turã tar ganan aanya sur difonok.
55004022	Odug ogon uur ado ibodõf. Wau ifenẽya ã bun ibodõf.
56001001	Aya Pol, Negur nẽ ferfer, Jesus Kristus nẽ aposel, Negur igirnẽdin neid momoiya nigin ado, momoi nẽ keleĩ uyu irou di, idi fateul bagai dibodõf nigin, igirnan,
56001002	momoiya ado keleĩ anĩ, mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ wau iseya bun ibodok, mata faimud ibodkeleya anĩ nigin Negur ĩ to idegẽdig, fau sain gariya inoya sã mog, wau kuturol fen, promis od iron.
56001003	Agef fen, yogon sain bun bagai, Negur neda Isennadaya ĩ irõ di, aya biya od wogõya kabĩ ifanan anĩ bunem wogõ au di, in od yaoren,
56001004	Taitus, neu kesu bagai, ada momoiya tekelei ado õ bun pas enei atotof: Negur Tamada ado Kristus Jesus neda Isennadaya neid wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya õ bun ibodõf.
56001005	Aya Krit nuyo an atornon anĩ nẽ gariya are, ereb bure felediya san anĩ madur woid fen, taun ganan bun uyu irouya, aya õ orokonon gen ugirnẽdiyouf nigin.
56001006	Uyu irouya are ĩ bouwa od sã, kayau tekelei aiwa, tamo ĩ ne gere tar momoiya ado, tetẽya, idodõya sã.
56001007	Sios lo fiya tamo ĩ, Negur nẽ kabĩ ifenẽya nigin, ĩ bouwa od sã, to aya dogol yedig, kaisã to name isedig, aai fatuk to yõdig, to kusĩ yedig, idegẽya bunem safina to yaledig.
56001008	Agef mã, ĩ tamo yaledig, ereb biya nigin wau laa fedig, ĩ kisi biya ado ibodõdig, madur, fateul, ĩ yogo nigin biya kulatun fedig.
56001009	Ĩ momoiya od difelnen anĩ irou kafĩ falauf, anĩ bunem, ĩ sã tunĩ keleĩ biya bunem waud yalesauf, agef fen, ĩ idi keleĩ biya od nigin kiwai dinon anidi faded fiyẽdiyouf bagai.
56001010	Ere nigin, an idodõya tamo, od kaũ sã, idegẽya temeleid musei difaref, idi atun mulũ bun temeleid anidim age difedig bagai.
56001011	Idi sigoreid ufofãf, ere nigin, idi idegẽya bunem safina yaleya nigin to ifelnẽya nẽ anĩ difelneĩd fen, fõ fõ adok daũ difedif.
56001012	Idi neid fonõ profet taka eig ye iron, “Krit tamo kayau idi faimud idegẽya temeleid, gaar kuĩ sane gen, fõ temeleid saaf weweneid.”
56001013	Od enei are momoi. Anĩ nigin, totol od urokeneĩd, ou wiyẽdiyouf, ago di, anĩ idi neid momoiya biyauf,
56001014	anĩ bunem, idi Juda neid nenerĩ kaũ sã to karĩ douf, age de fen, idi momoi nẽ anĩ ditoron anidi neid od to dõ difouf.
56001015	Karẽ bun temeleid bun, ereb ereb ganan karẽ, anĩ ere, idi amuyẽ kisi ado momoiya sã anidi bun, karẽ taka sã. Momoi, idi neid waud ado kisi es fiya sane len.
56001016	Idi Negur keleĩ dedig, anĩ ere, nedi tobonuneid bun, idi Negur nigin wa difedig. Idi sane bagai, idodõya temeleid, idi ereb biya age fiya nigin kisi feleya sã.
56002001	Õ ereb biya od wogõ yef anĩ kilei ufelnẽdiyouf.
56002002	Tamo biyeid dogo nigin biya kulatun difouf nigin, idi anĩ karĩ difiyẽdiyouf nigin, idi kisi biya ado dibodõf nigin ado, momoiya, waud laa fiya ado, feseya sã ifareya bun madur dibodõf nigin ufelnẽdiyouf bagai.
56002003	Age fiya bagai, kayau biyeideg karĩ del dibodõf nigin, taka dumen od to dirõf nigin, wain fatuk bagai to dãf nigin, agef fen, ereb biya anĩ difelnẽdiyouf nigin ufelneĩd.
56002004	Ago di, idi, kayau momoul, nedi aiweid tar adodo kesu tar nigin waud laa fouf nigin, tai difediyouf,
56002005	idi dogo nigin, sã biya kulatun difouf nigin ado bouweid od sã dibodõf nigin, fõ bun kabĩ dalouf nigin, tobonunã biya age difouf nigin ado, aiweid tar nigin karĩ difediyouf, age dife di, taka nem Negur nẽ od to kobu fouf nigin, kayau momoul tai difediyouf.
56002006	Age fiya gen bagai, kesu gaũ, dogo nigin biya kulatun difouf nigin wedereid urou.
56002007	Ereb ereb ganan bun, idi dile fen, dõ difouf nigin ereb ereb biya ago. Ogon ifelnẽya bun, õ tutuk ifareya, wau adok ifelnẽdiya bun ifenẽya,
56002008	wogõ biya tamo to kiwai difenẽf nẽ anĩ ufelnẽdiyouf, ago di, idi kiwai difonok anĩ mama fediyouf, ere nigin, idi ada nigin ereb sane taka wogõya nigin are sã.
56002009	Ferfer, ereb ereb ganan bun, nedi moroid tar karĩ difediyouf, waud al fiya difenẽdiyouf, aiteid to solo difouf,
56002010	idi bun tamal bẽ to dalouf, idi nedi moroid tar nẽ od dõ fiya biya bagai anĩ difelnẽdiyouf nigin ufelnẽdiyouf, age dife di, naab ganan bun, idi age difef bunem, Negur neda Isennadaya nigin ifelnẽya anĩ, tamo meleid bun biya ile di, tamo neid oroya anĩ bun dinouf.
56002011	Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya, isennẽya irou isidig anĩ, tamo ganan bun isin.
56002012	Anim, Negur nẽ tobonunã dõ fiya sã ado tenebur nẽ oroya sane bun, “Bai” yeya nigin ifelnadadig, agef fen, ada dug nigin biya kulatun ibodõya, madur ibodõya ado, Negur nẽ oroya bun, gama sain enei bun ibodõya nigin, ifelnadadig,
56002013	agef mã, ada el fiya nẽ wauda iseya, are neda Negur odug ado Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus ĩ, fula fiya medeĩya ado isiyouf anĩ tarĩ tafouf,
56002014	Jesus Kristus ĩ yogo luwa ada nigin itoron, are ĩ sesen ganan bun tamal yalelnada fen, ĩ yogo nigin yogon tamo kayau bagai kulo fele di, idi ereb biya age difouf nigin kabĩ totol dalouf nigin, ĩ age fen.
56002015	Ereb ereb enei õ ufelnẽdiyouf. Ogon totol ganan bunem, idi neid waud wales fen, wedereid urou. To loloum weid len, õ lai diyõf.
56003001	Tamo kayau wedereid fokõ wo, are idi lo fiya ado yeneid adodo tamo karĩ difediyouf, to didodõf, idi biya age difouf nigin ololo difouf,
56003002	taka to bouwa bun od dũf, wau inosiya ado waud difenẽdiyouf, tamo ganan bun dimatkesiyouf nigin ago.
56003003	Adag kulu kisi neneya adon, tadodon, didegnadan, tenebur nẽ oroya fire fire ado bouwa nẽ oroya fire fire nẽ ferfer tabodon. Ada tobonunã sesen ado kiyeĩ bun tabodon, to dileda orodin, adag taileid to orodan.
56003004	Anĩ ere, Negur neda Isennadaya nẽ tobonunã biya ado wau laa fiya wõ ye fen,
56003005	ĩ isennadan, are ada ereb madur age tafen anĩ bunem sã, are yogon wau yũya bunem. Ĩ mata wõya nẽ naan kulo fiya bunem ado, Awa Uur Fateulem mata falei fiya bunem isennadan.
56003006	Negur ĩ, Jesus Kristus neda Isennadaya bunem, Awa Uur Fateul, ada bun kisi feleya bagai foula fen,
56003007	are yogon wau ifenẽya bunem madur fadan, anĩ bunem, ada mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ wauda iseya ado fen, in akor anĩ talouf nigin age fen.
56003008	Od enei momoi bagai, anĩ nigin, aya, õ enei totol wogõ wo di, Negur nigin momoi def anidi karĩ del fen, ereb biya anĩ el de age difouf anĩ orouf. Enei ganan are biya bagai, tamo ganan nigin deuf.
56003009	Anĩ ere, neneya kisi abob fe fiyẽya anĩ, ibor dir fiya, monẽya ado, lo nigin luwa irouya anĩ sese wiyeĩd, ere nigin, anidi are kaũ sã, kabĩ ifenẽya kisi feleya sã.
56003010	Taka ĩ, ã atun fara fef, uruwa bun weder urouwauf, ago fen, babaneg weder urouwauf. Anĩ bure fele di, ĩ utornẽf.
56003011	Õ keleĩ youf, tamo age fiya are wau gogil fen, mosor bun ilen, ĩ yogo bouwa sanen inon.
56003012	Sain aya õ gein Artemas be Tikikus sur afiyẽ di, õ Nikopolis an, aya gein kaisã isiya nigin, totol bagai naab umirẽf, ere nigin, yau sain bun aya an abodõf nigin kisi anon.
56003013	Lo keleĩ tamo Senas ado Apolos, idi neid naab dilauf nigin, ereb ereb ganan usennẽdiyouf, ago di, idi ereb lau fiya sã dilauf.
56003014	Neda tamo kayau idig, ereb ereb biya age fiya nigin, idi de keleĩ anĩ dalouf bagai, are idi naa ganan nẽ safina dale fen, kaũ sã to dibodõf nigin age difouf.
56003015	Ganan aya geid mabodok anidim, õ bun aanya sur mafef. Momoiya bun amã nigin waud laa fef anidi aan wiyeĩd. Wau ifenẽya ã ganan bun ibodõf.
57001001	Aya, Pol, Kristus Jesus nẽ kalabus tamo, neda turada Timoti ado, oboida ado kabĩ turada Filemon gein,
57001002	mainada Afia, kusĩ tamo turada Akipus ado, sios ogon fõ bun guru difedig gein pas enei matotof.
57001003	Wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya, Negur neda Tamada ado Odug Jesus Kristus bunem õ bun ibodõf.
57001004	Aya, neu kosẽ bun, õ nigin karĩ aul fen, neu Negur faimud de afiyẽdig,
57001005	ere nigin, aya, ogon momoiya Odug Jesus bun ilen anĩ karĩ au fen, Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan nigin ogon waũ laa fiya anĩ karĩ audig.
57001006	Aya, õ amã geid ogon momoiya nẽ uyu kũ fiya anĩ kabĩ yale di, ereb ereb biya ganan, Kristus bun ada talef anĩ, õ kisi feleya bagai keleĩ youf nigin kosẽ auf.
57001007	Ogon waũ laa fiya anim, wau al fiya odug ifana fen, neu wau yalesen, ere nigin, turau õ, Negur nẽ tamo kayau neid waud filolõ fiya wenẽdin.
57001008	Anĩ nigin, Kristus bunem aya sã megeir afar fen, õ arokonõ di, ereb õ agouf nigin kisi feleya,
57001009	anĩ ere, aya wau laa fiya bun afar fen, totol bagai to ayok. Aya, Pol, tamo tubau fen, gama Kristus Jesus nẽ kalabus tamo,
57001010	aya neu kesu Onesimus nigin totol bagai to ayok, ĩ kokolin afar mog, neu kesu wõ yen.
57001011	Kulu ĩ õ nigin to biyan, anĩ ere, gama ĩ ada uruwom nigin biya bagai.
57001012	Aya, ĩ, õ gein kel sur afef, ĩ aya neu oboiyou.
57001013	Aya ĩ uruwom mabodom are, sain aya biya od nigin kokolin afar mog, ĩ ogon modoũ yale fen, isennam.
57001014	Anĩ ere, aya õ waũ to irõ mog, aya ereb taka naig be fiya age afouf nigin to oroun, are õ nugo yõya bunem sã, ogon oroya dõ wo agouf nigin age afen.
57001015	Momoi, ĩ õ uruwom sain naal bagai fara gen nẽ gariya are, õ ĩ baban gai gai kel walouf nigin be,
57001016	ĩ baban ferfer gen sã, anĩ ere, ferfer wal fiya, turã bagai. Ĩ aya bun neu oboiyou, anĩ ere, ĩ õ bun ogon oboi bagai neu wal fiya, are tamo nẽ lo fiya bun ado Odug nẽ lo fiya bun age fiyauf.
57001017	Anĩ nigin, õ, aya ogon kabĩ turã gen ago kisi wouf are, aya aan wiyaf gen, ĩg ago aan wiyẽf.
57001018	Ĩ õ bun ereb sane taka age fen be, ereb wareg taka adouf, wareg are aya bun uno.
57001019	Aya, Pol, imaum bagai enei atotof. Aya fau aba afonõf, aya, õ aya bun ogon mata nigin wareg ado anĩ nigin õ to arokonok.
57001020	Turau, aya fau õ bun tamal, ereb biya Odug bun alouf nigin orouf, Kristus bun, aya wau filolõ fiya wana.
57001021	Ogon dõ fiya anĩ momoi auf nigin, aya atotkonok, aya to ayok anĩ wal fiya agouf anĩ aya keleĩ.
57001022	Agef fen takag yeir. Aab taka, aya nigin dodok wana, ere nigin, ãgenei kosẽya bunem, aya baban ã bun kelau asi, an abodõf nigin, aya wau isef.
57001023	Epafras, Kristus Jesus bun neu kalabus turau, õ bun aanya sur fef.
57001024	Mak, Aristakus, Demas ado, Luk, neu kabĩ turau tar idig age difef.
57001025	Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ãgenei uur bun ibodõf.
58001001	Kulu Negur, profet bunem, sain musei ado naab fire fire bun, tubuda tar wogõ fiyẽdin,
58001002	anĩ ere, gama idikeleya naa enidi bun, ĩ Naal bunem wogõ fadan, Naal ĩ ereb ereb ganan akorouf nigin Negurem igirnen, ĩ bunem saa teneub ado inon.
58001003	Naal ĩ Negur nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nẽ so fiya, ĩ Negur yogo gen bagai, in od totol ado bunem ereb ereb ganan megeir irou ifaref. Ĩ mosor lilik fiya anĩ age fel fen, saa ilun Negur Megeir Bagai ima biyalẽ ibodon.
58001004	Negur, Naal yana ifenen are engel yeneid wal fiya, age fiya bagai, Naal ĩ engel wal fediya.
58001005	Ere nigin, Negur ĩ yogon engel taka to eig ye irokenen, “Õ neu Kesu, gama aya õ Tamã wõ aul.” Takag, Negur ĩ engel taka nigin to eig ye iron, “Aya yogon Tama abodõf, ĩ neu Kesu ibodõf.”
58001006	Takag, Negur ĩ yogon kesu matu tenebur ein irou isif sain bun, ĩ baban irok, “Negur nẽ engel ganan ĩ seli dalouf.”
58001007	Negur ĩ engel nigin irok, “Ĩ yogon engel yau gen wowã douf nigin inodif, ĩ yogon kabĩ tamo yã bale gen wowã douf nigin inodif.”
58001008	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ Naal nigin irok, “O Negur, ogon tano gai gai ibodkalauf, õ ogon tano tobonunã madur bagai bun lo wouf.
58001009	Õ tobonunã madur bagai nigin waũ laaf fen, tobonunã sane anĩ sese wedig, anĩ nigin, Negur, ogon Negur kulĩya nẽ moul õ bun fi felen, anĩ bunem, nẽ tã tar wal feid fen, ilun inenon.”
58001010	Takag, ĩ irok, “O Odug, gariya bun õ teneub nẽ gariya kare won, õ imam saa unon.
58001011	Idi fau inanakalauf, anĩ ere, õ fau ubodõf, idi ganan kolos gen sanef ilauf.
58001012	Õ idi saket gen kori wediyouf, idi kolos gen falei wediyouf. Anĩ ere, õ ubodok gen ago ubodõf, ogon sain to idikalauf.”
58001013	Negur ĩ yogon engel taka to eig ye irokenen, “Imau biyalẽ ubod mog, ogon kiwai tar õ yẽ inoya nẽ sawa anouf.”
58001014	Age fiyauf are, engel idi ere? Idi uur Negur nẽ kabĩ daledig, tamo kayau isennẽya dalouf anidi disennẽdiyouf nigin Negurem idi sur fedidig.
58002001	Anĩ nigin, ada karĩ taun anĩ fatuk bagai lo tafalauf, anĩ bunem, ada to kũ tafenẽf.
58002002	Negur nẽ od tubuda tar bun engel bunem wogõ difiyẽdin are totol ado ibodon, anĩ nigin, idi od anĩ didod ken, to dõ difen anidi are, anĩ kilei mala solo darau dalen.
58002003	Anĩ nigin, ada isennẽya odug anĩ to karĩ tafiyẽf are, naig ta tayalalauf? Uruwa bun Odug ĩ isennẽya enei nigin wogõ yen, age fe di, idi ĩ karĩ difiyen anidim, isennẽya are momoi anĩ, ada bun yaor difen.
58002004	Uris, ereb urug bagai, memelik fire fire bunem ado, Negur yogon oroya bunem Awa Uur Fateul ege luwa gadõ fedin anim, Negur ĩg isennẽya od anĩ megeir fen.
58002005	Negur ĩ, engel, teneub mata isiyouf tau fen, wogõ taudig anĩ nẽ lo fiya tamo, to inenẽdin.
58002006	Anĩ ere, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun taka nem mogo eig ye iron: “Tamo ĩ ere anĩ, õ ĩ nigin kisi wof? Tamo naal ĩ ere anĩ, õ ĩ nigin karĩ weledig?
58002007	Õ ĩ sain naal engel farumedin unenen, õ ĩ fula fiya medeĩya yana ado anĩ nẽ teter kurũ wiye ken,
58002008	ye farumen ereb ereb ganan gõ welen.” Negur ĩ farumen ereb ereb ganan gõ felen, are ereb taka ĩ farumen sã anĩ taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, gama ada ereb ereb ganan ĩ farumen ifaref anĩ to tailef.
58002009	Anĩ ere, Jesus Negurem ĩ sain naal engel farumedin inene ken, ĩ darau yale laa fen nigin, gama ĩ fula fiya medeĩya yana ado anĩ nẽ teter kurũ fiyen anĩ ada tailef, are Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya bunem, ĩ tamo kayau ganan nigin laa ilen.
58002010	Negur ereb ereb ganan, yogo nigin ado yogo bunem inon, ĩ kesu tar musei fula fiya medeĩya bun irou isiyouf nigin, tamo kel gei fiya nẽ marau Jesus, darau bunem kisi feleya bagai wõ youf nigin agef inenen, are tutuk.
58002011	Yogo tamo kayau fateul ifenẽdif ado, fateuledif anidi geid, ibor tekeleif. Anĩ nigin, Jesus idi turau tar fiyẽdiya nigin to mama fef.
58002012	Ĩ irok, “Aya õ yanã neu turau tar bun kurõ afalaisiyouf, tamo kayau guru difef meleid bun, aya õ selĩ abiyouf nigin seg alouf.”
58002013	Ĩ baban irok, “Aya ĩ bun neu momoiya anouf.” Takag, ĩ baban irok, “Aya yeir, Negur ĩ gere tar ifanan geid.”
58002014	Gere tar idi bouweid ado naudeid ado nigin, ĩg bouwa ado naud ado idi gen wõ yen, are ĩ yogon laa bunem, Satan ĩ laa nẽ megeir irouf anĩ daũ falauf nigin ado,
58002015	idi laa nigin kumĩ de fen, sain ganan anĩ nẽ ferfer dibodok disin anidi kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
58002016	Are momoi bagai, Jesus ĩ engel to isennẽdif, anĩ ere, ĩ Abraham nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar isennẽdif.
58002017	Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ, Jesus naab ganan bun yogon tura tar gen inenen, are Jesus ĩ pris mudur wau yũya, dõ fiya biya ado wõ ye fen, Negur aruna yalouf nigin ado, ĩ Negur nẽ didi yof fen, tamo kayau neid mosor yalelkenẽdiya kabĩ yalouf nigin age fen.
58002018	Jesus yogo bun kisi fiya wõ yen sain bun, ĩ morõ yalen, anĩ nigin, ĩ idi kisi fiya bun difaref anidi isennẽdiya kisi feleya.
58003001	Anĩ nigin, fateul turau tar, ãg Negurem iweignein, Jesus ĩ yogo aposel ado pris mudur, are ada ĩ nigin momoi tauf taudig, ĩ bun kisi fatuk tanouf.
58003002	Moses ĩ Negur nẽ fõ ganan bun, Negur nẽ od el fe dõ fedig, age fiya bagai, Jesus ĩ, Negur ĩ igirnen anĩ ait el fe dõ fedig.
58003003	Fõ inoya tamo yogo yana odug yaledig, fõ anĩ wal fiya. Age fiya bagai, Jesus ĩ yana odug bagai, Moses wal fiya.
58003004	Fõ ganan fõ inoya tamo ado, anĩ ere, Negur ĩ yogo ereb ereb ganan inoya marau.
58003005	Moses ĩ, Negur nẽ fõ ganan bun kabĩ tamo ibod ken, Negur nẽ od el fe dõ fedig, agef fen, ĩ Negur dumen bun ereb wogõ youf anĩ kurõ fesin.
58003006	Anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ Negur Naal, ĩ Negur ait el fe dõf fen, Negur nẽ fõ lo fedig. Anĩ nigin, ada toku totol tano fen, wauda isef anĩ nigin yanada talesef anĩ tarou tokõ tafalauf are, ada yogon fõ.
58003007	Anĩ nigin, Awa Uur Fateul eig ye irok kilei ago gouf: “Gama ã, Negur nẽ ait karĩ gouf are,
58003008	ã oun gerere tuan Negur kisi wiyẽg fen, kiwai wenẽgen age fiya gen, ã wauĩ to agef totolouf.
58003009	An temeĩ tar aya kisi difiya fen, kiwai difanan, are idi yar foti bun ereb age afen are dilen.
58003010	Anĩ nigin, aya ibor anidi nigin seye ise fen, oron, ‘Idi neid waud faimud itorna fen, fire iledig, age de fen, idi neu naab to keleĩdig.’
58003011	Anĩ nigin, aya seye ise fen, wau kuturol fen, oron, ‘Idi neu si inoya bun to bagai dilauf.’”
58003012	Turau tar, ã takam, wau sane ado momoiya sã anim, mata ibodõya Negur dudum fiyẽf anĩ to ago gouf nigin lo welegei.
58003013	Anĩ ere, od ‘Gama’ yeya Negur nẽ Itotoya bun yenek anĩ, ada bun fau agef yenẽf are, naa ganan bun abob wau talesagauf, anĩ bunem, ã taka mosorem idegnẽ di, wau to totolouf.
58003014	Uruwa bun ada kisi totol adon anĩ, kafĩ tafel tarou, idikeleya bun talauf are, ada Kristus nẽ ereb ereb ganan weim talef.
58003015	Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Gama ã Negur nẽ ait karĩ gouf are, ãgenei tubuĩ tar Negur kiwai difenen age fiya gen, ã wauĩ to agef totolouf.”
58003016	Are aiyaim karĩ de fen, kiwai dinon? Idi ganan Mosesem Isip tamal guri feid dilen anidim sã de?
58003017	Negur aiyai nigin yar foti wau sanen? Idi mosor dino fen, gerere tuan gare den anidi nigin sã de?
58003018	Negur aiyai nigin wau kuturol fen, idi yogon si inoya bun to bagai dilauf yen? Idi yogon od to dõ difen anidi nigin sã de?
58003019	Anĩ nigin, ada tailef, are idi to momoi den nigin, namen ileya kisi feleya san.
58004001	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ si inoya bun ileya nigin, Negur nẽ promis od anĩ fau yenek nigin, ã takam si inoya bun ileya nigin ã to biya ya anĩ, Negurem to ilouf nigin lo tafalauf.
58004002	Ere nigin, idi karĩ den gen, adag biya od karĩ taun. Idi od karĩ den, anĩ ere, idi bun faat yũya sã, ere nigin, idi od karĩ den sain, idi momoiya ado od anĩ to dalen.
58004003	Gama ada mogo momoi taun, are si inoya anĩ bun telef. Are idi to momoi den nigin Negur eig ye iron kilei, “Aya seye ise fen, wau kuturol fen, oron, ‘Idi neu si inoya bun to bagai dilauf.’” Negur nẽ kabĩ teneub kare fiya sain bun mogo bure felen, anĩ ere, ĩ od agef iron.
58004004	Negur nẽ Itotoya bun, Negur naa sewen nigin eig ye wogõ yen, “Naa sewen bun, Negur ĩ yogon kabĩ ganan bun si inon.”
58004005	Baban Negur nẽ Itotoya enei bun, ĩ eig ye irok, “Idi neu si inoya bun to bagai dilauf.”
58004006	Anĩ nigin, tunĩ si inoya anĩ bun sã dilauf nigin fau ibodok, anĩ ere, idi uyulil biya od karĩ den anidi, si inoya anĩ bun to dilen, ere nigin, idi od anĩ to dõ difen.
58004007	Anĩ nigin, sain meluk ilele di, Negur baban naa taka igir ken, are “Gama” yen anĩ, Negur ĩ Dawid sigor bunem wogõ yen, are mogo iron gen: “Gama ã, Negur nẽ ait karĩ gouf are, ã wauĩ to totolouf.”
58004008	Josua ĩ si inoya anĩ to ifenẽdin, ĩ si inoya anĩ ifenẽdim are, Negur anĩ dumen naa taka nigin to wogõ yem.
58004009	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ tamo kayau neid Sabat si inoya fau ibodok.
58004010	Ere nigin, Negur ĩ yogon kabĩ bun si inon kilei, taka ĩ Negur nẽ si inoya bun ilef, ĩg yogon kabĩ bun si inof.
58004011	Are, taka nem, od to dõ difen anidi to dõ feid fen, kubũ youf nigin, si inoya anĩ bun ileya nigin kabĩ totol bagai talouf.
58004012	Negur nẽ od mata ibod ken, kabĩ totol yalef, are dimig waila si sitakã wal fiya. Are malakanon uur ado, tuwa katõ fiya, tuwa nẽ seselina ado atun borũ fel si sitakãdig. Are wau bun kisi ado oroya es fedig.
58004013	Ereb ereb ganan inodin are Negur mala bun taka to iminek. Ereb ereb ganan ĩ mala bun lelek feleya ado yaor. Ĩ bun ada ereb age tafen anĩ faded tafiyẽf.
58004014	Anĩ nigin, pris mudur odug saa ilun Negur gein iselen, are Jesus Negur Naal, ada ĩ ado nigin, ada momoiya kurõ tafesif anĩ tarou kafĩ tafalauf.
58004015	Are, neda pris mudur ĩ, neda felu yabiya keleĩ bagai nigin, wau yũya yaleya kisi feleya, ĩ ada gen mogo naab ganan bun kisi fiya yalen, anĩ ere, ĩ mosor sã.
58004016	Anĩ nigin, ada megeir tano fen, Negur nẽ sia wagen talauf, an wau ifenẽya ibodok, anĩ bunem, ada neda lau fiya sain bun, ada isennadauf nigin wau yũya tale fen, wau ifenẽya fotou tafouf.
58005001	Pris mudur idi ganan tamo atun yale fen, tamo kayau nigin Negur aruna dale, mosor nigin ofa ado sesewi fiya difenẽf nigin igirnẽdin.
58005002	Ĩg yogo felu yabidig nigin, idi to kelei ken, kũ difenek anidi, molol nem isennẽdiya kisi feleya.
58005003	Age fiya nigin, ĩ tamo kayau neid mosor nigin ado, yogon mosor nigineg sesewi fedig.
58005004	Taka nem, pris mudur, yana odug anĩ, ĩ yogo bouwa bun to inodig, anĩ ere, ĩ Aron gen, Negurem dogol igirnẽdig.
58005005	Age fiya gen, Kristus ĩg pris mudur ibodõf nẽ fula fiya medeĩya yogo bouwa bun to inon. Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ irokenen, “Õ neu Kesu, gama aya õ Tamã wõ aul.”
58005006	Ĩ taka bun eig ye irok, “Õ faimud ubodkalauf nẽ pris, Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun.”
58005007	Jesus ĩ tenebur mata ibodon sain bun, ĩ inã odug marum fe fen, Negur ĩ laa bun tamal isennẽya nigin kisi feleya, ĩ bun kosẽ ye fen, igonen. Jesus ĩ imatkeis fen, Negur farumen ibodon nigin, Negur ĩ karĩ fiyen.
58005008	Jesus ĩ Negur Naal, anĩ ere, ĩ darau yalen anĩ bunem, dõ fiya nigin keleĩ yale fen,
58005009	kisi feleya bagai wõ yen. Agef fen, ĩ ait dõ difef ganan neid mata ibodkeleya kel gei fiya nẽ gariya wõ ye di,
58005010	Negur ĩ Jesus Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun pris mudur inenen.
58005011	Amã enei nigin wogõya musei ado, anĩ ere, amã faded yeĩya nigin totol, ere nigin, ã keleĩya nigin forõ gef.
58005012	Ã tise wõya nigin sain meluk adon, anĩ ere, ã fau taka nem Negur nẽ od tamo mata urug ifelnẽdidig age fiya baban ifelneĩf nigin ubodõgef. Ã fau su yõya nigin yenek, saaf totol yõya nigin kisi feleya sã.
58005013	Taka ĩ su yoko are ĩ fau momou, anĩ nigin, ĩ madur bagai nẽ ifelnẽya keleĩ sã.
58005014	Anĩ ere, saaf totol are biyeid neid, idi tai fiya bun, kisi def dile fen, enei biya, enei saneya keleĩdig.
58006001	Anĩ nigin, ada, ifelnẽya gariya bunem Kristus nigin kelein daũ are tator ken, keleĩ tõya bagai bun talauf. Ada keleĩ eig fediya nigin baban to gariya tanouf, are laa ileya nẽ suma bun tamal faleiya, Negur nigin momoiya,
58006002	naan igũdiya, ima teten inoya, laa bun tamal kel fãya ado, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ es fiya.
58006003	Negur wau irõf are, ada keleĩ mugier bagai talauf.
58006004	Idi Negur nẽ fula fiya mogo dalen, idi saa ilun nẽ ege luwa mogo kobũ de dilen, idi Awa Uur Fateul dalen,
58006005	idi Negur nẽ od are biya bagai ado, sain fau isiyouf anĩ nẽ megeir mogo kelein,
58006006	age difen anidi momoiya folõ difalauf are, idi baban waud faleiya nigin guri feid isiya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, idi dogo baban Negur Naal aa tetek bun du ken, mal atun mama difenek.
58006007	Teneub anĩ bun sain musei uyẽ isi lũf fen, kabĩ moroid saaf ifenẽdidig, teneub are Negur el fiya ifenẽdig.
58006008	Anĩ ere, teneub bun malũ duri ado lili isedif, are teneub to biya, gelu fiya melsã ibodok. Idikeleya bun yã malan isaikalauf.
58006009	Oboimã tar, amã eig ma wogõ mauf, anĩ ere, amã ã bun age fiya to wõ ye fen, biya fiya ã bun isiyouf nigin momoi mauf, biya fiya are kel gei fiya ado isiyouf.
58006010	Negur ĩ madur, ĩ, ãgenei kabĩ ado wauĩ laa fiya, are ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau usennẽdigef usigef bunem Negur ufelnẽgef anĩ, weder to tu kalauf.
58006011	Amã, ã mugu mugu kabĩ totol eig fiya bagai walegef uleg, idikeleya bun ulagauf anĩ oromak, ago ge di, ãgenei wauĩ iseya anĩ agef kisi falauf.
58006012	Amã, ã fõ yeĩf anĩ to oromak, anĩ ere, ã, idi momoi de, to fese de fen, ereb Negur ĩ afeneĩf yen anĩ dalef anidi, madẽ wedig ago gouf anĩ oromak.
58006013	Negur ĩ Abraham age afouf fiyen sain bun, taka Negur yogo wal fiya, ĩ yana bunem Negur wau kuturoleya od wogõya nigin taka to ibodon, anĩ nigin, ĩ yogo wau kuturol fen,
58006014	iron, “Aya momoi bagai el fiya afon ken, momoi bagai gerẽ tar musei afonõf.”
58006015	Age ye di, Abraham ĩ feseya sã tari fef ile, Negur afonõf yen anĩ yalen.
58006016	Tamo idi waud kuturol fen, dogo neid od megeir difouf are, tamo ĩ idi wal fediya yana bunem megeir difedig. Waud kuturoleya od anim, od wogõ def anĩ megeir fe fen, luwa irouya ganan irukaka kesidig.
58006017	Age fiya bagai, Negur age afouf yen anĩ dalouf anidi bun, Negur ĩ yogon kisi to bagai falei youf anĩ yaor fenẽdiyouf nigin, ĩ wau kuturoleya od wogõ yen anim, ĩ age afouf yen anĩ, megeir fen.
58006018	Od uru enei, are od Negur age afouf yen ado wau kuturoleya od anĩ, faleiya kisi feleya sã, Negur ĩ od uru enei nigin idegẽya kisi feleya sã anĩ bunem, wau iseya malada bun ifaref anĩ tarou kafĩ tafalauf nigin, Negur nẽ ahahaya bun taya telen ada anĩ, wauda fatuk yalesauf nigin Negur age fen.
58006019	Wau iseya enei are, ada maladakanon nẽ anka, are totol fen, to gebe yedig. Are anim, gabar tempel namen ibodok anĩ borũ fel, modoũ fateul bagai bun iledig.
58006020	Jesus ĩ Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun faimud ibodkeleya pris mudur wõ ye fen, ĩ mogo ada nigin an uyulil ilen.
58007001	Melkisedek enei Salem nẽ king, ĩ Negur Ilun Bagai nẽ pris. Ĩ Abraham king geid kusĩ del wal feid fen, kel isi mog, fotou fe fen, el fiya ifenen.
58007002	Age fe di, Abraham ereb ereb ganan ĩ ado anĩ bun tamal ten tekelei ifenen. Yana Melkisedek nẽ gariya are “madur bagai nẽ king,” takag, “Salem nẽ king,” anĩ nẽ gariya, “wau inosiya nẽ king.”
58007003	Melkisedek ĩ sina tama sã, in ibor nẽ gĩ taka sã, wõ yen nẽ naa ado laa nẽ naa taka sã, ĩ Negur Naal gen faimud ibodkeleya pris.
58007004	Ĩ naig fiya odug bagai anĩ kisi wog. Tubu Abraham ĩg safina kusĩ bun yalen anĩ ten tekelei ifenen.
58007005	Lo irok, are Lewi nẽ ibor nẽ tubu tar bun pris wowã def idi, tamo kayau bun ten tekelei dalouf, tamo kayau are nedi tureid tar. Tureid tar idig Abraham nẽ ibor, anĩ ere, idi age difedig.
58007006	Melkisedek ĩ Lewi nẽ ibor bun tamal sã, anĩ ere, ĩ Abraham bun tamal ten tekelei yale fen, Abraham Negurem age afouf fiyen anĩ el fiya ifenen.
58007007	Kisi togu fiya sã, tamo odugem, ĩ farumen anĩ el fiya ifenẽdig.
58007008	Pris tamo, idi gare dedig, ten tekelei daledig, anĩ ere, Melkisedek nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya yaor fef, ĩ mata ibodkeleya, ĩ ten tekelei yalen.
58007009	Ada sã eig tauf, Lewi ĩ ten tekelei yaledig, ĩg Abraham bunem Melkisedek ten tekelei ifenen,
58007010	ere nigin, Lewi ĩ fau tubu Abraham bouwa bun ibod mog, Melkisedek ĩ Abraham fotou fiyen.
58007011	Israel tamo kayau lo ifenẽdin anĩ bun irok nigin, Lewi idi pris kabĩ daledig. Lewi neid pris kabĩ anĩ bun lau fiya to yenem are, ere nigin pris taka isiya nigin lau fiya fau yenen, Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun tamal taka, Aron nẽ gĩ bun tamal sã?
58007012	Pris kabĩ falei fouf are, lo areg falei fouf.
58007013	Neda Odug nigin od enei wogõ yen, are ĩ ibor fire bun tamal, yogon ibor bun tamal taka pris kabĩ to yalen.
58007014	Neda Odug ĩ Juda ibor bun tamal are yaor. Anĩ ere, Moses ĩ pris nigin wogõ yen sain bun, Juda ibor nigin od taka to wogõ yen.
58007015	Pris taka Melkisedek gen bagai wõ yef are, od enei amã wogõ maun are yaor bagai wõ yef.
58007016	Ĩ tamo pris kabĩ yaleya nẽ lo bunem pris to wõ yen, anĩ ere, ĩ, mata, daũ feleya kisi feleya sã anĩ nẽ megeir bunem pris wõ yen.
58007017	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei: “Õ faimud ubodkalauf nẽ pris, Melkisedek nẽ gĩ bun.”
58007018	Lo tubu are megeir sã, kabĩ to yaledig, anĩ nigin, yerin gadi difelef,
58007019	(ere nigin, lo anim ereb taka to madur fedig). Anĩ ere, wau iseya biya anĩ wõ yef, anĩ bunem, ada Negur non telef.
58007020	Negur ĩ Jesus pris inenen, are wau kuturoleya od sã to inenen. Pris tunĩ ganan idi age fiya sã, idi wau kuturoleya od sã, pris wõ den.
58007021	Negur ĩ Jesus irokenen sain bun, ĩ wau kuturoleya od ado pris wõ yen: “Odug wau kuturol fen iron, are yogon kisi to falei youf, ‘Õ faimud ubodkalauf nẽ pris.’”
58007022	Wau kuturoleya od enei nigin, Jesus ĩ bar itenẽya tubu wal fiya nẽ megeir fiya wõ yen.
58007023	Pris idi museim dibodon, ere nigin, idi gare de fen, kabĩ to tokõ difelen.
58007024	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ faimud ibodkelef, anĩ nigin, ĩ gai gai pris kabĩ yalef, are taka bun to ilauf.
58007025	Age fiya nigin, idi ĩ bunem Negur garan disif anidi, ĩ el fe isenneĩd leya kisi feleya, ere nigin, ĩ mata faimud ibod ken, idi nigin Negur bun kosẽ yef.
58007026	Pris mudur age fiya anim, sã isennadauf. Ĩ fateul, kerema sã, amuyẽ sã, mosor adodo bun tamal gadi felen, Negur ĩ saa ilun bagai inenen.
58007027	Pris mudur tunĩ ganan, naa ganan, dogo neid mosor nigin ket sesewi dife fen, tamo kayau neid mosor nigin sesewi difedig, anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ pris anidi gen sã. Ĩ yogo bouwa sesewi fen sain bun, ĩ idi neid mosor nigin sain tekelei dogol sesewi fen.
58007028	Lo are felu yabidig tamo pris mudur igirnẽdidig, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ wau kuturoleya od, are lo dumen isin, od anim, Negur Naal, faimud kisi feleya bagai ibodkalauf nigin inenen, ĩ anĩ igirnen.
58008001	Amã wogõ mauf anĩ nẽ kaũ, are yeir. Ada pris mudur age fiya ado, ĩ saa ilun Negur nẽ sia ima biyalẽ ibod ken,
58008002	modoũ fateul bagai, are tamom sã, Odug yogo bagai salafat inon anĩ bun aruna yalef.
58008003	Pris mudur ganan, ofa ado yaro sesewi fiya difenẽf nigin igirnẽdif, anĩ nigin, neda Pris Mudur ĩg ereb taka ifenẽf nigin adouf.
58008004	Ĩ tenebur ibodom are, ĩ pris to wõ yem, ere nigin, tamo lo irok kilei ofa difenẽdif are mogo dibodok.
58008005	Idi modoũ fateul bagai, are saa ilun ibodok age fiya gen, anĩ nẽ malakanon bun aruna dalef. Anĩ nigin, Moses ĩ salafat fateul inouf nigin age fen sain bun, Negur ĩ weder iroun, “Lo welei, õ arei bun afelnon age fiya kilei bagai, ereb ereb ganan unouf.”
58008006	Anĩ ere, Jesus ĩ kabĩ yalen are idi neid kabĩ wal fiya, ere nigin, Negur ado tamo geid bar itenẽya nigin, ĩ atun tamo kabĩ yalef, bar itenẽya anĩ, bar itenẽya tubu anĩ wal fiya, bar itenẽya mata anĩ, Negur od age afouf yen, are od tubu wal fiya anĩ teten inon.
58008007	Bar itenẽya tubu bun kũ fenẽya taka to ibodom are, mata nigin to lau fiyam.
58008008	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ tamo kayau bun kũ fenẽya ile fen, iron: “Odug irok, sain fau isif, are Israel tamo kayau ado Juda tamo kayau geid bar itenẽya mata anouf.
58008009	Bar itenẽya are, aya idi neid tubuid tar Isip bun tamal imeid gim afe elen sain bun, idi tubuid tar geid, bar itenẽya anon age fiya gen sãf. Idi neu bar itenẽya to dõ difen nigin, aya idi dudum afedin.
58008010	Odug irok, sain anĩ dumen, aya Israel tamo kayau geid, bar itenẽya enei anouf. Aya neu lo idi neid kisi bun ano fen, idi neid waud bun atotauf. Aya idi neid Negur abodõf, idi neu tamo kayau dibodõf.
58008011	Tamo takam ne tã to ifelnẽf, tamo takam tura to eig ye irokenẽf, ‘Odug nigin keleĩ youf,’ ere nigin, idi ganan aya nigin keleĩ youf, naal bagai bunem isel, odug bun.
58008012	Aya idi neid sane nigin wederou tu kel fen, idi neid mosor nigin to karĩ aulauf.”
58008013	Negur ĩ bar itenẽya enei “mata” yen, anĩ bunem bar itenẽya tubu are kabĩ sã. Ereb taka tubu, kabĩ sã yen anĩ, kaisã bagai iminkalauf.
58009001	Bar itenẽya tubu anĩ, seli yabiya nigin nun ado fen, seli yabiya nẽ modoũ tenebur eineg adon.
58009002	Salafat taka dinon. Aab malabag anĩ bun, yal nẽ tibog, tebol ado, bret sesewi difen anĩ an ifaredin, modoũ are Modoũ Fateul dedig.
58009003	Gabar Modoũ Fateul bun ibodok anĩ dumen, aab taka Modoũ Fateul Bagai dedig ibodon,
58009004	an gol alta aa gaula sumeĩ nigin tõ fiyadig ado, bar itenẽya nẽ bogis gol nem ganan kerũ feleya ibodon. Bogis enei bun, gol darum mana ado, Aron nẽ manig sana wõ yen ado, meein bedu bar itenẽya itoton ado ifaredin.
58009005	Bogis teten Fula Fiya Medeĩya Negur nẽ engel Serubim difaren, wayeid yarirĩ dife, bogis mala dede difen, bogis mala are modoũ, Negur an mosor yaleledig. Anĩ ere, amã enei nigin gama to dir mafalauf.
58009006	Sain ereb ereb ganan age de dodok difel fen, pris idi Negur nẽ kabĩ dalouf nigin, aab malabag bun naa ganan diledig.
58009007	Anĩ ere, pris mudur dogol, aab Modoũ Fateul Bagai dedig gabar dumen ibodok anĩ bun, yar tekelei bun sain tekelei dogol iledig. Ĩ naud sã to bagai iledig. Ĩ yogo nigin ado, tamo kayau neid mosor to kelei ken dinon anĩ nigin naud Negur ifenẽdig.
58009008	Enei bunem Awa Uur Fateul, salafat fateul urug bagai dinon anĩ fau ifar mog, Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun ileya nigin, bobog fau kã feleya sã anĩ ifelnẽdin.
58009009	Enei are gama sain enei nigin malakanon. Are ofa ado yaro sesewi fiya Negur difenen anim, Negur seli yabidig tamo yogon wau kare keleya kisi feleya sã anĩ ifelnẽdif.
58009010	Safina age fediya anĩ, are saaf, naan yõya ado, amuyẽ lilik fiya nẽ tobonunã fire fire dogol. Age fediya anĩ, are bouwa buru nẽ lo, kabĩ yalef ile, suma mata nẽ sain bun.
58009011	Kristus ĩ, ereb ereb biya mogo wõ yen anĩ nẽ pris mudur isin. Ĩ salafat fateul odug, biya bagai bun isour yale ilen, salafat fateul are tamom to dinon, are ereb kare fen enei nẽ tomina sã.
58009012	Ĩ meme ado bulmakau naal nẽ naud ado to ilen, anĩ ere, ĩ Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun, yogon naud bunem, sain tekelei dogol isour yale ile fen, ada nigin kel gei fiya faimud ibodkeleya anĩ yalen.
58009013	Meme ado bulmakau nẽ naud ado, bulmakau gober naal yã difalege di, isaikelen anĩ nẽ aas nem, idi amuyẽ lilik fiya sã anidi tetedin wiri dife di, idi amuyẽ lilik fele di, bouweid fili yedig.
58009014	Are momoi youf are, Kristus nẽ naud naig fe yenẽf! Ĩ Awa Uur faimud ibodkeleya bunem, yogo bouwa amuyẽ sã, Negur bun sesewi fen. Yogon naud anim, ada wauda laa bun ileya nẽ tobonunã bun tamal kulo fadalef, anĩ bunem, ada mata ibodõya Negur aruna talouf.
58009015	Gariya enei nigin, Kristus ĩ bar itenẽya mata nẽ atun tamo, anĩ bunem, tamo Negurem iweignẽdin anidi, faimud ibodkeleya akor, are Negur age afouf yen anĩ dalouf. Ere nigin, bar itenẽya tubu bun, mosor dinon anidi, nedi mosor bun tamal yalelnẽdiyouf nigin, ĩ laa fen.
58009016	Fadim anĩ kabĩ yalouf nigin, fadim yun tamo ĩ mogo laa fen are yaorouf,
58009017	ere nigin, fadim are, tamo laa fe di dogol, kabĩ yaledig. Fadim yun tamo fau mata ibod mog, fadim anĩ to bagai kabĩ yaledig.
58009018	Age fiya nigin, bar itenẽya tubug naud sã to kabĩ yalen.
58009019	Moses lo bun ĩtãfiya ganan tamo kayau ganan wogõ fiyeĩd fen, ĩ bulmakau naal ado meme nẽ naud, naan ado yale falei fe fen, sipsip siwi giriya ado aa hisop were nem, lo buk bun ado tamo kayau ganan bun wiri fen.
58009020	Moses iron, “Enei are bar itenẽya nẽ naud, are Negur ã dõ gouf nigin irokenein.”
58009021	Naab tekelei anĩ bunem, ĩ salafat fateul ado sesewi fiya nẽ safina ganan bun naud wiri fen.
58009022	Momoi, lo bun irok, melsã ereb ereb ganan naud bunem kulo falauf, are naud to fi falauf are, mosor nigin weder to tu kalauf.
58009023	Anĩ nigin, saa ilun nẽ safina anĩ nẽ malakanon, sesewi fiya enei bunem kulo feledig, anĩ ere, saa ilun nẽ safina dogo, sesewi fiya enei wal fiya bunem, age fedig.
58009024	Kristus ĩ modoũ fateul tamom dinon, are modoũ fateul momoi bagai nẽ malakanon anĩ bun to ilen. Ĩ saa ilun bagai anĩ bun ile fen, Negur mala bun ada nigin wõ yen.
58009025	Pris mudur ĩ, yogo naud sã, yaro naud ado, yar ganan Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun iledig. Anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ yogo bouwa baba baban sesewi fouf nigin saa ilun to ilen.
58009026	Kristus ĩ age fem are, teneub kare fiya sain bunem isin are, ĩ sain musei darau yalem. Anĩ ere, gama idikeleya sain enei bun, ĩ yogo bouwa sesewi fe fen, mosor yalelauf nigin, sain tekelei dogol wõ yen.
58009027	Tamo ganan sain tekelei dogol gare douf, anĩ dumen, Negur es fediyouf.
58009028	Age fiya gen, Jesus ĩg tamo kayau musei neid mosor yalel kenẽdiyouf nigin, yogo bouwa sesewi fe, tekelei fen. Ĩ baban isiyouf, are mosor yaleleya nigin sã, anĩ ere, tamo idi ĩ tari difef anidi kel gei fediyouf nigin.
58010001	Lo are safina biya isif anĩ nẽ malakanon dogol, momoi bagai safina biya anĩ sã. Agef yenek nigin, lo are, sesewi fiya de tekelei anĩ, yar ganan gai toku difenẽdig anĩ bunem, idi Negur seli dabiyouf nigin disif anidi, madur tamo bagai wowãya kisi feleya sã bagai.
58010002	Age fiya kisi feleyam are, idi sesewi fiya ganan ditorom. Ere nigin, Negur sesewi difedig tamo neid mosor, momoi bagai kulo felem are, idi baban mosor nigin waud to morõ fedim.
58010003	Anĩ ere, yar ganan bun sesewi fiya anim, tamo kayau idi, mosor nigin karĩ deledig,
58010004	ere nigin, bulmakau ado meme nẽ naud anim mosor yaleleya kisi feleya sã.
58010005	Anĩ nigin, Kristus tenebur isi fen, iron: “Õ sesewi fiya ado ofa to oroyon, anĩ ere, õ aya nigin bouwa taka dodok won.
58010006	Õ, ofa yã bun ifaleg isaikeleya anĩ ado, mosor yaleleya nẽ ofa anĩ nigin waũ to iron.
58010007	Ago di, aya oron, ‘Aya nigin buk bun eig ye itoton, O Negur, aya yeir, aya ogon oroya dõ afouf nigin asin.’”
58010008	Ĩ uruwa iron, “Sesewi fiya ado ofa, ofa yã bun ifaleg isaikeleya anĩ ado, mosor yaleleya nẽ ofa anĩ õ to oroyon, anĩ nigin waũ to iron” (anĩ ere, lo are, idi age difouf nigin iron).
58010009	Age ye fen, ĩ iron, “Aya yeir, aya ogon oroya dõ afouf nigin asin.” Ĩ mata anĩ inouf nigin uruwa nẽ anĩ yalelen.
58010010	Oroya anĩ bun, Jesus Kristus ĩ yogo bouwa sesewi fe, tekelei felen, anĩ bunem, ada fateul wõ taun.
58010011	Naa ganan bun, pris ganan mugu mugu difar fen, Negur nigin dogo neid kabĩ daledig. Idi sesewi fiya de tekelei anĩ toku difenẽdig, sesewi fiya anim mosor yaleleya nigin kisi feleya sã bagai.
58010012	Anĩ ere, Kristus ĩ mosor nigin gai gai nẽ sesewi fiya tekelei fele fen, Negur ima biyalẽ ibodon.
58010013	Sain anĩ bunem isi gama, Kristus ĩ, yogon kiwai tar Negurem Kristus ye inoya nẽ sawa inenẽdiyouf anĩ tari fef.
58010014	Ĩ sesewi fe, tekelei felen anim, idi mosor bun temeleid kulo feledif anidi, gai gai nigin madur feledin.
58010015	Awa Uur Fateul ĩg od enei nigin eig ye irokanadaf. Uyulil ĩ irok:
58010016	“Odug irok, sain anĩ dumen, aya idi geid bar itenẽya enei anouf. Aya neu lo idi waud bun ano fen, idi neid kisi bun atotauf.”
58010017	Age ye fen, ĩ tobol fe irok: “Dogo neid mosor ado sane age difedig are, aya to karĩ aulauf.”
58010018	Mosor enei weder tu kelen ouf are, baban mosor nigin sesewi fiya taka to yenek.
58010019	Anĩ nigin, turamã tar, ada Jesus nẽ naud bunem, Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun tuninir ya sã ileya nigin kisi feleya.
58010020	An ileya nẽ naab are, mata ibodõya nẽ naab mata, are ĩ, ada nigin, gabar Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun ileya nigin bobog katĩ felen anĩ serek felen bunem kã felen, gabar are yogo bouwa.
58010021	Ada Negur nẽ fõ lo fiya nigin pris odug ado.
58010022	Anĩ nigin, ada wauda tutuk fen, momoiya totol ado Negur non talauf, ere nigin, ada wauda, mosor nẽ wau morõ bun tamal wirif kulo fada le fen, bouwada naan karẽtut nem kulo felen.
58010023	Neda wauda iseya ada wogõ taudig anĩ, ada tarou kafĩ tafalauf, ere nigin, Negur age afouf yen, are ĩ de age fouf bagai.
58010024	Ada wau laa fiya ado tobonunã biya bun talauf nigin, abob wau yaleseya nigin kisi tafouf.
58010025	Ada guru fiya anĩ to tatorõf, tunĩ to guru difedig gen, to age tafouf, anĩ ere, ada abob wau talesef talauf, ere nigin, ã, Odug nẽ Naa melsã isif are ulegef.
58010026	Ada momoi anĩ kelei ken, neda oroya dõ tafe, mosor tanof talauf are, mosor yaleleya nẽ sesewi fiya taka to ibodok,
58010027	anĩ ere, Negur yogon es fiya ado, yã bobo reya anim yogon kiwai tar yakur feid isasaikalauf anĩ, kumĩ ado tari fiya dogol ibodok.
58010028	Taka ĩ Moses nẽ lo dudum fen, ĩ nigin tamo urom be towom, ĩ age fen anĩ yaor dife di, waud yũya sã dukesi di, laa fen.
58010029	Age fiyauf are, taka ĩ, Negur Naal ye nem lai fe fen, bar itenẽya nẽ naud anim ĩ mosor bun tamal kulo fiyekelen anĩ, fateul sã gen inene ken, wau ifenẽya nẽ Awa Uur kono fiyek ĩ, darau naig fiya bagai yalouf anĩ kisi gef.
58010030	Ere nigin, ada kelei, Negur eig ye iron, “Taka ĩ sane age fouf, ĩ mala solo sane ifenẽya are neu kabĩ, ayam mala solo sane afenẽf.” Takag, ĩ baban iron, “Odug ĩ yogon tamo kayau es fediyouf.”
58010031	Taka ĩ mata ibodõya Negur ima bun ilauf are, ĩ fatuk bagai kumĩ tererẽ youf.
58010032	Ã uruwa bun fula fiya walegen, anĩ dumen naig wog ufaregen anĩ kisi waleg. Sain anĩ bun ã darau nẽ kusĩ odug walegen, anĩ ere, totol ufaregen.
58010033	Sain tunĩ, ã mal atun kono diyei ken, darau difeneĩdig. Sain tunĩ, ã, idi morõ age fiya dalen anidi usennẽdigedig.
58010034	Ã tamo kalabus bun dibodon anidi nigin wauĩ yũya wenẽdigen, agog fen, tamo idi ãgenei safina ganan dale di, ã kulĩya ado folõ wol kenẽdigen, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã aug safina biya, mata gai gai ibodkeleya nẽ ado.
58010035	Anĩ nigin, ãgenei kisi totol anĩ to folõ walagauf, are fau mala solo odug bagai ifeneĩf.
58010036	Ã totol ufaragauf, anĩ bunem, ã Negur nẽ oroya dõg fen, ereb ĩ age afouf yen anĩ walogouf.
58010037	Ere nigin, sain naal bagai ilele di, “Tamo ĩ isif, are fau isiyouf, ĩ to foi youf.
58010038	Anĩ ere, neu tamo madur bagai, ĩ momoiya bunem mata ibodõf. Ĩ dumelem soso rouf are, aya ĩ nigin wau to al fouf.”
58010039	Anĩ ere, ada, idi dumelem soso de fen, fõ delef gen sã, anĩ ere, ada, idi momoi de fen, isennẽya dalef gen.
58011001	Momoiya are, ereb nigin wauda isef anĩ, de momoi bagai agef wõ youf tauf anĩ. Momoiya are, ereb ada maladam to tailef anĩ, de momoi bagai ibodok tauf anĩ.
58011002	Kulu nẽ tamo kayau, dogo neid momoiya bunem, Negur idi nigin de fiyẽdin.
58011003	Momoiya bunem, ada keleĩ, Negur irõ di, saa teneub ado wõ yen, anĩ nigin, ereb ada malada bun tailef are, maladam to tailef anim inodin.
58011004	Momoiya bunem, Abel ĩ sesewi fiya, Kain nẽ wal fiya Negur ifenen. Abel nẽ momoiya bunem, Negur ĩ Abel nigin madur tamo bagai yen, ere nigin, Negur ĩ Abel nẽ sesewi fiya are de yen. Abel ĩ laa fen, anĩ ere, momoiya bunem, ĩ fau wogõ yef.
58011005	Momoiya bunem, Enok teneub enei bun tamal yalelnen, anĩ nigin, ĩ to laa fen. Negurem ĩ yalelnen nigin, takam ĩ to fotou fiyen. Negur nẽ Itotoya irok, Negur ĩ fau to yale mog, ĩ Negur wau al fiya ifenen.
58011006	Taka ĩ to momoi youf are, ĩ Negur wau al fiya ifenẽya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, taka ĩ Negur gein isif, are Negur ibodok anĩ ado, ĩ dimirnek anidi mala solo ifenẽdidig anĩ, de momoi bagai youf.
58011007	Momoiya bunem, Noa ĩ ereb malam fau ileya sã mog, Negurem weder iroun anĩ karĩ ye fen, ĩ Negur anini fiye ken, yogon ibor isennẽdiyouf nigin waag taka kare fen. Yogon momoiya bunem, Noa ĩ, teneub enei mosor ado anĩ yaor fe fen, madur bagai, are momoiya bunem isif anĩ, Negur bun tamal yalen.
58011008	Negur ĩ, Abraham yogon akor fau yalouf modoũ bun ilauf nigin iweignen sain bun, Abraham ĩ nain be ilauf ya anĩ keleĩ san. Anĩ ere, ĩ momoiya bunem Negur nẽ od dõf fen, ilen.
58011009	Momoiya bunem, Abraham ĩ, Negur afonõf yen teneub anĩ bun, yaũ teneub bun yaũ tamo gen ibodon. Ĩ salafat bun ibodon, Isak Jakop ado, idi Negur afonõf yen od tekelei Abraham yalen anĩ dalen, idig salafat bun dibodon.
58011010	Are Abraham ĩ, taun anĩ gariya teten totol ifaref, are Negurem eig fe yenẽf ye fen, kare fen anĩ tari fedig.
58011011	Abraham ĩ tubau bagai, Sara ĩ yogo dali. Anĩ ere, momoiya bunem, Abraham tama wõya nigin kisi felen, ere nigin, ĩ, Negur age afouf yen anĩ agef wõ youf bagai ye fen, momoi yen.
58011012	Anĩ nigin, tamo tekelei ĩ tubau bagai laa tamo gen, ĩ bunem yogon ibor nẽ tubu tar, saa ilun barisa ado maaĩ ubun kulum yenek gen, iwesleya kisi feleya sã, fulus fen.
58011013	Tamo kayau eneidi ganan momoi de fen, gare den. Idi ereb Negur ĩ age afouf yen anĩ to dalen. Are idi egerom meledim dogol dile fen, waud al fen. Age dife fen, teneub enei bun idi yaũ tamo, namala den.
58011014	Tamo kayau age de dirok, are dogo neid teneub dimirek anĩ difelnadaf.
58011015	Idi teneub ditor disin anĩ nigin kisi dalem are, idi keku de dilauf nigin kisi feleya yenem.
58011016	Age fiya ban, idi teneub biya bagai, saa ilun nẽ anĩ nigin waud yenen. Anĩ nigin, Negur ĩ, idi nemã Negur def anĩ nigin to mama fef, ere nigin, ĩ idi neid taun taka dodok felen.
58011017	Momoiya bunem, Negur Abraham kisi fiyen sain bun, Abraham ĩ, Isak anĩ Negur sesewi fiya ifenen. Abraham Negurem age afouf fiyen ĩ, naal tekelei bagai anĩ sesewi fiya ifenẽf nigin age fen.
58011018	Negur Abraham irokenen, “Isak bunem, ogon ibor tar wowã douf.”
58011019	Abraham kisi fen, Negur ĩ laa tamo kel turĩ fiya kisi feleya. Anĩ nigin, ada eig tau wogõya kisi feleya, Abraham ĩ Isak laa bun tamal kel yalen.
58011020	Momoiya bunem, Isak ĩ, Jakop Esau ado, dumen bun idi neid ibodõya nigin el fiya ifenẽdin.
58011021	Momoiya bunem, Jakop yogon laa melsã mog, Josef gere tar monog mugu mugu el fiya ifeneĩd fen, yogon manig tubi bun mudur isen ken, Negur seli yabin.
58011022	Momoiya bunem, Josef yogon laa melsã mog, Israel tamo kayau Isip tamal ditor dilauf nigin wogõ ye fen, yogon tuwa nigin faded fiyẽdin.
58011023	Momoiya bunem, Moses sina tama adom, Moses wõ ye di, ĩ ogõ towo dinokelnen, ere nigin, Moses ĩ kesu meli bagai dile fen, idi king nẽ od nigin to kumĩ den.
58011024	Momoiya bunem, Moses ĩ biya fen, Isip king nẽ barai nẽ kesu yeya anĩ itoron.
58011025	Moses ĩ, mosor nẽ oroya sain naal bun dõ fiya itor ken, Negur nẽ tamo kayau geid morõ dalouf nigin wau iron.
58011026	Moses ĩ kisi fen, are Kristus nigin kono fiya yaleya anĩ, Isip nẽ safina biya bagai anĩ wal fiya, ere nigin, ĩ yogon mala solo dumen nẽ anĩ lo felen.
58011027	Momoiya bunem, Moses ĩ Isip king nẽ seye nigin kumĩ sã, Isip itor ilen. Ĩ totol ifaren, ere nigin, Moses ĩ, Negur ileya kisi feleya sã anĩ, ilen gen age fen.
58011028	Momoiya bunem, ĩ Pasa ado, bobog bun naud wiri fiya nẽ suma inon, are Yukesiya nẽ Engel ĩ, Israel neid kesu monog matu to idenkesiyouf nigin age fen.
58011029	Momoiya bunem, Israel tamo kayau, teneub maug bun gen Maaĩ Giriya atu diyok dilen. Anĩ ere, Isip tamo idi dibal mog, naan kerub fedi di, gare den.
58011030	Momoiya bunem, Israel tamo kayau, Jeriko kau, naa sewen kalĩ dife di, Jeriko kau narĩ felen.
58011031	Momoiya bunem, naabur kayau Rahab, idi Negur ait to dõ difedig geid to didenkesin, ere nigin, ĩ kofo tamo aan fiyẽdin.
58011032	Aya baban ere od taka arokeneĩf? Aya Gidion, Barak, Samson, Jepta, Dawid, Samuel ado, profet idi nigin dir feleya nigin sain sã.
58011033	Idi momoiya bunem king geid kusĩ de fen, lai difedin. Idi madur bagai bunem kulatun difen. Idi Negur age afeneĩf yen anĩ dalen. Idi laion eweid difofakelen.
58011034	Idi yã bale difofor len. Idi dimig waila wal difen. Idi totol sã, anĩ ere, megeir dale fen, totol difaren. Idi kusĩ namen totol dale fen, yaũ kusĩ tamo lai difedin.
58011035	Kayau dogo neid tar gare dedin, baban mata ke de fafã de di, daledin. Tunĩ darau sane bagai dale fen, kafĩ fiya bun tamal yalelnẽdiya ditoron, are idi kel fãya biya anĩ, dalouf nigin age difen.
58011036	Tunĩ kono fiya ado tibog dalen, tunĩ sen nem difofa ken, kalabus bun dinenẽdin.
58011037	Idi meein tulu difedin. Idi so nem kokour difedi di, uru wõ yen. Idi dimig nem didenkesin. Idi sipsip gabar ado meme gabar difounkel dilen, are idi maleg dibodon, darau dalen, to biya difiyẽdin.
58011038	Tenebur ein, idi ed fe ibodõya nigin to biya. Idi gerere tuan, arein, meein ku bun ado, teneub kur diyõdig.
58011039	Eneidi ganan, Negur, dogo neid momoiya nigin de fiyẽdin. Anĩ ere, idi takam, Negur age afouf yen anĩ to yalen,
58011040	ere nigin, Negur ada nigin kisi biya bagai inon, are idi ada weim ouf dogol, kisi feleya bagai wowã douf nigin, Negur ĩ age fen.
58012001	Ada momoiya tamo kayau age fediya musei budũ gen kalilĩ difadaf. Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb ganan naaburada gudũ fef anĩ ado, mosor karika sane fili fadaf anĩ taraile fen, abob wawal fiya nẽ gudu reya Negurem inokanadan anĩ bun, feseya sã gududu tauf.
58012002	Ada malada Jesus bun dogol tanouf, ĩ neda momoiya nẽ gariya ado, momoiya kisi feleya bagai wõya nẽ. Ĩ wau al fiya mala bun ifaren anĩ nigin ye fen, ĩ aa tetek nigin to fese ye fen, mama yaleya nigin to kukĩ yen, agef fen, ĩ Negur nẽ sia ima biyalẽ ibodon.
58012003	Jesus ĩ mosor adodo tamom kiwai fatuk difenen anĩ ganan faali fen, ĩ nigin kisi tafouf, are ã to fõ yei ken, wauĩ folo rouf nigin age tafouf.
58012004	Ã mosor ado gunĩ gedig, anĩ ere, ã fau kusĩg fen, naudeĩ fi feleya sã.
58012005	Agog fen, ã wauĩ yaleseya od, Negur neu kesu tar yein anĩ wedereĩ tu kelen: “Neu kesu, õ Odug nẽ madur fiya to ege wouf, Odug ĩ ou yõf are, waũ to folo rouf,
58012006	ere nigin, Odug ĩ, idi nigin wau laa fedig anidi madur fiyẽdidig, agef fen, ĩ yogon kesu tar yaledif anidi ganan darau ifenẽdidig.”
58012007	Morõ ã ado are, Negur nẽ madur fiya anĩ de faali gouf. Negur ĩ, ã yogon kesu tar nigin age fef. Kesu nanĩ taka, tamam to madur fiyẽdig?
58012008	Negur yogon kesu tar ganan madur fiyẽdidig, anĩ ere, ĩ ã to madur yeĩf are, ã yogon kesu tar sã, ã dubur temeleĩ.
58012009	Ada ganan tamada tar ado, idi ada madur difada di, anĩ nigin bobou tafiyẽdidig. Anĩ nigin, ada fatuk bagai neda uur nẽ Tama farumen tabod ken, mata tabodõf!
58012010	Ada tamada tar, sain naal bagai, idi biya kisi difen anĩ kilei, madur difadan. Anĩ ere, Negur neda biya fiya nigin, madur fadadig, are ada ĩ geid fateulouf nigin age fedig.
58012011	Sain madur fiya ganan bun, wau al fiya to taledig, darau anĩ taledig. Anĩ ere, dum, idi darau age fiya bunem madur fiyẽdin anidi bun, madur bagai ado wau inosiya nẽ faat biya wõ youf.
58012012	Anĩ nigin, imeĩ bubur kelediya ado iboreĩ felu reya megeir weledigouf.
58012013	“Yeĩ nigin naab tutuk gouf,” anĩ bunem, yeĩ kirorõya to sesen lauf, are biya lediyouf.
58012014	Tamo ganan geid wauĩ inosiya bun ubodõg fen, fateulouf nigin kabĩ totol waleg. Fateul sãf are, takam Odug to ilouf.
58012015	Taka nem Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya to folo rouf nigin ado, aa faat dirikeĩ gen to wõ ye fen, musei morõ ifeneĩd fen, amuyẽ ifenẽdiyouf nigin lo welegei.
58012016	Taka nem noli tobonunã to inouf nigin be, Esau gen Negur nigin kisi sã to ibodõf nigin lo welegei. Esau ĩ, kesu matu nigin yogon akor fau yalouf anĩ, sain tekelei nẽ saaf anĩ nem na sur fen.
58012017	Anĩ dumen, ã karĩ gef kilei, ĩ el fiya enei akorouf nigin oron, anĩ ere, ĩ to yalen. Ĩ inã ado el fiya anĩ imiren, anĩ ere, ĩ wau faleiya nigin naab taka san.
58012018	Ã arei eig fiya bun to usigen, arei are kobũ fiya kisi feleya, yã balẽ yef ado, gugum, tubutubuya, uyẽ yau totol ado,
58012019	taur ait, ait taka od wogõya nẽ, are tamo idi ait anĩ karĩ de fen, od baban to wogõ fiyẽdiyouf nigin digonen,
58012020	ere nigin, idi eig ye irokenẽdin anĩ yaleya kisi feleya sã, “Gaar taka arei anĩ kobũ foufeg, meein tulu difouf.”
58012021	Moses anĩ ile fen, fatuk bagai kumĩ ise fen, iron, “Aya kumĩ tererẽ auf.”
58012022	Anĩ ere, ã Saion Arei bun, saa ilun nẽ Jerusalem, are mata ibodõya Negur nẽ taun usigen. Ã engel mala musei biya al de guru difef bun usigen.
58012023	Ã, Negur nẽ kesu matu, idi yeneid saa ilun itoton anidi neid sios bun usigen. Ã tamo ganan nẽ es fiya Negur bun ado, madur tamo kisi feleya bagai wowã den anidi neid uur bun usigen.
58012024	Ã, Jesus, bar itenẽya mata nẽ atun tamo bun ado, naud wiri fen, are Abel nẽ naud wogõ yef anĩ wal fiya od wogõ yef anĩ bun usigen.
58012025	Lo welegei, are ĩ wogõ yef anĩ to dudum wog. Idi tenebur ein wedereid iroun ĩ dudum difiyen idi to diyalelen, ani nigin, ada saa ilunem wederada irouf ĩ dudum tafouf are, ada iyaleleya nigin malai bagai.
58012026	Sain anĩ bun, yogon aitem teneub enei yokũ fen, anĩ ere, gama ĩ promis od eig ye iron, “Baban aya teneub dogol sã, saa ado yokũ afouf.”
58012027	Od “baban” yef are ifelnadaf, are ereb ereb inodin yokũ fiya kisi feleya anĩ yokũ feid fen, yalelauf, are ereb yokũ fiya kisi felya sã anĩ fau ifarauf nigin age fouf.
58012028	Ada tano yokũ fiya kisi feleya sã anĩ talef, anĩ nigin, Negur de tafiye ken, Negur wau al fouf nigin, kumĩ ado aniniya bunem, Negur seli tabiyouf,
58012029	ere nigin, neda “Negur ĩ isaikeleya nẽ yã.”
58013001	Abob nigin tureĩ tar gen, toku wauĩ laa fouf.
58013002	Tamo mata urug yalediya nigin to wedereĩ tu kalauf, tamo tunĩ age difen are, keleĩ sa ken, engel gei difedin.
58013003	Idi kalabus bun difaref anidi, ã idi geid takai kalabus bun ifareya gen, karĩ wedigouf. Idi to biya difiyẽdif anidi, ã morõ takai walegef gen, karĩ wedigouf.
58013004	Tamo kayau ado bagu fiya nigin, tamo ganan, yana odug an dinouf. Tamo kayau ado bagu fiya nẽ fatar karẽtut ibodõf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ, idi seseirã tobonunã dinof anidi ado, idi noli tobonunã dinof anidi, es fediyouf.
58013005	Moni nigin kisi fatuk to unogouf, safina ã adof anĩ, are eĩ de gouf, ere nigin, Negur ĩ iron, “Aya to bagai atorneĩf, aya to bagai folõ ayeikalauf.”
58013006	Anĩ nigin, ada kumĩ sã torõf, “Odug ĩ neu isennẽya, aya to kumĩ auf. Aya tamom ere naig fiyauf?”
58013007	Ãgenei uyu irouya, Negur nẽ od wogõ diyein anĩ karĩ walagauf. Idi naig de dibodok disi di, ereb wõ yen anĩ kisig fen, idi neid momoiya madẽ gouf.
58013008	Jesus Kristus ĩ to falei yedig, nor, gama ado, sain ganan, de agef ibodkeledig.
58013009	Ã ifelnẽya fire fire anim to wewu yeĩ irouleyeĩf. Ada wauda, wau ifenẽya anim megeir fouf anĩ biya, saaf nẽ lo dõ fiya bunem ada wauda to megeir fouf, are idi saaf nẽ lo dõ de doko anidi, anim to isennẽdif.
58013010	Ada alta ado, an pris salafat fateul bun kabĩ daledig idi, neda alta anĩ bun yõya nigin kisi feleya sã.
58013011	Pris mudur, yaro naud anĩ, mosor nẽ sesewi fiya Negur ifenẽf nigin, Modoũ Fateul Bagai bun iledig, yaro bouwa are, fõ mayã dumeitur difaleg isaikeledig.
58013012	Anĩ nigin, Jesus ĩg yogon naud bunem, tamo kayau neid mosor yalelauf nigin, taun bobog dumeitur darau faali fen.
58013013	Anĩ nigin, ada, ĩ mama faali fen anĩ tale fen, fõ mayã dumeitur ĩ gein talauf.
58013014	Ere nigin, ada, tenebur ein, faimud ibodkeleya nẽ taun sã, anĩ ere, ada taun fau isiyouf anĩ tamirek.
58013015	Anĩ nigin, ada toku, Jesus bunem, yana yaleseya nẽ sesewi fiya, Negur tafenẽf, yana yaleseya nẽ sesewi fiya are, sigoradam Jesus yana kurõ tafesif anĩ.
58013016	Ereb ereb biya agog fen, abob wenẽgouf anĩ to wedereĩ tu kalauf, ere nigin, sesewi fiya age fediya anim Negur wau al fedig.
58013017	Ãgenei uyu irouya farumen ubodõg fen, karĩ wiyẽdigouf. Idi ã lo diyeĩdig, idi dogo neid kabĩ nigin dum Negur dirokenẽf. Idi karĩ wiyẽdigouf, anĩ bunem, idi neid kabĩ morõ sã, wau kulĩya ado dalouf, ere nigin, idi morõ ado kabĩ dalouf are, ã to isenneĩf.
58013018	Amã nigin kosẽ gouf. Amã momoi mauf, are amã kisi karẽtut ado, amã ereb ereb ganan bun biya age mafouf nigin oromak.
58013019	Negur aya ã gein kaisã bagai sur fiyauf nigin, ã kosẽ gouf nigin, fatuk bagai arokeneik.
58013020	Wau inosiya nẽ Negur ĩ, faimud ibodkeleya bar itenẽya nẽ naud bunem, neda Odug Jesus, sipsip lo fiya tamo odug, laa bun tamal kel irousin.
58013021	Wau inosiya nẽ Negur ĩ, Jesus Kristus bunem, yogon oroya dõ gouf nigin ereb ereb biya ganan ã ifenei ken, yogo wau al fouf nigin ada bun kabĩ yalouf anĩ amã oromak. Negur ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya gai gai ibodõf. Momoi.
58013022	Turau tar, ã, neu wau yaleseya od anĩ, karĩ gouf nigin, totol bagai arokeneik, ere nigin, aya pas tobega dogol atotkenein.
58013023	Neda turada Timoti, kalabus bun tamal ulõ yesin anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin aya orouf. Ĩ kaisã wõ youf are, amã urom ã mailiyeĩf nigin masiyouf.
58013024	Ãgenei uyu irouya ganan ado, Negur nẽ tamo kayau ganan aan wiyẽdigouf. Idi Itali temeleid, ã bun, idi neid aanya, sur difeneik.
58013025	Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya ã ganan bun ibodõf.
59001001	Aya Jems, Negur ado Odug Jesus Kristus neid ferfer, Israel neid ibor tuwelf tenebur ein firagagaũ difen bun pas enei atotof. Aan yeya.
59001002	Turau tar, ereb sain morõ fire fire walogouf are, ã wauĩ al fiya nigin gouf,
59001003	ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ãgenei momoiya, kisi fiya bunem, feseya sã ifareya wõ yedig.
59001004	Feseya sã ifareya anĩ tobol ge di, ketẽ yese di, ã atĩyeĩ ken, kisi feleya bagai, ereb taka nigin lau fiya sã wõ gouf.
59001005	Ã taka kisi biya nigin lau fouf, Negur tamo ganan kisi biya nigin lau de fen to difiyẽf anĩ to ou fiyeĩd fen, wau sã kisi biya kisi feleya ifenẽdidig anĩ to fiyẽf, age fe di, ĩ ifenẽf.
59001006	Anĩ ere, ĩ to fiyẽ fenẽ, ĩ momoi ye fen, to wau uru ouf bagai, ere nigin, taka ĩ wau uru ouf are, ĩ maaĩ moloun wĩya gen, yaum wese fe di, ilef isif fedig gen.
59001007	Tamo age fiya, ĩ Odug bun tamal ereb taka alouf ye fen, to kisi fei.
59001008	Ĩ tamo wau uru ado, ereb age fef ganan bun, in wau to dẽ yesiledig.
59001009	Momoiya turada taka ĩ maleg are, ĩ Negur mala bun yogon modoũ ilun nigin wau al fouf bagai.
59001010	Anĩ ere, taka safina musei ado, sain Negur ĩ lai fesilnẽf are, ĩ anĩ nigin wau al fouf bagai, ere nigin, ĩ odõ munĩ gen inanakalauf.
59001011	Gaa ise fen, yogon uruwa nẽ totol anim aayũ gariri keledig, age fe di, munĩ tu rel fen, kubũ ye fen, yogon gegẽ meli bagai anĩ inanakalauf. Age fiya gen, tamo safina musei ado ĩg yogon kabĩ yalef ile mog, inanakalauf.
59001012	Tamo taka ĩ, morõ bun megeir ifaref ilauf, ĩ el fiyek, ere nigin, ĩ kisi fiya bun ifaren nigin, ĩ mata nẽ teter Negur idi ĩ nigin waud laa fef anidi afenẽdiyouf yen anĩ yalouf.
59001013	Kisi fiya isi di, taka nem to irõf, “Negur aya mosor anouf nigin kisi fiyaf.” Ere nigin, Negur ĩ sanem kisi fiyẽya kisi feleya sã, agef fen, inimeg taka mosor inouf nigin to kisi fiyẽf.
59001014	Anĩ ere, mugu mugu ĩ, yogon oroya sanem mala yũ yale di, kisi fiya bun iledig.
59001015	Age fe di, bouwa nẽ oroya anim, mosor wau bun kare fe di, mosor gõ fef, mosor anĩ isora le fen, laa gõ fef.
59001016	Turau tar oboiyou, to didegneĩf.
59001017	Ereb biya ganan ado ege luwa bagai ganan, are ilun tamal, Negur saa ilun nẽ lalan ganan kare fen ĩ bunem isif, ĩ to falei fulu yedig, ĩ buri ilef isif fedig gen to falei yedig.
59001018	Ĩ, yogon oroya bunem, ada, yogon momoi od bunem yogon gere tar wõ tauf nigin igirnadan, are ada ereb ĩ inodin anĩ ganan bun faat uyulil taka gen wõ tauf nigin age fen.
59001019	Turau tar oboiyou, enei karĩ walagauf: Tamo ganan kaisã bagai karĩ gouf, kaisã to wogõ gouf, kaisã to seye gouf,
59001020	ere nigin, tamo nẽ wau saneya are, tutuk mata ibodõya Negur orof anĩ to irou isidig.
59001021	Anĩ nigin, ereb ereb amuyẽ ganan ado, sesen ketẽ yesen ganan walelagauf, agog fen, wauĩ yukesileya bunem, od ã namein Negurem itenen, kel yaleyeĩf kisi feleya anĩ walogouf.
59001022	Ã od ege karĩ dogol ya bunem, to aug bouweĩ udegnẽg. Ereb yef anĩ dõg agog.
59001023	Aib taka ĩ od karĩ ye fen, ereb yef anĩ to dõ fef are, ĩ tamo yogo nawa dodo bun ilef gen,
59001024	ĩ yogo nawa felef, waĩf yale di, kaisã bagai yogo nawa nigin nene yedig gen age fiya.
59001025	Anĩ ere, tamo ĩ, lo kisi feleya bagai, karika ifenẽdig anĩ bun, el fe felef fen, faimud age fef ile, ereb karĩ yen anĩ to weder tu kel fen, anĩ agei fouf are, ĩ ereb age fef anĩ bun el fiyẽf.
59001026	Aibem taka ĩ aya momoi auf ye fen, ereb ereb lo irok kilei bagai dõf age fouf, anĩ ere, yogon sigor to fateul inouf are, ĩ yogo idegne ken, yogon momoiya are kaũ sã.
59001027	Momoiya, Negur ada Tamada karẽtut ado kũ fenẽya sã gen iledig, are eig fiya: maad ado waab, nedi morõ bun kulatun fediya, agef fen, tenebur nẽ oroyam to amuyẽ iroudauf nigin lo feleya.
59002001	Turau tar, ã, neda fula fiya medeĩya nẽ Odug Jesus Kristus nigin momoi gef nigin, ã wauĩ wenẽgef anĩ dogol to lo walagauf.
59002002	Tamo taka ĩ, ãgenei guru fiya bun ima sai gol ado kolos biya ifoun ken, isi di, maleg tamo taka kolos tubu adog namen isiyouf.
59002003	Ã tamo kolos biya ado anĩ el ge lo weleg fen, “Ogon ibodõya modoũ biya bagai yeir,” ge fen, maleg tamo urokenẽgouf, “Õ an ufar,” be “Õ yeu gariyan tenebur ubod,” wiyẽgouf are,
59002004	ã atun es ge fen foi gen, agog fen, kisi gariya sane bunem es fiya tamo wõ gen.
59002005	Karĩg, turau tar oboiyou! Negur ĩ, tenebur tamo kayau meleid bun maleg anidi momoiya bun kisi feleya bagai wõ de di, Negur nẽ tano ĩ nigin waud laa fedig anidi afenẽdiyouf yen anĩ, idi akor dalouf nigin to igirnẽdin de?
59002006	Anĩ ere, ã maleg anidi anĩ meleĩ irim uledigen. Tamo safineid adodom to lai diyeĩdig de? Idim ã kot bun to guri diyeĩ dirouleyeĩdig de?
59002007	Idim, Kristus yana biya anĩ bunem ã iweigneĩdig anĩ, to yana sane dinodig de?
59002008	Ã, momoi bagai, neda King nẽ lo, Negur nẽ Itotoya bun ibodok, “Õ ogo nigin waũ laa fef gen, nẽ tã nigineg ago waũ laa fouf,” anĩ dõ gouf are, ã biya ago gef.
59002009	Anĩ ere, ã wauĩ wenẽgef anĩ dogol lo walagauf are, ã mosor unog fen, lo bunem, ã lo wal fiya tamo wowã gef.
59002010	Ere nigin, taka ĩ lo ganan dõf fen, lo tekelei dogol wal fouf are, ĩ lo ganan wal fef.
59002011	Aib ĩ iron, “Õ seseirã to uno,” ĩ eig yeg iron, “Õ taka to ukeis.” Õ seseirã to unof, anĩ ere, taka ukesiyouf are, õ lo wal fiya tamo wõ wouf.
59002012	Idi, lo karika ifenẽdidig anim, es fediyouf age fediya gen wogõg fen, dõ gouf,
59002013	ere nigin, Negur, es fiya wau yũya sã anĩ, aib wau yũya sã bun inouf. Taka ĩ taka nigin wau yũya ifelnẽf are, ĩ es fiya anĩ wal fouf, ere nigin, ĩg Negurem wau yũya ifelnẽf.
59002014	Turau tar, tamo taka aya momoi auf ye fen, to dõf age fouf, ĩ ere biya age fouf? Momoiya age fiyam tau isennẽf?
59002015	Turada be mainada taka ĩ, kolos ado saaf naa teke tekelei yõya nẽ sã.
59002016	Ã takam ĩ irokenẽf, “Wau inosiya bun ule, aya õ de ailiyok, uruwa wale fen, wõ el wo,” age ye fen, ĩ bouwa buru isennẽya nigin ereb taka to age fouf, ĩ ere biya age fef?
59002017	Naab age fiya bagai, momoiya yogo dogol, dõ fiya bunem to isennek, are laa fef.
59002018	Anĩ ere, takam irõf, “Taka momoiya ado, taka dõ fiya ado.” Kisi age fiya are kũ fenẽya. Ogon momoiya, dõ fiya sãf are, naig fe di, aya õ momoiya ado ya anĩ keleĩ youf? Anĩ ere, aya, neu dõ fiya bunem, aya momoiya ado ya anĩ afelnõf.
59002019	Õ Negur tekelei ibodok ya anĩ momoi wof. Are de! Kaa seseneg age de momoi de fen, kumĩ tererẽ dedig.
59002020	Õ neneya bagai, õ momoiya dõ fiya sã are, ege bagai ya anĩ keleĩ you fenẽ de?
59002021	Ada tubuda Abraham yogo naal Isak alta bun Negur sesewi fiyẽf nigin age fen bun, ereb ĩ age fen bunem, Negur ĩ madur bagai to fiyen de?
59002022	Õ, yogon momoiya ado yogon dõ fiya bagu de kabĩ dale di, yogon momoiya, ereb age fen anĩ bunem, kisi felen anĩ ulef.
59002023	Anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok anĩ kisi felen, “Abraham Negur nigin momoi yen, age fe di, Negur Abraham madur bagai yen,” age ye fen, Negur Abraham nigin neu mou yen.
59002024	Anĩ bun, õ ulef, are tamo ĩ ereb age fef anĩ bunem, Negur ĩ nigin madur bagai yef, momoiya dogol bunem sã.
59002025	Age fiya bagai, Rahab naab kayau ĩg, kofo fiya tamo gei feid fen, naab taka bunem sur fedin anĩ bunem, Negur Rahab nigin to madur bagai fiyen de?
59002026	Bouwa uur sã are laa fef age fiya gen, momoiya dõ fiya sã are laa fef.
59003001	Turau tar, ã atun musei tise wowãya nigin to kisi gouf, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, amã tise kabĩ malef, totol bagai es famãf.
59003002	Ada ganan naab musei bun kuku taudig. Aib taka ĩ ereb yef bun to kũ fenẽf, ĩ tamo kisi feleya bagai, yogon bouwa ganan ulum iroukenẽya kisi feleya.
59003003	Ada hos sigorada dõ difouf nigin eweid bun ain tobega tanof are, ada hos bou ganan, sã gadi tafiyẽf.
59003004	Takag, waag bun kisi gouf. Idi odug bagai fen, yau totolem irouledig, anĩ ere, ulum irouya tamo narib ileya nigin, ulum naal bagai anim waag anĩ narib ileya orof nẽ irouledig.
59003005	Age fiya bagai, bouwada bun baleda are gai naal bagai, anĩ ere, ĩ, ereb odudug ĩ age fef nigin, yogo yana seli yabidig. Dub odug yã ninimam age fe di, uu yedig age fiya gen bagai kisi gouf.
59003006	Baledag ĩ yã, bouwada ganan atun sane nẽ teneub. Ĩ tamo oditekei bouwa ganan amuyẽ ifenẽdig, yogon mata ibodok ilauf ganan bun yã irãdig, age fe di, ĩg yogo hel bunem isaikalauf.
59003007	Gaar fire fire ganan, ninã, gaar luwedim diyõdig anĩ ado, maaĩwõ difaref are ganan, maman difiyẽdig nigin tamom maman difediyouf.
59003008	Anĩ ere, tamo takam bale maman fiya kisi feleya sã. Ĩ faimud sane fen, laa nẽ mũ sanem barikã.
59003009	Baledam ada neda Odug ado Tamada yana talesedig, age tafe fen, de anim tamo Negur yogo gen inodin anĩ gelu tafedidig.
59003010	Awada tekelei anĩ bun tamal, yana yaleseya ado gelu fiya wõ yedig. Turau tar, anĩ to agef ilauf bagai.
59003011	Maaĩ naan ado naan maug, warur tekelei bun tamal wõya kisi feleya de?
59003012	Turau tar, aa fig, aa oliv faat imaya kisi feleya de? Aa wain, aa fig faat imaya kisi feleya de? Age fiya gen, maaĩ naan, warur bun tamal, naan maug wõya kisi feleya sã.
59003013	Ã atun taka, kisi biya ado fen, kisi fokõ feleya adouf are, ĩ yogon tobonunã biya bunem, wau yukesileya kisi biya bunem isif anĩ bun, dõ fiya bunem anĩ yaorouf.
59003014	Anĩ ere, ã ãgenei wauĩ bun, kiyeĩ makik ado, aya aya yeya adouf are, ã yeneĩ to waleseg fen, aya kisi biya ado gouf. Ago gouf are, ã udegẽg fen, momoi nẽ od anĩ to dõ gouf.
59003015	Yeneĩ yaleseya nẽ kisi age fiya, saa ilunem to isif, anĩ ere, are tenebur tamal, bouwa nẽ oroya nẽ, Satan bun tamal.
59003016	Ere nigin, kiyeĩ ado aya aya yeya ibodok nẽ an, ekul fiya ado ereb ereb sane ganan ibodok.
59003017	Anĩ ere, kisi biya saa ilunem isif are, uyulil karẽtut, age fe di, maror nigin wau laa fiya, molol, abob karĩ fiyẽya, wau yũya barikã ado, faat biya yũya, anĩ kinau ya sã ado, mala yaleya sã.
59003018	Maur gudũ fiya tamo ĩ maror bun itenek, ĩ madur bagai anĩ kusu fedig.
59004001	Erem age fe di, kusĩya ado monẽya ã atun ibodok? Are ãgenei oroya ã namein kusĩ yedig anĩ bunem to wõ yedig de?
59004002	Ã ereb oroyeik, anĩ ere, to walegedig. Anĩ nigin, ã safineid adodo udenkesig fen, ereb ereb yalekenẽdiya nigin kisi gedig. Ã ereb oroyeik, anĩ ere, yaleya kisi feleya sã. Anĩ nigin, ã monẽg fen, kusĩ gedig. Ã to walegedig, ere nigin, ã Negur to, to wiyẽgedig.
59004003	Sain ã to gef bun, to walegedig, ere nigin, ã wauĩ bun tutuk sa ken, to gedig, ã ereb walegef are aug naumeĩ nigin ge fen, iraileya nigin ago gedig.
59004004	Ã gai de, tamo kayau seseirã dinodig gen! Ã tenebur nẽ oroya ado bagu gouf are, Negur kiwai wenẽgef anĩ ã keleĩ sã de? Taka ĩ tenebur nẽ oroya ado bagu fouf are, Negur nẽ kiwai tamo wõ youf.
59004005	Ã kisi gef, Negur nẽ Itotoya ĩ gariya sã, “Uur ada namedan ibodõf nigin inon anĩ kiyeĩ totol bagai ifenek,” yef de?
59004006	Anĩ ere, Negur ĩ wau ifenẽya mugi bagai ada ifanadadig. Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Negur ĩ, dogo yeneid dalesef anidi kiwai ifeneĩd fen, waud dukesil dibodok anidi wau ifenẽdidig.”
59004007	Age fiyauf are, aug Negur farumen ubodõgouf. Satan wal fiya nigin teĩbir gouf, ago ge di, ĩ ã folõ yeikalauf.
59004008	Negur wagen usig len, ĩ ã wagein isiyouf. Mosor adodo ã, imeĩ kulo gouf, kisi uru adodo ã, kisi tenebur ein nẽ oroya bun unogef anĩ utorõg fen, kisi ganan Negur bun dogol unogouf.
59004009	Wauĩ gudũf, maruĩ isi fen, inã walogouf. Kasãya utorõg fen, wauĩ gudũ fouf, wauĩ kulĩya utorõg fen, wauĩ morõf.
59004010	Odug mala bun wauĩ ukesileg, ago ge di, ĩ ã yalesneĩf.
59004011	Turau tar, ã abob, õ sane to wiyẽg. Taka ĩ, tura, õ sane fiyek be, es fiyek, ĩ lo are sane ye fen, lo es fiyek. Ã lo es wiyẽgouf are, ã lo dõ fiya tamo sã, anĩ ere, ã lo nẽ marau gen wowãg fen, ã aug tamo es wiyẽgedif.
59004012	Lo ifenẽya ado es fiya tamo, de tekelei dogol ibodok, ĩ yogo kel yaleya ado daũ feleya kisi feleya. Anĩ ere, ã ere anĩ neĩ tã es wiyẽgouf?
59004013	Gama karĩ gouf, õ aib urõgedig, “Gama be nil, amã fau taun enei be anĩ bun mele, an yar tekelei mabod, bisnis mano fen, moni malouf,” gedig.
59004014	Anĩ ere, ãgenei mata are nil naig fe ilauf anĩ, ã keleĩ sã. Ãgenei mata are ere? Ã ogou sain naal bagai wõ ye fen, iwaikeledig gen.
59004015	Anĩ nigin, ã eig gouf, “Odug orouf are, amã mabod ken, enei be anĩ age mafouf,” gouf.
59004016	Anĩ ere, ã agog wauĩ fã ye di, yeneĩ walesegedig. Yana yaleseya age fediya ganan are sane.
59004017	Age fiya nigin, taka ĩ biya nigin kelei ken, age fiya kisi feleya anĩ to age fouf, ĩ mosor inouf.
59005001	Gama karĩ weleg, ã safina musei adodo, morõ odug ã bun isif anĩ nigin maruĩ isi fen, inã walogouf.
59005002	Ãgenei safineĩ bura le di, dedek ãgenei kolos dakasin.
59005003	Ãgenei gol ado silwa maat te yun. Dogo neid maat te anim, ã nigin kiwai od wogõ ye fen, yã nem gen ãgenei bouweĩ yakasiyouf. Ã gamag idikeleya sain mog, safina kuru gen.
59005004	Ulegef! Kabĩ tamo ãgenei kabier kusu fiya nigin oroi dilen anĩ to na waledigen nigin, na yaleya nẽ wareg ã to wenẽdigen anim, ã nigin kaĩ ye fen, iron. Age dife di, oroi tamo aiteid, Odug saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri feid uyu iroudig anĩ, wederen ilen.
59005005	Ã tenebur ein ereb ereb biyai biyai ado ubodõg fen, bouweĩ sigigi gen. Ã idenkesiya nẽ naa nigin bouweĩ gigiru unogen.
59005006	Ã, idi mosor sã, kiwai to difenein anidi, bouweid ũg fen, udenkesigen.
59005007	Anĩ nigin, turau tar, to fese gef uleg, Odug nẽ isiya sain wõ youf. Saaf kabĩ yaleya tamo, teneub bun saaf biya bagai wõ youf nigin, naig fe tarif fen, uyẽ uruwan isif ile idikeledig anĩ atun, naig fe feseya sã tarif fen, kabĩ yaledig anĩ uleg.
59005008	Ãg, to feseg fen, totol ufaragauf, ere nigin, Odug isiya nẽ naa are mogo melsak.
59005009	Turau tar, abob to nauseir wiyẽg, abob nauseir wiyẽgouf are, es fiya ã bun isiyouf. Es fiya tamo mogo bobogẽ ifaref!
59005010	Turau tar, profet Odug nẽ yana bun wogõ den anidi, darau bun feseya sã difaren gen ãg ago gouf.
59005011	Ã keleĩ, ada idi feseya sã difaren anidi el fedif taudig. Ã Job naig fe feseya sã ifaren anĩ karĩg fen, dum Odug ĩ bun ereb naig fen are ulegen. Age fiya gen, Odug ĩ wau ifenẽya ado wau yũya barikã.
59005012	Anĩ ganan wal fiya, turau tar, ã wauĩ kuturol fen, saa ilun bunem, tenebur bunem be, ereb taka bunem od to megeir wogouf. Ãgenei yoya are de yo dogol gouf, ãgenei sãya are de sã dogol gouf. To dõ gouf are, es fiya bun ufaragauf.
59005013	Ã atun taka ĩ morõ bun ibodok de? Age fouf, ĩ kosẽ youf bagai. Ã atun taka wau al fef de? Age fouf, ĩ yana yaleseya nẽ seg yalediyouf.
59005014	Ã atun taka dagi ado de? Age fouf, ĩ sios nẽ mudur adodo ĩ nigin kosẽ de fen, Odug yana bun ĩ mudur bun moul fi difalauf nigin iwegnẽdiyouf bagai.
59005015	Age fe di, momoiya bunem kosẽ def anim dagi tamo el fiyẽdig. Odug ĩ yalesnẽf. Ĩ mosor inon ouf are, in mosor nigin weder tu kalauf.
59005016	Anĩ nigin, ãgenei mosor nigin abob mala bun kurõ wesig fen, abob nigin kosẽ ge di, ã karika walogouf. Madur tamo nẽ kosẽya are megeir ado fen, kabĩ yaledig.
59005017	Eliya ĩ tamo ada gen taka. Ĩ uyẽ to isiyouf nigin totol bagai kosẽ ye di, tenebur ein yar towo ogõ sigis uyẽ to isin.
59005018	Ĩ baban kosẽ ye di, saa ilunem uyẽ isin, age fe di, tenebur nẽ saaf wowã yen.
59005019	Turau tar, ã atun taka, momoi nẽ naab kũ fen ken, fasikor fel, meteig ile di, takam ĩ momoi nẽ naab bun kel irousiyouf are,
59005020	enei karĩ gouf, aibem taka ĩ mosor tamo yogon kũ fenẽya nẽ delẽ bun tamal falei fiyek are, yogon malakanon laa bun tamal kel yale fen, mosor musei ganan nigin weder tu keleya anĩ irou isif.
60001001	Aya Pita, Jesus Kristus nẽ aposel, Negur igirnẽdin anidi, tenebur ein yaũ tamo gen Pontus, Galesia, Kapadosia, Asia ado, Bitinia provins firagagaũ de difaref anidi bun pas enei atotof.
60001002	Ã, ereb wõya sã mog, Negur Tamada nẽ keleĩ biya kilei igirneĩ di, Awa Uur nẽ kabĩ bunem fateul wõ gen, anĩ bunem, ã Jesus Kristus sigor dõg fen, yogon naud ã tetein wiri fen. Wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun barikãf.
60001003	Negur, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ Tama yana talesauf! Yogon wau yũya odug bun, Negur ĩ Jesus Kristus laa bun tamal kel fã yen bunem, ada mata gõ fadan, are ada mata ibodõya wau iseya bun tele fen,
60001004	yogon akor, inanakeleya, bura leya be, sa keleya kisi feleya sã, ã nigin saa ilun dodok fen anĩ bun talauf nigin age fen.
60001005	Momoiya bunem, ã Negur nẽ megeir anim kulatun yeik ile, kel yaleya, idikeleya sain bun yaor fouf nigin dodok fef anĩ, isiyouf.
60001006	Anĩ nigin, gama sain naal bagai, ã morõ fire fire anĩ bun wauĩ morõ yeĩdigeg, ã fatuk bagai wauĩ kulĩ yef.
60001007	Morõ eneidi ã bun isin are, ãgenei momoiya, gol yã nem difalegefeg, sa keledig anĩ wal fiya wõ ye fen, ãgenei momoiya anĩ, momoiya bagai yaore di, Jesus Kristus wõ youf sain bun, yana ifenẽya, fula fiya medeĩya ado, yana yaleseya walogouf nigin agef isin.
60001008	Ã ĩ to ulegen, anĩ ere, ã ĩ nigin wauĩ laa fef. Ã gama ĩ to ulegef, anĩ ere, ã ĩ nigin momoi ge fen, wauĩ kulĩya dir feleya kisi feleya sã ado fula fiya medeĩya anim aura yeik,
60001009	ere nigin, ã ãgenei momoiya nẽ kaũ, ãgenei meleĩkanon kel yaleya anĩ mogo walegef.
60001010	Kel yaleya enei nigin, profet idi wau ifenẽya ã bun isin anĩ nigin wogõ den anidi, fatuk bagai el de dimir ken,
60001011	Kristus nẽ Uur idi bun ibodon anĩ, Kristus nẽ darau ado anĩ dumen isiyouf nẽ fula fiya medeĩya nigin profet od wogõ yen sain bun, ĩ ere nigin ado ereb sain nigin wogõ yen anĩ, idi keleĩ youf nigin age difen.
