60001012	Awa Uur Fateul saa ilunem sur fen anĩ bunem, soosi tamo idi biya od wogõ diyein anim ereb wogõ diyein, are engeleg dilouf nigin totol bagai orodif anĩ nigin, profet idi wogõ den sain bun, idi dogo nigin sã, ã nigin aruna dalen anĩ, idi bun yaor fen.
60001013	Anĩ nigin, dõ fiya nigin ãgenei kisi dodok gouf. Ã aug nigin biya kulatun gouf. Jesus Kristus yaor fouf sain bun, wau ifenẽya ifeneĩf anĩ nigin ãgenei wauĩ iseya barikãf.
60001014	Gere tar dõ fiya biya gen, sain ã neneya bun ubodõg fen, oroya sane ã walegen anĩ to dõ gouf.
60001015	Anĩ ere, Negur ã iweignein, ĩ fateul ibodok gen, ereb ã ago gef ganan bun fateul ubodõgouf,
60001016	ere nigin, Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok, “Fateul ubodõg, ere nigin, aya fateul abodok.”
60001017	Ã, Dei anĩ kinau ya bunem tamo mugu mugu nẽ kabĩ to es fedig ĩ, uweignẽgef, anĩ nigin, ã tenebur ein yaũ tamo gen, kumĩ ado aniniya anĩ bun, ãgenei mata ubodõgouf.
60001018	Ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã, mata ibodõya kaũ sã, tubuĩ tar bunem walegen anĩ bun tamal kel yaleyein, are silwa be gol age fediya gen, ereb bura lauf anĩ bunem sã,
60001019	anĩ ere, Kristus, sipsip naal amuyẽ sã, gerĩ tõ fiya taka sã anĩ nẽ naud biya bagai anĩ bunem kel yaleyein.
60001020	Negur ereb ereb ganan kare fiya sã mog, ĩ igirnen, anĩ ere, ã nigin idikeleya sain enei bun ĩ yaor fen.
60001021	Kristus bunem, ã, Negur Kristus laa bun tamal kel turĩ fiye ken, fula fiya medeĩya ifenen ĩ nigin momoi gen, anĩ nigin, ãgenei momoiya ado wauĩ iseya Negur bun ibodok.
60001022	Ã gama momoi anĩ dõ fiya bunem, aug nigin lilik ge fen, tureĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fiya bagai walegen nigin, abob nigin fatuk bagai wauĩ bun wauĩ laa fouf.
60001023	Ere nigin, ã bura leya nẽ faat bunem sã, to bura leya nẽ faat bunem baban gõ yein, are Negur nẽ od mata ibod ken, faimud ibodkeleya anĩ bunem age fen.
60001024	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Tamo ganan fisir gen, agef fen, dogo neid fula fiya medeĩya ganan kabier odõ munĩ gen. Fisir gariri keleid fen, munĩ kuku redig,
60001025	anĩ ere, Odug nẽ od faimud ibodkalauf.” Od enei are ã wogõ yein.
60002001	Anĩ nigin, sane ganan, idegẽya ganan, mala yaleya, kiyeĩ ado, dumen od irõya ganan urailagauf.
60002002	Momou mata gõ fediya gen, uur nẽ sumin karẽtut nigin fatuk bagai oroyeĩf, ago ge di, ã anĩ bunem ãgenei kel yaleya bun odugouf.
60002003	Gama ã, Odug ĩ biya yeya anĩ, mogo wõg ulegen.
60002004	Ã, ĩ mata ibodõya Meein, tamom dudum difiyen, anĩ ere, Negurem igirne ken, Negur mala bun biya bagai wõ yen anĩ bun usig fen,
60002005	ãg, mata ibodõya meein gen, uur nẽ fõ inoyeĩ di, pris fateul wõg fen, Jesus Kristus bunem uur nẽ sesewi fiya Negur mala bun biya anĩ wenẽdigouf.
60002006	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Lo weleg, aya Saion oun meein taka, monog tor aya agirnen, biya bagai anĩ anof, age afe di, taka ĩ, ĩ nigin momoi yef, ĩ mama to bagai yalouf.”
60002007	Momoi gef ã bun, meein enei are biya bagai. Anĩ ere, idi to momoi def anidi bun, “Meein fõ inoya tamom sane de fen, ditoron anĩ, gama monog tor wõ yen.”
60002008	Agef fen, “Ĩ, tamo yeid tũ fiya nẽ meein wõ ye fen, idi kuku douf nẽ sa tuwa anĩ wõ yen.” Idi yeid tũ fef, ere nigin, idi od anĩ to dõ difef, areg Negurem idi age difouf nigin igirin.
60002009	Anĩ ere, ã tamo kayau Negurem igirnein, king nẽ pris, teneub fateul, Negur nẽ tamo kayau wowã gen, are ĩ ã gugum bun tamal iweignei ken, yogon lalan biya bagai bun irouleyein anĩ nẽ yana, ã walesagauf nigin, agog wõ gen.
60002010	Uruwa bun, ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau sã, anĩ ere, gama ã Negur nẽ tamo kayau. Uruwa bun, ã wau yũya to walegen, anĩ ere, gama ã mogo wau yũya anĩ walegen.
60002011	Turau tar oboiyou, aya ã tenebur ein yaũ tamo ado urug tamo gen anĩ, mosor nẽ oroya meleĩkanon geid kusĩ yedig anĩ so wiyẽgouf nigin, totol bagai arokeneik.
60002012	Ã haiden atun tobonuneĩ biya bagai bun ubodõge di, idi ã nigin sane ago gedig dedig anidi, ãgenei tobonuneĩ biya anĩ dile fen, Negur ada ki fadauf sain bun, idi Negur yana dalesauf.
60002013	Ã aug Odug nigin ge fen, megeir ganan tamo atun inodin anĩ farumen ubodõgouf, are king megeir ilun bagai ĩ farumen be,
60002014	gawaman nẽ mudur adodo idi, tamo sane age difef anidi darau difenẽdiyouf nigin ado, tamo tutuk age difef anidi yeneid dalesauf nigin, Negurem sur fedif anidi farumen ubodõgouf.
60002015	Ere nigin, ã ereb biya ago gef bunem, kisi neneya tamo neid neneya wogõya anĩ foro dalauf, are Negur nẽ oroya.
60002016	Tamo kafĩ fiya sã ubodõgouf, anĩ ere, ãgenei kafĩ fiya sã anĩ sane kerub fiya nẽ kabĩ bun to unogouf. Negur nẽ ferfer ubodõgouf.
60002017	Tamo ganan anini wiyẽdigouf. Momoiya tureĩ tar nigin wauĩ laa fouf. Negur kumĩ ado anini wiyẽgouf. Agog fen, king anini wiyẽgouf.
60002018	Ferfer ã, aniniya ganan ado ãgenei odudug farumen ubodõgouf, idi biya fen, waud yũdig anidi dogol farumen sã, idi wau morõ difeneĩdig anidig farumen ubodõgouf.
60002019	Ere nigin, tamo taka ĩ gariya sã darau yalef sain bun, ĩ Negur nigin kisif fen, darau nẽ morõ anĩ faali fouf, are biya.
60002020	Anĩ ere, ã mosor unogen nigin wagĩ fiya waleg fen, morõ faali gouf are, ã bun ere biya anĩ isiyouf? Anĩ ere, ã ereb biya ago gen nigin darau waleg fen, anĩ faali gouf are, enei are Negur mala bun biya.
60002021	Enei bun ã iweignein, ere nigin, Kristus ã nigin darau yalen, are ãg ĩ uleg fen, yogon delẽ anĩ dõ gouf nigin age fen.
60002022	“Ĩ mosor taka to inon, age fe di, yogon sigor bun idegẽya taka to dilen.”
60002023	Sain idi ĩ kono difiyen, ĩ idi to solo fedin. Sain ĩ darau yalen, ĩ kumĩ to ifenẽdin. Age fiya ban, ĩ yogo Negur tutuk es fedig ĩ ima bun inon.
60002024	Neda mosor ĩ yogo bouwam aa tetek bun faali fen, are ada mosor bun gare tau fen, madur bagai bun mata tabodõf nigin age fen. Yogon gudũ fiyam ã el yein.
60002025	Ã sipsip gen fõ yeleyan ulegen, anĩ ere, gama ã sipsip marau, ãgenei meleĩkanon nẽ lo fiya tamo bun keg usigen.
60003001	Kayau ã, age fiya bagai, aiweĩ tar farumen ubodõgouf, ago ge di, aib idi biya od nigin to momoi defeg, idi irokenẽdiya bunem sã, nedi kayau tar neid tobonuneid bunem kel yalediyouf,
60003002	are idi ãgenei tobonuneĩ karẽtut ado aniniya anĩ dile fen, momoi douf.
60003003	Ãgenei meli meli, mayarẽ naki anĩ, fatiya korif ifõya, gol sai ifonũya be, kolos biya ifonũya age fediya bunem to isiyouf.
60003004	Age fiya ban, ãgenei meli meli, ã namein uur molol ado imatẽya anĩ nẽ meli meli to inanakalauf, are Negur mala bun odug bagai anĩ bunem isiyouf.
60003005	Naab enei bun, fateul kayau kulu temeleid idi, Negur bun waud dinon anidig, dogo nigin meli bagai wowã douf nigin age difedig. Idi dogo neid aiweid tar farumen dibodõdig.
60003006	Sara ĩ Abraham sigor dõf fen, ĩ nigin yogon odug yedig gen, ã ereb madur agog fen, kumĩ farumen to ubodõgouf are, ã ne barai tar wowã gef.
60003007	Tamo ãg, age fiya bagai, aiweĩ tar geid ubodõg fen, idi nigin kisi gouf, are idi forõya nigin tamo wal fiya sã, idi dum mata ibodõya nẽ ege luwa wau ifenẽya, ã weim walogouf nigin, aniniya ado ago wiyẽdigouf, ago ge di, ãgenei kosẽya, ereb takam to naabura gudũ fouf.
60003008	Od idĩya nigin, ã ganan abob geid wauĩ tekelei bun ubodõgouf. Abob nigin wauĩ ũgouf. Tureĩ tar gen abob nigin wauĩ laa fouf. Wauĩ yũya ado wauĩ yukesileya bun ubodõgouf.
60003009	Sane anĩ sane bunem be, kono fiya anĩ kono fiya bunem to solo gouf, anĩ ere, el fiya bunem solo gouf, ere nigin, ã ago ge di, el fiya anĩ walogouf nigin, ã enei bun iweignein.
60003010	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Aib ĩ mata nigin wau laaf fen, naa biya ilouf, ĩ yogo bale sane wogõya bun tamal so fiye ken, yogon sigor idegẽya wogõya bun tamal so fiyẽf bagai.
60003011	Ĩ sane itor ken, biya age fouf bagai. Ĩ maror imir ken, anĩ dõ fouf bagai.
60003012	Ere nigin, Odug nẽ malam tamo madur bagai lo fedidig, agef fen, yogon weder dogo neid kosẽya anĩ karĩ yedig. Anĩ ere, Odug nẽ nawa, idi sane age difef anidi bun dudum fiyẽdidig.”
60003013	Ã biya age fiya nigin kabĩ totol walogouf are, aim anĩ ã sane yeĩf?
60003014	Anĩ ere, ã ereb madur nigin darau walogoufeg, ã el yeik. “Ereb idi kumĩ def anĩ to kumĩg, to morõ yeĩf.”
60003015	Anĩ ere, ãgenei wauĩ bun Kristus ĩ Odug unogouf. Idi wauĩ iseya ã namein ibodok anĩ nẽ gariya karĩ douf nigin to diyeik anidi ganan solog urokenẽdigouf nigin, faimud dodok gouf. Anĩ ere, molol ado aniniya bunem enei agog fen,
60003016	kisi karẽtut walogouf, ago ge di, idi Kristus bun ãgenei tobonuneĩ biya nigin od sane wogõ def anidi, dogo neid dumen od wogõya nigin mama fediyouf.
60003017	Biya age fiya nigin darau yaleya, are Negur nẽ oroyauf, enei are, sane age fiya nigin darau yaleya anĩ wal fiya, are biya bagai youf.
60003018	Kristus ĩ, sain tekelei dogol, mosor nigin laa fen, ĩ madur tamo anĩ, idi madur sã tamo nigin laa fen, are ĩ, ã Negur bun irouleyeĩf nigin age fen. Ĩ bouwa dukesin, anĩ ere, Awa Uur bunem mata ibodon.
60003019	Awa Uur bunemeg ĩ ile fen, uur kalabus bun dibodon anidig wogõ fiyẽdin.
60003020	Eneidi are, kulu Noa nẽ sain bun, waag ifot mog, Negur idi nigin feseya sã tari fedidig, anĩ ere, idi fe den. Waag anĩ namen, tamo kayau musei sã, ganan eit dogol naan bunem kel yaledin.
60003021	Naan enei are, naan igũya, gama Jesus Kristus nẽ mata kel fãya bunem ãg kel yaleyeik anĩ nẽ malakanon, are bouwa bun amuyẽ yaleleya sã, are Negur bun kisi karẽtut biya inoya.
60003022	Jesus Kristus ĩ saa ilun isel fen, Negur ima biyalẽ ibodok, age fe di, engel, yeneid adodo ado, megeir ganan ĩ farumen dibodok.
60004001	Anĩ nigin, Kristus ĩ yogo bouwa bun darau yalen nigin, ã augeg yogon kisi de tekelei anĩ urougauf, ere nigin, taka ĩ yogo bouwa bun darau yalen, ĩ mosor inoya nigin folõ felen.
60004002	Agef fen, ĩ tenebur ein yogon mata ibodõya fau ibodok bun, tamo bouwa nẽ oroya nigin to mata ibodõf, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ oroya nigin mata ibodõf.
60004003	Ã kulu sain meluk bagai, ereb haiden age difedig anĩ, ago gedig, idi bouwa nẽ oroya nigin totol sane wau fãya, noli kisi, aai yõya, bilãya, mala odug bun naan yõya ado, idegẽya waitou yana yaleseya sane bagai bun dibodõdig.
60004004	Ã idi geid, idi sane bagai age difedig anĩ bun to ulege di, idi anĩ dile fen, terẽ def, age de fen, idi ã nigin od sane wogõ def.
60004005	Anĩ ere, idi, Negur idi mata dibodok anidi ado idi gare den anidi es fediyouf nigin dodok fef ĩ bun, dogo nigin kurõ difeis dirokenẽf.
60004006	Enei nigin, biya od anĩ, idi gama mogo gare den anidig wogõ fiyẽdin, are idi bouweid bun, tamo gen es feid fen, dogo neid uur bun, Negur mata ibodok gen mata dibodõf nigin age fen.
60004007	Ereb ereb ganan nẽ idikeleya naa mogo melsak. Anĩ nigin, ã kosẽ gouf nigin, kisi el ge waleg fen, aug nigin biya kulatun gouf.
60004008	Anĩ ganan wal fiya, abob nigin fatuk bagai wauĩ laa fouf, ere nigin, wau laa fiya are mosor musei kerub fedidig.
60004009	Nauseirya sã, abob el ge waledigouf.
60004010	Ã mugu mugu, Negur bunem ege luwa walegen anĩ bunem, Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya fire fire nẽ lo fiya tamo dõ fiya biya gen, abob aruna walogouf.
60004011	Aib taka ĩ od wogõ yef, ĩ Negur nẽ od bagai wogõya gen wogõ youf. Aib taka ĩ aruna yalef, ĩ megeir Negur ĩ ifenek anĩ bunem age fouf, are ereb ereb ganan bun, Jesus Kristus bunem, Negur yana dalesauf nigin age fouf. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya ado megeir gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
60004012	Turau tar oboiyou, ã darau yã isaĩneĩ geneg gama walegef anĩ nigin, ereb urug ã bun wõya gen to terẽ gouf.
60004013	Anĩ ere, ã Kristus geid darau walegef nigin wauĩ kulĩ youf, ago ge di, ã yogon fula fiya medeĩya anĩ yaor fouf sain bun, wauĩ fatuk bagai kulĩ youf.
60004014	Ã Kristus yana nigin de fen, kono diyeĩf, ã el yeik, ere nigin, fula fiya medeĩya nẽ Awa Uur, are Negur nẽ anĩ ã bun ibodok.
60004015	Ã darau walogouf, are tamo yukesiya tamo, bẽ tamo, tamo tobonunã sane fire fire dinodig be, baula fiya tamo, nedi darau gen sãf.
60004016	Age fiya ban, ã momoiya tamo nigin darau walogouf are, ã to mama yeĩ, anĩ ere, ã Negur yana anĩ urougef nigin ĩ yana walesagauf.
60004017	Ere nigin, sain eĩ, Negur nẽ ibor bun, es fiya gariya inoya nẽ. Es fiya anĩ ada bun gariya inof are, idi Negur nẽ biya od to dõ difedig anidi bun ere anĩ wõ youf?
60004018	Are Negur nẽ Itotoya eig ye irok kilei, “Madur tamo kel yalediya nigin malai bagai youf are, tamo momoiya sã ado mosor temeleid nigin ere anĩ wõ youf?”
60004019	Anĩ nigin, idi Negur nẽ oroya bunem darau dalef anidi, idi dogo, Negur kare fedin yogon od dõ fiya biya, ĩ ima bun dino fen, toku ereb biya anĩ age difef dilauf.
60005001	Sios nẽ uyu irouya ã atun dibodok bun, aya, uyu irouya tureĩ, Kristus nẽ darau ail fen, kurõ afesidig ado, fula fiya medeĩya fau yaor fouf weim talouf anĩ, ã arokeneik.
60005002	Negur nẽ sipsip ã farumen dibodok anĩ nẽ lo fiya tamo wõg fen, kabĩ mala nigin ge fen to lo wedigouf, anĩ ere, ã wauĩ iro ken, Negur ã ago gouf nigin orof kilei lo wedigouf. Moni nigin ge fen, to ago gouf, anĩ ere, aruneid yaleya nigin bagai fen, ago gouf.
60005003	Idi ã gem lo wedigouf nigin inodin anidi to nugo wiyẽdigouf, anĩ ere, ã sipsip dileyei ken, dõ diyeĩf nẽ tobonuneĩ bun ago gouf.
60005004	Agog mog, sipsip lo fiya tamo neid mudur wõ youf sain bun, ã fula fiya medeĩya nẽ teter to bagai tu ralauf anĩ walogouf.
60005005	Age fiya bagai, kesu oosi ã, biyeid uyu irouya farumen ubodõgouf. Ã ganan, abob nigin wauĩ yukesileya anĩ ufonũgouf, ere nigin, “Negur ĩ yeneid dalesef anidi kiwai gen iledidig, anĩ ere, ĩ waud yukesileya anidi wau ifenẽdidig.”
60005006	Anĩ nigin, Negur nẽ ima megeir barikã farumen wauĩ ukalaisileg ubodõgouf, ago ge di, ĩ ã yogon sain bun yalesneĩf.
60005007	Ãgenei suwẽya ganan ĩ bun unogouf, ere nigin, ĩ ã nigin suwẽ yedig.
60005008	Ã aug nigin biya kulatun ubodõg fen, lo walagauf. Ãgenei kiwai, Satan ĩ laion ninirã ye fen, taka yakasiyouf nigin mumul katĩ fedig gen, age fedig.
60005009	Momoiya bun totol ufareg fen, ĩ wal fiya nigin teĩbir gouf, ere nigin, ã keleĩ, ã tureĩ tar teneub ganan bun, darau de tekelei age fiya anĩ daledig.
60005010	Ago ge di, wau ifenẽya ganan nẽ Negur ĩ, ã Kristus bun, yogon fula fiya medeĩya faimud ibodkeleya bun iweignein ĩ, ã sain naal darau walege di, ĩ yogo baban yalesnei ken, ã kisi feleya bagai totol, megeir ado, feseya sã wõya nigin age fouf.
60005011	Ĩ bun megeir gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi.
60005012	Sailas, ĩ aya turau dõ fiya biya gen kisi afedig, in isennẽya bunem, aya ã tobega bagai atotkenein, anĩ bunem, aya ã wauĩ ales fen, enei ã gama walegef anĩ momoi bagai Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya au fen, kurõ afesin. Anĩ bun totol ufaragauf.
60005013	Sios Babilon ibodok, ĩ ã geid weim igirnein, ĩ ã bun yogon aanya sur fef, age fe di, neu kesu Mak ĩg age fef.
60005014	Wauĩ laa fiya bunem, abob umã wiyẽg fen, aan gouf. Ã Kristus bun ufaregef anĩ ganan bun, wau inosiya ibodõf.
61001001	Aya Simon Pita, Jesus Kristus nẽ ferfer fen aposel, idi neda Negur ado Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus nẽ madur bagai bunem momoiya meli bagai neda gen dalen anidi bun, pas enei atotof.
61001002	Ã, Negur ado neda Odug Jesus nigin keleĩ bunem, wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun barikãf.
61001003	Negur ĩ yogon fula fiya medeĩya ado biya bunem iweignadan, ada ĩ nigin keleĩ bunem, ada Negur nẽ oroya bun mata tabodõf nigin, ereb lau tafef anĩ ganan yogon megeir anim ifanadan.
61001004	Enei bunem, ĩ ada yogon promis od, odug fen meli bagai andi ifanadan, are anĩ bunem ã Negur nẽ tobonunã bun bagai ufareg fen, bouwa nẽ oroya sanem teneub ganan daũ fen anĩ utorõgouf nigin age fen.
61001005	Age fiya nigin, ãgenei momoiya bun, biya anĩ tobol fiya nigin kabĩ totol walogouf, agog fen, biya bun, keleĩ tobol fiya nigin,
61001006	agog fen, keleĩ bun, aug nigin biya kulatun ibodõya tobol fiya nigin, agog fen, aug nigin biya kulatun ibodõya bun, feseya sã ifareya tobol fiya nigin, agog fen, feseya sã ifareya bun, Negur nẽ oroya bun ibodõya tobol fiya nigin,
61001007	agog fen, Negur nẽ oroya bun ibodõya bun, abob geid nigal yũya tobol fiya nigin, agog fen, abob geid nigal yũya bun, wau laa fiya tobol fiya nigin kabĩ totol walogouf.
61001008	Ere nigin, ã tobonunã enei ganan waleg fen, tobol gouf are, ã neda Odug Jesus Kristus nigin keleĩ yaleya bun kabĩ biya kaũ ado walogouf.
61001009	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ eneidi taka to yalouf, ĩ melsã nigin dogol ileya kisi feleya fen, mala ifofakeleya, agef fen, ĩ yogon mosor kulu tamal bun tamal lilik fiyekelen anĩ weder tu kelen.
61001010	Anĩ nigin, turau tar, Negurem ã iweignei ken, igirnein anĩ tutuk bagai keleĩ youf nigin, kabĩ totol walogouf. Ere nigin, ã enei ago gouf are, ã to bagai kubũ gouf.
61001011	Ago ge di, ã, neda Odug fen Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus nẽ tano mata gai ibodkeleya bun, ileya nigin lakĩ fiya taka to ibodõf.
61001012	Anĩ nigin, ã enei nigin kelei ken, momoiya ã gama ado anĩ bun totol ufaregef, anĩ ere, aya enei nigin kisi gouf nigin, faimud wedereĩ fokõ afouf.
61001013	Aya kisi afef, aya bouwau enei nẽ salafat bun abod mog, ãgenei kisi turĩ afouf, are tutuk,
61001014	ere nigin, aya mogo, neda Odug Jesus Kristus kurõ feis irokanan nigin, aya keleĩ, aya mogo melsã yerin awaikalauf.
61001015	Anĩ nigin, aya ã atorneĩ mog, ã faimud enei karĩ walagauf nigin kabĩ totol alouf.
61001016	Amã, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ megeir ado isiya nigin ã marokenein sain are, amã nemã kisim tamo nẽ nenerĩ anĩ to wogõ mayein, anĩ ere, amã malamam bagai yogon fula fiya medeĩya nẽ megeir mailen anĩ wogõ maun.
61001017	Ait are Negur fula fiya medeĩya megeir ado bunem ĩ bun isi fen, iron, “Eĩ neu Kesu, ĩ nigin aya wau laa fedig, ĩ nigin aya wau kulĩ yedig,” sain anĩ bun, ĩ, Tama Negur bunem, yana odug ado fula fiya medeĩya yalen.
61001018	Amã ĩ geid arei fateul bun mafar mog, ait enei saa ilunem isi mog, amã mug bagai karĩ maun.
61001019	Agef fen, ada, profet neid od are momoi anĩ, megeir tafe, momoi tauf, are lalan gugum modoũ bun, we fef ile, we kasasa fe fen, bonimei nẽ barisa wauĩ bun fã youf gen, ã profet neid od karĩ weleg fen, el ge dõ gouf are, ã biya ubodõgouf.
61001020	Ereb odug bagai are eig fiya, ã keleĩ youf, Negur nẽ Itotoya nẽ profet od taka, tamo nẽ kisim to faded fouf.
61001021	Ere nigin, profet od, tamo nẽ oroya bunem to wogõ den, anĩ ere, tamo Awa Uur Fateulem ulum iroukenẽdi di, Negur bun tamal od dale fen, wogõ den.
61002001	Anĩ ere, tamo kayau atun idegẽya profeteg difaren, age fiya gen, ã atun idegẽya tiseg dibodõf. Idi fau tamo kayau daũ fediya nẽ idegẽya od anĩ iminẽyan difelneĩf, Odug na yaledin ĩ anĩ wa de fen, idi dogo bun kaisã bagai daũ feidleya anĩ dinouf.
61002002	Musei dogo neid tobonuneid sane dõ de fen, momoi nẽ naab are naabura gudũ difouf.
61002003	Dogo naumeid nigin, tise eneidi nenerĩ dogo neid kisim wogõ diyei ken, safineĩ gei difouf. Negur idi mogo es fedin, agef fen, idi daũ fediya nẽ are mogo isiyouf.
61002004	Negur ĩ engel mosor dino di, to isenneĩd fen, hel bun sur fiyẽdin, dumen es fediyouf nigin ku gugum keleya bun inenẽdin.
61002005	Negur ĩ kulu tenebur nẽ tamo kayau to isenneĩd fen, tamo kayau idi Negur nẽ to difaren anidi bun kuwei sur fen, anĩ ere, ĩ, Noa madur bagai nigin wogõya tamo ado, sewen anidi geid ahaha fedin.
61002006	Negur ĩ, Sodom taun ado Gomora taun, yam yakur feid aasu ileya bunem daũ feidlen, are tamo kayau Negur nẽ to difaref anidi bun, ereb wõ youf anĩ ifelnẽdiyouf nigin age fen.
61002007	Negur ĩ, Lot madur tamo, tamo lo to dõ difedig anidi neid tobonuneid sane nigin wau morõdig ĩ ahaha fiyen
61002008	(ere nigin, madur tamo are, naa ganan bun, idi atun ibod ken, tobonuneid sane ilen ado karĩ yen anĩ bunem, yogon malakanon madur anĩ darau yalen).
61002009	Age fiyauf are, Odug ĩ naig fe fen, tamo Negur nẽ dibodok anidi, morõ bun tamal yalelneĩd fen, tamo Negur nẽ to dibodok anidi, darau bun irounẽdif ile, es fiya nẽ naa bun ileya nigin anĩ keleĩ.
61002010	Negur ĩ, idi bouwa nẽ oroya sane dõ de fen, Odug nẽ yana lai difedig anidi bun, momoi bagai age fouf. Idi kumĩ sã ado, dogo yeneid dalesedig. Idi, engel megeir adodo nigin bou yũya od wogõya nigin to kumĩ dedig.
61002011	Anĩ ere, engeleg dogo neid totol ado megeir odug bagai nigin tamo eneidi wal fediya, Odug mala bun, engel megeir adodo age fediya nigin bou yũya od to wogõ dedig.
61002012	Anĩ ere, tamo eneidi, ereb idi keleĩ sã nigin kono difedig. Idi gaar kuĩ kisi sã, bouwa nẽ oroya dogol dõ dife di, tamom kaka difeid fen, didenkesiyouf nigin dogol gõ difedidig anidi gen. Gaar kuĩ gen, idig daũ fediyouf.
61002013	Idi sane age difen kilei, mala solo sane dalouf. Idi gaa atun bouwa nẽ oroya sigigi fiya nigin orodidig. Idi amuyẽ ado gerĩ tõ fiya. Idi ã geid sifa dino fen, nedi bouweid nẽ oroya sigigi difedig.
61002014	Idi meleid bun seseirã tobonunã barikã ado fen, mosor inoya nigin to bagai ditorõdig. Idi, tamo kayau totol sã difaref anidi, didĩ difedidig. Idi safina musei youf nigin imeid su lai de fen sũ we fiya nigin keleĩ bagai. Idi daũ feidleya nẽ gere tar.
61002015	Idi naab madur anĩ ditor ken, Beor naal, Balam ĩ sane nẽ mala solo nigin wau laa fedig anĩ nẽ naab dõ difouf nigin fasis difen.
61002016	Anĩ ere, ĩ donki, gaar kuĩ wogõya kisi feleya sã anim, yogon kũ fenẽya nigin ou fiyen, donki ĩ tamo nẽ ait nem wogõ ye fen, profet anĩ nẽ neneya kisi katũ fiyen.
61002017	Tamo eneidi, naan warur gere keleya gen ado, ogou uyẽ yau totol ado bunem irou isidig gen. Modoũ gugum keleya bagai anĩ, idi nigin saia fen.
61002018	Idi yana yaleseya od kaũ sã wogõ de fen, tamo kayau idi kũ fenẽya bun dibodok anidi bun tamal, mogo diyawof anidi, bouwa nẽ oroya, noli nigin kisi fãya bunem didĩ difedidig.
61002019	Tamo sane eneidi, tamo kayau karika ibodõya mafeneĩf de dirokenẽdidig, anĩ ere, idi dogo sane nẽ ferfer, ere nigin, tamo ĩ, ereb ĩ wal fiyek anĩ nẽ ferfer.
61002020	Idi, neda Odug ado Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus kelei ken, tenebur nẽ sane bun tamal soso dife di, baban tenebur nẽ sanem fili feid fen, wal fediyouf are, idi gariya bun sane dibodon anĩ wal fiya, idikeleya bun sane bagai dibodõf.
61002021	Idi madur bagai nẽ naab anĩ kelei ken, ĩtãfiya fateul idi imeid bun dinon anĩ dudum difem are, idi madur bagai nẽ naab anĩ to keleim, are dem.
61002022	Od biya tamo kayau wogõ dedig are, idi nigin momoi, “Gaũ yogon iluf anĩ kel yõdig,” takag, “Bor naan igu kel fen, baban ile ed igũdig.”
61003001	Turau tar oboiyou, eĩ neu pas baban ã bun sur afef. Aya pas uru enei atotodin are, kisi biya turĩ akeneĩ di, wedereĩ fokõ youf nigin age afen.
61003002	Aya, od profet fateul kulu wogõ den ado, ĩtãfiya neda Odug ado Isennadaya, ãgenei aposel bunem ifenein anĩ, ã karĩ walagauf nigin orouf.
61003003	Ã uyulil enei keleĩ youf, idikeleya naa bun, kono temeleid disiyouf, idi disi, kono de fen, dogo neid oroya sane dõ difouf.
61003004	Idi dirõf, “Ĩ asiyouf yen promis od anĩ nain? Amã nemã tamamã tar gare den bunem isif, ereb ereb ganan uruwa bun kare fen gen, agef yenek.”
61003005	Anĩ ere, idi, kulu bagai Negur nẽ od bunem saa wõ ye fen, teneub naan bun tamal ado naan nem kare fen anĩ, karĩ del fen, wedereid tu kelen.
61003006	Naan anim, kuwei fã ye fen, sain anĩ bun teneub ganan daũ felen.
61003007	Od de anim, saa ado teneub gama tailef are, yã nigin faraf foi fen, agef fen, tamo kayau momoiya sã es fiya ado daũ feidleya nẽ naa nigin inon ibodok.
61003008	Anĩ ere, turau tar oboiyou, ereb tekelei enei to wedereĩ tu kalauf, Odug bun naa tekelei are tausen yar gen, agef fen, tausen yar are naa tekelei gen.
61003009	Odug ĩ, yogon promis od kisi falauf nigin, tunĩ age dedig gen, to foi yedig. Ĩ taka daũ feleyan ileya itor ken, ganan waud falei fouf nigin, sain meluk tari yeĩdig.
61003010	Anĩ ere, Odug nẽ naa are, bẽ tamo gen isiyouf. Saa gududũ ye fen, iwaikalauf, ereb ereb nanaal teneub inon are ganan yam daũ falauf, agef fen, teneub ado ereb ereb ganan ĩ bun ibodok are yaor fouf.
61003011	Naab enei bun, ereb ereb ganan daũ falauf, anĩ nigin, ã tamo kayau naig fiya bagai wõya nigin kisi gef? Ã fateul ubodõg fen, Negur nẽ tobonunã bun ubodõgouf.
61003012	Ã, Negur nẽ naa tarig fen, kaisã bagai isiyouf nigin ololo gouf. Naa anĩ bun, yam saa daũ falauf, ereb ereb nanaal teneub inon are uruwam naan kalauf.
61003013	Anĩ ere, ada yogon promis od tarou fen, saa mata ado teneub mata ololo tafef, are madur tamo kayau an dibodõf.
61003014	Age fiya nigin, turau tar oboiyou, ã enei tari gef nigin, Odug mala bun amuyẽ sã, od sã wowãg fen, ĩ ado wauĩ katõ gouf nigin kabĩ totol walogouf.
61003015	Ãgenei kisi bun, neda Odug sain meluk tari fiya are, kel yaleya nigin gouf, are neda turada oboida Pol ĩg Negur kisi biya ifenẽ di, ã bun pas itoton kilei.
61003016	Ĩ yogon pas ganan bun, eig fe itotoid fen, enei nigin wogõ yen. Yogon pas bun, ereb ereb tunĩ keleĩya nigin lakĩ fiya bagai ibodok, are idi keleĩ sa ken, momoiya ilef isif anidi, Negur nẽ Itotoya tunĩ bun age difedig gen, falei difeid fen, dogo daũ feidleya bun diledig.
61003017	Anĩ nigin, turau tar oboiyou, ã enei mogo keleĩ nigin, lo wal fiya tamo neid kũ fenẽyam to guri diyei ken, dile ãgenei modoũ biya utorõg fen, kubũ geya nigin lo welegei.
61003018	Anĩ ere, neda Odug ado Isennadaya, Jesus Kristus nẽ wau ifenẽya ado keleĩ bun, odugouf. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya gama ado faimud ibodkalauf! Momoi.
62001001	Are ĩ gariya bun tamal, are amã mogo karĩ maun, are amã mogo malamam mailen, are amã mogo mail fen, amã imamam kobũ mafen–anĩ amã mata ibodõya nẽ Od mau fen, kurõ mafesif.
62001002	Mata are wõ yen. Amã anĩ mail fen, anĩ nigin kurõ mafesif. Age mafe fen, amã, mata ibodkeleya ĩ, Tama ado dibod ken, amã bun wõ yen anĩ, ã yaor mafe marokeneik.
62001003	Amã ereb mailen ado karĩ maun anĩ, ã yaor mafe marokeneik, are ãg amã geid nigal taũf nigin age mafef. Age fe di, neda nigal yũya are, Tama ado yogon Naal Jesus Kristus geid nigal taũf.
62001004	Amã nemã waumã kulĩya barikãf nigin enei matotof.
62001005	Od enĩ, amã ĩ bun tamal karĩ mau fen, ã yaor mafe marokeneik: Negur ĩ lalan, ĩ bun gugum taka to ibodok.
62001006	Ada ĩ geid nigal tauk tau fen, gugum bun tayõf are, ada tadeg fen, momoi anĩ bunem to tabodok.
62001007	Anĩ ere, ĩ lalan bun ibodok gen, adag lalan bun tayõf are, ada abob geid nigal taũf, age tafe di, Negur Naal, Jesus nẽ naud anim, mosor ganan bun tamal kulo fadalauf.
62001008	Ada mosor sã tauf are, ada dug tadeg ken, momoi anĩ ada namedan ibodõya sã.
62001009	Ada neda mosor kurõ tafalaisiyouf are, ĩ yogon od dõ fiya biya fen, madur bagai, anĩ nigin, ĩ fau neda mosor nigin weder tu kel fen, ada neda madur bagai sã anĩ ganan bun tamal kulo fadalauf.
62001010	Ada mosor to tanon tauf are, ada, Negur ĩ idegẽya tamal tau fen, in od ada namedan to ibodok.
62002001	Neu kesu tar, ã mosor to unogouf nigin, aya enei atotkeneik. Anĩ ere, taka ĩ mosor inouf are, taka ada isennadauf nigin yogon Dei irokenẽdig anĩ ibodok, ĩ Jesus Kristus, madur bagai.
62002002	Ĩ neda mosor nigin Negur nẽ didi yo fiya nẽ sesewi fiya, are neda mosor nigin dogol sã, anĩ ere, tenebur tamo kayau ganan neid mosor nigineg.
62002003	Ada keleĩ, ada yogon ĩtãfiya dõ tafef are, ada mogo ĩ keleĩ.
62002004	Tamo ĩ aya ĩ keleĩ ye fen, ereb ĩ irok anĩ to dõ fouf are, ĩ idegẽya tamo, agef fen, momoi anĩ ĩ bun to ibodok.
62002005	Anĩ ere, taka ĩ yogon od dõ fef are, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya are momoi bagai ĩ bun kisi felef. Anĩ bunem, ada ĩ bun tabodok anĩ ada keleĩ.
62002006	Aib taka ĩ bun abodok yef, ĩ Jesus age fedig gen age fouf bagai.
62002007	Turau tar oboiyou, aya ĩtãfiya mata to atotkeneik, anĩ ere, ĩtãfiya tubu, are abob nigin wau laa fiya anĩ, ã uruwa Jesus nigin momoi gen sain bunem karĩ gen. Ĩtãfiya tubu enei are, od ã karĩ gen anĩ.
62002008	Anĩ ere, aya ĩtãfiya mata atotkeneik, are anĩ nẽ momoi anĩ, ĩ bun ado ã bun mogo ulegef, ere nigin, gugum mogo iwaikele di, lalan momoi bagai anĩ mogo so fef.
62002009	Taka ĩ lalan bun abodok ye fen, yogon tura nigin to orof, ĩ fau gugum bun ibodok.
62002010	Aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin wau laa fef, ĩ lalan bun ibodok, age fe di, ereb anim ĩ ye tũ fiya nigin, ĩ bun taka to ibodok.
62002011	Anĩ ere, aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin to orof, ĩ gugum bun ibod ken, gugum bun iyõdig. Ĩ narib ilef anĩ, ĩ keleĩ sã, ere nigin, gugum anim ĩ mala ifofakelen.
62002012	Aya kesu tar ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ãgenei mosor in yana bunem weder tu kelen.
62002013	Aya tama tar ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã ĩ gariya bun ibodok anĩ keleĩ. Aya kesu oosi ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã sane anĩ mogo wal gen.
62002014	Aya kesu tar ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã Dei anĩ mogo keleĩ. Aya tama tar ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã ĩ gariya bun ibodok anĩ keleĩ. Aya kesu oosi ã atotkeneik, ere nigin, ã totol ado, age fe di, Negur nẽ od ã bun ibodok, age fe di, ã sane anĩ mogo wal gen.
62002015	Ã teneub enei be, ereb taka tenebur ibodok anĩ nigin to wauĩ laa fouf. Taka ĩ teneub enei nigin wau laa fouf are, Dei nẽ wau laa fiya ĩ bun to ibodok.
62002016	Ere nigin, ereb ereb ganan tenebur ein ifaref–mosor tamo nẽ oroya, yogon mala ile oroya ado, ereb ĩ ado fen ereb ĩ age fef anĩ nigin yana yaleseya–are Dei bun tamal to isif, anĩ ere, tenebur tamal isif.
62002017	Teneub ado yogon oroya are sa kalauf, anĩ ere, tamo Negur nẽ oroya dõ fef, ĩ mata ibodkalauf.
62002018	Neu kesu tar, sain enei are idikeleya sain. Kristus nẽ kiwai isif anĩ, ã mogo karĩ gen, age fiya gen, gamag Kristus nẽ kiwai tar musei disin. Anĩ bunem, sain enei are idikeleya sain anĩ, ada keleĩ.
62002019	Idi uruwa bun, ada geid tabod ken, ada bun tamal dilen, anĩ ere, idi momoi bagai neda sã. Ere nigin, idi nedam are, idi ada geid tabodom. Anĩ ere, idi ada bun tamal dilen anim, idi ganan neda sã anĩ yaor fen.
62002020	Anĩ ere, ã, Kristus ĩ Fateul anĩ bunem, Awa Uur Fateul waleg fen, ã ganan momoi anĩ keleĩ.
62002021	Aya ã momoi anĩ keleĩ sã nigin to atotkeneik, anĩ ere, ã momoi anĩ keleĩ nigin ado, idegẽya taka momoi anĩ bun tamal to isif nigin, aya ã atotkeneik.
62002022	Ai anĩ idegẽya tamo? Tamo, Jesus ĩ Kristus yeya anĩ wa fef anĩ. Tamo age fiya, are Kristus nẽ kiwai. Ĩ, Dei ado Naal wa fedif.
62002023	Taka ĩ Naal wa fef, ĩ bun Dei sã. Aib taka ĩ Naal kurõ fesif, ĩ bun Deig ado.
62002024	Ereb ã gariya bunem karĩ gen anĩ, ã bun agef ibodõf nigin lo walagauf. Ago gouf are, ã Naal bun ado Dei buneg ubodõgouf.
62002025	Agef fen, enei anĩ ereb ĩ age afouf fadan, are mata ibodkeleya.
62002026	Aya, idi ã kũ fenẽya bun dirouleyeĩya nigin age difef anidi nigin, enei atotkeneik.
62002027	Ã nigin, Awa Uur Fateul ã ĩ bun tamal walegen are, ã bun ibodok, age fe di, aib takam ã ifelneĩya nigin lau fiya taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, yogon Awa Uur Fateul anim, ereb ereb ganan nigin ã ifelneĩdig. Age fe di, Awa Uur Fateul anĩ momoi bagai, idegẽya sã, anĩ nigin, ã ifelnein kilei anĩ, ĩ bun ubodõgouf.
62002028	Neu kesu tar, gama ĩ bun agog ubodõgouf, ago ge di, ĩ wõ youf sain bun, ĩ isi di, ĩ mala bun, ada kumĩ sã ado mama sã tafarauf.
62002029	Ã, ĩ madur bagai anĩ keleĩ youf are, ã keleĩ, tamo idi ereb madur age difef anidi ganan ĩ bunem gogũ fedin.
62003001	Tamada, ada bun, wau laa fiya fatuk bagai ifanadan, anĩ nigin, Negur, ada in gere tar yedig. Are ada age fiya. Teneub enei ada nigin keleĩ sã, ere nigin, teneub enei ĩ nigin keleĩ sã.
62003002	Turau tar oboiyou, ada gama Negur nẽ gere tar. Age fe di, ada naig be fiya bagai wowã tauf, are fau yaor fiya sã. Anĩ ere, ada keleĩ, ĩ isyouf sain bun, ada ĩ gen wowã tauf, ere nigin, ada ĩ bagai anĩ tailauf.
62003003	Aib taka ĩ bun wau iseya anĩ ado, ĩ karẽtut bagai gen, ĩ yogo karẽtut ouf.
62003004	Aib taka mosor inof, ĩ lo wal fef. Momoi bagai, mosor are lo wal fiya.
62003005	Anĩ ere, ã keleĩ, ĩ ada neda mosor yalelauf nigin wõ yen. Agef fen, ĩ bun mosor sã.
62003006	Taka ĩ bun ibodok, ĩ mosor to inof iledig. Taka ĩ mosor inof iledig, ĩ to ilen be, oo, ĩ nigin keleĩ san.
62003007	Neu kesu tar, ã takam to idegneĩf. Aib taka ĩ ereb madur age fef, Odug ĩ madur bagai gen, ĩ madur.
62003008	Aib taka ĩ ereb mosor age fef, ĩ Satan nẽ, ere nigin, Satan ĩ gariya bunem mosor inof isin. Negur Naal ĩ, Satan nẽ kabĩ anĩ daũ falauf nigin wõ yen.
62003009	Taka Negur bunem gõ fen, ĩ mosor to inof iledig, ere nigin, Negur nẽ faat ĩ bun ibodok. Ĩ mosor inof ileya kisi feleya sã, ere nigin, ĩ Negur bunem gõ fen.
62003010	Ada ai anĩ Negur nẽ gere tar ado, ai anĩ Satan nẽ gere tar anĩ, naig tafe keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Aib taka ĩ ereb madur to age fef, ĩ Negur nẽ kesu sã, aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin to wau laa fef, ĩg Negur nẽ kesu sã.
62003011	Od enei ã gariya bunem karĩ gen, are ada abob nigin wauda laa fouf bagai.
62003012	Ã Kain gen to ago gouf, ĩ Satan nẽ fen, yogo tura yukesin. Ere nigin ĩ yogo tura yukesin? Ere nigin, yogon tobonunã are sane fen, yogo tura nẽ tobonunã are madur.
62003013	Turau tar, teneub enei nẽ tamo kayau sane diyeĩf are, to terẽ gouf.
62003014	Ada keleĩ, ada laa tator ken, mata ibodõya bun telen, ere nigin, ada neda turada tar nigin wauda laa fef. Aib taka ĩ to wau laa fef, ĩ laa bun ibodok.
62003015	Aib taka ĩ yogon tura nigin to orof, ĩ tamo yukesiya tamo, agef fen, ã keleĩ, tamo yukesiya tamo ĩ bun, mata ibodkeleya sã.
62003016	Ere anĩ wau laa fiya naig tafe ada keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Jesus Kristus ĩ ada nigin yogon mata itoron. Anĩ nigin, adag turada tar nigin neda mata tatorõf bagai.
62003017	Aib taka ĩ safina ado fen, yogon tura lau fiya bun ibodok anĩ ile fen, ĩ nigin wau to yuk, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya naig fe ĩ bun ibodok?
62003018	Neu kesu tar, ada od be, sigorada wogõya bunem wauda to laa fouf, anĩ ere, age tafedig ado momoi bun age tafouf.
62003019	Anĩ bunem, ada momoi bagai nẽ anĩ, ada keleĩ youf, age tafe fen, ada wauda yogon mala bun si inouf,
62003020	ada neda wauda, ada nigin kafĩ fiya ifanadauf sain anĩ buneg, age fouf. Ere nigin, Negur ĩ neda wauda wal fiya, agef fen, ĩ ereb ereb ganan nigin keleĩ.
62003021	Turau tar oboiyou, ada wauda kafĩ fiya to ifanadauf are, ada Negur mala bun kumĩ sã totol tafar fen,
62003022	ereb ada ĩ to tafiyek anĩ, ĩ bun tamal talouf, ere nigin, ada yogon ĩtãfiya dõ tafe fen, ereb ĩ orof anĩ age tafef.
62003023	Yogon ĩtãfiya are eig fiya. Negur Naal, Jesus Kristus nẽ yana nigin momoi tau fen, ĩ ada irokanadan kilei, abob nigin wauda laa fouf anĩ.
62003024	Idi yogon ĩtãfiya dõ difef anidi, ĩ bun dibodok, agef fen, ĩ idi bun ibodok. Ĩ ada bun ibodok anĩ, naig tafe ada keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Ada Awa Uur ifanadan anĩ bunem, ada anĩ keleĩ.
62004001	Turau tar oboiyou, uur ganan nigin to momoi ge fen, idi Negur bun tamal be sã anĩ ulogouf nigin, idi es wiyẽdigouf, ere nigin, idegẽya profet musei teneub ganan bun diyokelef.
62004002	Negur nẽ Awa Uur naig ge ã keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Uur ganan Jesus Kristus ĩ tamo bouwa bun isin anĩ dirõdig, are Negur bun temeleid.
62004003	Anĩ ere, uur ganan Jesus nigin wa difef, are Negur bun temeleid sã. Enei are Kristus nẽ kiwai anĩ nẽ uur, are ĩ mogo isif ya anĩ karĩ gen, gamag ĩ mogo tenebur ibodok.
62004004	Neu kesu tar, ã Negur nẽ ubodõg fen, idi wal wiyẽdigen, ere nigin, ĩ ã bun ibodok anĩ, ĩ tenebur ein ibodok anĩ wal fiya.
62004005	Idi tenebur temeleid, anĩ nigin, idi tenebur nẽ lo fiya bunem wogõ de di, tenebur tamo kayau idi karĩ difiyẽdidig.
62004006	Ada Negur bun temelada, age tafe di, aib ĩ Negur keleĩ, ada karĩ fadadig, anĩ ere, aib ĩ Negur bun tamal sã, ada to karĩ fadadig. Anĩ bunem, ada momoi bagai nẽ Awa Uur ado kũ fenẽya nẽ uur nigin keleĩ youf.
62004007	Turau tar oboiyou, abob nigin wauda laa fouf, ere nigin, wau laa fiya are Negur bunem isidig. Ganan waud laa fedig idi, are Negurem gõ fedi di, idi Negur keleĩ.
62004008	Aib taka ĩ to wau laa fedig, ĩ Negur keleĩ sã, ere nigin, Negur ĩ wau laa fiya.
62004009	Negur nẽ wau laa fiya eig fe ifelnadan. Ĩ yogon Naal tekelei bagai, ada ĩ bunem mata tabodõf nigin, tenebur sur fen.
62004010	Wau laa fiya are yeir. Ada Negur nigin wauda to laa fen, anĩ ere, ĩ ada nigin wau laaf fen, yogon Naal, neda mosor nigin Negur nẽ didi yo fiya nẽ sesewi fiya anĩ sur fen.
62004011	Turau tar oboiyou, Negur ĩ ada nigin agef wau laa fen nigin, adag abob nigin wauda laa fouf bagai.
62004012	Takam Negur to bagai ilen. Anĩ ere, ada abob nigin wauda laa fouf are, Negur ada bun ibod ken, yogon wau laa fiya ada bun kisi falauf.
62004013	Ada keleĩ, ada ĩ bun tabodok, agef fen, ĩ ada bun ibodok, ere nigin, ĩ yogon Awa Uur ada ifanadan.
62004014	Ada tail fen, kurõ tafeis, Dei, yogon Naal tenebur enei nẽ kel yaleya tamo wõ youf nigin sur fen, taudig.
62004015	Aib taka Jesus ĩ Negur Naal youf are, Negur ĩ bun ibodok, age fe di, ĩ Negur bun ibodok.
62004016	Age fiya nigin, ada, wau laa fiya ada nigin Negur ado anĩ kelei ken, momoi taudig. Negur ĩ wau laa fiya. Aib taka wau laa fiya bun ibodok, ĩ Negur bun ibodõ di, Negur ĩ bun ibodok.
62004017	Naab age fiya bun, wau laa fiya ada atun kisi fele di, ada es fiya naa bun, kumĩ sã, totol tafarauf, ere nigin, tenebur ein, ada Kristus gen tabodok.
62004018	Wau laa fiya bun, kumĩ taka to ibodok. Anĩ ere, wau laa fiya kisi feleya bagai anĩ, kumĩ irudig, ere nigin, kumĩ mala solo sane ado iledig. Taka ĩ kumĩ yef, ĩ wau laa fiya bun, kisi feleya bagai to wõ yef.
62004019	Ada wauda laa fedig, ere nigin, ĩ ketem ada nigin wau laa fen.
62004020	Aib taka ĩ aya Negur nigin wau laa fef ye fen, yogon tura nigin to orouf are, ĩ idegẽya tamal. Ere nigin, aib taka ĩ yogon tura ĩ iledig anĩ nigin to wau laa fef are, ĩ Negur to ilen anĩ nigin wau laa fiya kisi feleya sã.
62004021	Kristus ĩ ada ĩtãfiya enei ifanadan. Aib taka Negur nigin wau laa fef, ĩ yogon tura nigineg wau laa fouf bagai.
62005001	Aib taka ĩ Jesus ĩ Kristus yef, ĩ Negurem gõ fen, agef fen, aib taka tama nigin wau laa fef, ĩ yogon kesu nigineg wau laa fef.
62005002	Ada Negur nẽ gere tar nigin wauda laa fef ya anĩ, naig tafe keleĩ youf, are eig fiya. Negur nigin wau laaf fen, yogon ĩtãfiya dõ fiya bunem.
62005003	Negur nigin wau laa fiya, are yeir. Yogon ĩtãfiya dõ fiya. Agef fen, yogon ĩtãfiya are, ada age tafouf nigin morõ to ifanadadig,
62005004	ere nigin, ganan Negur bunem wowã den idi, tenebur nẽ oroya wal difedig. Momoiya bunem, ada tenebur nẽ oroya wal tafedig.
62005005	Aim anĩ tenebur nẽ oroya wal fef? Ĩ, Jesus Negur Naal ye fen, momoi yef anim dogol.
62005006	Enei anĩ, naan igũya nẽ naan ado laa nẽ naud bunem isin, are Jesus Kristus. Ĩ naan bunem dogol to isin, anĩ ere, naan ado naud bunem isin. Agef fen, Awa Uurem anĩ kurõ fesif, ere nigin, Awa Uur ĩ momoi bagai.
62005007	Towo anidim kurõ difesif.
62005008	Awa Uur, naan ado, naud. Agef fen, towo are tekelei wogõ def.
62005009	Ada tamom kurõ difesif anĩ taledig, anĩ ere, Negur nẽ kurõ fesiya are tamo nẽ wal fiya. Negur nẽ kurõ fesiya are yeir, ĩ yogon Naal nigin kurõ fesin.
62005010	Aib taka Negur Naal nigin momoi yef, ĩ kurõ fesiya od enei in wau bun ibodok. Aib taka Negur nigin to momoi yef, ĩ Negur idegẽya tamo yef, ere nigin, ĩ Negur yogon Naal nigin od kurõ fesin anĩ to momoi yef.
62005011	Kurõ fesiya od are yeir. Negur ada mata ibodkeleya ifanadan, age fe di, mata enei are yogo Naal bun ibodok.
62005012	Taka ĩ Naal ado, ĩ mata ado, taka ĩ Negur Naal sã, ĩ mata sã.
62005013	Aya, ã Negur Naal nẽ yana nigin momoi gef anĩ, mata ibodkeleya ã bun ibodok anĩ, ã keleĩ youf nigin enei atotkeneik.
62005014	Negur mala bun, ada kumĩ sã totol ado anĩ eig fiya. Ada yogon oroya dõ tafe fen, ereb taka nigin to tafiyẽf are, ĩ ada karĩ fadauf.
62005015	Age fe di, ada ereb nigin to tafiyek, ĩ karĩ fadadig anĩ ada keleĩ youf are, ada keleĩ, ereb ada to tafiyek are ada talef.
62005016	Aib taka ĩ yogon tura mosor laa bun to irouledig anĩ ino mog, ilouf are, ĩ tura nigin kosẽ ye di, Negur tura mata ifenẽf. Aya idi nedi mosor laa bun to guri feid irouledig anidi nigin wogõ auf. Mosor laa bun guri feid irouledig are ibodok. Aya mosor anĩ nigin kosẽ youf nigin to wogõ auf.
62005017	Kũ fenẽya ganan, are mosor, agef fen, mosor laa bun to guri feid irouledig anĩ ibodok.
62005018	Ada keleĩ, aib taka Negur bunem wõ yen, ĩ mosor to inof iledig. Negur Naal ĩ kulatun fiyẽ di, Satan nẽ anim ĩ to daũ fiyẽf.
62005019	Ada keleĩ, ada Negur nẽ gere tare di, teneub ganan Satan nẽ anĩ farumen ibodok.
62005020	Takag ada keleĩ, Negur Naal isi fen, ada keleĩ fokõ fanadan, are ada, Negur momoi bagai anĩ, keleĩ youf nigin age fen. Age fe di, ada, Negur momoi bagai anĩ bun tabodok, are yogon Naal Jesus Kristus bun. Ĩ momoi bagai Negur fen, mata ibodkeleya anĩ.
62005021	Neu kesu tar, idegẽya waitou so wiyẽdigouf.
63001001	Aya, sios nẽ mudur ado, kayau Negurem igirnen ado yogon gere tar bun pas enei atotof. Aya momoi anĩ bun ã nigin wau laa fedig, are aya dogol sã, anĩ ere, ganan idi momoi nigin keleĩ anidig,
63001002	are momoi anĩ ada namedan ibod ken, ada geid ibodkalauf anĩ nigin.
63001003	Wau ifenẽya, wau yũya ado, wau inosiya, Dei Negur ado Jesus Kristus, Dei nẽ Naal bunem, momoi ado wau laa fiya bun ada geid ibodõf.
63001004	Aya ogon gere tar tunĩ, Dei ada irokanadan kilei, momoi bun diyõ mog, ail fen, fatuk bagai wau al fen.
63001005	Gama, kayau oboiyou, aya ĩtãfiya mata õ to atotkonok, anĩ ere, ada gariya bunem talen anĩ dogol. Ada abob nigin wauda laa fouf anĩ, aya to afef.
63001006	Enei anĩ wau laa fiya, are ada yogon ĩtãfiya dõ fiya bun tayõf. Enei anĩ yogon ĩtãfiya, are ã gariya bunem mogo karĩ gen kilei, ã wauĩ laa fiya bun uyõgouf.
63001007	Idegẽya tamo musei, teneub ganan bun diyok, idi Jesus Kristus tamo bouwa bagai bun isin anĩ wa difedig. Tamo age fiya ĩ idegẽya tamo fen, ĩ Kristus nẽ kiwai.
63001008	Ã nigin amã kabĩ totol maledig anĩ, ege kilẽ to ilauf nigin ado, ã mala solo kisi feleya bagai walogouf nigin lo walagauf.
63001009	Taka ĩ Kristus nẽ ifelnẽya anĩ idod ken, anĩ bun to ibodok, ĩ namen Negur to ibodok. Aib taka ĩ ifelnẽya anĩ bun tobol fef ilef, ĩ namen Dei ado Naal dibodok.
63001010	Aib taka ã bun isi fen, ifelnẽya enei to irou isiyouf, ĩ ãgenei fõ bun to waleg uroulagauf, ĩ aaneg to wiyẽgouf.
63001011	Aib taka ĩ aan fiyek, ĩ yogon kabĩ sane bun weim kabĩ dalef.
63001012	Aya ã bun itotoya nigin musei ado, anĩ ere, aya pepa ado ink nem itotoya nigin to orouf. Age fiya ban, aya ã ki ayei ken, abob nawa bun wogõ tauf nigin wau irok, age tafe di, wauda al fiya anĩ isokosauf.
63001013	Ogon main Negurem igirnen anĩ nẽ gere tar, nedi aanya sur difef.
64001001	Aya, sios nẽ mudur ado, turau oboiyou Gaius, aya ĩ nigin momoi anĩ bun, wau laa fedig, ĩ bun pas enei atotof.
64001002	Turau oboiyou, ogon malãkanon biya ibodok gen, õ boũ biya ibod ken, ereb ereb ganan õ nigin biya ilauf nigin, aya kosẽ auf.
64001003	Turau tar tunĩ disi fen, õ momoi anĩ biya bagai dõ wo fen, momoi anĩ bun toku uyõdig anĩ dirokana di, aya fatuk bagai wau al fen.
64001004	Aya gereu tar momoi anĩ bun diyõdig karĩya anim, wau al fiya ereb ereb ganan wal fiya anĩ ifanadig.
64001005	Turau oboiyou, õ, turada tar idi, õ bun yaũ tamo anidi nigin el wo, biya ago wedidig.
64001006	Idi ogon waũ laa fiya nigin sios dirokenẽdin. Õ idi tobonunã Negur orof kilei sur wediyouf are, õ biya ago wouf.
64001007	Idi Odug yana nigin, haiden bun tamal isennẽya taka to dale fen, dilen.
64001008	Anĩ nigin, ada, momoi anĩ nigin weim kabĩ talouf nigin, tamo age fediya tasennẽdiyouf bagai.
64001009	Aya sios bun pas atoton, anĩ ere, Diotrefes uyulil ibodõya nigin wau laa fedig, ĩ nemã od to karĩ yedig.
64001010	Anĩ nigin, aya asiyouf sain bun, aya ĩ ereb age fef, amã nigin dumen od sane bagai irõdig anĩ yaor afouf. Anĩ dogol sã, ĩ turada tar yalediya nigin itoron. Ĩ idi turada tar yaleya nigin orodif anidig katũ feid fen, idi sios bun tamal yalelnẽdin.
64001011	Turau oboiyou, ereb sane anĩ to madẽ wo, ereb biya anĩ madẽ wouf. Aib taka ereb biya age fef, ĩ Negur bun tamal. Aib taka ereb sane age fef, ĩ Negur to ilen.
64001012	Demetrius ĩ nigin, ganan biya wogõ dedig, momoi anĩ ĩ yogog age fedig. Amãg ĩ nigin biya wogõ maudig, age mafe di, ã keleĩ, nemã wogõ are momoi.
64001013	Aya õ bun itotoya nigin musei ado, anĩ ere, aya pepa ado ink nem itotoya nigin to orouf.
64001014	Aya kaisã ileyõya nigin wau irok, age afe fen, abob nawa tail fen, wogõ tauf.
64001015	Wau inosiya õ bun ibodõf. Turada tar ein, nedi aanya sur difef. Turada tar an mugu mugu yeneid nem aan wediyouf.
65001001	Aya Jud, Jesus Kristus nẽ ferfer fen, Jems ne tura, idi Negurem iweignẽdin, Tamada Negur idi nigin wau laa fe di, Jesus Kristus kulatun fedidig anidi bun, pas enei atotof.
65001002	Wau yũya, wau inosiya ado, wau laa fiya, ã bun barikãf.
65001003	Turau tar oboiyou, aya, ã kel yaleya ada weim talen anĩ nigin atotkeneĩf nigin, kisi totol aledig, age a mã, aya kisi afen, aya atot fen, momoiya sain ganan nigin sain tekelei bun, Negur nẽ tamo kayau imeid bun ifenẽdin anĩ, el ge kulatun gouf nigin, totol bagai arokeneĩf, are deuf aun.
65001004	Ere nigin, tamo tunĩ idi daũ feidleya nigin mogo kulu yeneid itoton anidi, ã keleĩ sã mog, ã atun iminẽyan disin. Idi Negur nẽ ibodõya sã, idi neda Negur nẽ wau ifenẽya anĩ falei difel, karika tobonunã sane inoya nẽ gen dino fen, Jesus Kristus neda Uyu Irouya fen Odug yana wa difedig.
65001005	Momoi, ã enei ganan mogo keleĩ, anĩ ere, aya ã, Odug yogon tamo kayau Isip bun tamal kel gei fedin, anĩ ere, dum idi to momoi den anidi daũ feidlen anĩ nigin, baban wedereĩ fokõ afouf nigin orouf.
65001006	Takag, engel idi dogo neid ifareya modoũ bun to dibod ken, dogo neid modoũ ditoron anidi, Negurem es fiya naa odug nigin ye fen, idi gugum bun ineneĩd fen, sen mata ibodkeleya anim ifofakelen.
65001007	Age fiya bagai, Sodom Gomora ado, taun anidi kalilĩ fiya idi noli tobonunã ado tobonunã sane bun dilelen. Idi bun, yã mata faimud ibodkeleya nẽ darau dalouf anĩ nẽ malakanon ileyauf nigin age fen.
65001008	Naab gai age fiya bagai, imĩya tamo eneidi dogo bouweid amuyẽ dinoid fen, Negur nẽ yana dudum difiye ken, engel megeir adodo dumedin od dirõdig.
65001009	Anĩ ere, engel neid mudur ado Maikel, sain ĩ Satan ado Moses bouwa nigin luwa dirou fen, ĩ bouwa bun kumĩ sã od sane wogõya nigin itoron, anĩ ere, ĩ iron, “Odug õ ou yok!”
65001010	Anĩ ere, tamo eneidi, ereb idi keleĩ sã anĩ nigin, od sane dirõdig. Age de fen, idi gaar kisi sam gen, bouwa nẽ oroya bunem idi keleĩ anĩ dõ dife fen, daũ feleya bun dileledig.
65001011	Idi meleidlon ado! Idi Kain nẽ naab dõ difen. Idi moni nigin de fen, Balam nẽ kũ fenẽya bun kaisã dilelen. Idi Kora nẽ kiwai inoya dõ dife di, daũ feidlen.
65001012	Tamo enidi, ãgenei wauĩ laa fiya nẽ sifa bun, ã geid kumĩ sã saaf dokon maaĩwõ sa tuwa waag daũ fiyẽdig gen, daũ diyeĩdig. Idi sipsip lo fiya tamo, dogo naumeid nigin dogol kisi difedig gen. Idi budũ uyẽ sã, yaum irouf iyõdig gen. Idi aa wei, mayo sain bun faat sã, agef fen, laaf uru fen, warumutei teten isen gen.
65001013	Idi maaĩ moloun fatuk fã ye fen, dogo neid mama sali moku fiya gen. Idi barisa ilef isif fedig, anidi nigin karos bagai gugum keleya gai gai nigin saia fen gen.
65001014	Enok, ĩ Adam bunem isin ibor sewen, tamo eneidi nigin profet od wogõ yen, “Uleg, Odug ĩ yogon fateul anidi tausen tausen geid disif.
65001015	Ĩ ganan es feid fen, Negur nẽ to dibodok anidi ganan, dogo neid tobonunã sane, naab sane bun age difedig nigin ado, Negur nẽ to dibodok mosor temeleid anidi, od sane ganan ĩ nigin wogõ dedig nigin, Negur nẽ to dibodok anidi neid mosor yaor fediyouf.”
65001016	Tamo eneidi are nauseir temeleid fen, taka nẽ kũ fenẽya dimirẽdig. Idi dogo neid oroya sane dõ difedig. Idi dogo yeneid dales fen, dogo neid biya fiya nigin, tunĩ meleid yaleya bun biya biya le fen, wogõ dedig.
65001017	Anĩ ere, turau tar oboiyou, ereb neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ aposel mogo dirokenein anĩ kisi gouf.
65001018	Idi ã dirokenein, “Idikeleya sain bun, kono fiya tamo wowã de fen, dogo neid oroya sane dõ difouf.”
65001019	Tamo eneidim ã fara diyeĩf, idi tenebur nẽ kisi dõ de fen, Awa Uur idi bun to ibodok.
65001020	Anĩ ere, ã, turau tar oboiyou, ã aug nigin ãgenei momoiya fateul bagai bun fõ gen unogef useleg fen, Awa Uur Fateul bun kosẽ gouf.
65001021	Ã, neda Odug Jesus Kristus nẽ wau yũya anim, mata ibodkeleya bun irouleyeĩf anĩ tarig fen, Negur nẽ wau laa fiya bun, aug nigin kulatun gouf.
65001022	Idi momoiya totol sã nene def anidi bun wauĩ wenẽdigouf.
65001023	Tunĩ yã bun tamal gurar ge gei wedigouf. Agog fen, tunĩ bun wauĩ yũya aniniya ado ufelnẽdigouf. Anĩ ere, dogo neid kolos, bouwa nẽ oroya sanem amuyẽ iroun anĩ utorõg.
65001024	Negur ĩ, ã to kubũ gouf nigin kulatun yei ken, fula fiya medeĩya ĩ mala bun, kũ fenẽya sã, wau kulĩya odug ado ineneĩya kisi feleya ĩ anĩ bun,
65001025	ada Isennadaya Negur tekelei dogol ĩ anĩ bun, fula fiya medeĩya, totol, megeir ado, yana odug, neda Odug Jesus Kristus bunem, kulu, gama ado, faimud ibodkalauf! Momoi.
66001001	Jesus Kristus nẽ kurõ fesiya od, are ereb kaisã bagai wõ youf anĩ, Negurem yogon ferfer ifelnẽdiyouf nigin Jesus ifenen. Jesus ĩ, yogon ferfer Jon od anĩ keleĩ youf nigin, yogon engel Jon bun sur fen.
66001002	Jonem ereb ereb ganan ĩ ilen anĩ kurõ falaisif, are Negur nẽ od ado, Jesus Kristus nẽ od.
66001003	Taka ĩ profet od enei iwesef are ĩ el fiyek, agef fen, idi anĩ karĩ de fen, ereb anĩ bun itoton anĩ waud bun dinof anidi el fedif, ere nigin, sain mogo dodolef.
66001004	Aya Jon, Asia provins bun sios sewen bun pas enei atotof. Negur ĩ gama ibodok, kulu ibodon, dumen isiyouf bunem, uur sewen yogon king nẽ sia wagen difaref bunem ado,
66001005	Jesus Kristus ĩ Negur nẽ od el fe dõf wogõ yedig, ĩ tamo gare den bun tamal uyulil kel turĩ fiyen, tenebur king ganan neid mudur ĩ bunem, wau ifenẽya ado wau inosiya ã bun isif. Jesus ĩ ada nigin wau laaf fen, yogon naud bunem, ada neda mosor bun tamal yalelnadan.
66001006	Agef fen, ĩ ada yogon Tama Negur aruna yaleya nigin, in tano ado in pris inodan. Ĩ bun fula fiya medeĩya ado megeir gai gai ibodkalauf! Momoi.
66001007	Log, ĩ lalo bunem isif. Age fe di, meleid ganan ĩ dilouf, idi ĩ gilĩ difen anidig dilouf. Age fe di, tamo kayau tenebur ein ganan ĩ nigin waud gudũ fouf. Are agef bagai wõ youf! Momoi.
66001008	Odug Negur irok, “Aya uyulil ado idikeleya, aya gama abodok, kulu abodon, dumen asiyouf, aya saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri afeid uyu aroudig anĩ.”
66001009	Aya Jon, ãgenei tureĩ, aya, Jesus bun darau, Negur nẽ tano ado, feseya sã ifareya, ã geid taledig, aya Negur nẽ od ado Jesus nẽ od wogõ aun nigin, Patmos nuyo bun abodon.
66001010	Odug nẽ naa bun, aya Awa Uur namen abod ken, aya dumeun ait odug taur gen wõ ye mog, karĩ aun.
66001011	Ait iron, “Ereb õ ulef anĩ, buk kori fiya bun utot fen, sios sewen bun sur wediyouf, oun Efesus, Smerna, Pergamum, Taiataira, Sardis, Filadelfia ado, Laodisia.”
66001012	Aya ait wogõ fiyan anĩ ileya nigin falei aun. Aya falei aul fen, lam nẽ gol tutur sewen ailedin.
66001013	Lam tutur anĩ atun, aib taka “tamo naal gen” kolos meluk ifonũ di, yen isilen ado, let gol akor gu fen anĩ ifaren.
66001014	In mudur ado fatiya, sipsip siwi lalau, saa lalo lalau gen, yogon mala are yã mala fitotoleya gen.
66001015	Yogon ye are bras yã malan ifalegeya medeĩya gen, in ait are naan uhuhuya gen.
66001016	Yogon ima biyalẽ barisa sewen iroun, agef fen, in awa bun tamal, dimig bala waila si sitakã wõ yen. Yogon nawa are gaa ririya gen medeĩ yen.
66001017	Aya ĩ ail fen, aya ĩ ye gariyan kubũ au, laa gen ainen. Age afe di, ĩ ima biyalẽ aya teteun ino fen, iron, “Õ to kumĩ wo. Aya gariya, aya idikeleya.
66001018	Aya mata ibodõya nẽ, aya laa fiyan, anĩ ere, uleyaf, aya gai gai mata abodkalauf! Aya laa nẽ ado Hades nẽ ki aroudif.
66001019	“Anĩ nigin, ereb õ ulen, ereb gama ibodok, ereb dumen wõ youf anĩ utot.
66001020	Barisa sewen aya imau biyalẽ ulen ado, lam nẽ gol tutur sewen ulen anĩ nẽ waa nẽ gariya, are eig fiya: Barisa sewen are sios sewen neid engel, lam nẽ tutur sewen are sios sewen.
66002001	“Efesus sios nẽ engel bun utot: Od enei are, ĩ barisa sewen ima biyalẽ irou mog, sewen gol lam tutur difaren atun iyok ilen nẽ od:
66002002	Ereb õ ago wof, are aya keleĩ, ogon kabĩ totol yaleya ado ogon feseya sã ifareya anĩ. Aya keleĩ, õ tamo sesen to loloum weid fen, idi dogo anĩ aposel dedig, anĩ ere, aposel sã anidi es wiyeĩd fen, idi neid idegẽya anĩ ulen.
66002003	Õ totol ufar fen, neu yanau nigin morõ faali won, anĩ ere, õ to fõ yon.
66002004	Anĩ ere, aya õ nigin od enei ado: Õ uruwa aya nigin waũ laa fen anĩ utoron.
66002005	Anĩ nigin, õ nainenem kubũ won anĩ kisi wo! Falei wo fen, ereb uruwa agon anĩ agouf. Õ to falei wouf are, aya õ gein asi fen, ogon lam tutur ado yogon modoũ bun tamal alelauf.
66002006	Anĩ ere, tobonunã biya enei õ ado: Õ Nikolas dõ difiyek neid tobonuneid to oroyõdig, are ayag to oroudig.
66002007	Taka ĩ weder adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ Awa Uur sios irokenẽdif anĩ karĩ youf. Aib ĩ kusĩ anĩ wal fouf, aya ĩ mata ifenẽya nẽ aa Negur nẽ paradis bun ibodok anĩ bun tamal, yõya nigin yo afiyẽf.
66002008	“Smerna sios nẽ engel bun utot: Od enei are, ĩ gariya ado idikeleya, ĩ laaf fen, baban mata fã yen nẽ od.
66002009	Ogon darau ado ogon maleg nigin aya keleĩ, anĩ ere, õ safina musei ado. Aya idi dogo nigin Juda tamo dedig, anĩ ere, idi Juda tamo sã, Satan nẽ guru fiya anidi neid bou yũya od nigin keleĩ.
66002010	Ereb mogo õ darau ifonõf nigin to kumĩ wo. Aya õ arokonok, Satan ĩ mogo ã tunĩ kisi yeĩya nigin kalabus bun ineneĩf. Age fe di, ã naa ten darau walogouf. Õ laa bun dinenõfeg, ogon momoiya urou kafĩ walauf, ago di, aya õ mata nẽ teter kurũ ayõf.
66002011	Taka ĩ weder adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ Awa Uur sios irokenẽdif anĩ karĩ youf. Aib ĩ kusĩ anĩ wal fouf, namba tu nẽ laa ĩ to daũ fiyẽf.
66002012	“Pergamum sios nẽ engel bun utot: Od enei are, ĩ dimig bala waila si sitakã ado nẽ od.
66002013	Õ ubodok nẽ an aya keleĩ, an Satan nẽ sia ibodok. Anĩ ere, õ neu yanau urou kafĩ welef. Antipas, neu dõ fiya biya, aya nigin od wogõ yedig, ĩ Satan ibodok nẽ ãgenei taun an dukesin sain anĩ buneg, õ aya nigin ogon momoiya to folõ welen.
66002014	Anĩ ere, aya õ nigin od tunĩ ado: Õ tamo tunĩ an Balam nẽ keleĩ dirouf anidi ado, Balam ĩ Balak ifelnẽ di, Balak ĩ Israel tamo kayau yeid tũ fiya nẽ meein ino fen, idegnẽdi di, Israel idi saaf idegẽya waitou bun sesewi difen anĩ dokon, noli tobonunã dinon.
66002015	Age fiya gen, õ aneg tunĩ Nikolas nẽ ifelnẽya dirouf anidi ado.
66002016	Anĩ nigin, waũ falei wo! Sãf are, aya kaisã bagai õ gein asi fen, neu sigorou nẽ dimig ado idi geid kusĩ auf.
66002017	Taka ĩ weder adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ Awa Uur sios irokenẽdif anĩ karĩ youf. Aib ĩ kusĩ anĩ wal fouf, aya ĩ mana iminẽyan ibodok tunĩ afenẽf. Aya ĩ meein lalau takag, yana mata teten itoton anĩ afenẽf. Aib ĩ anĩ yalef dogol yana anĩ keleĩ youf.
66002018	“Taiataira sios nẽ engel bun utot: Od enei are Negur Naal nẽ od, yogon mala are yã mala fitotoleya gen, yogon ye are bras yã malan ifalegeya medeĩya gen.
66002019	Aya keleĩ, õ ereb agof, ogon waũ laa fiya ado momoiya, ogon aruna yaleya ado feseya sã ifareya. Aya keleĩ, õ uruwa bun ago won anĩ wal fiya gama õ agodig.
66002020	Anĩ ere, aya õ nigin od enei ado: Õ kayau Jesebel, ĩ yogo nigin profet kayau yef anĩ, loloum wedig. Ĩ yogon ifelnẽya bunem neu ferfer idegnẽdi di, idi noli tobonunã bun dile fen, saaf idegẽya waitou sesewi difen anĩ dõdig.
66002021	Aya ĩ yogon mosor nigin wau falei youf nigin sain afenen, anĩ ere, ĩ to orof.
66002022	Anĩ nigin, aya ĩ darau nẽ fatar bun ara ken, idi ĩ geid seseirã dinodig anidi, kayau anĩ nẽ naab nigin waud to falei youf are, aya idi darau fatuk bagai afenẽdiyouf.
66002023	Aya ĩ gere tar adenkesiyouf. Age afe di, sios ganan, aya waud ado kisi es afedig anĩ keleĩ youf. Age afe fen, aya ã mugu mugu ereb ereb ã ago gef kilei, mala solo afeneĩf.
66002024	Anĩ ere, aya ã tunĩ ganan Taiataira ufaregef anĩ arokeneik, ã kayau anĩ nẽ ifelnẽya to uroug fen, Satan nẽ waa namen bagai dedig anĩ to kelein anĩ arokeneik (aya ã bun ereb morõ taka to afeneĩf).
66002025	Ereb ã urougef anĩ dogol urougef uleg mog, asiyouf.
66002026	Aib ĩ kusĩ anĩ wal fe fen, neu oroya dõf ile, idikeleya bun ouf, aya ĩ teneub lo fediya nigin megeir afenẽf.
66002027	‘Ĩ ain manig nem ulum irokenẽdiyouf, ĩ mis gen daũ fedi di, urud falaisiyouf,’ are aya neu Dei bunem megeir alen gen.
66002028	Aya ĩ bonimei nẽ barisa kilokilog afenẽf.
66002029	Taka ĩ weder adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ Awa Uur sios irokenẽdif anĩ karĩ youf.
66003001	“Sardis sios nẽ engel bun utot: Od enei are, ĩ Negur nẽ uur sewen ado barisa sewen irouf anĩ nẽ od. Õ ereb agof, are aya keleĩ. Õ mata ubodok dedig, anĩ ere, õ laa yon.
66003002	Fã wale! Ereb mogo laa fou fenẽ anĩ megeir wenẽ, ere nigin, aya õ ereb agof are neu Negur nẽ mala bun tutuk bagai sã ailef.
66003003	Anĩ nigin, ereb õ walen, ereb õ karĩ won anĩ karĩ walauf. Anĩ dõ wo fen, waũ falei wo. Õ to fã walouf are, aya bẽ tamo gen asiyouf. Aya sain nanĩ be, õ gein asiyouf anĩ, õ to keleĩ youf.
66003004	Anĩ ere, õ, Sardis an tamo kayau tunĩ, idi neid kolos amuyẽ fiya sã difaref anidi ado. Idi kolos lalau difoun ken, aya geid mayõf, ere nigin, idi kisi feleya bagai.
66003005	Aib ĩ kusĩ anĩ wal fouf, ĩ idi gen kolos lalau ifonũf. Aya yogon yana, mata ibodõya nẽ buk bun tamal to alelauf, age afe fen, yogon yana neu Dei ado yogon engel meleid bun kurõ afesiyouf.
66003006	Taka ĩ weder adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ Awa Uur sios irokenẽdif anĩ karĩ youf.
66003007	“Filadelfia sios nẽ engel bun utot: Od enei are, ĩ fateul bagai ado momoi nẽ od, ĩ Dawid nẽ ki irouf. Ereb ĩ kã fef, taka nem to inolalauf, agef fen, ereb ĩ inolelef, taka nem to kã falauf.
66003008	Õ ereb agof, are aya keleĩ. Ulef, aya, sukar kã feleya taka nem inoleleya kisi felya sã anĩ, õ wagen anon. Aya keleĩ, õ megeir naal bagai ado, anĩ ere, õ neu od dõ wo fen, neu yanau to wa won.
66003009	Ulef, idi Satan nẽ guru fiya namen temeleid, idi dogo nigin Juda tamo dedig, anĩ ere, idi Juda tamo sã, idegẽya tamo anĩ, ayam age afe di, idi disi, õ yẽ gariyan kubũ de fen, aya õ nigin wau laa fedig anĩ idi keleĩ youf.
66003010	Õ feseya sã ufarauf nigin neu od urou kafĩ welen anĩ nigin, ayag idi tenebur dibodok kisi fediya nigin teneub ganan bun darau isiyouf sain bun, aya õ ahaha ayõf.
66003011	Aya kaisã bagai asiyouf. Õ ereb urouf anĩ kafĩ walauf, ago di, taka nem ogon kurũ fiya nẽ teter anĩ to yalouf.
66003012	Aib ĩ kusĩ anĩ wal fouf, aya, neu Negur nẽ tempel bun, ĩ monog tor atennẽf. Ĩ anĩ baban to bagai itorõf. Aya ĩ bun, neu Negur nẽ yana ado, neu Negur nẽ taun yana, Jerusalem mata, are saa ilun tamal neu Negur bunem isiyouf anĩ atotauf. Age afe fen, aya neu yanau matag ĩ bun atotauf.
66003013	Taka ĩ weder adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ Awa Uur sios irokenẽdif anĩ karĩ youf.
66003014	“Laodisia sios nẽ engel bun utot: Od enei are Momoi Barikã nẽ od, ĩ dõ fiya biya ado, momoi bagai Negur nẽ od wogõ yedig, ĩ ereb ereb Negur inodin ganan nẽ gariya.
66003015	Õ ereb agof anĩ aya keleĩ, are õ medir sã, uruwag sã. Aya õ medir be, uruwa anĩ taka ubodok nigin orouf.
66003016	Anĩ nigin, õ laigog, medir sã, uruwag sã nigin, aya õ mogo awau bun tamal atigil arãyõf.
66003017	Õ urõdig, ‘Aya safina ganan kisi feleya, aya safina musei alen nigin, aya ereb taka to lau afedig,’ wodig. Anĩ ere, õ keleĩ sã, õ gai sane bagai, malalon ado, maleg, malã ifofakeleya ado, gemũ ubodok.
66003018	Aya õ arokonok, õ aya bun gol bagai, gol yã bun difalegen anĩ, õ safina ganan kisi feleya bagai wõ wouf nigin, na walouf, õ kolos lalaug ufonũ di, ogon gemũ mama dede wouf nigin na walouf, õ mala marasin malã bun uno fen, kelẽ walauf nigin na walouf.
66003019	Aya idi nigin wau laa fedig anidi, aya ou afeid fen, tai afedidig. Anĩ nigin, kabĩ totol wale fen, mosor utor ken, waũ falei wouf.
66003020	Lo weleg, aya bobogẽ afar fen, godu afef. Taka ĩ aitou karĩ ye fen, sukar kã fouf are, aya ĩ namen asi fen, ĩ ado saaf mãf, age afe di, ĩ aya ado saaf mãf.
66003021	Aib ĩ kusĩ anĩ wal fouf, aya kusĩ wal afe fen, neu Dei nẽ king nẽ sia bun, neu Dei ado mabodok gen, ĩg neu king nẽ sia bun, aya ado mabodõf nigin yo afiyẽf.
66003022	Taka ĩ weder adouf, utornẽg len, ĩ Awa Uur sios irokenẽdif anĩ karĩ youf.”
66004001	Anĩ bure fele di, aya kelẽ aulen, aya wageun an saa ilun nẽ sukar kã feleya ifar mog, ailen. Age afe fen, ait aya uyulil taur gen wogõ fiya di, karĩ aun are iron, “Ein use, ago di, ereb enei bure fele di, wõ youf anĩ, afelnõf.”
66004002	Kaisã bagai aya Awa Uur namen abodon, age afe fen, wageun an saa ilun king nẽ sia bun, aib taka ibodon anĩ ailen.
66004003	Agef fen, taka an ibodon are, lo fiya bun meein medeĩya jaspa ado meein giriya medeĩya konilian gen wõ yen. Walol taka, meein aarau mata age fiya medeĩya emeral gen sof fen, king nẽ sia anĩ kalilĩ fen.
66004004	King nẽ sia anĩ sirin, tuwenti-fo king nẽ sia anim salili de fen, tuwenti-fo mudur adodo anĩ bun dibodon. Idi kolos lalau difoun ken, dogo neid mudureid bun king nẽ gol teter ado dibodon.
66004005	King nẽ sia bun kolimei filiya firagagaũ fe sof fen, gurũya odug wõ ye di, kolimei gudũ yen. King nẽ sia wagen lam sewen futu redin, are Negur nẽ awa uur sewen anĩ.
66004006	Takag, king nẽ sia wagen, ereb taka maaĩ gen galas nem dinon anĩ, galas medeĩya bagai age fiya ibodon. Anĩ atun king nẽ sia salili fiya bun, ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo difaren. Idi meleid barikã, wagedin ado dumedineg.
66004007	Ereb mata ibodõya uyu ifaren are laion gen, anĩ dõ fiya are bulmakau gen, anĩ dõ fiya are nawa, tamo nawa gen, anĩ dõ fiya are webi fatutu yef gen.
66004008	Ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo idi mugu mugu wayeid sigis ado fen, bouweid ganan bun meleid barikã, wayeid farumẽg meleid ado. Bõ ado gaa ado, idi eig yeya to folõ difeledig: “Fateul, fateul, fateul are Odug Negur saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri feid uyu iroudig anĩ, ĩ kulu ibodon, ĩ gama ibodok, ĩ dumen isiyouf.”
66004009	Ereb sain ereb mata ibodõya idi, taka ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibod ken, mata faimud ibodkeleya anĩ bun, fula fiya medeĩya, yana odug ado, de fiyẽya difenẽdig bun,
66004010	mudur adodo tuwenti-fo, ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibod mog, ĩ wagen kuku de fen, ĩ mata faimud ibodkeleya anĩ seli dalesedig. Idi king nẽ sia wagen dogo neid teter gõ difel fen, dirõdig:
66004011	“Nemã Odug Negur, õ fula fiya medeĩya, yana odug ado, megeir yaleya kisi feleya bagai, ere nigin, õ ereb ereb ganan ago di, wowã den, ago fen, ogon oroya bunem idi unodi di, age de difaref.”
66005001	Age de di, aya ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibodon anĩ ima biyalẽ, buk kori fiya si sitakã itotoya ado uris sewen nem ĩtã de fen, sile fiyan anĩ ailen.
66005002	Age afe fen, aya engel megeir ado taka ailen, ĩ ait odugem iweig iron, “Aim uris eneidi narĩ feid fen, buk kori fiya enei fara feleya kisi feleya?”
66005003	Anĩ ere, saa ilun be, tenebur be, teneub farumen tamal, taka nem buk kori fiya anĩ fara feleya be, namen fele fiya kisi feleya sã.
66005004	Aya fatuk bagai inã alen, ere nigin, taka nem buk kori fiya anĩ fara feleya be, namen fele fiya kisi feleya to wõ yen.
66005005	Age afe di, mudur adodo takam aya irokanan, “To inã wale! Ulef, Juda nẽ ibor bun tamal Laion, Dawid nẽ Warei mogo kusĩ wal fen. Inim, sã buk kori fiya anĩ yogon ĩtãfiya uris sewen ado fara falauf.”
66005006	Age ye di, aya Sipsip Naal dukesin anĩ gen, king nẽ sia ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo salili difiyen ado, mudur adodo atun ifar mog, ailen. Ĩ karat sewen ado mala sewen ado, mala sewen are Negur nẽ awa uur sewen teneub ganan bun susur fedin anidi.
66005007	Sipsip Naal ĩ isi fen, ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibodon anĩ nẽ ima biyalẽ buk kori fiya anĩ yalen.
66005008	Sain ĩ anĩ yalen, ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo, mudur adodo tuwenti-fo geid, Sipsip Naal wagen kuku den. Idi mugu mugu harp ado beĩ gol nem kaau sumeĩ biya isokoseya ado guri difen, kaau sumeĩ biya are momoiya tamo kayau neid kosẽ.
66005009	Age de fen, idi seg mata dalen: “Õ buk kori fiya anĩ wale fen, yogon ĩtãfiya uris sewen anĩ fara feleya kisi feleya bagai, ere nigin, õ dinõkesi di, õ ogon naud bunem ibor ganan bun, od fire fire ganan bun, tamo kayau ganan bun ado, teneub ganan bun, Negur nẽ tamo kayau na waledin.
66005010	Õ idi neda Negur aruna dalouf nigin, tano ado pris unenẽdin, ago di, idi teneub ganan lo fiya nigin mudur dibodõf.”
66005011	Age de di, aya malau ara ken, engel musei bagai neid aiteid karĩ aun, idi tausen musei ado handred tausen musei wal fiya. Idi king nẽ sia, ereb mata ibodõya ado, mudur adodo salili difiyẽdin.
66005012	Age de fen, idi aiteid odugem seg dalen: “Sipsip Naal dukesin ĩ megeir, safina, kisi biya, totol, yana odug, fula fiya medeĩya ado, yana yaleseya yaleya kisi feleya bagai!”
66005013	Agef fen, aya, ereb ereb ganan saa ilun difaref, tenebur difaref, teneub farumen difaref ado, maaĩ bun difaref, ereb ereb ganan anĩ namen mata difaref idi seg dale mog, karĩ aun: “Ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibodok ado Sipsip Naal bun, yana yaleseya, yana odug, fula fiya medeĩya ado, megeir, gai gai ibodkalauf!”
66005014	Ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo diron, “Momoi,” age de di, mudur adodo kuku de fen, yana dalesen.
66006001	Aya lo afe mog, Sipsip Naal ĩtãfiya uris sewen anĩ uyulil fara fen. Age fe di, aya, ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo takam, ait kolimei ait gen bun eig ye mog, karĩ aun, “Usi!”
66006002	Aya lo afen, aya wageun an hos lalau taka ifaren. Tamo anĩ teten ibodon ĩ wi taka iroun, ĩ kusĩ wal fiya nẽ teter ifenen, age fe di, ĩ hos bun kusĩ wal fe fen, kusĩ wal fediyouf nigin ilen.
66006003	Sipsip Naal ĩ ĩtãfiya uris uyulil dõ fiya anĩ fara fen, age fe di, aya ereb mata ibodõya uyulil dõ fiya anĩ eig ye mog, karĩ aun, “Usi!”
66006004	Age ye di, hos taka isin, are giriya bagai. Tamo anĩ teten ibodon ĩ, tenebur tamal malol yalel fen, tamo abob didenkesiyouf nigin megeir ifenen. Ĩ anĩ dimig odug ifenen.
66006005	Sipsip Naal ĩ ĩtãfiya uris anĩ dõ fiya fara fen, age fe di, aya ereb mata ibodõya anĩ dõ fiya anĩ eig ye mog, karĩ aun, “Usi!” Aya lo afen, aya wageun an hos karos taka ifaren. Tamo anĩ teten ibodon, yogon ima bun ĩ foi fiya nẽ safina iroun.
66006006	Age fe di, aya ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo atun ait taka gen karĩ aun are iron, “Naa tekelei nẽ mala solo wit bret tekelei yalouf, naa tekelei nẽ mala solo baali bret towo yalouf. Ago fen, oliv moul ado wain to daũ wo!”
66006007	Sipsip Naal ĩ ĩtãfiya uris anĩ dõ fiya fara fen, age fe di, aya ereb mata ibodõya anĩ dõ fiya anĩ eig ye mog, karĩ aun, “Usi!”
66006008	Aya lo afen, aya wageun an hos bailuya taka ifaren. Tamo anĩ teten ibodon ĩ yana Laa, age fe di, Hades ĩ degẽ degẽ fiyen. Idi tenebur tamo kayau aiwa adodo foi fiya atun taka anĩ, dimig nem, kadir nem, dagi odug nem ado, tenebur gaar kuĩ nem didenkesiyouf nigin megeir ifenẽdin.
66006009	Sipsip Naal ĩ ĩtãfiya uris anĩ dõ fiya fara fen, age fe di, aya idi Negur nẽ od dale fen, feseya sã od anĩ wogõ de di, didenkesin anidi neid meleidkanon alta farumen ailedin.
66006010	Idi aiteid odugem diweig diron, “Ereb ereb ganan nẽ Odug, fateul fen momoi, ere sain bun bagai, õ tenebur tamo kayau es woid fen, idi amã didenamakesin nigin mala solo wenẽdiyouf?”
66006011	Age de di, idi mugu mugu kolos lalau meluk ifenẽdin, agef fen, idi naal sain meluk tari de mog, dogo neid kabĩ tureid tar ado momoiya tamo kayau Negur igirnẽdin ganan, idi age difedin gen didenkesiya kisi falauf nigin irokenẽdin.
66006012	Aya ĩ ĩtãfiya uris anĩ dõ fiya fara fel mog, ailen. Age fe di, mimĩ odug wõ yen. Gaa gugum kel fen, wau gudũ fiya nẽ gabar meme siwi nem iwaya gen karos kelen. Ogõ oditekei naud giriya gen falei felen.
66006013	Age fe di, saa ilun barisa tenebur kuku ren, are aa fig faat dobi yau totolem yoũ fe di, kuku redig gen age fen.
66006014	Saa, pepa kori fiya gen iwaikelen, agef fen, arei ganan ado nuyo ganan, dogo neid modoũ ditoraran.
66006015	Age fe di, tenebur nẽ king, tamo yeneid adodo, kusĩ mudur, safina musei adodo, megeir adodo ado, ferfer ganan ado tamo kafĩ fiya sã bun difaref ganan, kuren ado arei nẽ sa atun diminanan.
66006016	Idi arei ado sa diweig dirokenẽdin, “Tetenaman kubũg fen, ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibodok anĩ nawa ado Sipsip Naal nẽ didi bun tamal unokolnamãg!
66006017	Ere nigin, idi neid didi nẽ naa odug mogo isin, anĩ nigin, aim ifareya kisi feleya?”
66007001	Anĩ bure fele di, aya engel aiwa adodo, teneub idikeleya uyu uyu aiwa adodo bun, difar fen, teneub uyu uyu aiwa adodo nẽ yau, yau takam teneub be, maaĩ be, aa taka bun to fũ fouf nigin kafĩ difel mog, ailen.
66007002	Age afe fen, aya engel taka mata ibodõya Negur nẽ ĩtãfiya uris ado gaa iseyan ise mog, ailen. Ĩ engel aiwa adodo teneub ado maaĩ daũ fiya nẽ megeir ifenẽdin anidi, ait odugem iweig irokenẽdin:
66007003	“Ã teneub be, maaĩ be, aa taka fau mog to daũg, amã neda Negur nẽ ferfer demeid bun ĩtãfiya uris manol len.”
66007004	Age ye di, aya idi ĩtãfiya nẽ uris dinon anidi ganĩ anĩ karĩ aun, are 144,000 idi Israel ibor ganan bun temeleid.
66007005	Juda nẽ ibor bun tamal 12,000 are ĩtãfiya uris dinon, Ruben nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000, Gad nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000,
66007006	Aser nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000, Naftali nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000, Manase nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000,
66007007	Simeon nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000, Lewi nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000, Isakar nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000,
66007008	Sebulun nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000, Josef nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000, Benjamin nẽ ibor bun tamal are 12,000.
66007009	Anĩ bure fele di, aya lo afen, aya wageun an guru fiya mala odug bagai, taka nem iwesleya kisi feleya sã, idi teneub ganan bun, ibor ganan bun, tamo kayau ganan bun ado, od fire fire ganan bun temeleid, idi king nẽ sia wagen ado Sipsip Naal wagen difaren. Idi kolos lalau meluk difoun ken, pam boge anã boge gen anĩ imedim guri difen.
66007010	Age de fen, idi aiteid odugem diweig diron: “Kel gei fiya are neda Negur king nẽ sia bun ibodok ado Sipsip Naal nẽ.”
66007011	Engel ganan, king nẽ sia ado, mudur adodo ado, ereb mata ibodõya aiwa adodo salili difiyeĩd difar fen, king nẽ sia wagen neweid lẽ kuku de fen, Negur yana dalesen.
66007012	Idi diron: “Momoi! Yana yaleseya, fula fiya medeĩya, kisi biya, de fiyẽya, yana odug, megeir ado, totol are neda Negur bun gai gai ibodkalauf. Momoi!”
66007013	Age de di, mudur adodo takam aya to fiyan, “Idi eneidi kolos lalau meluk difonun are nanidim, idi nainenem disin?”
66007014	Aya ĩ arokenen, “Tamo biya, õ keleĩ.” Age au di, ĩ irokanan, “Eneidi are darau, kafĩ fiya odug bun temeleid disin. Idi dogo neid kolos meluk Sipsip Naal naud nem kulo dife di, lalaun.
66007015	Anĩ nigin, “idi Negur nẽ king nẽ sia wagen difar fen, yogon tempel bun gaa ado bõ ganan aruna daledig. Age dife di, ĩ king nẽ sia bun ibodok anim yogon salafat biraraũ fe fen, kerũ fediyouf.
66007016	Idi baban to naũ fediyouf, to naan ail fediyouf. Gaam be, ereb uruwa adom, baban to isaĩnẽdiyouf.
66007017	Ere nigin, Sipsip Naal king nẽ sia atun ifaref inim, dogo neid lo fiya tamo ibodõf. Ĩ idi mata ibodõya nẽ naan warur bun gurif iroulediyouf. Age fe di, Negur ĩ idi meleid bun tamal maruid ganan waĩ falauf.”
66008001	Sain Sipsip Naal ĩtãfiya uris namba sewen anĩ fara fele di, saa ilun hap aua age fiya karasã sã mutũ bagai yenen.
66008002	Age fe di, aya engel sewen Negur wagen difaren anidi, taur sewen ifeneĩd mog, ailen.
66008003	Engel taka ĩ, aa gaula sumeĩ biya nẽ gol beĩ ado isi, alta bun ifaren. Ĩ aa gaula sumeĩ biya musei, momoiya tamo kayau ganan neid kosẽ ado, king nẽ sia wagen gol alta bun sesewi fouf nigin difenen.
66008004	Aa gaula sumeĩ biya nẽ kaau, momoiya tamo kayau neid kosẽ ado, engel ima bun tamal Negur wagen iselen.
66008005	Agef fen, engel aa gaula sumeĩ biya nẽ beĩ yale, alta bun tamal yã ife fen, tenebur iran, age fe di, kolimei gudũya, gurũya odug, kolimei filiya ado, mimĩ wõ yen.
66008006	Age fe di, engel sewen taur sewen ado, taur wese fiya nigin dodok difen.
66008007	Engel uyulil yogon taur wese fe di, uyẽ ais, yã naud ado bagu fen, isi di, tenebur iraran, age fe di, teneub tekelei faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka adok isaikelen, aa ganan faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka adok isaikelen, agef fen, fisir mata ganan isasaikelen.
66008008	Engel uyu wõ yen anĩ dõ fiya yogon taur wese fe di, ereb arei odug gen yã fitotoleya ado maaĩwõ iran. Maaĩ faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka, naud falei felen,
66008009	maaĩwõ ereb ereb mata ibodõya faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka gare den, agef fen, waag ganan faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka daũ felen.
66008010	Anĩ dõ fiya engel taka yogon taur wese fe di, barisa odug yal gen kaur fen, saa ilunem, naan faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka bun ado, naan warur anidi bun kubũ yen.
66008011	Barisa anĩ nẽ yana Dirikeĩ. Naan faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka dirikeĩ kele di, tamo kayau musei, naan dirikeĩ kelen anĩ bunem gare den.
66008012	Anĩ dõ fiya engel taka yogon taur wese fe di, gaa faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka, ogõ faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka ado, barisa faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka yũ di, idi ganan faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka gugum kelen. Naa faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka lalan sa kelen, agef fen, bõ faraf towo fiya gen anĩ takag age fen.
66008013	Aya lo afe mog, aya webi taka karĩ au mog, ilun fatutu ye fen, ait odugem iweig iron, “Malalon! Malalon! Malalon tenebur dibodok anidi bun, ere nigin, engel towog mogo taur ait wese difou fenẽ!”
66009001	Engel anĩ dõ fiya engel taka yogon taur wese fe di, aya barisa taka saa ilunem tenebur kubũ yen anĩ ailen. Barisa are ku isil idĩya sã nẽ ki anĩ ifenen.
66009002	Ĩ ku isil idĩya sã anĩ kã fele di, kaau are yã odug kũ fiya modoũ bun tamal gen fã yen. Ku isil idĩya sã bun tamal kaau anim, gaa ado saa gugum kelen.
66009003	Age fe di, kaau namen tamal, totobi tenebur wowã den, are idi neid megeir, tenebur ãbei neid megeir gen ifenẽdin.
66009004	Idi tenebur tamal fisir be, ereb aayũ be, aa taka to daũ difouf, anĩ ere, tamo kayau idi Negur nẽ uris demeid bun sã anidi dogol daũ difediyouf nigin irokenẽdin.
66009005	Idi tamo idenkesiya nẽ megeir to ifenẽdin, anĩ ere, idi ogõ faif bun darau dogol difenẽdiyouf nigin megeir ifenẽdin. Age fe di, idi neid darau arar, ãbei tamo garũ fe di, darau arar iledig gen.
66009006	Naa anidi bun tamo laa dimirẽf, anĩ ere, to dilouf. Idi laa orodiyouf, anĩ ere, laa to gurug fediyouf.
66009007	Totobi are hos kusĩ bun ileya nẽ gegen. Idi neid mudureid bun, ereb gol teter gen kurũ difedin, idi neid neweid tamo neweid gen.
66009008	Nedi fatiyeid kayau fatiyeid gen, agef fen, waileid are laion waila gen.
66009009	Nedi siot kapa are ain nẽ siot kapa gen, agef fen, idi neid wayeid furũya are hos musei ado karis kusĩ bun gududu de fen, gou redig gen.
66009010	Idi ibud ado waileid ãbei neid gen, agef fen, idi ibud nem ogõ faif bun tamo kayau darau difenẽdiyouf nigin megeir adon.
66009011	Idi uyu iroukenẽdiya nẽ king ado, are ku isil idĩya sã nẽ engel, in yana Hibru od nem are Abadon, Grik od nem are Apolion.
66009012	Morõ odug uyulil anĩ bure felen, age fe di, morõ odug uru are fau disif.
66009013	Engel namba sigis anĩ yogon taur wese fe di, aya ait taka gol alta Negur wagen ifaref anĩ nẽ karat aiwa adodo bunem wowã yeid mog, karĩ aun.
66009014	Ait are engel namba sigis taur ado anĩ irokenen, “Engel aiwa adodo Yufretis naan odug bun difofan anidi fara woidle.”
66009015	Age ye di, engel aiwa adodo are aua, naa, ogõ, yar enei bun bagai, tamo teneub ganan bun fara fiya towo anĩ taka adok didenkesiyouf nigin, dodok fedin anĩ folõ feledin.
66009016	Hos teten kusĩ bun ileya nẽ tamo anidi are 200 milion. Aya dogo neid namba karĩ aun.
66009017	Aya malau seleulã kurã fiya bun, hos adodo tamo hos tetedin dibodon anidi eig fiya ailedin: Idi neid siot kapa are, yã giriya gen, maaĩ gegẽ gen ado, bailuya salfa gen. Hos mudureid are, laion mudureid gen, agef fen, idi eweid bunem yã, kaau ado, salfa wowã yen.
66009018	Tamo tenebur ganan faraf towo fiya gen anĩ taka ganan, sane towo anim, yã, kaau ado, salfa idi eweid bun wowã yen anim didenkesin.
66009019	Hos idi neid megeir are eweid bun ado ibud bun ibodon, ere nigin, idi neid ibud are gogour gen fen, mudureid anim tamo kayau darau difenẽdidig.
66009020	Tamo kayau tunĩ ganan, sane eneidim to didenkesin anidi, idi imedim dinon anĩ to ditor ken, waud to falei yen. Idi kaa sesen yeneid yaleseya to ditor ken, gol, silwa, bras, meein ado, aa nẽ idegẽya waitou, are lo fiya, karĩya be, iyõya kisi felya sã anidi yeneid yaleseya itorõya sã.
66009021	Idi tamo yukesiya, dogo neid idegẽya kosẽya, dogo neid noli tobonunã be, dogo neid bẽ yaleya tobonunã nigineg waud to falei yen.
66010001	Anĩ bure fele di, aya engel megeir ado taka saa ilunem isi mog, ailen. Ĩ lalom silef fen, yogon mudur bun walol ado. In nawa gaa gen, agef fen, yogon ye are tor yã bobo reya gen.
66010002	Ĩ buk kori fiya naal taka ima bun fara feleya iroun. Ĩ ye biyalẽ maaĩ bun iten ken, ye kilẽ teneub bun itenen.
66010003	Agef fen, ĩ laion ninirã ye gen ken, ait odugem iweig iron. Sain ĩ iwegin, kolimei gudũya sewen neid aiteid wogõ den.
66010004	Kolimei gudũya sewen wogõ de di, aya anĩ atotau fenẽ age afen, anĩ ere, aya ait taka saa ilunem eig ye mog, karĩ aun, “Ereb kolimei gudũya sewen wogõ den anĩ bun ĩtãfiya uris uno fen, õ to utotauf.”
66010005	Age ye di, engel maaĩ bun ado teneub bun ifar mog ailen, are ima biyalẽ saa ilun yalesen.
66010006	Agef fen, engel ĩ, Negur gai gai mata ibodkeleya, saa ado ereb ereb ganan anĩ bun difaref, teneub ado ereb ereb ganan anĩ bun difaref, maaĩ ado ereb ereb ganan anĩ bun difaref inodin anĩ yana nem, wau kuturol fen, iron, “Foiya nẽ sain sã!
66010007	Anĩ ere, engel namba sewen anĩ yogon taur wese fouf naa bun, Negur nẽ waa, ĩ yogon ferfer profet irokenẽdin kilei, agef wõ ye kisi falauf.”
66010008	Anĩ bure fele di, ait saa ilunem aya irokana di, karĩ aun, are baban irokanan, “Ule, engel maaĩ ado teneub bun ifaref anĩ ima bun, buk kori fiya fara feleya irouf anĩ wale,” yen.
66010009	Age ye di, aya engel garan ele fen, buk kori fiya naal anĩ ifanauf nigin arokenen. Ĩ aya irokanan, “Are wale wõ wakas. Are õ namẽ bun dirikeĩ youf, anĩ ere, õ awã bun are nin te gen dan yõf.”
66010010	Aya buk kori fiya naal engel ima bun tamal ale on. Are neu awau bun nin te gen dan fiyan, anĩ ere, aya akalaisile di, nameun dirikeĩ fiyan.
66010011	Age afe di, idi aya dirokanan, “Õ tamo kayau musei, teneub musei, od musei ado, king musei nigin, baban profet od wogõ wouf.”
66011001	Aya sisi fiya nẽ tibog gen werĩ taka ifana fen, irokanan, “Ule fen, Negur nẽ tempel ado alta sisi wo fen, Negur yana an ganim dalesedig anĩ uwes.
66011002	Anĩ ere, tempel fofomala anĩ utor. Are to sisi wo, ere nigin, are haiden ifenẽdin. Idi foti-tu ogõ bun taun fateul anĩ lai difalauf.
66011003	Age dife di, aya neu od megeir fiya nẽ isennẽya tamo uru megeir afenẽdi di, idi 1,260 naa anidi bun wau gudũ fiya nẽ gabar difoun ken, profet od kurõ difesiyouf.”
66011004	Eneidi are oliv aa uru ado lam tutur uru, tenebur nẽ Odug wagen difaref.
66011005	Takam idi darau ifenẽdiya nigin age fouf are, yã eweid bunem wõ ye fen, idi neid kiwai tar oditekei yakur falauf. Aibem taka idi darau ifenẽdiyou fenẽ age fouf, are agef laa fouf bagai.
66011006	Tamo eneidi saa katĩ feleya nẽ megeir ado nigin, idi profet od wogõ douf sain, uyẽ to isiyouf, agef fen, idi naan falei fe di, naud wõya nigin megeir ado fen, ereb sain orodif kilei, idi ereb sane fire fire bunem teneub yũya nẽ megeir ado.
66011007	Idi Negur nẽ od kurõ fesiya bure difele di, gaar kuĩ anĩ ku isil idĩya sã bunem ulõ yeis fen, idi geid kusĩ de, wal feid fen, idenkesiyouf.
66011008	Idi neid bouweid buru taun odug anĩ nẽ naabur yenẽf, taun are yaab od bunem Sodom ado Isip dedig, an nedi Odugeg aa tetek bun dukesin.
66011009	Tamo kayau fire fire bun tamal, ibor fire fire bun tamal, od fire fire bun tamal ado, teneub fire fire bun tamal, tamo kayau idi, naa towo ado naa taka atun bun, nedi bouweid buru dile fen, mumã difouf nigin to yo douf.
66011010	Tamo kayau tenebur dibodok anidi, idi nigin waud al fe di, sifa dino fen, idi abob safina ege luwa difenẽf, ere nigin, profet uru eneidi, idi tenebur dibodok anidi darau difenẽdin.
66011011	Anĩ ere, naa towo ado naa taka atun anĩ bure fele di, mata neseya nẽ uur Negur bunem idi namedin ilen, age fe di, idi fafã de difaren. Age dife di, idi diledin are kumĩ tererẽ den.
66011012	Anĩ bure fele di, idi saa ilunem ait odug eig ye irokeneĩd mog, karĩ den, “Ilun ein useg,” yen. Age ye di, idi neid kiwai lo difeid mog, idi lalo bunem saa ilun diselen.
66011013	Sain anĩ bun bagai, mimĩ odug wõ ye di, taun anĩ bun ten tekelei adok daũ felen. Sewen tausen tamo kayau mimĩ anim idenkesin. Age fe di, idi gareya sã are kumĩ tererẽ de fen, saa ilun nẽ Negur fula fiya medeĩya difenen.
66011014	Morõ odug uyu ilen anĩ dõ fiya bure fele di, morõ odug anĩ dõ fiya mogo melsã bagai isiyou fenẽ.
66011015	Engel namba sewen anĩ yogon taur wese fe di, saa ilun ait odug wowã ye fen, diron: “Tenebur nẽ tano are, neda Odug ado yogon Kristus nẽ tano wõ yen, age fe di, ĩ gai gai lo fiya nigin anĩ nẽ mudur ibodõf.”
66011016	Age de di, tuwenti-fo mudur adodo, Negur wagen dogo neid king nẽ sia bun dibodon wageidlẽ kuku de fen, Negur yana dales,
66011017	diron: “Odug Negur saa ilun nẽ kusĩ tamo guri weid uyu uroudig anĩ, õ gama ubodok, kulu ubodon, amã õ de mayok, ere nigin, õ ogon megeir odug wale fen, lo fiya nigin king wõ won.
66011018	Teneub ganan waud sanen, anĩ ere, ogon didi mogo isin.
